AbilityHanger/AbilityType/Fight_Body.oracleText: When two creatures fight each deals noncombat damage equal to its power to the other.
AbilityHanger/AbilityType/Fight_Body.translation: 两个生物各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。

AbilityHanger/AbilityType/Goad_Body.oracleText: Until your next turn, a goaded creature attacks each combat if able. In games with more than two players, it attacks a player other than you if able.
AbilityHanger/AbilityType/Goad_Body.translation: 直到你的下一个回合，被煽惑的生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击使其被煽惑之永久物、咒语或异能的操控者以外的牌手，则必须如此作。

AbilityHanger/AbilityType/WinsTheFight_B.oracleText: If two creatures fight, each deals noncombat damage equal to its power to the other. A creature wins the fight if it is the only one that survives this damage.
AbilityHanger/AbilityType/WinsTheFight_B.translation: 如果两个生物互斗，它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的非战斗伤害。如果仅有一个生物存活，该生物赢得互斗。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Adamant.oracleText: This spell has an additional effect if cast with three mana of the indicated color.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Adamant.translation: 如果施放此咒语时支付过至少三点提及的法术力，则此咒语获得额外效应。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Addendum.oracleText: This spell has an additional effect if you cast it during your main phase.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Addendum.translation: 如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则它具有额外效应。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Ascend.oracleText: If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Ascend.translation: 如果你操控十个或更多永久物，则于这盘游戏接下来的时段中，你得到黄金城祝福。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Constellation.oracleText: This ability triggers when an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Constellation.translation: 当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，触发此异能。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Enrage.oracleText: This ability triggers whenever this creature takes damage.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Enrage.translation: 每当此生物受到伤害时，便会触发此异能。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/ForMirrodin_Bo.oracleText: When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/ForMirrodin_Bo.translation: 当此武具进战场时，派出一个2/2红色反抗军衍生生物，然后将它贴附于其上。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/InstantSorcery.translation: 当前是第{spellsCast}张瞬间／法术牌。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Intimidate_Bod.oracleText: A creature with Intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Intimidate_Bod.translation: 具威吓异能的生物只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Landfall.oracleText: This ability triggers when a land enters the battlefield under your control.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Landfall.translation: 当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，触发此异能。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/LifeGainedThis.oracleText: You have gained {lifeGained} life this turn.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/LifeGainedThis.translation: 本回合中你已获得{lifeGained}点生命。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/LifeGainedThis.oracleText: Your opponent has gained {lifeGained} life this turn.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/LifeGainedThis.translation: 本回合中你对手已获得{lifeGained}点生命。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Magecraft_Body.oracleText: This ability triggers when you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Magecraft_Body.translation: 每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，触发此异能。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/OtherInstantSo.translation: 当前是第{spellsCast}张其他瞬间／法术牌。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Raid.oracleText: This ability triggers if a creature you control attacked this turn.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Raid.translation: 如果本回合中由你操控的生物曾进行攻击，便会触发此异能。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Revolt.oracleText: This ability triggers if another permanent you control left the battlefield this turn.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Revolt.translation: 如果本回合中曾有其他由你操控的永久物离开战场，便会触发此异能。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/SpellsCastThis.oracleText: You have cast {spellsCast} spells this turn.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/SpellsCastThis.translation: 本回合中你已施放了{spellsCast}个咒语。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/SpellsCastThis.oracleText: Your opponent has cast {spellsCast} spells this turn.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/SpellsCastThis.translation: 本回合中你对手已施放了{spellsCast}个咒语。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Toxic_Body.oracleText: A player dealt combat damage by a creature with toxic also gets poison counters equal to that creature's total toxic value.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Toxic_Body.translation: 受此生物战斗伤害的牌手还会得到等同于其总下毒值的中毒指示物。

AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Undergrowth.oracleText: This ability checks the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
AbilityHanger/AbilityWord/Undergrowth.translation: 此异能会检查你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

AbilityHanger/CantSpecialize/Cant_Specia.oracleText: This permanent does not have specialized faces and can't specialize.
AbilityHanger/CantSpecialize/Cant_Specia.translation: 此永久物没有专精牌面，无法专精。

AbilityHanger/CantTransform/Cant_Transfo.oracleText: This is not a double-faced card and it can't transform.
AbilityHanger/CantTransform/Cant_Transfo.translation: 它本身不是双面牌，不会转化。

AbilityHanger/CantTransform/Cant_Transfo.oracleText: This permanent is not double-faced and can't transform.
AbilityHanger/CantTransform/Cant_Transfo.translation: 它本身不是双面牌，不会转化。

AbilityHanger/Counters/PoisonCounter_Bod.oracleText: A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.
AbilityHanger/Counters/PoisonCounter_Bod.translation: 如果一位牌手有十个或更多的中毒指示物，则其输掉游戏。

AbilityHanger/Counters/ShieldCounterRefe.oracleText: If a permanent with a shield counter on it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.
AbilityHanger/Counters/ShieldCounterRefe.translation: 如果其上有后盾指示物的永久物将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。

AbilityHanger/Counters/ShieldCounter_Bod.oracleText: If this would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.
AbilityHanger/Counters/ShieldCounter_Bod.translation: 如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。

AbilityHanger/Counters/StunCounterRefere.oracleText: If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.
AbilityHanger/Counters/StunCounterRefere.translation: 如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的已横置永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。

AbilityHanger/Counters/StunCounter_Body.oracleText: If this would become untapped, remove a stun counter from it instead.
AbilityHanger/Counters/StunCounter_Body.translation: 如果它将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。

AbilityHanger/DeckBuilder/CompanionViola.oracleText: This card invalidates your declared Companion. See the Companion's rules text for details.
AbilityHanger/DeckBuilder/CompanionViola.translation: 此牌会使你当前行侣无效，查看行侣文本了解规则详情。

AbilityHanger/Designation/ChosenCompanio.oracleText: This card is your chosen companion. Once per game you may pay {o3} any time you could cast a sorcery to put it into your hand.
AbilityHanger/Designation/ChosenCompanio.translation: 此牌是你选择的行侣。每盘游戏限一次于你可以施放法术的任意时机，你可以支付{o3}来将它放入手牌。

AbilityHanger/Designation/Commander_Body.oracleText: This commander will cost {cost} more the next time it is cast from the command zone.
AbilityHanger/Designation/Commander_Body.translation: 此指挥官下一次从统帅区中施放时，费用将增加{cost}。

AbilityHanger/Designation/Companion_Body.oracleText: If your starting deck meets the companion's restriction you may choose it to be your companion. Once per game you may pay {o3} any time you could cast a sorcery to put your chosen companion into your hand.
AbilityHanger/Designation/Companion_Body.translation: 如果你的起始套牌满足行侣条件，你可以将它选为你的行侣。每盘游戏限一次，于法术时机，你可以支付{o3}来将它置于你手上。

AbilityHanger/Designation/RingBearer_Bod.translation: 这个永久物是你的持戒人。

AbilityHanger/Entwine_Body.oracleText: You may pay an additional cost to choose both.
AbilityHanger/Entwine_Body.translation: 你可以额外支付费用以选择所有模式。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Accept_Body.oracleText: Choose one of three random offers, then one of three random conditions.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Accept_Body.translation: 选择三个随机提议中的一个，然后选择三个随机条件中的一个。（8选3）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt.oracleText: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt.translation: 如果此生物上没有+1/+1指示物，则在其上放置该数量的+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt1.oracleText: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt1.translation: 如果此生物上没有+1/+1指示物，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt2.oracleText: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt2.translation: 如果此生物上没有+1/+1指示物，则在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt3.oracleText: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt3.translation: 如果此生物上没有+1/+1指示物，则在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt4.oracleText: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Adapt4.translation: 如果此生物上没有+1/+1指示物，则在其上放置四个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afflict.oracleText: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses {numeral} life.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afflict.translation: 每当此生物被阻挡时，防御牌手失去{numeral}点生命。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AfinityForEquipmen.oracleText: This spell costs {o1} less to cast for each Equipment you control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AfinityForEquipmen.translation: 你每操控一个武具，此咒语便减少{o1}来施放。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife.oracleText: When this creature dies, create this many 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife.translation: 当此生物死去时，派出该数量的1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife1.oracleText: When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife1.translation: 当此生物死去时，派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife2.oracleText: When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife2.translation: 当此生物死去时，派出两个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife3.oracleText: When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Afterlife3.translation: 当此生物死去时，派出三个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Aftermath.oracleText: Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Aftermath.translation: 此咒语只能从你的坟墓场中施放。然后将它放逐。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass.oracleText: Put +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置若干+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色灵俑／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass1.oracleText: Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass1.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色灵俑／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass2.oracleText: Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass2.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色灵俑／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass3.oracleText: Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass3.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置三个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色灵俑／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass4.oracleText: Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Amass4.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置四个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色灵俑／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs1.oracleText: Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs1.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs2.oracleText: Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs2.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs3.oracleText: Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs3.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置三个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs4.oracleText: Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcs4.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置四个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcsX.oracleText: Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassOrcsX.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置X个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassX.oracleText: Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/AmassX.translation: 在一个由你操控的军队上放置X个+1/+1指示物。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色灵俑／军队衍生生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Backup1_Body.oracleText: When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it also gains the abilities printed below this one until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Backup1_Body.translation: 当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/BackupN_Body.oracleText: When this creature enters the battlefield, put {numeral} +1/+1 counters on target creature. If that's another creature, it also gains the abilities printed below this one until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/BackupN_Body.translation: 当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置{numeral}个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Bargain_Body.oracleText: You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Bargain_Body.translation: 你施放此咒语时可以牺牲一个神器，结界或衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/BattleCryReference.oracleText: Whenever a creature with battle cry attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/BattleCryReference.translation: 每当一个具有战嚎异能的生物攻击时，每个进行攻击的其他生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Battle_Cry_Body.oracleText: Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Battle_Cry_Body.translation: 每当此生物攻击时，每个进行攻击的其他生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Blitz_Body.oracleText: If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Blitz_Body.translation: 如果你支付此咒语的急袭费用来施放之，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Boast.oracleText: Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Boast.translation: 只能于此生物攻击过的回合中起动此异能，且每回合只能起动一次。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Bolster1_Body.oracleText: Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Bolster1_Body.translation: 选择一个由你操控的生物，且需是由你操控的生物中防御力最小或同为防御力最小者。在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Cascade.oracleText: When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost if its mana value is less than this spell's. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Cascade.translation: 当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶牌开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值比此咒语低、且不是地的牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用，只要该牌所成为的咒语之法术力值比此咒语低。然后将所有以此法放逐、且并未被施放的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Casualty2_Referenc.oracleText: As you cast a spell with casualty 2, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy that spell, and if it has any targets you may choose new targets for the copy.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Casualty2_Referenc.translation: 于你施放具催命2的咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量等于或大于2的生物。当你如此作时，复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CasualtyN_Body.oracleText: As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power {numeral} or greater. When you do, copy this spell, and if it has any targets you may choose new targets for the copy.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CasualtyN_Body.translation: 于你施放此咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量等于或大于{numeral}的生物。当你如此作时，复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CasualtyX_Body.oracleText: As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power X. When you do, copy this spell.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CasualtyX_Body.translation: 于你施放此咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量为X的生物。当你如此作时，复制此咒语。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Changeling.oracleText: This creature is every creature type.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Changeling.translation: 此生物是所有生物类别。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Cleave_Body.oracleText: You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Cleave_Body.translation: 你可以支付此咒语的贯通费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则删去方括号内的描述。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Compleated_Body.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="{manaCombined}"> can be paid with <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="{manaType0}">, <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="{manaType1}">, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Compleated_Body.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="{manaCombined}">可以用<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="{manaType0}">，<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="{manaType1}">，或2点生命来支付。如果以生命支付，则此鹏洛客进战场时上面少两个忠诚指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Compleated_Mono_Co.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xP{color}" color="#FFFFFF"> can be paid with <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x{color}">, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Compleated_Mono_Co.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xP{color}" color="#FFFFFF">可以用<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x{color}">，或2点生命来支付。如果以生命支付，则此鹏洛客进战场时上面少两个忠诚指示物。

For each <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xP{color}" color="#FFFFFF"> paid with life, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Conjure_Body.oracleText: A conjured card is added to the game.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Conjure_Body.translation: 一张变出的牌已添加到对局。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ConniveX_Body.oracleText: To have a creature connive X, draw X cards, then discard X cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each nonland card discarded this way.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ConniveX_Body.translation: 某生物筹谋的流程是抓X张牌，然后弃X张牌。每以此法弃掉一张非地牌，便在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Connive_Body.oracleText: To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Connive_Body.translation: 某生物筹谋的流程是抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃掉的是非地牌，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Convoke.oracleText: Your creatures can help you cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {o1} or one mana of that creature's color.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Convoke.translation: 你的生物能协助你施放此咒语。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{o1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithADinosaur.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile the four from among permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithADinosaur.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述四种化炼物件：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithADinosaur.oracleText: Craft with a Dinosaur, a Merfolk, a Pirate, and a Vampire
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithADinosaur.translation: 以一个恐龙、一个人鱼、一个海盗和一个吸血鬼化炼

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithArtifact_.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithArtifact_.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，放逐另一个由你操控的神器或一张你坟墓场中的神器牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithCave_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile a Cave you control or a Cave card from your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithCave_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，放逐另一个由你操控的洞窟或一张你坟墓场中的洞窟牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithCreature_.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile a creature you control or a creature card from your graveyard, Exile this card:  Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithCreature_.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，放逐另一个由你操控的生物或一张你坟墓场中的生物牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithFourOrMor.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile the four from among other permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithFourOrMor.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述化炼物件达四个或更多：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithFourOrMor.oracleText: Craft with four or more nonlands with activated abilities
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithFourOrMor.translation: 以四个或更多具起动式异能之非地物件化炼

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithIsland_Bo.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile an Island you control or an Island card from your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithIsland_Bo.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，放逐另一个由你操控的海岛或一张你坟墓场中的海岛牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithOneOrMore.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile one or more Dinosaurs you control and/or Dinosaur cards from your graveyard. Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithOneOrMore.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，从由你操控的恐龙和/或你坟墓场中的恐龙牌中放逐前述物件达一个或更多：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithOneOrMore.oracleText: Craft with one or more Dinosaurs
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithOneOrMore.translation: 以一个或更多恐龙化炼

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithOneOrMore.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile one or more other permanents you control and/or cards from your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithOneOrMore.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，从由你操控的其他永久物和/或你坟墓场中的牌中放逐前述物件达一个或更多：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。
以一个或更多物件化炼

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithTwoCreatu.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Exile the two from among creatures you control and/or cards in your graveyard, Exile this card: Return it transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CraftWithTwoCreatu.translation: {abilityCost}，放逐此牌，从由你操控的生物和/或你坟墓场中的生物牌中放逐前述物件达两个：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew1.oracleText: Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew1.translation: 横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于1的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew2.oracleText: Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew2.translation: 横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于2的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew3.oracleText: Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew4.oracleText: Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew4.translation: 横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于4的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew5.oracleText: Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew5.translation: 横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于5的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew6.oracleText: Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Crew6.translation: 横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于6的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/CursedRole_Body.oracleText: Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/CursedRole_Body.translation: 所结附的生物之基础力量和防御力为1/1。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Cycling.oracleText: You may pay the cycling cost to discard this card and draw a card.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Cycling.translation: 你可以支付循环费用并弃掉此牌来抓一张牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Dash_Body.oracleText: You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Dash_Body.translation: 你可以你选择支付此咒语的掩袭费用，若你如此作，它获得敏捷异能，并在结束步骤开始时，将此咒语成为的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Deathtouch.oracleText: Any amount of damage a source with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Deathtouch.translation: 具有死触异能的来源对生物造成任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Decayed_Body.oracleText: A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Decayed_Body.translation: 具败朽异能的生物不能进行阻挡。当它攻击，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Defender.oracleText: A creature with defender can't attack.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Defender.translation: 具守军异能的生物不能攻击。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Delve_Body.oracleText: Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1" color="#FFFFFF">.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Delve_Body.translation: 你可以为此咒语总费用中的每一点<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1" color="#FFFFFF">从你的坟墓场中放逐一张牌，而不支付该法术力。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Descend.oracleText: You descend each time a permanent card is put into your graveyard from anywhere.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Descend.translation: 如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Devoid_Body.oracleText: A devoid card has no color.

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Devotion.oracleText: Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Devotion.translation: 你的某种颜色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中该色法术力符号的数量。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlack.oracleText: Each {oB} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to black.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlack.translation: 你的黑色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oB}的数量。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlackAnd.oracleText: Each {oB} or {oG} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to black and green. (A {o(B/G)} only counts once)
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlackAnd.translation: 你的黑绿两色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oB}和{oG}的数量。（一个{o(B/G)}只计为一点）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlackAnd.oracleText: Each {oB} or {oR} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to black and red. (A {o(B/R)} only counts once)
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlackAnd.translation: 你的红黑两色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oB}和{oR}的数量。（一个{o(B/R)} 只计为一点）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlue.oracleText: Each {oU} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to blue.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlue.translation: 你的蓝色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oU}的数量。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlueAndB.oracleText: Each {oU} or {oB} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to blue and black. (A {o(U/B)} only counts once)

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlueAndR.oracleText: Each {oU} or {oR} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to blue and red. (A {o(U/R)} only counts once)
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToBlueAndR.translation: 你的红蓝两色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oU}和{oR}的数量。（一个{o(U/R)}只计为一点）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToGreen.oracleText: Each {oG} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to green.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToGreen.translation: 你的绿色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oG}的数量。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToGreenAnd.oracleText: Each {oG} or {oU} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to green and blue. (A {o(G/U)} only counts once)

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToGreenAnd.oracleText: Each {oG} or {oW} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to green and white. (A {o(G/W)} only counts once)
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToGreenAnd.translation: 你的白绿两色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oG}和{oW}的数量。（一个{o(G/W)}只计为一点）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToRed.oracleText: Each {oR} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to red.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToRed.translation: 你的红色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oR}的数量。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToRedAndGr.oracleText: Each {oR} or {oG} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to red and green. (A {o(R/G)} only counts once)
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToRedAndGr.translation: 你的红绿两色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oR}和{oG}的数量。（一个{o(R/G)}只计为一点）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToRedAndWh.oracleText: Each {oR} or {oW} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to red and white. (A {o(R/W)} only counts once)

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToWhite.translation: 你的白色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oW}的数量。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToWhiteAnd.oracleText: Each {oW} or {oB} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to white and black. (A {o(W/B)} only counts once)

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToWhiteAnd.oracleText: Each {oW} or {oU} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to white and blue. (A {o(W/U)} only counts once)
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DevotionToWhiteAnd.translation: 你的白蓝两色献力等同于由你操控的永久物之法术力费用中{oW}和{oU}的数量。（一个{o(W/U)}只计为一点）

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover10_Body.oracleText: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 10 or less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover10_Body.translation: 从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于10的非地牌为止。如果施放该牌所成之咒语的法术力值等于或小于10，你便可以施放之，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未施放，则将该牌置于你手上。将其余所放逐的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover3_Body.oracleText: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover3_Body.translation: 从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于3的非地牌为止。如果施放该牌所成之咒语的法术力值等于或小于3，你便可以施放之，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未施放，则将该牌置于你手上。将其余所放逐的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover4_Body.oracleText: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover4_Body.translation: 从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于4的非地牌为止。如果施放该牌所成之咒语的法术力值等于或小于4，你便可以施放之，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未施放，则将该牌置于你手上。将其余所放逐的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover5_Body.oracleText: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 5 or less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Discover5_Body.translation: 从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于5的非地牌为止。如果施放该牌所成之咒语的法术力值等于或小于5，你便可以施放之，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未施放，则将该牌置于你手上。将其余所放逐的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DiscoverX_Body.oracleText: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value X or less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DiscoverX_Body.translation: 从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于X的非地牌为止。如果施放该牌所成之咒语的法术力值等于或小于X，你便可以施放之，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未施放，则将该牌置于你手上。将其余所放逐的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Disturb.oracleText: You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Disturb.translation: 你可以从你坟墓场中施放已转化的此牌，且支付其惊扰费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DoubleStrike.oracleText: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage. (Does not apply when creatures "fight")
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DoubleStrike.translation: 具连击异能的生物能造成先攻与普通战斗伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DoubleTeam_Body.oracleText: When a creature with double team attacks, if it's not a token, conjure a duplicate into your hand, then both of them perpetually lose double team.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DoubleTeam_Body.translation: 当具后继异能的生物攻击时，如果它不为衍生物，变出一张它的复制牌置于你手上，然后两者永久失去后继异能。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/DraftFromSpellbook.oracleText: To draft from a spellbook select one of three random cards from this card's spellbook to add to your hand.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/DraftFromSpellbook.translation: 系统从法术书的所有选项中随机给出三张牌，你选择其中一张，将其置于你手上。
从法术书中发现一张牌

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Echo_Body.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Echo_Body.translation: 在你的维持开始时，若你在你最近的维持开始后才开始操控该永久物，则除非你支付其返响费用，否则牺牲之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Embalm.oracleText: You may pay the Embalm cost and exile this card from your graveyard to create a token that's a copy of this card, except it's white, it has no mana cost, and it's a Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Embalm.translation: 你可以支付遗存费用并从你的坟墓场放逐此牌来派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为此牌的复制品，但它是白色，没有法术力费用，且额外具有灵俑此类别。只能于法术时机起动。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Emerge.oracleText: You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Emerge.translation: 你可以牺牲一个生物并支付化生费用用来施放此咒语，此时总费用会扣除该生物之法术力值。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Enlist_Body.oracleText: As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Enlist_Body.translation: 于此生物攻击时，你可以横置一个由你操控、不具召唤失调且未进行攻击的生物。当你如此作时，将所横置生物的力量加至此生物直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Equip.oracleText: You may pay the Equip cost to attach this permanent to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Equip.translation: 你可以支付佩带费用将此永久物装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Escalate.oracleText: Pay the escalate cost for each mode chosen beyond the first
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Escalate.translation: 第一个模式之外每多选一个模式，便须支付一次此费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Escape.oracleText: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Escape.translation: 你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其逸脱费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Eternalize.oracleText: You may pay the Eternalize cost to exile this card from your graveyard and create a token that's a copy of this card, except it's black, it's 4/4, it has no mana cost, and it's a Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Eternalize.translation: 你可以支付永生费用并从你的坟墓场放逐此牌来派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为此牌的复制品，但它为黑色，是4/4，没有法术力费用，且额外具有灵俑此类别。只能于法术时机起动。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Evoke.oracleText: You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Evoke.translation: 你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Evolve.oracleText: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Evolve.translation: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，若该生物的力量或防御力大于此生物，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Exalted_Body.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents you control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Exalted_Body.translation: 每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，由你操控的永久物的每个颂威异能使该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Exert.oracleText: An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Exert.translation: 已耗竭的生物于你的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Exploit_Body.oracleText: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Exploit_Body.translation: 当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Explore.oracleText: Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Explore.translation: 展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Extort.oracleText: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xWB">. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Extort.translation: 每当你施放一个咒语时，你可以支付<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xWB">。如果你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等同于以此法失去的生命总和的生命。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fabricate1.oracleText: When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fabricate1.translation: 当此生物进战场时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物或派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fabricate2.oracleText: When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fabricate2.translation: 当此生物进战场时，在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物或派出两个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fabricate3.oracleText: When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fabricate3.translation: 当此生物进战场时，在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物或派出三个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fear_Body.oracleText: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Fear_Body.translation: 此生物只能被神器生物和／或黑色生物阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/FinalityCounter.oracleText: If a permanent with a finality counter on it would go to a graveyard from the battlefield, exile it instead.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/FinalityCounter.translation: 如果其上有终命指示物的永久物将从战场进入坟墓场，则改为放逐之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/FirstStrike.oracleText: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. (Does not apply when creatures "fight")
AbilityHanger/Keyword/FirstStrike.translation: 具先攻异能的生物会比不具此异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flash.oracleText: You may cast a spell with flash any time you could cast an instant.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flash.translation: 你可以于能够施放瞬间的时机下施放具有闪现异能的咒语。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flashback.oracleText: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flashback.translation: 你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flashback_Referenc.oracleText: You may cast a card with flashback from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flashback_Referenc.translation: 你可以从你的坟墓场施放一张具有返照异能的牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flying.oracleText: A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Flying.translation: 具飞行异能的生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Forestcycling_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Forestcycling_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张树林牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Forestwalk.oracleText: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Forestwalk.translation: 只要防御牌手操控树林，此生物就不能被阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Foretell.oracleText: During your turn, you may pay <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x2"> and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Foretell.translation: 于你的回合中，你可以支付<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x2"> 并将此牌从手上牌面朝下地放逐，在之后的回合你可以施放它并须改为支付其预示费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/HasFinalityCounter.oracleText: If this would go to a graveyard from the battlefield, exile this instead.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/HasFinalityCounter.translation: 如果它将从战场进入坟墓场，则改为放逐之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Haste.oracleText: A creature with haste can attack and {oT} as soon as it comes under your control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Haste.translation: 具敏捷异能的生物受你操控时便能攻击与{oT}。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof.oracleText: A player or permanent with Hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof.translation: 具辟邪异能的牌手或永久物不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof from Blac.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of black spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof from Blac.translation: 此生物不能成为由对手操控之黑色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof from Blue.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of blue spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof from Blue.translation: 此生物不能成为由对手操控之蓝色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof from Whit.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of white spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof from Whit.translation: 此生物不能成为由对手操控之白色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromAColor.oracleText: A player or permanent with hexproof from a color can't be target of spells or abilities your opponents control of that color.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromAColor.translation: 具有反某色辟邪的牌手或永久物不能成为由对手所操控之该色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromGreen_.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of green spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromGreen_.translation: 此永久物不能成为由对手所操控之绿色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromMultic.oracleText: A permanent with hexproof from multicolored can't be the target of multicolored spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromMultic.translation: 具有反多色辟邪的永久物不能成为由对手所操控之多色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromRed_Bo.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of red spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/HexproofFromRed_Bo.translation: 此永久物不能成为由对手所操控之红色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof_from_Arti.oracleText: A permanent with hexproof from artifacts and enchantments can't be the target of abilities from artifacts or enchantments your opponents control, or Auras your opponents cast.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof_from_Arti.translation: 具有反神器和结界辟邪的永久物不能成为由对手所操控之神器或结界的异能目标，也不能成为由对手操控之灵气的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof_from_Mono.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of monocolored spells or abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof_from_Mono.translation: 此生物不能成为由对手操控之单色咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof_from_Plan.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of planeswalker abilities your opponents control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hexproof_from_Plan.translation: 该永久物不能成为由对手所操控之鹏洛客异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hideaway5_Body.oracleText: When this permanent enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Hideaway5_Body.translation: 当此永久物进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Improvise.oracleText: Your artifacts can help you cast this spell. Each artifact you tap pays for {o1}.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Improvise.translation: 你的神器能协助你施放此咒语。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{o1}。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate1_Body.oracleText: Create an Incubator token with a +1/+1 counter on it and "{o2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate1_Body.translation: 派出一个上面有一个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{o2}：转化此神器。」 它转化为0/0非瑞人神器衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate2_Body.oracleText: Create an Incubator token with 2 +1/+1 counters on it and "{o2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate2_Body.translation: 派出一个上面有2个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{o2}：转化此神器。」 它转化为0/0非瑞人神器衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate3_Body.oracleText: Create an Incubator token with 3 +1/+1 counters on it and "{o2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate3_Body.translation: 派出一个上面有3个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{o2}：转化此神器。」 它转化为0/0非瑞人神器衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate4_Body.oracleText: Create an Incubator token with 4 +1/+1 counters on it and "{o2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate4_Body.translation: 派出一个上面有4个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{o2}：转化此神器。」 它转化为0/0非瑞人神器衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate5_Body.oracleText: Create an Incubator token with 5 +1/+1 counters on it and "{o2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Incubate5_Body.translation: 派出一个上面有5个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{o2}：转化此神器。」 它转化为0/0非瑞人神器衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/IncubateX_Body.oracleText: Create an Incubator token with X +1/+1 counters on it and "{o2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/IncubateX_Body.translation: 派出一个上面有X个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{o2}：转化此神器。」 它转化为0/0非瑞人神器衍生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Indestructible.oracleText: Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy a permanent with indestructible, and if it's a creature, it can't be destroyed by damage.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Indestructible.translation: 注明「消灭」的效应不会消灭具不灭异能的永久物，且如果其是生物，则不会因伤害而消灭。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Infect_Body.oracleText: A creature with infect deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Infect_Body.translation: 具有侵染生物以-1/-1指示物的形式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的形式对牌手造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Investigate.oracleText: Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{o2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card."
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Investigate.translation: 派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且其具有「{o2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Islandcycling_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Islandcycling_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Islandwalk_Body.oracleText: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Island.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Islandwalk_Body.translation: 只要防御牌手操控海岛，此生物便不能被阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Jump-start.oracleText: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Jump-start.translation: 你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，但必须支付其所需费用并额外弃一张牌。然后放逐此牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Kicker.oracleText: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Kicker.translation: 你施放此咒语时可以支付额外费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Learn.oracleText: You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Learn.translation: 你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。如果你未弃牌，则你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌，并将它置于你手上。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Lifelink.oracleText: Damage dealt by a creature, planeswalker or spell with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Lifelink.translation: 具系命异能之生物、鹏洛客或咒语造成的伤害，会让其操控者获得等量的生命。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/LivingWeapon_Body.oracleText: When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/LivingWeapon_Body.translation: 当此武具进战场时，派出一个0/0黑色非瑞人/病菌衍生生物，然后将它贴附此武具。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/LongListEnts_Body.oracleText: When you cast your next creature spell of that type this turn, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {linkedInfoItems}
AbilityHanger/Keyword/LongListEnts_Body.translation: 当你施放你的下一个具有该类别的生物咒语，该生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。 {linkedInfoItems}

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Madness.oracleText: If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Madness.translation: 若你将弃掉此牌，则改为将其弃到放逐区，若你如此作，可以通过支付其疯魔费用来施放之，若你未以此法施放则将此牌置入坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Madness_Reference.oracleText: If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Madness_Reference.translation: 如果你弃掉一张具有疯魔异能的牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Menace.oracleText: A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Menace.translation: 具威慑异能的生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mentor.oracleText: Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mentor.translation: 每当此生物攻击时，在目标进行攻击且力量小于它的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mill.oracleText: To mill a card a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mill.translation: 牌手磨一张牌指该牌手将牌库顶牌置于其坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modified.oracleText: Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modified.translation: 由你操控的武具，灵气，以及指示物是饰装。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modular1.oracleText: This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modular1.translation: 此永久物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。当它死去时，你可以将它的+1/+1指示物置于目标神器生物上。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modular2.oracleText: This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modular2.translation: 此永久物进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。当它死去时，你可以将它的+1/+1指示物置于目标神器生物上。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modular4.oracleText: This enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Modular4.translation: 此永久物进战场时上面有四个+1/+1指示物。当它死去时，你可以将它的+1/+1指示物置于目标神器生物上。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Morph_Body.oracleText: You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x3">. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Morph_Body.translation: 你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x3">，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mountaincycling_Bo.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mountaincycling_Bo.translation: {abilityCost}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张山脉牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mutate_Body.oracleText: If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it under or over target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Mutate_Body.translation: 如果你支付合变费用施放之，则改为将其放置在目标你拥有的非人类生物的顶上或底下，他们合变做顶上的生物，并拥有底下生物的所有异能。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Ninjutsu_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Ninjutsu_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Outlast_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xT" color="#FFFFFF">: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Outlast_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xT" color="#FFFFFF">：在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。延生的时机视同法术。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Overload.oracleText: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Overload.translation: 你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的“目标”字样全部更改为“每个”。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/PermanentTypesInGr.translation: 当前在坟墓场中的牌具有的永久物类型为：{permanentTypes}

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Perpetual_Body.oracleText: Perpetual effects are not removed from cards that change zones.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Perpetual_Body.translation: 永久效应不会在卡牌改变区域时移除。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Persist.oracleText: When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Persist.translation: 当此生物死去时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/PhasedOut.oracleText: This permanent is treated as if it doesn't exist until the start of its controller's next turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/PhasedOut.translation: 此永久物直到其操控者的下个回合视为不存在。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Phasing_Body.oracleText: Permanents that phase out, and anything attached to them, are treated as if they don't exist until the start of their controller's next turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Phasing_Body.translation: 跃离的永久物及其贴附的所有东西直到其操控者的下一个重置阶段重置前视为不存在。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Plainscycling_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Plainscycling_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/PlaneswalkerAffini.oracleText: This spell costs <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1"> less to cast for each planeswalker you control.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/PlaneswalkerAffini.translation: 你每操控一个鹏洛客，此咒语便减少<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1">来施放。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Proliferate.oracleText: Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Proliferate.translation: 选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromBlac.translation: 此生物不能被黑色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromBlue.translation: 此生物不能被蓝色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromChos.translation: 你不能被选定名字的任何东西指定为目标，造成伤害或结附。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromChos.translation: 此永久物不能被法术力值为所选数字以外的东西阻挡，指定为目标，造成伤害，结附或是装备。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromDevi.translation: 该永久物不能被魔鬼阻挡，指定为目标或造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromDogs.translation: 具有反狗保护的永久物不能被狗阻挡，指定为目标或造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromHuma.translation: 该永久物不能被人类阻挡，指定为目标或造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromOdd.oracleText: This permanent can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with an odd mana value.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromOdd.translation: 此永久物不能被法术力值为奇数的任何东西阻挡，指定为目标，造成伤害，结附或是装备。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromPlan.oracleText: This creature can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by planeswalkers.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromPlan.translation: 该生物不能被神生物阻挡，指定为目标或造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromRed.oracleText: This permanent can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything red.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromRed.translation: 此生物不能被红色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromWere.translation: 该永久物不能被狼人阻挡，指定为目标或造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromWhit.oracleText: This permanent can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything white.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromWhit.translation: 此生物不能被白色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ProtectionFromZomb.translation: 该生物不能被灵佣阻挡，指定为目标或造成伤害。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Prototype_Body.translation: 你施放此咒语时可选不同法术力费用、颜色和攻防的版本，其异能与类别不变。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Prowess.oracleText: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Prowess.translation: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，此生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Reach.oracleText: A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Reach.translation: 具有延势异能的生物可以阻挡具有飞行异能的生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ReadAhead_Body.oracleText: Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ReadAhead_Body.translation: 选择一个章节，此传纪一开始就有该数量的学问指示物。于你抓牌步骤后再加一个。跳过的章节不会触发。到III 后牺牲之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Rebound_Body.oracleText: If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Rebound_Body.translation: 如果你从手上施放此咒语，于它结算时将之放逐。在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Rebound_Referenced.oracleText: If you cast a spell with rebound from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Rebound_Referenced.translation: 如果一个具有弹回异能的咒语是从你手上施放，则此咒语结算时不进入你的坟墓场，改为将它放逐，并且在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不须支付其法术力费用。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Reconfigure_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Reconfigure_Body.translation: {abilityCost}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上；或从生物上卸装。重配的时机视同法术，它于贴附期间不是生物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Reinforce2_Body.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF">, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Reinforce2_Body.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF">，弃掉此牌：在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ReinforceX_Body.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xX" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF">, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ReinforceX_Body.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xX" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF">，弃掉此牌：在目标生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Retrace.oracleText: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Retrace.translation: 你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，但必须支付其所需费用，并额外弃掉一张地牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Riot.oracleText: A creature with riot enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Riot.translation: 具有起事异能的生物进战场时，你选择「+1/+1指示物」或「敏捷」异能。它进战场时上面有所选加成。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Role_Addendum.oracleText: If a creature has more than one Role controlled by the same player attached to it, all but the most recent one is put into the graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Role_Addendum.translation: 如果某个永久物其上结附有由同一位牌手操控的数个角色，则除了具最近之时间印记者外，所有其他这类角色都会被置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Role_Body.oracleText: If a creature has more than one Role controlled by the same player attached to it, all but the most recent one is put into the graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Role_Body.translation: 如果某个永久物其上结附有由同一位牌手操控的数个角色，则除了具最近之时间印记者外，所有其他这类角色都会被置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/RoyalRole_Body.oracleText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {o1}.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/RoyalRole_Body.translation: 所结附的生物得+1/+1 且具有守护{o1}。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scavenge_Body.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x5" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF">, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scavenge_Body.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x5" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG" color="#FFFFFF">，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry.oracleText: Look at the top cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry.translation: 检视你的牌库顶的若干牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry1.oracleText: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry1.translation: 检视你的牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry2.oracleText: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry2.translation: 检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry3.oracleText: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry3.translation: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry4.oracleText: Look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Scry4.translation: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/ScryX.oracleText: Look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/ScryX.translation: 检视你牌库顶的X张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Seek_Body.oracleText: To seek a card, put one at random from your library into your hand.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Seek_Body.translation: 掏一张牌，指从你的牌库中随机将一张牌置于你的手上。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Shroud_Body.oracleText: A player or permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells of abilities.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Shroud_Body.translation: 具有帷幕的牌手或永久物不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Siege_Body.oracleText: A battle is a permanent type that enters with defense counters. As a Siege battle enters, your opponent will be chosen to protect it, while you can attack it. Damage removes its defense counters, when the last counter is removed, exile it, then cast it transformed.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Siege_Body.translation: 战役是一种带有布防指示物的永久物类别。于围攻进战场时，选择一位对手来防卫之。你可以攻击它。 伤害会使其失去等量的布防指示物，当移去战役上最后一个布防指示物时，围攻的操控者将之放逐，且可以施放已转化的此牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Skulk.oracleText: A creature with skulk can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Skulk.translation: 具潜匿的生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/SorcererRole_Body.oracleText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1."
AbilityHanger/Keyword/SorcererRole_Body.translation: 所结附的生物得+1/+1且具有「每当此生物攻击时，占卜 1。」

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Specialize_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Choose a color, discard a card of that color or associated basic land type: This creature perpetually specializes into that color. Activate only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Specialize_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，选择一种颜色，弃一张该颜色或相关基本地类别的牌：此生物永久专精为该颜色。只能于法术时机起动。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Spectacle.oracleText: You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Spectacle.translation: 如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/SplitSecond.oracleText: As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/SplitSecond.translation: 只要具有转瞬异能的咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能施放咒语或起动不是法术力异能的异能。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Storm.oracleText: When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Storm.translation: 当你施放具有风暴异能的咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。 你可以为复制品选择新的目标。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Support2_Body.oracleText: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Support2_Body.translation: 在至多两个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil.oracleText: Look at the top card(s) of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil.translation: 检视你牌库顶的若干牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil1.oracleText: Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil1.translation: 检视你的牌库顶的牌。你可以将其置入你的坟墓场。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil2.oracleText: Look at the top 2 cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil2.translation: 检视你牌库顶的2张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil3.oracleText: Look at the top 3 cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil3.translation: 检视你牌库顶的3张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil4.oracleText: Look at the top 4 cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil4.translation: 检视你牌库顶的4张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil5.oracleText: Look at the top 5 cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Surveil5.translation: 检视你牌库顶的5张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Swampcycling_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Swampcycling_Body.translation: {abilityCost}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张沼泽牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Swampwalk.oracleText: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Swampwalk.translation: 只要防御牌手操控沼泽，此生物就不能被阻挡。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/TheRingTemptsYou_B.oracleText: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become or remain your Ring-bearer.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/TheRingTemptsYou_B.translation: 于魔戒引诱你时，如果你没有名称为魔戒的徽记，则你获得一个该徽记。然后你的徽记获得其下一个异能，且你可以选择一个由你操控的生物来担任持戒人。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Training_Body.oracleText: Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Training_Body.translation: 当此生物与另一个力量较之为大的生物一起攻击时，在前者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Trample.oracleText: A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Trample.translation: 具践踏异能的生物造成之过量战斗伤害能对所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Undying_Body.oracleText: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Undying_Body.translation: 当此生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将该生物在你的操控下返回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Unearth_Body.oracleText: {abilityCost}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Unearth_Body.translation: {abilityCost}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。若它将离开战场则改为将其放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Unearth_Body_Gener.oracleText: To Unearth a card return it from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Unearth_Body_Gener.translation: 破坟将一张牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。若它将离开战场则改为将其放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/VentureIntoTheDung.oracleText: Enter the first room of a dungeon. If already in a dungeon advance to the next room instead.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/VentureIntoTheDung.translation: 进入一个地城的第一个房间。 若已在地城中则改为前进至下一个房间。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Vigilance.oracleText: Attacking doesn't cause a creature with vigilance to tap.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Vigilance.translation: 具警戒异能的生物攻击时不需横置。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/Ward.oracleText: Whenever a permanent with ward becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays the ward cost.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/Ward.translation: 每当此永久物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付守护费用，否则反击之。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/WickedRole_Body.oracleText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/WickedRole_Body.translation: 所结附的生物得+1/+1。当此灵气从战场进入坟墓场时，每位对手各失去 1 点生命。

AbilityHanger/Keyword/YoungHeroRole_Body.oracleText: Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it."
AbilityHanger/Keyword/YoungHeroRole_Body.translation: 所结附的生物具有「每当此生物攻击时，若它的防御力等于或小于 3，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」

AbilityHanger/Keyword/monsterRole_Body.oracleText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
AbilityHanger/Keyword/monsterRole_Body.translation: 所结附的生物得+1/+1 且具有践踏异能。

AbilityHanger/Morph_Body.oracleText: You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x3">. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.
AbilityHanger/Morph_Body.translation: 你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x3">，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Abil.oracleText: You can't activate abilities on this card except mana abilities because of {affector}.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Abil.translation: 由于{affector}，你只能起动此牌的法术力异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Abil.oracleText: You can't activate abilities on this card except mana abilities.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Abil.translation: 你只能起动此牌的法术力异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Loya.oracleText: You can't activate this card's loyalty abilities because of {affector}.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Loya.translation: 由于{affector}，你不能起动此牌的忠诚异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Loya.oracleText: You can't activate this card's loyalty abilities.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Loya.translation: 你不能起动此牌的忠诚异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Mana.oracleText: You can't activate mana production abilities on the card {cardName} because of {preventerCardName}.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Mana.translation: 由于{preventerCardName}，你不能起动{cardName}上能够产生法术力的异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Mana.translation: 由于有效应限制，你不能起动{cardName}上能够产生法术力的异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Prev.oracleText: You can't activate abilities on this card because of {affector}.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Prev.translation: 由于{affector}，你不能起动此牌的异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Prev.oracleText: You can't activate abilities on this card.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Activated_Prev.translation: 你不能起动此牌的异能。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_AdaptHasC.oracleText: This creature will not successfully Adapt if it has one or more +1/+1 counters on it.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_AdaptHasC.translation: 如果此生物上已有一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则演化没有效果。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_EntersTap.oracleText: This card would enter the battlefield tapped.

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Legendary.oracleText: You already have a copy of this legendary in play. Playing this one will require you to choose which copy to keep.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Legendary.translation: 你在场上已有一个与此同名的传奇。使用此牌的话，你必须牺牲其中一个。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Legendary.oracleText: You already control a legendary with this name. Specializing into this color will require you to choose which legendary to keep.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Legendary.translation: 你已经操控具有该名称的传奇。专精为该颜色会要求你选择保留某个传奇。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Undefined.oracleText: Playing this card right now may not be the best choice.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Undefined.translation: 现在使用此牌可能不是最佳选择。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Unpayable.oracleText: This card will be sacrificed after being played if you can't pay the cost.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_Unpayable.translation: 如果你无法支付相应费用，则在你使用此牌之后，便需将它牺牲。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_WouldSacr.oracleText: This card will be sacrificed when it enters the battlefield if you can't sacrifice two other lands.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Body_WouldSacr.translation: 如果你无法牺牲两个其他地，则当此牌进战场时，便需将它牺牲。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Cast_Prevented.oracleText: You can't cast this spell because of {preventerCardName}.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Cast_Prevented.translation: 由于{preventerCardName}，你不能施放此咒语。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Cast_Prevented.oracleText: You can't cast this spell right now.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Cast_Prevented.translation: 你现在不能施放此咒语。

AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Play_Prevented.oracleText: You can't play this card because of {cardTitle}.
You can't play this card because of an effect.
AbilityHanger/PlayWarning/Play_Prevented.translation: 由于有效应限制，你不能使用此牌。

AbilityHanger/Qualification/CanBeTheTarg.oracleText: Can be the target of spells and abilities as though it didn't have hexproof
AbilityHanger/Qualification/CanBeTheTarg.translation: 能视同不具辟邪异能地指定为咒语或异能的目标

AbilityHanger/Qualification/CanPlayThisT.oracleText: You may play this card until the end of this turn.
AbilityHanger/Qualification/CanPlayThisT.translation: 直到本回合结束，你可以使用此牌。

AbilityHanger/Qualification/MayPlayThisT.oracleText: May Play Until End of Turn
AbilityHanger/Qualification/MayPlayThisT.translation: 直到回合结束可以使用

AbilityHanger/Regenerate_Body.oracleText: If a creature regenerates, the next time that turn it would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it
AbilityHanger/Regenerate_Body.translation: 如果一个生物可以重生，本回合中，当它下一次将要被消灭时，改为移除其上标记的所有伤害，并横置它。如果它为进行攻击或阻挡的生物，则将其移出战斗。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/A-Satoru_Um.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xB">, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/A-Satoru_Um.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xB">, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Adventure_B.oracleText: You may cast this card as an Adventure, after you do exile it. You may then cast the creature later from exile.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Adventure_B.translation: 你能将此牌当作历险来施放，之后会将它放逐。稍后你可以从放逐区施放该生物。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Adventure_B.oracleText: You may cast this card as an Adventure, after you do exile it. You may then cast the artifact later from exile.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Adventure_B.translation: 你能将此牌当作历险来施放，之后会将它放逐。稍后你可以从放逐区施放该神器。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Adventure_B.oracleText: You may cast this card as an Adventure, after you do exile it. You may then cast the permanent spell later from exile.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Adventure_B.translation: 你能将此牌当作历险来施放，之后会将它放逐。稍后你可以从放逐区施放该永久物咒语。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/ArtifactAff.oracleText: A spell with affinity for artifacts costs <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1"> less to cast for each artifact controlled (currently {amount}).
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/ArtifactAff.translation: 你每操控一个神器，具神器共鸣异能的咒语便减少<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1">来施放。（当前你操控{amount}个神器。）

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/ArtifactAff.oracleText: A spell with affinity for artifacts costs <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1"> less to cast for each artifact controlled.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/ArtifactAff.translation: 你每操控一个神器，具神器共鸣异能的咒语便减少<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1">来施放。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/CardStyle/B.translation: 卡牌样式是用于更改牌张的卡图、牌框等外观的饰品。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/HappilyEver.translation: 由你操控的永久物之中所包括的颜色有{count}种。
由你操控的永久物之中所包括的颜色有{count}种。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/HappilyEver.oracleText: Life total greater than or equal to your starting life total.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/HappilyEver.translation: 总生命等于或大于你的起始总生命。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/HappilyEver.oracleText: {count} card type among permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/HappilyEver.translation: 由你操控的永久物和／或在你坟墓场中的牌之中牌张类别有{count}种。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Historic/Hi.translation: 神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Information.oracleText: Only you can see this card. It's hidden to your opponent.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Information.translation: 只有你能看到此牌。不会向你的对手公开。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/Information.translation: 你和对手都能看得到此牌的正面。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/LegendaryIn.oracleText: You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/LegendaryIn.translation: 你只能于你操控传奇生物或传奇鹏洛客时施放传奇瞬间。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/LegendarySo.oracleText: You can cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.
AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/LegendarySo.translation: 你只能于你操控传奇生物或传奇鹏洛客时施放传奇法术。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/MultipleFac.translation: 右击查看更多信息和制作选项。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/NPE/Explain.translation: 进行攻击或阻挡时造成的伤害数量。
消灭该生物所需的伤害数量。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/NPE/Land_Bo.translation: 地可以产生用于施放咒语的法术力。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/NPE/SumSick.translation: 生物在其受你操控的首个回合中不能攻击。

AbilityHanger/SpecialHangers/NPE/Tapped_.translation: 生物攻击时需要横置。已横置的生物不能进行阻挡。
