Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_B_Desc.oracleText: As a black mage, every advantage comes at a cost. Sacrifice whatever is necessary to control the forces of death and darkness.
Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_B_Desc.translation: 身为黑色法师，你深知不付出代价就没有回报，为能掌控死亡与黑暗之力，甘愿作出任何牺牲。

Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_G_Desc.oracleText: As a green mage, the natural world is at your command. The power of life itself fuels your magic.
Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_G_Desc.translation: 身为绿色法师，你能够掌控整个自然世界，生命的力量本身就会为你提供充沛法力。

Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_R_Desc.oracleText: As a red mage, you revel in the chaos of battle. Fire is your weapon and your inspiration.
Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_R_Desc.translation: 身为红色法师，你陶醉于战斗的混乱，火焰既是你的武器，又能给你启迪。

Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_U_Desc.oracleText: As a blue mage, you control the battlefield through illusion. Always think three steps ahead of your foe.
Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_U_Desc.translation: 身为蓝色法师，你通过虚影来掌控战场，总是能够料敌先机。

Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_W_Desc.oracleText: As a white mage, you command disciplined armies. Enforce order to overwhelm your enemies.
Decks/Precon/CC_ANB_W_Desc.translation: 身为白色法师，你手下部队纪律严明，强化秩序以征服对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_Dreamhack2023_Desc.oracleText: An army of Soldiers is at your command on MTG Arena. Now, march into battle and onward to victory!
Decks/Precon/Precon_Dreamhack2023_Desc.translation: An army of Soldiers is at your command on MTG Arena. Now, march into battle and onward to victory!

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_BG_Desc.oracleText: Death is only the first step. What comes next - or comes back - is worth waiting for.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_BG_Desc.translation: 死亡只是第一步。接下来会发生什么 - 或回来 - 值得等待。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_BR_Desc.oracleText: Victory requires taking chances. Lead your army into battle, no matter the risks.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_BR_Desc.translation: 胜利需要把握机会。带领你的军队投入战斗，无论风险如何。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_GU_Desc.oracleText: These creatures are large and in charge, and you'd better believe they mean business.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_GU_Desc.translation: 这些生物体型庞大，掌管着一切，你最好相信它们是认真的。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_GW_Desc.oracleText: The tales of this deck's Adventures have been told far and wide. Now you can become part of them!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_GW_Desc.translation: 该套牌的历险故事已广为流传。现在你可以成为它们的一部分！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_RG_Desc.oracleText: Ferocity and might are the keys to victory when these big brawlers come to the table.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_RG_Desc.translation: 当这些大斗士出现时，凶猛和威力是胜利的关键。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_RW_Desc.oracleText: Expect plenty of derring-do and heroics when these gallant knights take the field.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_RW_Desc.translation: 当这些英勇的骑士上场时，预计会有大量的惊险动作和英雄主义。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_UB_Desc.oracleText: The creatures of Ikoria can exhibit many very strange, very useful mutations.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_UB_Desc.translation: 依克黎的生物可以表现出许多非常奇怪、非常有用的变异。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_UR_Desc.oracleText: Each spark, each mote of magic will fuel your power. Keep casting and seize victory.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_UR_Desc.translation: 每一个火花，每一粒魔法都会激发你的力量。继续铸造，夺取胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_WB_Desc.oracleText: Put your life total to work for you, and your opponents will struggle to keep up.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_WB_Desc.translation: 让你的生命总量为你工作，你的对手将难以跟上。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_WU_Desc.oracleText: From the starfield of Nyx, use these enchantments and artifacts to outwit your opponent.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2021_WU_Desc.translation: 在尼兹的星空中，使用这些结界和神器智取你的对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_BG_Desc.oracleText: Even the humblest creature can grow to be a real terror - and this deck is far from humble!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_BG_Desc.translation: 即使是最卑微的生物也可以成长为真正的恐怖——而这套牌远非卑微！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_BR_Desc.oracleText: It's time to collect the price on your opponent's head. Just don't spend it all in one place!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_BR_Desc.translation: 是时候猎取对手头上的悬赏了。只是不要把所有的钱都花在一个地方！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_GU_Desc.oracleText: Get ready to ramp! When this snowstorm hits, it'll be all downhill for anyone in your way.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_GU_Desc.translation: 准备好斜坡（双关：ramp）！当这场暴风雪来袭时，任何挡路的人都会走下坡路。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_GW_Desc.oracleText: Live long and beat down! Build up your army and your life total, then bring down the house.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_GW_Desc.translation: 活着并胜利！构建你的军队和你的总生命，然后把房子拆掉。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_RG_Desc.oracleText: It's a jungle out there! Every new land you discover will help power your creatures to victory.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_RG_Desc.translation: 外面是丛林！你发现的每一个新地都将帮助你的生物获得胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_RW_Desc.oracleText: Eyes open, there's danger afoot! Use your equipment to get a leg up, then kick your opponents to the curb.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_RW_Desc.translation: 睁眼，危险就在眼前！用你的装备站起来，然后把你的对手踢到路边。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_UB_Desc.oracleText: Keep the battlefield clear until the late game. Then you'll be taking control while they're wondering where it all went wrong.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_UB_Desc.translation: 保持战场清空，直到游戏后期。然后，当他们想知道哪里出了问题时，你将获得控制权。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_UR_Desc.oracleText: It's showtime! Show off some flashy moves with these crafty wizards and their powerful spells.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_UR_Desc.translation: 好戏开场了！用这些狡猾的巫师和他们强大的咒语炫耀一些华丽的动作。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_WB_Desc.oracleText: Adventurers, assemble! Get your party together, then head into the dungeon. The only danger is to your enemies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_WB_Desc.translation: 冒险家们，集合! 召集你的队伍，然后进入地牢。唯一的危险是对你的敌人而言。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_WU_Desc.oracleText: The sky is the limit! Plan your moves carefully, and your air game will reign supreme.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2022_WU_Desc.translation: 天空才是极限！仔细计划你的动作，你的空中游戏将至高无上。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_BG_Desc.oracleText: Fill up your graveyard with goodies to use, reuse, and abuse its contents against your terrified opponents!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_BG_Desc.translation: 用好东西填满你的坟墓场，使用、重复使用和滥用它的内容来对付你惊恐的对手!

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_BR_Desc.oracleText: Control the battlefield and your opponents with potent artifacts, then smelt them into something entirely new!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_BR_Desc.translation: 用强大的神器控制战场和你的对手，然后将它们熔炼成全新的东西！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_GU_Desc.oracleText: Create vast amounts of mana to set loose giant creatures far quicker than your opponents could ever expect!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_GU_Desc.translation: 创造大量的法术力，以比你的对手想象的更快的速度释放巨型生物！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_GW_Desc.oracleText: Flood the battlefield with creatures of all shapes and sizes and get ready to party!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_GW_Desc.translation: 用各种形状和大小的生物充斥战场，准备参加派对！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_RG_Desc.oracleText: Unleash your ferocious werewolves at night to stalk your unsuspecting prey. Awooo!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_RG_Desc.translation: 晚上释放你凶猛的狼人来跟踪你毫无戒心的猎物。哇哦！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_RW_Desc.oracleText: Study the blade and harness the power of your samurai to unleash an avalanche of swords against all who would defy you!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_RW_Desc.translation: 研究刀刃并驾驭武士的力量，向所有敢于挑战你的人施展如雪崩般的刀剑！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_UB_Desc.oracleText: Use your sneaky ninjas to strike your opponents when and where they least expect. Believe it!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_UB_Desc.translation: 使用你的鬼鬼祟祟的忍者在他们最不期望的时间和地点打击你的对手。相信它！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_UR_Desc.oracleText: Combine instants and sorceries together to create something truly wonderous and claim victory!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_UR_Desc.translation: 将瞬间和法术结合在一起，创造出真正奇妙的东西并取得胜利！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_WB_Desc.oracleText: Maintain the balance between artifact and enchantment spells, and all your opponents will fall!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_WB_Desc.translation: 保持神器和结界咒语之间的平衡，所有对手都会倒下！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_WU_Desc.oracleText: Smite foes with your glorious angels as they fly over your opponent's creatures to count up the wins!
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP2023_WU_Desc.translation: 用你光荣的天使粉碎敌人，当他们飞过你的对手的生物时，就可以计算出胜利的数量了！

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_BG_Desc.oracleText: Unlock your inner trash-monster when you get down and dirty with the Golgari guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_BG_Desc.translation: 与葛加理公会一同深耕地底，释放内心腐朽猛兽。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_BR_Desc.oracleText: Have a blast clowning around with the manic antics of the Rakdos guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_BR_Desc.translation: 与拉铎司公会一道装痴扮狂，引爆激情震撼全场。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Black_Desc.oracleText: As a black mage, every advantage comes at a cost. Sacrifice whatever is necessary to control the forces of death and darkness.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Black_Desc.translation: 身为黑色法师，你深知不付出代价就没有回报，为能掌控死亡与黑暗之力，甘愿作出任何牺牲。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Blue_Desc.oracleText: As a blue mage, you control the battlefield through illusion. Always think three steps ahead of your foe.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Blue_Desc.translation: 身为蓝色法师，你通过虚影来掌控战场，总是能够料敌先机。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_GU_Desc.oracleText: Grab your favorite octopus-crab-shark and get weird with the mutants of the Simic.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_GU_Desc.translation: 与析米克公会一道感受变异，把章鱼螃蟹鲨鱼拼合一体。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_GW_Desc.oracleText: Join the family to live in peace and harmony among the Selesnya guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_GW_Desc.translation: 融入瑟雷尼亚公会大家庭，与兄弟姐妹同享安宁祥和。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Green_Desc.oracleText: As a green mage, the natural world is at your command. The power of life itself fuels your magic.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Green_Desc.translation: 身为绿色法师，你能够掌控整个自然世界，生命的力量本身就会为你提供充沛法力。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_RG_Desc.oracleText: Take a walk on the wild side with the raucous misfits of the Gruul guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_RG_Desc.translation: 与古鲁公会一起感受野性，战吼震天破坏彻地。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_RW_Desc.oracleText: Take power alongside the Boros guild by marching on to the battlefield with a never-ending parade of creatures.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_RW_Desc.translation: 与波洛斯公一齐并肩作战，军队连绵称霸战场。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Red_Desc.oracleText: As a red mage, you revel in the chaos of battle. Fire is your weapon and your inspiration.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_Red_Desc.translation: 身为红色法师，你陶醉于战斗的混乱，火焰既是你的武器，又能给你启迪。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_UB_Desc.oracleText: Little is known about the secretive Dimir guild and we're not talking.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_UB_Desc.translation: 底密尔公会行踪成谜，外界所知甚少。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_UR_Desc.oracleText: Spark your curiosity then explode onto the scene with the experimental Izzet guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_UR_Desc.translation: 与伊捷公会一块深入探究，轰鸣实验放飞想象。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_WB_Desc.oracleText: Appreciate the finer things in life and death when you rub elbows with the ghostly Orzhov guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_WB_Desc.translation: 与欧佐夫公会一起遁入幽魅，算尽财富超脱生死。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_WU_Desc.oracleText: Get serious by laying down the law with the Azorius guild.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_WU_Desc.translation: 与俄佐立公会一同严肃议事，循规蹈矩制定法律。

Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_White_Desc.oracleText: As a white mage, you command disciplined armies. Enforce order to overwhelm your enemies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_EPP_White_Desc.translation: 身为白色法师，你手下部队纪律严明，强化秩序以征服对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_B.oracleText: As a black mage, every advantage comes at a cost. Sacrifice whatever is necessary to control the forces of death and darkness.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_B.translation: 身为黑色法师，你深知不付出代价就没有回报，为能掌控死亡与黑暗之力，甘愿作出任何牺牲。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_BG.oracleText: Utilize creatures that explore through the deck to get an advantage on your opponent.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_BG.translation: 利用勘察生物探索套牌，找寻克敌先机。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_BR.oracleText: Plunder and pillage your enemies with the cunning maneuvers of pirates! Make them walk the plank.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_BR.translation: 善用航海士巧谋妙计掠夺四海，让敌人走投无路！

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_GU.oracleText: Sneak past your foe's defenses and manipulate the battlefield to your benefit with the slick Merfolk of Ixalan.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_GU.translation: 运用依夏兰人鱼之灵动优势，巧妙绕过敌人防线，暗中操弄战局让己方得占先机。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_GW.oracleText: Build up a powerful army and overrun the battlefield. Find glory and strength in numbers.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_GW.translation: 组建强大生物军团主宰战场，众人齐力共探无上荣光。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_RG.oracleText: Useful early on, even stronger later. Utilize the flexibility of kicker spells to get more might for your mana.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_RG.translation: 增幅咒语不仅能在早期用来救急，更能在后期扭转战局。灵活运用这类咒语，充分发挥法术力威力。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_RW.oracleText: Combine powerful weapons and enchantments with your creatures to overpower your foes.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_RW.translation: 利用强力武具与灵气，全副武装你的生物，一举击溃拦路之敌。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_UB.oracleText: Seize control of the battlefield and once it's yours, summon powerful creatures to finish off your enemies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_UB.translation: 强势控制战场。等到了一切尽在掌握之时，再召唤强力生物终结对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_UR.oracleText: Cast powerful spells to manipulate the game. Utilize your wizards to improve your magic even further.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_UR.translation: 施放强力咒语改变战局。利用法术师让自己的咒语更上一层楼。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_WB.oracleText: Outlive your opponent by using your opponent's lifeforce to heal your wounds. Your life means their death.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_WB.translation: 汲取对手生命精萃滋补自身活力，最终拖垮对手。你之所生，彼之灭亡。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_WU.oracleText: Unlock the hidden power of artifacts using White and Blue magic. Craft awesome combos to take down the opposition.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_Desc_WU.translation: 解锁隐藏在白蓝魔法之后的神器之力。亲手搭配强力组合，一举拿下对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_G.oracleText: As a green mage, the natural world is at your command. The power of life itself fuels your magic.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_G.translation: 身为绿色法师，你能够掌控整个自然世界，生命的力量本身就会为你提供充沛法力。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_R.oracleText: As a red mage, you revel in the chaos of battle. Fire is your weapon and your inspiration.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_R.translation: 身为红色法师，你陶醉于战斗的混乱，火焰既是你的武器，又能给你启迪。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_U.oracleText: As a blue mage, you control the battlefield through illusion. Always think three steps ahead of your foe.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_U.translation: 身为蓝色法师，你通过虚影来掌控战场，总是能够料敌先机。

Decks/Precon/Precon_July_W.oracleText: As a white mage, you command disciplined armies. Enforce order to overwhelm your enemies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_July_W.translation: 身为白色法师，你手下部队纪律严明，强化秩序以征服对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_BG_Desc.oracleText: Overrun anyone in your way with a Swarm of Saprolings.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_BG_Desc.translation: 召唤腐生物大军，横扫一切挡路之敌。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_BR_Desc.oracleText: Death is not the end. Strike terror from beyond with powerful graveyard combos.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_BR_Desc.translation: 死亡并非终局。借助强力坟墓场组合技，召使死者之力震撼出击。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_GW_Desc.oracleText: Enchant your creatures to new levels of power and use binding spells to restrain your foes.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_GW_Desc.translation: 用灵气武装你的生物，增强己方战力，同时运用束缚咒语制约对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_RG_Desc.oracleText: Create additional mana to summon massive monsters to crush your enemies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_RG_Desc.translation: 运用额外法术力召唤庞巨怪兽击垮对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_RW_Desc.oracleText: Overwhelm your opponent with a massive army. Strike with powerful combat spells to turn the tides in your favor.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_RW_Desc.translation: 集结大军压倒对手。以强大的战斗咒语扭转战局。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_UB_Desc.oracleText: Manipulate the battlefield to your advantage with these crafty spells.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_UB_Desc.translation: 利用诡诈咒语抢占战场先机。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_UG_Desc.oracleText: Sneak past your foe's defenses and manipulate the battlefield to your benefit with the slick Merfolk of Ixalan.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_UG_Desc.translation: 运用依夏兰人鱼之灵动优势，巧妙绕过敌人防线，暗中操弄战局让己方得占先机。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_UR_Desc.oracleText: Cast powerful spells to wreak havoc on your enemies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_UR_Desc.translation: 施放强力咒语，将敌人玩弄于股掌之间。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_WB_Desc.oracleText: Outlive your opponent by using their lifeforce to heal your wounds. Your life means their death.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_WB_Desc.translation: 汲取对手生命精萃滋补自身活力，最终拖垮对手。你之所生，彼之灭亡。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_WU_Desc.oracleText: Leverage your affinity for artifacts to pummel your foes.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_WU_Desc.translation: 运用大量神器击倒对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_WU_Desc_2.oracleText: Soar over your opponent's defense while protecting your front-line with tactical spells.
Decks/Precon/Precon_NPE_GRN_WU_Desc_2.translation: 利用战斗咒语保护接敌生物，派出空中部队洞穿对手防线。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_ELD_Oko_Desc.oracleText: Oko is a shapeshifting iconoclast, uncommonly clever even for a faerie, who prefers trickery and manipulation to all-out battle. Deploy evasive creatures and augment them at crucial moments to build an unstoppable force.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_ELD_Oko_Desc.translation: 幻法仙灵瓯柯是一个变形叛逆者，即使对一个仙灵来说也是不寻常的聪明，他更喜欢诡计和操纵，而不是全面的战斗。部署易闪躲生物并在关键时刻附体它们，以建立一支不可阻挡的力量。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_ELD_Rowan_Desc.oracleText: As the daughter of a king, Rowan has trained extensively in both swordsmanship and etiquette — but she greatly prefers to solve her problems with a blade. Marshal an army of noble knights and assault your opponent with military precision.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_ELD_Rowan_Desc.translation: 作为国王之女，萝婉在剑术和礼仪方面都接受了广泛的训练--但她更喜欢用刀剑来解决问题。召集一支贵族骑士军队，以精准军事化风格突击你的对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_GRN_BG-Desc.oracleText: Fill your graveyard with creatures, then draw on the power of death to crush your foe.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_GRN_BG-Desc.translation: 牺牲生物填满自己的坟墓场，然后利用死亡的力量击溃对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_GRN_UR_Desc.oracleText: Disrupt your opponent's plans and pummel them with a flurry of spells on your way to victory.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_GRN_UR_Desc.translation: 利用连串咒语打乱对手计划、令其无暇应对，便可一路迈向胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Ajani_Desc.oracleText: Aid your allies as you lead them to victory.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Ajani_Desc.translation: 助力己方伙伴，引导他们迈向胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Chandra_Desc.oracleText: Overwhelm your foe with fire and fury.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Chandra_Desc.translation: 利用无尽烈焰和滔天怒火征服对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Mu_Desc.oracleText: Lock down your opponent and soar over their defenses.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Mu_Desc.translation: 先设法让对手动弹不得，而后利用空中大军穿越防线。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Sorin_Desc.oracleText: Draw strength from death and destruction.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Sorin_Desc.translation: 从死亡与毁灭当中汲取力量，壮大自己。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Vivien_Desc.oracleText: Crush your opponent with nature's might.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M20_Vivien_Desc.translation: 召使自然之力压服对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Basri_Desc.oracleText: The entire multiverse has opened before Basri Ket, ready to test his unshakable ideals. Spread the hurt by permanently powering up an army of creatures that submit to no one.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Basri_Desc.translation: 整个多重宇宙已经在巴席利面前展开，准备测试他不可动摇的理想。通过永久强化一群不服从任何人的生物来传播伤害。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Chandra_Desc.oracleText: Passionate, powerful, possessing a short fuse, Chandra is always ready to bring the heat. Launch a burning barrage directly at your opponent's life total until  nothing but ash remains.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Chandra_Desc.translation: 激情，强大，暴脾气，茜卓总是准备好带来热浪。直接向你的对手倾泻燃烧弹幕，直到只剩下灰烬。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Garruk_Desc.oracleText: Cursed no longer, Garruk is free to stalk the multiverse for the prey of his choosing. Overrun your opponent  with a ceaseless stampede of really, really big creatures.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Garruk_Desc.translation: 不再被诅咒的贾路可以自由地在多重宇宙中寻找他选择的猎物。用非常非常大的生物不断地踩踏你的对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Liliana_Desc.oracleText: Freed from her previous burdens, Liliana is prepared to take what is rightfully hers. In this case, it's your complete and utter victory fueled by a highly  disposable army of undead.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Liliana_Desc.translation: 摆脱了之前的负担，莉莲娜准备好接受属于她自己的命运。在如此境遇，以一支高度可支配的亡灵大军，获得完全彻底的胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Teferi_Desc.oracleText: A master of time magic, Teferi wields the lessons of the past to forge a better future. Clean your opponent's clock with an overwhelming number of resources.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_M21_Teferi_Desc.translation: 作为时间魔法大师，泰菲力运用过去的教训来营造更美好的未来。泰菲力用大量资源打断对手的节奏获取胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_RNA_1_Desc.oracleText: Summon a horde of feral creatures and goad them into a frenzy as you stampede to victory!
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_RNA_1_Desc.translation: 持续召唤凶猛兽群，激发它们破坏天性，踏平一切阻碍赢取胜利！

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_RNA_2_Desc.oracleText: Optimize spells by casting them at the perfect moments to clear the way for your flying creatures.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_RNA_2_Desc.translation: 看准时机施放咒语，发挥其最大效用，借此为飞行生物扫清障碍。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_THB_Ashiok_Desc.oracleText: Fill your graveyard along with your opponent's for massive value as you slowly drive them insane.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_THB_Ashiok_Desc.translation: 将你的坟墓场和对手的坟墓场一起填满，获取巨大的优势，当然也慢慢把你对手逼疯。

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_THB_Elspeth_Desc.oracleText: Build up a battalion of devoted soldiers and fearlessly lead them to a glorious victory.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_THB_Elspeth_Desc.translation: 忠诚卫士结为军阵，无畏荣光引导胜利

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_WAR_UG_Desc.oracleText: Take control of the situation! Manipulate your opponent's battlefield and power up your army with Proliferate!
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_WAR_UG_Desc.translation: 将局面掌控在自己手中！扰乱对手战场，同时利用增殖强化己方实力！

Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_WAR_WB_Desc.oracleText: Build up your forces by gaining life. Overwhelm your foes with pure power and use crafty tactics to sneak past their defenses.
Decks/Precon/Precon_PW_WAR_WB_Desc.translation: 获得生命即可壮大军势。而后依靠纯粹战力击溃对手，并利用巧妙策略绕开防线。

Decks/Precon/Precon_Posty_Firesong.oracleText: A Song of Sun and Fire

Decks/Precon/Precon_SSR_M20_R_Desc.oracleText: Use spells and creatures to overwhelm your foe.
Decks/Precon/Precon_SSR_M20_R_Desc.translation: 抛洒咒语，派出生物，一举压服对手。

Decks/Precon/Precon_SSR_M20_W_Desc.oracleText: Use your flying creatures to directly attack their life.
Decks/Precon/Precon_SSR_M20_W_Desc.translation: 部署飞行生物统治天空，而后直击对手获取胜利。

Decks/Precon/Precon_StarterAmazon_M21_B_.oracleText: Weaken your foes with deadly spells and finish them off with your dark minions.
Decks/Precon/Precon_StarterAmazon_M21_B_.translation: 致死魔咒削弱敌军，暗黑爪牙终结生命

Decks/Precon/Precon_StarterAmazon_M21_G_.oracleText: Command giant beasts to crush your opponents and decimate their armies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_StarterAmazon_M21_G_.translation: 号令群兽，粉碎敌手，歼灭敌军

Decks/Precon/Precon_Starter_M21_B_Desc.oracleText: Weaken your foes with deadly spells and finish them off with your dark minions.
Decks/Precon/Precon_Starter_M21_B_Desc.translation: 致死魔咒削弱敌军，暗黑爪牙终结生命

Decks/Precon/Precon_Starter_M21_G_Desc.oracleText: Command giant beasts to crush your opponents and decimate their armies.
Decks/Precon/Precon_Starter_M21_G_Desc.translation: 号令群兽，粉碎敌手，歼灭敌军

Decks/Precon/Precon_StreamLabs_desc.oracleText: Recruit your army and mentor your foot soldiers into battle-hardened veterans. Build a force to be reckoned with!
Decks/Precon/Precon_StreamLabs_desc.translation: 招募军队，训导新兵，将其锤炼成才。建立一支能够昭彰正义的军队！

Decks/Precon/Precon_TwitchCon2018_desc.oracleText: TwitchCon 2018 Bonus Deck. Harness the power of convoke to accelerate your most powerful spells. Use your numbers to your advantage!
Decks/Precon/Precon_TwitchCon2018_desc.translation: TwitchCon 2018年奖励套牌。善用召集的力量，迅速使出强力咒语。将人数优势转化为战场胜势！

Decks/Precon/Precon_TwitchPrime_2019_Lil.oracleText: Amass your Dreadhorde army and use tactical spells to control the battlefield.
Decks/Precon/Precon_TwitchPrime_2019_Lil.translation: 震惧军集结为阵，战术咒语操控战场

Decks/Precon/Precon_TwitchPrime_desc.oracleText: Join the Boros Legion in the fight against Bolas! Mentor your army into a force strong enough to take down any foe.
Decks/Precon/Precon_TwitchPrime_desc.translation: 加入波洛斯教团，共同对抗波拉斯！不断训导部队，令其在战场上所向披靡。

Decks/Precon/Standard_LCI_Storydecks_Doe.oracleText: Does it Belong in a Museum

Decks/Precon/Standard_LCI_Storydecks_MyL.translation: 我喜欢的语言是恐龙语

Decks/Precon/Standard_LCI_Storydecks_One.oracleText: One Sun for a Thousand Moons

Decks/Precon/Welcome_Booster_Deck_2021_D.oracleText: Swoop onto the battlefield with wizards and blast past any defenses with instants and sorceries. Start playing MTG Arena by tapping into supreme power!
Decks/Precon/Welcome_Booster_Deck_2021_D.translation: 法术师切入战场，使用瞬间和法术轰开任何防御。通过挖掘至高无上的力量，游玩万智牌竞技场！

Decks/Precon/Welcome_Booster_Deck_2022_D.oracleText: Ready to score big on MTG Arena? You'll find everything you need for the job right in your own graveyard.
Decks/Precon/Welcome_Booster_Deck_2022_D.translation: 准备好在万智牌竞技场上大获全胜了吗？你会在自己的坟墓场里找到所需的一切。

Decks/Precon/Welcome_Booster_Deck_Desc.oracleText: Faithful friends and curious critters are all here to welcome you! Gather your forces, power them up, and begin your journey into MTG Arena.
Decks/Precon/Welcome_Booster_Deck_Desc.translation: 忠实的朋友和好奇的小动物都在这里欢迎您！集结您的部队，为他们强化，然后开始您的万智牌竞技场之旅。

Decks/Precon/Workshop_Artisan_Heroes.translation: 从无名小卒到英名震世

Decks/Precon/Worlds_2021_Stanislav_Cifka.translation: 斯坦尼斯拉夫·奇夫卡(Stanislav Cifka)

Draft/Autopicking_Description.oracleText: Your picks will be made automatically if you do not return to draft now.
Draft/Autopicking_Description.translation: 如果您现在不返回轮抽，你的选牌将自动选择。

Draft/AverageQueueTime_Over.translation: 平均排队时间：{minutes}分钟以上

Draft/AverageQueueTime_Under.translation: 平均排队时间：{minutes}分钟以下

Draft/DraftCompletedReconnect_Descriptio.oracleText: The draft portion of this event ended while you were away from the game. Build your deck and join the queue!
Draft/DraftCompletedReconnect_Descriptio.translation: 该活动轮抽的选牌环节已在你离开游戏时结束。 构筑你的套牌并加入队列!

Draft/Draft_WaitingForPacks.oracleText: Waiting on other players to pass a draft pack...
Draft/Draft_WaitingForPacks.translation: 正在等待其它玩家传来卡包…

Draft/EventEnded_Description.oracleText: An event you were in has ended. Your entry fee has been returned to your account.
Draft/EventEnded_Description.translation: 有一个你参加的活动结束了，你的入场费用已返回到你账号中。

Draft/EventEnded_Title.translation: 赛事结束 - 门票费用返还

Draft/LeavingTable_Description.oracleText: If you are not back in time, your next pick will be made for you. Are you sure you want to leave?
Draft/LeavingTable_Description.translation: 如果你不能在时限内返回，你的下一抓将会为你自动选择。 确定要离开吗?

Draft/LeavingTable_Title.translation: 警告 - 正在离开轮抽牌桌

Draft/RebuildingQueue.oracleText: One or more players did not ready up in time. Rebuilding the queue.
Draft/RebuildingQueue.translation: 有一个或多个玩家未在时限内准备，重新建立队列。

Draft/RemovedForInactivity_Description.oracleText: You have been temporarily removed from the draft for inactivity. Unless you return to the event now, your picks will be automatically selected for you.
Draft/RemovedForInactivity_Description.translation: 因为挂机，你已经暂时被移出轮抽，除非你现在返回活动，否则你的抓取将自动为你选择。

Draft/RemovedFromQueue_Description.oracleText: You did not click 'Ready' in time to join the draft, please try again.
Draft/RemovedFromQueue_Description.translation: 你未在时限内点击 '准备' 来参加轮抽，请再试一次。

DuelScene/Browsers/BrowserSubheader_Drag.oracleText: Drag a card into your graveyard.
DuelScene/Browsers/BrowserSubheader_Drag.translation: 将一张卡牌拖到你的坟墓场。

DuelScene/Browsers/BrowserSubheader_Drag.oracleText: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard.
DuelScene/Browsers/BrowserSubheader_Drag.translation: 每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是地牌，则你可以展示该牌并置于你手上。若你未将该牌置于你手上，则你可以将它置入你的坟墓场。

DuelScene/Browsers/BrowserSubheader_Drag.oracleText: Drag the card to put it on top of your library or into your graveyard.
DuelScene/Browsers/BrowserSubheader_Drag.translation: 将这张卡牌拖到你的牌库顶或者你的坟墓场。

DuelScene/Browsers/ChooseColorPair.oracleText: Choose a card for each color pair.
DuelScene/Browsers/ChooseColorPair.translation: 为每组双色色组各选择一张卡牌。

DuelScene/Browsers/Choose_CardOnLibrary_.oracleText: Put a card back on top of your library? The rest will go to your graveyard.
DuelScene/Browsers/Choose_CardOnLibrary_.translation: 是否要将一张牌置于你的牌库顶？其余的牌将置入你的坟墓场。

DuelScene/Browsers/Choose_Option_Text.oracleText: Click an option below to select it.
DuelScene/Browsers/Choose_Option_Text.translation: 点击下方的选项进行选择。

DuelScene/Browsers/Choose_Option_ToPlayO.oracleText: Select Card to Play or Cast
DuelScene/Browsers/Choose_Option_ToPlayO.translation: 选择要使用或施放的牌

DuelScene/Browsers/CombatPhase.oracleText: Beginning of Combat, Declare Attackers, Declare Blockers, Combat Damage, End of Combat
DuelScene/Browsers/CombatPhase.translation: 战斗开始，宣告攻击者，宣告阻挡者，战斗伤害，战斗结束

DuelScene/Browsers/Confirmation_SubHeade.oracleText: {CardName} will not gain the activated abilities of creature cards exiled by this ability.
DuelScene/Browsers/Confirmation_SubHeade.translation: {CardName}不会获得由此能力放逐的生物的起动式异能。

DuelScene/Browsers/Delve_Subheader.oracleText: Each card you exile from your graveyard pays for <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1" color="#FFFFFF">
DuelScene/Browsers/Delve_Subheader.translation: 每张从你的坟墓场中放逐的牌都将为咒语提供<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x1" color="#FFFFFF">

DuelScene/Browsers/DungeonRoomSelect_Bro.oracleText: Select the next room to move into.
DuelScene/Browsers/DungeonRoomSelect_Bro.translation: 选择下一个要进入的房间。

DuelScene/Browsers/Foretell_Special_Acti.oracleText: During your turn, you may pay {o2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost {foretellCost}.
DuelScene/Browsers/Foretell_Special_Acti.translation: 在你的回合中，你可以支付{o2}并将这张牌从你手牌中面朝下放逐。在之后的回合中以预示费用{foretellCost}来施放他。

DuelScene/Browsers/Multi_Browser_SubTitl.oracleText: Click on one option below to select it.
DuelScene/Browsers/Multi_Browser_SubTitl.translation: 点击下方的选项进行选择。

DuelScene/Browsers/Mutate_BrowserSubHead.oracleText: Select whether to mutate this card under or over the targeted creature. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.
DuelScene/Browsers/Mutate_BrowserSubHead.translation: 选择在目标生物之上还是之下合变这张牌。 他们会合变成上方的生物并拥有下方生物的所有异能。

DuelScene/Browsers/NoActionsBrowser_Head.oracleText: You May Not Play These Cards
You May Not Play This Card

DuelScene/Browsers/NoActionsBrowser_SubH.oracleText: Click the button below to continue

DuelScene/Browsers/OptionalActionWorkflo.oracleText: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token
DuelScene/Browsers/OptionalActionWorkflo.translation: 派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物

DuelScene/Browsers/OptionalActionWorkflo.oracleText: Create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens
DuelScene/Browsers/OptionalActionWorkflo.translation: 派出两个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物

DuelScene/Browsers/OptionalActionWorkflo.oracleText: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens
DuelScene/Browsers/OptionalActionWorkflo.translation: 派出三个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物

DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Bottom_S.oracleText: Drag cards to order them on the bottom of your library.
DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Bottom_S.translation: 拖动牌张以决定其在你牌库底的顺序。

DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Generic_.translation: 拖动牌张以决定其顺序。

DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Targets_.oracleText: Drag targets to choose resolution order
DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Targets_.translation: 拖动目标来决定结算顺序

DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Top_SubH.oracleText: Drag cards to order them on top of your library.
DuelScene/Browsers/OrderRequest_Top_SubH.translation: 拖动牌张以决定其在你牌库顶的顺序。

DuelScene/Browsers/OrderTriggeredAbiliti.oracleText: Drag triggers to choose resolution order
DuelScene/Browsers/OrderTriggeredAbiliti.translation: 拖动触发来决定结算顺序

DuelScene/Browsers/Order_Attackers_Text.oracleText:
Drag to order the creatures attacking {cardName}.
Creatures will be damaged in order from left to right.
DuelScene/Browsers/Order_Attackers_Text.translation:
拖动来为攻击{cardName}的生物安排顺序。
将会按照从左到右的顺序依次对生物造成伤害。

DuelScene/Browsers/Order_Blockers_Text.oracleText:
Drag to order the creatures blocking {cardName}.
Creatures will be damaged in order from left to right.
DuelScene/Browsers/Order_Blockers_Text.translation:
拖动来为阻挡{cardName}的生物安排顺序。
将会按照从左到右的顺序依次对生物造成伤害。

DuelScene/Browsers/Phyrexian_Mana_SubTit.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xP"> represents a cost of 2 life.
DuelScene/Browsers/Phyrexian_Mana_SubTit.translation: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xP">表示可以使用2点生命代为支付费用。

DuelScene/Browsers/Repeat_Options_Subhea.oracleText: You may choose the same option more than once, {options} options remaining
DuelScene/Browsers/Repeat_Options_Subhea.translation: 你可以多次选择同一项，还需选择{options}次

DuelScene/Browsers/Riot_BrowserSubHeader.oracleText: Select whether this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or haste.
DuelScene/Browsers/Riot_BrowserSubHeader.translation: 选择该生物进战场时上面的加成：+1/+1指示物或敏捷异能。

DuelScene/Browsers/ScryBrowser_SubHeader.oracleText: Drag cards to put them on the top or bottom of your library.
DuelScene/Browsers/ScryBrowser_SubHeader.translation: 拖动牌张以将其置于牌库顶或牌库底。

DuelScene/Browsers/ScryishBrowser_SubHea.oracleText: Drag the card to put it second from the top, or on the bottom, of your library.
DuelScene/Browsers/ScryishBrowser_SubHea.translation: 将这张牌拖到你的牌库顶数来第二张或者牌库底。

DuelScene/Browsers/Select_From_Available.oracleText: Click a zone name on the left to view that zone. Choose a card by clicking it.
DuelScene/Browsers/Select_From_Available.translation: 点击左侧的区域名称来检视该区域。点击牌张进行选择。

DuelScene/Browsers/StartingPlayer_Header.oracleText: Choose if You Will Draw First or Play First

DuelScene/Browsers/StartingPlayer_SubHea.oracleText: The player who plays first will skip their first draw. It is usually best to play first, but some strategies prefer to draw first.
DuelScene/Browsers/StartingPlayer_SubHea.translation: 先手牌手会略过其第一个抓牌步骤。通常都是选择先手更好，但有些策略偏好选择后手来多抓一张牌。

DuelScene/Browsers/StartingPlayer_Waitin.oracleText: Your opponent is choosing which player will play first.

DuelScene/Browsers/Submit_Deck_FailureTo.oracleText: Deck validation failed. Your deck has {mainQty} cards and your sideboard has {sideQty}, but the limit is {maxQty}.
DuelScene/Browsers/Submit_Deck_FailureTo.translation: 套牌验证失败。你的套牌有{mainQty}张主牌，{sideQty}张备牌，但最多只能有{maxQty}张。

DuelScene/Browsers/Submit_Deck_MissingFo.oracleText: Your deck did not specify a play format
DuelScene/Browsers/Submit_Deck_MissingFo.translation: 你的套牌未指定游戏赛制

DuelScene/Browsers/Surveil_Browser_Subti.oracleText: Drag cards to put them on the top of your library or into your graveyard.
DuelScene/Browsers/Surveil_Browser_Subti.translation: 拖动牌张以决定是要将其置于你的牌库顶，还是置入你的坟墓场。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/BoltlandSubheader.oracleText: Select whether to pay 3 life or to enter the battlefield tapped.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/BoltlandSubheader.translation: 选择是支付3点生命还是横置进入战场。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ChooseX_Prompt_Sa.oracleText: Select number of creatures to sacrifice
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ChooseX_Prompt_Sa.translation: 选择要牺牲的生物数量

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Choose_KeepX_Disc.oracleText: Keep {cardQuantity} cards, the rest will be discarded.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Choose_KeepX_Disc.translation: 保留{cardQuantity}张牌，剩下的将被丢弃。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Click_Select_Opti.oracleText: Click on one option below to select it
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Click_Select_Opti.translation: 点击下方的选项进行选择

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Click_Yes_No_Text.oracleText: Click Yes to proceed or No to cancel.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Click_Yes_No_Text.translation: 点击「是」继续，或点击「否」取消。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ClientPrompt_Choo.oracleText: Choose a player or planeswalker to attack.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ClientPrompt_Choo.translation: 选择要攻击的牌手或鹏洛客。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ClientPrompt_Igno.oracleText: Assign damage as though {cardName} weren't blocked?
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ClientPrompt_Igno.translation: 是否要将{cardName}视同未受阻挡地分配伤害？

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ClientPrompt_Open.oracleText: You will take all available opening hand actions unless you deselect them.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ClientPrompt_Open.translation: 以下是所有你将会执行的起手牌行动，若其中有你不希望执行的，请取消选择之。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Divide_Pile_Faced.oracleText: Drag cards to move them between piles. The top pile will be face-down.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Divide_Pile_Faced.translation: 拖动牌张以在堆之间移动它们。上方的堆将是面朝下的。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Divide_Pile_Text.oracleText: Drag cards to move them between piles.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Divide_Pile_Text.translation: 拖动牌张将它们在牌堆之间移动。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ExaminePerpetual.translation: 查看永久变更后的牌张

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Hexproof.oracleText: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Hexproof.translation: 此生物不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Over_Max_HandSize.oracleText: Your maximum hand size is ({maxHandSize}). You will need to discard {number} cards at the end of your turn.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Over_Max_HandSize.translation: 你的手牌上限是({maxHandSize})张。在你的回合结束时需要弃掉{number}张牌。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Over_Max_HandSize.oracleText: You will need to discard down to {maxHandSize} at the end of your turn.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Over_Max_HandSize.translation: 在你的回合结束时需要将手牌弃到{maxHandSize}张。

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/Select_Pile_Text.oracleText: Press Select to choose a pile

DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ShocklandSubheade.oracleText: Select whether to pay 2 life or to enter the battlefield tapped.
DuelScene/ClientPrompt/ShocklandSubheade.translation: 选择是要支付2点生命还是要横置进战场。

DuelScene/ColorSelector/ModifierEnabled.oracleText: Hold Shift to adjust by 5 per click.
DuelScene/ColorSelector/ModifierEnabled.translation: 点击时按住Shift键来每次增减5。

DuelScene/EndMatch/Match_Drain_Enabled.oracleText: Matches have been temporarily disabled. Please try again later or update your client.
DuelScene/EndMatch/Match_Drain_Enabled.translation: 暂时无法进行对局。请于稍后重试，或者更新你的客户端。

DuelScene/EndMatch/PostMatchSurvey_Appre.oracleText: Your feedback matters. Thank you for helping!
DuelScene/EndMatch/PostMatchSurvey_Appre.translation: 你的反馈很重要。感谢你的帮助！

DuelScene/EndMatch/PostMatchSurvey_Ask.oracleText: Did you have fun in the match?
DuelScene/EndMatch/PostMatchSurvey_Ask.translation: 你在比赛中玩得开心吗？

DuelScene/Interaction/CastingTimeOption/.oracleText: Specialize {abilityCost}, Discard a {specializeColor} or {specializeLandType} card: This permanent specializes into {specializeColor}. Activate only as a sorcery.
DuelScene/Interaction/CastingTimeOption/.translation: 专精{abilityCost}，弃一张{specializeColor}或{specializeLandType}牌：此永久物专精为{specializeColor}。只能于法术时机起动。

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/NextPhaseStep/Phas.translation: 接下来是：结算先攻伤害

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.translation: 在对手的宣告攻击者步骤暂停
在我的宣告攻击者步骤暂停
在下一个维持和抓牌步骤暂停

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.oracleText: Stop on opponent's upkeep and draw step
DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.translation: 在对手的维持和抓牌步骤暂停

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.oracleText: Stop on my upkeep and draw step
DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.translation: 在我的维持和抓牌步骤暂停
在对手的宣告阻挡者步骤暂停
在我的宣告阻挡者步骤暂停
在战斗时暂停
在战斗结束步骤暂停
在下一次战斗时暂停

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.oracleText: Stop on opponent's beginning of combat
DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.translation: 在对手的战斗开始步骤暂停

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.oracleText: Stop on my beginning of combat
DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.translation: 在我的战斗开始步骤暂停
在结算伤害后暂停
在下一个战斗伤害步骤暂停
在对手的战斗伤害步骤暂停
在我的战斗伤害步骤暂停
在宣告完攻击者后暂停
在下一个宣告攻击者步骤暂停
在宣告完阻挡者后暂停
在下一个宣告阻挡者步骤暂停
在本回合结束步骤暂停

DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.oracleText: Stop at End of next Turn
DuelScene/PhaseLadder/PhaseStop/PhaseSte.translation: 在下回合结束步骤暂停
在对手的结束步骤暂停
在我的结束步骤暂停
在战斗前暂停
在对手的战斗前行动阶段暂停
在我的战斗前行动阶段暂停
在战斗步骤后暂停
在下一个战斗步骤后暂停
在对手的战斗后行动阶段暂停
在我的战斗后行动阶段暂停
在下一次战斗前暂停

DuelScene/Prompt/ConsecutiveTurnTooltip.oracleText: This player will take the next turn.
DuelScene/Prompt/ConsecutiveTurnTooltip.translation: 这个牌手将进行一个额外的回合。

DuelScene/RuleText/CantBeBlockedByColorC.oracleText: Can't be blocked by {color} creatures this turn
DuelScene/RuleText/CantBeBlockedByColorC.translation: 本回合无法阻挡{color}色的生物

DuelScene/RuleText/CantCastWithManaValue.oracleText: Until your opponent's next turn you can't cast spells with the following mana value(s): {prohibitedValues}
DuelScene/RuleText/CantCastWithManaValue.translation: 直到对手的下个回合之前，你无法施放以下法术力值的咒语：{prohibitedValues}

DuelScene/RuleText/NoMaximumHandSize.oracleText: You have no maximum hand size.
DuelScene/RuleText/NoMaximumHandSize.translation: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

DuelScene/RuleText/NumberOfModifiedCreat.oracleText: Modified creatures you controlled as you cast this: {modifiedCreatureCount}
DuelScene/RuleText/NumberOfModifiedCreat.translation: 你施放此咒语时你操控的有饰装生物数为：{modifiedCreatureCount}

DuelScene/RuleText/PendingEffect_Inspire.oracleText: Maximum hand size reduced by three.

DuelScene/RuleText/PlayCardFromSideboard.oracleText: Play a card from your sideboard.
DuelScene/RuleText/PlayCardFromSideboard.translation: 从你的备牌使用一张牌。

DuelScene/ScreenSpace/ManaPool/FromSnowS.oracleText: <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xS"> Mana from a snow source

DuelScene/ScreenSpace/Prompts/FullContro.oracleText:
<color="green">[Shift + Ctrl]</color> Lock/Unlock Full Control.
While enabled, Full Control stops at all possible times.
DuelScene/ScreenSpace/Prompts/FullContro.translation:
<color="green">[Shift + Ctrl]</color>锁定／解锁「完全掌控」。
启用「完全掌控」后：
 - 游戏会在所有能够行动的时机暂停等待你的行动
 - 需要手动支付法术力费用

DuelScene/SelectColdRoleTargets.oracleText: Each creature can only be enchanted by one Role you control, creating a new Role will remove the old Role.
DuelScene/SelectColdRoleTargets.translation: 每个生物身上只能结附一个由你操控的角色，结附新的角色将会导致旧角色被移除。

DuelScene/SelectTargets_LocalPlayer.oracleText: Do you want to target yourself with {source}?
DuelScene/SelectTargets_LocalPlayer.translation: 你是否要将自己指定为{source}的目标？

DuelScene/SelectTargets_LocalPlayer_Curs.oracleText: Do you want to enchant yourself with a Curse?
DuelScene/SelectTargets_LocalPlayer_Curs.translation: 你想要对自己使用诅咒吗?

DuelScene/SelectTargets_Opponent.oracleText: Do you want to target your opponent with {source}?
DuelScene/SelectTargets_Opponent.translation: 你是否要将对手指定为{source}的目标？

DuelScene/Selection_ExploitMissingSource.oracleText: Do you want to sacrifice {selectedCardName}? {sourceCardName} has left the battlefield, any abilities that trigger when it exploits a creature won't trigger.
DuelScene/Selection_ExploitMissingSource.translation: 你想牺牲{selectedCardName}吗? {sourceCardName}已经离开战场，任何榨取生物时触发的异能都不会生效。

DuelScene/Selection_LocalPlayer.oracleText: Do you want to select yourself?

DuelScene/SettingsMenu/Gameplay/PhaseLad.oracleText: Show phase and combat step icons in game.
DuelScene/SettingsMenu/Gameplay/PhaseLad.translation: 在游戏中显示阶段和战斗步骤图标.

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/FreeMulligan_De.oracleText: In this format, the first mulligan is free!
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/FreeMulligan_De.translation: 本赛制首次再调度免费！

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/FreeMulligan_De.oracleText: Your opponent is choosing whether or not to take a free mulligan.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/FreeMulligan_De.translation: 对手正在选择是否进行免费再调度

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonMulliganC.oracleText: You will return {count} cards to the bottom of your library.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonMulliganC.translation: 你需要将{count}张牌放入你的牌库底。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonMulliganC.oracleText: You will return {count} card to the bottom of your library.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonMulliganC.translation: 你需要将{count}张牌放入你的牌库底。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonReturnSub.oracleText: Drag {count} cards to the bottom of your library.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonReturnSub.translation: 将{count}张牌拖动到你的牌库底。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonReturnSub.oracleText: Drag {count} card to the bottom of your library.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonReturnSub.translation: 将{count}张牌拖动到你的牌库底。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonRules.oracleText: Each time you take a mulligan, you draw seven cards, then decide if you want to keep that hand or take an additional mulligan. Once you've decided to keep your hand, put a number of cards equal to the number of times you have mulliganed this game on the bottom of your library in any order.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/LondonRules.translation: 你需要将若干手牌置于你的牌库底，其数量等用于你再调度的次数。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/MulliganConsequ.oracleText: This replaces these {currentHandSize} cards with {nextHandSize} new ones.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/MulliganConsequ.translation: 这样会将现有这{currentHandSize}张手牌洗回，然后新抓{nextHandSize}张牌。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.oracleText:
Mulligan your opening hand? This replaces this card with nothing.
Note that a good opening hand has multiple lands and spells.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.translation:
要再调度吗？这样会将现有这张手牌牌洗回，但不会新抓牌。
小提示：手牌中地牌和咒语牌数量均衡才算是好的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.oracleText:
Mulligan your opening hand? This replaces these {cardsInHand} cards with a new one.
Note that a good opening hand has multiple lands and spells.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.translation:
要再调度吗？这样会将现有这{cardsInHand}张手牌洗回，然后新抓一张牌。
小提示：手牌中地牌和咒语牌数量均衡才算是好的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.oracleText: Mulligan your opening hand? This replaces these {cardsInHand} cards with {newCardCount} new ones. Note that a good opening hand has multiple lands and spells.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.translation: 要再调度吗？这样会将现有这{cardsInHand}张手牌洗回，然后新抓{newCardCount}张牌。 小提示：手牌中地牌和咒语牌数量均衡才算是好的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.oracleText: Mulligan your opening hand? This replaces these {cardsInHand} cards with {newCardCount} new one. Note that a good opening hand has multiple lands and spells.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/Mulligan_Openin.translation: 要再调度吗？这样会将现有这{cardsInHand}张手牌洗回，然后新抓{newCardCount}张牌。 小提示：手牌中地牌和咒语牌数量均衡才算是好的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpeningHandDeta.oracleText: Your opponent is choosing whether to keep their hand or mulligan to {newHandSize} cards.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpeningHandDeta.translation: 对手正在选择是要保留起手，还是再调度至{newHandSize}张牌

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentChoosin.oracleText: Your opponent is choosing whether to keep {count} cards or to mulligan.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentChoosin.translation: 对手正在选择是要保留{count}张牌还是再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentChoosin.oracleText: Your opponent is choosing whether to keep {count} card or to mulligan.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentChoosin.translation: 对手正在选择是要保留{count}张牌还是再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentKeepPlu.oracleText: Your opponent kept a hand of {count} cards.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentKeepPlu.translation: 对手保留了{count}张牌的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentKeepSin.oracleText: Your opponent kept a hand of {count} card.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentKeepSin.translation: 对手保留了{count}张牌的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentKept.oracleText: Your opponent kept a hand of {handSize} cards.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentKept.translation: 对手保留了{handSize}张牌的起手。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.oracleText: Your opponent has taken {count} mulligans and can't take any more.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.translation: 你对手已再调度{count}次，无法继续再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.oracleText: Your opponent has taken {count} mulligan and can't take any more.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.translation: 你对手已再调度{count}次，无法继续再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.oracleText: Your opponent has {handSize} cards and may take a mulligan after you have made your choice.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.translation: 对手现有{handSize}张手牌，且能在你决定之后继续选择是否再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.oracleText: Your opponent has taken {count} mulligans and may take another after you have made your choice.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.translation: 对手已再调度{count}次，且能在你决定之后继续选择是否再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.oracleText: Your opponent has taken {count} mulligan and may take another after you have made your choice.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentMulliga.translation: 对手已再调度{count}次，且能在你决定之后继续选择是否再调度。

DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentWaiting.oracleText: Your opponent is waiting for their initial mulligan choice.
DuelScene/StartingPlayer/OpponentWaiting.translation: 对手正在等待你的决定，之后才轮到其为首次再调度做选择。

DuelScene/Warning/AFK_Warning.oracleText: Warning! You haven't acted recently. Act soon or you'll concede the game!
DuelScene/Warning/AFK_Warning.translation: 警告！你已有一段时间没有任何操作。请尽快行动，否则你会输掉此盘游戏。

DuelScene/Warning/AttachAura_ColdHighlig.oracleText: Do you want to attach {aura} to {target}?

DuelScene/Warning/MatchClockLowTime.oracleText: Less than {minutesRemaining} minutes remaining in your match timer. You will concede the match if it expires.
DuelScene/Warning/MatchClockLowTime.translation: 你对局计时器上的剩余时间已少于{minutesRemaining}分钟。如果时间用完，将视作你认输对局。

DuelScene/Warning/SelectTargets_ColdHigh.oracleText: Do you want to target {target} with {source}?
DuelScene/Warning/SelectTargets_ColdHigh.translation: 你是否要将{target}指定为{source}的目标？

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Con.oracleText: Contact Us/Review or Delete Your or Your Child's Collected Info
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Con.translation: 联系我们／查看或删除您或您子女的已收集信息

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Opt.oracleText:
• You can reset your mobile ad ID (IDFA or AAID) at any time through your device settings, which will allow you to limit the use of information collected about you. You may also visit http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices.
• The location data collected through an app depends on your device settings and app permissions.  You can disable location permissions on the app or device level and Bluetooth and WiFi scanning.
• If you have linked your Wizards account with certain social media or third party gaming platforms, such as Facebook or Steam, you may unlink your accounts at any time by visiting your Wizards account settings.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Opt.translation:
"-您随时可以通过您所使用的设备来重置您的移动广告标识符（IDFA或AAID），这样便能够限制相关方面使用您设备提供之可供收集的个人信息。您也可以访问http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices了解其他选择。
-您可以通过您设备的设置与应用权限设定来控制应用所收集的位置信息：应用或设备层级的定位许可及蓝牙与WiFi扫描。"

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Opt.oracleText: * For additional information, please see Section 9 of our full Privacy Policy.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Opt.translation: * 有关更多信息，请参阅我们完整隐私政策的第 9 节。

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText:
• California residents have special rights, including the rights to known certain information and to require specific pieces of information; the right to delete certain information; the right to opt-out of the "sale" of their personal information to third parties; and the right not to be discriminating against for exercising their rights.
• To the extent Wizards sells your personal information as the term "sell" is defined under the California Consumer Privacy Act, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information by us to third parties at any time. You may submit a request to opt-out by going to https://company.wizards.com/legal/wizards-coasts-privacy-policy#donotsell, calling our toll-free number at (800) 324-6496 or emailing us at privacy@wizards.com.
• We do not sell personal information of consumers who we have actual knowledge are under 16 years old.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation:
• California residents have special rights, including the rights to known certain information and to require specific pieces of information; the right to delete certain information; the right to opt-out of the "sale" of their personal information to third parties; and the right not to be discriminating against for exercising their rights.
• To the extent Wizards sells your personal information as the term "sell" is defined under the California Consumer Privacy Act, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information by us to third parties at any time. You may submit a request to opt-out by going to https://company.wizards.com/legal/wizards-coasts-privacy-policy#donotsell, calling our toll-free number at (800) 324-6496 or emailing us at privacy@wizards.com.
• We do not sell personal information of consumers who we have actual knowledge are under 16 years old.

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText: * For additional information, please see Section 14 of our full Privacy Policy.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation: * 有关更多信息，请参阅我们完整隐私政策的第 14 节。
关于加州居民的特别通知

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText: • Parents or guardians of a child under the age of 13 (13 to 16 depending on location in the EU) have the right to contact us to review, correct, or delete their child's data at any time. Children may only use our services once we have obtained verifiable parental consent in compliance with the U.S. Children's Online Privacy Protection Rule.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation: "-未满13周岁（欧盟境内依所在地区规定不同为未满13-16周岁）之儿童的家长或监护人有权随时联系我们查看、修正或删除其子女的数据。相关儿童唯有在依照美国儿童在线隐私保护法（U.S. Children’s Online Privacy Protection Rule）提供可验证的家长同意书之后，方可使用我们的服务。"

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText: * For additional information, please see Section 6 of our full Privacy Policy.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation: * 有关更多信息，请参阅我们完整隐私政策的第 6 节。

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText: Special Notice Regarding European, UK and Swiss Users
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation: 关于欧盟用户的特别说明

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText:
• Users located in European Union, United Kingdom and Switzerland have special rights, including to access, rectify and erase personal data; the right to data portability; the right to be forgotten; the right to withdraw consent; and the right to restrict or object to processing of personal data.
• Personal data will be transferred out of the EU, Switzerland and the UK to the United States. We utilize appropriate safeguards for transfers of personal data, such as Standard Contractual Clauses.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation:
"-身处欧盟境内的用户具有多项特殊权利，包括个人数据的访问、修改、删除权；数据可携权；被遗忘权；和对个人信息处理的限制及拒绝权。
-个人数据将从欧盟境内转出存至美国。"

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText: * For additional information, please see Sections 11 and 15 of our full Privacy Policy.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation: * 有关更多信息，请参阅我们完整隐私政策的第 11 节和第 15 节。

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.oracleText: • If you engage in organized play, your information (e.g., name, DCI number, city, state, nationality, username and email) may be accessible by authorized tournament organizers, retail locations that are part of the Wizards Play Network, members of the Wizards' community that are adjudicating organized play events, and prize fulfillment service providers. These parties are independent of Wizards, but they are contractually prohibited from using your information for any other purpose than that for which it was provided to them, and they agree to maintain the confidentiality, security and integrity of information they receive from us.  Your information may also be disclosed to members of the Wizards' community who are engaged in investigating violations of tournament rules and the Code of Conduct. Additionally, your name, city and country may appear in online leaderboards and organized play event results.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Spe.translation:
"- 如果您参加组织化赛事，则经授权的比赛主办人、Wizards play Network销售网络成员销售点、威世智社群中担任组织化赛事裁判之成员，及发放奖金之服务提供商均有权访问您的信息。
虽然上述各方均为独立于威世智的第三方，但威世智与其均立有合约，规定其不得将您的个人信息用于原本规定之外的其他用途，且上述各方均同意严守从我处获得之所有信息的私密、安全及完整。
您的信息也会披露给调查违反比赛规则和行为准则的威世智社群成员。
此外，您的信息可能显示于在线排行榜和组织化赛事的结果中。"

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wha.oracleText:
• Device, connectivity, and configuration data (IP address, ad ID, device ID, screen, resolution etc.)
• Precise and imprecise location data
• Web browser settings (e.g., language preferences) 
• Web browsing behavior (e.g., number of visits, pages visited, etc.)
• Contact data (e.g., email address, physical address, age, phone number, etc.)
• Wizards profile data (e.g., username, photo, etc.)
• Social media profile data (e.g., account info authorized via Facebook, Twitter, etc.)
• Third party gaming platform data (such as Steam or Twitch)
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wha.translation:
"- 设备、网络连接情况和配置数据（IP地址、广告标识符、设备标识符，屏幕，分辨率等）
- 精确和粗略的位置数据
- 浏览器设置（例如，语言首选项）
- 网页浏览行为（例如访问次数、访问过的页面等）
- 联系数据（电子邮件地址、实际住址、电话号码等）
- 威世智个人档案数据（用户名、照片等）
- 社交媒体个人档案数据（例如通过Facebook、Twitter等授权的帐户信息）
- 第三方游戏平台数据（例如Steam或Twitch）"

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wha.oracleText: * This section includes information collected while you use the app, as well as information that may be collected if you create a Wizards account and link your account with social media or third party gaming platforms.  For more information, please see Section 3 of our full Privacy Policy (URL below).
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wha.translation: * 本部分包括您使用应用程序时收集的信息，以及在您创建威世智帐户并将您的帐户与社交媒体或第三方游戏平台链接时可能收集的信息。如需了解更多信息，请参阅我们完整的隐私政策（网址如下）的第 3 节。

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Why.oracleText:
• Account creation and management
• Support for internal operations (e.g., analytics, app and site optimization, etc.)
• Interest-based and contextual advertising
• Enabling advanced features (e.g., delivering or restricting content and advertising based on location)
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Why.translation:
"- 为内部运营提供支持（例如分析、应用和站点优化等）
- 根据访客兴趣和文章内容投放广告
- 实现高级功能（例如根据位置发布或限制网页或广告内容）"

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Why.oracleText: For more information, please see Section 4 of our full Privacy Policy.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Why.translation: 有关更多信息，请参阅我们完整隐私政策的第 4 节。

Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wit.oracleText:
• Internal operations' service providers (such as Firebase, BugSnag, Unity, ConsentCheq and Backtrace)
• Social media platforms and third party gaming platforms (such as Facebook, Twitter, Twitch, and Steam)
• Marketing partners and third party ad networks (such as Facebook)
• third party analytics service providers (such as Adjust, Google analytics, Swrve and Braze)
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wit.translation:
• 内部运营服务提供商（例如 Firebase、BugSnag、Unity、ConsentCheq 和 Backtrace）
• 社交媒体平台和第三方游戏平台（如 Facebook、Twitter、Twitch 和 Steam）
• 营销合作伙伴和第三方广告网络（如 Facebook）
