Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wit.oracleText: * For more information, please see Sections 5, 7 and 8 of our full Privacy Policy.
Duelscene/SettingsMenu/PrivacyPolicy/Wit.translation: * 有关更多信息，请参阅我们完整隐私政策的第 5，7，8 节。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black01_Descr.oracleText: Killing creatures that tap for mana may stop your opponent from ever casting their big spells.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black01_Descr.translation: 杀死对手的产费生物也许能阻止对手施放它的超超超超超大号火球——或者其他。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black02_Descr.oracleText: Use creatures that can return from the graveyard as blockers again and again.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black02_Descr.translation: 用能够从坟墓场多次复生的生物做为阻挡者。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black03_Descr.oracleText: Use instants after declaring blockers to surprise your opponent. Combine creatures and spells to take down even bigger threats.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black03_Descr.translation: 在宣告阻挡者之后使用瞬间牌让你的对手大吃一惊。结合生物和咒语来消除更大的威胁。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black04_Descr.oracleText: Having many creatures that pose a threat is usually better than one really big creature.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Black04_Descr.translation: 大部分时候，多个生物形成的威胁大于单个巨兽。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue01_Descri.oracleText: Effects that reduce the cost of spells speed up everything else. Get them out early and keep them alive.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue01_Descri.translation: 减费效应加速其余一切。尽早打出它们并保证其存活。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue02_Descri.oracleText: Returning a creature to its owner's hand is a good way to keep it from attacking or blocking.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue02_Descri.translation: 将生物将移回其拥有者手上是阻碍其进攻或防守的好办法。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue03_Descri.oracleText: When you return a creature to its owner's hand, any auras are removed. Target your own creatures to give them a second chance at life.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue03_Descri.translation: 当你将目标生物移回其拥有者手上，生物上的所有灵气都将被移除。你也可以指定你自己的生物以在战斗中获利。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue04_Descri.oracleText: Hexproof can protect your creatures from spells, even spells that have already been cast.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Blue04_Descri.translation: 即使咒语已经施放，辟邪异能仍然能够保护你的生物。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green01_Descr.oracleText: Creatures that tap for mana are best kept out of combat.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green01_Descr.translation: 横置产费的生物将不能参与战斗。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green02_Descr.oracleText: Having a creature with power 4 or greater will help increase your mana.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green02_Descr.translation: 操控力量等于或大于4的生物能助你增加法术力。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green03_Descr.oracleText: Having a creature with power 4 or greater will help increase your mana.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green03_Descr.translation: 操控力量等于或大于4的生物能助你增加法术力。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green04_Descr.oracleText: Avoid attacking or blocking into creatures with deathtouch. Use spells to get rid of them instead.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Green04_Descr.translation: 避免向拥有死触异能的生物进攻或阻挡。尝试用咒语解决它们。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red01_Descrip.oracleText: If your opponent has big blockers, wait until you have overwhelming numbers before attacking.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red01_Descrip.translation: 如果你的对手拥有巨大的阻挡者，在拥有压倒性的数量优势前请暂缓进攻。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red02_Descrip.oracleText: Use your spells and abilities to sneak past your opponent's creatures.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red02_Descrip.translation: 利用你的咒语和异能绕过敌人的生物。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red03_Descrip.oracleText: Killing creatures that tap for mana may stop your opponent from ever casting their big spells.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red03_Descrip.translation: 杀死对手的产费生物也许能阻止对手施放它的超超超超超大号火球——或者其他。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red04_Descrip.oracleText: Activate your abilities after blockers are declared. That's the best time to surprise your opponent with extra damage.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/Red04_Descrip.translation: 在宣告进攻或阻挡之后起动异能，这是给予额外伤害的最佳时机。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White01_Descr.oracleText: Some cards get better when combined. Play them early and keep them alive.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White01_Descr.translation: 一些卡牌具有配合时效果更佳。尽早打出它们并保证其存活。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White02_Descr.oracleText: Any damage from a deathtoucher will destroy a creature, but it won't hurt players any more than usual. Avoid blocking them.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White02_Descr.translation: 带有死触的伤害均能直接消灭生物，但只会对牌手造成常规伤害。不要阻挡它们。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White03_Descr.oracleText: Creatures with first strike deal damage before any others. You can even combine first strike with other spells and abilities.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White03_Descr.translation: 先攻的生物先于其他生物造成伤害。你甚至可以将先攻与其他法术和能力结合起来。

EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White04_Descr.oracleText: Creatures with double strike deal double damage. You'll also get twice the benefit by increasing their power.
EPP/ColorMastery/LossHints/White04_Descr.translation: 具有连击异能的生物能造成加倍伤害。通过增加他们的力量，将获得双倍的收益。

EPP/DeckUpgrade/Explanation.oracleText: The following cards have been unlocked for your {deckInfo} deck.
EPP/DeckUpgrade/Explanation.translation: 你的{deckInfo}套牌已解锁以下牌张。

EPP/DeckUpgrade/More_Info_Body.oracleText: You have new card upgrade available. Click the button below to swap them into your deck. Keep your deck at the minimum size (60 cards) so you draw your best cards as often as possible.
EPP/DeckUpgrade/More_Info_Body.translation: 你有新牌升级可用。点击下面的按钮，把它们置换到你的卡组中。保持你的牌组在最小下限（60张），这样你就能尽可能多地抽到你需要的牌。

EPP/Level/GenericUnlock.oracleText: Unlock additional play modes by playing more games.
EPP/Level/GenericUnlock.translation: 进行更多对局以解锁额外的游戏模式。

EPP/Level/Reach10ToUnlock.oracleText: Reach level 10 to unlock additional play modes.
EPP/Level/Reach10ToUnlock.translation: 达到等级10以解锁额外的游戏模式。

EPP/Level/ReachToUnlock.oracleText: Complete 4 Color Challenges to unlock all play modes.
EPP/Level/ReachToUnlock.translation: 达到等级3以解锁额外的游戏模式。

EPP/Level/ReachToUnlockPvP.oracleText: Complete 2 Color Challenges to unlock PvP.

EPP/Level/ReachToUnlock_alt.oracleText: Complete more Color Challenges to unlock additional play modes.
EPP/Level/ReachToUnlock_alt.translation: 提升至更高等级以解锁其他游戏模式。

EPP/Level/ReachToUnlock_alt2.oracleText: Complete more Color Challenges to unlock.
EPP/Level/ReachToUnlock_alt2.translation: 提升至更高等级以解锁。

EPP/Nodes/B1A_Desc.oracleText: Play a game with a Black deck to unlock.
EPP/Nodes/B1A_Desc.translation: 利用黑色套牌进行一盘对战来解锁。

EPP/Nodes/B2A_Desc.oracleText: Use "hard removal" spells to kill almost anything, then close out the game with powerful fliers.
EPP/Nodes/B2A_Desc.translation: 利用「硬性去除」咒语扫清面前一切阻碍，而后借助强大飞行生物击溃对手。

EPP/Nodes/B3A_Desc.oracleText: Tokens and kill-spells that allow you to double-block favorably and reward your creatures dying.
EPP/Nodes/B3A_Desc.translation: 众多的衍生物与去除咒语让你能够从容派出生物联手阻挡，同时还能从死去的生物身上获利。

EPP/Nodes/B3B_Desc.oracleText: Reoccurring sources of card-advantage that work with the dead and dying.
EPP/Nodes/B3B_Desc.translation: 死者复生，亡灵涌动，借此不断累积卡牌优势。

EPP/Nodes/B4A_Desc.oracleText: Indulge {card title} with a new card style!
EPP/Nodes/B4A_Desc.translation: 以全新卡牌样式为{card title}生趣！

EPP/Nodes/G1A_Desc.oracleText: Play a game with a Green deck to unlock.
EPP/Nodes/G1A_Desc.translation: 利用绿色套牌进行一盘对战来解锁。

EPP/Nodes/G2A_Desc.oracleText: Spells that let your creatures directly kill your opponent's creatures.
EPP/Nodes/G2A_Desc.translation: 具有能让生物彼此之间直接造成伤害的咒语，利用体型优势消灭对方。

EPP/Nodes/G3A_Desc.oracleText: Mana-producing creatures help ramp you to powerful, but efficiently-costed threats.
EPP/Nodes/G3A_Desc.translation: 借助法术力生物加速展开，快速施放强大且能充分利用资源的威胁。

EPP/Nodes/G3B_Desc.oracleText: Giant creatures adept at controlling the battlefield combined with mana-ramp to help get them out.
EPP/Nodes/G3B_Desc.translation: 借助法术力加速施放巨型生物，利用后者掌控战场。

EPP/Nodes/G4A_Desc.oracleText: Evolve {card title} with a new card style!
EPP/Nodes/G4A_Desc.translation: 用新卡牌样式提升{card title}！以全新卡牌样式为{card title}加礼！

EPP/Nodes/Generic_Desc.oracleText: Place a mastery orb here to obtain these cards.
EPP/Nodes/Generic_Desc.translation: 在此放置精研法珠来获得这些牌。

EPP/Nodes/Generic_Desc_BP.oracleText: Place a set mastery orb here to obtain these cards.
EPP/Nodes/Generic_Desc_BP.translation: 在此放置精研法珠来获得这些牌。

EPP/Nodes/Generic_Styles_Desc.oracleText: Place a mastery orb here to obtain this style.
EPP/Nodes/Generic_Styles_Desc.translation: 在此放置精研法珠来获得此样式。

EPP/Nodes/Generic_Styles_Desc_BP.oracleText: Place a set mastery orb here to obtain this style.
EPP/Nodes/Generic_Styles_Desc_BP.translation: 在此放置精研法珠来获得此样式。

EPP/Nodes/R1A_Desc.oracleText: Play a game with a Red deck to unlock.
EPP/Nodes/R1A_Desc.translation: 利用红色套牌进行一盘对战来解锁。

EPP/Nodes/R2A_Desc.oracleText: Cheap but versatile damage spells mixed with huge dragons that threaten to end the game.
EPP/Nodes/R2A_Desc.translation: 前期依靠费用低廉、用法灵活的伤害咒语掌控节奏，后期派出巨龙来终结悬念。

EPP/Nodes/R3A_Desc.oracleText: Dragon-based synergies that get more powerful the longer the game goes on.
EPP/Nodes/R3A_Desc.translation: 基于「龙」这一生物类别的牌张配合，游戏局势拖得越久，就越能突显套牌威力。

EPP/Nodes/R3B_Desc.oracleText: Mighty dinosaurs that immediately take over the game.
EPP/Nodes/R3B_Desc.translation: 派出强大的恐龙即刻接管战局。

EPP/Nodes/R4A_Desc.oracleText: Celebrate {card title} with a new card style!
EPP/Nodes/R4A_Desc.translation: 以全新卡牌样式为{card title}祝耀！

EPP/Nodes/U1A_Desc.oracleText: Play a game with a Blue deck to unlock.
EPP/Nodes/U1A_Desc.translation: 利用蓝色套牌进行一盘对战来解锁。

EPP/Nodes/U2A_Desc.oracleText: Big, game-ending fliers and enchantments to lock-down enemy creatures.
EPP/Nodes/U2A_Desc.translation: 指挥能够终结游戏的大型飞行生物肆虐天空，同时用结界来死锁对手生物。

EPP/Nodes/U3A_Desc.oracleText: Low, medium, and high costed threats to put pressure on early and maintain it throughout the game.
EPP/Nodes/U3A_Desc.translation: 当中威胁遍布低中高费各个区间，不仅能够从游戏前期开始即施加压力，还能让对手整盘游戏都无法喘气。

EPP/Nodes/U3B_Desc.oracleText: Artifact synergies create card-advantage by creating tokens and drawing cards.
EPP/Nodes/U3B_Desc.translation: 利用神器之间的配合不断派出衍生物、抓取牌张，累积卡牌优势。

EPP/Nodes/U4A_Desc.oracleText: Enhance {card title} with a new card style!
EPP/Nodes/U4A_Desc.translation: 以全新卡牌样式为{card title}添彩！

EPP/Nodes/W1A_Desc.oracleText: Play a game with a White deck to unlock.
EPP/Nodes/W1A_Desc.translation: 利用白色套牌进行一盘对战来解锁。

EPP/Nodes/W2A_Desc.oracleText: Powerful creatures and enchantments that render the opponent's forces ineffective.
EPP/Nodes/W2A_Desc.translation: 借助强力生物与结界限制对手，令其难以发挥军势威力。

EPP/Nodes/W3A_Desc.oracleText: Angels that can dominate the battlefield both offensively and defensively.
EPP/Nodes/W3A_Desc.translation: 天使大军攻守兼备，能够统治整个战场。

EPP/Nodes/W3B_Desc.oracleText: Kill tapped creatures with spells to reach an extremely strong late-game.
EPP/Nodes/W3B_Desc.translation: 利用咒语消灭已横置的生物，力争把战局拖入后期好发挥威力。

EPP/Nodes/W4A_Desc.oracleText: Honor {card title} with a new card style!
EPP/Nodes/W4A_Desc.translation: 以全新卡牌样式为{card title}增辉！

EPP/Practice/goodluck_88.oracleText: Thank you. Good luck to you too.

EPP/Practice/idlechat_01.oracleText: Keep going, you can do this.

EPP/Practice/idlechat_104.oracleText: It's important to take your time.

EPP/Practice/idlechat_105.oracleText: I hope I win, but hope you win too.
EPP/Practice/idlechat_105.translation: 我希望我赢，也希望你赢。

EPP/Practice/idlechat_107.oracleText: It's always nice to have someone else to play with.
EPP/Practice/idlechat_107.translation: 能有人一起玩总是很开心。

EPP/Practice/idlechat_108.oracleText: Hmmm, I wonder what your favorite card is.
EPP/Practice/idlechat_108.translation: 嗯...我来猜猜你最喜欢哪张牌。

EPP/Practice/idlechat_110.oracleText: Hey, I can see your hand!

EPP/Practice/idlechat_112.oracleText: Keep with it, you're doing great.

EPP/Practice/intro_01.oracleText: I'm your spark. Let me show you just what you're capable of.
EPP/Practice/intro_01.translation: 我是你的火花。让我来引导你发现自己的真正潜能。

EPP/Practice/intro_02.oracleText: This looks like a good spot for some practice.
EPP/Practice/intro_02.translation: 这里看来是练习的好地方。

EPP/Practice/intro_74.oracleText: Hey, Look over here! I'm a planeswalker!
EPP/Practice/intro_74.translation: 嘿，快看我！我成鹏洛客了！

EPP/Practice/intro_78.oracleText: Get ready for some friendly competition!

EPP/Practice/intro_79.oracleText: It's a game, so remember to have fun.
EPP/Practice/intro_79.translation: 这只是游戏，所以玩得开心最重要。

EPP/Practice/mulliganto4_115.oracleText: Maybe we should just start over.

EPP/Practice/mulliganto5_113.oracleText: Oh, I hate it when that happens.

EPP/Practice/oops_95.oracleText: Oh don't worry, we all make mistakes.
EPP/Practice/oops_95.translation: 别放在心上，大家都会犯错。

EPP/Practice/sparkytakes10andlives_118.oracleText: Whoa! That's going to leave a mark.

EPP/Practice/thinking_98.oracleText: Take your time, there's no rush.

EPP/Quests/3_JumpIn_Runs_Footer.oracleText: Explore new cards and strategies in the Jump In! event.
EPP/Quests/3_JumpIn_Runs_Footer.translation: 在速学活动中探索新的牌张与策略。

EPP/Quests/6_JumpIn_Runs_Footer.oracleText: Explore new cards and strategies in the Jump In! event.
EPP/Quests/6_JumpIn_Runs_Footer.translation: 在速学活动中探索新的牌张与策略。

EPP/Quests/AlchemyPlay_Description.translation: 进行五局非天梯模式的炼金赛制对局

EPP/Quests/AlchemyPlay_Footer.oracleText: Play give games of Alchemy - win or lose!
EPP/Quests/AlchemyPlay_Footer.translation: 进行五局炼金赛制的对局——无论输赢！

EPP/Quests/Beat_Sparky_Description.translation: 赢得一场与火花精灵的对局。

EPP/Quests/Beat_Sparky_Footer.oracleText: Test your skills against Sparky, our AI computer opponent.
EPP/Quests/Beat_Sparky_Footer.translation: 与火花精灵对抗以测试你的牌技。

EPP/Quests/Complete_1_Color_Challenge_Fo.oracleText: Explore one of the five colors of Magic.
EPP/Quests/Complete_1_Color_Challenge_Fo.translation: 探索万智牌的五种颜色中的一种。

EPP/Quests/Complete_1_Color_Challenge_Re.oracleText: Explore one of the five colors of Magic.
EPP/Quests/Complete_1_Color_Challenge_Re.translation: 探索万智牌的五种颜色中的一种。

EPP/Quests/Complete_5_Color_Challenge_Fo.oracleText: Grow your knowledge in each of the five colors of Magic.
EPP/Quests/Complete_5_Color_Challenge_Fo.translation: 在颜色挑战中增长你对万智牌的了解。

EPP/Quests/Complete_Dual_Color_Precon_Fo.oracleText: Battle other players with premade two-color decks!
EPP/Quests/Complete_Dual_Color_Precon_Fo.translation: 用双色新手套牌与其他牌手进行对局。

EPP/Quests/Complete_Spark_Rank_Footer.oracleText: Rank up and upgrade your decks!

EPP/Quests/Complete_Sparky_Challenge_Foo.oracleText: Test your skills against Sparky, our AI computer opponent.
EPP/Quests/Complete_Sparky_Challenge_Foo.translation: 与火花精灵对抗以测试你的牌技。

EPP/Quests/HistoricBrawl_Footer.oracleText: Play five games of Brawl - win or lose!
EPP/Quests/HistoricBrawl_Footer.translation: 游玩五局争锋 — 无论输赢！

EPP/Quests/QuickDraft_Description.translation: 完成三局快速轮抽比赛

EPP/Quests/QuickDraft_Footer.oracleText: Draft new cards in a Quick Draft event!
EPP/Quests/QuickDraft_Footer.translation: 在快速轮抽活动中选取新的牌张！

EPP/Quests/Reach_Silver_Rank.translation: 在构筑排位模式达到白银段位

EPP/RewardTrack/Complete_1_Color_Challen.translation: 浮雕牌套 & 火花精灵挑战

EPP/RewardTrack/OrbExplanation.oracleText: Mastery Orbs can be used to upgrade your starter decks.
EPP/RewardTrack/OrbExplanation.translation: 你可以用精研法珠来升级你的起始套牌。

EPP/RewardTrack/RewardStylePlusWildcards.oracleText: Reward: Card Style, {number1} Uncommon & {number2} Common Wildcards
EPP/RewardTrack/RewardStylePlusWildcards.translation: 奖励：卡牌样式、{number1}张非凡和{number2}张普通万用牌

EPP/RewardTrack/Style_Orb_And_Unlock.translation: 1种样式、1颗法珠并解锁其他游戏模式

EPP/RewardWeb/ClickToInsert.oracleText: Click a node to insert a mastery orb.
EPP/RewardWeb/ClickToInsert.translation: 点击节点来放置精研法珠。

EPP/RewardWeb/ClickToInsert_BP.oracleText: Click a node to insert a set mastery orb.
EPP/RewardWeb/ClickToInsert_BP.translation: 点击节点来放置精研法珠。

EPP/RewardWeb/ColorPathExplanationHanger.oracleText: Unlock the {color} path by playing a game with a {color} deck.
EPP/RewardWeb/ColorPathExplanationHanger.translation: 利用{color}套牌进行对战来解锁{color}之路。

EPP/RewardWeb/EarnMoreOrbs.oracleText: Earn more orbs by leveling up.

EPP/RewardWeb/EarnOrbsByleveling.oracleText: Earn Mastery Orbs by leveling up!
EPP/RewardWeb/EarnOrbsByleveling.translation: 提升等级即可获得精研法珠！

EPP/RewardWeb/EarnOrbsByleveling_BP.oracleText: Earn Set Mastery Orbs by leveling up!
EPP/RewardWeb/EarnOrbsByleveling_BP.translation: 提升等级即可获得精研法珠！

EPP/RewardWeb/NeedMoreOrbs.oracleText: Acquire more Mastery Orbs to unlock.
EPP/RewardWeb/NeedMoreOrbs.translation: 需要更多精研法珠才能解锁。

EPP/RewardWeb/NeedMoreOrbs_BP.oracleText: Acquire more Set Mastery Orbs to unlock.
EPP/RewardWeb/NeedMoreOrbs_BP.translation: 需要更多精研法珠才能解锁。

EPP/RewardWeb/OrbSpend_Error_MetricUnloc.oracleText: You need to play more matches with cards of this color before unlocking this reward.
EPP/RewardWeb/OrbSpend_Error_MetricUnloc.translation: 你需要再接着利用跟奖励同样颜色的牌张进行对战，才能将其解锁。

EPP/RewardWeb/OrbSpend_Error_NotEnoughOr.oracleText: You don't have enough orbs to unlock this reward right now.
EPP/RewardWeb/OrbSpend_Error_NotEnoughOr.translation: 你没有足够的法珠来立刻解锁这项奖励。

EPP/RewardWeb/OrbSpend_Error_TrackOrWebD.oracleText: This Mastery Tree is currently disabled.  Please try again later.
EPP/RewardWeb/OrbSpend_Error_TrackOrWebD.translation: 此精研树当前已停用。  请再试一次。

EPP/RewardWeb/PlayColorToUnlockNodes.oracleText: Play with a new color to unlock more nodes
EPP/RewardWeb/PlayColorToUnlockNodes.translation: 利用新颜色套牌进行游戏以解锁更多节点

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Play_01.oracleText: Planeswalker, it looks like you can now join "Alchemy Play"!
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Play_01.translation: 鹏洛客，你现在可以参加「炼金匹配」了！

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Play_02.oracleText: This is similar to Spark Ranked in that you'll use a deck legal in Alchemy to queue up to battle other Planeswalkers.
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Play_02.translation: 这是类似于火花天梯模式的赛制，你可以用炼金赛制套牌来与其他鹏洛客对战。

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Play_03.oracleText: Not only can use the same decks you used in Spark Ranked, but in Alchemy Play your rank will not be affected, so go have some fun!
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Play_03.translation: 你不但可以继续用你在火花天梯模式中的套牌，而且还不会影响你的天梯排位，所以尽情享受吧！

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_01.oracleText: Congratulations on completing Spark Rank, Planeswalker!
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_01.translation: 恭喜你打通了火花天梯赛制，鹏洛客！

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_02.oracleText: With that I believe you're ready for Alchemy Ranked play. Alchemy is the format you've been mastering while in Spark Rank.
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_02.translation: 看来你已经准备好参加炼金天梯模式了。「炼金」是你在火花天梯中一直在练习的赛制。

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_03.oracleText: There are formats other than Alchemy, and they all have Ranked and Play modes which you'll discover soon I have no doubt.
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_03.translation: 在「炼金」之外，还有许多其他赛制，它们各自都有天梯模式和休闲模式，相信你很快就会发现它们。

EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_04.oracleText: Now the real ranked journey begins. I'm rooting for you, and hope you find what you're searching for, Planeswalker.
EPP/Sparky/Alchemy_Ranked_04.translation: 现在，真正的天梯之旅开始了！我为你加油，希望你能得偿所愿，鹏洛客。

EPP/Sparky/BotMatch_01.oracleText: Here is where you can play a practice game against...me!
EPP/Sparky/BotMatch_01.translation: Here is where you can play a practice game against...me!

EPP/Sparky/BotMatch_02.oracleText: You can use any deck you'd like, but I won't go easy on you!
EPP/Sparky/BotMatch_02.translation: You can use any deck you'd like, but I won't go easy on you!

EPP/Sparky/Brawl_01.oracleText: Welcome to Brawl! This format is similar to Commander- You choose a legendary creature to lead an army into battle. You can even choose a Planeswalker as your Commander!
EPP/Sparky/Brawl_01.translation: Welcome to Brawl! This format is similar to Commander- You choose a legendary creature to lead an army into battle. You can even choose a Planeswalker as your Commander!

EPP/Sparky/Brawl_02.oracleText: Standard Brawl decks consist of 60 cards legal in Standard, while Brawl requires 100 cards, and can use almost any card on MTG Arena!
EPP/Sparky/Brawl_02.translation: 不同于争锋需要100张卡牌并可以使用万智牌竞技场上几乎任何一张牌，标准争锋套牌由60张标准赛制合法的卡牌构成。

EPP/Sparky/Codex_00.oracleText: You've unlocked another page in the Codex of the Multiverse!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_00.translation: 你已经解锁了多重宇宙法典的另一页！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_01.oracleText: If you'd like to know even more about Magic: The Gathering, then follow me!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_01.translation: 如果你想知道更多关于万智牌的事，跟我来！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_02.oracleText: Welcome to The Codex of the Multiverse! This is your place to ignite your curiosity around Magic, and learn how to master it.
EPP/Sparky/Codex_02.translation: 欢迎来到多重宇宙法典！ 这是你激发对万智牌好奇心并学习如何掌握它的地方。

EPP/Sparky/Codex_03.oracleText: The secrets of the Multiverse await you, and the more you play, the more entries you'll unlock.
EPP/Sparky/Codex_03.translation: The secrets of the Multiverse await you, and the more you play, the more entries you'll unlock.

EPP/Sparky/Codex_04.oracleText: Because as you know: Knowledge is Power!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_04.translation: Because as you know: Knowledge is Power!

EPP/Sparky/Codex_05.oracleText: As you continue your journey, you'll unlock more pages of the Codex, so be sure to drop by for more knowledge!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_05.translation: 当你继续你的旅程时，你将解锁更多的法典页面，所以一定要来获取更多知识！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_07.oracleText: Welcome home, Planeswalker! This is where you can use the Play Blade to choose your way to play and get right into slinging some spells!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_07.translation: 欢迎回家，鹏洛客！ 在这里你可以选择你的游戏方式并开始施展一些咒语！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_08.oracleText: If you want to learn the very basics of how to play Magic, then Quick Start is the place to well...start!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_08.translation: 如果你想学习如何玩万智牌的基础知识，那么“快速入门”就是你的最佳选择！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_09.oracleText: Profile is where you can learn how to personalize yourself and learn all about your Seasonal Rank that resets every month.
EPP/Sparky/Codex_09.translation: 在个人资料中，你可以学习如何个性化自己并了解有关每月重置的赛季排名的所有信息。

EPP/Sparky/Codex_10.oracleText: Want to look at the cards in your collection and create some amazing decks? Then Decks is the place to go!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_10.translation: 想要查看你收藏的卡牌并创建一些令人惊叹的套牌吗？ 那么套牌就是你该去的地方！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_11.oracleText: Store is where you can check out all the newest offerings and pick up packs, card styles, sleeves, and much more!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_11.translation: 你可以在商店中查看所有最新产品并挑选卡包、卡牌样式、牌套等等！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_12.oracleText: The Formats page breaks down the different ways to play Magic, from Constructed to Limited, and includes my personal favorite, Jump-In!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_12.translation: 赛制页面详细介绍了玩万智牌的不同方式，从构筑赛到限制赛，其中包括我个人最喜欢的“速学”！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_13.oracleText: Remember, anytime you discover a new way to play, a full description will magically appear in the Codex of the Multiverse! Neat, huh?
EPP/Sparky/Codex_13.translation: 请记住，每当你发现新的游戏方式时，完整的描述都会神奇地出现在多重宇宙法典中！ 不错吧？

EPP/Sparky/Codex_14.oracleText: Over in Events, you'll find different ways to play ranging from Premier Play tournaments that lead to Arena Championships, to celebrations of Magic in the form of Midweek Magic!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_14.translation: 在活动中，你会发现不同的玩法，从通往竞技场锦标赛的 Premier Play 锦标赛，到周中万智牌形式的万智牌庆祝活动！

EPP/Sparky/Codex_15.oracleText: Mastery breaks down how you can earn rewards from the Mastery Tree and Set Mastery just by playing!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_15.translation: Mastery breaks down how you can earn rewards from the Mastery Tree and Set Mastery just by playing!

EPP/Sparky/Codex_16.oracleText: Want to learn more about the steps and phases of a turn? Then Parts Of A Turn is the place for you!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_16.translation: Want to learn more about the steps and phases of a turn? Then Parts Of A Turn is the place for you!

EPP/Sparky/Codex_17.oracleText: There are many Card Types out there, and this page will sort them all out for you.
EPP/Sparky/Codex_17.translation: There are many Card Types out there, and this page will sort them all out for you.

EPP/Sparky/Codex_18.oracleText: This is where you'll learn about the various zones a card can travel such as library, hand, stack, and maybe even exile!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_18.translation: This is where you'll learn about the various zones a card can travel such as library, hand, stack, and maybe even exile!

EPP/Sparky/Codex_19.oracleText: Here is where you can learn about some similarities between MTG Arena and paper Magic: The Gathering!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_19.translation: Here is where you can learn about some similarities between MTG Arena and paper Magic: The Gathering!

EPP/Sparky/Codex_20.oracleText: Here is where you can learn about the difference between Izzet and Abzan, and which color likes artifacts the most!
EPP/Sparky/Codex_20.translation: Here is where you can learn about the difference between Izzet and Abzan, and which color likes artifacts the most!

EPP/Sparky/Codex_21.oracleText: If you're curious as to what terms like aggro, midrange, and control mean, then check out this page.
EPP/Sparky/Codex_21.translation: If you're curious as to what terms like aggro, midrange, and control mean, then check out this page.

EPP/Sparky/Codex_22.oracleText: What's in a card? Care for a deep dive into what makes a card magical?
EPP/Sparky/Codex_22.translation: What's in a card? Care for a deep dive into what makes a card magical?

EPP/Sparky/Codex_23.oracleText: Some cards are too powerful to be used in certain formats, and sometimes cards will even come off that format's banned and restricted list.
EPP/Sparky/Codex_23.translation: Some cards are too powerful to be used in certain formats, and sometimes cards will even come off that format's banned and restricted list.

EPP/Sparky/ColorChallengeIntro_01.oracleText: Beating Color Challenges is a great way to learn about the game, and earn some rewards!
EPP/Sparky/ColorChallengeIntro_01.translation: Beating Color Challenges is a great way to learn about the game, and earn some rewards!

EPP/Sparky/Events_01.oracleText: Here in Events, you can discover unique ways to play. You might even recognize a few!
EPP/Sparky/Events_01.translation: Here in Events, you can discover unique ways to play. You might even recognize a few!

EPP/Sparky/Events_02.oracleText: One of my favorite events to play is Jump In! It's a great way to get right into a game of Magic and it's a new adventure every time. You even get to keep the cards!
EPP/Sparky/Events_02.translation: One of my favorite events to play is Jump In! It's a great way to get right into a game of Magic and it's a new adventure every time. You even get to keep the cards!

EPP/Sparky/Evil/01.oracleText: Welcome to MTG Arena, Creature! Here, Planeswalkers will summon you, and force you to enter combat to fight for their whims.
EPP/Sparky/Evil/01.translation: Welcome to MTG Arena, Creature! Here, Planeswalkers will summon you, and force you to enter combat to fight for their whims.

EPP/Sparky/Evil/02.oracleText: There's not a lot you can do about it, and sometimes you'll just be forced to chump block a strictly better creature.
EPP/Sparky/Evil/02.translation: There's not a lot you can do about it, and sometimes you'll just be forced to chump block a strictly better creature.

EPP/Sparky/Evil/03.oracleText: That's if you even survive for a turn! You might just enter the graveyard while you're still summoning sick. Rough beats.
EPP/Sparky/Evil/03.translation: That's if you even survive for a turn! You might just enter the graveyard while you're still summoning sick. Rough beats.

EPP/Sparky/Evil/04.oracleText: Well, what are you waiting for, Creature? It's time to hit that big orange button and get in there!
EPP/Sparky/Evil/04.translation: Well, what are you waiting for, Creature? It's time to hit that big orange button and get in there!

EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_01.oracleText: It looks like you're ready for a Brawl!
EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_01.translation: 看起来你准备好来一场争锋对局了！

EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_02.oracleText: This is a unique format where you'll choose one legendary creature or planeswalker to champion a deck of 99 other cards.
EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_02.translation: This is a unique format where you'll choose one legendary creature or planeswalker to champion a deck of 99 other cards.

EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_03.oracleText: It looks like you've even earned a deck of your own to get started!
EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_03.translation: It looks like you've even earned a deck of your own to get started!

EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_04.oracleText: This format includes almost every card on MTG Arena, so you're sure to discover some new experiences!
EPP/Sparky/Historic_Brawl_04.translation: This format includes almost every card on MTG Arena, so you're sure to discover some new experiences!

EPP/Sparky/Jump_In_01.oracleText: I think you're ready to jump into Jump In!
EPP/Sparky/Jump_In_01.translation: I think you're ready to jump into Jump In!

EPP/Sparky/Jump_In_02.oracleText: Here you'll pick two different half-decks from a variety of themes, then combine them to create a deck all your own.
EPP/Sparky/Jump_In_02.translation: Here you'll pick two different half-decks from a variety of themes, then combine them to create a deck all your own.

EPP/Sparky/Jump_In_03.oracleText: You can then play against other Planeswalkers with that deck as much as you'd like, and the cards are yours to keep!
EPP/Sparky/Jump_In_03.translation: You can then play against other Planeswalkers with that deck as much as you'd like, and the cards are yours to keep!

EPP/Sparky/NPEComplete_01.oracleText: Congratulations on completing Spark Rank! You've done a great job coming into your own as a new Planeswalker.
EPP/Sparky/NPEComplete_01.translation: 恭喜您完成火花天梯赛制！ 作为一名新鹏洛客，你已经做得很好了。

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_01.oracleText: You're back! After that match, I think you're finally ready for me to show you a very popular way to play: Draft!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_01.translation: 你回来了！经过这场对局，我想你终于准备好让我向你展示一种非常流行的游戏方式：轮抽！

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_02.oracleText: Let's first get you started with Quick Draft! Here you'll draft cards with AI friends of mine, then play against other planeswalkers.
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_02.translation: 首先让我们开始快速轮抽！ 在这里，你将与我的AI朋友一起轮抽卡牌，然后与其他旅法师对战。

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_03.oracleText: Quick Draft is a limited format. That just means that you'll open up cards and create your deck in the event!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_03.translation: 快速轮抽是一种限制赛制。这意味着你将在赛事中选择牌张并创建您的套牌！

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_04.oracleText: I've even given you a Quick Draft token, so you can give it a go, on me!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_04.translation: 我给了你一枚快速轮抽代币，所以你可以尝试一下，跟我来！

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_05.oracleText: I think it's time to introduce you to Sealed, another type of format similar to Draft!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_05.translation: 我想是时候向你介绍现开了，这是另一种类似于轮抽的赛制！

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_05b.oracleText: You've also unlocked another type of limited event called Sealed!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_05b.translation: 你还解锁了另一种名为“现开”的限制赛事！

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_06.oracleText: Much like the name is hinting at, here you'll be given six packs of Magic cards. You'll open them and make your deck out of just those opened cards!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_06.translation: 就像名字所暗示的那样，在这里你将获得六包万智牌卡包。 你将打开它们并用这些卡片构筑你的套牌！

EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_07.oracleText: So try to stick to two colors, play around fifteen creatures, and do your best with the limited amount of resources at your disposal!
EPP/Sparky/QuickDraft_07.translation: 因此，请尝试主要使用两种颜色，带上大约十五个生物，并利用有限的资源尽力而为！

EPP/Sparky/Quick_Draft_01.oracleText: You've now unlocked Quick Draft, one of my favorite ways to play!
EPP/Sparky/Quick_Draft_01.translation: You've now unlocked Quick Draft, one of my favorite ways to play!

EPP/Sparky/Quick_Draft_02.oracleText: Here, you'll open up three packs, select cards one at a time, and pass the rest among AI bots, so feel free to take your time.
EPP/Sparky/Quick_Draft_02.translation: Here, you'll open up three packs, select cards one at a time, and pass the rest among AI bots, so feel free to take your time.

EPP/Sparky/Quick_Draft_03.oracleText: Then you'll make a draft deck with those cards to play against other Planeswalkers. And the best part is the cards you choose are added to your collection!
EPP/Sparky/Quick_Draft_03.translation: Then you'll make a draft deck with those cards to play against other Planeswalkers. And the best part is the cards you choose are added to your collection!

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_01.oracleText: This is where you can find your current rank in Spark Rank!
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_01.translation: 你可以在此处找到你当前在火花天梯模式中的排名！

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_02.oracleText: As you play, you'll level up through the four tiers. I wonder what happens when you complete Tier 1? Hmm...
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_02.translation: 当你游玩的时候，你将会升过四个段位。 我想知道当你到达段位1时会发生什么？ 唔...

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_03.oracleText: Then climb your way up the tiers of Spark Ranked play as you master your Planeswalker spark!
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_03.translation: Then climb your way up the tiers of Spark Ranked play as you master your Planeswalker spark!

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_04.oracleText: After you complete Spark Rank, who knows what adventures await. I can't wait for you to find out!
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_04.translation: After you complete Spark Rank, who knows what adventures await. I can't wait for you to find out!

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_06.oracleText: You've unlocked a new mode to play against other aspiring Planeswalkers!
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_06.translation: You've unlocked a new mode to play against other aspiring Planeswalkers!

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_07.oracleText: Congratulations on unlocking Spark Rank! Here is where you'll battle other Planeswalkers with any deck you like!
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_07.translation: Congratulations on unlocking Spark Rank! Here is where you'll battle other Planeswalkers with any deck you like!

EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_08.oracleText: A great place to start is using decks you have earned from playing the Starter Deck Duel Event. You can even upgrade those decks and make your own creation!
EPP/Sparky/SparkRank_08.translation: A great place to start is using decks you have earned from playing the Starter Deck Duel Event. You can even upgrade those decks and make your own creation!

EPP/Sparky/Sparky_Challenge_01.oracleText: Nice work, Planeswalker! I think you're ready for the next stage of your journey.
EPP/Sparky/Sparky_Challenge_01.translation: 干得漂亮，鹏洛客！我觉得你已经准备好进入下一个阶段了。

EPP/Sparky/Sparky_Challenge_02.oracleText: In Sparky's Challenge, you'll choose a starter deck to play against...me!
EPP/Sparky/Sparky_Challenge_02.translation: 在火花精灵挑战中，你将选择一个新手套牌来挑战我！

EPP/Sparky/Sparky_Challenge_03.oracleText: If you can defeat me three times, you'll have proven you're ready to step into a much larger world. So let's go!
EPP/Sparky/Sparky_Challenge_03.translation: 如果你能打败我三次，你就证明了你已经准备好进入更大的世界了。所以我们走吧！

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_01.oracleText: Nice work! I think you're ready to face other Planeswalkers in a new event: Starter Deck Duel!
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_01.translation: 干得好！ 我认为你已准备好在新赛事中面对其他鹏洛客了：新手套牌对决！

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_02.oracleText: Here, you'll choose from one of 10 two-color Starter Decks to battle other Planeswalkers.
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_02.translation: 在这里，你将从十套双色新手套牌中选择一套来与其他鹏洛客进行对局。

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_03.oracleText: And here's the best part: If you win with a deck, you'll add it to your collection!
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_03.translation: And here's the best part: If you win with a deck, you'll add it to your collection!

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_04.oracleText: You can join as many times as you'd like! Can you unlock all ten?
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_04.translation: You can join as many times as you'd like! Can you unlock all ten?

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_05.oracleText: Welcome to Starter Deck Duel! Here you'll choose a deck to play against other Planeswalkers as much as you like.
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_05.translation: Welcome to Starter Deck Duel! Here you'll choose a deck to play against other Planeswalkers as much as you like.

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_06.oracleText: Once you win with a deck, you'll add it to your collection!
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_06.translation: Once you win with a deck, you'll add it to your collection!

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_07.oracleText: Go here to select a new deck.
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_07.translation: Go here to select a new deck.

EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_08.oracleText: Once you win three games, you'll unlock something else too! Are you up for the challenge?
EPP/Sparky/StarterDeckDuel_08.translation: Once you win three games, you'll unlock something else too! Are you up for the challenge?

EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_01.oracleText: Hey, you got a wildcard! Follow me to find out how to use them to craft new cards!
EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_01.translation: 嘿，你已经获得了一张万用牌。跟我来学习怎么用它合成新牌吧！

EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_02.oracleText: Wildcards can be redeemed for any card of the same rarity.
EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_02.translation: 万用牌可以兑换成相同稀有度的任何牌张。

EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_03.oracleText: You can earn wildcards primarily by opening packs. This will progress your vault and wildcard tracks, but packs can also just contain wildcards themselves!
EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_03.translation: 你主要可以通过开包获取万用牌，这会增加你的宝库和万用牌进度，不过你也有可能从补充包中直接开到万用牌。

EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_04.oracleText: Now that you have one, why not go to your Decks, and craft a new card? A great place to start is to clone a Starter Deck and modify it to make it yours!
EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_04.translation: 既然您已经有了一张万用牌，为什么不去打开你的套牌制作一张新卡呢？ 一个很好的起点是复制新手预组并修改它以使其成为你自己的套牌！

EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_04_alt.oracleText: Now that you have a Rare Wildcard, why not make a new deck with any rare card you like!
EPP/Sparky/Wildcards_04_alt.translation: 现在你已经有了一张稀有万用牌，为什么不用你喜欢的任何稀有卡来制作新套牌呢！

EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_01.oracleText: Wow, you've beaten all of the Color Challenges.
EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_01.translation: 哇，你已经完成了所有的颜色挑战。

EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_02.oracleText: I knew you could do it!

EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_03.oracleText: And now, a new quest has appeared.
EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_03.translation: 而现在，一个新的任务出现了。

EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_05.oracleText: You can earn ten new decks by completing it.
EPP/Sparky/challengesDone_05.translation: 你可以通过完成它来获得十个新套牌。

EPP/Sparky/colorChallengeIntro_01.oracleText: You'll upgrade your decks by beating Color Challenges.
EPP/Sparky/colorChallengeIntro_01.translation: 您将通过完成颜色挑战来升级你的套牌。

EPP/Sparky/colorChallengeIntro_02.oracleText: You're well on your way to being a great planeswalker.
EPP/Sparky/colorChallengeIntro_02.translation: 你正在成为一名伟大的鹏洛客。

EPP/Sparky/firstcolorchoice_158.oracleText: You're on the road to becoming a great planeswalker! Now it's time to choose your path.
EPP/Sparky/firstcolorchoice_158.translation: 你必将成为伟大的鹏洛客！现在该选择你的入门之路了。

EPP/Sparky/firstunlock_159.oracleText: One step closer to becoming the best!
EPP/Sparky/firstunlock_159.translation: 你在追求卓越的道路上更进一步！

EPP/Sparky/firstunlock_160.oracleText: Keep progressing like this and pretty soon you'll be ready for anything!
EPP/Sparky/firstunlock_160.translation: 保持这种势头，很快你就准备好迎接一切挑战！

EPP/Sparky/hintatbotxp_151.oracleText: While you're leveling up, you can earn rewards by playing games with me or with other players.
EPP/Sparky/hintatbotxp_151.translation: 除了提升等级之外，跟我和其他牌手对战还可以赢取奖励。

EPP/Sparky/hintatbotxp_152.oracleText: You can practice with me to start with.
EPP/Sparky/hintatbotxp_152.translation: 一开始你可以先和我练习。

EPP/Sparky/hintatbotxp_153_alt.oracleText: You can practice with me to start.
EPP/Sparky/hintatbotxp_153_alt.translation: 你可以先从跟我练习开始。

EPP/Sparky/hintatnobotxp_161.oracleText: Wow, great progress. I don't know if I'm even a match for you anymore.
EPP/Sparky/hintatnobotxp_161.translation: 哇，你真是进步神速。恐怕我已经不是你的对手了。

EPP/Sparky/hintatnobotxp_162.oracleText: Really impressive! I can't keep up!
EPP/Sparky/hintatnobotxp_162.translation: 真厉害！我已经跟不上你了！

EPP/Sparky/introtoquest_150.oracleText: Play more games to level-up and unlock more stuff.
EPP/Sparky/introtoquest_150.translation: 进行对战可提升等级并解锁更多内容。

EPP/Sparky/introtorewardtrack_154.oracleText: Each time you level-up, you'll earn new rewards.
EPP/Sparky/introtorewardtrack_154.translation: 你每升一级，都会获得新的奖励。

EPP/Sparky/introtoweb_156.oracleText: There's new cards in every direction!
EPP/Sparky/introtoweb_156.translation: 这里到处都是新的牌张！

EPP/Sparky/momentofgraduation_163.oracleText: You did it! I'm so proud of you.
EPP/Sparky/momentofgraduation_163.translation: 你做到了！我真为你骄傲。

EPP/Sparky/momentofgraduation_164.oracleText: You made it! You're quite the formidable opponent!
EPP/Sparky/momentofgraduation_164.translation: 你做到了！你现在已经无人能挡了！

EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_165.oracleText: I'll be around if you want to practice a new deck, but from now on, you'll have to battle other players to earn rewards.
EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_165.translation: 如果想练习新的套牌，我随时奉陪。但现在，你得和其他牌手进行对战才能赢取奖励。

EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_166.oracleText: You've mastered everything I can teach you. If you want greater power, you'll have to take on greater foes.
EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_166.translation: 你已经掌握了我所知的一切。只有向更强悍的敌人发起挑战，才能不断提高自身。

EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_166_SC.oracleText: You've mastered everything I can teach you. If you want greater power, you'll have to take on greater foes.
EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_166_SC.translation: 你已经掌握了我所知的一切。只有向更强悍的敌人发起挑战，才能不断提高自身。

EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_167.oracleText: I always thought you were amazing, but now the whole multiverse will know.
EPP/Sparky/removingbotxp_167.translation: 你在我心目中一直是颗耀眼明星，该让整个多重宇宙见识你的实力。

Emotes/ZNR/Full/AllOfUs.oracleText: You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!
Emotes/ZNR/Full/AllOfUs.translation: 你惹我们一个人，你就是在惹我们所有人!

Emotes/ZNR/Full/DawnAdventure.oracleText: A new dawn, a new adventure.

Emotes/ZNR/Full/FlashFast.oracleText: Too flashy to ignore. Too fast to catch.
Emotes/ZNR/Full/FlashFast.translation: 难以忽视的浮华。难以捕获的速度。

Emotes/ZNR/Full/GnarlidsFollow.oracleText: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.
Emotes/ZNR/Full/GnarlidsFollow.translation: 魔力充盈之处，糙节兽必随至。

Emotes/ZNR/Full/InfernoSpark.oracleText: Every inferno begins with a spark.

Emotes/ZNR/Full/IonaNoLonger.oracleText: Iona no longer guards this place. We do.
Emotes/ZNR/Full/IonaNoLonger.translation: 艾欧娜虽不再庇佑此地，但我们仍继续守护。

Emotes/ZNR/Full/ObeyCooperate.oracleText: It doesn't obey me. It cooperates with me.
Emotes/ZNR/Full/ObeyCooperate.translation: 它不听我的话。它只是配合我行动。

Emotes/ZNR/Full/RebirthDeath.oracleText: Every rebirth looks like a death.

Emotes/ZNR/Full/ServesYou.oracleText: Serves you right for rushing ahead.

Emotes/ZNR/Full/SwarmRise.oracleText: On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise.
Emotes/ZNR/Full/SwarmRise.translation: 邪翼蔽日，血雨腥风，虫群必将崛起。

Emotes/ZNR/Full/TurnedAround.oracleText: I think we somehow got turned around.
Emotes/ZNR/Full/TurnedAround.translation: 我想我们算是转过头了。

Event_Desc_AER_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Event_Desc_AER_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Event_Desc_Treasure_Constructed.oracleText: Play Treasure Contructed, win card style rewards! In Treasure Constructed, at the beginning of each of your upkeeps, you create an artifact Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color. This event is also the first event on MTG Arena with card style rewards! You'll get the card style for Skewer the Critics at one or more wins, plus if you get five wins you'll receive the card style for Chemister's Insight. You can only receive each card style once, but it can be applied to all copies of the card in your collection.
Event_Desc_Treasure_Constructed.translation: 参加「珍宝构筑」，赢取卡牌样式奖励！于「珍宝构筑」中，在你的每个维持开始时，你都会派出一个能够牺牲来产生一点任意颜色法术力的珍宝衍生神器。这也是万智牌竞技场中第一个奖励卡牌样式的赛事！赢得至少一胜，便可获得遏制倒彩的卡牌样式。如果你取得五胜，便可再获得化学师的洞察之卡牌样式。每张卡牌样式只能获得一次，但不限使用张数～你收藏中的同画卡牌均可应用。

Events/Day_2_Notice.oracleText: This token qualifies you for the associated Day 2 event. Join from 6am - 8am PT.
Events/Day_2_Notice.translation: 此门票给予你参加Day2赛事的资格。在太平洋时间(PT)上午6 点-上午2 点参加。

Events/Decathlon_Notice.oracleText: This can qualify you for a specific Finals event. See full rules for further information on that event.
Events/Decathlon_Notice.translation: 这能使你具有参加最终比赛的资格。阅读完整规则以助了解更多信息。

Events/DeckLockDisclaimer.oracleText: Once submitted, your deck and its cosmetics cannot be changed for the duration of this event.
Events/DeckLockDisclaimer.translation: 提交后，您的套牌及其皮肤在此活动期间无法更改。

Events/DeckSubmit_AlreadyDoneWithMatches.oracleText: You are already done with your matches.

Events/Event_Cash_Details.oracleText: Wizards of the Coast will contact eligible players earning this award after the event.

Events/Event_Cat_DOM_Omniscience_Draft.translation: 全知全能轮抽：多明纳里亚

Events/Event_Desc_AFR_DraftChallenge.oracleText: Prove yourself in a high-stakes Draft Challenge! Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_AFR_DraftChallenge.translation: 在高风险的轮抽挑战中证明自己！轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行三盘两胜制的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_AlchemyPrecons.oracleText:
The latest set of Alchemy cards is here, and it's time to hit the laboratory! To get things started, we've arranged a few samples that will get you off and running. Give them a try, and you just might find the seed for your next masterpiece! 

You will receive 1000 Mastery XP when you join this event. Then choose any of these preconstructed decks and play as much as you want until the event ends. You may change your deck choice at any time.
Events/Event_Desc_AlchemyPrecons.translation:
最新系列的炼金模式卡牌在这里，是时候轰击实验室了！在开始之前，我们为你安排了一些可以轻松上手的样品。进行尝试，然后你可能会找到你下一个杰作的种子！

当你参加此活动你将获得 1000 精研通行证经验。选择其中一个预组套牌，游玩直到活动结束。你可以在任何时候更换你的套牌。

Events/Event_Desc_AlchemyRebalanceEvent.oracleText:
With the latest developments in Alchemy, there's a new landscape to explore. Put a tried-and-true theorem to the test, or break fresh ground with your own experiments. You can bring any Alchemy deck you like, whether you have the cards in your collection or not!

To see all of the latest card changes, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-alchemy-latest-changes>here</link></u>.
Events/Event_Desc_AlchemyRebalanceEvent.translation:
随着炼金术的最新发展，有一处新景观可供探索。测试一个久经考验的定理，或者用自己的实验开辟新天地。你可以携带任何你喜欢的炼金套牌，无论你的收藏中是否有该卡片！

要查看所有最新的卡牌更改，请点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-alchemy-latest-changes>此处</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_AlchemyWelcome.oracleText: Welcome to the debut of Alchemy, the newest format on MTG Arena! Alchemy contains all of the sets from Standard, plus new cards from a special release each set. Alchemy is fully digital, which means that in addition to new cards, you can expect to see functional adjustments to cards in the format on a regular basis. You'll find a full range of cards, packs, queues, and events for Alchemy right alongside the familiar Standard and Historic game modes. All you have to do is join in and play! For now, start your journey with 3 packs of Alchemy: Innistrad when you join this welcome event. Then take the format for a spin and earn a few more to help you on your way. Have fun and enjoy the games!
Events/Event_Desc_AlchemyWelcome.translation: 欢迎来到万智牌进机场的最新模式 炼金！ 炼金模式包含标准中的所有系列，加上 来自每个特殊版本的新牌。炼金是完全数字化的，这意味着除了新卡牌之外，你还可以定期看到游戏模式中原有卡牌的功能调整。 除了熟悉的标准和史迹游戏模式之外，你还会发现炼金的各种卡牌、补充包、队列和事件。你所要做的就是加入并游玩！ 现在，当你加入这个欢迎赛事时，用3包炼金：依尼翠 开始你的旅程。然后试试这个模式并赚取更多以帮助你前进。玩得开心，享受游戏！

Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Challenge.oracleText: Bring your Alchemy deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive rewards based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Challenge.translation: 用你的炼金赛制套牌进行三盘两胜的对战！你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Event.oracleText: Bring your Alchemy deck, play some games, and receive rewards based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Event.translation: 使用你事先组好的炼金赛制套牌，不断进行对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Ladder.oracleText: Alchemy uses cards from recent sets with additional balance changes. Results will affect your Constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Ladder.translation: 炼金赛制使用最近发售系列的卡牌，并有额外平衡性调整。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Play.oracleText: Play with cards from the last two years, including digital-only cards and rebalanced cards!
Events/Event_Desc_Alchemy_Play.translation: 玩过去两年的卡牌，包括纯数字卡牌和重新平衡的卡牌！

Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess.oracleText: Welcome to Launch Celebration! Play ANY Deck, Win EVERY Card. Your access to all Standard cards starts right now. Play games with any Standard deck, even with cards not in your collection! After joining, click the "Choose Your Deck" button on the right to build or select your deck. Flex your deck brewing muscles as you get ready for our Win Every Card Challenge on October 5, 20:00 Pacific time (UTC-7), where you can really welcome the challenge and potentially walk away with one copy of every Standard card. Don't know what decks to play? Check out a few decklists here.
Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess.translation: 欢迎来到启动庆典！玩任何套牌，赢任意卡牌。 现在开始，你可以使用所有标准卡。使用任何标准套牌游玩，即使里面有你未收集的卡牌！加入后，点击右侧的“选择你的套牌”按钮来构建或选择你的套牌。 尽情锻炼吧，为太平洋时间10月5日20:00（UTC-7）的“赢任意卡牌”挑战赛做好准备，那时你可以迎来真正的挑战，并有可能带走每一张标准卡的副本。 不知道该玩什么套牌？查看一下这里的一些套牌列表。

Flex your deck brewing muscles as you get ready for our Win Every Card Challenge on October 5, 20:00 Pacific time (UTC-7), where you can really welcome the challenge and potentially walk away with one copy of every Standard card. Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_ALT2.translation: 欢迎来到启动庆典！玩任何套牌，赢任意卡牌。 现在开始，你可以使用所有标准卡。使用任何标准套牌游玩，即使里面有你未收集的卡牌！加入后，点击右侧的“选择你的套牌”按钮来构建或选择你的套牌。 尽情锻炼吧，为太平洋时间10月5日20:00（UTC-7）的“赢任意卡牌”挑战赛做好准备，那时你可以迎来真正的挑战，并有可能带走每一张标准卡的副本。 不知道该玩什么套牌？查看一下这里的一些套牌列表。

Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Alt.oracleText: Welcome to Launch Celebration! Play ANY Deck, Win EVERY Card. Your access to all Standard cards starts right now. Play games with any Standard deck, even with cards not in your collection! Once you start, click the "Choose Your Deck" button on the right to build or select your deck. Get to five wins in this event to qualify for our Win Every Card Challenge on October 5, where you can really welcome the challenge and potentially walk away with one copy of every Standard card. Don't know what decks to build to get your 5 qualifying wins? Check out a few decklists here.
Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Alt.translation: 欢迎来到启动庆典！玩任何套牌，赢任意卡牌。 现在开始，你可以使用所有标准卡。使用任何标准套牌游玩，即使里面有你未收集的卡牌！加入后，点击右侧的“选择你的套牌”按钮来构建或选择你的套牌。 在此赛事中赢得五场胜利，才有资格参加太平洋时间10月5日20:00（UTC-7）的“赢任意卡牌”挑战赛，那时你可以迎来真正的挑战，并有可能带走每一张标准卡的副本。 不知道要构建什么套牌才能获得 5 次排位赛胜利？查看一下这里的一些套牌列表。

Check out a few decklists here.

Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Alt1_ALT2.translation: 玩任何套牌，赢任意卡牌！ 使用任何标准套牌游玩，即使里面有你未收集的卡牌！加入后，点击右侧的“选择你的套牌”按钮来构建你的套牌。 关注太平洋时间10月5日20:00（UTC-7）的“赢任意卡牌”挑战赛，那时你可以迎来真正的挑战，并有可能带走每一张标准卡的副本。 不知道该玩什么套牌？查看一下这里的一些套牌列表。

Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Alt_ALT2.oracleText: Welcome to Launch Celebration! Play ANY Deck, Win EVERY Card. Your access to all Standard cards starts right now. Play games with any Standard deck, even with cards not in your collection! Once you start, click the "Choose Your Deck" button on the right to build or select your deck. Practice with 12 games in this event to prepare for our Win Every Card Challenge on October 5, 20:00 Pacific time (UTC-7) where you can really welcome the challenge and potentially walk away with one copy of every Standard card. Don't know what decks to build to get your 5 qualifying wins? Check out a few decklists here.
Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Alt_ALT2.translation: 欢迎来到启动庆典！玩任何套牌，赢任意卡牌。 现在开始，你可以使用所有标准卡。使用任何标准套牌游玩，即使里面有你未收集的卡牌！加入后，点击右侧的“选择你的套牌”按钮来构建或选择你的套牌。 在此次赛事中进行12次对战，为太平洋时间10月5日20:00（UTC-7）的“赢任意卡牌”挑战赛做好准备，那时你可以迎来真正的挑战，并有可能带走每一张标准卡的副本。 不知道要构建什么套牌才能获得 5 次排位赛胜利？查看一下这里的一些套牌列表。

Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Finals.oracleText: Play ANY Deck, Win EVERY Card! Win 12 games before your second loss and receive the top reward, a copy of EVERY card in Standard plus a Sealed Event Token! All participants earn rewards, click here to see the full event rewards. Note: We strongly recommend you join and play your games as early as possible. We want to make sure everyone can try for 12 wins before the event ends.
Events/Event_Desc_AllAccess_Finals.translation: 玩任何套牌，赢任意卡牌！ 在第二次失败之前赢得12场比赛即可获得最高奖励，即标准版所有卡牌的副本和一枚密封赛事代币！所有参与者都能获得奖励，点击这里查看全部赛事奖励。。 注意：我们强烈建议你尽可能早地加入并进行比赛。我们希望确保每个人都能在活动结束前尝试获得12场胜利。

Events/Event_Desc_ArenaOpen_Day1.oracleText: Compete for monetary rewards! Sign up for this Day 1 event and get all 7 wins to qualify for Day 2 where top finishers earn monetary rewards! Players may enter Day 1 as many times as they wish, but can only enter Day 2 once even if they have qualified through Day 1 multiple times. The format for Day 1 is Historic with single-game matches, and then Traditional Historic with best-of-three matches using sideboards for Day 2. For assistance, click here to contact Game Support. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Receiving monetary rewards requires creating or having existing Wizards, DCI, and i-Payout accounts. See here for full details.

Events/Event_Desc_ArenaTeamEvent.oracleText: Thank you for all your hard work!

Events/Event_Desc_BRO_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Soldiers Gather your Soldiers and overwhelm your opponent on the ground and in the skies. Draw Power Draw a multitude of cards from your deck to keep the knowledge flowing and strengthen your creatures at the same time! Artifact Sacrifice Fuel the fight by sacrificing artifacts. Powerstones rev your engines and can later be sacrificed for more power! Don't forget artifacts with unearth can be sacrificed twice! Mechanized Stompy Use Powerstones to deploy your biggest threats quickly. Back them up with power-boosting spells to dominate every fight! Artifacts Enter the Battlefield Assemble your crew of creatures that are enhanced when artifacts enter the battlefield, then use Powerstones, Soldier tokens, and unearthed creatures to power up your attacks. Scrappy Swarm Deploy your army early, but don't be afraid to fill the graveyard. Creatures with mana value three or less offer more than you might expect, alive or dead. Prowess Aggro Round up a squad of inventors and wizards that can utilize cheap artifacts, instants, and sorcery spells to press their advantage. Graveyard Counter In an endless war, your creatures that rely on a populated graveyard will be pleased as their power increases well into the late game. Unearth Aggro Start your aggression early, and the second wave that comes back with Unearth may just be the last you need. Powerstone Ramp Accumulate Powerstones to help build your defenses, and soon no one will stand a chance against your colossal army of colossuses.

Events/Event_Desc_Brawl_HQ_Alt.oracleText: Welcome to the Brawlers' Guild! Come to the guildhall and play as many games as you want until February 13, 2020 at 20:00 UTC.
Events/Event_Desc_Brawl_HQ_Alt.translation: 欢迎来到格斗公会！在 2020年2月13日20:00 UTC之前，来大厅尽情畅玩吧。

Events/Event_Desc_Brawl_Launch.oracleText: Dive into a Brawl! Build a deck around a legendary creature or planeswalker which serves as your commander, and fight your way to victory. The following cards are banned in Brawl: Sorcerous Spyglass Click here to learn more about Brawl.
Events/Event_Desc_Brawl_Launch.translation: 加入争锋！围绕一个传奇生物或鹏洛客构组一副指挥官风格的套牌，并为胜利而奋战。以下卡牌在争锋中被禁用： 巫视望远镜 点击此处了解有关 Brawl 的更多信息。

Events/Event_Desc_Brawlers_Guildhall.oracleText: Welcome to the Brawlers' Guild! Come to the guildhall and play as many games as you want until July 1, 2020 at 16:00 UTC. The following cards are banned in Brawl: Drannith Magistrate Oko, Thief of Crowns Lutri, the Spellchaser Winota, Joiner of Forces Golos, Tireless Pilgrim Sorcerous Spyglass
Events/Event_Desc_Brawlers_Guildhall.translation: 欢迎来到格斗公会！在 2020年7月1日16:00 UTC之前，来大厅尽情畅玩吧。 以下卡牌在争锋中被禁用： 卓尼斯官员 窃冠瓯柯 逐咒獭灵拉翠 聚力领袖薇诺塔 不倦朝圣械戈罗斯 巫视望远镜

Events/Event_Desc_Brawlers_Guildhall_Alt.oracleText: Welcome to the Brawlers' Guild! Come to the guildhall and play as many games as you want until May 21, 2020 at 19:00 UTC. The following cards are banned in Brawl: Lutri, the Spellchaser Oko, Thief of Crowns Golos, Tireless Pilgrim Sorcerous Spyglass
Events/Event_Desc_Brawlers_Guildhall_Alt.translation: 欢迎来到格斗公会！在 2020年5月21日19:00 UTC之前，来大厅尽情畅玩吧。 以下卡牌在争锋中被禁用： 逐咒獭灵拉翠 窃冠瓯柯 不倦朝圣械戈罗斯 巫视望远镜

Events/Event_Desc_Brewers_M19.oracleText: Bring your janky brew! In this event, you'll earn up to six "Brewer" cards selected by our designers from outside the current meta (sorry, Spikes!) that you can use to create your own fun decks for Quick Play. You'll earn more cards the more wins you get! Play until you reach three wins or three losses.
Events/Event_Desc_Brewers_M19.translation: 带上你的创新力作！我们的设计人员挑选了部分埋没于当前赛场趋势之外（求胜型牌手们，对不起了！）的「自创套牌」牌张。你能在这个赛事中赢取至多六张此类牌张，供你构筑娱乐套牌进行快速游戏。获胜场次越多，能赢得的牌数也就越多！持续游戏，直到取得三胜或三败为止。

Events/Event_Desc_CORE_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_CORE_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_Cascade_Constructed.oracleText:
Bring your Standard deck and play games, with a twist: The first spell you cast each turn will let you cast another spell from your deck without paying its mana cost! The following cards are banned in this event:

<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"> Deafening Silence
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"> Rule of Law
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"> Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"> Teferi, Time Raveler
Events/Event_Desc_Cascade_Constructed.translation:
在「倾曳构筑」中，当你每回合首度施放咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值比所施放之咒语低的非地咒语为止，然后你可以施放该牌且不需支付其法术力费用！以此法展示但未施放的牌会去到你的牌库底。

使用事先组好的60张套牌，充分利用此规则，享受游戏乐趣，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励。以下为本赛事的禁牌表：

<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW">震撼寂静
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW">依法治理
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU">俄佐立变节者拉温妮
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU">理时泰菲力

Events/Event_Desc_ChaosClash_Core.oracleText: When you play with chaos, you never know what you'll get! In this event, you'll be given a deck full of mystery cards from Magic: The Gathering Arena, and it's up to you to find the path to victory. Discover what tools you have to work with and the best ways to use them!
Events/Event_Desc_ChaosClash_Core.translation: 当你玩混沌时，你永远不知道你会得到什么！在本次活动中，你将获得一副装满万智牌竞技场的神秘卡片的套牌，由你自己寻找胜利之路。发现你有哪些工具可以使用，以及使用这些工具的最佳方法!

Events/Event_Desc_ChaosClash_Core_Alt.oracleText: When you play with chaos, you never know what you'll get! In this event, you'll be given a deck full of mystery cards from Magic: The Gathering Arena, and it's up to you to find the path to victory. Discover what tools you have to work with and the best ways to use them! The first time you play in this event, you can join without an entry fee!
Events/Event_Desc_ChaosClash_Core_Alt.translation: 当你玩混沌时，你永远不知道你会得到什么！在本次活动中，你将获得一副装满万智牌竞技场的神秘卡片的套牌，由你自己寻找胜利之路。发现你有哪些工具可以使用，以及使用这些工具的最佳方法! 第一次参加此赛事，你可以免费参加！

Events/Event_Desc_ChaosClash_Mastermind.oracleText: When you play with chaos, you never know what you'll get! In this event, you'll be given a deck full of mystery cards from Magic: The Gathering Arena, and it's up to you to find the path to victory. Discover what tools you have to work with and the best ways to use them! Instead of playing lands normally, use the Mastermind emblem to turn any card in your hand into a land that can provide any color of mana. What cards you keep and how you use them will determine the winner!
Events/Event_Desc_ChaosClash_Mastermind.translation: 当你玩混沌时，你永远不知道你会得到什么！在本次活动中，你将获得一副装满万智牌竞技场的神秘卡片的套牌，由你自己寻找胜利之路。发现你有哪些工具可以使用，以及使用这些工具的最佳方法! 与其正常地打出地，不如使用主脑徽记将你手中的任何牌变成地，可以提供任何颜色的法力。你保留什么牌以及你如何使用它们将决定胜负!

Events/Event_Desc_Comp_Constructed.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive gold and cards based on how many matches you win. Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Comp_Constructed.translation: 使用构筑套牌与对手进行三盘两胜的对局！最后根据胜局数量赢得金币和牌张。所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed.oracleText: Bring your deck and enjoy a quick game!
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌开始快速游戏！

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed _GRN.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play games! You'll receive gold and cards based on how many games you win. Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed _GRN.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行游戏！最后根据胜场数量赢得金币和牌张。所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_ConstructedBestOf3.oracleText: Standard uses cards only from recent sets. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding.
Events/Event_Desc_ConstructedBestOf3.translation: 标准模式只使用最近发售的几个系列的卡牌。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_AFR.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Adventures in the Forgotten Realms. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_AFR.translation: 使用仅用 被遗忘国度战记中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_CoreSet.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Core Set 2019, Core Set 2020 and Core Set 2021. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win. The following cards are banned: Nexus of Fate Veil of Summer Field of the Dead
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_CoreSet.translation: 使用仅用 2019核心系列，2020核心系列和2021核心系列中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。 以下卡牌被禁止使用： 龙命连结点 夏色帘幕 亡者旷野

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_DMU.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Dominaria United. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_DMU.translation: 使用仅用 多明纳里亚：众志成城中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Eldraine.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Throne of Eldraine. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Eldraine.translation: 使用仅用 艾卓王权中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Event.oracleText: Bring your Standard deck, play some games, and receive rewards based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Event.translation: 使用你事先组好的标准赛制套牌，不断进行对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_GRN.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play games! You'll receive gold and cards based on how many games you win. Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_GRN.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行游戏！最后根据胜场数量赢得金币和牌张。所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_HBG.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_HBG.translation: 使用仅用 炼金新篇：博德之门中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ikoria.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ikoria.translation: 使用仅用 依克黎：巨兽时空中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_KHM.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Kaldheim. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_KHM.translation: 使用仅用 凯德海姆中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_MID.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Midnight Hunt. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_MID.translation: 使用仅用 依尼翠：黯夜猎踪中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_NEO.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_NEO.translation: 使用仅用 神河：霓朝纪中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ravnica.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck of only cards from Guilds of Ravnica, Ravnica Allegiance, and War of the Spark and play games! You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win. Gates Ablaze is banned in this format.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ravnica.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌（仅限利用出自烽会拉尼卡、效忠拉尼卡和火花之战这三个系列的牌张）进行游戏！最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励。城门失火在此赛制中禁用。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ravnica_Al.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck of only cards from Guilds of Ravnica, Ravnica Allegiance, and War of the Spark and play games! You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ravnica_Al.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌（仅限利用出自烽会拉尼卡、效忠拉尼卡和火花之战这三个系列的牌张）进行游戏！最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ravnica_Al.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck of only cards from Guilds of Ravnica, Ravnica Allegiance, and War of the Spark and play games! You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win. Gatebreaker Ram is banned in this format.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Ravnica_Al.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌（仅限利用出自烽会拉尼卡、效忠拉尼卡和火花之战这三个系列的牌张）进行游戏！最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励。破门公羊在此赛制中禁用。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_SNC.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Streets of New Capenna. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_SNC.translation: 使用仅用 新卡佩纳：喧嚣黑街中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Strixhaven.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Strixhaven: School of Mages. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Strixhaven.translation: 使用仅用 斯翠海文：魔法学校中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Test.oracleText: This would normally be a description of your event.  Instead, you testers get to see this.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Test.translation: 这里通常会显示赛事说明。但各位测试者只能看到这段文字。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Theros.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Theros Beyond Death. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Theros.translation: 使用仅用 塞洛斯：冥途求生中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_VOW.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Innistrad: Crimson Vow. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_VOW.translation: 使用仅用 依尼翠：腥红婚誓中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Zendikar.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from Zendikar Rising. You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Constructed_Zendikar.translation: 使用仅用 赞迪卡再起中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。你将会根据获胜场数获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Crafters_Challenge.oracleText: In the Crafter's Challenge, you can build any Standard deck you can think of - whether you own the cards or not. Then, if you perform well, you can win the wildcards to craft the very deck you've been playing (or anything else) and use it wherever you wish!
Events/Event_Desc_Crafters_Challenge.translation: 在匠人挑战中，你可以构建任何你能想到的标准套牌——无论你是否拥有这些卡牌。然后，如果你表现出色，你可以赢取万用牌来制作你一直在玩的套牌（或其它卡牌），并在任何你想使用的地方使用它！

Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft.oracleText: This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players In this event you open and pass around packs like a typical Draft, only the card pool isn't bound to a single Magic set, but are drawn from the best of all the cards available in MTG Arena. To see the full list of cards in this format, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft.translation: 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。 真人轮抽 - 与其他7名玩家进行一场限时轮抽 在此赛事下，你像一般轮抽一样打开卡牌包选择然后传递包，只有卡池不再绑定到单个万智牌套牌，而是从 万智牌竞技场中所有可用卡牌中抽取的顶尖卡牌池。要查看此赛制的完整卡牌列表，请单击此处。

Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players In this event you open and pass around packs like a typical Draft, only the card pool isn't bound to a single Magic set, but are drawn from the best of all the cards available in MTG Arena. To see the full list of cards in this format, click here. Then play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft_ArenaTraditi.translation: 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。 真人轮抽 - 与其他7名玩家进行一场限时轮抽 在此赛事下，你像一般轮抽一样打开卡牌包选择然后传递包，只有卡池不再绑定到单个万智牌套牌，而是从 万智牌竞技场中所有可用卡牌中抽取的顶尖卡牌池。要查看此赛制的完整卡牌列表，请单击此处。 然后进行Bo3对战，你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft_Chromatic.oracleText: This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players In the Chromatic Cube, not only are the decks splashy, but the colors are too! Be prepared to draft cards that require more colors, more mana, and more deckbuilding prowess as you make epic big-mana plays! For more information, including the full list of cards in this format, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft_Chromatic.translation: 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。 真人轮抽 - 与其他7名玩家进行一场限时轮抽 在“五彩方盒”中，不仅套牌很丰富，而且颜色也很丰富！轮抽并构建需要更多颜色、更多法术力和更强套牌构建能力的套牌。准备好了吗？因为你要进行史诗般的大法力游戏! 获取更多信息，包括此赛制的完整卡牌列表，请点击此处。

This list of cards focuses on creature subtypes and combat. Assemble the right cards and lead your army to victory! To see the full list of cards in this format, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft_Tinkerers.oracleText:
This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Welcome to the Tinkerer's Cube, a toolbox full of cogs, widgets, and spanners. This collection of cards is stuffed with themes and subthemes, giving you tons of options to mix and match. Here, a deck is greater than the sum of its parts, and it's up to you to tinker your way to victory! So what will you build?

For more information, including the full list of cards in this format, click here.

Removal is less prevalent, as the main focus is on building the best contraption you can muster. Now get to work! To see the full list of cards in this format, click here. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_CubeDraft_TinkerersTra.translation: 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。 真人轮抽 - 与其他7名玩家进行一场限时轮抽 欢迎来到“修补匠方盒”，一个装满齿轮、零件和扳手的工具箱。这个卡牌集合充满了大量主题和子主题，为你提供大量混合搭配的选择。移除的情况较少，因为主要的重点是构建你能想到的最好的机巧神器。现在开始工作，要查看此赛制的完整卡牌列表，请点击here. 进行Bo3对战，你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_CubeSealed_Arena.oracleText: Want to play some limited that really packs a punch? The Cube Sealed experience grants you 6 packs like a typical Sealed event, only the card pool isn't bound to a single Magic set! Instead, they are drawn from the crème de la crème of all the cards available in MTG Arena. Cube has no concept of rarity, so you'll have plenty of exciting rares and mythics in your pool. The diversity of cards and the strategies and synergies make each run an exciting new experience every time! See a list of all the cards in the cube by clicking here. This event is phantom. Cards in your sealed pool are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_CubeSealed_Arena.translation: 想玩一些真正有冲击力的限制游戏吗？ 方盒现开体验像典型的现开活动一样，为你提供 6 包，只是卡池不再绑定到单个万智牌系列！取而代之的是，从 万智牌竞技场中所有可用卡牌中抽取的精华卡牌。 方盒没有稀有度的概念，所以你的池子里会有很多令人兴奋的稀有和秘稀。卡片的多样性以及策略和配合使每次游玩都成为令人兴奋的新体验！ 点击此处，查看方盒中全部卡牌列表。 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。

Events/Event_Desc_DAR_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Note: This set is not legal in Standard.
Events/Event_Desc_DAR_Premier_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 注意：此系列在标准赛制不可用。

Events/Event_Desc_DAR_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Note: This set is not legal in Standard.
Events/Event_Desc_DAR_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_DBL_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Get ready for a high-octane showdown with even more of your favorite monsters and mayhem! This special draft event features a special blend of cards from Innistrad: Midnight Hunt and Innistrad: Crimson Vow, including two rares in every pack. And to make sure everyone starts off on the right claw, each entry will earn you one of 17 Dracula card styles from Crimson Vow! Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_DBL_Premier_Draft.translation: 准备好与你最喜欢的怪物和混乱进行一场激烈的对决！这个特殊的轮抽赛事特别融合了来自依尼翠：黯夜猎踪和依尼翠：腥红婚誓系列的卡牌，包括每包中都有两张稀有牌。为了确保每个人都能从正确的爪子上开始，每个参赛者都能从依尼翠：腥红婚誓的17种德古拉卡牌样式中获得一种! 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_DMU_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Fliers Tempo Hold your ground with tokens and defensive instants and sorceries, all while attacking from the air. Control Develop a long-term advantage with card draw and creature removal spells, then go after your opponent directly in the late game. Reckless Aggro Throw caution to the wind and assault your opponent, clearing a path with creature removal spells or by simply trading your creatures for theirs. Domain Stompy Rule the board by attacking with the largest creatures on the battlefield, boosted by the domain mechanic. Domain Tokens Assemble a massive army of creatures and tokens, then dominate the mid-game with the domain mechanic. Creature Sacrifice Ruthlessly sacrifice your small creatures or tokens for profit, then bring creatures back from the graveyard to overwhelm your opponent. Spells Aggro Cast instant and sorcery spells to bolster aggressive creatures and clear a path to victory. Domain Midrange Get maximum value out of your cards with huge creatures, bringing cards back from the graveyard, and domain rewards. Tokens Aggro Go wide with an aggressive army of small creatures and tokens, punching through your opponent's defenses with spells and effects that boost your whole team. Kicker Ramp Build up your mana to get additional value from kicking your spells. Splash in some other colors to take advantage of powerful multicolor cards and the domain mechanic.
Events/Event_Desc_DMU_Premier_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 飞行节奏 用衍生物和防御性的瞬间和法术进行地面防御，同时从空中进行攻击。 控制 利用抓牌和生物移除咒语形成长期优势，然后在游戏后期直接追击你的对手。 无情快攻 将谨慎抛诸脑后，直接攻击你的对手，用生物移除咒语扫清道路，或者简单地用你的生物交换他们的生物。 领土风暴 通过使用战场上最大的生物进行攻击，在领土机制的推动下，统治棋盘。 领土衍生物 组建一支庞大的生物和衍生物大军，然后用领土机制主宰游戏中期。 生物牺牲 无情地牺牲你的小生物或衍生物以获得收益，然后将生物从坟墓场带回来压倒你的对手。 法术快攻释放瞬间和法术咒语来振励好斗异能生物，并扫清通往胜利的道路。 领土中速 使用巨大的生物让你的牌发挥最大价值，将牌从坟墓场中带回，并获得领土的加成效果。 衍生物快攻 使用由小生物和衍生物组成的侵略性大军，用可以提升整个团队的咒语和效应来突破对手的防御。 增幅暴费 使用增幅类咒语获得额外法术力建立优势，加上一些其它颜色卡牌以更好利用多色和领土优势。

Events/Event_Desc_DMU_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Reckless Aggro Throw caution to the wind and assault your opponent, clearing a path with creature removal spells or by simply trading your creatures for theirs. Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Cascade_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs, but with a twist: The first spell you cast each turn will first have you reveal cards from the top of your library until you find a nonland card with a lower converted mana cost. You can cast that card without paying its mana cost. Two spells for the price of one! You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Cascade_Draft.translation: 14张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。不过这次有些不一样：你每回合施放的第一个咒语会先从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值比它低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。付一得二！你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Comp_Draft.translation: 14张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。你所选择的牌张会加入你的收藏，且你会用你抽到的这些牌加上基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌参赛。不断进行三盘两胜的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Free_Spells_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs, but with a twist: Spells don't cost any mana! Keep the lands out of your deck, you don't need them. Your starting hand size is 3. You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! (Note that activated abilities and other mana payments function normally.)
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Free_Spells_Draft.translation: 14张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌，但这次有些不一样：咒语无需费用即可施放！套牌中不必加入地，你已不需要它们。你的起始手牌数量为3。你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！（请注意：起动式异能和其他需要支付法术力才能办到的事情仍会正常作用。）

Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Omniscience_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs, but with a twist: Spells don't cost any mana! Keep the lands out of your deck, you don't need them. Your starting hand size is 3.  You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! (Note that activated abilities and other mana payments function normally.)
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Omniscience_Draft.translation: 14张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌，但这次有些不一样：咒语无需费用即可施放！套牌中不必加入地，你已不需要它们。你的起始手牌数量为3。你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！（请注意：起动式异能和其他需要支付法术力才能办到的事情仍会正常作用。）
