Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Note: This set is not legal in Standard.
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Quick_Draft_Explor.oracleText: In Exploration, Magic's rules are changed: You can play two lands per turn, your starting hand size is nine, and you have no maximum hand size! Draft cards using 14-card draft packs and build a 40-card deck to battle others. You'll receive rewards based on how many wins you earn and you get to keep all the cards you choose!
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Quick_Draft_Explor.translation: 「探险」玩法的万智牌规则略有不同：你每回合可以使用两个地，你的起始手牌数量为九张，且没有手牌上限。用14张牌的轮抽用补充包进行轮抽，精心挑选牌张，构筑一副40张的套牌与其他牌手对战。最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励，而且所抽选的牌都归你所有！

Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Treasure_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs, but with a twist: At the beginning of each of your turns, you'll get a Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color. Accelerate by one mana each turn, or save them up to cast an expensive spell in half the time! You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_DOM_Treasure_Draft.translation: 14张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。不过这次有些不一样：在你的每个回合开始时，你会获得一个珍宝衍生物，牺牲它可以产生一点任意颜色的法术力。你可以每回合都用它来加速一点法术力，也可以把它们都留起来提前施放大型咒语！你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon10_3Sets.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 10 is On the Edge: Bring a 60-card deck using only cards from Streets of New Capenna, Dominaria United, and The Brothers' War. If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon10_3Sets.translation: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon10_TurboDraft.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 10 is Turbo Draft: Sit down with seven bots and pick one card at a time from rotating draft packs of Strixhaven: School of Mages. Build a 40-card deck to take on other drafters, but every spell you cast will cost 5 generic mana less! If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon10_TurboDraft.translation: 欢迎来到竞技场十项全能！快来在各种赛制中测试你的能力，同时还能获得MTGA的至高荣耀！ 赛事10-疾速轮抽: 与其他七名机器人坐下来，从 斯翠海文：魔法学校 的轮抽包中一次选择一张牌。构建一副40张的套牌来对付其他轮抽者，但你施放的每个咒语都将减少5点通用法术力成本！如果你达到最大胜场，你将获得这个赛事的门票。从不同赛事中收集三份（或更多！）门票，即可获得参加十项全能决赛的资格！获取更多信息，请点击这里。 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon1_Alchemy.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 1 is Alchemy: Bring a 60-card deck and battle in Arena's newest constructed format. If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon1_Alchemy.translation: 欢迎来到竞技场十项全能！快来在各种赛制中测试你的能力，同时还能获得MTGA的至高荣耀！ 赛事1-炼金: 构筑一副60张的套牌，然后在竞技场最新的构筑赛制中鏖战。如果你达到最大胜场，你将获得这个赛事的门票。从不同赛事中收集三份（或更多！）门票，即可获得参加十项全能决赛的资格！获取更多信息，请点击这里。

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon1_JumpIn.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 1 is Jump In!: Choose two packets with their own themes and combine them into a deck! If you can jump all the way to maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here. This event is phantom. Cards in your deck are not added to your collection.

Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon2_Sealed.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 2 is Sealed: Build a 40-card deck from three packs each of Innistrad: Midnight Hunt and Innistrad: Crimson Vow, then play games against your fellow competitors. If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon2_Sealed.translation: 欢迎来到竞技场十项全能！快来在各种赛制中测试你的能力，同时还能获得MTGA的至高荣耀！ 赛事2-现开: 以依尼翠：黯夜猎踪和依尼翠：腥红婚誓系列各三包卡牌包中构建40张的套牌，然后与你的竞争对手进行游戏。如果你达到最大胜场，你将获得这个赛事的门票。从不同赛事中收集三份（或更多！）门票，即可获得参加十项全能决赛的资格！获取更多信息，请点击这里。 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon3_Sealed.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 3 is Mixed Dominarian Sealed: Build a 40-card deck from two packs each of Dominaria, Dominaria United and The Brothers' War, then play games against your fellow competitors. If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here. This event is phantom. Cards in your pool are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon3_Sealed.translation: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon3_TradDraft.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 3 is Traditional Draft: Sit down with seven other players and pick one card at a time from rotating draft packs of Innistrad: Crimson Vow. Build a 40-card deck to take on other drafters in best-of-three matches. If you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon3_TradDraft.translation: 欢迎来到竞技场十项全能！快来在各种赛制中测试你的能力，同时还能获得MTGA的至高荣耀！ 赛事3-三盘轮抽: 与其他七名玩家坐下来，从轮转的依尼翠：腥红婚誓系列的轮抽用补充包中一次选择一张牌。构筑一副40张的套牌与其他玩家进行三盘两胜制的对局。如果你达到最大胜场，你将获得这个赛事的门票。从不同赛事中收集三份（或更多！）门票，即可获得参加十项全能决赛的资格！获取更多信息，请点击这里。 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。

Events/Event_Desc_Decathlon4_EmblemStand.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon! Come test your abilities in a variety of game modes for a chance at MTG Arena glory! Event 4 is Emblem Standard: Bring a 60-card deck for the premier tabletop format, and we'll bring a few tokens to get you started. Make the most of them, and if you reach maximum wins, you will earn this event's special token. Collect three tokens (or more!) from different events, and you can qualify for the Decathlon Finals! For full details, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_DecathlonFinals.oracleText: Welcome to the Arena Decathlon Finals! Congratulations on your mastery of many MTG Arena game modes. Now it's time to put that mastery to the ultimate test! The game mode for the Finals is Traditional Duplicate Sealed: Everyone has the same pool of powerful cards to build from. Choose your 40-card deck to take on other finalists in best-of-three matches. Depending on how many preliminary event tokens you collected, you can enter the Finals up to twice. If you can carry any of your entries all the way to maximum wins, you will win one copy of each card from the upcoming set, Phyrexia: All Will Be One, for its release! This event is phantom. Cards in your pool are not added to your collection. For full details, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Draft10Life_ELD.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs, but with a twist: You and your opponent will start the game at 10 life!
Events/Event_Desc_Draft10Life_ELD.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，但有一点不同：你和你的对手将以10点生命开始游戏！

Events/Event_Desc_DraftChallenge_AFR.oracleText: Prove yourself in a high-stakes Draft Challenge! Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_DraftChallenge_AFR.translation: 在高风险的轮抽挑战中证明自己！轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行三盘两胜制的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_Draft_Test.oracleText: This would normally be a description of your event.  Instead, you testers get to see this.
Events/Event_Desc_Draft_Test.translation: 这里通常会显示赛事说明。但各位测试者只能看到这段文字。

Events/Event_Desc_DragonsDungeons_HBG.oracleText: Look, I'm not trying to overstep, but isn't this getting a little out of hand? Dragons overhead, adventurers breaking down the front door... how is an honest, hard-working dungeon master supposed to get anything done? My HOA* fees aren't getting any cheaper! *Hoard of Artifacts In this Historic Singleton All Access event, be the bane of DMs everywhere: dragons with 5+ mana value are cheaper, and every second spell will venture you further into the dungeon. You can use cards that aren't in your collection, so let your creativity run wild! As you plunder, you'll receive Rulebook card styles of Legendary Creatures from Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate. There are 16 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_DragonsDungeons_HBG.translation: 听着，我不是想越俎代庖，但这是不是有点失控了？龙在头顶上，冒险者砸开前门......一个诚实的、努力工作的地牢主人怎么可能完成任何事情？我的物业费并没有变得更便宜! 神器囤积 在这个史迹无双全卡赛事中，成为无处不在的DM祸根：法力值超过 5 的龙更便宜，而每一次施法都会让你在地牢里走得更远。你可以使用你收藏中没有的卡牌，尽情发挥你的创造力吧！当你掠夺时，你会收到来自炼金新篇：博德之门 的传奇生物的规则书卡牌样式。有16种款式可供收藏！ 关于此赛制的更多细节，包括完整的卡牌样式列表，请点击这里。

Events/Event_Desc_DualColorPrecons.oracleText:
Welcome to Starter Deck Duel, a Preconstructed event where you choose one of 10 two-color Starter Decks to battle other players!

If you win with your chosen deck, it will be added to your collection to play in places like Spark Rank.

This event has no entry fee, so try out as many decks as you like until you find the two colors that speak to you. Then you can upgrade it and make it yours for the battles to come! Win three games to continue mastering your spark!
Events/Event_Desc_DualColorPrecons.translation:
Welcome to Starter Deck Duel, a Preconstructed event where you choose one of 10 two-color Starter Decks to battle other players!

If you win with your chosen deck, it will be added to your collection to play in places like Spark Rank.

This event has no entry fee, so try out as many decks as you like until you find the two colors that speak to you. Then you can upgrade it and make it yours for the battles to come! Win three games to continue mastering your spark!

Events/Event_Desc_ELD_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_ELD_Comp_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！

Events/Event_Desc_ELD_Premier_Draft.oracleText: This set is only legal in Historic and Explorer. Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_ELD_Premier_Draft.translation: This set is only legal in Historic and Explorer. Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. Events/Event_Desc_ELD_Quick_Draft.oracleText:
Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_ELD_Quick_Draft.translation:
每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Draft.oracleText: This event is used to facilitate podded drafting in Esports events.
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Draft.translation: 此活动用于促进电竞赛事中的真人轮抽。

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_MIQ.oracleText: Congratulations on qualifying for the Mythic Invitational Qualifier! Complete rules, prize description, schedule, and eligibility qualifications can be found here. Good luck!
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_MIQ.translation: 恭喜你获得传奇邀请赛资格赛的资格！ 完整的规则、奖品说明、时间表和资格审查可在此处找到。祝你好运！

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_MPC.oracleText: Congratulations on qualifying for the Mythic Point Challenge! Complete rules, prize description, schedule, and eligibility qualifications can be found here.
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_MPC.translation: 恭喜你获得秘稀分数挑战的资格！ 完整的规则、奖品说明、时间表和资格审查可在此处找到。祝你好运！

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier.oracleText: Congratulations on qualifying for the Mythic Championship Qualifier! Complete rules, prize description, schedule, and eligibility qualifications can be found here. Good luck!
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier.translation: 恭喜你获得传奇冠军赛预赛的资格！ 完整的规则、奖品说明、时间表和资格审查可在此处找到。祝你好运！

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day1.oracleText: Congratulations on earning your way to Qualifier Weekend! Sign up for this Day 1 event and get all 7 wins to qualify for Day 2! You may join each day only once. Players can only join Day 1 and (if qualified) Day 2 events between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day1.translation: 恭喜你获得参加资格赛周末的机会！报名参加第1天的赛事并获得全部7场胜利，即可获得第 2 天的参赛资格！你每天只能参加一次。 玩家只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加第 1 天和第 2 天的活动（如果有资格）。 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止的地方无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day1.oracleText: Players can only join Day 1 and (if qualified) Day 2 events between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT (1300 - 1500 UTC).
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day1.translation: 玩家只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加第 1 天和第 2 天的活动（如果有资格）。(1300 UTC - 1500 UTC)

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day1.oracleText: Players can only join Day 1 and (if qualified) Day 2 events between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT (1400 - 1600 UTC).
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day1.translation: 玩家只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加第 1 天和第 2 天的活动（如果有资格）。(1400 UTC - 1600 UTC)

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day2.oracleText: Congratulations on making Day 2! You may join only once. To play Day 2, you MUST join between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day2.translation: 祝贺你进入第2天的赛事！你每天只能参加一次。 第2天的赛事，只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加。 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止的地方无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day2.oracleText:
Congratulations on making Day 2! You may join only once.

To play Day 2, you MUST join between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT (1300 UTC - 1500 UTC).

For more information on the format and complete rules, <link=http://magic.wizards.com/mtga-qualifier-weekend><u>click here</u></link>.
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day2.translation:
祝贺你进入第2天的赛事！你每天只能参加一次。

第2天的赛事，只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加 (1300 UTC - 1500 UTC)。

有关赛制和完整规则的更多信息，请点击<link=http://magic.wizards.com/mtga-qualifier-weekend><u>此处</u></link>。

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day2.oracleText: To play Day 2, you MUST join between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT (1400 UTC - 1600 UTC).
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Qualifier_Day2.translation: 第2天的赛事，只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加 (1400 UTC - 1600 UTC)。

Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Standard.oracleText: This event is used to facilitate Standard in Esports events.
Events/Event_Desc_Esports_Standard.translation: This event is used to facilitate Standard in Esports events.

Events/Event_Desc_EternalNightMID.oracleText: The turn of the season draws near, and darkness falls across the land. Out there, in the impenetrable shadows, strange and terrible things are stirring. Lurking. Hunting. Keep your wits about you, or else risk becoming lost in the night. If you can survive the hungry wolves and grisly ghouls, you may yet see another sunrise... Bring a 60-card Singleton deck that's not afraid of the dark: each time night falls, you will lose 1 life and draw a card. At the end of your run, you'll bring Eternal Night card styles from Innistrad: Midnight Hunt back from out of the darkness. There are 14 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available to find out in the darkness, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_EternalNightMID.translation: 季节之交临近，黑暗笼罩大地。在那里，在密不透风的阴影中，奇怪而可怕的东西正在蠢蠢欲动，潜伏，狩猎。保持你的智慧，否则就有可能在黑夜中迷失。如果你能在饥饿的狼和可怕的食尸鬼面前幸存下来，你就可以看到明天的太阳...... 带上60张不怕黑的无双套牌：每次黑夜降临，你会失去1条生命并抽一张牌。当你狂奔结束时，你将把来自依尼翠：黯夜猎踪的永夜卡牌样式带回来。有14种款式可供收藏！ 关于此赛制的更多细节，包括完整的卡牌样式列表，请点击这里。

Events/Event_Desc_Exploration_Draft.oracleText: In Exploration draft, Magic's rules are changed: You can play two lands per turn, your starting hand size is nine, and you have no maximum hand size!
Events/Event_Desc_Exploration_Draft.translation: 在探险轮抽中，万智牌的规则发生了变化：你每回合可以使用两张地，你的起始手牌为9张，并且你没有手牌上限！

Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Challenge.oracleText: Bring your Explorer deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive rewards based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Challenge.translation: 使用你事先组好的探险赛制套牌，不断进行三局两胜对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Event.oracleText: Bring your Explorer deck, play some games, and receive rewards based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Event.translation: 使用你事先组好的探险赛制套牌，不断进行对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Ladder.oracleText: Explorer uses cards from Standard sets dating back to October 2012. Results will affect your Constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Ladder.translation: 探险赛制使用2012年10月以来进入过标准模式的卡牌。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Play.oracleText: Play with an expanded set of cards in this true-to-paper format!
Events/Event_Desc_Explorer_Play.translation: 在这个和实体卡一样真实的赛制里玩更多的卡片！

Events/Event_Desc_ExtraLife_2019.oracleText:
Extra Life 2019: Play Games. Heal Kids.

Purchase special sleeves in the MTG Arena store, and proceeds** will be donated to Seattle Children's Hospital! On November 2, tune in to <u><link=https://twitch.tv/magic>twitch.tv/magic</link> </u> for special guests and epic games.

To help celebrate, this event gives an extra life to both players (start at 21) and creatures (+0/+1). 

**Charity Item: Net proceeds donated to Extra Life benefiting Seattle Children's Hospital; purchase price less transaction fees.
Events/Event_Desc_ExtraLife_2019.translation:
额外生命2019：玩游戏，救孩子。

在商店购买特殊牌套，所得收益**将捐赠给西雅图儿童医院！ 11 月 2 日，请收看 <u><link=https://twitch.tv/magic>twitch.tv/magic</link> </u> 观看特邀嘉宾和史诗般的游戏。

为了庆祝，这个活动为玩家（从21点开始）和生物（+0/+1）提供了额外的生命。

**慈善项目：捐赠给额外生命的净收益，将使西雅图儿童医院受益；购买价格减去交易费用。

Events/Event_Desc_ExtraLife_Historic_Bra.oracleText:
Extra Life 2023 Treasure Brawl is an event to help raise awareness of our partnership with Extra Life, who we work with yearly to help raise money for Children's Miracle Network Hospitals.

In this Historic Brawl event, you'll use Preconstructed Decks focusing on gaining extra life, and players will start with an extra life. Not only that, but each player will also create a treasure token during their upkeep! This mirrors the true treasure that is the support you all have given this partnership throughout the past 10 years.

You'll even be using a special avatar and sleeves that you can pick up in the Store right now, with all net proceeds benefitting Seattle Children's Hospital!

You can continue to help the Children's Miracle Network by donating and learning about how to get more involved <u><link=https://www.extra-life.org/index.cfm?fuseaction=donorDrive.participant&participantID=508899>HERE</link></u>. Another way to assist and score some sweet merch is by checking out the Magic: The Gathering Extra Life Store <u><link=https://extralifeshop.com>HERE</link></u>.

Thank you again for all your help across the years, and we hope to support Seattle Children's Hospital even more in 2023. So join the event, play some games, and help heal kids through Extra Life!
Events/Event_Desc_ExtraLife_Historic_Bra.translation:
额外生命 2023 珍宝争锋是一项旨在帮助提高我们与 Extra Life 合作伙伴关系的活动，我们每年都会与额外生命合作，帮助为儿童奇迹网络医院筹集资金。

在这个史迹争锋活动中，你将使用专注于获得额外生命的预组套牌，并且牌手将从额外生命开始。 不仅如此，每个牌手在维持阶段中还会生成一个珍宝衍生物！ 这反映了真正的财富，那就是你们所有人在过去10年里给予这一合作伙伴的支持。

你甚至可以使用特殊的头像和牌套，你可以立即在商店中购买，所有净收益都将捐献给西雅图儿童医院！

您可以通过捐赠和了解如何更多地参与来继续帮助儿童奇迹网络<u><link=https://www.extra-life.org/index.cfm?fuseaction=donorDrive.participant&participantID=508899>此处 </link></u>。 另一种帮助并获得一些甜蜜商品的方法是访问 Magic: The Gathering Extra Life 商店<u><link=https://extralifeshop.com>此处</link></u>。

再次感谢您多年来的所有帮助，我们希望在2023年为西雅图儿童医院提供更多支持。所以，参加活动，玩一些游戏，通过 Extra Life 帮助治愈孩子们！

Events/Event_Desc_Extra_Life_Momir.oracleText: Wizards of the Coast is donating $25,000 to Extra Life to support healing local kids. We're also raising money through a charity stream this weekend from 8am Pacific Time on October 19 to 11:59pm Pacific Time on October 20. Tune in and consider joining us in donating to this worthy cause if you are able. To celebrate, we're running this special event for the weekend! Each turn, click on Momir on the left side of your battlefield, pay X mana, and discard a card to create a random token copy of a creature from all of MTG Arena with converted mana cost X. No deck required, we'll provide deck of 12 copies each of the five basic lands. And since this is in support of Extra Life, players will begin with 21 life.
Events/Event_Desc_Extra_Life_Momir.translation: 威世智将向「Extra Life」捐赠25000美元，为当地儿童医疗事业尽一份绵薄之力。在本周末，即太平洋时间10月19日上午8时到10月20日下午11时59分期间，我们还将举办慈善直播活动募集善款。敬请准时关注，如果您行有余力，也可以考虑一同为这一崇高事业献上心意。为纪念这一筹款活动，我们将在本周末举办这一特殊赛事！在每个回合中，你都可以点击位于战场左侧的莫秘维，支付X点法术力并弃一张牌，游戏便会从万智牌竞技场所有法术力值为X的生物当中随机挑选一个，为你派出该生物之复制品衍生物。无需事先构筑套牌，游戏会为牌手备好一副每种基本地各12张的套牌。由于这是为支持「Extra Life」而举办的特殊活动，所有牌手的起始生命值都是21点。

Events/Event_Desc_FIAB_ChaosSealed_Bo1.oracleText: The prizes for this event are only available to players in the United States. Sign up for this event and get all 6 wins to win a Physical Festival in a Box: Las Vegas 2023 delivered to you. The format for this event is 9 packs of Chaos Sealed with single-game matches. You'll receive 9 packs: 1x Dominaria United Draft 1x The Brothers' War Draft 1x Streets of New Capenna Draft 1x Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Draft 1x Wilds of Eldraine Draft 1x March of the Machine Draft 1x Phyrexia: All Will Be One Draft 1x Innistrad: Crimson Vow Draft 1x Innistrad: Midnight Hunt Draft The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-one-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Receiving physical rewards requires creating or having existing Wizards, DCI, and i-Payout accounts. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_FIAB_ChaosSealed_Bo1.translation: The prizes for this event are only available to players in the United States. Sign up for this event and get all 6 wins to win a Physical Festival in a Box: Las Vegas 2023 delivered to you. The format for this event is 9 packs of Chaos Sealed with single-game matches. You'll receive 9 packs: 1x Dominaria United Draft 1x The Brothers' War Draft 1x Streets of New Capenna Draft 1x Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty Draft 1x Wilds of Eldraine Draft 1x March of the Machine Draft 1x Phyrexia: All Will Be One Draft 1x Innistrad: Crimson Vow Draft 1x Innistrad: Midnight Hunt Draft The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-one-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Receiving physical rewards requires creating or having existing Wizards, DCI, and i-Payout accounts. See here for full details.

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_100C_HistoricBrawl.oracleText: Connect with your local game store and keep yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) at home on MTG Arena! Today's event is Historic Brawl: Bring a 100-card Brawl deck using any cards in MTG Arena, led by your favorite legendary creature or planeswalker! You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards here. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_100C_HistoricBrawl.translation: 通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！ 本周赛事是史迹争锋：构筑一副100张的争锋套牌，MTGA任何可用的牌都可以。由你最喜欢的传奇生物或鹏洛客带领！ 当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击这里。 *注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_100Standard.oracleText: Connect with your local game store while keeping yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) on MTG Arena! Today's event is Super Standard: Standard is always a big deal, but this is extra big! Bring a 100-card Standard deck! You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards here. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_100Standard.translation: 通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！ 本周赛事是超级标准：标准总是一个大问题，但这是额外大的问题。带上 100 张卡的标准套牌！ 当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击这里。 *注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Artisan.oracleText:
Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena!

Today's event is Artisan: Bring a 60-card Standard deck, but using only commons, uncommons, and basic lands. Without rares, the common folk can truly be heard!

You can receive a code for a Midweek Magic Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/midweek-magic?utm_medium=product&utm_source=arena>HERE</link></u>.

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Artisan.translation:

Build a 60-card Brawl deck with your Standard cards, then battle others.

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>HERE</link></u>.

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.

This week: Cascade. Bring your 60-card Standard deck. The first time you cast a spell each turn, you'll get to cast another card without paying its mana cost from your library with a lower mana value.

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>HERE</link></u>.

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_ChallengerDecks.oracleText:
Connect with your local game store and keep yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) at home on MTG Arena!

Today's event is the 2021 Challenger Decks! Choose from among some of Standard's powerful strategies and seize victory!

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>here</link></u>.

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_ChallengerDecks.translation:
通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！

今天的赛事是2021年挑战者套牌! 从一些标准的强大策略中进行选择，抓住胜利的机会!

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

*注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Future.oracleText:
Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena!

This week's format is Standard 2022: Bring a 60-card using only cards from the last year of Standard! Out with the old and in with the new!

You can receive a code for a Midweek Magic Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/midweek-magic?utm_medium=product&utm_source=arena>HERE</link></u>.

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_HistoricArtisan.oracleText: Connect with your local game store and keep yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) at home on MTG Arena! Today's event is Historic Artisan: Bring a 60-card deck using only commons, uncommons, and basic lands from any set in MTG Arena. Without rares, the common folk can truly be heard! You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards here. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_KHM_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Connect with your local game store while keeping yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) on MTG Arena! This week: Draft Kaldheim! Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs with bots, no waiting, and no pick timers. Add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, and play against other players. You can play as many games as you want with your deck, but you can only draft once. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how HERE. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.

You can play as many games as you want with your deck，but you can only draft once. 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。 You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Mastermind.oracleText:
Connect with your local game store while keeping yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) on MTG Arena!

This week: We'll provide a deck for you to play... but it has no lands in it. Instead, discard a card in exchange for a land token that will make any color of mana. Get creative and get wins!

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>HERE</link></u>.

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_MrBeast.oracleText: Compete with MrBeast! MrBeast plays FNM at Home! For one hour only, MrBeast will log in to MTG Arena to challenge two players... and you could get the call! Log in to MTG Arena on April 23 at 11am PT and you could be one of two lucky players to battle it out with MrBeast and have an opportunity to win $25,000 USD! This week, MTG Arena's two-color introductory decks! Change decks as often as you like. Receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. *No Purchase Necessary. Begins at 11 AM PT and ends at 12 PM PT on 4/23/21. 18+ or age of majority only. Open only to legal res of 50 US/DC, Canada (excl. QC), Japan, The UK, Germany, France, Netherlands, Sweden, Austria, and Portugal. See here for full details.

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_NoLimits.oracleText: Connect with your local game store and keep yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) at home on MTG Arena! In today's event, the only rule is that there are no rules! Bring a deck of at least 40 cards from all of MTG Arena, and we do mean all. No bans, no restriction on number of copies, no need to have the cards in your collection. Hold on to your sparks - it's about to get wild. You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards here. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_NoLimits.translation: 通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！ 本周赛事：在今天的活动中，唯一的规则就是没有规则！从所有MGTA卡牌中带上至少40张牌，我们的意思是全部。没有禁牌，没有卡牌张数限制，你也无需在你的收藏中先拥有卡片。抓住你的火花 - 它即将变得狂野。 当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击这里。 *注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>here</link></u>.

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_OmniscienceAlt.oracleText:
Connect with your local game store and keep yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) at home on MTG Arena!

Today's event is Omniscience: Not only will we provide the deck, but we'll also let every card be cast for free! You'll only start with three cards, but without needing mana, anything is possible. As an extra twist, both players will be restricted to only one spell each turn and only 10 life.

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>here</link></u>.

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_OmniscienceAlt.translation:
通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！

本周赛事是全知全能：我们不仅会提供套牌，还会免费施放每张牌！你只能从三张牌开始，但不需要法术力，一切皆有可能。“但是”，作为额外的转折语气提醒，两名玩家每回合只能使用一个咒语，并且开始时只有10点生命。

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

*注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Pauper.oracleText: Connect with your local game store and keep yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) at home on MTG Arena! Today's event is Pauper: Bring a 60-card Historic deck that contains only commons and basic lands. Look for some common ground with all those cards you've drafted and build something new! You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards here. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Pauper.translation: 通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！ 本周赛事是全铁：构筑一副60张的史迹套牌，只可使用普通牌和基本地。寻找你抓取到的所有卡牌的共同点，并构建新的东西！ 当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击这里。 *注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_PlayAnyDeck.oracleText:
Connect with your local game store while keeping yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) on MTG Arena!

This week: Build a deck with ANY card in Standard, whether it's in your collection or not. Challenge other players. Build more decks. Challenge more players. Rinse, repeat.

You can receive a code for a unique card sleeve when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>HERE</link></u>

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.
Events/Event_Desc_FNM_PlayAnyDeck.translation:
通过MTGA线上玩星期五晚上魔术(FNM)，与你当地的游戏商店保持联系，同时确保自己和他人的安全！

本周赛事：用任何标准卡牌构建套牌，无论它是否在你的收藏中。挑战其他玩家……构建更多的套牌……挑战更多玩家……喝水……憋尿……重复……

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

*注：送完为止。并非所有商店都参与。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_Singleton.oracleText:
Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena!

Today's event is Singleton: Bring a 60-card Standard deck with no duplicates besides basic lands! Every game is a unique experience!

You can receive a code for a Midweek Magic Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/midweek-magic?utm_medium=product&utm_source=arena>HERE</link></u>.

*Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.

Today's event is Standard: Bring a 60-card Standard deck, battle against the competition, and claim victory in the premier constructed format!

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how, as well as a list of banned cards <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>here</link></u>.

本日赛事是标准：构筑一副60张的标准套牌，与竞争者交锋，并在首要的构筑赛制中取得胜利！

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_FNM_StandardShakeup.oracleText:
Connect with your local game store while keeping yourself and others safe by playing Friday Night Magic (FNM) on MTG Arena!


This week: We'e shaking up Standard with some extra bans. Build a 60-card deck, then battle others. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-home-details>here</link></u>.

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>HERE</link></u>.

Today's event is Standard All Access: While you'll still bring a Standard deck, you won't need the cards! Try out that new deck you've had your eye on, or create something new!

This week: Bring a Standard Singleton deck, and get ready for presents: you'll receive a Treasure token every turn! For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-home-details>here</link></u>.

You can receive a code for an Arena FNM Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>HERE</link></u>.

本周赛事：带上标准单张套牌，准备好迎接礼物：每回合你都会收到一个珍宝衍生物！有关此赛制的更多详细信息，包括禁牌表，请单击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-home-details>这里</link></u>

当你与当地游戏商店分享你的结果时，你会收到包含两个装饰品的竞技场FNM推广包的代码。了解更多使用信息，点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-fnm-play-home-1>这里</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Cascade.oracleText: Bring your Standard deck and play games, with a twist: The first spell you cast each turn will let you cast another spell from your deck without paying its mana cost! The following cards are banned in this event: Deafening Silence Rule of Law Fae of Wishes Flaxen Intruder Lavinia, Azorius Renegade Teferi, Time Raveler Field of the Dead Lucky Clover _________________________________________________ Even Faerie parties must come to an end, but not before going out with a bang. A magical cacophony fills the Wilds as festivalgoers launch spells like fireworks into the night sky, summoning all manner of mayhem. Join in if you dare!
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Cascade.translation: 带上你的标准套牌并玩游戏，但有一点不同：你每回合施放的第一个咒语，可以让你无需支付法术力费用从套牌中施放另一个咒语！本次赛事禁止以下卡牌： 震撼寂静 依法治理 趁愿仙儿 金发入侵者 俄佐立变节者拉温妮 理时泰菲力 亡者旷野 幸运苜蓿 _________________________________________________ 即使是仙灵派对也必须结束，但不是在轰轰烈烈地出去之前。当节日的观众向夜空发射像烟花一样的咒语时，一种神奇的嘈杂声充满了荒野，引发了各种各样的混乱。有胆就加入吧！

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_OkosMadnes.oracleText: Both players start with a deck of basic lands. Click the emblem on the left side of the battlefield, pay one mana, and discard a card to get a creature token, but that trickster, Oko, is... turning everyone into Elks? Huh? _________________________________________________ The master of ceremonies has arrived! Now let go the shackles of your courtly Realm and embrace the chaos of the Wilds! The very land shifts under your feet and impossible creatures appear out of thin air to join the fray. You're not dreaming. It's just getting weird.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_OkosMadnes.translation: 两位牌手都从一副基本地牌开始。点击战场左侧的徽记，支付一点法术力，弃掉一张牌，得到一个衍生生物，但那个骗子瓯柯，正在……把所有人都变成麋鹿？嗯？ _________________________________________________ 典礼司仪来了！现在放开你宫廷领域的枷锁，拥抱荒野的混乱！土地在你的脚下移动，不可能的生物凭空出现加入战斗。你不是在做梦，只是变得很奇怪。

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Showcase.oracleText: Play like a pro! Use top decks from Mythic Championship V in single-game matches. Swap decks as often as you like as each deck is available for your use in this event. _________________________________________________ Hidden deep in the Wilds, the Festival of the Fae kicks off with combat! Heroes travel from far and wide to compete for the Fae folk's amusement. Now choose your champion. If things don't work out, go ahead and choose another. And another. These are Faerie rules, after all.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Showcase.translation: 像职业选手一样游戏! 在单场比赛中使用第五届传奇冠军赛的顶级套牌。你可以随心所欲地更换套牌，因为每个套牌都可以在这个赛事中使用。 _________________________________________________ 隐藏在荒野深处，仙灵节以战斗拉开帷幕！英雄们从四面八方赶来争夺法伊族人的乐趣。现在选择你的冠军。如果事情不成功，请继续选择另一个，还有一个。毕竟，这些是仙灵的规则。

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Std_Artisa.oracleText: Bring a Standard deck consisting only of commons and uncommons! The following cards are banned in this event: Persistent Petitioners Cauldron Familiar Cavalcade of Calamity Gates Ablaze _________________________________________________ Hidden deep in the Wilds, the Festival of the Fae kicks off with a welcome fete of magical wares. A bustling plaza stretches as far as the eye can see. What's for sale? Mostly junk, of course. But sprinkled among the clutter real treasures await...if you're willing to look.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Std_Artisa.translation: 组一套只含有普通和非凡牌的标准套牌！以下为本赛事的禁牌表： 执着诉愿人 鼎镬佣兽 灾祸行进 城门失火 _________________________________________________ 隐藏在荒野深处，仙灵节以一场欢迎魔法商品的庆典拉开序幕。一个熙熙攘攘的广场一直延伸到视线所及的地方。有什么可卖的？当然，大部分是垃圾。但在这些杂乱无章的东西中，真正的宝物在等待着......如果你愿意看的话。

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Std_Artisa.oracleText:
Bring a Standard deck consisting only of commons and uncommons! Cavalcade of Calamity and Persistent Petitioners are banned in this format.

<color=#BFBFBFc0>_________________________________________________</color>

The Festival comes to an end, but don't forget your souvenirs! A dizzying marketplace stretches as far as the eye can see. What's for sale? Mostly junk, of course. But sprinkled among the clutter real treasures await...if you're willing to look.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalFae_Std_Artisa.translation: 组一套只含有普通和非凡牌的标准套牌！以下为本赛事的禁牌表： 执着诉愿人 灾祸行进 _________________________________________________ 隐藏在荒野深处，仙灵节以一场欢迎魔法商品的庆典拉开序幕。一个熙熙攘攘的广场一直延伸到视线所及的地方。有什么可卖的？当然，大部分是垃圾。但在这些杂乱无章的东西中，真正的宝物在等待着......如果你愿意看的话。

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_Artisan.oracleText: Honor the God of the Forge in this week's Festival of the Gods event by fashioning an Artisan-style Standard deck consisting only of common and uncommon cards. Make Purphoros proud by raining fire and fury upon the unbelievers! The following cards are banned: Persistent Petitioners Cauldron Familiar Cavalcade of Calamity Gates Ablaze <#ff1d1d>Purphoros's areas of influence include the forge, the restless earth, fire, artisans, obsession, and the cycle of creation and destruction. With his mighty hammer, he can melt the earth with a strike and create life from the sparks themselves.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_Artisan.translation: Honor the God of the Forge in this week's Festival of the Gods event by fashioning an Artisan-style Standard deck consisting only of common and uncommon cards. Make Purphoros proud by raining fire and fury upon the unbelievers! The following cards are banned: Persistent Petitioners Cauldron Familiar Cavalcade of Calamity Gates Ablaze <#ff1d1d>Purphoros's areas of influence include the forge, the restless earth, fire, artisans, obsession, and the cycle of creation and destruction. With his mighty hammer, he can melt the earth with a strike and create life from the sparks themselves.

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_GiantMons.oracleText: Leave your temples behind and join the hunt with the God Nylea in this week's Festival of the Gods event. Harness the power of nature by drawing a card every time you play a creature card with cost 4 or greater, and release your giant monsters to stomp your opponent's units into the ground! The following card is banned: Narset, Parter of Veils Nylea has no temples, buildings, or holy sites in her honor save for trees surrounded by clouds of butterflies. Most of her human followers are loners and outcasts. She has influence over the seasons, the forest, and the hunt; though hates doing so for sport.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_GiantMons.translation: Leave your temples behind and join the hunt with the God Nylea in this week's Festival of the Gods event. Harness the power of nature by drawing a card every time you play a creature card with cost 4 or greater, and release your giant monsters to stomp your opponent's units into the ground! The following card is banned: Narset, Parter of Veils Nylea has no temples, buildings, or holy sites in her honor save for trees surrounded by clouds of butterflies. Most of her human followers are loners and outcasts. She has influence over the seasons, the forest, and the hunt; though hates doing so for sport.

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_HistoricB.oracleText: Erebos, God of the Underworld is calling forth his champions from the shadows to rise again in this week's Festival of the Gods event! Reanimate the past by building a historic brawl deck and then deploy misfortune and ill fate on your enemies under the leadership of your chosen commander. The following cards are banned: Meddling Mage Oko, Thief of Crowns Golos, Tireless Pilgrim Sorcerous Spyglass <#a95eff>Erebos is a jealous and tyrannical ruler, proud of his domain as lord of all that ever lived. His areas of influence include death, the Underworld, envy, bitterness, and wealth, as gold is abundant and without value in the Underworld.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_HistoricB.translation: Erebos, God of the Underworld is calling forth his champions from the shadows to rise again in this week's Festival of the Gods event! Reanimate the past by building a historic brawl deck and then deploy misfortune and ill fate on your enemies under the leadership of your chosen commander. The following cards are banned: Meddling Mage Oko, Thief of Crowns Golos, Tireless Pilgrim Sorcerous Spyglass <#a95eff>Erebos is a jealous and tyrannical ruler, proud of his domain as lord of all that ever lived. His areas of influence include death, the Underworld, envy, bitterness, and wealth, as gold is abundant and without value in the Underworld.

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_ImmortalS.oracleText: Daylight is breaking on this week's Festival of the Gods event and the radiant glory of Theros' God of the Sun, Heliod is burning brighter than ever. Each player has an emblem with the effects of The Immortal Sun and starts with only six cards. How will you outshine your opponent? The following cards are banned: Faerie Vandal Narset, Parter of Veils Irencrag Pyromancer Lavinia, Azorius Renegade Improbable Alliance Due to the effects of The Immortal Sun emblem, Planeswalkers with only loyalty abilities are banned in this event. <#fed100>Heliod is often invoked at dawn meals and in matters of family honor, legal proceedings, and marriages to name a few. His areas of influence include the sun, law, justice, kinship, and retribution. He is occasionally symbolized by a pegasus.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_ImmortalS.translation: Daylight is breaking on this week's Festival of the Gods event and the radiant glory of Theros' God of the Sun, Heliod is burning brighter than ever. Each player has an emblem with the effects of The Immortal Sun and starts with only six cards. How will you outshine your opponent? The following cards are banned: Faerie Vandal Narset, Parter of Veils Irencrag Pyromancer Lavinia, Azorius Renegade Improbable Alliance Due to the effects of The Immortal Sun emblem, Planeswalkers with only loyalty abilities are banned in this event. <#fed100>Heliod is often invoked at dawn meals and in matters of family honor, legal proceedings, and marriages to name a few. His areas of influence include the sun, law, justice, kinship, and retribution. He is occasionally symbolized by a pegasus.

Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_ThassaDec.oracleText: The ocean is calling! Set sail in search of hidden secrets and ancient knowledge in this week's Festival of the Gods event. Both you and your opponent will embark with the same oversized Singleton deck. As the sea shanty implores, "May Thassa, the deep-dwelling God of the Sea, guide the cold currents and bring you to victory!" <#4ffff5>Thassa's influences include the ocean, aquatic creatures, ancient knowledge, and the passage of time to name a few. She works slow, eventual, unfolding change to the status quo: resculpting the land, changing coastlines, and upending institutions.
Events/Event_Desc_FestivalGods_ThassaDec.translation: The ocean is calling! Set sail in search of hidden secrets and ancient knowledge in this week's Festival of the Gods event. Both you and your opponent will embark with the same oversized Singleton deck. As the sea shanty implores, "May Thassa, the deep-dwelling God of the Sea, guide the cold currents and bring you to victory!" <#4ffff5>Thassa's influences include the ocean, aquatic creatures, ancient knowledge, and the passage of time to name a few. She works slow, eventual, unfolding change to the status quo: resculpting the land, changing coastlines, and upending institutions.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_BRO_Mishra.oracleText: So, Urza believes himself too brilliant to ever be matched? That pompous blowhard! He'll soon learn that I've not only matched but surpassed him. The Brothers' War between Urza and Mishra shaped the lives of the two men, the fate of their nations, and the history of their world. These preconstructed Historic Brawl decks are helmed by Mishra and his allies from throughout the legendary decades-spanning conflict. Take your pick, then go head-to-head with players from Urza's Army. As you win, you'll earn Schematic card styles from The Brothers' War. There are 10 different styles to collect in this event, with 10 more available in Urza's Army! For more details on this event, including a full list of card styles you can earn, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_BRO_Mishra.translation: 所以，克撒相信自己的才能无可匹敌？那个自大的吹牛大王！他很快会认识到我的才能早就远超于他。 在克撒和米斯拉之间兄弟之战塑造了他们的人生，他们国家的命运，他们世界的历史。这套预组史迹争锋套牌是由米斯拉和他的盟友在这几十年传奇般的战争中所领导的。带着你的选择，然后去面对另一名带着克撒的军队的玩家。如果你获胜，你将会赢得来自兄弟之战的草图卡牌样式。共有10种不同的样式可以在这次的赛事供你收集，还有另外10种可用的在克撒的军队里！ 关于这次赛事的更多细节，包括你可以赢得的全部的卡牌样式，点击这里 当本次赛事结束时，参加者会自动获得未领取的奖励

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_BRO_Urza.oracleText: Mishra has strived his entire life to be my rival, as if such a thing could exist. He's managed only to become a bothersome thorn for my foot. No matter. The fate of any thorn is to be crushed under a boot. The Brothers' War between Urza and Mishra shaped the lives of the two men, the fate of their nations, and the history of their world. These preconstructed Historic Brawl decks are helmed by Urza and his allies from throughout the legendary decades-spanning conflict. Take your pick, then go toe-to-toe with players from Mishra's Forces. As you win, you'll earn Schematic card styles from The Brothers' War. There are 10 different styles to collect in this event, with 10 more available in Mishra's Forces! For more details on this event, including a full list of card styles you can earn, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_BRO_Urza.translation: Mishra has strived his entire life to be my rival, as if such a thing could exist. He's managed only to become a bothersome thorn for my foot. No matter. The fate of any thorn is to be crushed under a boot. The Brothers' War between Urza and Mishra shaped the lives of the two men, the fate of their nations, and the history of their world. These preconstructed Historic Brawl decks are helmed by Urza and his allies from throughout the legendary decades-spanning conflict. Take your pick, then go toe-to-toe with players from Mishra's Forces. As you win, you'll earn Schematic card styles from The Brothers' War. There are 10 different styles to collect in this event, with 10 more available in Mishra's Forces! For more details on this event, including a full list of card styles you can earn, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_DOM.oracleText:
Grow your collection of Dominaria cards! Bring your constructed deck and battle opponents to receive Dominaria packs and Dominaria cards based on how many wins you earn. Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).

Keep playing with that deck until you reach five wins or two losses.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_DOM.translation:
充实你的多明纳里亚牌张收藏！使用事先组好的套牌与对手进行对局，并根据你的胜场数量赢得多明纳里亚补充包。使用同一副套牌持续游戏，直到累积五胜或二败为止。所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

使用同一副套牌持续游戏，直到累积五胜或二败为止。

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_Festival_MAT_.oracleText:
Ixalan is a plane full of wonderous treasures.  So much treasure you may have trouble knowing what to do with it all!

Get four wins to collect all Treasure Card Styles in this Treasured Historic Singleton Festival!

Bring a 60-card Historic deck with no duplicates besides basic lands!  Read the ban list for this format <link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/mtg-arena/treasured-festival-historic-singleton-june-2-5>here</link> 

In this event, each player creates a Treasure token at the beginning of each of their upkeeps.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_HBG_Dragon_Br.oracleText: It gets tiring, you know... generation after generation of humans on quests to slay us. Ha! A mouse may rage, but the lion hears only squeaks. My kin, on the other claw, are much more worthy adversaries. I'm especially eager to test the mettle of Ziatora, a challenger from a plane called 'New Capenna.' To her I say: "It's time for a Dragon Brawl, Zi!" In Dragon Brawl, revel in your grandeur using one of the provided Historic Brawl decks, each of which features a Legendary Dragon as the commander. As you win, you'll earn dragon-themed Rulebook card styles from Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate. There are 10 different styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles you can earn, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_IKO_HistoricA.oracleText: Uncover the past and retell the tales of adventure, power, and victory once again in this week's Festival of Monsters event. In this Historic, Artisan-style experience, pick up the pieces of that which was left behind and experience Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths in a new light! This event is commons and uncommons only. The following cards are banned: Healer's Hawk Persistent Petitioners Cauldron Familiar Cavalcade of Calamity Gates Ablaze Veil of Summer Zenith Flare

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_IKO_MonsterEm.oracleText: This week's fast, loud, and dramatic Festival of Monsters preconstructed omniscience event features an oversized deck of monstrous proportions. You'll start with three cards in your hands and you can cast all spells for free - no need for lands! Cast forth the unfettered, raw power of Ikoria's beasts and tremble in awe and delight as you witness that battles unfold before you!

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_IKO_StandardT.oracleText:
Watch your mana accelerate as impressively as the monsters of this epic and dangerous plane in this week's Festival of Monsters event! At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, you'll create an artifact Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color.

The following cards are banned:
Agent of Treachery
Blood Aspirant
Woodland Champion
Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
Mayhem Devil
Korvold, Fae-Cursed King
Karn, the Great Creator

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_KHM_3Sets.oracleText: Listen now to the Festival of Tales! Hear of the demons of Immersturm! Did your parents scare you with tales of Kardur, the buried demon lord, when you were a child? Then maybe you are ready to hear of the first Bloodsky! Long ago, the demon Varragoth escaped from Immersturm, where demons are bound. He came to Bretagard and led the Skelle clan on a rampage across the land! Halvar and the other gods came to fight the demon back, but it was a long and bloody month before peace returned. That time each year is now called Bloodsky. Of course, the runes have been restored, and the demons are again sealed in Immersturm. For now, anyway... Bring a 60-card deck using only cards from the past three Standard sets: Core Set 2021, Zendikar Rising, and Kaldheim. Change your deck at any time. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_KHM_Emblem.oracleText: Listen now to the Festival of Tales! Hear of how our noble gods, the Skoti, finally overthrew the elven gods, the Einir! It was late in the war when the Einir called on King Narfi of Karfell to aid them. But deathly Egon made Narfi a better offer: immortality in exchange for switching sides. Narfi broke his oath and agreed to Egon's bargain, and at such cost! Now his immortality is that of the grave! With their new undead army, the Skoti defeated the Einir and sealed them away in the trees of Skemfar. King Harald of the elves watches over them now, and you might wonder how happy he is about it... Bring a 60-card Standard deck, and change it at any time. For each instant or sorcery you cast, you will create or grow an Army you control. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_KHM_HistoricA.oracleText: Listen now to the Festival of Tales! Hear of clever Valki and his greatest trick! He asked mighty Toralf for help harnessing the spirit horse Windfell, and we all know Toralf never backs down from a challenge. Though it took him three days, he finally laid Valki's enchanted harness upon its neck. Only then was Valki's trick revealed! He had tied the harness to the Gods' Hall! As Windfell galloped off, he pulled the Hall all the way down to the roots of the World Tree, where it still rests today, and where the spirit owl Vega watches over it to make sure it goes no further. And Valki...well, he did not stay to thank Toralf for his help! Bring a 60-card deck using commons, uncommons, and basic lands from all of MTG Arena, and change it at any time. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_KHM_HistoricB.oracleText: Listen now to the Festival of Tales! Hear now of Hurrik, the first leader of the Beskir! Ages ago, Hurrik came upon a man fighting a wolf. He quickly knew this was no ordinary wolf: it was the Beast of the Cosmos, Sarulf! And this was no ordinary man: it was the God of the Cosmos, Alrund! Hurrik saw that Sarulf's teeth were coated in poison. When Alrund was struck and fell, paralyzed, Hurrik drew his bow and shot an arrow into Sarulf's eye, driving the beast away! In thanks, Alrund gifted the Feltmark and his blessing to Hurrik. That blessing lives on today in Sigrid, Hurrik's descendant, who leads the Beskir wisely and justly. Bring a Brawl deck using any cards on MTG Arena - not just Standard! Change it at any time during the event. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_KHM_Precon.oracleText: Listen now to the Festival of Tales! Hear stories from across the World Tree, the bridge between the realms! From the halls of Starnheim to the mists of Littjara, it is the World Tree that links Kaldheim together. Those who know it can travel across the realms - as long as the god Esika sees fit to let them! She was born of the Tree, and she keeps it well. She shares the Tree with the clever Cosmos beast Toski, her messenger and spy, who hears all and brings new secrets to her. If you ever find yourself between the realms, give your thanks to Esika, and prepare yourself to become a part of the next tale we tell! Select from among the event's preconstructed decks and play as much as you like. Change decks whenever you choose.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LCI_HistoricB.oracleText:
Collect some of your Favorite Card Style in this Historic Brawl Festival!

Take these Historic Brawl preconstructed decks for a spin, and see if you find a new favorite! Change decks as often as you like.

ADD MORE DESCRIPTION WHEN DECKS ARE COMPETE
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LCI_HistoricB.translation:
在这个史迹争锋节上收集一些你最喜欢的卡牌样式！

试试这些史迹争锋预组套牌，看看你是否能找到新的最爱！可以随意更换套牌。

“当套牌完成时，添加更多描述”

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LCI_ImmortalS.oracleText:
Collect some of your Favorite Card Style in this Historic Festival!

The Immortal Sun provides vast magical power to its wielder and is currently lost in the multiverse. How will you wield its ancient power?

Bring a 60-card deck from among any cards available on MTG Arena. Put old favorites and new contenders toe-to-toe with the powers of the Immortal Sun:

At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

Spells you cast cost {o1} less to cast.

Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LCI_ImmortalS.translation:
在这个史迹节里收集一些你最喜欢的卡牌样式！

永生圣阳为它的使用者提供了巨大的魔力，目前它已经迷失在多重宇宙中。你将如何运用它的古老力量？

从万智牌竞技场上可用的任何卡牌中选择60张卡牌。让旧爱和新兴竞争者与永生圣阳的力量面对面：

在你的抓牌步骤开始时，额外抓一张牌。

你施放的咒语减少{o1}来施放。

由你操控的生物得+1/+1。

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LCI_Storydeck.oracleText:
Collect some of your Favorite Card Style in this Block Festival!

Play out the story with 60-card decks containing only Lost Caverns of Ixalan cards usable in Standard. Change decks as often as you like.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LCI_Storydeck.translation:
在这个街区节日中收集一些你最喜欢的卡牌样式！

用仅包含可用于标准模式的《依夏兰迷窟》60张卡牌作为套牌来演绎故事。随意更换套牌。

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_LTR_Brawl.oracleText: Your favorite legendary creature from The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth is ready to command your deck into battle! Bring a 60-card Alchemy-legal Brawl deck with a twist: Legendary creatures and planeswalkers are banned except those from The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth. Play and change decks as much as you want until the event ends! "To Isengard!" the Ents cried in many voices. "To Isengard!" To Isengard Though Isengard be ringed and barred with doors of stone; Though Isengard be strong and hard, as cold as stone and bare as bone, We go, we go, we go to war, to hew the stone and break the door; For bole and bough are burning now, the furnace roars – we go to war! To land of gloom with tramp of doom, with roll of drum, we come, we come; To Isengard with doom we come! With doom we come, with doom we come! So they sang as they marched southwards -- The Ends, Book 2, pg 485

To land of gloom with tramp of doom, with roll of drum, we come, we come; To Isengard with doom we come! With doom we come, with doom we come! So they sang as they marched southwards -- The Ends, Book 2, pg 485

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_M21_HistoricS.oracleText: For this week's Festival of Time event, you'll need to weave together more cards than ever, calling in aid from many times and places. Can you bring the past into the present? The future may depend upon it. Your deck must be at least 100 cards from all of MTG Arena, but you can only use a single copy of any card that isn't a basic land, and you cannot use a sideboard or companion. The following cards are not allowed: Nexus of Fate Oko, Thief of Crowns
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_M21_HistoricS.translation: 欢迎来到本周的时光活动节，你需要聚集的卡牌远超从前，从各个多重宇宙呼唤援助。你能否将过去带至当下？未来或许取决于此。 你的牌组必须有至少100张牌，你可以使用MTGA中的所有卡牌，但除基本地外每张牌都只能使用一张，你不能使用备牌区和行侣。 以下卡牌被禁止使用： 龙命连结点 窃冠瓯柯

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_M21_HistoricS.oracleText: For this week's Festival of Time event, you'll need to weave together more cards than ever, calling in aid from many times and places. Can you bring the past into the present? The future may depend upon it. In the community-inspired Gladiator format, your deck must be at least 100 cards, and you can use (almost) any card on Arena. However, you can only use a single copy of any card that isn't a basic land. The following cards are not allowed: Nexus of Fate Oko, Thief of Crowns

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_M21_NewPlayer.oracleText: Welcome to the Festival of Time! This week, we are turning the clock forward for a glimpse of what is to come. Change is on the horizon, and even savvy veterans will have to learn new ways to achieve glory. These decks have already adapted to the coming changes. They use only cards from the past year, and they will be useful to planeswalkers young and old for a long while yet. Fight it out, and determine who will rule the future!

Change is on the horizon, and even savvy veterans will have to learn new ways to achieve glory. These decks have already adapted to the coming changes. They use only cards from the past year, and they will be useful to planeswalkers young and old for a long while yet. Fight it out, and determine who will rule the future!

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_MID_Emblem.oracleText: The Harvest Festival is winding down, but there's still time for one more party! This season of plenty means there's plenty to go around, so come right in! Dig into a delicious dish, tickle your brain with a clever puzzle, or just enjoy the shine of a pretty bauble. Actually, how about all three? At the Harvest Bash, everyone gets a few treats to celebrate the season: you'll get a Clue token, a Treasure token, and a Food token. Bring a 60-card Singleton deck and win Equinox card styles for your collection! Play as much as you want until the event ends. For more details on this event, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_MID_Precon.oracleText: Welcome to the Harvest Festival! Do you hear that music? Smell those funnel cakes? The season is well and truly in swing, so step into the fair and have a look around. Whether you like haunted houses or hay rides, there's fun for all ages! And don't pay any mind to reports of menacing clawed figures looming in the shadows outside the grounds. We're quite sure there's nothing to be worried about... Enjoy the attractions of the Festival with these preconstructed decks, and win Equinox card styles for your collection! You can change decks as often as you like and play as much as you want until the event ends. For more details on this event, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_MOM_HistoricA.oracleText: Collect your Favorite Team-Up Card Style in this Historic Artisan Festival! Bring a 60-card deck using only commons, uncommons, and basic lands from any set in MTG Arena. Without rares, the common folk can truly be heard!

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_MOM_HistoricB.translation:
Collect your Favorite Team-Up Card Style in this Historic Brawl Festival!

Bring a 100-card Brawl deck using any cards in MTG Arena, led by your favorite legendary creature or planeswalker!

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ONE_Basilica.oracleText: Behold the Fair Basilica! Its crimson sinews and porcelain metal are styled after its ruler, Elesh Norn, the dominant praetor of New Phyrexia. Her control over old Mirrodin's mycosynth reserves has ensured her rule continues unchallenged...so far. This 60-card Singleton event arrives at the Fair Basilica, the white-dominated sphere of New Phyrexia. The glory of Elesh Norn cannot be denied in this place, and abilities that trigger from creatures entering the battlefield will be doubled in exultation of her generosity and wisdom. Embrace this true perfection, and you'll earn white Ichor Showcase card styles from Phyrexia: All Will Be One. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ONE_Compleatl.oracleText: Our target is New Phyrexia, formerly known as Mirrodin. An entire plane rebuilt from the inside out, filled with predators, hazards, and traps. Everything there will kill you, compleat you, or both given half a chance. This should be a walk in the park, right? If you attack New Phyrexia, you'd better do your homework lest you find yourself Compleatly Outmatched. Learn where the real power lies with these Brawl decks, each helmed by a dangerous foe who can be found defending (or also attempting to conquer) New Phyrexia. As you win, you'll earn Manga card styles for planeswalkers from Phyrexia: All Will Be One. There are 10 different styles to collect! For more details on this event, including a full list of card styles you can earn, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ONE_Furnace.oracleText: The Autonomous Furnace was the first sphere established by Phyrexia in their assault on what was once Mirrodin. The Mirran resistance now uses it as a refuge and staging ground, ignored by Urabrask while the praetor furthers his own plots. This 60-card Singleton event takes us to the Autonomous Furnace, the red-dominated sphere of New Phyrexia. Nothing is wasted in this massive forge complex: when you discard a card here, you'll still be able to cast it this turn. Use your resources wisely, and you'll earn red Ichor Showcase card styles from Phyrexia: All Will Be One. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ONE_Maze.oracleText: The Hunter Maze is a labyrinthine wilderness of copper trees draped in vines and green fog. The praetor Vorinclex and his ally, the compleated former Mirran hero Glissa, rule over this endless battlefield where only the strong survive. This 60-card Singleton event brings us to the Hunter Maze, the green-dominated sphere of New Phyrexia. This impenetrable jungle rewards the strongest combatants: when a creature with 4 or more power joins your side, it will bring a new card along with it. Overpower the competition, and you'll earn green Ichor Showcase card styles from Phyrexia: All Will Be One. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ONE_Pits.oracleText: The praetor Sheoldred reigns over the Dross Pits after claiming them by trickery from one of her upstart rivals. The acidic necrogen and toxic gases that flow throughout the sphere make an unforgiving setting for their ongoing war games. This 60-card Singleton event descends into the Dross Pits, the black-dominated sphere of New Phyrexia. It is a foul place dominated by death: your abilities that trigger from creatures dying will be doubled here. Capture this power, and you'll earn black Ichor Showcase card styles from Phyrexia: All Will Be One. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_One_Bay.oracleText: Tread carefully in the Surgical Bay; its entire surface is covered in a swirling sea of quicksilver and oil. The sky is lit by ominous, eye-like lights that report every move to Jin-Gitaxias in his spire-top laboratory. This 60-card Singleton event explores the Surgical Bay, the blue-dominated sphere of New Phyrexia. Here, cruel and disturbing experiments abound: when you proliferate, it is especially prolific, giving you two instances of extra counters. Your findings will earn you blue Ichor Showcase card styles from Phyrexia: All Will Be One. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_SNC_Brokers.oracleText: We all know the Brokers of today: a law firm with demonic ties who secretly follow a doomsday prophecy. But how did they go from nomadic paladins to legalistic opportunists? In this 60-card Singleton event, even the slightest advantage can be leveraged, so get ready to turn your counters into cards! As you do, you'll earn Golden Age Showcase card styles from Streets of New Capenna, each featuring spells from the Brokers family. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_SNC_Cabaretti.oracleText: We all know the Cabaretti of today: fun-loving druids who expect loyalty from their followers (or else). But how did they go from keepers of an ancient faith to a nefarious cult? In this 60-card Singleton event, there's strength in numbers, so build your alliance from the ground up! As you do, you'll earn Golden Age Showcase card styles from Streets of New Capenna, each featuring spells from the Cabaretti family! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_SNC_Maestros.oracleText: We all know the Maestros of today: elite vampire assassins with a passion for fine art. But how did they go from generous patrons to a murderous crime family? In this 60-card Singleton event, harness the ruthless ambition of the Maestros as you sacrifice creatures to recast instants and sorceries from your graveyard. As you do, you'll earn Golden Age Showcase card styles from Streets of New Capenna, each featuring spells from the Maestros family! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_SNC_Obscura.oracleText: We all know the Obscura of today: powerful wizards and mystics who use their power to con and blackmail. But how did they go from enlightened counselors to angels to manipulative grifters? In this 60-card Singleton event, every attack is a covert operation, so get ready to connive your way to victory! As you do, you'll earn Golden Age Showcase card styles from Streets of New Capenna, each featuring spells from the Obscura family. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_SNC_Riveteers.oracleText: We all know the Riveteers of today: tough-as-nails artisans who can break buildings as easily as kneecaps. But how did they go from skilled tradespeople to dominating the lower levels of New Capenna? In this 60-card Singleton event, no sacrifice is in vain with the right preparation–craft your decks and turns to make your own silver linings. As you do, you'll earn Golden Age Showcase card styles from Streets of New Capenna, each featuring spells from the Riveteers family! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_SNC_Turf_Braw.oracleText: The streets grow restless in New Capenna. Tensions between the families are reaching a fever pitch, and the alleys whisper of coming violence. No one's quite sure what started all–do the Obscura have something on the Brokers? Did the Riveteers steal from Maestros? Goodness knows the Cabaretti are ready... whatever the cause, one thing is clear: this means brawl. In Turf Brawls, defend your territory–or expand your influence–using one of the provided decks, each of which features a family representative as the commander! As you win, you'll earn the Skyscraper card styles from Streets of New Capenna. There are 10 different styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles you can earn, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_STX_Knowledge.oracleText: The Strixhaven University College Cup is upon us! At this annual competition, mage-students from Strixhaven's five colleges compete to earn prestige for their college. The first competition is the Test of Knowledge! One of Strixhaven's most respected faculty members is here to oversee the test and provide guidance to the students. Get ready to show your stuff! In this event, the spells will be flying fast and furious! Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery, you'll draw a new card. Bring a 60-card Singleton deck to take advantage and claim victory! For your first win in this event each day, your Strixhaven college-themed sleeve, avatar, and pet will earn points for that College. After three events, the highest-scoring College will earn a special card sleeve for everyone on Arena! For more details on this event and the current scores, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_STX_Leadershi.oracleText: And now, the thrilling conclusion to the Strixhaven University College Cup! At this annual competition, mage-students from Strixhaven's five colleges compete to earn prestige for their college. The third and final competition is the Test of Leadership! Strixhaven has cultivated many fine leaders, and now you must choose one to stand by your side. Rally your friends and followers and seize victory! In this event, bring a 60-card Brawl deck led by a legendary creature or planeswalker from Strixhaven: School of Mages! For your first win in this event each day, your Strixhaven college-themed sleeve, avatar, and pet will earn points for that College. After three events, the highest-scoring College will earn a special card sleeve for everyone on Arena! (Your choice of Commander does not affect these scores. Play whatever you like!) For more details on this event and the current scores, click here.
