At this annual competition, mage-students from Strixhaven's five colleges compete to earn prestige for their college. The second competition is the Test of Wit! With great power at your fingertips, what will you create? Show off your most impressive and imposing ideas to win both your match and the hearts of the crowd. In this event, you get a Treasure token each upkeep. Bring a 100-card Standard deck to maximize your extra mana! For your first win in this event each day, your Strixhaven college-themed sleeve, avatar, and pet will earn points for that College. After three events, the highest-scoring College will earn a special card sleeve for everyone on Arena! For more details on this event and the current scores, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_WOE_DarkTutel.oracleText: Collect some of your Favorite Card Style in this Alchemy Festival! Once upon a time, a dark curse provided knowledge at a harsh price. Bring a 60-card Alchemy deck. Break out the latest and greatest from the lab, or maybe find a new favorite! In this event, each player gets an extra card each turn, but loses life equal to its mana value.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_WOE_DarkTutel.translation: 在这个炼金节上收集一些您最喜欢的卡牌样式！ 很久以前，黑暗诅咒以残酷的代价提供了知识。 带上一副 60 张炼金套牌。 揭开实验室的最新、最精彩的成果，或者找到新的最爱！ 在这个活动中，每个玩家每回合都会额外抽一张牌，但会失去等于其法力值的生命。

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_WOE_GiftBagHi.oracleText: Collect some of your Favorite Card Style in this Historic Festival! Once upon a time, a trail of crumbs, clues, and coins led deep into the woods. Which will you find first? Bring a 60-card deck from among any cards available on MTG Arena. Put old favorites and new contenders toe-to-toe! In this event, players get one free treasure, clue, and food token on their first three turns, in whatever order they want!
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_WOE_GiftBagHi.translation: 在这个史迹节中收集一些您最喜欢的卡牌样式！ 很久以前，一条由面包屑、线索和硬币组成的小道通向树林深处。 你会先找到哪个？ 从 MTG Arena 上提供的任意卡牌中挑选一套 60 张卡牌。 让旧的最爱和新的竞争者面对面！ 在此活动中，玩家在前三回合可以按选择的顺序分别获得一个珍宝、线索或食品衍生物！

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_WOE_SeasonofG.oracleText: Collect some of your Favorite Card Styles in this Standard Festival! Once upon a time, enormous stalks rose up from the ground. In their shade, life flourshed. Bring a 60-card Standard deck, battle against the competition, and claim victory in the premier constructed format! In this event, players scry 1 whenever they play a creature, and draw a card whenever they target their own creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_WOE_SeasonofG.translation: 在这个标准节中收集一些您最喜欢的卡牌样式！ 从前，巨大的树干从地里升起。 在他们的树荫下，生命蓬勃发展。 带上 60 张标准牌组，与竞争对手一较高下，并在顶级构筑赛制中获得胜利！ 在此活动中，玩家每次释放生物咒语时都会占卜 1，使用咒语指自己的生物为目标时抓一张牌。

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_3Sets.oracleText: We've simply loved showing you around Zendikar during this Festival of Adventure! But as our journey comes to a close, it's time to put all we've seen into practice with a hands-on survival test. When you're out exploring, you won't always have everything you think you need. What happens when your pack is empty and your favorite rope snaps in two? You'll have to make the best use of what you've got, putting your gear to work in ways you might not have otherwise. Can you survive with limited tools and resources? That is the mark of a true adventurer! Bring a 60-card deck using only cards from the past three Standard sets: Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths, Core Set 2021, and Zendikar Rising. Change your deck at any time. The following cards are not allowed: Omnath, Locus of Creation

What happens when your pack is empty and your favorite rope snaps in two? You'll have to make the best use of what you've got, putting your gear to work in ways you might not have otherwise. Can you survive with limited tools and resources? That is the mark of a true adventurer! The following cards are not allowed: Omnath, Locus of Creation

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_Mastermin.oracleText: We've seen a great deal during the Festival of Adventure. We hope you've been paying attention along the way, because now it's time to put all that information to work. Think you know all there is to know? Then show it off at Trivia Night! Think fast: What's the most important piece of gear for venturing into an Ondu ruin? Do you need a Cleric or a Wizard to decipher these glyphs? Which of these opposing party members is the most dangerous, and why? If you know your stuff, you could win it all! The deck for this event is full of Clerics, Rogues, Warriors, and Wizards, but it contains no lands. Each turn, you may discard a card in exchange for a land token that will make any color of mana.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_Mastermin.translation: We've seen a great deal during the Festival of Adventure. We hope you've been paying attention along the way, because now it's time to put all that information to work. Think you know all there is to know? Then show it off at Trivia Night! Think fast: What's the most important piece of gear for venturing into an Ondu ruin? Do you need a Cleric or a Wizard to decipher these glyphs? Which of these opposing party members is the most dangerous, and why? If you know your stuff, you could win it all! The deck for this event is full of Clerics, Rogues, Warriors, and Wizards, but it contains no lands. Each turn, you may discard a card in exchange for a land token that will make any color of mana.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_Precon.oracleText: Welcome to the Festival of Adventure! During the next few weeks, we will be visiting and learning about the plane of adventure, Zendikar! From the lush canopies of Turntimber to the shadowed passages of Agadeem, this plane has sights and stories that few can match. This week, enjoy any of our fascinating programs, then make your own itinerary! You can choose whether to visit beautiful landmarks or to learn about useful, locally sourced spells. Each path offers a rich experience that you will not soon forget! Select from among the event's preconstructed decks and play as much as you like. Change decks whenever you choose.
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_Precon.translation: Welcome to the Festival of Adventure! During the next few weeks, we will be visiting and learning about the plane of adventure, Zendikar! From the lush canopies of Turntimber to the shadowed passages of Agadeem, this plane has sights and stories that few can match. This week, enjoy any of our fascinating programs, then make your own itinerary! You can choose whether to visit beautiful landmarks or to learn about useful, locally sourced spells. Each path offers a rich experience that you will not soon forget! Select from among the event's preconstructed decks and play as much as you like. Change decks whenever you choose.

Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_Singleton.oracleText: In this week's Festival of Adventure, we'll explore one of Zendikar's most unique features: the Roil. Zendikar's mana is so powerful that the ground can't even stay grounded! Bring a 60-card Standard deck with only one copy of any card except basic lands, and change it at any time. Your first spell each turn lets you cast a spell of lower cost out of your deck! The following cards are not allowed: Archon of Emeria Deafening Silence Drannith Magistrate Mangara, the Diplomat Ghostly Pilferer Cauldron Familiar Fires of Invention Flaxen Intruder Once Upon a Time Lutri, the Spellchaser Oko, Thief of Crowns Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath Escape to the Wilds Omnath, Locus of Creation Lucky Clover
Events/Event_Desc_Festival_ZNR_Singleton.translation: In this week's Festival of Adventure, we'll explore one of Zendikar's most unique features: the Roil. Zendikar's mana is so powerful that the ground can't even stay grounded! Bring a 60-card Standard deck with only one copy of any card except basic lands, and change it at any time. Your first spell each turn lets you cast a spell of lower cost out of your deck! The following cards are not allowed: Archon of Emeria Deafening Silence Drannith Magistrate Mangara, the Diplomat Ghostly Pilferer Cauldron Familiar Fires of Invention Flaxen Intruder Once Upon a Time Lutri, the Spellchaser Oko, Thief of Crowns Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath Escape to the Wilds Omnath, Locus of Creation Lucky Clover

Events/Event_Desc_Flash_Event.oracleText:
Get a Dominaria pack just for entering this event! Bring your constructed deck, and battle opponents and earn bonus rewards with enough wins. 

Keep playing with that deck until you reach three wins or two losses.
Events/Event_Desc_Flash_Event.translation:
参加赛事即可获得多明纳里亚补充包！使用事先组好的套牌与对手进行对局，获得足够的胜场数量便可赢得额外奖励。

使用同一副套牌持续游戏，直到累积三胜或二败为止。

Events/Event_Desc_Future_Artisan.oracleText: Bring your Artisan deck into the new year! Build your deck from only common and uncommon cards from the sets remaining in Standard after renewal season: Throne of Eldraine, Theros Beyond Death, Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths, and Core Set 2021. The following cards are banned: Cauldron Familiar Zenith Flare
Events/Event_Desc_Future_Artisan.translation: Bring your Artisan deck into the new year! Build your deck from only common and uncommon cards from the sets remaining in Standard after renewal season: Throne of Eldraine, Theros Beyond Death, Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths, and Core Set 2021. The following cards are banned: Cauldron Familiar Zenith Flare

Events/Event_Desc_Future_Ranked.oracleText: Get a head start on the upcoming Standard format and earn extra Set Mastery XP! Play Ranked Standard 2020 by using cards from: Guilds of Ravnica, Ravnica Allegiance, War of the Spark, Core Set 2020, and Throne of Eldraine! You can play this event as many times as you want!
Events/Event_Desc_Future_Ranked.translation: 在即将更新的标准赛环境中占得头筹，赢取额外的精研通行证奖励！使用来自烽会拉尼卡、效忠拉尼卡、火花之战、2020核心系列、以及艾卓王权的卡牌，参加2020标准排名赛！ 本赛事没有参赛次数限制！

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Cascade_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs, but with a twist: The first spell you cast each turn will first have you reveal cards from the top of your library until you find a card with a lower converted mana cost. You can cast that card without paying its mana cost. Two spells for the price of one! You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Cascade_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。但这次有些不一样：你每回合施放的第一个咒语会先从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值比它低的牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。付一得二！你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Comp_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。你所选择的牌张会加入你的收藏，且你会用你抽到的这些牌加上基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌参赛。不断进行三盘两胜的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Draft_Exploration.oracleText: In Exploration, Magic's rules are changed: You can play two lands per turn, your starting hand size is nine, and you have no maximum hand size! Draft cards using 15-card draft packs and build a 40-card deck to battle others. You'll receive rewards based on how many wins you earn and you get to keep all the cards you choose!
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Draft_Exploration.translation: 「探险」玩法的万智牌规则略有不同：你每回合可以使用两个地，你的起始手牌数量为九张，且没有手牌上限。用15张牌的补充包进行轮抽，精心挑选牌张，构筑一副40张的套牌与其他牌手对战。最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励，而且所抽选的牌都归你所有！

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Omniscience_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs, but with a twist: Spells don't cost any mana! Keep the lands out of your deck, you don't need them. Your starting hand size is 3.  You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! (Note that activated abilities and other mana payments function normally.)
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Omniscience_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。但这次有些不一样：咒语无需费用即可施放！套牌中不必加入地，你已不需要它们。你的起始手牌数量为3。  你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！（请注意：起动式异能和其他需要支付法术力才能办到的事情仍会正常作用。）

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Treasure_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs, but with a twist: At the beginning of each of your turns, you'll get a Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color. Accelerate by one mana each turn, or save them up to cast an expensive spell in half the time! You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_GRN_Treasure_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。但这次有些不一样：在你的每个回合开始时，你会获得一个珍宝衍生物，牺牲它可以产生一点任意颜色的法术力。你可以每回合都用它来加速一点法术力，也可以把它们都留起来提前施放大型咒语！你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Game_Awards_2019.oracleText: Now that we've celebrated at The Game Awards, it's time to shuffle up and pick sides! Join Ashiok and Elspeth in a fight deep in the Theros underworld. They're both armed with some of Magic's most iconic and powerful cards, as well as preview cards from Theros Beyond Death. You'll earn Theros Beyond Death packs that you can open when the set releases in January. Note: Event decks will not be added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_Game_Awards_2019.translation: Now that we've celebrated at The Game Awards, it's time to shuffle up and pick sides! Join Ashiok and Elspeth in a fight deep in the Theros underworld. They're both armed with some of Magic's most iconic and powerful cards, as well as preview cards from Theros Beyond Death. You'll earn Theros Beyond Death packs that you can open when the set releases in January. Note: Event decks will not be added to your collection.

Events/Event_Desc_Gathering2021.oracleText: The multiverse is a big place, and everyone in it is unique. That's what makes it so special when you have the right people around you. No matter on what plane you find yourself, it can still feel like home if you're with family - whether you were born into them or discovered them along the way. The right combination of pieces can make for a perfect deck or a perfect holiday. This weekend, you can find your own blend in this All-Access Singleton event. Build any 60-card Standard deck, whether you have the cards in your collection or not, and play as much as you want until the event ends. Have fun!
Events/Event_Desc_Gathering2021.translation: The multiverse is a big place, and everyone in it is unique. That's what makes it so special when you have the right people around you. No matter on what plane you find yourself, it can still feel like home if you're with family - whether you were born into them or discovered them along the way. The right combination of pieces can make for a perfect deck or a perfect holiday. This weekend, you can find your own blend in this All-Access Singleton event. Build any 60-card Standard deck, whether you have the cards in your collection or not, and play as much as you want until the event ends. Have fun!

Events/Event_Desc_Gathering2022.oracleText: The multiverse is a big place, and finding the right people to adventure with is a big job. Building a community with others who share your interests means that you'll always have friends, or even rivals, to make things more interesting! Putting together the right combination of cards can make for a perfect deck, and finding the right community of players can make for a perfect holiday! This weekend, you can find both in Gladiator, a fan format using 100-card singleton Historic decks! This event is All-Access, meaning you can even use cards outside of your collection. To learn more about Gladiator and its community, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_Gathering2022.translation: The multiverse is a big place, and finding the right people to adventure with is a big job. Building a community with others who share your interests means that you'll always have friends, or even rivals, to make things more interesting! Putting together the right combination of cards can make for a perfect deck, and finding the right community of players can make for a perfect holiday! This weekend, you can find both in Gladiator, a fan format using 100-card singleton Historic decks! This event is All-Access, meaning you can even use cards outside of your collection. To learn more about Gladiator and its community, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Giant_Monsters.oracleText: In Giant Monsters, whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value of four or greater, draw a card! Narset, Parter of Veils and Nexus of Fate are banned in this format.
Events/Event_Desc_Giant_Monsters.translation: 在「威凛巨兽」规则下，每当你施放法术力值等于或大于四的生物时，你便抓一张牌！揭帷娜尔施和龙命连结点在此赛制中禁用。

Events/Event_Desc_GladiatorSpotlight.oracleText:
Welcome to Gladiator, one of the most popular fan formats for MTG Arena!

Gladiator uses 100-card singleton Historic decks with a minimal banned list. You then face off in best-of-three matches, giving you the chance to see a wide range of possibilities from both players' decks. There are no sideboards, so what you bring is what you've got!

To learn more about Gladiator and and its community, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/magic-digital/community-spotlight-gladiator-august-2022>here</link></u>.
Events/Event_Desc_GladiatorSpotlight.translation:
欢迎来到角斗士，这是MTGA最受欢迎的粉丝赛制之一！

角斗士使用100张无双史迹套牌和最低限度的禁牌表。然后，你将在三盘两胜制的比赛中对峙，让你有机会从双方玩家的套牌中看到广泛的可能性。没有备牌，所以你带来的就是你所拥有的！

要了解有关角斗士及其社区的更多信息，请单击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/magic-digital/community-spotlight-gladiator-august-2022>此处</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_Greedy_Draft.oracleText: In Greedy Draft, draft three packs and keep the cards you draft, but with a twist: Everyone can play two lands per turn, starts with 9 cards in their hand, and has no maximum hand size!
Events/Event_Desc_Greedy_Draft.translation: 在「贪婪轮抽」中，依然是利用三包补充包进行轮抽，且你所抽到的牌张都会加入你的收藏，不过有些不一样：所有人每回合都能使用两个地，以9张手牌起手，没有手牌上限。

Events/Event_Desc_HBG_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Flicker your creatures in and out of play to produce as many triggers as possible! Control the battlefield and sneak in creatures to deal damage to your opponent. The real treasure will be the treasure you make along the way. DRAGONS! The best offense is a good defense? Gain life so you can lower theirs! Earn bonuses every time your creatures leave the battlefield. MORE DRAGONS! What's dead may never die... but may live again? Prepare for trouble! Use the new Double Team mechanic to cast creatures with the same name. EVEN MORE DRAGONS!

Use the new Double Team mechanic to cast creatures with the same name. EVEN MORE DRAGONS!

Events/Event_Desc_HBG_Trad_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Flicker your creatures in and out of play to produce as many triggers as possible! Control the battlefield and sneak in creatures to deal damage to your opponent. The real treasure will be the treasure you make along the way. DRAGONS! The best offense is a good defense? Gain life so you can lower theirs! Earn bonuses every time your creatures leave the battlefield. MORE DRAGONS! What's dead may never die... but may live again? Prepare for trouble! Use the new Double Team mechanic to cast creatures with the same name. EVEN MORE DRAGONS!
Events/Event_Desc_HBG_Trad_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 在游戏中闪动你的生物，以产生尽可能多的触发器 控制战场，偷袭生物，对你的对手造成伤害。 真正的宝藏将是你沿途创造的财富。 龙！龙！龙！ 最好的进攻就是防守？获得生命，这样你就可以降低他们的生命！ 每次你的生物离开战场时，都能获得奖励。 更多的龙！更多的龙！更多的龙！ 死去的东西可能永远不会死去……但可能会再次复活？ 准备好迎接麻烦! 使用新的双团队机制来施放同名的生物。 甚至更多的龙！甚至更多的龙！甚至更多的龙！

Events/Event_Desc_HOU_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_HOU_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_HistoricBrawl.oracleText: Bring a Brawl deck using any cards on MTG Arena - not just Standard! Change it at any time during the event. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-historic-brawl>here</link></u>.
Events/Event_Desc_HistoricBrawl.translation: 使用MTGA中的任何卡牌构建争锋套牌 - 不仅仅是标准！赛事期间可随时更改。有关此赛制的更多详细信息，包括禁牌表，请单击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-historic-brawl>此处</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_HistoricBrawlFest.oracleText: Students at Strixhaven University learn about magic from across the Multiverse, and each college offers its own perspective. Lorehold, for example, searches for critical spells from throughout history, while Quandrix calculates the mathematically correct artifact to perfectly balance out their arsenal. But the most important piece of the puzzle is yours to decide. So, what's your major? It's time to cram for finals! This time, you'll need to bring a 100-card Brawl deck using any cards on MTG Arena - not just Standard! Change it at any time during the event. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_HistoricBrawlFest.translation: Students at Strixhaven University learn about magic from across the Multiverse, and each college offers its own perspective. Lorehold, for example, searches for critical spells from throughout history, while Quandrix calculates the mathematically correct artifact to perfectly balance out their arsenal. But the most important piece of the puzzle is yours to decide. So, what's your major? It's time to cram for finals! This time, you'll need to bring a 100-card Brawl deck using any cards on MTG Arena - not just Standard! Change it at any time during the event. For more details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_HistoricShakeup_Week1.oracleText:
We're shaking Historic up with an additional banned list for this event! For the full details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-khm-hist-shakeup>here</link></u>.

Play your favorites while you can, because next week, we will be back to give things another big shake. Even more cards will get kicked out for the next round! Who will rise to the top?
Events/Event_Desc_HistoricShakeup_Week1.translation:
我们将在本次史迹革新赛事中为史迹增加一份额外禁牌表！关于这一赛制的全部细节，包括禁牌表，请点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-khm-hist-shakeup>这里</link></u>。

多多玩你的最爱，因为下周，我们将会给带来另一个大变动。甚至更多的牌将被踢出下一轮! 谁将升至顶峰？

Events/Event_Desc_HistoricShakeup_Week2.oracleText:
After one week of Shakeup, Historic is getting re-shaken with even more additional bans for this event! For the full details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-khm-hist-shakeup>here</link></u>.

It's anyone's game, but don't get too comfortable. After this week, we'll be making one more round of bans. Your games will help decide who makes the grade and who is left standing at the end!
Events/Event_Desc_HistoricShakeup_Week2.translation:
经过一周的革新后，史迹正在重新调整，并为此赛事增加了更多的禁令！有关此格赛制的完整详细信息，包括禁牌表，请单击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-khm-hist-shakeup>此处</link></u>。

这是任何人的游戏，但不要太舒服。本周之后，我们将再进行一轮禁令。你的游戏将有助于决定谁能取得好成绩，谁能在最后站稳脚跟!

Events/Event_Desc_HistoricShakeup_Week3.oracleText: It's the final week of Historic Shakeup! After three sets of additional bans, can you find the remaining diamonds in the rough?  For the full details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-khm-hist-shakeup>here</link></u>.
Events/Event_Desc_HistoricShakeup_Week3.translation: 这是史迹革新的最后一周！三套附加禁牌表后，你能在原石中找到剩余的钻石吗？有关此赛制的完整详细信息，包括禁牌表，请单击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-khm-hist-shakeup>此处</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Challenge.oracleText: Bring your Historic deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive rewards based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Challenge.translation: 使用你事先组好的史迹赛制套牌，不断进行三局两胜对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Event.oracleText: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history.
Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Event.translation: 使用MTG Arena上线以来的精选列表牌张进行游戏。

Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Ladder.oracleText: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history.  Results will affect your constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Ladder.translation: 使用MTGA上线以来的精选列表牌张进行游戏。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Launch.oracleText:
Celebrate the release of 20 new cards to MTG Arena in this best-of-one Historic event.

You can purchase the complete Historic Anthology 1 in the Store which contains playsets of every new card, or use Wildcards to craft each card individually. Historic allows you to use all sets currently available in MTG Arena.

Banned Cards:
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"> Nexus of Fate
Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Launch.translation:
庆祝MTGA推出20张新卡牌，参加这场一盘胜负的史迹赛事。

您可以在商店中购买完整的史迹合集1--包含所有新卡片的套装，或者使用万用牌单独制作每张卡片。史迹允许你使用当前在MTGA中可用的所有系列牌。

禁牌表：
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU">龙命连结点

Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Play.translation: 史迹赛制使用MTGA上线以来的所有牌张。

Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Shakeup.oracleText: We're shaking Historic up with an additional banned list for this event only! For the full details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-historic-shakeup>here</link></u>.
Events/Event_Desc_Historic_Shakeup.translation: 我们将在本次活动中为史迹增加一份额外禁牌表！关于这一赛制的全部细节，包括禁牌表，请点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-historic-shakeup>这里</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_Holiday_2018.oracleText: Happy Holidays from the MTG Arena team! Bring your deck of only commons and enjoy the winter scenery as you play!
Events/Event_Desc_Holiday_2018.translation: 万智牌竞技场全体同仁恭祝佳节愉快！利用事先组好之的套牌（仅含普通牌）进行对战，尽情欣赏全新假日对战桌面！

Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Your draft pod will contain other players. To celebrate the launch of Player Draft, all players may play in one Premier Draft Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths without paying entry!
Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Comp_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 你的轮抽组中包含其他玩家。为庆祝真人轮抽的推出，所有玩家都可以参加竞技轮抽依克黎：巨兽时空，无需付费！

Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Quick_Draft.oracleText:
Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Quick_Draft.translation:
每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Trad_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_IKO_Trad_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_Invitational_Celebrati.oracleText: Tune into the MTG Arena Mythic Invitational this weekend (March 28 - 31), where 64 players compete for $1 million in prizes. Follow all the action at http://twitch.tv/magic and play while you watch! You can win Chemister's Insight and Skewer the Critics card styles.
Events/Event_Desc_Invitational_Celebrati.translation: 本周末（3月28日至31日）收看MGTA秘稀邀请赛，64名玩家将争夺100万美元的奖金。关注 http://twitch.tv/magic 上的所有动态，边看边玩！你可以赢得*化学师的洞察*和*遏止倒彩*的卡牌样式。

Events/Event_Desc_Jump_In.oracleText: Welcome to the world of MTG Arena! Here you can explore popular cards and strategies, and maybe even find a new favorite. It's time to Jump In! When you join this event, you will get to select two different half-decks from a variety of themes in Alchemy. Combine them, and you'll have a deck that's ready to go. Play as much as you want here, or use the cards to build new decks for other modes - they're yours to keep! Resign at any time if you wish to rejoin and pick new packets. You will have to pay the entry again, but you will keep all cards from the decks you choose.
Events/Event_Desc_Jump_In.translation: 欢迎来到万智牌竞技场的世界！在这里，你可以探索流行的卡牌和策略，甚至可以找到新的最爱。是时候加入了！ 当你参加这个活动时，你将可以从炼金术的各种主题中选择两个不同的半套牌。将它们结合起来，你就会有一套可以使用的套牌。在这里，你可以碎心所欲地玩，或者用这些卡牌为其它模式建立新的套牌--它们都是你的。 如果你想重新加入并挑选新的主题包，可以在任何时候退出。你需要重新支付参赛门票，但之前选择的套牌中的所有卡牌均会保留。

Events/Event_Desc_Jump_In_LTR.oracleText: Ready to start playing The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth on MTG Arena? You can explore different strategies while playing and collecting cards from this new set. When you join this event, you will get to select two different half-decks from a variety of themes. They'll be combined and you will have a deck ready to go. Play as much as you want here, or use the cards to build new decks for other modes - they're yours to keep! Resign at any time if you wish to rejoin and pick new packets. You will have to pay the entry again, but you will keep all cards from the decks you choose. "The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater." – Haldir (Book 1, pg 349)
Events/Event_Desc_Jump_In_LTR.translation: Ready to start playing The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth on MTG Arena? You can explore different strategies while playing and collecting cards from this new set. When you join this event, you will get to select two different half-decks from a variety of themes. They'll be combined and you will have a deck ready to go. Play as much as you want here, or use the cards to build new decks for other modes - they're yours to keep! Resign at any time if you wish to rejoin and pick new packets. You will have to pay the entry again, but you will keep all cards from the decks you choose. "The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater." – Haldir (Book 1, pg 349)

Events/Event_Desc_Jumpstart_J21.oracleText: Welcome to Jumpstart: Historic Horizons! When you join this event, you will get to select two different half-decks from a variety of themes inspired by Magic's history and the Modern Horizons sets. Combine them, and you'll have a deck that's ready to go! You'll keep all the cards from your deck, and you can play with it as much as you want. Resign at any time if you wish to rejoin and pick new packets. You will have to pay the entry again, but you can also earn all rewards again as well.
Events/Event_Desc_Jumpstart_J21.translation: 欢迎来到速战：史迹新篇！ 当你加入此赛事时，你可以从发源于万智牌历史的各种主题，以及摩登新篇主题中选择两个不同的「半套牌」补充包，将它们混合起来，你就有一副可以立刻开玩的套牌了！这些牌会全数加入你的收藏，并且你想玩几局都可以！ 如果你想重选新的主题包，你可以随时退出赛事。你需要重新支付入场费，但你也可以再次获得各种奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Jumpstart_M21.oracleText: Welcome to Jumpstart, where dinosaurs roam above the clouds and spellcasting dogs run free! When you join this event, you will get to select two different half-decks from a variety of themes. Combine them, and you'll have a deck that's ready to go! You'll keep all the cards from your deck, including the special basic land styles for each theme. Resign at any time if you wish to rejoin and pick new packets. You will have to pay the entry again, but you can also earn all rewards again as well.
Events/Event_Desc_Jumpstart_M21.translation: 欢迎来到速战 当你加入此赛事时，你可以从发源于万智牌历史的各种主题中选择两个不同的「半套牌」补充包，将它们混合起来，你就有一副可以立刻开玩的套牌了！你将保留你套牌中的所有牌，包括每个主题的特殊基本地样式。 如果你想重选新的主题包，你可以随时退出赛事。你需要重新支付入场费，但你也可以再次获得各种奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_KTK_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Abzan Counters Each creature you add to your army makes the others stronger. Use Outlast to buff your creatures and overrun your opponent! Jeskai Spellcast Redirect your opponent and use their own overextension against them. Cast spells to play tricks and make powerful threats out of your small creatures. Sultai Graveyard Get ahead of the curve by stocking your graveyard and recycling it into large creatures and impactful spells. The cycle of life and death is as inevitable as your victory! Mardu Warriors Ride with the Horde and go aggro! Attack to trigger your Raid bonuses and buff all your creatures to finish your opponent in one shot. Temur Behemoths Overwhelm your opponent with huge creatures hiding just out of sight. Plus, your ferocious beasts enhance your other spells to stomp all over the enemy.

Events/Event_Desc_LCI_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Oltec Ingenuity Buy time with blockers, removal, and lifegain while you assemble an array of wondrous artifacts to take over the late game. Echoes of the Dead Set up to block while you fill your graveyard, then drag your opponent into the deep end with high-cost creatures, card draw, and recursive threats. Going Down! Keep your creatures growing by attacking viciously to make your opponent block or throwing permanents into the graveyard yourself. Then keep them down with creature removal. Dinosaurs of the Sun Empire Summon gigantic dinosaurs to crush the opposition, supporting them with ways to make more mana or break through blockers. Malamet Tactics Keep the pressure on with low-cost creatures. When your opponent tries to set up a defense, it's time to pounce by powering up your forces. Dusk Legion Pilgrimage Sacrifice little creatures and artifacts for the glory of Aclazotz (and additional resources). Once you smell blood, seal their fate with a few larger creatures. Pirates' Plunder Set sail with a rowdy crew and their haul of Equipment and Treasure. When those landlubbers try to stop you, fly over the top or throw their blockers overboard. Fungal Festering Muck up the battlefield with sticky creatures while you fill your graveyard. Once you've descended enough to power your side up, start grinding your way through the opposing blockers. Thousand-Moon Legion Launch your military campaign with lots of small creatures and artifacts, then tactically tap those resources to activate your forces and rout the invaders. River Herald Expedition Go exploring to stock your side with lands and powerful creatures, then sink your extra mana into activated abilities and card draw to drown the opposition in value.
Events/Event_Desc_LCI_Premier_Draft.translation: 从传递中的轮抽补充包中一次选一张牌。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑一套40张的套牌。进行游戏并基于你的胜场获得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 欧尔特克智谋 通过阻挡者、去除和生命回复拖延时间，借机集结神器大军在游戏后期出奇制胜。 亡者回响 设防阻挡并借机填坟，再通过高费生物、抽牌手段和无尽威胁将对手拖入深渊。 给我倒下！ 通过猛烈地进攻迫使对手阻挡或自己将永久物扔入坟场让你的生物逐步膨胀，再不断使用去除击倒对手的生物。 烈阳帝国恐龙大军 召唤巨型恐龙压垮对手并通过产出更多法术力或突破阻挡者的手段支援它们。 豹族计策 通过低费生物持续制造压力。对手试图构筑防线之时即是你膨胀军队猛扑之际。 暮影军团朝圣 牺牲小生物和神器来重现阿洛佐兹的荣光（并获取额外资源）。一旦你闻到敌人的鲜血，用更强大的生物了结他们的性命。 海盗劫掠 带领一批残暴的船员和他们抢来的武器和财宝扬帆启航。当那些航海菜鸟试图挡你去路时，飞过他们头顶或直接把他们的阻挡者扔下海。 真菌溃烂 将黏糊糊的生物铺满战场并借机填坟。一旦你已落坟足够多次以强大你的阵线，那就开始逐步蚕食突破对手的阻挡者吧。 千月军团 通过大量小生物和神器开展你的军事行动，然后策略性地横置那些资源以激活你的军队并击溃入侵者。 川流使探险队 进行勘察为你的阵线积累土地和强大生物，然后将你额外的法术力投入起动式异能和抓牌来赚取价值淹没对手。

Events/Event_Desc_LCI_Quick_Draft_Emblem.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers Chimil, the Inner Sun is a source of great power and reverence for the Oltec in Ixalan's core. In its light, you feel an immense surge of power. Chimil, the Inner Sun emblem: "At the beginning of your end step, discover 5."
Events/Event_Desc_LCI_Quick_Draft_Emblem.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间 内阳奇密理是依夏兰世界核心中的强大力量源也是欧尔特克人的信仰。在它的光芒中，你会感受到无穷无尽的力量 内阳奇密理徽记：「在你的结束步骤开始时，倾探5。」

Events/Event_Desc_LTR_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players "Draw Two" Humans Defend the citadel ! Drawing two cards every turn will ensure you never run out of reinforcements. Amass Control Grow a massive Orc Army , then wield Saruman's mighty suite of spells to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Amass Aggro The forces of Mordor will rush out of your hands and through the enemy's defenses with this aggressive strategy, sacrificing themselves for the glory of Sauron. Power Matters The wilds of Middle-earth™ are home to many of its strongest denizens, such as Ents, Trolls, and the noble Rangers. Use them to overwhelm your opponent with great numbers. Food Never underestimate a Hobbit! This low-to-the-ground aggressive deck uses Food tokens for a lot more than the occasional second-refreshment. Tokens From earthen Treasures to soaring Spirits and everything in-between, this strategy revolves around going wide and eventually overwhelming the opponent. Spells Draw on the knowledge and magic of Middle-earth's most powerful Wizards to cast a stream of increasingly impressive instants and sorceries. Sacrifice Repurpose and recycle your creatures to summon a frightening assortment of terrors, including the Nazgûl and their Fell Beasts. Go-Wide Humans Answer the call and charge into battle! These Humans combine to create a force capable of slicing through any foe. Scry Elvish magic offers you a glimpse at many possible futures. Choose wisely and you'll find victory waiting at the top of your deck.

Events/Event_Desc_Ladder.oracleText: Standard uses cards only from recent sets. Results will affect your Constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Ladder.translation: 标准模式只使用最近发售的几个系列的卡牌。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Limited_Ladder.oracleText: Results will affect your Limited rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Limited_Ladder.translation: 对局结果会影响你的限制赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Limited_Traditional.oracleText: Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding.
Events/Event_Desc_Limited_Traditional.translation: 进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。

Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR1.oracleText: Part I is Momir. No deck required, we'll provide a deck for you to play consisting of basic lands and the 36 WAR planeswalkers! Ravnica. City of Guilds. Anything and everything can be found on this worldwide cityscape. Grand halls, decrepit slums and ancient ruins are interwoven amid the maze of streets, bustling markets and shadowy back alleys. For the citizens of Ravnica, intrigue and opportunity are abundant as the ten ruling guilds vie for power, wealth, and influence. Balanced on the edge of a precarious peace, the city grew and flourished... until the Planar Bridge opens, unleashing death and destruction.
Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR1.translation: 第I部分为「莫秘维」。无需事先构筑套牌，游戏会为牌手备好一副包含基本地和36位火花之战鹏洛客的套牌！ 拉尼卡。公会城。天下景观齐聚这座世界性的城市。巨大厅堂、破旧的贫民窟及古老的遗迹在拉尼卡错综复杂的街道、繁华的闹市与阴暗的陋巷中交织。拉尼卡的十个公会彼此争夺着力量、财富和权力，对于拉尼卡的居民来说，这是一个到处是阴谋和机会的世界。城市在脆弱又来之不易的和平中发展壮大…直到时空渡桥开启，将死亡与毁灭引入这里。

Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR2.oracleText: Part II is Pauper. Bring a deck using only commons! Persistent Petitioners is banned. As the Dreadhorde army advances, Planeswalkers from across the blind eternities answer the call for aid. Some come willingly, aware of Nicol Bolas's schemes and what it means for the multiverse if he were to succeed. Others are simply drawn by the inexplicable power of the interplanar beacon. But this is all according to Nicol Bolas's plan. With the Immortal Sun now on Ravnica, any planeswalkers who sets foot onto Ravnica find themselves unable to leave.
Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR2.translation: 第II部分为「纯普」。使用事先组好的套牌参赛，但该套牌仅能以「普通」稀有度牌张组成。执着诉愿人在此赛制中禁用。 随着震惧军的大肆行进，来自黑暗虚空的鹏洛客们纷纷回应了求救的信号。有些鹏洛客早已察觉到尼可波拉斯的计划及其对多重宇宙的危害，所以甘愿前往。另一些鹏洛客则只是被跨时空信标的奇妙力量吸引而来。但这些都是尼可波拉斯计划的一部分。随着永生圣阳现身拉尼卡，任何踏足此世界的鹏洛客都发现自己无法脱身离去。

Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR3.oracleText: Part III is Singleton. Bring a deck with no more than one copy of any card (other than basic lands). An alternate "London" mulligan rule will be used for this event. Across Ravnica, the districts are mobilizing to confront the Elder Dragon. United behind a common cause native Ravnicans begin the counterattack, unleashing powerful weapons and champions of their own against the Eternals. Others set their eyes on Bolas, intent on storming his citadel and bringing him down. But as a magical flare rises from the dragon's throne, the Planeswalkers on Ravnica learn exactly what Bolas has planned for them...
Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR3.translation: 第III部分为「无双」。使用事先组好的套牌进行对局，但该套牌中每种牌至多只能有一张（基本地除外）。本赛事将采用新的「伦敦」再调度规则。 拉尼卡各城区齐心动员共抗长老龙。拉尼卡本地居民同仇敌忾，拿出强力武器、派出精兵良将反击永生者。其他人则意欲直取波拉斯，打算猛攻尊殿而将他一举击败。但看到巨龙王座上一道魔法亮光闪过，拉尼卡上的鹏洛客仿佛已经知道波拉斯为其安排的下场为何…

Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR4.oracleText: Part IV is Counters. Bring a deck with cards this emblem will put a lot of counters on! The Elderspell has been cast. The dreadhorde continues its advance, further empowered as the God-Eternals enter the fray. Time is running out, as are the options. With each failure, Nicol Bolas grows stronger, as each Spark consumed serves to fuel his ascension to godhood. The endgame has begun.
Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR4.translation: 第IV部分为「指示物」。使用事先组好的套牌参赛，不过这个徽记会让你牌上的指示物满溢，因此请务必留意能与之互动的牌张！ 波拉斯施放了至尊咒。震惧军继续前进，而永生煞神参战令他们更加势不可挡。时间所剩无多，方法也越来越少。每次失败都让波拉斯更加强大，而每颗收下的火花也让波拉斯更显神格。终局将至。

Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR5.oracleText: Part V is Ravnica. Bring your deck with only cards from Guilds of Ravnica, Ravnica Allegiance, and War of the Spark! Gates Ablaze is banned. For over a hundred years, everything had led to this moment. Every battle, every betrayal, every death. By serving Nicol Bolas, Liliana would finally remain at the height of her power – forever. But serving Nicol Bolas for eternity was not a life worth living. As Liliana Vess prepares herself for death, an old friend makes a sacrifice of his own, giving Liliana the strength and time needed to bring down Nicol Bolas once and for all.
Events/Event_Desc_Lore_WAR5.translation: 第V部分为「拉尼卡」。使用事先组好的套牌参赛，但该牌套仅限利用出自烽会拉尼卡、效忠拉尼卡和火花之战这三个系列的牌张组成。城门失火在此赛事中禁用。 这一百多年以来的一切都引向这一时刻。所有的战斗，所有的背叛，所有的死亡。莉莲娜原本以为，效忠波拉斯就将自身力量始终保持巅峰～直到永远。但永生效忠波拉斯，却会让自己的命途黯淡无光。正当莉莲娜准备拥抱死亡之时，一位旧友挺身而出，甘愿牺牲自己让莉莲娜有足够的时间积攒力量，一举彻底击溃波拉斯。

Events/Event_Desc_M19_Cascade_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs, but with a twist: The first spell you cast each turn will first have you reveal cards from the top of your library until you find a card with a lower converted mana cost. You can cast that card without paying its mana cost. Two spells for the price of one! You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_M19_Cascade_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。但这次有些不一样：你每回合施放的第一个咒语会先从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值比它低的牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。付一得二！你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_M19_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_M19_Comp_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。你所选择的牌张会加入你的收藏，且你会用你抽到的这些牌加上基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌参赛。不断进行对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_M19_Omniscience_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs, but with a twist: Spells don't cost any mana! Keep the lands out of your deck, you don't need them. Your starting hand size is 3.  You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! (Note that activated abilities and other mana payments function normally.)
Events/Event_Desc_M19_Omniscience_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。但这次有些不一样：咒语无需费用即可施放！套牌中不必加入地，你已不需要它们。你的起始手牌数量为3。  你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！（请注意：起动式异能和其他需要支付法术力才能办到的事情仍会正常作用。）

Events/Event_Desc_M19_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Note: This set is not legal in Standard.
Events/Event_Desc_M19_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_M19_Quick_Draft_Explor.oracleText: In Exploration, Magic's rules are changed: You can play two lands per turn, your starting hand size is nine, and you have no maximum hand size! Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_M19_Quick_Draft_Explor.translation: 「探险」玩法的万智牌规则略有不同：你每个回合可以使用两个地，你的起始手牌数量为九，且没有手牌上限！14张牌的补充包将在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。你所选择的牌张会加入你的收藏，且你会用你抽到的这些牌加上基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌参赛。不断进行对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_M19_StressTest_Draft.oracleText: A special event for our July 20 stress test, this event has the same rewards as Quick Draft, but only requires half the normal entry to join! Draft cards using 15-card draft packs and build a 40-card deck to battle others. You'll receive rewards based on how many wins you earn and you get to keep all the cards you choose! Keep playing until you reach seven wins or three losses.
Events/Event_Desc_M19_StressTest_Draft.translation: 作为7月20日压力测试的特别活动，本赛事的奖励跟快速轮抽赛相同，但报名费减半！用15张牌的补充包进行轮抽，精心挑选牌张，构筑一副40张的套牌与其他牌手对战。最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励，而且所抽选的牌都归你所有！持续游戏，直到取得七胜或三败为止。

Events/Event_Desc_M19_Treasure_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs, but with a twist: At the beginning of each of your turns, you'll get a Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color. Accelerate by one mana each turn, or save them up to cast an expensive spell in half the time! You'll keep all cards drafted, then play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win.
Events/Event_Desc_M19_Treasure_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。不过这次有些不一样：在你的每个回合开始时，你会获得一个珍宝衍生物，牺牲它可以产生一点任意颜色的法术力。你可以每回合都用它来加速一点法术力，也可以把它们都留起来提前施放大型咒语！你所有抽到的牌都归你所有，不断进行对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_M20_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_M20_Comp_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行三盘两胜制的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_M20_Omniscience_Draft.oracleText: In Omniscience Draft, draft three packs and keep the cards you draft, but with a twist: You don't have to pay the mana costs for spells you cast! No need to put lands in your deck. You'll also get one mana of each color each turn to use for abilities, and every player starts with three cards in their hand instead of seven.
Events/Event_Desc_M20_Omniscience_Draft.translation: 在「全知全能轮抽」中，依然是利用三包补充包进行轮抽，且你所抽到的牌张都会加入你的收藏，不过有些不一样：牌张不需法术力费用即可施放！套牌中不再需要留出地牌位置，你的法术力池中每个回合都会加入每种颜色各一点的法术力，供你起动异能之用，同时每位牌手的起始手牌数量改为三张（而非原本的七张）。

Events/Event_Desc_M20_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_M20_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励，另外当你第一次获得7胜时，还将获得铁根军头卡牌样式！ 人机轮抽 - 与AI机器人轮抽对抗，无需等待，也无需选择计时器

Events/Event_Desc_M20_Quick_Draft_Alt2.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win, plus a Ironroot Warlord card style the first time you get to 7 wins!
Events/Event_Desc_M20_Quick_Draft_Alt2.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励，另外当你第一次获得7胜时，还将获得铁根军头卡牌样式！

Events/Event_Desc_M21_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_M21_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_M21_Quick_Draft.oracleText:
Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_M21_Quick_Draft.translation:
每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_M21_Trad_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_M21_Trad_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_MAT_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Knights Knights have assembled from around the multiverse! Keeping a steady supply of these gallant creatures will help press your advantage each turn. Graveyard Mill everyone. Your forces will improve with more strategies and greater power as each graveyard fills. Sacrifice Desperate times call for desperate measures. Sacrifice your artifacts and creatures to pave a path to victory. Battles Get ready to liberate your favorite plane from the Phyrexians! Prioritize Battles, Magic's newest card type, and smash through opposing defenses to save the day. +1/+1 Counters It's time to buff up! Arm your creatures with +1/+1 counters to outclass the opposition. Phyrexian Looking to play the villain? Seek out Phyrexians of all sorts to take advantage of them and their swarms of little hatching Incubator tokens. Convoke Your creatures are here to help withstand the invasion. Build an army early and they'll help you cast powerful spells with convoke. Incubate Go big and generate tons of mana to play bigger creatures and incubate larger tokens. Backup Find a good partner and tag-team those Phyrexians. Use the backup mechanic to find the right combination of abilities to build toward your victory each turn. Transform Life is always more fun with some change. Take your cards to the next level by winning battles and turning Incubator tokens and creatures into their Phyrexian selves.

Events/Event_Desc_MID_Sealed.oracleText: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is Midnight Hunt Sealed: Open six packs and add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, then play against other players as much as you want. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events HERE.
Events/Event_Desc_MID_Sealed.translation: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is Midnight Hunt Sealed: Open six packs and add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, then play against other players as much as you want. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events HERE.

Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_MID_Trad_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Arm your creatures with +1/+1 counters to outclass the opposition. Phyrexian Looking to play the villain? Seek out Phyrexians of all sorts to take advantage of them and their swarms of little hatching Incubator tokens. Convoke Your creatures are here to help withstand the invasion. Build an army early and they'll help you cast powerful spells with convoke. Incubate Go big and generate tons of mana to play bigger creatures and incubate larger tokens. Backup Find a good partner and tag-team those Phyrexians. Use the backup mechanic to find the right combination of abilities to build toward your victory each turn. Transform Life is always more fun with some change. Take your cards to the next level by winning battles and turning Incubator tokens and creatures into their Phyrexian selves.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_3Sets.oracleText: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! Events/Event_Desc_MWM_3Sets.translation: 欢迎来到周中万智牌！每周尝试一个不同的方式来游玩万智牌竞技场！ 本周活动是剑走偏锋：使用 艾卓仙踪, 邪军压境 包括 邪军压境: 终战回响 和 依夏兰迷窟. 这三个标准系列，构筑一套60张的套牌。你需要尖端的策略来取得胜利！ 了解有关本次万智牌周中活动以及即将举行的周中万智牌活动的更多详细信息HERE.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_BRO_BotDraft.translation: 欢迎来到周中万智牌！每周尝试一个不同的方式来游玩万智牌竞技场！ 本周活动是兄弟之战快速轮抽: 从轮换的卡包中一次选择一张卡牌，与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也无选牌时间限制。 添加基本地以组成 40 张牌的牌组，并随心所欲地与其他玩家对战。 这是一个幻影活动。你所抓取的牌张不会添加到你的收藏当中。 了解有关本次魔术周中活动以及即将举行的周中万智牌活动的更多详细信息HERE.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_SIR_Sealed.oracleText: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered Sealed: Open six packs and add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, then play against other players as much as you want. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. This Week's Shadows of the Past: Fatal Flashback! Click Here to Learn More about the rotating Shadows of the Past in Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered Limited Events! Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events HERE. Haunting Spirits Establish a ghostly presence as you take to the skies with Spirits and other unlikely allies. Relentless Zombies Destroy enemy creatures with removal spells, reload your hand with card draw, and march on with a horde of Zombies. Vampire Madness Your vampire army helps you to discard cards, cast spells for their madness costs, and secure victory. The key is striking the right balance between discard outlets and madness cards. Wolves Attack Transform your Werewolves with a combination of instants and activated abilities. Your outsized creatures will overrun your opponents in no time. Super-Humans Stack up Auras and Equipment on your Humans to swing in for the kill with your larger-than-life creatures. Valuable Sacrifice Expendable resources are everywhere in white-black. Sacrifice creatures and pay life liberally for value. Spell Science Noncreature spells perform double duty here if you pick up enough creatures that reward you for playing them. Graveyard Shift Stock your graveyard to get extra value from powerful delirium cards. Your deck will just need a wide variety of card types to turn it on. Righteous Fury Run down your opponent with cheap, powerful threats and well-timed combat tricks. Let's Investigate Play defense while you build up a supply of Clues. You'll soon learn enough to overwhelm your opponent with card advantage and large monsters.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_SNC_BotDraft.oracleText: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is Streets of New Capenna Bot Draft: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs against AI with no waiting and no pick timers. Add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, and play against other players as much as you want. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events HERE. The Five Families The Obscura: Craft the perfect draws and use superior intelligence over a long game to engineer a route to victory. Use the family's connive mechanic to draw, then discard - giving your creatures +1/+1 counters along the way! The Maestros: Hire expendable underlings as your family's muscle on the streets. Then use the casualty mechanic to sacrifice those minions, copy your spells, and blast your opponent. The Riveteers: The Riveteers rumble with large creatures. Give your creatures haste with the blitz mechanic, then sacrifice them at the end of your turn to draw a card. Keep that pressure up! Then press your advantage to crush your opponents. The Cabaretti: Flood the board with tokens and small creatures to overwhelm the opposition. The family knows how to collaborate for greater gain: alliance abilities give you additional effects whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control. The Brokers: The Brokers are always ready to take down your opponents one notch at a time. Attack relentlessly to deal small amounts of damage, and mount an impenetrable defense - legal or otherwise! - by amassing shield counters on your creatures.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_UltimateShowdown20.oracleText: For years, the different player types have lived together in harmony. But today, everything changes. Today, it's time to stop being polite and start learning the empirically correct, clearly superior, and unambiguously best way to play the game. But who will reign supreme? Will it be Timmy, master of monsters? Johnny, the ingenious inventor? Cutthroat card-slinger Spike? Or perhaps the lore-loving Vorthos? Each of these iconic archetypes has brought their own deck to this contest, and we've ripped the mana costs off so they can get right down to business. Welcome to the Ultimate Showdown! In this Omniscience event, each deck brings the essence of a player archetype to the table. Play as much as you want and change decks whenever you like. And if you find the archetype that truly speaks to your soul, you can add their avatar and sleeve to your collection in the Store!
Events/Event_Desc_MWM_UltimateShowdown20.translation: 多年来，不同类型的玩家和谐共处。但今天，一切都变了。今天，是时候停止客气，开始学习经验上正确的、明显优越的、毫不含糊的最佳游戏方式了。 但谁将统治至高无上？会是怪物大师蒂米吗？天才发明家强尼？残酷的卡牌投掷者斯派克？或者也许是热爱绝杀的沃尔托斯？这些标志性的原型都带来了他们自己的卡组参加这次比赛，而且我们已经取消了法力成本，所以他们可以直接开展业务了。欢迎来到终极对决！ 在这个全知全能的赛事中，每一副牌都会将一个玩家原型的精髓带到桌上。想玩多少就玩多少，想换牌就换牌。如果你找到了真正与你的灵魂对话的原型，你可以在商店里把他们的头像和牌套添加到你的收藏中！

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_WOEConstructed.translation: 欢迎来到周中万智牌！每周尝试一个不同的方式来游玩万智牌竞技场！ 本周活动是 艾卓仙踪 构筑: 带上一副 60 张卡片，其中仅包含最新系列的卡牌，并展示您对新牌的理解！ 了解有关本次魔术周中活动以及即将举行的周中万智牌活动的更多详细信息 HERE.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_WOE_Sealed.oracleText: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is Wilds of Eldraine Sealed: Open six packs and add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, then play against other players as much as you want. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events HERE.
Events/Event_Desc_MWM_WOE_Sealed.translation: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is Wilds of Eldraine Sealed: Open six packs and add basic lands to make a 40-card deck, then play against other players as much as you want. This event is phantom. Cards you draft are not added to your collection. Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events HERE.

Events/Event_Desc_MWM_WorldsShowcase.oracleText: Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena! This week's event is the Standard decks from this year's Worlds competitors! Choose a player and deck from among Magic's best, then catch them in action during World Championship XXVII this Friday through Sunday! Find out everything you need to know right here. You can receive a code for a Midweek Magic Promo Pack containing two cosmetic items when you share your results with your local game store. Find out how HERE. *Note: While supplies last. Not all stores are participating.

Not all stores are participating.

Events/Event_Desc_MadScience_VOW.oracleText: This was never the plan. The machine was intended to capture energy from spellcasting so it could be reused, put to better purpose. Creating zombies bent to your will was not the purpose you had in mind - but then again, who's to say it's not a better one after all? Think of the good you could do, the recognition you could earn, the doubters who who would finally eat those words...or be eaten, if necessary... In this event, your Alchemy deck will let you show them all! When you cast an instant or sorcery, you will create a Zombie Army token based on its mana value. The more spells you cast, the larger your creation will grow, until your legion covers the countryside! When your mad rampage comes to an end, you'll receive Eternal Night card styles from Innistrad: Crimson Vow. There are 12 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles your experiments can uncover, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Magic30_Premier_Draft.oracleText: This weekend, we conclude the yearlong celebration of Magic's 30th anniversary! MTG Arena is getting in on the action with Mixed-Up Draft, featuring mixed-together cards from many different sets in every pack. All players who enter will receive a special sleeve, and then you'll show down with cards from all across the game's history! Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_Magic30_Premier_Draft.translation: This weekend, we conclude the yearlong celebration of Magic's 30th anniversary! MTG Arena is getting in on the action with Mixed-Up Draft, featuring mixed-together cards from many different sets in every pack. All players who enter will receive a special sleeve, and then you'll show down with cards from all across the game's history! Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players

Events/Event_Desc_ManaLink_Draft.oracleText:
In Mana Link Draft, draft three packs and keep the cards you draft like normal, but there are some new rules. First, you will receive a land token automatically each turn. Second, you can cast any number of spells that you have enough lands to afford.

Will you stay low to the ground and flood the board once you hit three lands? Or defend yourself enough to hit those expensive cards that will take control of the game? You can even still play lands from your hand to further accelerate yourself, but risk running out of action later on. You'll start with fewer cards and less life than normal, so be ready to jump right into the fray!

Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_ManaLink_Draft.translation:
在法力链接轮抽中，像往常一样轮抽三包并持有你轮抽的牌，但有一些新规则。首先，你将每回合自动收到一个地衍生物。其次，你可以施放任何数量的咒语，只要你有足够的地能负担得起。

你会一直保持低姿态，一旦打出三张地就淹没战场？还是积极防御，打出那些高法术力的牌来控制游戏？你甚至还可以从你的手牌中打出地来进一步加快自己的速度，但却要冒着以后无法行动的风险。你的开局手牌和开场生命值都会比正常情况下少，所以要准备好直接战斗吧!

每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_Metagame_Challenge.oracleText: Bring your Standard deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive rewards based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Metagame_Challenge.translation: 使用标准构筑套牌与对手进行三盘两胜的对局！最后根据胜局数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Momir.oracleText: Each turn, click on Momir on the left side of your battlefield, pay X mana, and discard a card to create a random token copy of a creature from all of MTG Arena with mana value X. No deck required, we'll provide a deck of 12 copies each of the five basic lands. Give in to Momir's Madness, won't you?
Events/Event_Desc_Momir.translation: 在每个回合中，你都可以点击位于战场左侧的莫秘维，支付X点法术力并弃一张牌，游戏便会从万智牌竞技场所有法术力值为X的生物当中随机挑选一个，为你派出该生物之复制品衍生物。无需事先构筑套牌，游戏会为备好一副每种基本地各12张的套牌。你会不会屈从于莫秘维的疯狂呢？

Events/Event_Desc_Momir_PW.oracleText: In this event, we'll provide a deck for you to play consisting of basic lands and planeswalkers. Use the Momir emblem to generate creature tokens. You can cast planeswalkers normally as spells, or discard them to activate the Momir emblem.
Events/Event_Desc_Momir_PW.translation: 在本次赛事中，我们将提供一套由基本地和鹏洛客组成的套牌供你使用。使用莫秘维徽记来生成衍生生物。你可以以咒语形式正常施放鹏洛客，或弃掉它们来启动莫秘维徽记。

Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl.oracleText: Join this event to play any number of Brawl games until the event ends. The following cards are banned in Brawl: Oko, Thief of Crowns Sorcerous Spyglass Note: This event ends on January 16, 2020 at 20:00 UTC.
Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl.translation: Join this event to play any number of Brawl games until the event ends. The following cards are banned in Brawl: Oko, Thief of Crowns Sorcerous Spyglass Note: This event ends on January 16, 2020 at 20:00 UTC.

Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_CraftHis.oracleText: Until this event ends, the card awarded for your first win can't be crafted and is only legal in MTG: Arena Brawl and Direct Challenge. Afterward, it can be crafted and will be playable in Historic, as well as MTG: Arena Brawl.
Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_CraftHis.translation: 在此赛事结束之前，你无法制作首胜获得的卡牌，这些卡牌仅在MTGA争锋和直接对战中有效。赛事结束之后，首胜获得的卡牌可以被制作出来并可以在史迹以及MTGA争锋中游玩。

Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_CraftHis.oracleText: The card awarded for your first win is playable in Historic, and MTG: Arena Brawl. The card can also be crafted.
Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_CraftHis.translation: 首胜获得的卡牌可以被制作出来，并可以在史迹以及MTGA争锋中游玩。

Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_NoCountd.oracleText: Join this event to play as many Brawl games as you would like until the event ends on January 31, 2020 at 16:00 UTC.
Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_NoCountd.translation: Join this event to play as many Brawl games as you would like until the event ends on January 31, 2020 at 16:00 UTC.

Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_Rotation.oracleText: The card will remain legal in Brawl in MTG: Arena indefinitely.
Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_Rotation.translation: 这张牌在MTGA争锋中将无限期可用。

Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_Rotation.oracleText: It will rotate out of Brawl when Standard rotates in Fall 2021.
Events/Event_Desc_Monthly_Brawl_Rotation.translation: 当标准在 2021 年秋季轮换时，它将轮换出争锋。

Events/Event_Desc_NBL_Historic.oracleText:
Create a Historic deck using the most powerful cards on MTG Arena! After the last No Banned List Historic Event, we wanted to see what a few adjustments would do.  For details check out this week's <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/mtg-arena/mtg-arena-announcements-october-30-2023#historicevent>Arena Announcements</link></u>!

This event is All-Access, meaning you can even use cards outside of your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_NBL_Historic.translation:
使用MTGA上最强力的单卡构组一套史记套牌！在最后一次无禁史记活动结束后，我们计划对史记的禁牌表做些改动。详情请看<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/mtg-arena/mtg-arena-announcements-october-30-2023#historicevent>MTGA公告</link></u>！

这是一个全卡活动，你可以使用不在你收藏当中的牌张。

The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players

Events/Event_Desc_NeonArcade_NEO.oracleText: The Neon Arcade is the hottest spot for the best players in the city. Are you a whiz at pinball? A fighting-game master? A hero of jukebox dance-offs? No matter your play style, this is where you can turn that skill into ultimate gaming glory. So drop in your coin, rack up all the points you can, and shoot for the stars! Bring a Singleton deck and try to set a new high score! Each time you cast a spell that's bigger than you've cast before, you'll get a Treasure token that can help push you even higher. When your credits are finally spent, you'll score Soft Glow styles from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty. There are 20 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available in the arcade, click here.

No matter your play style, this is where you can turn that skill into ultimate gaming glory. So drop in your coin, rack up all the points you can, and shoot for the stars! Bring a Singleton deck and try to set a new high score! Each time you cast a spell that's bigger than you've cast before, you'll get a Treasure token that can help push you even higher. For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available in the arcade, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_NewHistoric.oracleText: Seeing the maturation of the Historic format over time has been exciting, but we recently got to thinking. Have we lost sight of what got us here in the first place? Is this truly honoring the historical traditions of Magic? Not exactly, but it could! It's time to take Historic back to how things were really meant to be. In the olden days, decks could be as small as 40 cards! And you could play as many of a card as you wanted, not just four! And there weren't any banned cards to worry about! Doesn't that sound great? This is such an obviously great way to play, we've even enabled All Access so that everyone can participate. We're still debating the fate of existing "Old Historic" queues and events, but in the meantime, enjoy the new look of Historic here. Have fun! Build a 40-card deck with no limit on copies of a card. Every card on MTG Arena is legal and available, whether it's in your collection or not. (Yes, even that card.) Play as much as you want!

Events/Event_Desc_ONE_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Artifacts Phyrexia is filled with glorious artifacts. Gather as many of these artifacts as you can to outmaneuver your opponent. Proliferate Control Use proliferate to spread the glory of Phyrexia—oil counters, poison counters, and loyalty counters are all ready to be proliferated. Oil Counters & Sacrifice All Phyrexians are valuable, even (and sometimes especially) in death. Use your creatures and artifacts to generate oil counters when they die. Oil Counters Midrange The more things with oil counters you have, the merrier. Use these oil counters to get the biggest, smashiest creatures you can. Toxic Aggro Take advantage of small toxic creatures, especially Mite tokens, to swarm your opponent. Corrupted Give your opponent three or more poison counters, then your corrupted cards become even more powerful. Oil Counters & Noncreature Spells Build up your oil counters and overwhelm your opponent by casting a variety of artifacts, enchantments, instants, sorceries, and yes, even planeswalkers! Poison Victory You have the biggest baddest creature with toxic. Use them to get your opponent to 10 poison counters. For Mirrodin! Equipment Someone's got to fight against the Phyrexians! Your rebels can use equipment to stave them off! Proliferate & Poison Two great tastes that go great together. Use green creatures with toxic to deal out serious poison counters, then proliferate to finish the job.
