Events/Event_Desc_Omniscience_Draft.oracleText: In Omniscience Draft, draft three packs and keep the cards you draft, but with a twist: You don't have to pay the mana costs for spells you cast! No need to put lands in your deck. You'll also get one mana of each color each turn to use for abilities, and every player starts with three cards in their hand instead of seven.
Events/Event_Desc_Omniscience_Draft.translation: 在「全知全能轮抽」中，依然是利用三包补充包进行轮抽，且你所抽到的牌张都会加入你的收藏，不过有些不一样：牌张不需法术力费用即可施放！套牌中不再需要留出地牌位置，你的法术力池中每个回合都会加入每种颜色各一点的法术力，供你起动异能之用，同时每位牌手的起始手牌数量改为三张（而非原本的七张）。

Events/Event_Desc_OutOfTheShadows.oracleText: She can't fool me. Night after night, I've heard her scuttling about in the gardens. I know she's out there, and I'm prepared. No ninja is going to surprise me! And see, now she's not even bothering to hide, just standing in the courtyard! And... there's another one under that archway. And one on the rooftop. And one in the den... I think I preferred when they were keeping to the gardens. Bring a 60-card Singleton deck that's light on its feet! When you deal combat damage to your opponent, a creature hiding in your hand will get +1/+1, and you'll be able to get the drop on your opponent with some instant-speed creatures. At the end of your run, disappear back into the shadows with Ninja showcase styles from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty. There are 12 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles hidden away at the hideout, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_OutOfTheShadows.translation: She can't fool me. Night after night, I've heard her scuttling about in the gardens. I know she's out there, and I'm prepared. No ninja is going to surprise me! And see, now she's not even bothering to hide, just standing in the courtyard! And... there's another one under that archway. And one on the rooftop. And one in the den... I think I preferred when they were keeping to the gardens. Bring a 60-card Singleton deck that's light on its feet! When you deal combat damage to your opponent, a creature hiding in your hand will get +1/+1, and you'll be able to get the drop on your opponent with some instant-speed creatures. At the end of your run, disappear back into the shadows with Ninja showcase styles from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty. There are 12 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles hidden away at the hideout, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Pandemonium.oracleText: In Pandemonium, whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield, this emblem deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls! If you like a world where creatures keep damaging each other, bring your deck, because this event is for you! Shapers' Sanctuary, Thorn Lieutenant, Polyraptor, and Tocatli Honor Guard are banned in this format.
Events/Event_Desc_Pandemonium.translation: 在「大混乱」玩法中，每当一个由你操控的生物进战场时，此徽记会向目标由对手操控的生物造成等同于前者力量的伤害！如果你喜欢生物不断互相伤害的世界，那就拿起套牌加入这一赛事吧！你一定会爱上它！本赛制中禁用塑形师庇护所、荆棘副官、多态迅猛龙和托卡特理仪队兵。

Events/Event_Desc_Pauper.oracleText: Build a 60-card constructed deck using only cards printed in MTG Arena as commons! Persistent Petitioners is banned in this format.
Events/Event_Desc_Pauper.translation: 只利用曾在万智牌竞技场中以「普通」稀有度登场的牌张，组出一副60张的构筑套牌。执着诉愿人在此赛制中禁用。

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation1_GuildBatt.oracleText: Pick your favorite guild event deck and battle it out with other guilds! Note: Event decks will not be added to your collection. _________________________________________________ You won't see a "Most Popular Plane in the Multiverse" without seeing Ravnica on the list! It's easy to see why this is a place that so many Planeswalkers love to return to. It's got city, city, and more city! Be sure to save up your zibs and zinos if you plan to check out the Tin Street Market!
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation1_GuildBatt.translation: 挑选最喜欢的公会赛事套牌，与其他公会对战！ 注：赛事套牌不会加入你的收藏。 ________________________________________________ 如果要有「多重宇宙最受欢迎时空」榜单，拉尼卡一定名列其中！而众多鹏洛客流连忘返于此的原因也显而易见：因为这里有城市、广阔的城市、漫无边际的城市！如果你打算去锡街市场逛逛，记得先攒好所需开销！

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation1_PreconPW.oracleText: Pick a planeswalker deck from Guilds of Ravnica, Ravnica Allegiance, or War of the Spark! You don't need to have collected the cards, nor will they be added to your collection. The deck you pick will be your deck throughout the event!
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation1_PreconPW.translation: 从烽会拉尼卡、效忠拉尼卡和火花之战这三个系列的鹏洛客套牌中挑选一副！你无需事先拥有这些牌张，而在赛事完成后所选套牌也不会加入你的收藏。你挑选的套牌就是你用于参加本次赛事的套牌！

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation2_Treasure.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, create an artifact Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color! _________________________________________________ Dinos, and pirates, and merfolk, oh my! These sun-soaked shores have so much to offer, from sunken ruins to golden cities. And treasure. Let's not forget about the treasure. So set sail under the Immortal Sun and be sure to explore everything this plane has to offer!
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation2_Treasure.translation: 在你的维持开始时，你都会派出一个能够牺牲来产生一点任意颜色法术力的珍宝衍生神器。 _________________________________________________ 恐龙、航海士、人鱼，天呐！从沉没废墟到黄金城，这阳光灿烂的海岸有太多东西值得一探究竟。还有宝藏。千万别忘了宝藏。在永生圣阳下扬帆远航，探索这个时空带来的无尽可能！

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation3_MoreBans.oracleText:
We're shaking Standard up! Play with the following cards banned:

White: Benalish Marshal; History of Benalia; Venerated Loxodon
Blue: Curious Obsession; Nexus of Fate
Black: Command the Dreadhorde
Red: Arclight Phoenix; Experimental Frenzy; Goblin Chainwhirler; Light Up the Stage; Rampaging Ferocidon; Rekindling Phoenix; Runaway Steam-Kin
Green: Nissa, Who Shakes the World; Wildgrowth Walker
Multicolored: Hydroid Krasis; Teferi, Hero of Dominaria; Teferi, Time Raveler; 	Thought Erasure
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation3_MoreBans.translation:
我们决定颠覆一下既有标准赛趋势！本赛事禁用以下牌张：

白色：宾纳里亚元帅；宾纳里亚史；景仰象族
蓝色：好奇求索；龙命连结点
黑色：统领震惧军
红色：弧光凤凰；实验性狂乱；舞链鬼怪；照亮舞台；莽闯暴猛龙；复焰凤凰；落跑汽身
绿色：撼世妮莎；野生行客
多色：水螅融合体；多明纳里亚英雄泰菲力；理时泰菲力；	抹消思绪

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation3_Singleton.oracleText: Bring a deck with no more than one copy of any card (other than basic lands). _________________________________________________ The memories you make here will last you a lifetime. But who needs a lifetime, when you could have an eternity? If the gods deem you worthy, the opportunity could be yours! Immortal glory awaits you beneath the suns of Amonkhet!
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation3_Singleton.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行对局，但该套牌中每种牌至多只能有一张（基本地除外）。 _________________________________________________ 这里经历会让你一世难忘。但比起获得永生来说，谁又会在乎一世呢？如果你能得到诸神认可，跻身豪英之列，你就有机会得享永生来世！阿芒凯双日当空，待你摘取永恒荣耀。

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation4_Shakeup.oracleText: Play Standard with the following cards banned: Benalish Marshal History of Benalia Curious Obsession Brineborn Cutthroat Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord Arclight Phoenix Goblin Chainwhirler Light Up the Stage Rekindling Phoenix Runaway Steam-Kin Nissa, Who Shakes the World Wildgrowth Walker Field of the Dead Teferi, Hero of Dominaria Teferi, Time Raveler Thought Erasure Feather, the Redeemed Hydroid Krasis Risen Reef _________________________________________________ Now this is the place where legends are born! If you want to make a name for yourself in the multiverse, Dominaria is definitely the place to start. Or destroy. Either way, your visit here is promised to be one for the history books!
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation4_Shakeup.translation: 本赛事禁用以下牌张： 宾纳里亚元帅 宾纳里亚史 好奇求索 海生割喉客 骄傲血领索霖 弧光凤凰 舞链鬼怪 照亮舞台 复焰凤凰 落跑汽身 撼世妮莎 野生行客 亡者旷野 多明纳里亚英雄泰菲力 理时泰菲力 抹消思绪 复耀飞羽 水螅融合体 醒转暗礁 _________________________________________________ 这里即是传奇诞生的地方！如果你想在多重宇宙中扬名立万，最好就是从多明纳里亚起步。或是将多明纳里亚终结。但无论怎样，你的到访注定会在史籍中添上浓墨重彩的一笔！

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation4_Singleton.oracleText: Bring a deck with no more than one copy of any card (other than basic lands).
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation4_Singleton.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行对局，但该套牌中每种牌至多只能有一张（基本地除外）。

Events/Event_Desc_Planecation5_Landfall.oracleText: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, get a small effect based off the top card of your library! _________________________________________________ Rock and roil, baby! With so much wild wonder, even the land seems alive. But the wildwood isn't the only thing stirring on this plane. This place is sure to awaken your adventurer's spirit, so pack accordingly!
Events/Event_Desc_Planecation5_Landfall.translation: 每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你都会获得一个小型效应，具体会根据你牌库顶牌来决定！ _________________________________________________ 岩石摇动，狂搅翻腾，大家摇滚起来！如此多样的蛮野奇迹，整个大地似乎都有了生机。但在这个时空中可不止有丛林在摇曳。这里定会唤醒你的探险精神，请务必收拾好行装！

Events/Event_Desc_Play.oracleText: Standard uses cards only from recent sets.
Events/Event_Desc_Play.translation: 标准模式只使用最近发售的几个系列的卡牌。

Events/Event_Desc_Play_Brawl.oracleText: Build a singleton deck of recent cards centered around your Commander: a Legendary creature or planeswalker!
Events/Event_Desc_Play_Brawl.translation: 以你的指挥官（传奇生物或鹏洛客）为中心，构建一套由无重复卡牌组成的套牌

Events/Event_Desc_Play_Brawl_Historic.oracleText: Build a 100-card singleton deck of eternally-legal cards centered around a Legendary creature or planeswalker: your Commander!
Events/Event_Desc_Play_Brawl_Historic.translation: 围绕您的指挥官（传奇生物或鹏洛客），构建一套100张的无双套牌！

Events/Event_Desc_Play_Historic_Bo1.oracleText: Play with (nearly) all cards available on Magic: The Gathering Arena!
Events/Event_Desc_Play_Historic_Bo1.translation: 使用近乎所有万智牌：竞技场上可用的卡牌进行游戏！

Events/Event_Desc_Play_Standard_Bo1.oracleText: Play with cards from the last three years. Magic: The Gathering's flagship format!
Events/Event_Desc_Play_Standard_Bo1.translation: 使用最近三年的卡牌进行游戏。这是万智牌：竞技场的主打赛制！

Events/Event_Desc_Play_Timeless.oracleText: Timeless uses every card on MTG Arena.
Events/Event_Desc_Play_Timeless.translation: 永恒赛制可以使用所有存在于MTGA上的牌张。

Events/Event_Desc_Precon_Brawl_ELD.oracleText: Be the first to play Throne of Eldraine in this special event, using one of four preconstructed decks in our newest format, Brawl! Play a deck built around a specific legendary creature or planeswalker Commander, and play one-on-one games! You can learn more about Brawl by clicking here. Players will not receive the Brawl decks in their collections, but Throne of Eldraine cards shown below in rewards can be used in Standard 2020 events starting September 9 and in other events starting September 26.
Events/Event_Desc_Precon_Brawl_ELD.translation: 参加活动，抢先体验艾卓王权！在此特殊活动中，你将从四副预组套牌中选择一副，加入我们最新的赛制～争锋！ 选择一位特殊的传奇生物或鹏洛客当作你的指挥官，并围绕它构筑一副套牌，而后与另一位牌手进行双人对战！欲知争锋赛制的更多信息，敬请点按此处。 争锋套牌不会加入牌手的收藏当中，但显示在赛事奖励中给出的艾卓王权卡牌可在9月9日开始的「2020标准赛」赛事活动中使用，并从9月26日开始可以在其他赛事活动中使用。

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierPlayIn_Bo1.oracleText: This month's Qualifier Weekend is coming up! If you're not already qualified, get all six wins in this Play-In event to earn your seat. The format for this Play-In event is phantom Lost Caverns of Ixalan Sealed with single-game matches using individual timers. If you win six games, come back next week for the Qualifier Weekend! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details. This event is phantom. Cards in your pool are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_QualifierPlayIn_Bo1.translation: 本月的资格赛周末即将来临！如果你还未获得资格，在本入围赛事中赢取6胜来获得你的资格赛周末席位。 本入围赛事的赛制是BO1依夏兰迷窟幻影现开，需使用个人计时器。如果你能赢取6胜，一定记得下周回来参加资格赛周末！ 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止地区无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。 这是一个幻影赛事，卡池中的卡不会加入你的收藏

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierPlayIn_Bo1202.oracleText: This month's Qualifier Weekend is coming up! If you're not already qualified, get all six wins in this Play-In event to earn your seat. The format for this Play-In event is Historic with single-game matches using individual timers. If you win six games, come back next week for the Qualifier Weekend! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierPlayIn_Bo3.oracleText: This month's Qualifier Weekend is almost here! If you're not already qualified, get all four match wins in this Play-In event to earn your seat. The format for this Play-In event is Explorer with best-of-three matches using sideboards and individual timers. If you win four matches, come back tomorrow for the Qualifier Weekend! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_QualifierPlayIn_Bo3.translation: 本月的资格赛周末即将来临！如果你还未获得资格，在本入围赛事中赢取4胜来获得你的资格赛周末席位。 本入围赛事的赛制是BO3探险构筑，需使用备牌和个人计时器。如果你能赢取4胜，一定记得明天回来参加资格赛周末！ 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止地区无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

The format for this Play-In event is Traditional Historic with best-of-three matches using sideboards and individual timers. If you win four matches, come back tomorrow for the Qualifier Weekend! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day1.oracleText: Congratulations on earning your way to Qualifier Weekend! Sign up for this Day 1 event and get all 7 wins to qualify for Day 2! You may join each day only once. Players can only join Day 1 and (if qualified) Day 2 events between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day1.translation: 恭喜你获得参加资格赛周末的机会！报名参加第1天赛事并获得全部7场胜利，即可获得第 2 天赛事的参赛资格！每天的赛事你只能参加一次。 玩家只能在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加第 1 天和第 2 天的赛事（如果有资格）。 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止地区无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day1_.oracleText: Congratulations on earning your way to Qualifier Weekend! Sign up for this Day 1 event and get all 7 wins to qualify for Day 2! You may join each day only once. Players can only join Day 1 and (if qualified) Day 2 events between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details. This event is phantom. Cards in your deck are not added to your collection.

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day2.oracleText: Congratulations on making Day 2! You may join only once. To play Day 2, you MUST join between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day2.translation: 祝贺你进入第2天的赛事！本赛事你只能参加一次。 第2天的赛事，必须在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加。 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止地区无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day2_.oracleText: Congratulations on making Day 2! You may join only once. To play Day 2, you MUST join between 6 a.m. PT - 8 a.m. PT. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details. This event is phantom. Cards in your deck are not added to your collection.
Events/Event_Desc_QualifierWeekend_Day2_.translation: 祝贺你进入第2天的赛事！本赛事你只能参加一次。 第2天的赛事，必须在太平洋时间上午 6 点至上午 8 点之间参加。 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止地区无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。 这是一个幻影赛事，卡池中的卡不会加入你的收藏

Events/Event_Desc_QuickExploration.oracleText: In Exploration, Magic's rules are changed: You can play two lands per turn, your starting hand size is nine, and you have no maximum hand size!
Events/Event_Desc_QuickExploration.translation: 「探险」玩法的万智牌规则略有不同：你每个回合可以使用两个地，你的起始手牌数量为九，且没有手牌上限！

Events/Event_Desc_Quick_Constructed.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play games! You'll receive gold and cards based on how many games you win. Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Quick_Constructed.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行游戏！最后根据胜场数量赢得金币和牌张。所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_Quick_Singleton.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play games, with a twist! Decks can only have one copy of any cards (other than basic lands). You'll receive rewards based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Quick_Singleton.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行游戏，但这次不一样！套牌中每种牌只能有一张（基本地除外）。最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_RAVM_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_RAVM_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_RIX_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_RIX_Premier_Draft.translation: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players

Events/Event_Desc_RIX_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers Note: This set is not legal in Standard.
Events/Event_Desc_RIX_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 人机轮抽 - 与AI机器人轮抽对抗，无需等待，也无需选择计时器 注意：此系列在标准中并不合规。

Events/Event_Desc_RNA_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 15-card draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_RNA_Comp_Draft.translation: 15张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。你所选择的牌张会加入你的收藏，且你会用你抽到的这些牌加上基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌参赛。不断进行三盘两胜制的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_RNA_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_RNA_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_RNA_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_RNA_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Ranked.oracleText: Bring your deck and see how high you can rank up!
Events/Event_Desc_Ranked.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行对战，不断提高你的段位！

Events/Event_Desc_Ravnica_Remix.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. Each pack contains a mix of cards from Guilds of Ravnica and Ravnica Allegiance! The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Ravnica_Remix.translation: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. Each pack contains a mix of cards from Guilds of Ravnica and Ravnica Allegiance! The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Events/Event_Desc_RebalancedHistoric.oracleText: What would the world be like if a villain were a hero instead? If you turned left instead of right? The Multiverse is a huge place, but it can't contain every possibility, and even small changes can lead to big results. Come step through the mirror to another world where not everything is as you remember it... We're through the looking glass! In this event, some of Historic's most wanted are back in action, but in slightly different forms. To see all of these cards, search for "e:ANC" in the deckbuilder or click HERE. You can play these or any other cards from Historic in this event, regardless of whether they are in your collection! Enjoy!

Events/Event_Desc_RoadToWorlds_2020.oracleText: Magic World Championship XXVI is happening this Friday through Sunday! To celebrate, we're giving you a chance to play some of the decks Standard decks from last year that Magic World Championship XXVI players used on their way to qualifying. To learn more about the event and how to watch coverage, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_RoadToWorlds_2020.translation: Magic World Championship XXVI is happening this Friday through Sunday! To celebrate, we're giving you a chance to play some of the decks Standard decks from last year that Magic World Championship XXVI players used on their way to qualifying. To learn more about the event and how to watch coverage, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_SIR_Premier_Drafta.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players This Week's Shadows of the Past: Morbid and Macabre! Haunting Spirits Establish a ghostly presence as you take to the skies with Spirits and other unlikely allies. Relentless Zombies Destroy enemy creatures with removal spells, reload your hand with card draw, and march on with a horde of Zombies. Vampire Madness Your vampire army helps you to discard cards, cast spells for their madness costs, and secure victory. The key is striking the right balance between discard outlets and madness cards. Wolves Attack Transform your Werewolves with a combination of instants and activated abilities. Your outsized creatures will overrun your opponents in no time. Super-Humans Stack up Auras and Equipment on your Humans to swing in for the kill with your larger-than-life creatures. Valuable Sacrifice Expendable resources are everywhere in white-black. Sacrifice creatures and pay life liberally for value. Spell Science Noncreature spells perform double duty here if you pick up enough creatures that reward you for playing them. Graveyard Shift Stock your graveyard to get extra value from powerful delirium cards. Your deck will just need a wide variety of card types to turn it on. Righteous Fury Run down your opponent with cheap, powerful threats and well-timed combat tricks. Let's Investigate Play defense while you build up a supply of Clues. You'll soon learn enough to overwhelm your opponent with card advantage and large monsters.

Wolves Attack Transform your Werewolves with a combination of instants and activated abilities. Your outsized creatures will overrun your opponents in no time. Super-Humans Stack up Auras and Equipment on your Humans to swing in for the kill with your larger-than-life creatures. Valuable Sacrifice Expendable resources are everywhere in white-black. Sacrifice creatures and pay life liberally for value. Spell Science Noncreature spells perform double duty here if you pick up enough creatures that reward you for playing them. Graveyard Shift Stock your graveyard to get extra value from powerful delirium cards. Your deck will just need a wide variety of card types to turn it on. Righteous Fury Run down your opponent with cheap, powerful threats and well-timed combat tricks. Let's Investigate Play defense while you build up a supply of Clues. You'll soon learn enough to overwhelm your opponent with card advantage and large monsters.

Events/Event_Desc_SNC_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players The Five Families The Obscura: Craft the perfect draws and use superior intelligence over a long game to engineer a route to victory. Use the family's connive mechanic to draw, then discard - giving your creatures +1/+1 counters along the way! The Maestros: Hire expendable underlings as your family's muscle on the streets. Then use the casualty mechanic to sacrifice those minions, copy your spells, and blast your opponent. The Riveteers: The Riveteers rumble with large creatures. Give your creatures haste with the blitz mechanic, then sacrifice them at the end of your turn to draw a card. Keep that pressure up! Then press your advantage to crush your opponents. The Cabaretti: Flood the board with tokens and small creatures to overwhelm the opposition. The family knows how to collaborate for greater gain: alliance abilities give you additional effects whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control. The Brokers: The Brokers are always ready to take down your opponents one notch at a time. Attack relentlessly to deal small amounts of damage, and mount an impenetrable defense - legal or otherwise! - by amassing shield counters on your creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_SNC_Premier_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 五大家族 秘闻帮：在漫长的比赛中制作完美的平局并使用卓越的智慧来设计通往胜利的路线。使用家族的筹谋机制来抓牌，然后弃牌——在你的生物上放置 +1/+1 指示物! 绝艺盟： 雇佣可消耗的下属作为你的家族在街头的力量。然后利用催命机制来牺牲这些小兵，复制你的咒语，并轰击你的对手。 勤工联： 铆工们用大型生物轰鸣。用急袭机制给你的生物以敏捷异能，然后在你的回合结束时牺牲它们来抽一张牌。保持这种压力! 然后发挥你的优势，击溃你的对手。 乐舞会： 用指示物和小生物铺满桌面以压制对手。家族知道如何合作以获得更大的收益：每当另一个生物在你的控制下进入战场，联手异能附加额外效应。 扶济社： 扶济社总是有所准备，将对手层层击溃。无情攻击造成少量伤害，但建立坚不可摧的防御 - 合法或其他！ - 通过在你的生物上积累后盾指示物

Events/Event_Desc_SNC_Rebalanced_Draft.translation: 在异位轮抽中，新卡佩纳：喧嚣黑街中的许多卡牌都被重新平衡，创造了这种轮抽赛制的另一种面貌。弄清楚哪些家族要上台，尘埃落定后你就可以统治新卡佩纳。 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_AFR.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fourteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_AFR.translation: 你将获得6个14张的补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_AKR.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fifteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_AKR.translation: 你将得到6包15张牌的补充包。补充包内的牌张都会加入你的收藏，而你将利用这些牌外加基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌进行游戏。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_BRO.oracleText: You'll receive 6 The Brothers' War packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Soldiers Gather your Soldiers and overwhelm your opponent on the ground and in the skies. Draw Power Draw a multitude of cards from your deck to keep the knowledge flowing and strengthen your creatures at the same time! Artifact Sacrifice Fuel the fight by sacrificing artifacts. Powerstones rev your engines and can later be sacrificed for more power! Don't forget artifacts with unearth can be sacrificed twice! Mechanized Stompy Use Powerstones to deploy your biggest threats quickly. Back them up with power-boosting spells to dominate every fight! Artifacts Enter the Battlefield Assemble your crew of creatures that are enhanced when artifacts enter the battlefield, then use Powerstones, Soldier tokens, and unearthed creatures to power up your attacks. Scrappy Swarm Deploy your army early, but don't be afraid to fill the graveyard. Creatures with mana value three or less offer more than you might expect, alive or dead. Prowess Aggro Round up a squad of inventors and wizards that can utilize cheap artifacts, instants, and sorcery spells to press their advantage. Graveyard Counter In an endless war, your creatures that rely on a populated graveyard will be pleased as their power increases well into the late game. Unearth Aggro Start your aggression early, and the second wave that comes back with Unearth may just be the last you need. Powerstone Ramp Accumulate Powerstones to help build your defenses, and soon no one will stand a chance against your colossal army of colossuses.

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_DAR.oracleText: This set is only legal in Historic and Explorer. You'll receive 6 Dominaria packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_DAR.translation: 此系列仅在史迹和探险中合法。 你将得到6包多明纳里亚的补充包。补充包内的牌张都会加入你的收藏，而你将利用这些牌外加基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌进行游戏。不断进行对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_DMU.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Dominaria United packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Fliers Tempo Hold your ground with tokens and defensive instants and sorceries, all while attacking from the air. Control Develop a long-term advantage with card draw and creature removal spells, then go after your opponent directly in the late game. Reckless Aggro Throw caution to the wind and assault your opponent, clearing a path with creature removal spells or by simply trading your creatures for theirs. Domain Stompy Rule the board by attacking with the largest creatures on the battlefield, boosted by the domain mechanic. Domain Tokens Assemble a massive army of creatures and tokens, then dominate the mid-game with the domain mechanic. Creature Sacrifice Ruthlessly sacrifice your small creatures or tokens for profit, then bring creatures back from the graveyard to overwhelm your opponent. Spells Aggro Cast instant and sorcery spells to bolster aggressive creatures and clear a path to victory. Domain Midrange Get maximum value out of your cards with huge creatures, bringing cards back from the graveyard, and domain rewards. Tokens Aggro Go wide with an aggressive army of small creatures and tokens, punching through your opponent's defenses with spells and effects that boost your whole team. Kicker Ramp Build up your mana to get additional value from kicking your spells. Splash in some other colors to take advantage of powerful multicolor cards and the domain mechanic.
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_DMU.translation: 你将收到6包多明纳里亚：众志成城补充包卡牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 飞行节奏 用衍生物和防御性的瞬间和法术进行地面防御，同时从空中进行攻击。 控制 利用抓牌和生物移除咒语形成长期优势，然后在游戏后期直接追击你的对手。 无情快攻 将谨慎抛诸脑后，直接攻击你的对手，用生物移除咒语扫清道路，或者简单地用你的生物交换他们的生物。 领土风暴 通过使用战场上最大的生物进行攻击，在领土机制的推动下，统治棋盘。 领土衍生物 组建一支庞大的生物和衍生物大军，然后用领土机制主宰游戏中期。 生物牺牲 无情地牺牲你的小生物或衍生物以获得收益，然后将生物从坟墓场带回来压倒你的对手。 法术快攻释放瞬间和法术咒语来振励好斗异能生物，并扫清通往胜利的道路。 领土中速 使用巨大的生物让你的牌发挥最大价值，将牌从坟墓场中带回，并获得领土的加成效果。 衍生物快攻 使用由小生物和衍生物组成的侵略性大军，用可以提升整个团队的咒语和效应来突破对手的防御。 增幅暴费 使用增幅类咒语获得额外法术力建立优势，加上一些其它颜色卡牌以更好利用多色和领土优势。

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_HBG.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Flicker your creatures in and out of play to produce as many triggers as possible! Control the battlefield and sneak in creatures to deal damage to your opponent. The real treasure will be the treasure you make along the way. DRAGONS! The best offense is a good defense? Gain life so you can lower theirs! Earn bonuses every time your creatures leave the battlefield. MORE DRAGONS! What's dead may never die... but may live again? Prepare for trouble! Use the new Double Team mechanic to cast creatures with the same name. EVEN MORE DRAGONS!

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_KTK.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Khans of Tarkir packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Abzan Counters Each creature you add to your army makes the others stronger. Use Outlast to buff your creatures and overrun your opponent! Jeskai Spellcast Redirect your opponent and use their own overextension against them. Cast spells to play tricks and make powerful threats out of your small creatures. Sultai Graveyard Get ahead of the curve by stocking your graveyard and recycling it into large creatures and impactful spells. The cycle of life and death is as inevitable as your victory! Mardu Warriors Ride with the Horde and go aggro! Attack to trigger your Raid bonuses and buff all your creatures to finish your opponent in one shot. Temur Behemoths Overwhelm your opponent with huge creatures hiding just out of sight. Plus, your ferocious beasts enhance your other spells to stomp all over the enemy.

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_LCI.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Lost Caverns of Ixalan packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Oltec Ingenuity Buy time with blockers, removal, and lifegain while you assemble an array of wondrous artifacts to take over the late game. Echoes of the Dead Set up to block while you fill your graveyard, then drag your opponent into the deep end with high-cost creatures, card draw, and recursive threats. Going Down! Keep your creatures growing by attacking viciously to make your opponent block or throwing permanents into the graveyard yourself. Then keep them down with creature removal. Dinosaurs of the Sun Empire Summon gigantic dinosaurs to crush the opposition, supporting them with ways to make more mana or break through blockers.   Malamet Tactics Keep the pressure on with low-cost creatures. When your opponent tries to set up a defense, it's time to pounce by powering up your forces. Dusk Legion Pilgrimage Sacrifice little creatures and artifacts for the glory of Aclazotz (and additional resources). Once you smell blood, seal their fate with a few larger creatures. Pirates' Plunder Set sail with a rowdy crew and their haul of Equipment and Treasure. When those landlubbers try to stop you, fly over the top or throw their blockers overboard. Fungal Festering Muck up the battlefield with sticky creatures while you fill your graveyard. Once you've descended enough to power your side up, start grinding your way through the opposing blockers. Thousand-Moon Legion Launch your military campaign with lots of small creatures and artifacts, then tactically tap those resources to activate your forces and rout the invaders. River Herald Expedition Go exploring to stock your side with lands and powerful creatures, then sink your extra mana into activated abilities and card draw to drown the opposition in value.
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_LCI.translation: 你将获得6包依夏兰迷窟补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑一套40张的套牌。进行游戏并基于你的胜场获得奖励！ 欧尔特克智谋 通过阻挡者、去除和生命回复拖延时间，借机集结神器大军在游戏后期出奇制胜。 亡者回响 设防阻挡并借机填坟，再通过高费生物、抽牌手段和无尽威胁将对手拖入深渊。 给我倒下！ 通过猛烈地进攻迫使对手阻挡或自己将永久物扔入坟场让你的生物逐步膨胀，再不断使用去除击倒对手的生物。 烈阳帝国恐龙大军 召唤巨型恐龙压垮对手并通过产出更多法术力或突破阻挡者的手段支援它们。 豹族计策 通过低费生物持续制造压力。对手试图构筑防线之时即是你膨胀军队猛扑之际。 暮影军团朝圣 牺牲小生物和神器来重现阿洛佐兹的荣光（并获取额外资源）。一旦你闻到敌人的鲜血，用更强大的生物了结他们的性命。 海盗劫掠 带领一批残暴的船员和他们抢来的武器和财宝扬帆启航。当那些航海菜鸟试图挡你去路时，飞过他们头顶或直接把他们的阻挡者扔下海。 真菌溃烂 将黏糊糊的生物铺满战场并借机填坟。一旦你已落坟足够多次以强大你的阵线，那就开始逐步蚕食突破对手的阻挡者吧。 千月军团 通过大量小生物和神器开展你的军事行动，然后策略性地横置那些资源以激活你的军队并击溃入侵者。 川流使探险队 进行勘察为你的阵线积累土地和强大生物，然后将你额外的法术力投入起动式异能和抓牌来赚取价值淹没对手。

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_LTR.oracleText: You'll receive 6 The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! "Draw Two" Humans Defend the citadel ! Drawing two cards every turn will ensure you never run out of reinforcements. Amass Control Grow a massive Orc Army , then wield Saruman's mighty suite of spells to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Amass Aggro The forces of Mordor will rush out of your hands and through the enemy's defenses with this aggressive strategy, sacrificing themselves for the glory of Sauron. Power Matters The wilds of Middle-earth™ are home to many of its strongest denizens, such as Ents, Trolls, and the noble Rangers. Use them to overwhelm your opponent with great numbers. Food Never underestimate a Hobbit! This low-to-the-ground aggressive deck uses Food tokens for a lot more than the occasional second-refreshment. Tokens From earthen Treasures to soaring Spirits and everything in-between, this strategy revolves around going wide and eventually overwhelming the opponent. Spells Draw on the knowledge and magic of Middle-earth's most powerful Wizards to cast a stream of increasingly impressive instants and sorceries. Sacrifice Repurpose and recycle your creatures to summon a frightening assortment of terrors, including the Nazgûl and their Fell Beasts. Go-Wide Humans Answer the call and charge into battle! These Humans combine to create a force capable of slicing through any foe. Scry Elvish magic offers you a glimpse at many possible futures. Choose wisely and you'll find victory waiting at the top of your deck.

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_MID.translation: 你将获得6个14张的补充包。 这些牌会加入你的收藏。 你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行游戏。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_MOM.oracleText: You'll receive 6 March of the Machine packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Knights Knights have assembled from around the multiverse! Keeping a steady supply of these gallant creatures will help press your advantage each turn. Graveyard Mill everyone. Your forces will improve with more strategies and greater power as each graveyard fills. Sacrifice Desperate times call for desperate measures. Sacrifice your artifacts and creatures to pave a path to victory. Battles Get ready to liberate your favorite plane from the Phyrexians! Prioritize Battles, Magic's newest card type, and smash through opposing defenses to save the day. +1/+1 Counters It's time to buff up! Arm your creatures with +1/+1 counters to outclass the opposition. Phyrexian Looking to play the villain? Seek out Phyrexians of all sorts to take advantage of them and their swarms of little hatching Incubator tokens. Convoke Your creatures are here to help withstand the invasion. Build an army early and they'll help you cast powerful spells with convoke. Incubate Go big and generate tons of mana to play bigger creatures and incubate larger tokens. Backup Find a good partner and tag-team those Phyrexians. Use the backup mechanic to find the right combination of abilities to build toward your victory each turn. Transform Life is always more fun with some change. Take your cards to the next level by winning battles and turning Incubator tokens and creatures into their Phyrexian selves.

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_MixedUp.oracleText: This event is phantom. Cards in your pool are not added to your collection. You know what's more exciting than a pack of cards? A pack of mystery cards! Why the mystery? Well, look, some beebles got into the warehouse and moved everything around, and now it's a mystery whether you like it or not. I'd actually appreciate some help sorting things back out, and I don't mind if you play some games along the way. Thanks for pitching in! If you've finished your run in this weekend's run of the Arena Open, kick back with some Mixed-Up Sealed! You can enter this event either by paying the entry fee once or by entering Day 1 of the Arena Open. Once you've entered, you can play as many times as you like for the rest of the weekend. You'll receive 6 packs of mixed-up cards from all across MTG Arena, and then build the best 40-card deck you can. Once you're finished, we'll find the right shelves in the back room for your cards, and you can join again!

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_NEO.oracleText: You'll receive 6 15-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_NEO.translation: 你将获得6个15张的补充包。 这些牌会加入你的收藏。 你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行游戏。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_ONE.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Phyrexia: All Will Be One packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Artifacts Phyrexia is filled with glorious artifacts. Gather as many of these artifacts as you can to outmaneuver your opponent. Proliferate Control Use proliferate to spread the glory of Phyrexia—oil counters, poison counters, and loyalty counters are all ready to be proliferated. Oil Counters & Sacrifice All Phyrexians are valuable, even (and sometimes especially) in death. Use your creatures and artifacts to generate oil counters when they die. Oil Counters Midrange The more things with oil counters you have, the merrier. Use these oil counters to get the biggest, smashiest creatures you can. Toxic Aggro Take advantage of small toxic creatures, especially Mite tokens, to swarm your opponent. Corrupted Give your opponent three or more poison counters, then your corrupted cards become even more powerful. Oil Counters & Noncreature Spells Build up your oil counters and overwhelm your opponent by casting a variety of artifacts, enchantments, instants, sorceries, and yes, even planeswalkers! Poison Victory You have the biggest baddest creature with toxic. Use them to get your opponent to 10 poison counters. For Mirrodin! Equipment Someone's got to fight against the Phyrexians! Your rebels can use equipment to stave them off! Proliferate & Poison Two great tastes that go great together. Use green creatures with toxic to deal out serious poison counters, then proliferate to finish the job.

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_SIRa.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! This Week's Shadows of the Past: Creature Type Terror! Click Here to Learn More about the rotating Shadows of the Past in Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered Limited Events! Haunting Spirits Establish a ghostly presence as you take to the skies with Spirits and other unlikely allies. Relentless Zombies Destroy enemy creatures with removal spells, reload your hand with card draw, and march on with a horde of Zombies. Vampire Madness Your vampire army helps you to discard cards, cast spells for their madness costs, and secure victory. The key is striking the right balance between discard outlets and madness cards. Wolves Attack Transform your Werewolves with a combination of instants and activated abilities. Your outsized creatures will overrun your opponents in no time. Super-Humans Stack up Auras and Equipment on your Humans to swing in for the kill with your larger-than-life creatures. Valuable Sacrifice Expendable resources are everywhere in white-black. Sacrifice creatures and pay life liberally for value. Spell Science Noncreature spells perform double duty here if you pick up enough creatures that reward you for playing them. Graveyard Shift Stock your graveyard to get extra value from powerful delirium cards. Your deck will just need a wide variety of card types to turn it on. Righteous Fury Run down your opponent with cheap, powerful threats and well-timed combat tricks. Let's Investigate Play defense while you build up a supply of Clues. You'll soon learn enough to overwhelm your opponent with card advantage and large monsters.

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_SN.oracleText: You'll receive 6 14-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! The Five Families The Obscura: Craft the perfect draws and use superior intelligence over a long game to engineer a route to victory. Use the family's connive mechanic to draw, then discard - giving your creatures +1/+1 counters along the way! The Maestros: Hire expendable underlings as your family's muscle on the streets. Then use the casualty mechanic to sacrifice those minions, copy your spells, and blast your opponent. The Riveteers: The Riveteers rumble with large creatures. Give your creatures haste with the blitz mechanic, then sacrifice them at the end of your turn to draw a card. Keep that pressure up! Then press your advantage to crush your opponents. The Cabaretti: Flood the board with tokens and small creatures to overwhelm the opposition. The family knows how to collaborate for greater gain: alliance abilities give you additional effects whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control. The Brokers: The Brokers are always ready to take down your opponents one notch at a time. Attack relentlessly to deal small amounts of damage, and mount an impenetrable defense - legal or otherwise! - by amassing shield counters on your creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_SN.translation: 你将得到6包14张牌的补充包。补充包内的牌张都会加入你的收藏，而你将利用这些牌外加基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌进行游戏。不断进行对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励 五大家族 秘闻帮：在漫长的比赛中制作完美的平局并使用卓越的智慧来设计通往胜利的路线。使用家族的筹谋机制来抓牌，然后弃牌——在你的生物上放置 +1/+1 指示物! 绝艺盟： 雇佣可消耗的下属作为你的家族在街头的力量。然后利用催命机制来牺牲这些小兵，复制你的咒语，并轰击你的对手。 勤工联： 铆工们用大型生物轰鸣。用急袭机制给你的生物以敏捷异能，然后在你的回合结束时牺牲它们来抽一张牌。保持这种压力! 然后发挥你的优势，击溃你的对手。 乐舞会： 用指示物和小生物铺满桌面以压制对手。家族知道如何合作以获得更大的收益：每当另一个生物在你的控制下进入战场，联手异能附加额外效应。 扶济社： 扶济社总是有所准备，将对手层层击溃。无情攻击造成少量伤害，但建立坚不可摧的防御 - 合法或其他！ - 通过在你的生物上积累后盾指示物

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_WOE.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Wilds of Eldraine packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! The Frost Queen Control the flow of combat by tapping your opponent's creatures and taking to the sky with fliers. Enchanting Slumber Assemble a team of flying Faeries and support them with tricky spells and creature removal to win the long game. The Dark Piper Create a massive number of Rat tokens to swarm past your opponent's defenses. Be aggressive and take advantage of cards that reward you for your attackers trading off in combat. Ruby and the Wolf Call forth what lurks in the wilderness of Eldraine , summoning high-powered creatures or enhancing your small creatures with Roles and combat tricks. Armont and the Beasts Gather an army of creatures and get bonuses for enchanting them with Roles and other Auras, then go all-out when you have the upper hand. Pale as Snow Make use of the bargain and Role mechanics and get rewarded for your creatures and enchantments going to the graveyard.   The Magician's Misstep Go aggressive or be more controlling with a flurry of bewitching instants and sorceries to keep your opponent off balance. Greta, Witch Hunter Creature removal and life gain will help stave off your opponent's attacks until you're able to command the board with big creatures and Food rewards. Brawl at the Grand Ball Enhance your creatures with Roles and take advantage of the celebration mechanic with low-mana aggressive creatures and spells. The Kingdom of Storms Use defensive creatures and spells to buy time while you build up your lands. Reward yourself by casting spells that cost five mana or more to dominate the late game.
Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_WOE.translation: 你将获得6包艾卓仙踪补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑一套40张的套牌。进行游戏并基于你的胜场获得奖励！ 冰霜女王通过横置对手的生物和带领飞行大军遨游天际掌控战斗的走向。 迷人醉眠集结一队飞行仙灵并辅以诡计咒语和生物去除来赢得长盘胜利。 黑暗笛手派出潮水般的老鼠衍生物淹没对手的防线。保持激进并善用卡牌让你从进攻生物的战斗交换中获得回报。 小红玉与恶狼召唤强大的高攻生物或利用角色灵气和战斗诡计增强弱小生物，从中唤醒潜藏在艾卓幻野的神秘力量。 娅蒙与野兽集结一队生物大军并通过结附角色及其他灵气获益。当你取得场面优势时全力进攻。 苍白如雪充分利用加码和角色机制让你的生物和结界进入坟墓场时给予回报。 魔术师的失策激进地进攻或走控制：通过施放法术和瞬间搅乱战场让对手场面失衡。 女巫猎人格蕾特在生物去除和生命回复的帮助下拖延对手的进攻直到你能够通过强大生物和食品回报掌控战场。 堂皇舞宴喧闹用角色灵气增强你的生物并通过低费进攻生物和咒语来善加利用欢庆机制。 风暴王国使用防御性生物和咒语为你积累足够地牌拖延时间，最终通过施放5费及以上咒语获取回报接管游戏后期。

Events/Event_Desc_Sealed_ZNR.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fourteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Events/Event_Desc_ShowcasePlayIn_Bo1.oracleText: It's time for the very first Arena Championship! This weekend, 32 of the best players in MTG Arena are facing off to earn the title of Arena Champion and a seat at World Championship XXVIII. For the rest of us, it's not too late to start climbing toward the next Arena Championship, and it can all start right here. If you're not already qualified, get all six wins in this Play-In event to earn your seat at the next Qualifier Weekend. The format for this Play-In event is Arena Championship Showcase with best-of-one matches and individual timers. Choose one of the Alchemy decks being played by Arena Championship competitors this weekend and face off against the same field they'll be facing. If you win six games, come back on October 15 for the Qualifier Weekend! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_ShowcasePlayIn_Bo1.translation: 现在是第一届竞技场冠军赛的时间！本周末，MTGA的32名最优秀的玩家将展开对决，争夺竞技场冠军头衔和第二十七届世界万智牌冠军赛的席位。对于我们其他人来说，现在开始向下一个竞技场冠军攀登还不算太晚，一切都可以从这里开始。如果你尚未获得资格，请在此入围赛中获得全部六场胜利，以赢得你在下一个资格赛周末的席位。 本次资格赛赛事是竞技场冠军赛展示赛，包括一盘胜负比赛和个人计时器。选择本周末竞技场冠军赛参赛者正在使用的炼金套牌之一，并与他们将面临的相同场地进行对决。如果你赢了六场比赛，请在10 月15日回来参加资格赛周末！ 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止的地方无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

Events/Event_Desc_ShowcasePlayIn_Bo3.oracleText: It's time for the very first Arena Championship! This weekend, 32 of the best players in MTG Arena are facing off to earn the title of Arena Champion and a seat at World Championship XXVIII. For the rest of us, it's not too late to start climbing toward the next Arena Championship, and it can all start right here. The format for this Play-In event is Arena Championship Showcase with best-of-three matches using sideboards and individual timers. Choose one of the Alchemy decks being played by Arena Championship competitors this weekend and face off against the same field they'll be facing. If you win four matches, come back on October 15 for the Qualifier Weekend! Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not available in all regions/territories. Void where prohibited. Additional terms and conditions apply. See here for full details.
Events/Event_Desc_ShowcasePlayIn_Bo3.translation: 现在是第一届竞技场冠军赛的时间！本周末，MTGA的32名最优秀的玩家将展开对决，争夺竞技场冠军头衔和第二十七届世界万智牌冠军赛的席位。对于我们其他人来说，现在开始向下一个竞技场冠军攀登还不算太晚，一切都可以从这里开始。如果你尚未获得资格，请在此入围赛中获得全部四场胜利，以赢得你在下一个资格赛周末的席位。 本次资格赛赛事是竞技场冠军赛展示赛，包括带备牌的三盘两胜比赛和个人计时器。选择本周末竞技场冠军赛参赛者正在使用的炼金套牌之一，并与他们将面临的相同场地进行对决。如果你赢了四场比赛，请在10 月15日回来参加资格赛周末！ 必须年满18岁才能参加。并非在所有地区/领地都可用。禁止的地方无效。附加条款和条件适用。请参阅此处了解完整详情。

Events/Event_Desc_Singleton_Challenge.oracleText: Ready to take your singleton deck to the next level? The Singleton Challenge offers the ability to win more prizes than our usual singleton event! Decks in this event can't have more than one copy of any card, except for basic lands.
Events/Event_Desc_Singleton_Challenge.translation: 准备好用自己的无双套牌迎接新的挑战了吗？「无双挑战」奖品较普通无双赛更为丰盛，让你能有更多收获。用于参加本赛事的套牌受「同名牌不超过一张」规则限制，基本地除外。

Events/Event_Desc_Singleton_Standard.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play games, with a twist! Decks can only have one copy of any cards (other than basic lands). You'll receive gold and cards based on how many games you win! Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Singleton_Standard.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行游戏，但这次有些不一样！套牌中每种牌只能有一张（基本地除外）。最后根据胜场数量赢得金币和牌张！所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_SleeperAgents_DMU.oracleText: This pitiful world. So flawed, so painfully imperfect, but at least it is malleable. Easy to construct a shell. The shell is gruesome and inelegant, but no more so than those already here. They will not notice. Too concerned with individual things. They claim to be united. They do not yet know of true unity. They do not yet know the Machine Orthodoxy. But they will. In this 60-card Singleton event, you never know who's on whose side–every turn, a random creature in your hand will be revealed to be a Phyrexian sleeper agent! Will you adopt a compleatly different strategy? As you play, you'll earn Stained Glass Showcase card styles from Dominaria United, featuring key figures from the invasion! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles, click here. When this event ends, entrants will receive any unclaimed rewards automatically.
Events/Event_Desc_SleeperAgents_DMU.translation: 这个可怜的世界。如此有缺陷，如此痛苦地不完美，但至少它是可塑的，易于构建外壳。外壳令人毛骨悚然且不雅，但不比那些已经在这里的外壳更糟糕。他们不会注意到的，他们太在意个人的事情，虽然他们声称是团结的。他们还不知道真正的团结。他们还不知道机器正统所在，但他们迟早会知道的。 在这个60张无双赛事中，你永远不知道谁站在谁一边——每一轮，你手中的一个随机生物都会被揭示为非瑞克西亚潜藏密探！你会采取完全不同的策略吗？玩游戏时，你将获得来自 多明纳里亚：众志成城 的花窗展示卡牌样式，其中包含入侵的关键人物！ 了解有关此赛制的更多详细信息，包括卡牌样式的完整列表，请单击此处. 当这个赛事结束时，参赛者将自动收到未领取的奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Spark_Ladder.oracleText: Play against other Planeswalkers here to level up, earn rewards, and harness your spark!
Events/Event_Desc_Spark_Ladder.translation: Play against other Planeswalkers here to level up, earn rewards, and harness your spark!

Events/Event_Desc_SparkyChallenge.oracleText:
Welcome to Sparky's Challenge, where you challenge...me! This is a Preconstructed event where I've given you a choice of some of my favorite starter decks to play with against me as you become more familiar with your Planeswalker spark!

This event has no entry fee, so you can keep challenging me, your greatest test yet! That is until you've won three games and I've decided you're ready to face even greater competition, Planeswalker!
Events/Event_Desc_SparkyChallenge.translation:
欢迎来到火花精灵挑战，在这里你将要挑战我！这是一个预组活动，我给你准备了一些我最喜欢的新手套牌作为选项。

这是一个免费活动，你可以一直挑战我，直到你赢得了三次胜利。

Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Challenge.oracleText: Bring your Standard deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive rewards based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Challenge.translation: 使用标准构筑套牌与对手进行三盘两胜的对局！最后根据胜局数量赢得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Shakeup.oracleText: We're shaking Standard up with an additional banned list for this event only! For the full details on this format, including a list of banned cards, click <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-standard-shakeup>here</link></u>.
Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Shakeup.translation: 我们将在本次赛事中为标准模式增加一份额外禁牌表！关于这一赛制的全部细节，包括禁牌表，请点击<u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-standard-shakeup>这里</link></u>。

Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Shakeup_Alt.oracleText: We're shaking Standard up with an alternative banned list for this event only! Click the button below to examine the banned cards.
Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Shakeup_Alt.translation: 我们将在本次赛事中为标准模式增加一份额外禁牌表！点击下方按钮查看禁牌表。

Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Shakeup_Alt2.oracleText:
We're shaking Standard up with an alternative banned list for this event only! Click the button below to examine the banned cards, or read the list below:

<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG"> Once Upon a Time
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG"> Veil of Summer
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"> Oko, Thief of Crowns
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xC"> Field of the Dead
Events/Event_Desc_Standard_Shakeup_Alt2.translation:
我们将在本次赛事中为标准模式增加一份额外禁牌表！点击下方按钮查看禁牌表或者阅读一下禁牌表：

<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG">很久以前
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG">夏色帘幕
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU">窃冠瓯柯
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xC">亡者旷野

Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Amazonian.oracleText: We're giving Draft new house rules with Amazonian (twitch.tv/amazonian). Amy loves building crazy decks with lots of potential. So together we created AMAZONIAN'S PLAY ANYTHING DRAFT, where you can have unlimited potential. Because you don't have to pay the mana cost to play any card! No need to put lands in your deck, as every card's mana cost is waived when you cast it. Draft Core Set 2019, keep the cards you draft, and build a 40-card deck that takes advantage of the biggest cards. You'll also get one mana of each color in your mana pool each turn that you can use for abilities, and every player also starts with three cards in hand instead of seven.
Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Amazonian.translation: 我们与Amazonian（twitch.tv/amazonian）一道，为轮抽赛事拟定全新自订规则。Amy钟爱构筑疯狂套牌，从不扼杀一切可能。我们由此推出「Amazonian的万物尽出轮抽」，让你释放无限潜能。牌张不需法术力费用即可施放，你不再需要为费用问题绞尽脑汁！套牌中不再需要留出地牌位置，所有牌张的法术力费用都变作免费，你可以在任何回合施放任何东西。使用2019核心系列进行轮抽，抽选到的牌即归你所有，之后利用它们构筑一副40张的套牌，利用高费咒语占据战场主动。你的法术力池中每个回合都会加入每种颜色各一点的法术力，供你起动异能之用，同时每位牌手的起始手牌数量改为三张（而非原本的七张）。

Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Kibler.oracleText: We're giving Constructed new house rules with Brian Kibler (twitch.tv/bmkibler). Kibler loves putting big creatures on the battlefield. So together we created KIBLER'S GIANT MONSTERS, where every time you cast a creature with converted mana cost of four or greater, you draw a card. That's more value for your powerful critters! Bring a 60-card deck full of larger creatures that take advantage of the card draw and put it to the test!
Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Kibler.translation: 我们与Brian Kibler（twitch.tv/bmkibler）一道，为构筑赛事拟定全新自订规则。Kibler钟爱派出巨怪猛兽主宰战场。由此我们特别推出「Kibler的威凛巨兽」规则。在此规则下，每当你施放法术力值等于或大于四的生物时，你便抓一张牌。强劲生物价值更增一分！本次请善用大生物进战场带来的额外抓牌效应，利用事先组好的60张套牌迎接对手挑战！

Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Kripp.oracleText: We're giving Draft new house rules with Kripp (twitch.tv/nl_kripp). Kripp loves playing decks using three or four colors. So together we created KRIPP'S TREASURE DRAFT. Draft Guilds of Ravnica like normal and then play a game of Magic with unique rules. At the beginning of your turn you get a new Treasure Token, which is an artifact that can be sacrificed for one mana of any color. The combination of Guilds of Ravnica multicolor cards and an extra mana of any color each turn makes three or four colors an inevitability in your 40-card deck.
Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Kripp.translation: 我们与Kripp（twitch.tv/nl_kripp）一道，为轮抽赛事拟定全新自订规则。Kripp对三色或四色套牌情有独钟。由此我们特别推出「Kripp的珍宝轮轴」。利用烽会拉尼卡系列的补充包如常进行轮抽，但随后进行的万智牌游戏中会有特殊规则生效。在你的每个回合开始时，你都会新获得一个珍宝衍生物，其具有「牺牲之：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」烽会拉尼卡系列当中本来就有丰富的多色搭配，如今每个回合都能多获得一点任意颜色的法术力，更能使你在40张套牌内得心应手地同时驾驭三到四色。

Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Nox.oracleText: We're giving Constructed new house rules with Nox (twitch.tv/professornoxlive). Nox loves brewing wacky decks and loves Sunbird's Invocation. So together we created CASCADE CONSTRUCTED, where the first card you play each turn has Cascade: when you cast that card, you exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland permanent with a converted mana cost less than the spell you cast, then you get to play that card without paying its mana cost and put all other exiled cards on the bottom of your library. That's two cards for the mana cost of one! Build a 60-card deck that can take advantage of Cascade and put it to the test!
Events/Event_Desc_Streamer_Nox.translation: 我们与Nox（twitch.tv/professornoxlive）一道，为构筑赛事拟定全新自订规则。Nox喜欢自创思路奇特的套牌，尤其钟爱阳禽祝愿这张牌。由此我们特别推出「倾曳构筑」。在此玩法中，你每回合施放的第一个咒语具有倾曳异能：当你施放该咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值比所施放之咒语小的非地牌为止，然后你可以施放该牌且不需支付其法术力费用，并将所有其他以此法放逐的牌置于你的牌库底。付一得二！构筑一副60张的套牌，充分发挥倾曳优势，迎接对手挑战！

Events/Event_Desc_StressTest_Constructed.oracleText: A special event for our July 20 stress test, this event awards cards as you earn up to seven wins, and even packs at higher win counts. A loss will end your progress, but you don't need gold or gems to play to join again! Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_StressTest_Constructed.translation: 7月20日压力测试特别活动。参赛牌手会随着胜场数的增加而赢得牌张奖励（至多七胜），取得较高胜场的牌手更能赢得补充包。一旦落败便会前功尽废，但不需付出金币或宝石便可重新参赛！所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_THB_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_THB_Comp_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行三盘两胜制的对局，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_THB_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_THB_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_THB_Quick_Draft.oracleText:
Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_THB_Quick_Draft.translation:
每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_Taste_ELD.oracleText: Explore the Realm and the Wilds of Eldraine! We'll provide the decks for you to get a quick taste of the new set.
Events/Event_Desc_Taste_ELD.translation: Explore the Realm and the Wilds of Eldraine! We'll provide the decks for you to get a quick taste of the new set.

Events/Event_Desc_Test_Artisan.oracleText: Construct your deck using only common and uncommon cards, then win as many games as you can!
Events/Event_Desc_Test_Artisan.translation: 仅使用普通卡和非凡卡构建你的套牌，然后尽可能多地赢得比赛！

Events/Event_Desc_Test_ExtraLife2019.oracleText: In this event, players start at 21 life and all creatures get an extra point of toughness.
Events/Event_Desc_Test_ExtraLife2019.translation: In this event, players start at 21 life and all creatures get an extra point of toughness.

Events/Event_Desc_Test_OkosMadness.oracleText: Both players start with a deck of basic lands. Click the emblem on the left side of the battlefield, pay one mana, and discard a card to get a creature token, but that trickster, Oko, is...turning everyone into elks? Huh?
Events/Event_Desc_Test_OkosMadness.translation: 两位牌手都从一副基本地牌开始。点击战场左侧的徽记，支付一点法术力，弃掉一张牌，得到一个衍生生物，但那个骗子瓯柯，正在……把所有人都变成麋鹿？嗯？

Events/Event_Desc_Test_PlaytestLeagueFin.oracleText: This is the final event of the MTG Arena Playtest League! You can play up to 5 games of Standard, regardless of your record.  Join the event only once.
Events/Event_Desc_Test_PlaytestLeagueFin.translation: 这是MTGA游戏测试联赛的最后一场比赛! 无论你的战绩如何，你最多可以玩5场标准赛。只能参加一次活动。

Events/Event_Desc_Timeless_Challenge.oracleText: Bring your Timeless deck and play best-of-three matches! You'll receive rewards based on how many matches you win.
Events/Event_Desc_Timeless_Challenge.translation: 使用你事先组好的永恒赛制套牌，不断进行三局两胜对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Timeless_Ladder.oracleText: Timeless uses every card on MTG Arena. Results will affect your constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Timeless_Ladder.translation: 永恒赛制可以使用所有存在于MTGA上的牌张。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Timeless_Traditional_L.oracleText: Timeless uses every card on MTG Arena. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding. Results will affect your constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Timeless_Traditional_L.translation: 永恒赛制可以使用所有存在于MTGA上的牌张。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_AFR.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fourteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_AFR.translation: 你将获得6个14张的补充包。 这些牌会加入你的收藏。 你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_BRO.oracleText: You'll receive 6 The Brothers' War packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Soldiers Gather your Soldiers and overwhelm your opponent on the ground and in the skies. Draw Power Draw a multitude of cards from your deck to keep the knowledge flowing and strengthen your creatures at the same time! Artifact Sacrifice Fuel the fight by sacrificing artifacts. Powerstones rev your engines and can later be sacrificed for more power! Don't forget artifacts with unearth can be sacrificed twice! Mechanized Stompy Use Powerstones to deploy your biggest threats quickly. Back them up with power-boosting spells to dominate every fight! Artifacts Enter the Battlefield Assemble your crew of creatures that are enhanced when artifacts enter the battlefield, then use Powerstones, Soldier tokens, and unearthed creatures to power up your attacks. Scrappy Swarm Deploy your army early, but don't be afraid to fill the graveyard. Creatures with mana value three or less offer more than you might expect, alive or dead. Prowess Aggro Round up a squad of inventors and wizards that can utilize cheap artifacts, instants, and sorcery spells to press their advantage. Graveyard Counter In an endless war, your creatures that rely on a populated graveyard will be pleased as their power increases well into the late game. Unearth Aggro Start your aggression early, and the second wave that comes back with Unearth may just be the last you need. Powerstone Ramp Accumulate Powerstones to help build your defenses, and soon no one will stand a chance against your colossal army of colossuses.
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_BRO.translation: You'll receive 6 The Brothers' War packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Soldiers Gather your Soldiers and overwhelm your opponent on the ground and in the skies. Draw Power Draw a multitude of cards from your deck to keep the knowledge flowing and strengthen your creatures at the same time! Artifact Sacrifice Fuel the fight by sacrificing artifacts. Powerstones rev your engines and can later be sacrificed for more power! Don't forget artifacts with unearth can be sacrificed twice! Mechanized Stompy Use Powerstones to deploy your biggest threats quickly. Back them up with power-boosting spells to dominate every fight! Artifacts Enter the Battlefield Assemble your crew of creatures that are enhanced when artifacts enter the battlefield, then use Powerstones, Soldier tokens, and unearthed creatures to power up your attacks. Scrappy Swarm Deploy your army early, but don't be afraid to fill the graveyard. Creatures with mana value three or less offer more than you might expect, alive or dead. Prowess Aggro Round up a squad of inventors and wizards that can utilize cheap artifacts, instants, and sorcery spells to press their advantage. Graveyard Counter In an endless war, your creatures that rely on a populated graveyard will be pleased as their power increases well into the late game. Unearth Aggro Start your aggression early, and the second wave that comes back with Unearth may just be the last you need. Powerstone Ramp Accumulate Powerstones to help build your defenses, and soon no one will stand a chance against your colossal army of colossuses.

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_DAR.oracleText: This set is only legal in Historic and Explorer. You'll receive 6 Dominaria packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_DAR.translation: 此系列仅在史迹和探险中合法。 你将获得6个多明纳里亚的补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_DMU.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Dominaria United packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Fliers Tempo Hold your ground with tokens and defensive instants and sorceries, all while attacking from the air. Control Develop a long-term advantage with card draw and creature removal spells, then go after your opponent directly in the late game. Reckless Aggro Throw caution to the wind and assault your opponent, clearing a path with creature removal spells or by simply trading your creatures for theirs. Domain Stompy Rule the board by attacking with the largest creatures on the battlefield, boosted by the domain mechanic. Domain Tokens Assemble a massive army of creatures and tokens, then dominate the mid-game with the domain mechanic. Creature Sacrifice Ruthlessly sacrifice your small creatures or tokens for profit, then bring creatures back from the graveyard to overwhelm your opponent. Spells Aggro Cast instant and sorcery spells to bolster aggressive creatures and clear a path to victory. Domain Midrange Get maximum value out of your cards with huge creatures, bringing cards back from the graveyard, and domain rewards. Tokens Aggro Go wide with an aggressive army of small creatures and tokens, punching through your opponent's defenses with spells and effects that boost your whole team. Kicker Ramp Build up your mana to get additional value from kicking your spells. Splash in some other colors to take advantage of powerful multicolor cards and the domain mechanic.
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_DMU.translation: 你将收到6包多明纳里亚：众志成城补充包卡牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行Bo3对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 飞行节奏 用衍生物和防御性的瞬间和法术进行地面防御，同时从空中进行攻击。 控制 利用抓牌和生物移除咒语形成长期优势，然后在游戏后期直接追击你的对手。 无情快攻 将谨慎抛诸脑后，直接攻击你的对手，用生物移除咒语扫清道路，或者简单地用你的生物交换他们的生物。 领土风暴 通过使用战场上最大的生物进行攻击，在领土机制的推动下，统治棋盘。 领土衍生物 组建一支庞大的生物和衍生物大军，然后用领土机制主宰游戏中期。 生物牺牲 无情地牺牲你的小生物或衍生物以获得收益，然后将生物从坟墓场带回来压倒你的对手。 法术快攻释放瞬间和法术咒语来振励好斗异能生物，并扫清通往胜利的道路。 领土中速 使用巨大的生物让你的牌发挥最大价值，将牌从坟墓场中带回，并获得领土的加成效果。 衍生物快攻 使用由小生物和衍生物组成的侵略性大军，用可以提升整个团队的咒语和效应来突破对手的防御。 增幅暴费 使用增幅类咒语获得额外法术力建立优势，加上一些其它颜色卡牌以更好利用多色和领土优势。

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_HBG.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Flicker your creatures in and out of play to produce as many triggers as possible! Control the battlefield and sneak in creatures to deal damage to your opponent. The real treasure will be the treasure you make along the way. DRAGONS! The best offense is a good defense? Gain life so you can lower theirs! Earn bonuses every time your creatures leave the battlefield. MORE DRAGONS! What's dead may never die... but may live again? Prepare for trouble! Use the new Double Team mechanic to cast creatures with the same name. EVEN MORE DRAGONS!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_HBG.translation: You'll receive 6 Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate packs. Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_KHM.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fifteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_KHM.translation: 你将获得6个15张的补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_KTK.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Khans of Tarkir packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Abzan Counters Each creature you add to your army makes the others stronger. Use Outlast to buff your creatures and overrun your opponent! Jeskai Spellcast Redirect your opponent and use their own overextension against them. Cast spells to play tricks and make powerful threats out of your small creatures. Sultai Graveyard Get ahead of the curve by stocking your graveyard and recycling it into large creatures and impactful spells. The cycle of life and death is as inevitable as your victory! Mardu Warriors Ride with the Horde and go aggro! Attack to trigger your Raid bonuses and buff all your creatures to finish your opponent in one shot. Temur Behemoths Overwhelm your opponent with huge creatures hiding just out of sight. Plus, your ferocious beasts enhance your other spells to stomp all over the enemy.

Cast spells to play tricks and make powerful threats out of your small creatures. Sultai Graveyard Get ahead of the curve by stocking your graveyard and recycling it into large creatures and impactful spells. The cycle of life and death is as inevitable as your victory! Temur Behemoths Overwhelm your opponent with huge creatures hiding just out of sight. Plus, your ferocious beasts enhance your other spells to stomp all over the enemy.

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_LCI.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Lost Caverns of Ixalan packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Oltec Ingenuity Buy time with blockers, removal, and lifegain while you assemble an array of wondrous artifacts to take over the late game. Echoes of the Dead Set up to block while you fill your graveyard, then drag your opponent into the deep end with high-cost creatures, card draw, and recursive threats. Going Down! Keep your creatures growing by attacking viciously to make your opponent block or throwing permanents into the graveyard yourself. Then keep them down with creature removal. Dinosaurs of the Sun Empire Summon gigantic dinosaurs to crush the opposition, supporting them with ways to make more mana or break through blockers.   Malamet Tactics Keep the pressure on with low-cost creatures. When your opponent tries to set up a defense, it's time to pounce by powering up your forces. Dusk Legion Pilgrimage Sacrifice little creatures and artifacts for the glory of Aclazotz (and additional resources). Once you smell blood, seal their fate with a few larger creatures. Pirates' Plunder Set sail with a rowdy crew and their haul of Equipment and Treasure. When those landlubbers try to stop you, fly over the top or throw their blockers overboard. Fungal Festering Muck up the battlefield with sticky creatures while you fill your graveyard. Once you've descended enough to power your side up, start grinding your way through the opposing blockers. Thousand-Moon Legion Launch your military campaign with lots of small creatures and artifacts, then tactically tap those resources to activate your forces and rout the invaders. River Herald Expedition Go exploring to stock your side with lands and powerful creatures, then sink your extra mana into activated abilities and card draw to drown the opposition in value.
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_LCI.translation: 你将获得6包依夏兰迷窟补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑一套40张的套牌。进行bo3对局并基于你的胜场获得奖励！ 欧尔特克智谋 通过阻挡者、去除和生命回复拖延时间，借机集结神器大军在游戏后期出奇制胜。 亡者回响 设防阻挡并借机填坟，再通过高费生物、抽牌手段和无尽威胁将对手拖入深渊。 给我倒下！ 通过猛烈地进攻迫使对手阻挡或自己将永久物扔入坟场让你的生物逐步膨胀，再不断使用去除击倒对手的生物。 烈阳帝国恐龙大军 召唤巨型恐龙压垮对手并通过产出更多法术力或突破阻挡者的手段支援它们。 豹族计策 通过低费生物持续制造压力。对手试图构筑防线之时即是你膨胀军队猛扑之际。 暮影军团朝圣 牺牲小生物和神器来重现阿洛佐兹的荣光（并获取额外资源）。一旦你闻到敌人的鲜血，用更强大的生物了结他们的性命。 海盗劫掠 带领一批残暴的船员和他们抢来的武器和财宝扬帆启航。当那些航海菜鸟试图挡你去路时，飞过他们头顶或直接把他们的阻挡者扔下海。 真菌溃烂 将黏糊糊的生物铺满战场并借机填坟。一旦你已落坟足够多次以强大你的阵线，那就开始逐步蚕食突破对手的阻挡者吧。 千月军团 通过大量小生物和神器开展你的军事行动，然后策略性地横置那些资源以激活你的军队并击溃入侵者。 川流使探险队 进行勘察为你的阵线积累土地和强大生物，然后将你额外的法术力投入起动式异能和抓牌来赚取价值淹没对手。

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_LTR.oracleText: You'll receive 6 The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! "Draw Two" Humans Defend the citadel ! Drawing two cards every turn will ensure you never run out of reinforcements. Amass Control Grow a massive Orc Army , then wield Saruman's mighty suite of spells to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Amass Aggro The forces of Mordor will rush out of your hands and through the enemy's defenses with this aggressive strategy, sacrificing themselves for the glory of Sauron. Power Matters The wilds of Middle-earth™ are home to many of its strongest denizens, such as Ents, Trolls, and the noble Rangers. Use them to overwhelm your opponent with great numbers. Food Never underestimate a Hobbit! This low-to-the-ground aggressive deck uses Food tokens for a lot more than the occasional second-refreshment. Tokens From earthen Treasures to soaring Spirits and everything in-between, this strategy revolves around going wide and eventually overwhelming the opponent. Spells Draw on the knowledge and magic of Middle-earth's most powerful Wizards to cast a stream of increasingly impressive instants and sorceries. Sacrifice Repurpose and recycle your creatures to summon a frightening assortment of terrors, including the Nazgûl and their Fell Beasts. Go-Wide Humans Answer the call and charge into battle! These Humans combine to create a force capable of slicing through any foe. Scry Elvish magic offers you a glimpse at many possible futures. Choose wisely and you'll find victory waiting at the top of your deck.
