Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_MID.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fourteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_MID.translation: 你将获得6个14张的补充包。 这些牌会加入你的收藏。 你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_MOM.oracleText: You'll receive 6 March of the Machine packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Knights Knights have assembled from around the multiverse! Keeping a steady supply of these gallant creatures will help press your advantage each turn. Graveyard Mill everyone. Your forces will improve with more strategies and greater power as each graveyard fills. Sacrifice Desperate times call for desperate measures. Sacrifice your artifacts and creatures to pave a path to victory. Battles Get ready to liberate your favorite plane from the Phyrexians! Prioritize Battles, Magic's newest card type, and smash through opposing defenses to save the day. +1/+1 Counters It's time to buff up! Arm your creatures with +1/+1 counters to outclass the opposition. Phyrexian Looking to play the villain? Seek out Phyrexians of all sorts to take advantage of them and their swarms of little hatching Incubator tokens. Convoke Your creatures are here to help withstand the invasion. Build an army early and they'll help you cast powerful spells with convoke. Incubate Go big and generate tons of mana to play bigger creatures and incubate larger tokens. Backup Find a good partner and tag-team those Phyrexians. Use the backup mechanic to find the right combination of abilities to build toward your victory each turn. Transform Life is always more fun with some change. Take your cards to the next level by winning battles and turning Incubator tokens and creatures into their Phyrexian selves.

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_NEO.oracleText: You'll receive 6 15-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_NEO.translation: 你将获得6个15张的补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_ONE.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Phyrexia: All Will Be One packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Artifacts Phyrexia is filled with glorious artifacts. Gather as many of these artifacts as you can to outmaneuver your opponent. Proliferate Control Use proliferate to spread the glory of Phyrexia—oil counters, poison counters, and loyalty counters are all ready to be proliferated. Oil Counters & Sacrifice All Phyrexians are valuable, even (and sometimes especially) in death. Use your creatures and artifacts to generate oil counters when they die. Oil Counters Midrange The more things with oil counters you have, the merrier. Use these oil counters to get the biggest, smashiest creatures you can. Toxic Aggro Take advantage of small toxic creatures, especially Mite tokens, to swarm your opponent. Corrupted Give your opponent three or more poison counters, then your corrupted cards become even more powerful. Oil Counters & Noncreature Spells Build up your oil counters and overwhelm your opponent by casting a variety of artifacts, enchantments, instants, sorceries, and yes, even planeswalkers! Poison Victory You have the biggest baddest creature with toxic. Use them to get your opponent to 10 poison counters. For Mirrodin! Equipment Someone's got to fight against the Phyrexians! Your rebels can use equipment to stave them off! Proliferate & Poison Two great tastes that go great together. Use green creatures with toxic to deal out serious poison counters, then proliferate to finish the job.

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_SIRa.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! This Week's Shadows of the Past: Creature Type Terror! Click Here to Learn More about the rotating Shadows of the Past in Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered Limited Events! Haunting Spirits Establish a ghostly presence as you take to the skies with Spirits and other unlikely allies. Relentless Zombies Destroy enemy creatures with removal spells, reload your hand with card draw, and march on with a horde of Zombies. Vampire Madness Your vampire army helps you to discard cards, cast spells for their madness costs, and secure victory. The key is striking the right balance between discard outlets and madness cards. Wolves Attack Transform your Werewolves with a combination of instants and activated abilities. Your outsized creatures will overrun your opponents in no time. Super-Humans Stack up Auras and Equipment on your Humans to swing in for the kill with your larger-than-life creatures. Valuable Sacrifice Expendable resources are everywhere in white-black. Sacrifice creatures and pay life liberally for value. Spell Science Noncreature spells perform double duty here if you pick up enough creatures that reward you for playing them. Graveyard Shift Stock your graveyard to get extra value from powerful delirium cards. Your deck will just need a wide variety of card types to turn it on. Righteous Fury Run down your opponent with cheap, powerful threats and well-timed combat tricks. Let's Investigate Play defense while you build up a supply of Clues. You'll soon learn enough to overwhelm your opponent with card advantage and large monsters.

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_SNC.oracleText: You'll receive 6 Streets of New Capenna packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! The Five Families The Obscura: Craft the perfect draws and use superior intelligence over a long game to engineer a route to victory. Use the family's connive mechanic to draw, then discard - giving your creatures +1/+1 counters along the way! The Maestros: Hire expendable underlings as your family's muscle on the streets. Then use the casualty mechanic to sacrifice those minions, copy your spells, and blast your opponent. The Riveteers: The Riveteers rumble with large creatures. Give your creatures haste with the blitz mechanic, then sacrifice them at the end of your turn to draw a card. Keep that pressure up! Then press your advantage to crush your opponents. The Cabaretti: Flood the board with tokens and small creatures to overwhelm the opposition. The family knows how to collaborate for greater gain: alliance abilities give you additional effects whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control. The Brokers: The Brokers are always ready to take down your opponents one notch at a time. Attack relentlessly to deal small amounts of damage, and mount an impenetrable defense - legal or otherwise! - by amassing shield counters on your creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_SNC.translation: You'll receive 6 Streets of New Capenna packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! The Five Families The Obscura: Craft the perfect draws and use superior intelligence over a long game to engineer a route to victory. Use the family's connive mechanic to draw, then discard - giving your creatures +1/+1 counters along the way! The Maestros: Hire expendable underlings as your family's muscle on the streets. Then use the casualty mechanic to sacrifice those minions, copy your spells, and blast your opponent. The Riveteers: The Riveteers rumble with large creatures. Give your creatures haste with the blitz mechanic, then sacrifice them at the end of your turn to draw a card. Keep that pressure up! Then press your advantage to crush your opponents. The Cabaretti: Flood the board with tokens and small creatures to overwhelm the opposition. The family knows how to collaborate for greater gain: alliance abilities give you additional effects whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control. The Brokers: The Brokers are always ready to take down your opponents one notch at a time. Attack relentlessly to deal small amounts of damage, and mount an impenetrable defense - legal or otherwise! - by amassing shield counters on your creatures.

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_STX.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fifteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_STX.translation: 你将获得6个15张的补充包。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_VOW.oracleText: You'll receive 6 fourteen-card packs. The cards will be added to your collection and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_VOW.translation: 你将获得6个14张的补充包。 这些牌会加入你的收藏。 你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。 你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_WOE.oracleText: The Frost Queen Control the flow of combat by tapping your opponent's creatures and taking to the sky with fliers. Enchanting Slumber Assemble a team of flying Faeries and support them with tricky spells and creature removal to win the long game. The Dark Piper Create a massive number of Rat tokens to swarm past your opponent's defenses. Be aggressive and take advantage of cards that reward you for your attackers trading off in combat. Ruby and the Wolf Call forth what lurks in the wilderness of Eldraine , summoning high-powered creatures or enhancing your small creatures with Roles and combat tricks. Armont and the Beasts Gather an army of creatures and get bonuses for enchanting them with Roles and other Auras, then go all-out when you have the upper hand. Pale as Snow Make use of the bargain and Role mechanics and get rewarded for your creatures and enchantments going to the graveyard.   The Magician's Misstep Go aggressive or be more controlling with a flurry of bewitching instants and sorceries to keep your opponent off balance. Greta, Witch Hunter Creature removal and life gain will help stave off your opponent's attacks until you're able to command the board with big creatures and Food rewards. Brawl at the Grand Ball Enhance your creatures with Roles and take advantage of the celebration mechanic with low-mana aggressive creatures and spells. The Kingdom of Storms Use defensive creatures and spells to buy time while you build up your lands. Reward yourself by casting spells that cost five mana or more to dominate the late game.
Events/Event_Desc_Trad_Sealed_WOE.translation: 冰霜女王通过横置对手的生物和带领飞行大军遨游天际掌控战斗的走向。 迷人醉眠集结一队飞行仙灵并辅以诡计咒语和生物去除来赢得长盘胜利。 黑暗笛手派出潮水般的老鼠衍生物淹没对手的防线。保持激进并善用卡牌让你从进攻生物的战斗交换中获得回报。 小红玉与恶狼召唤强大的高攻生物或利用角色灵气和战斗诡计增强弱小生物，从中唤醒潜藏在艾卓幻野的神秘力量。 娅蒙与野兽集结一队生物大军并通过结附角色及其他灵气获益。当你取得场面优势时全力进攻。 苍白如雪充分利用加码和角色机制让你的生物和结界进入坟墓场时给予回报。 魔术师的失策激进地进攻或走控制：通过施放法术和瞬间搅乱战场让对手场面失衡。 女巫猎人格蕾特在生物去除和生命回复的帮助下拖延对手的进攻直到你能够通过强大生物和食品回报掌控战场。 堂皇舞宴喧闹用角色灵气增强你的生物并通过低费进攻生物和咒语来善加利用欢庆机制。 风暴王国使用防御性生物和咒语为你积累足够地牌拖延时间，最终通过施放5费及以上咒语获取回报接管游戏后期。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Alchemy_Ev.oracleText: Bring your Alchemy deck with a sideboard, play some best-of-three matches, and receive rewards based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Alchemy_Ev.translation: 用你的炼金赛制套牌（包含备牌），进行三局两胜对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Alchemy_La.oracleText: Alchemy uses cards from recent sets with additional balance changes. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding. Results will affect your Constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Alchemy_La.translation: 炼金赛制使用最近发售系列的卡牌，并有额外平衡性调整。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Alchemy_Pl.oracleText: Alchemy uses cards from recent sets with additional balance changes. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Alchemy_Pl.translation: 炼金赛制使用最近发售系列的卡牌，并有额外平衡性调整。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Cons_Event.oracleText: Bring your Standard deck with a sideboard, play some best-of-three matches, and receive rewards based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Cons_Event.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌（包含备牌），不断进行对局，最后根据胜局数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Explorer_E.oracleText: Bring your Explorer deck with a sideboard, play some best-of-three matches, and receive rewards based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Explorer_E.translation: 使用你事先组好的探险赛制套牌（包含备牌），不断进行三局两胜对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Explorer_L.oracleText: Explorer uses cards from Standard sets dating back to October 2012. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding. Results will affect your Constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Explorer_L.translation: 探险赛制使用2012年10月以来进入过标准模式的卡牌。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Explorer_P.oracleText: Explorer uses cards from Standard sets dating back to October 2012. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Explorer_P.translation: 探险赛制使用2012年10月以来进入过标准模式的卡牌。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Historic_E.oracleText: Bring your Historic deck with a sideboard, play some best-of-three matches, and receive rewards based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Historic_E.translation: 使用你事先组好的史迹赛制套牌（包含备牌），不断进行三局两胜对战，最后根据胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Historic_L.oracleText: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding. Results will affect your constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Historic_L.translation: 使用MTGA上线以来的精选列表牌张进行游戏。。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Historic_P.oracleText: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Historic_P.translation: 使用MTGA上线以来的精选列表牌张进行游戏。。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Ladder.oracleText: Standard uses cards only from recent sets. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding. Results will affect your Constructed rank.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Ladder.translation: 标准赛制只使用最近发售的几个系列的卡牌。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。对局结果会影响你的构筑赛段位。

Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Play.oracleText: Standard uses cards only from recent sets. Play a best-2-out-of-3 match with sideboarding.
Events/Event_Desc_Traditional_Play.translation: 标准模式只使用最近发售的几个系列的卡牌。进行三局两胜制，有备牌局的对战。

Events/Event_Desc_Treasure.oracleText: Bring your constructed deck and play games, with a twist! At the beginning of each of your turns, you'll get a Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color. Accelerate by one mana each turn, or save them up to cast an expensive spell in half the time! You'll receive prizes based on your number of wins. Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Treasure.translation: 使用事先组好的套牌进行游戏，但这次有些不一样！在你的每个回合开始时，你会获得一个珍宝衍生物，牺牲它可以产生一点任意颜色的法术力。你可以每回合都用它来加速一点法术力，也可以把它们都留起来提前施放大型咒语！你会根据你的胜场数量获得奖励。所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_Treasure_Constructed.oracleText:
Play Treasure Contructed, win card style rewards! In Standard Treasure, at the beginning of each of your upkeeps, you create an artifact Treasure token which you can sacrifice for a mana of any color. The following cards are banned in this format:

<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xR"> Blood Aspirant
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG"> Woodland Champion
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xW"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xU"> Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xB"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xR"> Mayhem Devil
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xB"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xR"><sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xG"> Korvold, Fae-Cursed King
<sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="xC"> Karn, the Great Creator
Events/Event_Desc_Treasure_Constructed.translation: 参加「珍宝构筑」，赢取卡牌样式奖励！于「珍宝构筑」中，在你的每个维持开始时，你都会派出一个能够牺牲来产生一点任意颜色法术力的珍宝衍生神器。这也是万智牌竞技场中第一个奖励卡牌样式的赛事！赢得至少一胜，便可获得遏制倒彩的卡牌样式。如果你取得五胜，便可再获得化学师的洞察之卡牌样式。每张卡牌样式只能获得一次，但不限使用张数～你收藏中的同画卡牌均可应用。

Events/Event_Desc_Turbo_Draft.oracleText:
In Turbo Draft, draft three packs and keep the cards you draft, but with a twist: Each spell costs <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x5"> less!

Note: This cost reduction will not affect the colored mana required to cast a card, and it does not apply to activated abilities.

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_Turbo_Draft.translation: 在疾速轮抽中，轮抽三包并保留你轮抽的牌，但有一点不同：每个咒语的花费 更少！ 注意：此费用减少不会影响施放一张牌所需的有色法术力，也不适用于起动式异能。 人机轮抽 - 与AI机器人轮抽对抗，无需等待，也无需选择计时器

Events/Event_Desc_TwiceTheLife.oracleText: Bring a deck that doesn't depend on dealing 20 damage fast, because in this event players start at 40 life!
Events/Event_Desc_TwiceTheLife.translation: 暂时忘记那些靠快速消耗对手20点生命致胜的套牌吧，本赛事中牌手的起始总生命为40！

Events/Event_Desc_Twitchcon_Day9.oracleText: We're giving Constructed new house rules with Day[9] (twitch.tv/day9tv). Day[9] has always had a burning displeasure for counters and tricks. So together we created INSTA-BAN, where you bring a 60-card deck with zero instant-speed spells in it. That's right, all instants and cards with flash are banned from this event!
Events/Event_Desc_Twitchcon_Day9.translation: 我们与Day[9]（twitch.tv/day9tv）一道，为构筑赛事拟定全新自订规则。Day[9]无比憎恨反击和诡计。所以我们特别推出「无瞬间」。在此玩法中，你依然要组一副60张的套牌，但里面一张瞬间速度的咒语都不能有。没错，本赛事中禁用所有瞬间和具闪现异能的牌！

Events/Event_Desc_Twitchcon_Gaby.oracleText: We're giving Draft new house rules with Gaby Spartz (twitch.tv/gabyspartz). Gaby loves drafting and building ambitious decks. So together we are running a GREEDY DOMINARIA DRAFT. Draft 3 packs of Dominaria around a few unique rules in this game of Magic. Everyone can play two lands per turn, starts with 9 cards, and has no maximum hand size.
Events/Event_Desc_Twitchcon_Gaby.translation: 我们与Gaby Spartz（twitch.tv/gabyspartz）一道，为轮抽赛事拟定全新自订规则。Gaby喜欢在轮抽中抽选和构筑另类套牌。所以我们隆重推出「贪婪多明纳里亚轮抽」。牌手还是利用3包多明纳里亚补充包进行轮抽，但随后进行的万智牌游戏会有些特殊规则生效。所有人每回合都能使用两个地，以9张手牌起手，没有手牌上限。

Events/Event_Desc_UnbrokenBlade.oracleText: May your courage never waver. May your service never falter. May your blade never break. The way of the samurai can be lonely and unforgiving, but we're providing some much-appreciated assistance: whenever you attack with only one creature, they'll get a +1/+1 edge to help them out. Use this to gain the upper hand for your 60-card Singleton deck, and at the end of your run, you'll earn Samurai card styles from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty for your collection. There are 12 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available to those who prove worthy, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_UnbrokenBlade.translation: May your courage never waver. May your service never falter. May your blade never break. The way of the samurai can be lonely and unforgiving，but we're providing some much-appreciated assistance: 每当你用一个生物单独攻击，它们获得+1/+1 . 利用这个来为你的 60张 单张套牌获得优势，每轮完成时，你将获得来自 神河：霓朝纪 武士卡牌样式到你的收藏中. 总共有 12 种样式收集 ! For more details on this format，including a full list of card styles available to those who prove worthy，click here.

Events/Event_Desc_VOW_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_VOW_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers

每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_Valentines_2019.oracleText: Come spend the weekend with a Singleton event hosted by Day[9] and Danny Trejo. No entry fee! Create a deck with only one copy of any card in it (other than basic lands). Get to at least one win for an alternate art copy of Duress. Get to five wins for an alternate art copy of Ghalta, Primal Hunger.
Events/Event_Desc_Valentines_2019.translation: 以由Day[9]和Danny Trejo举办的无双赛事欢度周末春光。无需报名费！构筑一副套牌，但需注意每种牌仅限使用一张（基本地除外）。赢得至少一胜即可获得一张全新插画的逼从。赢得五胜即可获得一张全新插画的始饥戈厄塔。

Events/Event_Desc_WAR_Comp_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating 14-card draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a  40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win!
Events/Event_Desc_WAR_Comp_Draft.translation: 14张牌的轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。你所选择的牌张会加入你的收藏，且你会用你抽到的这些牌加上基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌参赛。不断进行三盘两胜制的对局，最后根据你的胜局数量赢得奖励！

Brawl at the Grand Ball Enhance your creatures with Roles and take advantage of the celebration mechanic with low-mana aggressive creatures and spells. The Kingdom of Storms Use defensive creatures and spells to buy time while you build up your lands. Reward yourself by casting spells that cost five mana or more to dominate the late game.
Events/Event_Desc_WOE_Premier_Draft.translation: 从传递中的轮抽补充包中一次选一张牌。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑一套40张的套牌。进行游戏并基于你的胜场获得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 冰霜女王通过横置对手的生物和带领飞行大军遨游天际掌控战斗的走向。 迷人醉眠集结一队飞行仙灵并辅以诡计咒语和生物去除来赢得长盘胜利。 黑暗笛手派出潮水般的老鼠衍生物淹没对手的防线。保持激进并善用卡牌让你从进攻生物的战斗交换中获得回报。 小红玉与恶狼召唤强大的高攻生物或利用角色灵气和战斗诡计增强弱小生物，从中唤醒潜藏在艾卓幻野的神秘力量。 娅蒙与野兽集结一队生物大军并通过结附角色及其他灵气获益。当你取得场面优势时全力进攻。 苍白如雪充分利用加码和角色机制让你的生物和结界进入坟墓场时给予回报。 魔术师的失策激进地进攻或走控制：通过施放法术和瞬间搅乱战场让对手场面失衡。 女巫猎人格蕾特在生物去除和生命回复的帮助下拖延对手的进攻直到你能够通过强大生物和食品回报掌控战场。 堂皇舞宴喧闹用角色灵气增强你的生物并通过低费进攻生物和咒语来善加利用欢庆机制。 风暴王国使用防御性生物和咒语为你积累足够地牌拖延时间，最终通过施放5费及以上咒语获取回报接管游戏后期。

Events/Event_Desc_WOE_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers The Frost Queen Control the flow of combat by tapping your opponent's creatures and taking to the sky with fliers. Enchanting Slumber Assemble a team of flying Faeries and support them with tricky spells and creature removal to win the long game. The Dark Piper Create a massive number of Rat tokens to swarm past your opponent's defenses. Be aggressive and take advantage of cards that reward you for your attackers trading off in combat. Ruby and the Wolf Call forth what lurks in the wilderness of Eldraine , summoning high-powered creatures or enhancing your small creatures with Roles and combat tricks. Armont and the Beasts Gather an army of creatures and get bonuses for enchanting them with Roles and other Auras, then go all-out when you have the upper hand. Pale as Snow Make use of the bargain and Role mechanics and get rewarded for your creatures and enchantments going to the graveyard.   The Magician's Misstep Go aggressive or be more controlling with a flurry of bewitching instants and sorceries to keep your opponent off balance. Greta, Witch Hunter Creature removal and life gain will help stave off your opponent's attacks until you're able to command the board with big creatures and Food rewards. Brawl at the Grand Ball Enhance your creatures with Roles and take advantage of the celebration mechanic with low-mana aggressive creatures and spells. The Kingdom of Storms Use defensive creatures and spells to buy time while you build up your lands. Reward yourself by casting spells that cost five mana or more to dominate the late game.

Events/Event_Desc_WOE_Trad_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players The Frost Queen Control the flow of combat by tapping your opponent's creatures and taking to the sky with fliers. Events/Event_Desc_WOE_Trad_Draft.translation: 从传递中的轮抽补充包中一次选一张牌。这些牌会加入你的收藏。你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑一套40张的套牌。进行bo3对局并基于你的胜场获得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 冰霜女王通过横置对手的生物和带领飞行大军遨游天际掌控战斗的走向。 迷人醉眠集结一队飞行仙灵并辅以诡计咒语和生物去除来赢得长盘胜利。 黑暗笛手派出潮水般的老鼠衍生物淹没对手的防线。保持激进并善用卡牌让你从进攻生物的战斗交换中获得回报。 小红玉与恶狼召唤强大的高攻生物或利用角色灵气和战斗诡计增强弱小生物，从中唤醒潜藏在艾卓幻野的神秘力量。 娅蒙与野兽集结一队生物大军并通过结附角色及其他灵气获益。当你取得场面优势时全力进攻。 苍白如雪充分利用加码和角色机制让你的生物和结界进入坟墓场时给予回报。 魔术师的失策激进地进攻或走控制：通过施放法术和瞬间搅乱战场让对手场面失衡。 女巫猎人格蕾特在生物去除和生命回复的帮助下拖延对手的进攻直到你能够通过强大生物和食品回报掌控战场。 堂皇舞宴喧闹用角色灵气增强你的生物并通过低费进攻生物和咒语来善加利用欢庆机制。 风暴王国使用防御性生物和咒语为你积累足够地牌拖延时间，最终通过施放5费及以上咒语获取回报接管游戏后期。

Events/Event_Desc_WeddingCrashers.oracleText: It's the biggest wedding of the season, and everyone who's anyone will be in attendance. This is no time to stay on the sidelines! It's time to mix it up and celebrate these new bonds of matrimony! Even if you're not technically on the invite list, you can still make your way inside and enjoy the festivities, the scintillating company, and, of course, the dinner service. Word is, it's all simply to die for. Bring a 60-card Standard deck with no more than three of any card other than basic lands - and then make sure your cards find their partners before the ushers find you, because whenever you cast a spell that has a match in your battlefield or graveyard, you'll collect two Blood tokens. When you finally get tossed from the premises, you'll receive Fang card styles from Innistrad: Crimson Vow for the new friends you made along the way. There are 19 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available at the wedding, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_WeddingCrashers.translation: It's the biggest wedding of the season, and everyone who's anyone will be in attendance. This is no time to stay on the sidelines! It's time to mix it up and celebrate these new bonds of matrimony! Even if you're not technically on the invite list, you can still make your way inside and enjoy the festivities, the scintillating company, and, of course, the dinner service. Word is, it's all simply to die for. Bring a 60-card Standard deck with no more than three of any card other than basic lands - and then make sure your cards find their partners before the ushers find you, because whenever you cast a spell that has a match in your battlefield or graveyard, you'll collect two Blood tokens. When you finally get tossed from the premises, you'll receive Fang card styles from Innistrad: Crimson Vow for the new friends you made along the way. There are 19 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available at the wedding, click here.

Events/Event_Desc_Welcome_Weekend_Single.oracleText: Welcome to the MTG Arena Open Beta! To celebrate, we're running a Singleton event where players can only have one copy of a card in their decks (other than basic lands). No gold or gems are required to join, and you have the opportunity to win card rewards based on your wins! Each uncommon card reward can get upgraded to a rare or mythic (15%).
Events/Event_Desc_Welcome_Weekend_Single.translation: 欢迎加入万智牌竞技场公开测试！我们正在举办无双赛事以示庆贺！无双赛正如其名，牌手的套牌中同名牌只能有一张（基本地除外）参加比赛无需支付金币或宝石，且有机会根据胜场数量赢取牌张奖励！所得之非凡牌奖励都有机会升级为稀有或秘稀牌（15%）。

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Artisan.oracleText: "One should never consider themselves disadvantaged by a lesser or uncommon tool. You should be able to find victory when using even the most incomplete materials. To tell you the truth, it's sometimes this challenge that's the most enjoyable part! Try out these Artisan decks and I'll show you why you shouldn't be so eager to cast the common or uncommon options aside." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Artisan.translation: “永远不要认为自己被一种次要或不常见的工具置于不利地位。即使使用最不完整的材料，你也应该能够找到胜利。说实话，有时候这个挑战才是最有趣的部分！试试这些银铁套牌，我会告诉你为什么不应该如此急切地放弃普通或非凡选项。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Brawl.oracleText: "These decks were crafted around either a legendary creature or planeswalker who will serve as your commander. Don't worry - like any good commander they're resilient. If your first choice doesn't work for you, you can always change your selection. You can cause all the trouble you want with these until the dust settles and the event comes to a close." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Brawl.translation: “这些套牌是围绕将担任你指挥官的传奇生物或鹏洛客制作的。别担心——就像任何优秀的指挥官一样，他们有韧性。如果你的第一选择不适合你，你可以随时更改你的选择。你可以用这些来制造你想要的所有麻烦，直到尘埃落定，赛事结束。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Draft_IKO.oracleText: "I'm of the belief that there's nothing wrong with standing on the shoulders of those who have come before us, and these draft decks are a perfect example of that! These Ikoria: Lair of Behemoth's draft decks have already proven themselves worthy and act as an example of what a commendable draft deck should look like." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Draft_IKO.translation: “我相信站在前人的肩膀上并没有错，而这些轮抽套牌就是一个完美的例子！这些 依克黎：巨兽时空的轮抽套牌已经证明了自己的价值，并作为值得称道的轮抽套牌的典范。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Draft_THB.oracleText: "I'm of the belief that there's nothing wrong with standing on the shoulders of those who have come before us, and these draft decks are a perfect example of that! These Theros Beyond Death draft decks have already proven themselves worthy and act as an example of what a commendable draft deck should look like." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Draft_THB.translation: “我相信站在前人的肩膀上并没有错，而这些轮抽套牌就是一个完美的例子！这些 塞洛斯：冥途求生的轮抽套牌已经证明了自己的价值，并作为值得称道的轮抽套牌的典范。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_GuildBattle.oracleText: "There are certain elements that are drawn to each other and then there are others that oppose - sometimes violently. What you're about to walk into is that volatile situation and I've prepared some options that will help you stand your ground. There exists a synergy between the cards you have in your hand, but they will react fiercely against the opponent." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_GuildBattle.translation: “某些元素相互吸引，而另一些元素则相互反对——有时是暴力的。你将要面对的是动荡的局势，我已经准备了一些选项来帮助你站稳脚跟。你手中的牌之间存在协同作用，但它们会对对手做出激烈的反应。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Historic.oracleText: " These may have seen their share of conflicts, but the scars of battle show that you fought, and most importantly, survived. There are times when you need those who have stood the test of time at your side, so I put these away in safe keeping for such a time as this. If you'll only wipe away the dust, I assure you - you'll wipe that smile off your opponent's face." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Historic.translation: “这些可能已经看到了他们的冲突，但战斗的伤疤表明你战斗过，最重要的是，你活下来了。有时候，你需要那些经受住时间考验的人在你身边，所以我把它们妥善保管，以备不时之需。如果你只需擦去灰尘，我向你保证--你会把这种笑容从你的对手脸上擦掉。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_HistoricPaupe.oracleText: "In this Pauper event, these decks bring together well-known warriors of the past, who are only common in name and not in might. Great things can be achieved through this collective action when focused and aimed in the right direction." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_HistoricPaupe.translation: “在这次全铁赛事中，这些套牌汇集了过去著名的战士，他们只是名存实亡，实力不济。通过这种集体行动，只要重点突出，方向正确，就能取得伟大的成就。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Mastermind.oracleText: "You'll only get stronger if you keep bearing heavier loads, so I'll be honest with you - this one is going to require you to stay focused and to think critically. I'm sending you out with no lands, but instead I want you to discard a card in exchange for a land token that will make any color of mana. Get creative and get wins!" - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Mastermind.translation: “只有不断承受更重的负荷，你才会变得更强壮，所以我跟你说实话--这一次需要你保持专注，并进行批判性思考。我派你出去时没有地，但我希望你弃掉一张牌，以换取一个可以产生任何颜色法术力的地衍生物。发挥创意并获得胜利！” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_NoCardLimit.oracleText: This might sound mad, but I removed the maximum count restriction from these. Use them wisely, as this will certainly require a different strategy than you might be used to. However, if you can take advantage of these effectively, well...there is great power in numbers after all. - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_NoCardLimit.translation: “这听起来可能很疯狂，但我取消了这些东西的最大数量限制。明智地使用它们，因为这肯定需要一个与你可能习惯的不同的策略。但是，如果你可以有效地利用这些优势，那么……毕竟人数众多。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_OffMeta.oracleText: "So, you're itching to try something a little different, eh? Well I've got just the thing for you! You won't find the decks everyone else is playing, but that doesn't mean that they don't still pack a serious punch! If you want to have some fun and experiment with some cards that are, let's say 'off the beaten path,' then give these a go!" - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_OffMeta.translation: “那么，你渴望尝试一些不同的东西，是吗？那么，我为你准备了合适的东西！你不会发现其他人都在玩的套牌，但这并不意味着它们不具备严重的冲击力！如果你想找点乐子，并尝试使用一些牌，比方说"不走寻常路"，那就试试这些卡牌吧！” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Staircase.oracleText: "In life there's never a shortage of the unremarkable, but often you need to climb the proverbial mountain to set your eyes upon the extraordinary. While maybe not as profound, these decks reflect that sentiment in regards to their rarity counts. Specifically there will be a single copy of any mythic card, two copies of a rare, three of uncommon, and four of any common." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_Staircase.translation: “生活中从不缺少平凡，但往往你需要爬上众所周知的山，才能看到非凡。虽然可能没有那么深刻，但这些套牌在稀有性方面反映了这种情绪。具体来说，将有一张任意秘稀牌的副本、两张稀有牌、三张非凡牌和四张普通牌。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_TasteOfIkoria.oracleText: "Heading out to unfamiliar new lands for the first time can be equal parts exciting and unnerving. To help prepare you for some of the things you'll encounter, I've put together a bit of a sampler, or test run of sorts, of what you can expect from this plane. Give them all a try and you'll come out the other side significantly more prepared for the real thing." - Feldon
Events/Event_Desc_Workshop_TasteOfIkoria.translation: “第一次前往陌生的新土地可能既令人兴奋又令人不安。为了帮助你为你将遇到的一些事情做好准备，我已经把你可以从时空期待获取的东西放在一起，或者说是试运行。试一试，你会为真正的事情做好充分的准备。” - 费顿

Events/Event_Desc_Worlds_2020.oracleText: The Magic World Championship XXVI is happening this weekend on MTG Arena! Tune in to live event coverage and see which of the 16 incredible competitors will win the title of World Champion and their share of the $1,000,000 prize pool. Join the fun and #FindYourChampion by selecting a Worlds competitor! We'll provide decks for use during this event. Matches are best-of-one, and you can swap decks between games.
Events/Event_Desc_Worlds_2020.translation: The Magic World Championship XXVI is happening this weekend on MTG Arena! Tune in to live event coverage and see which of the 16 incredible competitors will win the title of World Champion and their share of the $1,000,000 prize pool. Join the fun and #FindYourChampion by selecting a Worlds competitor! We'll provide decks for use during this event. Matches are best-of-one, and you can swap decks between games.

Events/Event_Desc_Worlds_2021.oracleText: The Magic World Championship XXVII is happening this weekend on MTG Arena! Tune in to live event coverage and follow these 16 incredible competitors as they fight for the title of World Champion! Join in on the fun by selecting a Worlds competitor and taking their deck for a spin. See if you have what it takes to play with the best of the best! Matches are best-of-one, and you can swap decks as much as you want.
Events/Event_Desc_Worlds_2021.translation: The Magic World Championship XXVII is happening this weekend on MTG Arena! Tune in to live event coverage and follow these 16 incredible competitors as they fight for the title of World Champion! Join in on the fun by selecting a Worlds competitor and taking their deck for a spin. See if you have what it takes to play with the best of the best! Matches are best-of-one, and you can swap decks as much as you want.

Events/Event_Desc_XLN_Quick_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!
Events/Event_Desc_XLN_Quick_Draft.translation: 轮抽用补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！

Events/Event_Desc_Y22SNC_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs that include cards from the latest Alchemy release. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players The Five Families The Obscura: Craft the perfect draws and use superior intelligence over a long game to engineer a route to victory. Use the family's connive mechanic to draw, then discard - giving your creatures +1/+1 counters along the way! The Maestros: Hire expendable underlings as your family's muscle on the streets. Then use the casualty mechanic to sacrifice those minions, copy your spells, and blast your opponent. The Riveteers: The Riveteers rumble with large creatures. Give your creatures haste with the blitz mechanic, then sacrifice them at the end of your turn to draw a card. Keep that pressure up! Then press your advantage to crush your opponents. The Cabaretti: Flood the board with tokens and small creatures to overwhelm the opposition. The family knows how to collaborate for greater gain: alliance abilities give you additional effects whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control. The Brokers: The Brokers are always ready to take down your opponents one notch at a time. Attack relentlessly to deal small amounts of damage, and mount an impenetrable defense - legal or otherwise! - by amassing shield counters on your creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_Y22SNC_Premier_Draft.translation: 轮抽用炼金补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 五大家族 秘闻帮：在漫长的比赛中制作完美的平局并使用卓越的智慧来设计通往胜利的路线。使用家族的筹谋机制来抓牌，然后弃牌——在你的生物上放置 +1/+1 指示物! 绝艺盟: 雇佣可消耗的下属作为你的家族在街头的力量。然后利用催命机制来牺牲这些小兵，复制你的咒语，并轰击你的对手。 勤工联: 铆工们用大型生物轰鸣。用急袭机制给你的生物以敏捷异能，然后在你的回合结束时牺牲它们来抽一张牌。保持这种压力! 然后发挥你的优势，击溃你的对手。 乐舞会: 用指示物和小生物铺满桌面以压制对手。家族知道如何合作以获得更大的收益：每当另一个生物在你的控制下进入战场，联手异能附加额外效应。 扶济社: 扶济社总是有所准备，将对手层层击溃。无情攻击造成少量伤害，但建立坚不可摧的防御 - 合法或其他！ - 通过在你的生物上积累后盾指示物。

Events/Event_Desc_Y23BRO_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs that include cards from the latest Alchemy release. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Soldiers Gather your Soldiers and overwhelm your opponent on the ground and in the skies. Draw Power Draw a multitude of cards from your deck to keep the knowledge flowing and strengthen your creatures at the same time! Artifact Sacrifice Fuel the fight by sacrificing artifacts. Powerstones rev your engines and can later be sacrificed for more power! Don't forget artifacts with unearth can be sacrificed twice! Mechanized Stompy Use Powerstones to deploy your biggest threats quickly. Back them up with power-boosting spells to dominate every fight! Artifacts Enter the Battlefield Assemble your crew of creatures that are enhanced when artifacts enter the battlefield, then use Powerstones, Soldier tokens, and unearthed creatures to power up your attacks. Scrappy Swarm Deploy your army early, but don't be afraid to fill the graveyard. Creatures with mana value three or less offer more than you might expect, alive or dead. Prowess Aggro Round up a squad of inventors and wizards that can utilize cheap artifacts, instants, and sorcery spells to press their advantage. Graveyard Counter In an endless war, your creatures that rely on a populated graveyard will be pleased as their power increases well into the late game. Unearth Aggro Start your aggression early, and the second wave that comes back with Unearth may just be the last you need. Powerstone Ramp Accumulate Powerstones to help build your defenses, and soon no one will stand a chance against your colossal army of colossuses.

Events/Event_Desc_Y23DMU_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs that include cards from the latest Alchemy release. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Fliers Tempo Hold your ground with tokens and defensive instants and sorceries, all while attacking from the air. Control Develop a long-term advantage with card draw and creature removal spells, then go after your opponent directly in the late game. Reckless Aggro Throw caution to the wind and assault your opponent, clearing a path with creature removal spells or by simply trading your creatures for theirs. Domain Stompy Rule the board by attacking with the largest creatures on the battlefield, boosted by the domain mechanic. Domain Tokens Assemble a massive army of creatures and tokens, then dominate the mid-game with the domain mechanic. Creature Sacrifice Ruthlessly sacrifice your small creatures or tokens for profit, then bring creatures back from the graveyard to overwhelm your opponent. Spells Aggro Cast instant and sorcery spells to bolster aggressive creatures and clear a path to victory. Domain Midrange Get maximum value out of your cards with huge creatures, bringing cards back from the graveyard, and domain rewards. Tokens Aggro Go wide with an aggressive army of small creatures and tokens, punching through your opponent's defenses with spells and effects that boost your whole team. Kicker Ramp Build up your mana to get additional value from kicking your spells. Splash in some other colors to take advantage of powerful multicolor cards and the domain mechanic.
Events/Event_Desc_Y23DMU_Premier_Draft.translation: 轮抽用炼金补充包在桌上轮转，你每次需从中选择一张牌。这些牌张将加入你的收藏，而你将使用它们和基本地来构筑一副40张的套牌。不断进行对战，最后根据你的胜场数量赢得奖励！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽 飞行节奏 用衍生物和防御性的瞬间和法术进行地面防御，同时从空中进行攻击。 控制 利用抓牌和生物移除咒语形成长期优势，然后在游戏后期直接追击你的对手。 无情快攻 将谨慎抛诸脑后，直接攻击你的对手，用生物移除咒语扫清道路，或者简单地用你的生物交换他们的生物。 领土风暴 通过使用战场上最大的生物进行攻击，在领土机制的推动下，统治棋盘。 领土衍生物 组建一支庞大的生物和衍生物大军，然后用领土机制主宰游戏中期。 生物牺牲 无情地牺牲你的小生物或衍生物以获得收益，然后将生物从坟墓场带回来压倒你的对手。 法术快攻释放瞬间和法术咒语来振励好斗异能生物，并扫清通往胜利的道路。 领土中速 使用巨大的生物让你的牌发挥最大价值，将牌从坟墓场中带回，并获得领土的加成效果。 衍生物快攻 使用由小生物和衍生物组成的侵略性大军，用可以提升整个团队的咒语和效应来突破对手的防御。 增幅暴费 使用增幅类咒语获得额外法术力建立优势，加上一些其它颜色卡牌以更好利用多色和领土优势。

Events/Event_Desc_Y23ONE_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs that include cards from the latest Alchemy release. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Artifacts Phyrexia is filled with glorious artifacts. Gather as many of these artifacts as you can to outmaneuver your opponent. Proliferate Control Use proliferate to spread the glory of Phyrexia—oil counters, poison counters, and loyalty counters are all ready to be proliferated. Oil Counters & Sacrifice All Phyrexians are valuable, even (and sometimes especially) in death. Use your creatures and artifacts to generate oil counters when they die. Oil Counters Midrange The more things with oil counters you have, the merrier. Use these oil counters to get the biggest, smashiest creatures you can. Toxic Aggro Take advantage of small toxic creatures, especially Mite tokens, to swarm your opponent. Corrupted Give your opponent three or more poison counters, then your corrupted cards become even more powerful. Oil Counters & Noncreature Spells Build up your oil counters and overwhelm your opponent by casting a variety of artifacts, enchantments, instants, sorceries, and yes, even planeswalkers! Poison Victory You have the biggest baddest creature with toxic. Use them to get your opponent to 10 poison counters. For Mirrodin! Equipment Someone's got to fight against the Phyrexians! Your rebels can use equipment to stave them off! Proliferate & Poison Two great tastes that go great together. Use green creatures with toxic to deal out serious poison counters, then proliferate to finish the job.

Events/Event_Desc_Y24LCI_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs that include cards from the latest Alchemy release. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players Oltec Ingenuity Buy time with blockers, removal, and lifegain while you assemble an array of wondrous artifacts to take over the late game. Echoes of the Dead Set up to block while you fill your graveyard, then drag your opponent into the deep end with high-cost creatures, card draw, and recursive threats. Going Down! Keep your creatures growing by attacking viciously to make your opponent block or throwing permanents into the graveyard yourself. Then keep them down with creature removal. Dinosaurs of the Sun Empire Summon gigantic dinosaurs to crush the opposition, supporting them with ways to make more mana or break through blockers. Malamet Tactics Keep the pressure on with low-cost creatures. When your opponent tries to set up a defense, it's time to pounce by powering up your forces. Dusk Legion Pilgrimage Sacrifice little creatures and artifacts for the glory of Aclazotz (and additional resources). Once you smell blood, seal their fate with a few larger creatures. Pirates' Plunder Set sail with a rowdy crew and their haul of Equipment and Treasure. When those landlubbers try to stop you, fly over the top or throw their blockers overboard. Fungal Festering Muck up the battlefield with sticky creatures while you fill your graveyard. Once you've descended enough to power your side up, start grinding your way through the opposing blockers. Thousand-Moon Legion Launch your military campaign with lots of small creatures and artifacts, then tactically tap those resources to activate your forces and rout the invaders. River Herald Expedition Go exploring to stock your side with lands and powerful creatures, then sink your extra mana into activated abilities and card draw to drown the opposition in value.

Events/Event_Desc_Y24WOE_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs that include cards from the latest Alchemy release. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players The Frost Queen Control the flow of combat by tapping your opponent's creatures and taking to the sky with fliers. Enchanting Slumber Assemble a team of flying Faeries and support them with tricky spells and creature removal to win the long game. The Dark Piper Create a massive number of Rat tokens to swarm past your opponent's defenses. Be aggressive and take advantage of cards that reward you for your attackers trading off in combat. Ruby and the Wolf Call forth what lurks in the wilderness of Eldraine , summoning high-powered creatures or enhancing your small creatures with Roles and combat tricks. Armont and the Beasts Gather an army of creatures and get bonuses for enchanting them with Roles and other Auras, then go all-out when you have the upper hand. Pale as Snow Make use of the bargain and Role mechanics and get rewarded for your creatures and enchantments going to the graveyard. The Magician's Misstep Go aggressive or be more controlling with a flurry of bewitching instants and sorceries to keep your opponent off balance. Greta, Witch Hunter Creature removal and life gain will help stave off your opponent's attacks until you're able to command the board with big creatures and Food rewards. Brawl at the Grand Ball Enhance your creatures with Roles and take advantage of the celebration mechanic with low-mana aggressive creatures and spells. The Kingdom of Storms Use defensive creatures and spells to buy time while you build up your lands. Reward yourself by casting spells that cost five mana or more to dominate the late game.

Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2020.oracleText:
When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body. Today, we celebrate that spirit, everyone's pal, Yargle!

We asked Yargle how best to celebrate, and here's how we interpreted its gurgles and shrieks:
- Yargle makes the rules! Yargle has provided decks for everyone to use, and we've even cleaned most of the slime off of them.
- Yargle is the center of attention! Yargle is the only non-common card allowed, and you'll have plenty of extras so you won't run out.
- Yargle is special! Yargle will be faster to get into the fight, so nobody has to have fun alone.

Join us for a rip-roaring good time with a spirit of a frog which ate a maggot that was actually a transformed lieutenant of a demon. Happy Yargle Day, everyone!
Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2020.translation:
贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。今天，我们庆祝这种精神，每个人的朋友，雅骨尔！

我们询问了雅骨尔如何最好地庆祝，以下是我们如何解释它的咯咯声和尖叫声：
- 雅骨尔制定了规则! 雅骨尔提供了套牌供大家使用，我们甚至已经把套牌上的大部分粘液清理干净了。
- 雅骨尔是关注的焦点! 雅骨尔是唯一允许使用的非普通卡，你会有大量的额外卡，所以你不会用完。
- 雅骨尔很特别! 雅骨尔会更快地进入战斗，所以没有人必须独自享受乐趣。

加入我们的行列，与一只吃了蛆的青蛙精怪一起度过一段撕心裂肺的美好时光，这只青蛙实际上是一个恶魔的变身副官。各位，雅骨尔日快乐！

Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2021.oracleText:
When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body. Today, we celebrate that spirit, everyone's pal, Yargle!

This year, Yargle has invited several friends who share its interests and general lopsidedness, and everyone's squaring off in a Historic Brawl showdown. Of course, it's Yargle's day, so the rules might be a little lopsided to boot, but who's counting? Choose your favorite champion and celebrate in style! Happy Yargle Day, everyone!
Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2021.translation:
贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。今天，我们庆祝这种精神，每个人的朋友，雅骨尔！

今年，雅骨尔邀请了几个与它志趣相投的朋友，大家在史迹争锋中对决。当然，今天是雅骨尔的节日，所以规则可能有点一边倒，但谁又能说得清呢？选择你最喜欢的冠军，有风格地庆祝吧！各位，雅骨尔日快乐!

Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2022.oracleText:
When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body. Today, we celebrate that spirit, everyone's pal, Yargle!

This year, Yargle is looking to broaden its horizons, to branch out and learn some new skills. And what's the best way to learn? By eating, of course! Feed Yargle or one of its froggy brethren a choice morsel, and that Frog will gain all of its meal's abilities. Delicious and educational! Happy Yargle Day, everyone!

贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。

今天，我们庆祝这种精神，每个人的朋友，雅骨尔！

在他这一年，雅骨尔正在寻求拓宽视野，拓展业务并学习一些新技能。什么是最好的学习方式？当然是吃！给雅骨尔或它的一个青蛙兄弟喂食精选的食物，那只青蛙就会获得所有食物的能力。既美味又有教育意义! 各位，雅骨尔日快乐!

Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2023.oracleText:
When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body. Today, we celebrate that spirit, everyone's pal, Yargle!

This year, Yargle is looking to broaden its horizons, to branch out and learn some new skills. And what's the best way to learn? By eating, of course! Feed Yargle or one of its froggy brethren a choice morsel, and that Frog will gain all of its meal's abilities. Delicious and educational! Happy Yargle Day, everyone!
Events/Event_Desc_Yargle_Day_2023.translation:
贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。今天，我们庆祝这种精神，每个人的朋友，雅骨尔！

在他这一年，雅骨尔正在寻求拓宽视野，拓展业务并学习一些新技能。什么是最好的学习方式？当然是吃！给雅骨尔或它的一个青蛙兄弟喂食精选的食物，那只青蛙就会获得所有食物的能力。既美味又有教育意义! 各位，雅骨尔日快乐!

Events/Event_Desc_YawningPortal.oracleText: "Welcome to the Yawning Portal, finest tavern in Waterdeep! You look like you've come to try your luck down the Well, right? I hope you've come ready, for your sake." At the center of this boisterous tavern is a 40-foot-wide, seemingly bottomless stone-rimmed well. It leads to the treacherous dungeon of Undermountain, for those bold enough to make the descent. You step up and grip the rope, wondering what you will face down below... Bring a 60-card Singleton deck that's ready to explore: when you cast two spells during a turn, you'll venture into the dungeon. At the end of your run, you'll receive rulebook card styles from Adventures in the Forgotten Realms as loot. There are 27 styles to collect! For more details on this format, including a full list of card styles available to find in the dungeon, click here.
Events/Event_Desc_YawningPortal.translation: “欢迎来到打呵欠之门，深水城最好的酒馆！你看起来是来井下试试运气的，对吧？我希望你已经准备好了，为你着想。” 在这个喧闹的小酒馆的中心是一口40英尺宽、看似无底的石缘井。对于那些胆大妄为的人来说，它通向地脉迷城的危险地城。你站起来抓住绳子，想知道你会在下面面对什么...... 带上60张无双套牌探索吧：当你在一个回合中施放两个咒语时，你将深入地城。在你的旅程结束时，你会从被遗忘国度战记 获得规则书卡牌样式作为战利品。有 27 种款式可供收藏！ 有关此赛制的更多详细信息，包括可在地牢中找到的卡牌样式的完整列表，请单击此处。

Events/Event_Desc_ZNR_Premier_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_ZNR_Premier_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场! 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_ZNR_Quick_Draft.oracleText:
Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play games and receive prizes based on how many games you win!

Bot Draft - Draft against AI with no waiting & no pick timers
Events/Event_Desc_ZNR_Quick_Draft.translation:
每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌开始游戏。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场!

人机轮抽～与AI进行轮抽，无需等待，也不限制选牌时间

Events/Event_Desc_ZNR_Trad_Draft.oracleText: Select one card at a time from rotating draft packs. The cards will be added to your collection, and you'll use them plus basic lands to build a 40-card deck. Play best-of-three-game matches and receive prizes based on how many matches you win! Player Draft - A timed draft with 7 other players
Events/Event_Desc_ZNR_Trad_Draft.translation: 每次从传过来的轮抽卡包中选一张牌，这些牌会加入你的收藏，你将使用这些牌加上基本地来构筑40张的套牌进行bo3对战。你将得到的奖励取决于你的胜场！ 真人轮抽～和其他七位玩家共同进行的限时轮抽

Events/Event_Desc_black01.oracleText: Green often ramps-up into big spells by using creatures that can tap for mana.
Events/Event_Desc_black01.translation: 绿色经常通过横置产费的生物来加速法术力获取，从而提前使用大咒语。

Events/Event_Desc_black02.oracleText: White often uses cards that gain life combined with synergistic abilities.
Events/Event_Desc_black02.translation: 白色经常将获得生命以及在获得生命时会得到额外增益的牌张组合在一起使用。

Events/Event_Desc_black03.oracleText: Red often relies on instants to surprise their opponents when they least expect it.
Events/Event_Desc_black03.translation: 红色经常依靠瞬间(牌)出其不意地打断对手的节奏。

Events/Event_Desc_black04.oracleText: Blue often uses flying creatures to sail past blockers.
Events/Event_Desc_black04.translation: 蓝色经常使用飞行生物绕过阻挡者。

Events/Event_Desc_black05.oracleText: Play against another player using the Black deck, win or lose, to complete this Color Challenge. No one knows who it will be.
Events/Event_Desc_black05.translation: 使用黑色套牌与另一位玩家对战，无论输赢，完成此颜色挑战。没有人知道对手会是谁。

Events/Event_Desc_blue01.oracleText: Some Black creatures have effects when they die.
Events/Event_Desc_blue01.translation: 一些黑色生物在死亡时会产生效果。

Events/Event_Desc_blue02.oracleText: Creatures with the 'reach' keyword can block creatures with flying. You will have to find another way around them.
Events/Event_Desc_blue02.translation: 具有“延势”关键字的生物可以阻挡具有“飞行”异能的生物。你将不得不找到另一种方法来绕过它们。

Events/Event_Desc_blue03.oracleText: Creatures with double strike deal damage once before other creatures in combat, then they also deal normal damage.
Events/Event_Desc_blue03.translation: 具有“连击”关键字的生物在战斗中，先于其他生物之前造成一次伤害，然后它们再造成一次正常伤害。

Events/Event_Desc_blue04.oracleText: Red sometimes gains rewards for using instants and sorceries.
Events/Event_Desc_blue04.translation: 红色有时会因使用瞬间和法术而获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_blue05.oracleText: Play against another player using the Blue deck, win or lose, to complete this Color Challenge. No one knows who it will be.
Events/Event_Desc_blue05.translation: 使用蓝色套牌与另一位玩家对战，无论输赢，完成此颜色挑战。没有人知道对手会是谁。

Events/Event_Desc_green01.oracleText: White often uses many small creatures to overwhelm their opponent.
Events/Event_Desc_green01.translation: 白色经常使用许多小生物来压倒他们的对手。

Events/Event_Desc_green02.oracleText: Red sometimes gains rewards for using instants and sorceries.
Events/Event_Desc_green02.translation: 红色有时会因使用瞬间和法术而获得奖励。

Events/Event_Desc_green03.oracleText: Blue often combines good blockers with flying creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_green03.translation: 蓝色经常将优秀的阻挡者与飞行生物结合起来。

Events/Event_Desc_green04.oracleText: Any amount of damage a source with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.
Events/Event_Desc_green04.translation: 具有死触异能的来源对生物造成任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。

Events/Event_Desc_green05.oracleText: Play against another player using the Green deck, win or lose, to complete this Color Challenge. No one knows who it will be.
Events/Event_Desc_green05.translation: 使用绿色套牌与另一位玩家对战，无论输赢，完成此颜色挑战。没有人知道对手会是谁。

Events/Event_Desc_red01.oracleText: Blue often combines good blockers with flying creatures.
Events/Event_Desc_red01.translation: 蓝色经常将优秀的阻挡者与飞行生物结合起来。

Events/Event_Desc_red02.oracleText: Black sometimes spends extra resources for deadlier spells.
Events/Event_Desc_red02.translation: 黑色有时会为更致命的咒语花费额外的资源。

Events/Event_Desc_red03.oracleText: Green often ramps-up into big spells by using creatures that can tap for mana.
Events/Event_Desc_red03.translation: 绿色经常通过横置产费的生物来加速法术力获取，从而提前使用大咒语。

Events/Event_Desc_red04.oracleText: Creatures with double strike deal damage twice in combat. They deal first strike damage and normal damage too.
Events/Event_Desc_red04.translation: 具有“连击”关键字的生物在战斗中，先于其他生物之前造成一次伤害，然后它们再造成一次正常伤害。

Events/Event_Desc_red05.oracleText: Play against another player using the Red deck, win or lose, to complete this Color Challenge. No one knows who it will be.
Events/Event_Desc_red05.translation: 使用红色套牌与另一位玩家对战，无论输赢，完成此颜色挑战。没有人知道对手会是谁。

Events/Event_Desc_white01.oracleText: Red often uses many small creatures to overwhelm their opponent.
Events/Event_Desc_white01.translation: 红色经常使用许多小生物来压倒他们的对手。

Events/Event_Desc_white02.oracleText: Black often benefits from sending creatures to the graveyard.
Events/Event_Desc_white02.translation: 黑色通常会因将生物送入坟墓场而受益。

Events/Event_Desc_white03.oracleText: Blue uses creatures with flying to avoid blockers.
Events/Event_Desc_white03.translation: 蓝色经常使用飞行生物绕过阻挡者。

Events/Event_Desc_white04.oracleText: Green creatures are often bigger than the rest. You'll need to use spells and abilities to beat them.
Events/Event_Desc_white04.translation: 绿色生物通常比其他生物“大”。你需要使用咒语和异能来击败它们。

Events/Event_Desc_white05.oracleText: Play against another player using the White deck, win or lose, to complete this Color Challenge. No one knows who it will be.
Events/Event_Desc_white05.translation: 使用白色套牌与另一位玩家对战，无论输赢，完成此颜色挑战。没有人知道对手会是谁。

Events/Event_NonStandardDraft_Note.oracleText: Important Note: Cards in this draft are not playable in Standard
Events/Event_NonStandardDraft_Note.translation: 重要消息：此轮抽中的卡牌无法在标准赛制使用。

Events/Event_Preview_Desc_black.oracleText: Beautiful, cunning, and ambitious to a fault, Liliana has mastered the dark art of necromancy. Her spells reanimate the dead and corrupt the living.
Events/Event_Preview_Desc_black.translation: 美丽，狡猾，而充满野心的莉莲娜，擅长运用暗黑魔法死灵术。她的咒语能够操弄亡者，腐化生灵。

Events/Event_Preview_Desc_blue.oracleText: Jace is a master of mental magic: spells of illusion, deception, and mind reading. His powers allow him to manipulate enemies by countering their magic or using their spells against them.
Events/Event_Preview_Desc_blue.translation: 杰斯擅长心灵魔法：幻影、欺瞒，以及读取心灵的咒语。他的力量让他能反击敌对法师的魔法，或以其道反治其身。

Events/Event_Preview_Desc_green.oracleText: Vivien's homeworld was deeply divided between the forest dwellers and an advanced civilization that encircled the dwindling woodlands; she belonged to the Smaragdi, sworn to protect the forest.
Events/Event_Preview_Desc_green.translation: 薇薇安的家园时空有着鲜明的族群对立～栖居深林的原始住民与侵蚀自然土地之先进文明一直冲突不断；碧玉族誓死保卫林地家园，而薇薇安正是其中一员。

Events/Event_Preview_Desc_red.oracleText: There is no virtue in subtlety, at least not as far as Chandra is concerned. She's a confident, ardent, defiant Planeswalker whose specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.
Events/Event_Preview_Desc_red.translation: 缜密没什么好处～至少茜卓纳拉从不挂心这点。她是一名自信满盈，热情似火，桀骜不驯的鹏洛客，她的专长就是烈焰：火焰咒语，火焰，以及更猛的火焰。

Events/Event_Preview_Desc_white.oracleText: Ajani is torn between his leonin ferocity and his sense of justice. Born on Naya, and an outcast within his own family, an albino leonin never accepted by the rest of his pride.
Events/Event_Preview_Desc_white.translation: 金鬃阿耶尼正为狮族天生的凶猛与自己的正义感间的拉锯而烦恼着。他出生于纳雅，却因为是白狮而无法被狮群所接受，遭自己的族类驱逐。

Events/Event_Title_MWM_Cascade_Alchemy_D.oracleText:
Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena!

This week's event is Cascade Alchemy: The first time you cast a spell each turn, you'll get to cast another, less expensive card from your library without paying its mana cost. What a bargain! All you'll need to play is a 60-card Alchemy deck.

Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-midweek-magic?utm_medium=product&utm_source=arena>HERE</link></u>.
Events/Event_Title_MWM_Cascade_Alchemy_D.translation:
Welcome to Midweek Magic! Each week, try out a different way to play MTG Arena!

This week's event is Cascade Alchemy: The first time you cast a spell each turn, you'll get to cast another, less expensive card from your library without paying its mana cost. What a bargain! All you'll need to play is a 60-card Alchemy deck.

Find out more details about this and upcoming Midweek Magic events <u><link=https://magic.wizards.com/mtga-midweek-magic?utm_medium=product&utm_source=arena>HERE</link></u>.

MOTD/Set_Prerelease_Event_Live_Text.translation: [set name]特别售前赛进行中，请留意赛事部分！

MOTD/Set_Prerelease_Event_Tomorrow_Text.oracleText: Check back tomorrow for a special Prerelease event for [set name]! Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/Set_Prerelease_Event_Tomorrow_Text.translation: 明天会有[set name]特别售前赛，到时再回来！欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Later_Today_Text.oracleText: Check back later today for a special Release event for [set name]! Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Later_Today_Text.translation: 天稍后会有[set name]特别发售赛，待会再回来！欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Later_Today_Title.translation: 今天稍后有特别发售赛！

MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Live_Text.oracleText: Check out our events section now for a special Release event for [set name]!
MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Live_Text.translation: [set name]特别发售赛进行中，请留意赛事部分！

MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Tomorrow_Text.oracleText: Check back tomorrow for a special Release event for [set name]! Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/Set_Release_Event_Tomorrow_Text.translation: 明天会有[set name]特别发售赛，到时再回来！欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

MOTD/System_Client_Restart_Text.oracleText: We have released an important update. We recommend restarting your client at your earliest convenience.
MOTD/System_Client_Restart_Text.translation: 已发布重要更新。建议尽快重新启动客户端。

MOTD/System_Constructed_Disabled_Text.oracleText: We have temporarily disabled all Constructed events while we investigate issues with our system. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Constructed_Disabled_Text.translation: 由于需要对系统问题进行调查，现已暂时停止所有构筑赛事。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Constructed_Restored_Text.oracleText: We have restored the ability to play Constructed events. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service.
MOTD/System_Constructed_Restored_Text.translation: 现已能重新参加构筑赛事。如果你在游戏过程仍遇到问题，请联系客户服务。

MOTD/System_Draft_Disabled_Text.oracleText: We have temporarily disabled Draft events while we investigate issues with our system. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Draft_Disabled_Text.translation: 由于需要对系统问题进行调查，现已暂时停止所有轮抽赛事。请访问 https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Draft_Restored_Text.oracleText: We have restored the ability to play Draft events. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service.
MOTD/System_Draft_Restored_Text.translation: 现已能重新参加轮抽赛事。如果你在游戏过程仍遇到问题，请联系客户服务。

MOTD/System_EmergencyMaintenance_Text.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for emergency downtime shortly. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_EmergencyMaintenance_Text.translation: 我们即将关闭游戏服务器以进行紧急维护。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Event_Refund_Text.oracleText: Due to technical difficulties during a recent event, we will be proactively returning event entries where appropriate. Please allow up to 7 days for the return to be applied. Thank you for your patience.
MOTD/System_Event_Refund_Text.translation: 由于最近一场赛事遇到技术问题，我们将主动向相关牌手退回报名费。所退报名费至多需要7天才会出现在你的收藏当中。在此感谢你的耐心等候。

MOTD/System_Investigating_Text.oracleText: Hello, MTG Arena players! Thank you for your patience while we investigate issues currently impacting the game. Please join us on https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for updates.
MOTD/System_Investigating_Text.translation: 各位MTG竞技场的牌手，你好！现在系统出现故障，无法正常进行游戏。我们正在努力调查问题原因，在此期间感谢各位的耐心等待。请时刻关注https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io了解最新进展。

MOTD/System_Limited_Disabled_Text.oracleText: We have temporarily disabled all Limited events while we investigate issues with our system. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Limited_Disabled_Text.translation: 由于需要对系统问题进行调查，现已暂时停止所有限制赛事。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Limited_Disabled_Title.translation: 现开赛和轮抽赛已关闭

MOTD/System_Limited_Restored_Text.oracleText: We have restored the ability to play Limited events. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service.
MOTD/System_Limited_Restored_Text.translation: 现已能重新参加限制赛事。如果你在游戏过程仍遇到问题，请联系客户服务。

MOTD/System_Maintenance_Today_Text.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled downtime today. You may experience issues with the game and/or downtime. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Maintenance_Today_Text.translation: 我们将在今天关闭游戏服务器进行例行维护。届时你在游戏中可能会遇到问题，甚至出现无法连接服务器的情况。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Maintenance_Tomorrow_Text.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled downtime tomorrow. You may experience issues with the game and/or downtime. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Maintenance_Tomorrow_Text.translation: 我们将在明天关闭游戏服务器进行例行维护。届时你在游戏中可能会遇到问题，甚至出现无法连接服务器的情况。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Patch_Text.oracleText: We have successfully patched the issues we were experiencing. Thank you for your patience!
MOTD/System_Patch_Text.translation: 我们已成功修复先前发生的问题。感谢各位的耐心等待！

MOTD/System_Sealed_Disabled_Text.oracleText: We have temporarily disabled Sealed events while we investigate issues with our system. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Sealed_Disabled_Text.translation: 由于需要对系统问题进行调查，现已暂时停止所有现开赛事。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Sealed_Restored_Text.oracleText: We have restored the ability to play Sealed events. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service.
MOTD/System_Sealed_Restored_Text.translation: 现已能重新参加现开赛事。如果你在游戏过程仍遇到问题，请联系客户服务。

MOTD/System_Store_Down_Text.oracleText: We have temporarily disabled store purchases while we investigate issues with our e-commerce system. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
MOTD/System_Store_Down_Text.translation: 由于需要对电商系统问题进行调查，现已暂时停止商店购物。请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io以了解更多信息。

MOTD/System_Store_Restored_Text.oracleText: We have restored the ability to make store purchases. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service.
MOTD/System_Store_Restored_Text.translation: 现已能在商店进行购物。如果你在购买过程仍遇到问题，请联系客户服务。

MainNav/DeckFormat/AdventuresintheForgot.oracleText: Adventures in the Forgotten Realms Constructed

MainNav/DeckFormat/DominariaUnited.translation: 多明纳里亚：众志成城构筑

MainNav/DeckFormat/LTR.oracleText: The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth Constructed

MainNav/DeckFormat/LTRAlt.oracleText: The Lord of the Rings Constructed

MainNav/DeckFormat/LTRBrawl.oracleText: The Lord of The Rings Brawl

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Alchemy.oracleText: Play with cards from the last two years, including digital-only cards and rebalanced cards!
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Alchemy.translation: 使用最近两年的牌张，包含大量极度不平衡的牌张且能随意改牌不给与任何补偿的赛制！

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Brawl.oracleText: Build a singleton deck of recent cards centered around your Commander: A legendary creature or planeswalker!
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Brawl.translation: 构筑一套以你的指挥官为核心的每张非基本地牌限一的60张套牌（牌张须为标准赛制可用）：指挥官可以是传奇生物或鹏洛客！

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Explorer.oracleText: Play with an expanded set of cards in this true-to-paper format!
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Explorer.translation: 可以使用先驱合法且已经于MTGA上线的所有牌张的赛制！

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Historic.oracleText: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history.
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Historic.translation: 使用MTG Arena上线以来的精选列表牌张进行游戏。

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/HistoricBrawl.oracleText: Build a 100-card singleton deck of eternally-legal cards centered around a legendary creature or planeswalker: your Commander!
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/HistoricBrawl.translation: 构筑一套以你的指挥官为核心的每张非基本地牌限一的100张套牌（MTGA上的牌张几乎都可用）：指挥官可以是传奇生物或鹏洛客！

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Standard.oracleText: Play with cards from the last three years. Magic: The Gathering's flagship format!
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Standard.translation: 可以使用最近三年的牌张。

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Timeless.oracleText: Play with every card on MTG Arena.
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/Timeless.translation: 使用所有存在于MTGA上的牌张

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalAlchem.oracleText: Play with cards from the last two years, including digital-only cards and rebalanced cards! (Best-of-3)
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalAlchem.translation: 只能使用过去两年的卡牌，包括炼金卡牌和再平衡卡牌（BO3）

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalExplor.oracleText: Play with an expanded set of cards in this true-to-paper format! (Best-of-3)
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalExplor.translation: 在这个能使用扩展系列卡牌，更接近实体卡的赛制里进行对局（三局两胜）

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalHistor.oracleText: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history. (Best-of-3)
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalHistor.translation: Play with a curated list of cards throughout MTG Arena's history. (Best-of-3)

MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalStanda.oracleText: Play with cards from the last three years. Magic: The Gathering's flagship format! (Best-of-3)
MainNav/DeckFormatInfo/TraditionalStanda.translation: 使用最近三年的卡牌进行游戏。这是万智牌：竞技场的主打赛制！（Bo3）

MainNav/DeckManager/Add_Deck_Text.oracleText: Deck successfully added to your inventory.
MainNav/DeckManager/Add_Deck_Text.translation: 套牌已经被添加到了你的收藏中。

MainNav/DeckManager/DeckManager_MessageC.oracleText: Are you sure you want to delete {0}? This can't be undone.
MainNav/DeckManager/DeckManager_MessageC.translation: 你确定要删除{0}？此操作不能倒回。

MainNav/DeckManager/DeckManager_NoDecksF.oracleText: No decks found with the currently selected filters.
MainNav/DeckManager/DeckManager_NoDecksF.translation: 使用当前选择的筛选器找不到套牌。

MainNav/DeckManager/Export_Deck_Text.oracleText: {deckName} has been copied to your clipboard.

MainNav/DeckManager/GladiatorSpotlight_D.oracleText: In the fan-made Gladiator format, play a 100-card deck that's ready for anything! Clone one of these decks and modify it to your liking, or build something totally new.
MainNav/DeckManager/GladiatorSpotlight_D.translation: 在粉丝制作的角斗士赛制中，游玩拥有100 张卡牌的套牌，准备好应对任何事情！克隆其中一个套牌并根据自己的喜好对其进行修改，或者构建全新的套牌。

MainNav/DeckManager/Import_CardNotCollec.oracleText: The input string contains a card that is not collectable: {cardName}
MainNav/DeckManager/Import_CardNotCollec.translation: 输入的字符串中含有无法收集的牌张：{cardName}

MainNav/DeckManager/Import_Deck_Text.translation: 已成功从剪贴板导入套牌

MainNav/DeckManager/Resume_Edit_Message.oracleText: You have an unsaved deck in progress. Would you like to resume editing or discard this deck?
MainNav/DeckManager/Resume_Edit_Message.translation: 你有一个没有保存的套牌。你想要继续编辑还是丢弃该套牌?

MainNav/Draft/EventDescription.oracleText:
When you draft, you'll open a Limited booster, pick a card, then pass the rest to another player. Pick a card from what you get passed, then keep going. After three packs like that, build a 40-card deck with basic lands and the cards you picked.
Play against other people and their draft decks. Lose three times, and you're done. The more you win, the more prizes you accumulate!
MainNav/Draft/EventDescription.translation:
轮抽的流程如下：你打开一包限制赛补充包，从中挑选一张牌，然后将剩余的牌传给下一位牌手。之后你接过别人传给你的牌，从中挑选一张，以此类推。在如此重复三包之后，你需要利用你抽到的牌加上适当数量的基本地，构筑出一副40张的套牌。
之后你就用这副套牌跟其他牌手组出的轮抽套牌进行对局。三败之后你的征途即告终结，但你胜得越多，累积的奖品也就越多！
