MainNav/FriendChallenge/AllowedOnlyOneCh.oracleText: Only one challenge request is allowed. Please cancel pending request.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/AllowedOnlyOneCh.translation: 同时只能提交一个挑战请求。 请取消之前的请求。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/CancelChallenge_.oracleText: Entering a match will cancel your outgoing challenge.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/CancelChallenge_.translation: 加入比赛会取消你进行中的挑战请求。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotAcceptFrie.oracleText: Please finish the current match to accept this challenge.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotAcceptFrie.translation: 请先完成当前对局来接受挑战。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotAcceptFrie.oracleText: Please leave the current challenge to accept this new challenge.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotAcceptFrie.translation: 请离开当前挑战来接受新的挑战。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotSendChalle.oracleText: Finish the current match to challenge a friend.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotSendChalle.translation: 完成当前对局以挑战好友。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotSendMoreTh.oracleText: You can only challenge one friend at a time.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/CannotSendMoreTh.translation: 你一次只能向一个好友发出挑战。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeAccepte.oracleText: {username} accepted your challenge. You will need to discard or save changes before joining them.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeAccepte.translation: {username} 接受你的挑战。 参加之前你需要放弃或保存变更。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeAccepte.oracleText: Save failed for an unknown reason, discarding unsaved changes.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeAccepte.translation: 未知原因保存失败，取消未保存的变更。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeExistsE.oracleText: A challenge with this player already exists.
A challenge with this player already exists. Canceling challenge. Please try again.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeExistsE.translation: 该玩家已有挑战存在。 取消挑战。 请重试。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeExistsE.oracleText: A challenge with this player already exists.

MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeGeneric.oracleText: Friend challenge has failed. Please try again later.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/ChallengeGeneric.translation: 好友挑战失败。 请稍后重试。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/ClosePlayBladeDu.oracleText: Navigating away from deck selection will cancel this challenge.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/ClosePlayBladeDu.translation: 离开套牌选择界面会取消挑战。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/NonexistantChall.oracleText: A challenge with this friend does not exist. The challenge might have been canceled or friend has since become unavailable.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/NonexistantChall.translation: 该好友的挑战不存在。 挑战可能已被取消或者好友已离席。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/OpponentNotAvail.oracleText: Opponent is not available. They may be busy or have gone offline. Canceling challenge.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/OpponentNotAvail.translation: 对手已离席。 他们可能忙碌中或离线。 正在取消挑战。

MainNav/FriendChallenge/OpponentNotFound.oracleText: Opponent does not exist or is not your friend.
MainNav/FriendChallenge/OpponentNotFound.translation: 对手不存在或者不是你的好友。

MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_EverySet.oracleText: About a month after each set, an Alchemy pack for the set will come out adding new digital-only cards for it. These are legal in Alchemy and Historic, and in the future could be rebalanced.
MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_EverySet.translation: About a month after each set, an Alchemy pack for the set will come out adding new digital-only cards for it. These are legal in Alchemy and Historic, and in the future could be rebalanced.

MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_ForMore.oracleText: For more information on Alchemy, click <link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/mtga-alchemy><u>here</u></link>
MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_ForMore.translation: 有关炼金的更多信息，请单击<link=https://magic.wizards.com/en/mtga-alchemy><u>此处</u></link>

MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_Grant.oracleText: To help you get started in Alchemy, you'll receive three Alchemy: Innistrad packs, plus six rare and one mythic individual card reward from Alchemy: Innistrad!
MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_Grant.translation: To help you get started in Alchemy, you'll receive three Alchemy: Innistrad packs, plus six rare and one mythic individual card reward from Alchemy: Innistrad!

MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_NewFormat.oracleText: Alchemy is a new format to Arena, like Standard or Historic.
MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_NewFormat.translation: 炼金是竞技场的一种新赛制，就像标准或历史赛制一样。

MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_RotationAn.oracleText: Alchemy rotates every year, following the pattern of Standard. It has Play and Ranked support, and is available in best-of-one and best-of-three.
MainNav/General/AlchemySplash_RotationAn.translation: Alchemy rotates every year, following the pattern of Standard. It has Play and Ranked support, and is available in best-of-one and best-of-three.

MainNav/General/EntryReward.oracleText: All players who enter the event receive this reward.
MainNav/General/EntryReward.translation: All players who enter the event receive this reward.

MainNav/General/NonStandardPack_Desc.oracleText: Packs will be of a random non-Standard set on MTG Arena
MainNav/General/NonStandardPack_Desc.translation: 将获得随机的非标准系列卡包

MainNav/General/PIP_Desc.oracleText: Use Play-In Points to enter a Qualifier Play-In event each month
MainNav/General/PIP_Desc.translation: 每月使用参入围赛积分来进入资格赛入围赛赛事。

MainNav/General/StandardPack_Desc.oracleText: Packs will be of a random Standard set on MTG Arena
MainNav/General/StandardPack_Desc.translation: 将获得随机的标准系列卡包

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Lorehold_Desc.oracleText: Due to Lorehold College's victory in the College Cup, today's Daily Deal record is historically relevant!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Lorehold_Desc.translation: 由于衡鉴学院在学院杯中的胜利，今天的每日优惠具有历史意义！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Prismari_Desc.oracleText: Due to Prismari College's victory in the College Cup, today's Daily Deal is artistically stimulating!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Prismari_Desc.translation: 由于粹丽学院在学院杯中的胜利，今天的每日优惠具有艺术感染力！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Quandrix_Desc.oracleText: Due to Quandrix College's victory in the College Cup, today's Daily Deal permutation is infinitely mathematical.
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Quandrix_Desc.translation: 由于量析学院在学院杯中的胜利，今天的每日优惠排列具有无限的数学！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Silverquill_De.oracleText: Due to Silverquill College's victory in the College Cup, today's Daily Deal script is quite eloquent.
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Silverquill_De.translation: 由于银毫学院在学院杯中的胜利，今天的每日优惠剧本很有说服力！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Witherbloom_De.oracleText: Due to Witherbloom College's victory in the College Cup, today's Daily Deal is very down to earth.
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Store_Witherbloom_De.translation: 由于靡华学院在学院杯中的胜利，今天的每日优惠非常朴实无华！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Lorehold_Des.oracleText: The studious and fervent Lorehold College has won The College Cup!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Lorehold_Des.translation: 勤奋好学且热情的衡鉴学院赢得了学院杯！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Prismari_Des.oracleText: The passionate and creative Prismari College has won The College Cup!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Prismari_Des.translation: 充满激情和创造力的粹丽学院赢得了学院杯！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Quandrix_Des.oracleText: The ingenious and mathematical Quandrix College has won The College Cup!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Quandrix_Des.translation: 灵巧而逻辑的量析学院赢得了学院杯！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Silverquill_.oracleText: The stylish and eloquent Silverquill College has won The College Cup!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Silverquill_.translation: 时尚而雄辩的银毫学院赢得了学院杯！

MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Witherbloom_.oracleText: The resourceful and vigorous Witherbloom College has won The College Cup!
MainNav/HomePage/CC_Victory_Witherbloom_.translation: 足智多谋并朝气蓬勃的靡华学院赢得了学院杯！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_03_Store_Des.oracleText: New Exquisite Sleeves for renowned cards are now in the Store. Pair it with a new Avatar and check out these top card styles that are now on Sale!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_03_Store_Des.translation: 著名卡牌的新精饰牌套已在商店上架，并搭配有新的头像，顶级的卡牌样式。这些通通都在热销中!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_04_Store_Des.oracleText: Take your first steps into the enchanting world of Theros. Purchase new boosters, cosmetics, and the Set Mastery Pass!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_04_Store_Des.translation: 迈出你的第一步，进入令人陶醉的塞洛斯世界。购买新的补充包、装饰和精研通行证!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_05_Store_Des.oracleText: Stellar offers on Nyx Lands, Card Style Bundles, and the new Daily Deals tab in the store! Also available - Secret Lair sleeves for direct purchase!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_05_Store_Des.translation: 商店中上架的尼兹地，卡牌样式套装以及新的每日特惠专柜有惊人的优惠！秘室珍品牌套也可直接购买！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_06_Store_Des.oracleText: Historic Anthology 2 brings 25 beloved cards to Arena. Also, find new Unsanctioned Lands and the uncanny Puppet Jace in the Store.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_06_Store_Des.translation: 史迹合集2为竞技场带来了25张心爱的新卡牌。同时有新的鸡飞地和诡异的木偶杰斯上架。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_06_Store_Tit.oracleText: New Historic Anthology set plus more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_06_Store_Tit.translation: 新史迹合集系列及更多！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_07_Store_Des.oracleText: Ikoria: Lair of Behemoths is available! Grab the Set Mastery Pass and earn the monstrous Godzilla Series Monster Card Styles with the purchase of IKO Boosters!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_07_Store_Des.translation: 依克黎：巨兽时空现已上线！抓紧时间购买精研通行证，现在购买IKO补充包，可获得可怕的 哥斯拉系列怪物卡牌样式！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_08_Store_Des.oracleText: Pick up a great deal on 27 incredible cards from Magic's history. What powerful new decks will you create?
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_08_Store_Des.translation: 从万智牌历史中挑选 27 张令人难以置信的卡牌。你会创造出什么强大的新套牌？

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_09_Store_Des.oracleText: Amazing reprints and your favorite Planeswalkers return. Booster packs, Set Mastery Pass, Showcase Bundles and so much more available now!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_09_Store_Des.translation: 惊人的重印和你最喜爱的鹏洛客回归。现在有更多的补充包、精研通行证、展示套装和其它东西可供<s>选择</s>(氪金）。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_10_Store_Des.oracleText: Spice up your deck with the Unstable Land Bundle and borderless Planeswalkers card styles.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_10_Store_Des.translation: 用鸡飞地套装和扩画鹏洛客卡牌样式为你的套牌增添趣味。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_11_Store_Des.oracleText: Explore the desert plane of Amonkhet and dangerous ancient magic. Plus new Full Art Lands and the Basri Ket Avatar are now available!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_11_Store_Des.translation: 探索阿芒凯沙漠时空，以及这里危险的古代魔法。此外，全新的大画地和巴席利柯特头像现已推出！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_12_Store_Des.oracleText: Reclaim the adventurer's paradise of Zendikar. Earn full art lands from large Zendikar booster bundles, buy incredible card styles, and unlock the Set Mastery Pass for tons of rewards.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_12_Store_Des.translation: 夺回冒险家的天堂-赞迪卡。从大型赞迪卡 补充套装中获得大画地，购买令人难以置信的卡牌样式，解锁精研通行证以获得大量奖励。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_13_Store_Des.oracleText: The legendary Black Lotus arrives in MTG Arena as a companion and exquisite sleeve! Plus, 15 gorgeous Euro Lands that will add some old-school flair to your deck.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_13_Store_Des.translation: 传说中的黑莲花作为宠物和精饰牌套抵达万智牌竞技场！此外，15 个华丽的欧元地将为你的套牌增添一些老派风格。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_14_Store_Des.oracleText: The world of artifacts returns to Arena; unlock your inner inventor with Kaladesh Remastered cards! Also in the store, 15 Asia-Pacific themed lands that will bring beauty to your decks!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_14_Store_Des.translation: 神器世界回归竞技场；用卡拉德许重铸卡牌解锁你内心的发明家情怀！此外，商店里还有15张亚太主题的地牌，将为你的套牌带来别样风情。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_15_Store_Des.oracleText: Share some festive joy with the Food Golem Sleeve. Be sure to check out our available bundles for sweet companions, lands, and sleeves.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_15_Store_Des.translation: 用食品魔像牌套分享节日的欢乐。请务必查看我们提供的甜蜜宠物、地牌和牌套的套装。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_15_Store_Des.oracleText: For a limited time, pick up the all-new Food Golem Sleeve and some beautiful basic lands to set your deck apart!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/1_15_Store_Des.translation: 在有限的时间内，拿起全新的食品魔像牌套和一些美丽的基本地，让你的套牌与众不同！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2019_11_Store_.oracleText: Bundled deals on Throne of Eldraine styles AND Card Styles for the first Historic Anthology.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2019_11_Store_.translation: 套装：艾卓王权卡牌样式和史迹合集卡牌样式

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2019_DragonWhe.oracleText: New! Inspired by the card from Magic's first set, the Dragon Whelp companion is now available in the Store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2019_DragonWhe.translation: 全新！受 Magic 第一套卡牌的启发，小龙宠物现已在商店中发售！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2022_December_.oracleText: Find the perfect gift for any Magic fan with our Holiday Gift Guide!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2022_December_.translation: Find the perfect gift for any Magic fan with our Holiday Gift Guide!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_23_Store_.oracleText: Compleat your collection by grabbing newly phyrexianized Avatars, Praetor Stickers, Infected Lands, and more in the Store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_23_Store_.translation: 通过在商店中挑选新的非瑞克西亚头像、魔判官表情和腐化大画地牌来完化你的收藏吧！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_24_1_Stor.oracleText: Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered is available for Pre-order now! Stop by the store to check it out and get a head start on the set.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_24_1_Stor.translation: Shadows Over Innistrad Remastered is available for Pre-order now! Stop by the store to check it out and get a head start on the set.

炼金：非瑞克西亚在这里！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_25_0_MOMS.translation: Earn Sleeves, Packs, and more by completing quests to defend the Multiverse and ascend the Mastery track!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_27_0_STOR.oracleText: It's time to fight against the darkness! Bolster your decks with heroic new Avatars, Sleeves, and more available in the Store!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_27_0_STOR.oracleText: Just because The Ring can't tempt you, doesn't mean these offers won't! Check out the store today to find new Avatars, Sleeves, and more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_27_0_STOR.translation: Just because The Ring can't tempt you, doesn't mean these offers won't! Check out the store today to find new Avatars, Sleeves, and more!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_28_0_STOR.oracleText: A new Historic Anthology and Explorer Anthology have arrived! Come see what's entering Historic and pick up Depth Art for it in the Store today!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_28_0_STOR.oracleText: It's back and hotter than ever! No need to sweat over missed cosmetics; pick up favorite Sleeves, Lands, and Companions, as well as all new Summer-themed Cosmetics in the Store today!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_28_0_STOR.translation: It's back and hotter than ever! No need to sweat over missed cosmetics; pick up favorite Sleeves, Lands, and Companions, as well as all new Summer-themed Cosmetics in the Store today!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_28_40_STO.oracleText: The Wicked Slumber grows ever closer. Keep your eyes open and stay prepared with three Pre-orders, available now in the Store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_28_40_STO.translation: 邪恶倦眠越来越近。 请睁大眼睛，做好准备，三款预购商品现已在商店发售！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_29_0_STOR.oracleText: Fear not, for none of the enchanting items before you are cursed. Stop by the store today to get Full Art Lands, new Stickers, and more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_29_0_STOR.translation: 别怕，你面前的这些迷人的玩意儿可没被诅咒。今日就请光临商店获取大画地，新贴纸及更多好物！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_29_0_STOR.oracleText: New magics have appeared in the store!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_30_0_STOR.oracleText: Alchemy: Eldraine is here, and with it are new packs and cosmetics! Stop by the store to see all the new goodies!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_30_0_STOR.translation: 炼金：艾卓已上线，还有新的补充包和饰品！ 来商店看看所有新的好东西！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_30_30_STO.oracleText: There's no telling what waits down in the depths of Ixalan. Stock up for the journey with three Pre-orders, available now in the Store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_30_30_STO.translation: 不知道依夏兰的深处有什么在等待着。 为旅程做好准备，三种预购现已在商店发售！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_31_0_STOR.oracleText: It's time to unearth some gems. Stop by the store today to get Full Art Lands, new Stickers, and more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_31_0_STOR.translation: 是时候挖掘一些宝石了。今天到商店来购买大画地、新贴纸表情等！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_32_0_STOR.oracleText: Alchemy: Ixalan is here, and with it are new packs and cosmetics! Stop by the store to see all the new goodies!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_32_0_STOR.translation: Alchemy: Ixalan is here, and with it are new packs and cosmetics! Stop by the store to see all the new goodies!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_33_0_STOR.oracleText: Ensure your enemies quake in fear with powerful deals available now in the Store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_33_0_STOR.translation: 现在商店提供巨大优惠，确保你的敌人在恐惧中颤抖！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_ONE_PreOr.oracleText: Preorders have a compleatly new look! Pick up the Pack Bundle, Play Bundle, or the new Pass Bundle before ONE releases to help ensure your victory against the threat of Phyrexia.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2023_ONE_PreOr.translation: Preorders have a compleatly new look! Pick up the Pack Bundle, Play Bundle, or the new Pass Bundle before ONE releases to help ensure your victory against the threat of Phyrexia.

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2024_33_60_Sto.oracleText: Get ready to solve some crimes! Get the best tools for when the investigation begins with three Pre-orders, available now in the Store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/2024_33_60_Sto.translation: Get ready to solve some crimes! Get the best tools for when the investigation begins with three Pre-orders, available now in the Store!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_01_Store_De.oracleText: Take part in the epic Saga of Kaldheim. New Boosters Packs, new Set Mastery Pass, new Showcase Bundles, and more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_01_Store_De.translation: 参加史诗般的凯德海姆传奇。新的补充包、新的精研通行证、新的展示套装等等！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_03_Store_De.oracleText: Historic Anthology 4 has arrived, featuring Death's Shadow, Sword of Body and Mind, and more! Check it out along with the new Amonkhet Cat companion!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_03_Store_De.translation: 史迹合集4已经到来，其中包含死亡阴影、身灵剑和灵思等等！和新的阿芒凯猫宠物一起来看看吧！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_04_Store_De.oracleText: Enroll in Strixhaven University with New Booster Packs, Set Mastery Pass, Stickers, Companions, Showcase Bundles, and more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_04_Store_De.translation: 办理斯翠海文大学入学手续，获得新的补充包、精研通行证、贴纸、宠物、展示套装等！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_05_Store_De.oracleText: Historic Anthology 5 is here! From the Commands of Dragons of Tarkir to the Praetors of New Phyrexia, come check out what all is entering Historic!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_05_Store_De.translation: 史迹合集5来了！从鞑契巨龙的命令到新非瑞克西亚的执政官，快来看看有什么进入了历史！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_06_04_Jumps.oracleText: The fan favorite format returns! Combine two themes together and quickly get into the game in this fun and unique way to play Magic!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_06_04_Jumps.translation: 玩家最喜欢的模式回归！将两个主题的套牌组合在一起，以这种有趣而独特的方式快速进入游戏，玩万智牌竞技场！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_07_Store_De.oracleText: New Booster Packs, Set Mastery, Stickers, Companions, Showcase Bundles, and more. Adventure awaits!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_07_Store_De.translation: 新的补充包、精研通行证、贴纸、宠物、展示套装等等。冒险在等着你！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_07_Store_Ti.oracleText: Adventures in the Forgotten Realms is now available!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_07_Store_Ti.translation: 被遗忘国度战记已经可用！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_08_Store_De.oracleText: Check out Nyx basic lands, the Thopter bundle, and depth art styles for Jumpstart: Historic Horizons!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_08_Store_De.translation: 查看尼兹基本地，振翼机套装以及深度艺术风格的速战：史迹新篇!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_09_Store_De.oracleText: Check out the new stickers and incredible Eternal Night full art basic lands!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_09_Store_De.translation: 查看新的贴纸和令人难以置信的永恒之夜大画基本地！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_11_Store_De.oracleText: Check out all the new wedding favors on sale as you attend Innistrad's most extravagant event!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_11_Store_De.translation: 在你参加依尼翠最奢华的活动时，不妨查看下正在出售的婚礼用品！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_12_Store_De.oracleText: Sweet Bundles and Alchemy Packs are now on sale for Magic's newest format!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/21_12_Store_De.translation: 万智牌竞技场 最新模式的甜蜜套装和炼金包现已发售！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_17_Store_Ti.translation: 「炼金新篇：博德之门」现已发售！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_19_Store_Ti.translation: 多明纳里亚：众志成城已经发售！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_20_Store_De.oracleText: Reinforce your deck and show off how you play Magic with new cards from Alchemy: Dominaria and Unfinity Avatars!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_20_Store_Ti.translation: 炼金：多明纳里亚在这里！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_21_Store_De.translation: Raise your automatons in arms and prepare for war! Stock up on Mech Lands, new Wildcard bundles, and more in the Store!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_21_Store_Ti.oracleText: The Brothers' War is now on sale!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_22_Store_De.oracleText: The war rages on! In addition to a new Alchemy bundle, stop by the Store to tinker with a new Explorer Anthology, Basic Land Styles, and more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/22_22_Store_De.translation: The war rages on! In addition to a new Alchemy bundle, stop by the Store to tinker with a new Explorer Anthology, Basic Land Styles, and more!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Sealed_Des.oracleText: Grab your dice and prepare for adventure by building a 40-card sealed deck with 6 packs of Magic's latest set!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Sealed_Des.translation: 拿起你的骰子，用6包万智牌的最新系列卡牌构建一副40张的现开套牌，为历险做好准备！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Sealed_Tit.oracleText: Sealed Adventures in the Forgotten Realms

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Set_Master.oracleText: Venture into dungeons and earn some dragon companions with the Adventures in the Forgotten Realms Set Mastery!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Set_Master.translation: 深入地牢并通过被遗忘国度战记精研通行证获取一些龙宠物！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Set_Master.oracleText: Adventures in the Forgotten Realms Set Mastery
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AFR_Set_Master.translation: 被遗忘国度战记精研通行证

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AKR_Release_De.oracleText: Check out MTG Arena's first draftable Historic set
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AKR_Release_De.translation: 查看万智牌竞技场的第一个可轮抽的史迹系列

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Alchemy_21_Des.oracleText: Magic: The Gathering's newest all digital format has arrived on MTG Arena!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Alchemy_21_Des.translation: 万智牌全新的数字化模式已在MTGA上线!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Alchemy_Premie.oracleText: Create a 40-card deck from rotating draft packs (including the latest Alchemy cards), and play games to earn gems and packs!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Alchemy_Premie.translation: 用轮转的补充包（包含最新的炼金牌）构组40张的套牌，进行对决赢得宝石和卡包！
新卡佩纳炼金竞技轮抽

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AllAccess_Desc.oracleText: Build and play decks with any Standard deck, even cards not in your collection.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AllAccess_Desc.translation: 使用任何标准套牌来构建套牌并游玩，即使里面有你未收集的卡牌。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AllAccess_Fina.oracleText: Reach 12 wins to earn one copy of every Standard card.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/AllAccess_Fina.translation: 达到 12 胜即可获得每张标准牌的副本。
赢任意卡牌挑战 - 标准

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Amazon_Holiday.oracleText: Give the gift of Magic and unlock both decks for two players.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Amazon_Holiday.translation: 赠送万智牌礼物并为两名玩家解锁两个套牌。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Amazon_Holiday.oracleText: Arena Starter Kit: Bring a Friend to Arena
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Amazon_Holiday.translation: 竞技场起始包：邀请朋友加入竞技场

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Announcements_.oracleText: The latest news and upcoming schedule for MTG Arena (updated weekly)
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Announcements_.translation: MTGA最新消息和近期活动日程表（每周更新）

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/April_PotM_Lea.oracleText: The Hedron Guardian is about to move back into its containment position. Grab this gritty and gravelly Guardian to keep you safe on the battlefield before it crumbles from the Store.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/April_PotM_Lea.translation: The Hedron Guardian is about to move back into its containment position. Grab this gritty and gravelly Guardian to keep you safe on the battlefield before it crumbles from the Store.

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.oracleText: Who will be the victors of Arena Championship 2? Come watch and cheer on your favorite players as they compete for their share of $200,000 and a seat at the Magic World Championship!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.translation: Who will be the victors of Arena Championship 2? Come watch and cheer on your favorite players as they compete for their share of $200,000 and a seat at the Magic World Championship!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.oracleText: Arena Championship 3 starts streaming on Saturday, May 27th @ 9a PT. Get ready to watch players as they compete for their share of $200,000 and a seat at the Magic World Championship!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.translation: Arena Championship 3 starts streaming on Saturday, May 27th @ 9a PT. Get ready to watch players as they compete for their share of $200,000 and a seat at the Magic World Championship!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.oracleText: Who will be the victors of Arena Championship 4? Come watch and cheer on your favorite players as they compete for their share of $200,000 and a seat at the Magic World Championship!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.translation: 谁将成为竞技场锦标赛4的胜利者？ 快来观看您最喜欢的选手为他们争夺 200,000 美元奖金和万智牌世界锦标赛席位而进行的比赛并为他们加油吧！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.oracleText: Who will be the victors of Arena Championship 1? Come watch and cheer on your favorite players as they compete for their share of $200,000 USD and a seat at the Magic World Championship!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ArenaChampions.translation: 谁将成为竞技场冠军赛1的胜利者？快来观看并为你最喜爱的选手加油助威，他们将争夺200000美元的奖金和世界万智牌冠军赛的席位！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Cube_Des.oracleText: Draft 3 packs that contain some of the sweetest cards in all of MTG Arena!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Cube_Des.translation: 轮抽3个包，其中包含一些所有MTGA卡牌中最甜蜜的卡牌!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Alc.translation: 竞技场公开赛 - 炼金！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Des.oracleText: Compete in a 2 day high-stakes event for cash!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Des.translation: 参加为期 2 天的高风险赛事，赢取现金！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Des.oracleText: Compete in a two-day event to win up to $2,500 USD!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Des.translation: 参加为期两天的赛事，赢取高达2500美元的奖金！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Dra.translation: 竞技场公开赛 - 轮抽！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Mix.oracleText: The Arena Open - Sealed with Day 2 Draft!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Open_Mix.translation: 竞技场开放 - 现开赛 为第2天轮抽赛获取资格!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_PlayIn__.oracleText: Get six wins in this Best-of-One event to gain entry into next week's Qualifier Weekend!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_PlayIn__.translation: 在一盘胜负的对局中赢得六场胜利，从而进入明天的资格赛周末！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_PlayIn__.oracleText: Get four wins in this Best-of-Three event to gain entry into tomorrow's Qualifier Weekend!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_PlayIn__.translation: 在三盘两胜的对局中赢得四场胜利，从而进入明天的资格赛周末！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Play_In_.oracleText: Get six wins in this Best-of-One event to gain entry into the next week's Qualifier Weekend!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Play_In_.translation: 在一盘胜负的对局中赢得六场胜利，从而进入明天的资格赛周末！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Play_In_.oracleText: Get four wins in this Best-of-Three event to gain entry into tomorrow's Qualifier Weekend!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Arena_Play_In_.translation: 在三盘两胜的对局中赢得四场胜利，从而进入明天的资格赛周末！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/August_PotM_He.oracleText: No need to go foraging, we have the Black Lotus in the Store! Show off your green (?) thumb and let it sprout on the battlefield!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/August_PotM_He.translation: No need to go foraging, we have the Black Lotus in the Store! Show off your green (?) thumb and let it sprout on the battlefield!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/BasicLands_Des.oracleText: Full art, alternate art, and basic land card styles available now!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/BasicLands_Des.translation: 现已推出各式卡牌样式～大画、异画及多种基本地卡牌样式等你选购！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Black_Is_Magic.oracleText: This Secret Lair seeks to honor Black culture, history, and beauty. Proceeds benefit Black Girls CODE.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Black_Is_Magic.translation: 这个秘室珍品旨在纪念黑人文化、历史和美丽。收益将使Black Girls CODE从中受益。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Black_Is_Magic.oracleText: Secret Lair: Black Is Magic - Last Chance!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Black_Is_Magic.translation: 秘室珍品：黑，魔法 - 最后机会！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Brawl_Launch_D.oracleText: Play with your deck built around a legendary creature or planeswalker.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Brawl_Launch_D.translation: 使用围绕一个传奇生物或鹏洛客来构筑的套牌进行游戏。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Brawl_Play_Que.oracleText: Grab a game of Brawl with no entry whenever you wish!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Brawl_Play_Que.translation: 随心所欲地参加一场无需门票的争锋游戏！
争锋无时无刻，时时刻刻

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Bundle_Adventu.oracleText: Get a one-time deal on 3,500 Gems and pick up The Adventurer Avatar and City of Brass Sleeve.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Bundle_Adventu.translation: 一次性购买3500颗宝石，并获得冒险者头像和黄铜之都牌套。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Bundle_Explore.oracleText: Get a one-time deal on 5 iconic Card Styles and 3,500 Gems before it leaves the store on July 16, 2020.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Bundle_Explore.translation: 购买超值组合，内含5张标志性卡牌的卡牌样式和3500颗宝石，仅限单次购买。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CI_Satisfactio.oracleText: Take our survey to tell us about your experience in MTG Arena.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CI_Satisfactio.translation: 参加我们的调查，告诉我们你在MTGA的体验。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CI_Satisfactio.oracleText: We Want To Hear From You
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CI_Satisfactio.translation: 我们希望收到你的来信

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CLB_AtHomeKit_.oracleText: Try out Magic's most popular multiplayer format with a draft box or all 4 decks full of beloved D&D characters.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CLB_AtHomeKit_.translation: 入手满是D&D热门角色的轮抽盒或全部四套预组套牌，试试万智牌最受欢迎的多人游戏模式。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Calendar_Desc.oracleText: Check out the full event schedule online
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Calendar_Desc.translation: 在线查看完整赛事日程安排

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Chromatic_Cube.oracleText: Draft 3 packs that contain some of the most colorful and splashy spells in the Multiverse!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Chromatic_Cube.translation: 轮抽3个包，其中包含一些多重宇宙最丰富多彩、最引人注目的咒语!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Chromatic_Cube.oracleText: Make a splash in this Chromatic Cube event! Draft a deck that's full of multicolor madness and earn colorful prizes!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Chromatic_Cube.translation: 在这个五彩方盒赛事中大放异彩！轮抽并构建一个多色的套牌并获得五颜六色的奖品！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CodexOfTheMult.oracleText: Explore the Codex of the Multiverse to learn the basics of Magic: The Gathering, and much more!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CodexOfTheMult.translation: Explore the Codex of the Multiverse to learn the basics of Magic: The Gathering, and much more!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Collection_Pro.oracleText: Have  you ever wondered how close you are to being set-complete? Check out your progress in the Player Profile!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Collection_Pro.translation: 你有没有好奇自己离全卡还有多远？快去玩家资料中查看一下你的进度吧！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/College_Cup_1_.oracleText: Choose your Strixhaven college and compete for glory and prizes!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/College_Cup_1_.translation: 选择你的斯翠海文学院，开始为荣誉和奖品而战！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/College_Cup_2_.oracleText: It's up to you to fight for your chosen college and climb to the top of the standings!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/College_Cup_2_.translation: 就看你如何为你所选择的学院而战，并攀登到榜首！这就是我们的目标。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/College_Cup_3_.oracleText: The final challenge will test your Leadership in an all-out Strixhaven Brawl!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/College_Cup_3_.translation: 最后的挑战将在全面的斯翠海文争锋中考验你的领导力！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ColorChallenge.oracleText: Master all five colors of Magic and upgrade your decks!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ColorChallenge.translation: 掌握所有五种颜色的万智牌并升级你的套牌！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Companion_Susp.oracleText: Learn more about what's happening with the companion mechanic
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Companion_Susp.translation: 了解更多关于行侣机制的详情

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Companion_Susp.oracleText: Cards with Companion Suspended on MTG Arena

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Companion_Upda.oracleText: Companion rules have changed. Click to find out more.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Companion_Upda.translation: 行侣规则已改变。点击查看更多详情。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Competitive_Pl.oracleText: Check out the upcoming changes to MTG Arena's competitive play!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Competitive_Pl.translation: 查看MTGA比赛体系即将发生的变化！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ConstructPet_L.oracleText: Show your resolve with the Angelic Construct Companion Bundle before it crumbles from the store!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ConstructPet_L.translation: 在天使组构体宠物套装从商店里下架之前，展示你的决心！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Constructed_KH.oracleText: Bring a deck and play games using cards only from the Kaldheim set.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Constructed_KH.translation: 使用仅用 凯德海姆中含有的牌张组成的套牌进行对战。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CosmeticsAnnou.oracleText: Card Styles, Avatars, and Sleeves available now
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CosmeticsAnnou.translation: 现已推出卡牌样式、头像、牌套供选购

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CraftersChalle.oracleText: Play any Standard deck you want - and win wildcards!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CraftersChalle.translation: 玩任何你心仪的标准套牌 - 赢取万用牌!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CubeDraft_Titl.oracleText: Arena Cube Draft - A New Kind of Limited Experience!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CubeDraft_Titl.translation: 竞技场方盒轮抽：全新的限制赛体验！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CubeSealed_Des.oracleText: A Limited event where your packs contain some of the best cards MTG Arena has to offer.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CubeSealed_Des.translation: 限时赛事，你的包中包含 MTGA 提供的一些最佳卡牌。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CubeSealed_Tit.oracleText: Arena Cube Sealed - A New Kind of Limited Experience!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/CubeSealed_Tit.translation: 竞技场方盒现开：全新的限制赛体验！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Daily_Deals_Ev.oracleText: Check out the Daily Deals tab in the Store for exciting new offers every day.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Daily_Deals_Ev.translation: 查看商店中的每日特惠专柜，每天都有令人兴奋的新优惠！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decathlon_2021.oracleText: Compete in ten different formats to qualify for the Arena Decathlon Finals in January!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decathlon_2021.translation: 在十项不同的赛制中竞争，以获得参加1月份竞技场十项全能决赛的资格!
欢迎来到竞技场十项全能!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decathlon_Fina.oracleText: Use your Decathlon Tokens to participate in the Arena Decathlon Finals!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decathlon_Fina.translation: 使用你的十项全能门票来参加竞技场十项全能决赛！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decathlon_Fina.oracleText: The Arena Decathlon Finals are here!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decathlon_Fina.translation: The Arena Decathlon Finals are here!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/December_PotM_.oracleText: This cute cub isn't cold, they just take a bit to warm up! Stop by the store to pick one up today!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/December_PotM_.translation: 这只可爱的幼兽并不冷，它只是需要一点时间来热身！今天就去商店买一只吧！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decklists_Desc.oracleText: Find your next deck by checking out these winning MTG Arena decklists!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Decklists_Desc.translation: 浏览这些赢麻了的牌表，说不定哪套就成你的了！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/DirectChalleng.oracleText: For a limited time, earn quest progress when challenging your friends!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/DirectChalleng.translation: 限时挑战好友，获得任务进度！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/DirectPlay_Des.oracleText: Challenge another Arena player to a private game
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/DirectPlay_Des.translation: 挑战其他竞技场牌手进行私人对战

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Dominaria_Seal.oracleText: Crack six packs and put your deckbuilding prowess to the test
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Dominaria_Seal.translation: 现场打开六包补充包，考验你的套牌构筑技艺

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/DoubleFeature_.oracleText: Draft all the spookiest monsters from both Innistrad: Midnight Hunt and Innistrad:Crimson Vow!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/DoubleFeature_.translation: 从依尼翠：黯夜猎踪和依尼翠：腥红婚誓中轮抽所有最恐怖的怪物！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELDStore_Sept2.oracleText: Eldraine Boosters, Cosmetic Bundles, Card Styles, and more await your adventures!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELDStore_Sept2.translation: 艾卓王权补充包、装饰套装、卡牌样式等等正在等你发掘！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELDStore_Sept2.oracleText: Throne of Eldraine added to Store

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_CollectorB.oracleText: Buy from your local game store, supplies limited.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_CollectorB.translation: 从你当地的游戏商店购买，供应有限。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_CollectorB.oracleText: Get a Collector Booster when buying a box of Throne of Eldraine.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_CollectorB.translation: 购买一盒艾卓王权时获得1份收藏家补充包。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_FatPack_De.oracleText: Buy a Throne of Eldraine Bundle in stores, and receive two special card sleeves in-game!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_FatPack_De.translation: 商店购买1份艾卓王权套装，在游戏中获得两张特殊牌套！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Planeswalk.oracleText: Get a code to unlock the entire deck in MTG Arena!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Planeswalk.translation: 获取代码以解锁MTGA中的一整个套牌！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Planeswalk.oracleText: Buy a Throne of Eldraine Planeswalker Deck
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Planeswalk.translation: 购买1份艾卓王权鹏洛客套牌

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Promo_Pack.oracleText: Click to find a local store.
Earn Throne of Eldraine Promo Packs In Store
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Promo_Pack.translation: 在商店中获得艾卓王权促销包

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Sealed_Des.oracleText: Tear open six packs and put your deck building prowess to the test.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_Sealed_Des.translation: 现场撕开六包补充包，考验你的套牌构筑技艺。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_SetMastery.oracleText: Endless rewards, revamped Mastery Tree, and Foxes oh my!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/ELD_SetMastery.translation: 无尽的奖励、重制的精研树，还有狐狸哦，全都是我的！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/EdgeOfNight_De.oracleText: Win Eternal Night card styles in this emblem event.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/EdgeOfNight_De.translation: 在徽记赛事中，赢取永恒之夜卡牌样式。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/EsportsAnnounc.oracleText: Learn more about the $10 million prize pool in 2019
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/EsportsAnnounc.translation: 了解2019年度千万美元总奖金赛事安排的更多信息

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Creature.oracleText: Draft a deck centered around a single creature type and unleash coordinated fury!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Creature.translation: 围绕一个单一的生物类型构建一副套牌，并释放出协调的怒火!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_DragonsA.oracleText: Bring your best gear and delve into this thrilling event to earn gold and card styles!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_DragonsA.translation: 带上你最好的装备钻进这个激动人心的赛事来获得金币和卡牌样式！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Festival.oracleText: Come play our Festival in a Box event for an opportunity to win a Festival in a Box! Limited to participants in the United States. Click here for more info.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Festival.translation: Come play our Festival in a Box event for an opportunity to win a Festival in a Box! Limited to participants in the United States. Click here for more info.

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Festival.oracleText: Win a Festival in a Box!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Festival.translation: Win a Festival in a Box!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Final_Sh.oracleText: Who will reign supreme? Come play with four Omniscience decks that represent a different Magic player Archetype and find your style to show off!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Final_Sh.translation: 谁将成为最高统治者？来玩四套代表不同魔术师原型的全知全能套牌，找到你的风格来展示吧

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Holiday_.oracleText: Earn exclusive alternate art copies of Llanowar Elves & Firemind's Research
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_Holiday_.translation: 赢取独家异画罗堰妖精和炎灵研究

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Event_MixedUpP.oracleText: Come celebrate Magic 30 and draft a deck from a series of mixed-up packs containing some favorite sets on Arena!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SecretLair_Jun.oracleText: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate Tabletop Prerelease!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SecretLair_Jun.translation: 《指挥官传奇：争战博德之门》桌面售前赛

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SecretLair_MSC.translation: 这些种草好货会在夜里爆炸！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SecretLair_Sup.translation: 来用最新的全天然、完全清爽的秘室珍品种草来补充能量。这正是游戏玩家所渴望的!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SecretLair_Sup.translation: 这是你抢夺包含漫画、技术和忍者的种草的最后机会!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Pa.translation: 仅限今天，与这些用于桌面游戏的另类艺术啮齿动物一起庆祝农历新年。包括一个鼠主题的MTGA牌套！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Pa.oracleText: Secret Lair Drop: Year of the Rat

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Se.oracleText: Secret Lair Artist Series: Seb McKinnon

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Sq.oracleText: Secret Lair: We Hope You Like Squirrels
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Sq.translation: 秘室珍品：我们希望你喜欢松鼠

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Sq.oracleText: Because... there's a lot of squirrels. Includes a code for a Squirrel Mob exquisite sleeve on MTG Arena.
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Sq.translation: 因为... 有很多松鼠。包括MTGA上松鼠暴群精饰牌套的代码。

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Ta.oracleText: Tattoo master Josh Howard lent his needle to create these incredible traditional flash sheet designs. Includes a sleeve for MTG Arena
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Ta.translation: 纹身大师乔什·霍华德用他的针创造了这些令人难以置信的传统闪卡设计。包括一个用于MTGA的牌套

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Ta.oracleText: Secret Lair - Full Sleeves: The Tattoo Pack
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Ta.translation: 秘室珍品 - 全牌套：纹身包

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Th.oracleText: Take on the darkness with the Guardian of Thraben - includes card styles and sleeve for MTG Arena!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Th.translation: 与瑟班守护者一起对抗黑暗 - 包括MTGA的卡牌样式和牌套！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Th.oracleText: Secret Lair: Thalia: Beyond the Helvault
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Th.translation: 秘室珍品：莎利雅：狱窖之上

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Secret_Lair_Wo.oracleText: Purchase this special philanthropic Secret Lair and receive Arena sleeves!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/September_PotM.oracleText: Have you ever wanted a tanuki robot inhabited by a kami? Now you can have one! Pompon-chan came into being on Kamigawa, but would love to travel the multiverse with you. Stop by the store to find her now!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/September_PotM.translation: Have you ever wanted a tanuki robot inhabited by a kami? Now you can have one! Pompon-chan came into being on Kamigawa, but would love to travel the multiverse with you. Stop by the store to find her now!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_BRO.oracleText: Bring your mightiest forces to battle and earn sleeves, card styles, and more from The Brothers' War!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_BRO.translation: Bring your mightiest forces to battle and earn sleeves, card styles, and more from The Brothers' War!

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_BRO.oracleText: Battle fiercely to earn XP and claim prizes before this Mastery Pass ends!
MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_BRO.translation: 在精研通行证结束之前激烈地战斗，获得经验值，赢取奖品！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_BRO.translation: 兄弟之战精研通行证即将结束！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_HBG.translation: 掌握先制，赢取金属龙、冒险头像和更多内容！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/SetMastery_HBG.translation: 「炼金新篇：博德之门」精研通行证！

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Set_Mastery_ON.translation: 非瑞克西亚：万界归一精研通行证

MainNav/HomePage/Carousel/Store_Pack_Pur.translation: 每购买10个其它补充包获得一个黄金补充包！

MainNav/HomePage/M21_Preview_Final_Desc.translation: 通过抢先体验和预览为发布做准备。

MainNav/HomePage/M21_Set_Mastery_Preview.oracleText: See what's coming in Core Set 2021 Mastery Pass.
MainNav/HomePage/M21_Set_Mastery_Preview.translation: 看看 核心系列2021精研通行证中会有些什么！

MainNav/HomePage/Splash/Companion_New.oracleText: If your starting deck meets the companion's restriction you may choose it to be your companion. Once per game you may pay <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x3"> any time you could cast a sorcery to put your chosen companion into your hand.
MainNav/HomePage/Splash/Companion_New.translation: 如果你起始套牌满足行侣限制，你可以选它作为你的行侣。 每局游戏一次，在你能使用法术的任意时机你可以支付 <sprite="SpriteSheet_ManaIcons" name="x3"> 来把行侣放到你的手牌。

MainNav/HomePage/Splash/Companion_Old.oracleText: If your starting deck meets the companion's restriction you may choose it to be your companion and cast it once from outside the game.
MainNav/HomePage/Splash/Companion_Old.translation: 如果你的起始套牌满足行侣条件，你可以将它选为你的行侣，游戏之外释放一次。

MainNav/HomePage/ZNR_Preview_Final_Desc.oracleText: Prepare for launch with Early Access and preview roundups.
MainNav/HomePage/ZNR_Preview_Final_Desc.translation: 通过抢先体验和预览为发布做准备。

MainNav/HomePage/ZNR_Set_Mastery_Preview.oracleText: See what's coming in the Zendikar Rising Mastery Pass.

MainNav/Killswitch/PopupError_Message.oracleText: This is currently unavailable, please try again later
MainNav/Killswitch/PopupError_Message.translation: 当前不可用，请稍后尝试

MainNav/Landing/Landing_Marquee_MainImag.oracleText: Click here to choose a preconstructed Battle Deck and start playing!
MainNav/Landing/Landing_Marquee_MainImag.translation: 点击此处选择一副预先构筑好的战斗套牌，即刻开始游戏！

MainNav/Landing/Welcome_Banner_Subhead.translation: 祝您游戏愉快，直播畅快！

MainNav/Landing/Welcome_SideBanner_Subhe.oracleText: Open the boosters in your collection!
MainNav/Landing/Welcome_SideBanner_Subhe.translation: 打开你牌张收藏中的补充包！

MainNav/Learn/More_Header.oracleText: Looking for more tips? There's an entire course on how to up your game.
MainNav/Learn/More_Header.translation: 需要更多提示？我们准备了完整教程，助你提升游戏技艺。

MainNav/Learn/Twitch_Disclaimer.translation: TWITCH，TWITCH标志和／或Glitch标志是Twitch Interactive，Inc.或其附属公司的商标。

MainNav/Login/Acccount_Registered_Email_.oracleText: Email address already registered with another account.
MainNav/Login/Acccount_Registered_Email_.translation: 此电子邮件地址已被另一个帐号使用。

MainNav/Login/Accept_TC.oracleText: Please accept the terms and conditions to register.
MainNav/Login/Accept_TC.translation: 需接受条款与条件才能注册。

MainNav/Login/Age_Requirement_Not_Met.oracleText: This account cannot be created. Please contact Game Support for assistance. Error code 88.
MainNav/Login/Age_Requirement_Not_Met.translation: 无法创建帐户。请联系游戏支持以获取帮助。错误代码88。

MainNav/Login/Click_Submit_Agree.oracleText: By clicking on ‘Submit' I agree to the Terms and Conditions, Code of Conduct, and Privacy Policy.
MainNav/Login/Click_Submit_Agree.translation: 点击「提交」即表示我同意 条款与细则、行为准则和隐私政策。

MainNav/Login/Confirm_Email.translation: 确认你的电子邮件地址

MainNav/Login/Default_Error_Message.oracleText: A unexpected problem occurred (Error code: {code}). Please try again.
MainNav/Login/Default_Error_Message.translation: 发生意外问题（错误码：{code}）。请再试一次。

MainNav/Login/Description_ClosedBetaMigr.oracleText: Note: If you haven't logged in since the Closed Beta, and made purchases during the Closed Beta, you will need to contact customer service to have those purchases transferred. In the meantime, feel free to create another account to get back into the action.
MainNav/Login/Description_ClosedBetaMigr.translation: 注意：如果你在封测结束后从未登录过，且曾在封测过程中购买过物品，则你需要联系客户服务来将之前所作的购买转移到新帐户当中。在此期间，你可以创建新帐户来重新游戏。

MainNav/Login/Description_ForgotPassword.oracleText: Click here and we'll send you a password reset e-mail.
MainNav/Login/Description_ForgotPassword.translation: 点击此处，我们便会将重置密码电子邮件发送给你。

MainNav/Login/Description_Forums.oracleText: Check server status, discuss the game, and chat with devs and other players about your experience.
MainNav/Login/Description_Forums.translation: 检查服务器的状态，讨论游戏并与开发人员和其他牌手聊聊你的体验。

MainNav/Login/Description_Status.oracleText: Check server status and read about any expected downtimes.
MainNav/Login/Description_Status.translation: Check server status and read about any expected downtimes.

MainNav/Login/Description_Support.oracleText: Other account issues? Find a game-breaking bug? File a ticket and one of our support reps will get back to you as soon as posisble.
MainNav/Login/Description_Support.translation: 遇到了其他的帐号问题？还是碰到了影响游戏正常进行的错误？烦请提交工单，我们的支持代表会尽快与你联系。

MainNav/Login/DisplayName_Length_Feedbac.translation: 显示名称必须介于3-23个字符之间。

MainNav/Login/Display_Name_Moderated.oracleText: Display name cannot contain banned words.
MainNav/Login/Display_Name_Moderated.translation: 显示名称不得包含禁用字。

MainNav/Login/Email_Required.oracleText: Please enter a valid email address.
MainNav/Login/Email_Required.translation: 请输入有效的电子邮箱地址。

MainNav/Login/Enter_Email.translation: 输入你的电子邮箱地址

MainNav/Login/Enter_Valid_Birthdate_Feed.oracleText: Enter a valid birthdate to continue.
MainNav/Login/Enter_Valid_Birthdate_Feed.translation: 输入有效的出生日期以继续。

MainNav/Login/Experience_Question.oracleText: How much Magic have you played?
MainNav/Login/Experience_Question.translation: 你对万智牌的熟悉程度如何？

MainNav/Login/ForgotCredentials_Descript.oracleText:
Forgot your password? No problem! 

Enter the e-mail you used to register your account, and we'll send you instructions to recover your account.
MainNav/Login/ForgotCredentials_Descript.translation:
忘记密码？别担心！

在此输入你注册帐号时使用的电子邮箱，我们便会把找回帐号的说明发送给你。

MainNav/Login/Help_Description.oracleText: We're sorry you're having issues. Here are a couple ways we can try to get you back up and running.
MainNav/Login/Help_Description.translation: 很抱歉你遇到问题。有几种方法可以帮助你再度进入游戏。

MainNav/Login/Invalid_Email_Password.translation: 电子邮箱地址或密码无效。

MainNav/Login/Minimum_Age_Feedback.oracleText: This account cannot be created. Please contact Game Support for assistance. Error code 89.
MainNav/Login/Minimum_Age_Feedback.translation: 无法创建帐户。请联系游戏支持以获取帮助。错误代码88。

MainNav/Login/Minimum_Age_Registration_U.oracleText: Proceed to myaccounts.wizards.com to create an account?

MainNav/Login/Old_Account_Feedback.oracleText: This email is associated with an existing MTG Arena Closed Beta Account. Log in to that account to continue.
MainNav/Login/Old_Account_Feedback.translation: 此电子邮箱已与现有的MTG竞技场封闭测试帐号相关联。请登录该帐号以继续。

MainNav/Login/Old_Password.oracleText: You've logged in to your old Arena Closed Beta account, which was already upgraded to a Wizards Account. Please log in with the password you chose for your Wizards Account.
MainNav/Login/Old_Password.translation: 您现在登录的原有《竞技场》封测帐号已升级为威世智帐户。请使用您威世智帐户的密码登录。

MainNav/Login/PasswordRules.oracleText:
Passwords must contain at least:
- 8 characters
- An upper-case and lower-case character
Passwords must not contain:
- EmailAddress
- Display Name
- Same character repeated 3 or more times
MainNav/Login/PasswordRules.translation:
"密码须至少包含：
- 8个字符
- 一个大写字母和一个小写字母
密码不得包含：
- 电子邮件地址
- 显示名称r
- 重复3次以上的相同字符"

MainNav/Login/Password_Character_Repeate.oracleText: Password cannot contain same character repeated 3 times
MainNav/Login/Password_Character_Repeate.translation: 密码不得包含重复3次的相同字符

MainNav/Login/Password_Contains_Display_.oracleText: Password cannot be based on display name
MainNav/Login/Password_Contains_Display_.translation: 密码不得与显示名称近似

MainNav/Login/Password_Contains_Email_Fe.oracleText: Password cannot be based on email address
MainNav/Login/Password_Contains_Email_Fe.translation: 密码不得与电子邮件地址近似

MainNav/Login/Password_Length_Feedback.translation: 密码必须介于8-64个字符之间。

MainNav/Login/Password_Too_Simple.oracleText: Password too simple. Try increasing length and/or combining numbers, symbols, or upper and lowercase characters.
MainNav/Login/Password_Too_Simple.translation: 密码太简单。请增加密码长度和／或加入数字、符号，或大小写字母。

MainNav/Login/Receive_Offers.oracleText: YES! Wizards may send me promotional emails about Wizards' events, games, offers, and services.
MainNav/Login/Receive_Offers.translation: 威世智可以向我发送有关威世智赛事，游戏，优惠与服务的促销邮件。

MainNav/Login/Recovery_Email_Couldnt_Sen.oracleText: Recovery e-mail could not be sent.
MainNav/Login/Recovery_Email_Couldnt_Sen.translation: 无法发送找回电子邮件。

MainNav/Login/Recovery_Email_Sent.oracleText: Success! If an account exists for this email address, you'll receive instructions for resetting your password shortly.
MainNav/Login/Recovery_Email_Sent.translation: 成功！如果此电子邮件地址有帐户与之关联，您很快会收到重设密码的说明。

MainNav/Login/ResetPasswordDescription.oracleText:
To keep your account secure, we require that you choose a new password.
We have sent instructions on how to reset your password to your registered email address.
Please check your email and reset your password to continue.
For questions, <u><link=CustomerSupport>Contact Support</link></u>.
MainNav/Login/ResetPasswordDescription.translation:
To keep your account secure, we require that you choose a new password.
We have sent instructions on how to reset your password to your registered email address.
Please check your email and reset your password to continue.
For questions, <u><link=CustomerSupport>Contact Support</link></u>.

MainNav/Login/Rotation_Body.oracleText: The following sets are now only playable in Standard or Historic play modes.
MainNav/Login/Rotation_Body.translation: 以下系列现在只能在标准或史记赛制使用。

MainNav/Login/ShareData.oracleText: YES! Wizards may share my data with its third-party partners to provide me with personalized ads for Wizards' events, games, and services. I may opt out at any time. Click <link="PP8"><u>here</u></link> for details.
MainNav/Login/ShareData.translation: 威世智可以与其第三方合作伙伴共享我的数据，为我提供威世智赛事，游戏与服务的个性化广告。我可以随时选择退出。欲了解详情，请点击<link="PP8"><u>此处</u></link>。

MainNav/Login/SocialIdentityInUse.oracleText: There is already an account associated with this Epic id
MainNav/Login/SocialIdentityInUse.translation: 已有一个帐户与此 Epic ID 关联

MainNav/Login/TokenExpiredMessage.oracleText: Your login session has expired. Please log in to your Wizards Account again.
MainNav/Login/TokenExpiredMessage.translation: 你的登录已过期。请重新登录你的威世智帐户。

MainNav/Login/Upgraded_Account_Descripti.oracleText: Your account must be migrated to the new account system. Please confirm the information below.
MainNav/Login/Upgraded_Account_Descripti.translation: 您的帐户必须迁移至新的帐户系统。请确认以下信息。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ajani.oracleText:
"I have seen tyrants whose ambitions knew no limits. Creatures who styled themselves gods or praetors or consuls but thought only of their own desires, not of those they ruled. Whole populations deceived. Civilzations plunged into war. People who were simply trying to live made to suffer. To die. Never again. Until all have found their place, I will keep watch."

~ Ajani Goldmane, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ajani.translation:
「我曾亲眼目睹野心无度的暴君，他们自诩为神明、国君、执政，却只顾满足自己的私欲，从不考虑子民的需求，由此欺瞒全体子民，将整个文明拖入战火。只想安居乐业的人民却被迫遭受苦难，生命垂危。我绝不会让这些重演。在万物各得归属前，我将挚诚守护。」

～金鬃阿耶尼，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Angrath.oracleText:
"Eh, you don't have to worry about me," he huffed with some internal bitterness. "All I want is to defeat the damn dragon so I can get back to my daughters."

~ Angrath, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Angrath.translation:
「呃，你不必担心我，」他大声回复，但面露难色。「我现在只想击败那条该死的龙，好快点回到我的女儿身边。」

～安戈斯，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Arlinn.oracleText:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'one step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"

~ Arlinn Kord
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Arlinn.translation:
「如果你听不懂狼语，那就让我来翻译一下：『再敢靠近一步，我就撕开你的喉咙。』」

～雅琳珂德

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ashiok.oracleText:
"Events on this plane will inspire nightmares for generations to come."

~ Ashiok
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ashiok.translation:
「这个时空眼下所遭遇的一切，将成为连绵数代的噩梦。」

～安梭苛

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Chandra.oracleText:
Chandra took a deep breath... and ignited her entire body from the inside out. She wouldn't sacrifie her Spark, but she'd sure as hell use it to fuel her flames. She burned so brightly, the others all had to cover their eyes and take a few more steps back.

~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Chandra.translation:
茜卓深深吸了一口气…而后由内而外引燃全身。她绝不会牺牲自己的火花，但她却甘心用其来加亮身上光辉。而今她全身火焰烧得如此旺盛，令周遭众人不由得举手护住双眼，后退数步。

～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Davriel.oracleText:
"This Liliana person seems to have very poor negotiating skills. Who signs a contract with demons and doesn't bother to read the fine print? That's the most important part."

~ Davriel Cane
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Davriel.translation:
「这个叫莉莲娜的家伙好像不太懂得谈判技巧。哪有人跟恶魔签订契约却不去仔细阅读细则的？这才是最重要的地方啊。」

～达夫黎凯恩

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Domri.oracleText:
"Hey dragon! I am Domri Rade, champion and master of all the Gruul Clans! You and I should be talkin', mate! How 'bout I swear allegiance to you and yours! We'll burn Ravnica to the ground!"

~ Domri Rade, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Domri.translation:
「嘿，巨龙！我是多密雷德，古鲁各部族最强大的斗士与领袖！我们应该来谈一谈，伙计！我要加入你和你们的军队！这样我们就能把整个拉尼卡烧成平地！」

～多密雷德，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Dovin.oracleText:
"Then I suppose," he went on, "it will come as no suprise that I'm thoroughly prepared for each of you, with thopters designed specifically to neutralize your skills while exploiting your weaknesses."

~ Dovin Baan, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Dovin.translation:
「那么，」他接着说：「要是说我为你们每个人都做了充分准备，还设计了振翼机专门用来针对各位并找寻弱点，想必你们也不会太惊讶吧？」

～多温班恩，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Gideon.oracleText:
He unsheathed his sword with intentional dramatic effect, raising it high into the air. "This is Blackblade. It has already slain one Elder Dragon, and it can destroy Bolas, as well. With it, I hereby vow to take back this world. Who's with me?"

~ Gideon Jura, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Gideon.translation:
他郑重地拔出利刃，高举空中。「此乃乌锋。它曾让长老龙溅血，也定能夺取波拉斯性命。我发誓必用此剑拯救这个世界。谁要来跟我一起？」

～基定尤拉，火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Huatli.oracleText: Staring down at the lazotep-clad bodies scattered around her, Huatli considered the opening lines of a poem in their honor. The warriors of Amonkhet deserved that much.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Huatli.translation: 华特莉环视身边具具被拉佐特石包覆的尸身，心头已想好颂赞其荣耀的诗歌开篇。拉佐特石当中的阿芒凯战士应配得上这一切。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Jace.oracleText: As the relentless horde of Eternals poured into the plaza, Jace smiled, unable to completely master his curiosity despite the dire circumstances. Would the undead take the illusory bait or bee-line directly for his Spark? Either way, the results would certainly prove interesting.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Jace.translation: 看着永生者大军蜂拥杀进广场，杰斯竟然还笑了笑。尽管情况严峻，但他仍忍不住好奇：这些亡灵会不会被幻象引诱？还是会径直朝自己冲来？无论是哪一种，结局都会很有趣。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Jaya.oracleText:
Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good.

~ Jaya Ballard
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Jaya.translation:
各人看到的危险各不相同。至少，你得先看得准。

～雅亚巴拉德

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/JiangYanggu.oracleText:
"How did you cross the Blind Eternities with a dog?" Gideon asked, perplexed. 

"He's a magic dog," Jiang said with a shrug, as if that explained everything.

~ Gideon Jura and Jiang Yanggu, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/JiangYanggu.translation:
「你是怎么带着一条狗一起穿越黑暗虚空的？」基定不解地问道。

「这是一条有魔力的狗，」姜旸谷耸耸肩，仿佛这已能说明一切。

～基定尤拉与姜旸谷，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Karn.oracleText: Karn's heavy metal form sprang into motion with surprising agility. Before Dack could blink, three eternals lay shattered on the cobblestones. "Watch your back," the golem rumbled.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Karn.translation: 卡恩的金属身躯突然以迅雷不及掩耳之势跃起。戴克还来不及眨眼，就看到三个永生者被击碎倒在鹅卵石地面。「小心身后，」魔像缓缓说道。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Kasmina.oracleText:
"So many lives lost. So much potential wasted. The dragon's selfishness will cost the Multiverse dearly."

~ Kasmina
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Kasmina.translation:
「生灵涂炭，才俊尽失。这条龙的私心将让多重宇宙付出沉重的代价。」

～克蜜娜

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Kaya.oracleText:
Kaya wasn't just a Planeswalker. She was also a highly trained ghost-assassin. That wasn't a metaphor. She killed ghosts for a living.

~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Kaya.translation:
卡娅不只是一位鹏洛客，还是一位训练有素的鬼魂杀手。这并不是什么比喻的说法。她真的以驱鬼为生。

～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Kiora.oracleText: The endless sea of stone set Kiora's nerves on edge. Yet beneath it all, she could feel deep waters and within them, something ancient stirring. She reached out with her mind, calling it to the surface.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Kiora.translation: 无边无际的建物大海让奇奥拉心烦意乱。不过她感受得到，这片石林之下还有深邃汪洋，其中还有远古生灵待人唤醒。于是她静下心来用意念呼唤，将它唤醒召至地面。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Liliana.oracleText:
Long ago, she had been a Planeswalker when that term still meant something. Back when the Spark that granted the power to traverse worlds wasn't handed to every Beefslab who could wield a sword or child who could summon up a bit of fire. Back then, Planeswalkers were immortal. Back then, Planeswalkers were nothing short of gods.

And Liliana Vess was a—goddess!


~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Liliana.translation:
从很久以前，鹏洛客还是一个强大的存在时，她就一直是鹏洛客了。那时候，能够穿越世界的火花之力，舞剑蛮汉或召火毛孩都无从获得。那时候，鹏洛客还是永生的。那时候，鹏洛客就是神灵一般的存在。

莉莲娜当时就是女神！


～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Nahiri.oracleText: Molten blades whirled around Nahiri, parrying the vampire's blows with graceful ease. She would make Sorin wish he'd never escaped the prison she made for him.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Nahiri.translation: 娜希丽身边熔石刀剑飞舞，轻松化解吸血鬼的攻势。她会让索霖后悔逃出她专为他建立的囚笼。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Narset.oracleText:
"In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon."

~ Narset
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Narset.translation:
「在乱战之中，敌人的攻击可能就是你最称手的武器。」

～娜尔施

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/NicolBolas.oracleText:
The entire plan had been flawless. Every contingency addressed. Every potential threat neutralizied. Bolas had been doing this kind of thing for millennia, yet even he was impressed. Over his endless lifetime, Nicol Bolas had seen everything. And still, the Elderspell was a sight to behold.

~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/NicolBolas.translation:
整个计划完美无瑕。所有意外都有备案。所有威胁都已消除。虽然波拉斯几千年来一直在做同样的事情，但这次仍令其难忘。纵使尼可波拉斯在永恒生命中已见过一切事物。但他仍为至尊咒的壮丽景象所折服。

～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Nissa.oracleText:
"Let me make this clear: without a perfect act of unity from every single guild in concert, the plan has no hope of succeeding. You must put all grievances—petty or otherwise—behind you."

~ Nissa Revane, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Nissa.translation:
「让我把话说清楚：这个计划必须所有公会团结一心，联合行动才有希望成功。无论你们之间有什么成见与不满，都给我统统放下。」

～妮莎瑞文，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/ObNixilis.oracleText:
Ob Nixilis flexed his wings and took flight, attacking the Eternals from above, raining fire down upon them. Once he'd cleared a fiery circle, he landed, grabbed an Eternal and ripped off its limbs. He proceeded to tear apart and/or burn Eternals with his flaming hands, and Dack watched as the demon seemed to grow fiercer, more powerful—and larger—with every victory.

~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/ObNixilis.translation:
欧尼希兹振翅高飞，准备从上空向永生者发动攻击。顿时只见焰流向敌人倾注而下。在火焰散去之后，他降落地面，随手抓起永生者将其撕碎抛出。他继续前行，或而将永生者化为碎片，或而用双手将其烧成灰烬。戴克默默地注视这位恶魔，仿佛每次胜利都会让他变得更凶残，更强大，甚至更庞巨。

～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ral.oracleText:
He was lucky lazotep was such a good conductor. With a little effort, he created a circuit between himself and the dozen Eternals. They squirmed and jerked like butterflies pinned to a wall until he shut the electricity off, and as one they dropped to the cobblestones, smoking.
~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ral.translation:
幸运的是，拉佐特石是优良的导体。他不费吹灰之力，就在他和十几个永生者只见建成回路。转瞬之间他们就像被钉在墙上的蝴蝶一般，不停舞动、抽搐。直到拉尔停止电流，他们便齐刷刷地倒在鹅卵石地面上，身上青烟直冒。
～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Saheeli.oracleText:
Saheeli pulled out a small silver whistle. She puckered her lips and blew; the whistle emitted no audible sound. But the three remaining flying bandar heard its call and sprang into action, each latching onto a horse-sized thopter to take full control of its clockwork mechanisms. Saheeli smiled.

"Baan's not the only one who has prepared for his opponents."

~ Saheeli Rai, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Saheeli.translation:
莎希莉掏出了一个小巧的银哨。她噘起嘴将其吹鸣。虽然未发出任何声响，但剩余的三只飞猴听到了呼唤，齐齐开始行动～跳落马匹大小的振翼机中掌控其发条装置。莎希莉露出了微笑。

「为对手做准备的可不止班恩一个。」

～莎希莉莱伊，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Samut.oracleText:
Samut fought with a fury and passion Teyo had never seen before. She seemed to know the names of every single one of her lazotep foes, grimly saying, "You are free, Eknet. You are free, Temmet. You are free, Neit," as she slew each one.

~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Samut.translation:
撒姆特以一种泰佑从未在她身上见过的狂怒与激愤作战。她似乎知道每个包覆在拉佐特石下的敌人名字。她每杀一个，便会冷冷说道：「你自由了，埃尼特。你自由了，蒂穆特。你自由了，内特。」

～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Sarkhan.oracleText:
"You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."

~ Sarkhan Vol
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Sarkhan.translation:
「你曾经破坏我的家园，摧毁我的心智。现在我来找你寻仇了，波拉斯。」

～萨坎沃

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Sorin.oracleText: Even as the chaos of battle raged about him, Sorin could feel the familiar presence. He was certain now—she was here. Sweeping aside the strange undead creatures that swarmed to attack him, he strode forward with grim purpose. Nothing would keep him from his revenge.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Sorin.translation: 就算身边被战斗的混乱所笼罩，索霖仍能隐约感受到一种令人熟悉的存在。他现在确定了～她就在这里。在扫清蜂拥朝他扑来的不死生物之后，他满脸严肃地径直前行：没有人能阻止他复仇雪恨。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Tamiyo.oracleText: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Tamiyo.translation: 多美代原本只想旁观战乱进展，但她很快就意识到自己根本没法抽身事外。

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Teferi.oracleText:
Knocked off his feet, Teyo saw the eternal raise its scimitar to strike, but its stroke never fell. It stood frozen, trapped in concentric rings of magical force that shifted and rotated like clockwork. "Don't just lie there," said a warm voice from behind him. "Even my spells don't last forever. At least, not anymore."

~ Teferi
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Teferi.translation:
泰佑被击倒后，眼睁睁地看着永生者举起弯刀行将砍下，但这一刀永远没落下来。只见它呆站原地，被困在如漩涡转动的魔力圆环之中。「别干躺在那里，」身后传来一阵温暖话语。「我的咒语也不能永远困住它，至少现在不能了。」

～泰菲力

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Teyo.oracleText:
He claimed to be a novice shieldmage, and the boy was clearly operating at the point of near-exhaustion, but he did his part, protecting their backs, their fronts, their sides. He was quick and smart and if the situation weren't half so desperate, Kaya might have been amused at the way he was constantly surprised by his own rapidly growing skills.

~ War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Teyo.translation:
这男孩声称自己只是一名盾法师新手，如今已明显精疲力竭咬牙硬撑。但他圆满地完成了自己的任务～保护他们身后、身前、身侧不受攻击。他敏捷、聪颖，经常面对自己技艺飞速增长露出迷惑不解的表情。要不是战况过于激烈，卡娅可能会仔细看着他，并以这滑稽表情为乐。

～《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/TheWanderer.oracleText:
Davriel stood back to back with the mysterious stranger as Eternals closed in from all sides. "Nice hat," he remarked, trying to sound as unflappable as she looked.
The Wanderer sliced through three of the approaching undead with an effortless sweep of her broadsword. "Nice mask," she replied, with more than a hint of sarcasm.

~ The Wanderer and Davriel Cane
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/TheWanderer.translation:
随着永生者大军从四面逼近，达夫黎和神秘人被逼到圆圈中央，背对而立。「你的帽子不错。」他攀谈道，竭力想要装得跟对方神色一般泰然。
飘萍挥舞阔剑，转眼砍倒三个扑上来的亡灵。「你的面具也不错。」她回了一句，但语气之中却带有一些讥讽。

～飘萍与达夫黎凯恩

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ugin.oracleText:
"Help me now, and I will place a living Bolas in an eternal prison with myself as his eternal jailer. You'll be rid of us both. Forever. It isn't simply the safer course, it is the only course that guarantees the safety of the Multiverse."

~ Ugin, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Ugin.translation:
「帮助我，我要生擒波拉斯，把他囚禁在永恒牢笼之中，而我将永远看着他。我们两个将永远消失，永远。这不是较安全的做法，而是保证多重宇宙安全的唯一可行之道。」

～乌金，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Vivien.oracleText:
She spoke for the first time, anger rising steadily in her voice: "My name is Vivien Reid. And I don't want to help. I want to kill the dragon myself." 

"As long he as ends up dead," Ajani said. 

She inhaled, trying to rein in her rage. She succeeded. "As long as he ends up dead," she agreed.

~ Vivien Reid and Ajani Goldmane, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Vivien.translation:
她终于开口说话，但声音中满是愤怒：「我叫薇薇安瑞德。我不是来帮忙的。我只想亲手宰了那条龙。」

「只要他死。」阿耶尼说。

她深吸了一口气，试图平复自己的愤怒。她成功了。「只要他死。」她同意道。

～薇薇安瑞德与金鬃阿耶尼，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Vraska.oracleText:
"All across the city, the Golgari are opening up pathways to safety for every Ravnican they can find. We are fighting Bolas' army and preserving life." And then—more for show than anything—she added with bitter sarcasm, "You're welcome."

~ Vraska, War of the Spark: Ravnica by Greg Weisman
MainNav/LoreText/WAR/Vraska.translation:
「葛加理正在遍寻全城，为每位能找到的拉尼卡人发掘逃生通路。我们在抗击波拉斯军队的同时，也在保全生命。」然后，也许只是为了摆摆样子，她由略带讥讽地补充道：「不用谢我。」

～瓦丝卡，《火花之战：拉尼卡》，格雷格·韦斯曼著

MainNav/MOTD/MOTD_ScrollView_Viewport_Co.oracleText:
Four placeholder lines of text that show how great our message of the day is.
Very important placeholder information
Eat your vegtables
Or no dessert for you
MainNav/MOTD/MOTD_ScrollView_Viewport_Co.translation:
四行占位符的文本显示了我们今天的信息有多么棒。
非常重要的占位符信息
吃你的蔬菜
或者没有甜点给你

MainNav/Mailbox/CardRebalances_Descripti.oracleText: We've made adjustments to a few cards in Arena to make games more balanced. We've given you an additional copy of each card you already owned. To see all the rebalances and reasoning behind them, check out our Release Notes below!
MainNav/Mailbox/CardRebalances_Descripti.translation: 我们对《万智牌：竞技场》中的一些卡牌进行了调整，使游戏更加平衡。你会额外收到一份这些牌张的调整版本。要查看所有的调整牌张和背后的原因，请查看我们下面的补丁说明!

MainNav/Mailbox/Claim_Error.oracleText: The items could not be claimed, please try again later.
MainNav/Mailbox/Claim_Error.translation: 这些物品无法获得，请稍后重试

MainNav/Mailbox/CosmeticCallout_Descript.oracleText:
Did you know that you can change the cosmetics of each of your decks individually? That means that your decks can have even more distinctive personality, and you don't have to change your default cosmetics every time you want a new look! The steps are simple:

Go to your ‘Decks' tab

Select the deck you want to change the cosmetics for, and click ‘edit deck'

Click on the ‘Deck Name' panel

Click on the Avatars, Pets, and Card Sleeves buttons to change which cosmetics are applied to that deck!

And voilà! Your deck is now even more beautiful and unique!
MainNav/Mailbox/CosmeticCallout_Descript.translation:
您知道您可以单独更改每套牌的外观吗？ 这意味着您的套牌可以具有更加独特的个性，并且您不必每次想要新外观时都更改默认外观！ 步骤很简单：

转到您的“套牌”选项卡

选择您想要更改饰品的牌组，然后单击“编辑牌组”

单击“卡组名称”面板

单击头像、宠物和牌套按钮来更改应用于该牌组的饰品！

瞧！ 您的套牌现在更加美丽和独特！

MainNav/Mailbox/Customer_Service_Descrip.oracleText: Your issue should now be resolved, and we're sorry for any inconvenience it caused. Thank you for playing Magic: The Gathering Arena!
MainNav/Mailbox/Customer_Service_Descrip.translation: Your issue should now be resolved, and we're sorry for any inconvenience it caused. Thank you for playing Magic: The Gathering Arena!

Unclaimed items will be automatically claimed upon message expiration.

MainNav/Mailbox/Decathlon_Reward_Title.oracleText: Get ready for the Arena Decathlon Finals!

MainNav/Mailbox/DeckTechABTest_Descripti.oracleText:
Have you ever wondered what sort of combos you can pop off with in Arena? Want cool decks without having to think about their composition yourself? Well wait no longer.

Check out our YouTube channel for unique tips and tricks for some of our favorite decks across Standard, Historic, and more!
MainNav/Mailbox/DeckTechABTest_Descripti.translation:
你曾想知道在竞技场中哪种组合技能让自己嗨起来吗？想要炫酷套牌却不想自己苦思构筑？那么行动起来！

访问我们的YouTube频道获取一些标准、史迹及更多赛制中最受欢迎套牌的独特技巧和秘诀！

MainNav/Mailbox/EarlyAccessGeneric_Desc.oracleText: Watch Standard, Sealed, and Draft as your favorite streamers face off against each other in head-to-head matches in a special early-access event happening now!
MainNav/Mailbox/EarlyAccessGeneric_Desc.translation: Watch Standard, Sealed, and Draft as your favorite streamers face off against each other in head-to-head matches in a special early-access event happening now!

MainNav/Mailbox/EarlyAccess_Gift_ForPart.oracleText:
We're so excited to have you here! As a courtesy to other players, please let your games finish naturally, so that everyone can get to experience as much of the set as possible.  

In your Invite Email, there is a link to join the Early Access event Discord, which is the best place to reach out about any technical troubleshooting or updates. 

Thank you again for participating in Early Access!
MainNav/Mailbox/EarlyAccess_Gift_ForPart.translation:
我们很高兴您能来到这里！ 出于对其他玩家的礼貌，请让您的游戏自然结束，以便每个人都能尽可能多地体验该系列。

在您的邀请电子邮件中，有一个加入早期访问活动 Discord 的链接，这是联系任何技术故障排除或更新的最佳位置。

再次感谢您参与抢先体验！

MainNav/Mailbox/EarlyAccess_Gift_ForPart.oracleText: Thank you for joining Early Access!
MainNav/Mailbox/EarlyAccess_Gift_ForPart.translation: Thank you for joining Early Access!

MainNav/Mailbox/ExtraLifeEmployeeStream_.oracleText:
Come watch Wizards employees play Magic in support of the Extra Life Charity from Monday, October 30th until Friday, November 3rd from 9am to 12pm PT!

And of course, don't forget to check out the Game Day stream this Saturday, November 4th from 4pm to 10pm PT!

MainNav/Mailbox/HalloweenCosmetics_Descr.oracleText:
Have you come here hoping to follow a trail of treats? What splendors might await at the end...piles of candy and goodies, sweeter and more plentiful than your wild heart could dream up.

Or have you, perhaps, been tricked? Deceived by a gaggle of imps who cackle at your fallen spirits? 

There is only one way to find out: click the claim button below now to see if you have been tricked or given a treat! 

Happy Halloween!
MainNav/Mailbox/HalloweenCosmetics_Descr.translation:
您来到这里是不是希望追寻美食的踪迹？ 最后可能会有什么发光的东西等待着……成堆的糖果和好东西，比你狂野的心所能想象的更甜蜜、更丰富。

或者你被欺骗了？ 被一群对你堕落的灵魂咯咯笑的小鬼欺骗了吗？

只有一种方法可以查明：立即点击下面的“领取”按钮，看看您是否被欺骗或得到了奖励！

万圣节快乐！

MainNav/Mailbox/HarvestTideFestival_Anno.oracleText:
Visit your local WPN store October 27-29 and join The Harvesttide Festival to bring back the spooky goodness from both Innistrad: Midnight Hunt and Innistrad: Crimson Vow. In this event players will pit Humans, Vampires, and Werewolves against each other in Two-Headed Giant games and win prizes.

Register for the event with the same Wizards account as your MTG Arena account and receive an Undead Butler sleeve on MTG Arena.

For more details, click below!

*This event is available in North American WPN stores only.

MainNav/Mailbox/MOMPodcast_Description.oracleText:
Lore enthusiasts rejoice! The Magic Story Podcast is back.
 
Join Wizards of the Coast official hosts Harless Snyder (Product Marketing Manager) and Natalie Kreider (Game Producer) as they take you through the multiverse like never before. Whether you have been playing Magic for years or just discovered it yesterday, the podcast is intended to be a convenient entry point to dive deeper into the various characters, settings, and stories that make up Magic.  
 
Click the link below to learn more, and to access the archive!

MainNav/Mailbox/MagicAnniversaryGiveaway.oracleText:
It's our anniversary! We released Arena on September 27th, 2019, and have had the privilege of continuing to improve it every day since.

We're so honored to have you here with us, whether you started playing all the way back in the beta or just joined us recently. Our players remind us that Magic is for everyone, all around the world, at any time. You're what makes working on this game great. Every fun piece of art, every whacky mechanic, and every cool new feature we do is with all of you mind.

Thanks for being with us, and we hope you continue to stick around and make Magic with us going forward! We've attached a special thank-you to this message, press the claim button below to receive it! See you on the battlefield!

(Unclaimed messages will be automatically granted upon message expiration)
MainNav/Mailbox/MagicAnniversaryGiveaway.translation:
这是我们的周年纪念日！ 我们于 2019 年 9 月 27 日发布了 Arena，并有幸从那时起每天都在不断改进它。

我们非常荣幸您能来到这里，无论您是在测试版中就开始玩游戏还是最近才加入我们。 我们的玩家提醒我们，万智牌适合世界各地的每个人。 是你们让这款游戏的工作变得精彩。 我们所做的每一件有趣的艺术品、每一个古怪的机制以及每一个很酷的新功能都与你们所有人有关。

感谢您与我们在一起，我们希望您继续留下来，与我们一起让万智牌走向未来！ 我们在此消息中附上了特别的感谢，请按下面的领取按钮来接收它！ 战场上见！

（未被领取的消息将在消息过期后自动授予）

MainNav/Mailbox/MagicAnniversaryGiveaway.oracleText: It's Magic the Gathering: Arena's Anniversary
MainNav/Mailbox/MagicAnniversaryGiveaway.translation: 今天是万智牌 竞技场的周年纪念日

MainNav/Mailbox/NewFormat_Timeless_Annou.oracleText:
Charge up your Lightning Bolt and hold onto your Counterspell because today we are introducing Timeless, a new Constructed Format where all cards on Magic: The Gathering Arena are playable. We expect Timeless to be filled with fast, fun, and exciting games as players will have access to the most powerful cards in MTG: Arena.

To contain all these powerful cards, Timeless will be the first format on Arena to have a Restricted List. If a card is on the restricted list, only a single copy of that card may be included in your deck and sideboard.

Ranked and Play queues will be available right away. During this time, we are going to be watching the format very closely for cards that should be added to the restricted list. Come be one of the first players to test it out, and click the link below to read more about it!

MainNav/Mailbox/PreferredPrinting_Descri.oracleText:
We are happy to announce that you can now select your favorite printing of each card in your collection! Yes, this means you can select your favorite basic lands!

Multiple printings for a single card are now collapsed down to a single entry. You can toggle the expand button on a card to see all the printings you have and toggle it again to close them up. From the expanded view you can tap on the heart to set a favorite, which is the printing the game will use by default. Your current favorite card is the first one used when you add it to your deck or when auto-adding lands.

Here are a few tips and tricks to help you start selecting your Preferred Printing of cards:

-- The easiest way to see this in action is to go to your collection, and sort to your lands.

-- From there, expand a card by using the button displayed in the upper left of any card that has multiple printings.

-- Select a favorite by clicking the heart button in the lower right corner of your favorite printing.

-- If you do not have a favorite selected, it defaults to the newest printing of that card in your collection.

-- If you would like a deck to NOT use your favorite, expand the list and select the printing you want for that deck.

-- If you have less printings of your favorite than you use, the most recent printing is also used.

-- Limited modes will keep the non-land cards to the ones in that set. For example: If the set has Opt, you'll see that set's Opt in your deck, not your preferred version.

From the expanded view you can tap on the heart to set a favorite, which is the printing the game will use by default. Your current favorite card is the first one used when you add it to your deck or when auto-adding lands.

MainNav/Mailbox/VAT_Update_Description.oracleText:
Starting with the update on May 18, Magic: The Gathering Arena is making some adjustments to its storefront in order to create pricing parity across devices and platforms throughout Europe to better account for value-added tax. 

First, players who are paying in Euros on PC will see approximately a 10% increase in prices. This will bring PC prices closer to being in line with mobile prices, which will not change. 

Additionally, we will be removing the ability to switch between paying in Euros and Dollars. Players in Europe will now only be able to pay in Euros. 

As an example, here are the price updates for Gem packages: 

750 gems: 4.99 USD/EUR -> 5.49 EUR 
1,600 gems: 9.99 USD/EUR -> 10.99 EUR 
3,400 gems: 19.99 USD/EUR -> 21.99 EUR 
9,200 gems: 49.99 USD/EUR -> 53.99 EUR 
20,000 gems: 99.99 USD/EUR -> 107.99 EUR 

These changes are effective immediately and will not affect other regions.
