MainNav/NavBar/MasteryDisabled_Tooltip.translation: 精研通行证目前不可用。

MainNav/NavBar/WildCardsTooltip_Vault_De.oracleText: Contains 1 Mythic Wildcard, 2 Rare Wildcards, and 3 Uncommon Wildcards. Unlock the Vault by collecting cards.
MainNav/NavBar/WildCardsTooltip_Vault_De.translation: 包含1张秘稀万用牌、2张稀有万用牌和3张非凡万用牌。收集牌张便能打开宝库。

MainNav/Objectives/PlayPVPPoptart_Descri.oracleText: You cannot earn these rewards in Bot matches or the Color challenge.
MainNav/Objectives/PlayPVPPoptart_Descri.translation: 你不能在机器人对战或颜色挑战中获得这些奖励。

MainNav/Objectives/PlayPVPPoptart_Footer.oracleText: Earn daily and weekly rewards by playing against opponents in play, ranked, or live events.
MainNav/Objectives/PlayPVPPoptart_Footer.translation: 通过在对战、天梯或进行中的赛事与对手对战来获得日常和周常奖励。

MainNav/PackProgressMeter/BonusPackConte.oracleText: Golden Packs contain 6 rares, each with a normal chance to upgrade to mythic rare.
MainNav/PackProgressMeter/BonusPackConte.translation: 黄金补充包包含6张稀有牌，每张有正常的概率升级成为秘稀稀有度。

MainNav/PackProgressMeter/CallToAction.oracleText: Purchase {remaining} more Khans of Tarkir, Alchemy: Ixalan and The Lost Caverns of Ixalan packs to earn a Golden Pack.
MainNav/PackProgressMeter/CallToAction.translation: Purchase {remaining} more Khans of Tarkir, Alchemy: Ixalan and The Lost Caverns of Ixalan packs to earn a Golden Pack.

MainNav/PackProgressMeter/MeterDesriptio.oracleText: Every pack you purchase with gold or gems gets you closer to a Golden Pack.
MainNav/PackProgressMeter/MeterDesriptio.translation: 你使用金币或宝石购买的每个补充包都会使你更接近一个黄金补充包。

MainNav/PackProgressMeter/MeterDesriptio.oracleText: Golden Packs contain 6 rares, each with a normal chance to upgrade to mythic rare.
MainNav/PackProgressMeter/MeterDesriptio.translation: 黄金补充包包含6张稀有牌，每张有正常的概率升级成为秘稀稀有度。

MainNav/Packs/NoPackOpen1.oracleText: These packs currently cannot be opened. Please try again later.
MainNav/Packs/NoPackOpen1.translation: 这些补充包目前不能打开。 请之后再试。

MainNav/Packs/NoPackOpen2.oracleText: These packs are from an upcoming set. You will be able to open them once the set is released.
MainNav/Packs/NoPackOpen2.translation: 这些补充包来自未实装系列。 当系列实装时你可以打开。

MainNav/PetNames/M21_Preorder_Dog.translation: 大流士奥斯沃斯格哈特四世

MainNav/Popups/Handheld_MOZ_Tutorial_Tit.oracleText: Tap and hold cards to inspect their details.

MainNav/Popups/QuestRewardPopup/QuestRew.oracleText:
Text about how great this super special reward we're getting is.  It's really neat, you'll see!  
Pro tip:  Lands are the best card in the game.  Every deck needs them.  Make sure you draft them first!
MainNav/Popups/QuestRewardPopup/QuestRew.translation:
文字说明我们获得的这个超级特别奖励有多棒。真的很精致，你会看到的！
专业提示：地是游戏中最好的牌。每个套牌都需要它们。确保你先轮抽它们！

MainNav/Popups/QuestRewardPopupDetailsFo.oracleText: You can have up to three daily quests at one time.
MainNav/Popups/QuestRewardPopupDetailsFo.translation: 你同时最多只能有三个每日任务。

MainNav/Popups/SetAnnouncement/Descripti.oracleText: Visit the store to purchase packs and add to your collection.
MainNav/Popups/SetAnnouncement/Descripti.translation: 访问商店购买补充包，丰富你的牌张收藏。

MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_BottomPa.oracleText: THIS EVENT IS FREE TO PLAY

MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_LeftPane.oracleText:
The more you win, the bigger the prize!
With five wins, you'll even unlock a new battle deck!
MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_LeftPane.translation:
胜得越多，赢的越多！
取得五胜即能解锁一副全新战斗套牌！

MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_LeftPane.oracleText:
Run the Gauntlet!

Duel players with similar records until you win five times or lose twice. You'll increase your gold prize with each win. Unlock a new deck by winning five times!
MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_LeftPane.translation:
强手过招，连续对决！

与水平相当的牌手连续对战，直到你取得五胜或两败为止。每多取得一胜，还能增加你的金币奖励，取得五胜更能解锁新的套牌！

MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_LeftPane.oracleText:
Choose a Deck and Play!

Grab one of your battle decks and enter the fray! Can you win five times before you lose twice? Complete quests to unlock additional decks!
MainNav/PreconEvent/PreconEvent_LeftPane.translation:
选择套牌，加入游戏！

选择一副战斗套牌加入战局！你能否在吞下两场败局之前取得五胜？完成任务即可解锁额外套牌！

MainNav/PrivateGame/DeckType_60_Card_Alc.translation: 套牌类型：60张重制版卡牌

MainNav/PrivateGame/DiscordHost.oracleText: Start hosting, then head to Discord.
MainNav/PrivateGame/DiscordHost.translation: 请先主办游戏，然后前往Discord。

MainNav/PrivateGame/DiscordWidget_Bottom.oracleText: Waiting for an opponent to join.

MainNav/PrivateGame/DiscordWidget_TopTex.oracleText: Send a Game Invite in Discord.

MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.oracleText: Series Format (Best of X) mismatch: you and your opponent must select the same option.
MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.translation: 对战盘数（X盘制）不符：你和对手必须选择相同的选项。

MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.oracleText: You and your opponent did not select compatible Challenge Options:
MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.translation: 你和对手所选的对战选项不同：

MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.oracleText: Mode mismatch: you and your opponent must select the same options.
MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.translation: 赛事模式不符：你和对手必须选择相同的选项。

MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.oracleText: Unknown: Apologies, we haven't handled the following error yet. Please check your settings against your opponent's and ensure they are compatible.
MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MismatchedConf.translation: 未知错误：抱歉，我们尚无法处理以下错误。请和对手一同检查所设选项，确保两边相同。

MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MistmatchedCon.oracleText: Starting Player mismatch: Both of you must either choose Coin Flip, or your Play/Draw First selections must be complementary.
MainNav/PrivateGame/Error_MistmatchedCon.translation: 先手设置不符：双方可以都选择「掷硬币」，否则双方的「先手」／「后手」选项必须对应。

MainNav/PrivateGame/InputOpponent.oracleText: Input your opponent's Display Name and ID number
MainNav/PrivateGame/InputOpponent.translation: 输入对手的显示名称和ID编号

MainNav/PrivateGame/InputOpponentAlt.oracleText: Input your opponent's Wizards Account ID
MainNav/PrivateGame/InputOpponentAlt.translation: 输入对手的威世智帐户ID

MainNav/PrivateGame/Waiting.oracleText: Waiting for your opponent to challenge you back.
MainNav/PrivateGame/Waiting.translation: 正在等待对手向你回发对战请求。

MainNav/PrivateGame/WaitingWithSub.oracleText: Waiting for <USERNAME WILL BE SUBBED IN> to challenge you back.
MainNav/PrivateGame/WaitingWithSub.translation: 正在等待<USERNAME WILL BE SUBBED IN>向你回发对战请求。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Adventurer_Bio.oracleText: A hooded figure stands in the doorway, their face obscured by shadows. They do not speak, but mysterious power crackles at their fingertips. Who are they? What do they want? Their fate has yet to be written.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Adventurer_Bio.translation: 戴着兜帽的人站在门口，他们的脸被阴影遮住了。他们没有说话，但神秘的力量在他们的指尖噼啪作响。他们是谁？他们想要什么？他们的命运还有待书写。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/AjaniGoldmane_Bi.oracleText: Ajani Goldmane is a leonin Planeswalker who fiercely believes in justice, though his methods for achieving it have changed over the years. He fell under Phyrexian control as a pawn in their invasion scheme, but his mind and body were restored after the war.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/AjaniGoldmane_Bi.translation: 金鬃阿耶尼是一位坚信正义的狮子鹏洛客，尽管多年来他实现正义的方式已经发生了变化。 他作为非瑞克西亚入侵阴谋的一枚棋子，落入非瑞人的控制之下，但战后他的心灵和身体都得到了恢复。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Ajani_DMU_Bio.oracleText: A leonin warrior and healer once known throughout the Multiverse for his heroic deeds, the Planeswalker Ajani made the perfect sleeper agent for the Phyrexian praetor Sheoldred's dark plans. Once a champion of the Coalition, Ajani has become one of its most feared enemies, striking terror and despair in the hearts of those he hunts.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Ajani_DMU_Bio.translation: 一位狮子战士和治疗师，曾经因其英勇事迹而闻名于多重宇宙，鹏洛客阿耶尼现在成为了非瑞克西亚魔判官希欧蕊的黑暗计划中完美的潜藏密探。曾经是联盟冠军的阿耶尼，现在已成为联盟最可怕的敌人之一，被他所捕猎的人，心中充满了恐惧和绝望。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/AlenaHalana_VOW_.oracleText: Partners in both work and life, Halana and Alena protect travelers through the Ulvenwald, an ancient forest that is home to werewolves, vampires, and other dangerous creatures. With the onset of eternal night, their battles against these terrors have become more harrowing than ever before.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/AlenaHalana_VOW_.translation: 荷拉娜与阿雷娜是工作和生活中的伙伴，她们保护旅行者穿越沃文森森林，这是一个古老的森林，是狼人、吸血鬼和其他危险生物的家园。随着永夜的到来，她们与这些恐怖怪物的战斗变得比以往任何时候都更加惨烈。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Angrath_Bio.oracleText: Angrath is driven by a feeling of restless impatience, like a caged animal awaiting its moment of freedom. This fuels his wild temper and spurs him on in an endless series of raids upon the coastal towns of the Sun Empire.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Angrath_Bio.translation: 安戈斯犹如久囚笼中的野兽，因渴望自由而焦躁。他本就易怒，如今更是火上加油，不断驱使船员去劫掠烈阳帝国的沿海城镇。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Astarion_HBG_Bio.oracleText: Astarion prowled the night as a vampire spawn for centuries, serving a sadistic master until he was snatched away. Now he can walk in the light, but can he leave his wicked past behind?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Astarion_HBG_Bio.translation: 阿斯代伦是一个徘徊在夜幕下的吸血鬼后裔，他已经活了几百年，期间一直侍奉着他那虐待成性的主人，直到他被掳走。现在他可以行走在阳光下，但他能舍去他那扭曲的过往吗？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Atraxa_MOM_Bio.oracleText: Originally an angel from Mirrodin who was "blessed" with compleation, Atraxa serves as the voice of Elesh Norn and spreads her words (and glistening oil) across the Multiverse. During the invasion, she's tasked with destroying New Capenna and its source of Halo—but Atraxa may not be prepared for what she finds there . . .
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Atraxa_MOM_Bio.translation: Originally an angel from Mirrodin who was "blessed" with compleation, Atraxa serves as the voice of Elesh Norn and spreads her words (and glistening oil) across the Multiverse. During the invasion, she's tasked with destroying New Capenna and its source of Halo—but Atraxa may not be prepared for what she finds there . . .

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Aurelia_Bio.oracleText: Aurelia argues that true justice isn't merely the enforcement of the letter of existing laws; but the establishment of equitable and compassionate relationships among all of Ravnica's people.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Aurelia_Bio.translation: 欧瑞梨认为，仅用强权维系法条权威算不上守护正义，唯有使平等互助理念长植民心，方才能在拉尼卡实现公义。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Adv.oracleText: A hooded figure stands in the doorway, their face obscured by shadows. They do not speak, but mysterious power crackles at their fingertips. Who are they? What do they want? Their fate has yet to be written.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Adv.translation: 戴着兜帽的人站在门口，他们的脸被阴影遮住了。他们没有说话，但神秘的力量在他们的指尖噼啪作响。他们是谁？他们想要什么？他们的命运还有待书写。

He fell under Phyrexian control as a pawn in their invasion scheme, but his mind and body were restored after the war.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Aja.translation: 金鬃阿耶尼是一位坚信正义的狮子鹏洛客，尽管多年来他实现正义的方式已经发生了变化。 他作为非瑞克西亚入侵阴谋的一枚棋子，落入非瑞人的控制之下，但战后他的心灵和身体都得到了恢复。

Once a champion of the Coalition, Ajani has become one of its most feared enemies, striking terror and despair in the hearts of those he hunts.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Aja.translation: 一位狮子战士和治疗师，曾经因其英勇事迹而闻名于多重宇宙，鹏洛客阿耶尼现在成为了非瑞克西亚魔判官希欧蕊的黑暗计划中完美的潜藏密探。曾经是联盟冠军的阿耶尼，现在已成为联盟最可怕的敌人之一，被他所捕猎的人，心中充满了恐惧和绝望。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ale.oracleText: Partners in both work and life, Halana and Alena protect travelers through the Ulvenwald, an ancient forest that is home to werewolves, vampires, and other dangerous creatures. With the onset of eternal night, their battles against these terrors have become more harrowing than ever before.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ale.translation: 荷拉娜与阿雷娜是工作和生活中的伙伴，她们保护旅行者穿越沃文森森林，这是一个古老的森林，是狼人、吸血鬼和其他危险生物的家园。随着永夜的到来，她们与这些恐怖怪物的战斗变得比以往任何时候都更加惨烈。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Alp.oracleText: A mysterious and powerful mage delving deep into the secrets of the past, this aven seeks to turn history into Dominaria's most potent weapon.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Alp.translation: 布罗格生前是个工匠，用他在乌尔博格找到的废品拼凑出机械的小玩意。现在他已经死了，但他还在继续修补，组装沼泽苔藓和尸体材料，为他繁荣的社交圈添砖加瓦。在他的工场外，可以看到布罗格和他的好朋友丁骨，丁骨偶尔会抢劫他。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Alp.oracleText: A mysterious and powerful mage delving deep into the secrets of the past, this aven seeks to turn history into Dominaria's most potent weapon.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Alp.translation: 这位神秘而强大的法师深入研究过去的秘密，试图将历史变成多明纳里亚最有力的武器。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ang.oracleText: Angrath is driven by a feeling of restless impatience, like a caged animal awaiting its moment of freedom. This fuels his wild temper and spurs him on in an endless series of raids upon the coastal towns of the Sun Empire.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ang.translation: 安戈斯犹如久囚笼中的野兽，因渴望自由而焦躁。他本就易怒，如今更是火上加油，不断驱使船员去劫掠烈阳帝国的沿海城镇。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ara.oracleText: Aragorn, legendary Ranger of the North, is a man of many destinies. As the descendant of Isildur, Aragorn wields his ancestor's reforged blade and joined the Fellowship of the Ring to settle his family's legacy. After the war, he claims the throne of Gondor and weds Arwen, his true love.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ara.translation: 阿拉贡，传说中的北方游侠，一个命运多舛的人。 作为伊熙尔铎的后裔，阿拉贡挥舞着他祖先的重铸剑，并加入了魔戒远征队来继承他家族的遗产。 战争结束后，他获得了刚铎的王位，并与他的真爱阿尔温结婚。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Arv.oracleText: Once a proud Benalish knight, Arvad was turned into a vampire by a descendent of the notorious Sengir line. Wielding the same holy magic that lets him withstand sunlight and suppress his hunger for blood, Arvad guards his companions aboard the Weatherlight from the Phyrexian invaders.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Arv.translation: 亚瓦德曾经是一名骄傲的宾纳里亚骑士，被臭名昭著的森吉尔家族的后裔变成了吸血鬼。挥舞着同样的神圣魔法，让他能够抵御阳光并抑制对血液的渴望，亚瓦德守护着他在晴空号上的同伴们，使他们免受非瑞克西亚入侵者的侵扰。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ash.oracleText: Cloaked in darkness and mystery, Ashiok has the power to turn nightmares into reality. Ashiok claims to act in the name of equality—and believes there is no greater equalizer than fear.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ash.translation: 隐藏在黑暗和神秘之中，安梭苛拥有将噩梦变为现实的力量。 安梭苛声称以平等的名义行事——并相信没有比恐惧更能平衡的东西了。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ash.oracleText: Ashiok is an elegant being of nightmare who draws on fear, creating twisted physical manifestations of each victim's darkest dreams. Ashiok's motives and origin are unknown, but most who encounter this sinister entity quickly conclude that some mysteries are better left unraveled.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ash.translation: 安梭苛是一个优雅的噩梦生物，利用恐惧，为每个受害者最黑暗的梦想创造扭曲的物理表现。安梭苛的动机和来源不明，但大多数遇到这个邪恶的实体的人很快就会得出结论，有些谜团最好不要被揭开。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ast.oracleText: Astarion prowled the night as a vampire spawn for centuries, serving a sadistic master until he was snatched away. Now he can walk in the light, but can he leave his wicked past behind?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ast.translation: 阿斯代伦是一个徘徊在夜幕下的吸血鬼后裔，他已经活了几百年，期间一直侍奉着他那虐待成性的主人，直到他被掳走。现在他可以行走在阳光下，但他能舍去他那扭曲的过往吗？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Atr.oracleText: Originally an angel from Mirrodin who was "blessed" with compleation, Atraxa serves as the voice of Elesh Norn and spreads her words (and glistening oil) across the Multiverse. During the invasion, she's tasked with destroying New Capenna and its source of Halo—but Atraxa may not be prepared for what she finds there . . .
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Atr.translation: 亚崔夏原本是来自秘罗地的天使，被“祝福”完化，她为艾蕾侬代言，并将她的话语（和烁油）传播到多重宇宙。 在入侵期间，她的任务是摧毁新卡佩纳及其金圆源头，但亚崔夏可能还没有为她在那里发现的东西做好准备……

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Aur.oracleText: Aurelia argues that true justice isn't merely the enforcement of the letter of existing laws; but the establishment of equitable and compassionate relationships among all of Ravnica's people.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Aur.translation: 欧瑞梨认为，仅用强权维系法条权威算不上守护正义，唯有使平等互助理念长植民心，方才能在拉尼卡实现公义。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bas.oracleText: For most of his life, Basri Ket was utterly devoted to Oketra, god of loyalty and solidarity. When she was slain in the Hour of Devastation, his world was shattered. But rather than let it break him, he took up one of her massive arrows as a spear and vowed to champion her ideals across the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bas.translation: 巴席利柯特一生中的大部分时间都完全献给了团结之神。当她在毁灭时刻被杀时，他的世界被打碎了。但他并没有因此而崩溃，而是拿起她的一支巨箭作为长矛，发誓要在整个多重宇宙捍卫她的理想。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bol.oracleText: A force of villainous destruction, crushing all that stand in his way.  Elder dragon and tyrant of worlds, Nicol Bolas is one of the oldest known beings in the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bol.translation: 龙族的长老，世界的暴君；尼可波拉斯是多重宇宙中已知的最古老人物之一。他掌握着邪恶的毁灭力量，能够粉碎一切敢阻止他的魔法和生灵。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bor.oracleText: When the Machine Legion invades Ravnica, two unlikely heroes rise to defend it: Borborygmos, the enormous cyclopean leader of the Gruul clans, and Fblthp, a tiny homunculus with the worst sense of direction in the Multiverse. They're opposites in many ways, but when it comes to protecting Ravnica, they see perfectly eye to eye.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bor.translation: When the Machine Legion invades Ravnica, two unlikely heroes rise to defend it: Borborygmos, the enormous cyclopean leader of the Gruul clans, and Fblthp, a tiny homunculus with the worst sense of direction in the Multiverse. They're opposites in many ways, but when it comes to protecting Ravnica, they see perfectly eye to eye.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bor.oracleText: Boromir, the eldest son of the Steward of Gondor, is a proud fighter and a member of the Fellowship of the Ring. Tempted by the Ring's power, he attempts and fails to seize it from Frodo. When Uruk-hai attack the Fellowship at Amon Hen, Boromir meets a tragic end.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bor.translation: Boromir, the eldest son of the Steward of Gondor, is a proud fighter and a member of the Fellowship of the Ring. Tempted by the Ring's power, he attempts and fails to seize it from Frodo. When Uruk-hai attack the Fellowship at Amon Hen, Boromir meets a tragic end.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bra.oracleText: Centuries ago, Braids was a powerful mage for the Cabal until a near-death experience left her trapped in dementia space. There she was trapped, torn apart again and again by her own nightmares, until a desperate conclave of summoners performed a ritual to drag her back to Dominaria (and unfortunately blew up all their heads in the process).
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bra.translation: 几个世纪前，布蕾德是柯帮的一名强大法师，直到一次濒临死亡的经历让她被困在惧像空间。她被困在那里，一次又一次地被自己的噩梦撕裂，直到一个穷途末路的惧像召唤师协会举行仪式将她拖回多明纳里亚（不幸的是，在这个过程中他们的头都被炸掉了）。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bra.oracleText: Beckett Brass is the steady leader of the Brazen Coalition. Hoping to bounce back in the wake of the Phyrexian invasion, Brass marshals her pirate crew toward the rumored wealth and power hidden below the surface.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Bra.translation: 贝克蒂霸司是莽霸联盟的沉着领导者。霸司带领她的海盗船员动身寻找传说中隐藏在地面下的财富和权力，希望能在非瑞人入侵后卷土重来。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cha.oracleText: There is no virtue in subtlety, at least not as far as Chandra Nalaar is concerned. She's a confident, ardent, defiant Planeswalker whose specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cha.translation: 缜密没什么好处～至少茜卓纳拉从不挂心这点。她是一名自信满盈，热情似火，桀骜不驯的鹏洛客，她的专长就是烈焰：火焰咒语，火焰，以及更猛的火焰。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cha.oracleText: An impulsive and immensely powerful pyromancer, Chandra Nalaar is still growing into the hero she is destined to become.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cha.translation: An impulsive and immensely powerful pyromancer, Chandra Nalaar is still growing into the hero she is destined to become.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cha.oracleText: An impulsive and immensely powerful pyromancer, Chandra Nalaar is still growing into the hero she is destined to become.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cha.translation: 茜卓纳拉是位性格冲动、技艺高强的烈焰术士。将来她必定能够成为伟大英雄，只是她现在仍在不断进步。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cou.oracleText: The court of Ardenvale values loyalty above all else, and only those with truly virtuous hearts survive the trial of the Circle of Loyalty. Ardenvale's knights fight in perfect unison with a single, unbreakable will, each one selflessly defending the next.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Cou.translation: 雅登瓦的宫廷重视忠诚高于一切，只有那些正直善良的人才能在忠诚焰圈的考验中幸存下来。雅登瓦的骑士们以一种牢不可破的意志完美地统一作战，每个人都无私地捍卫着下一个人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dan.oracleText: Danitha, heir of House Capashen, is a brave and brash knight who can always be found at the front of a melee. Trained from a young age in both diplomacy and sword-play, Danitha has taken over command of the knights once loyal to her fallen father—now she fights not just for Benalia, but Dominaria.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dan.translation: 卡帕轩家族的继承人达妮莎是一位勇敢而无畏的骑士，总是可以在混战的前线找到她。达妮莎从小就接受外交和剑术训练。她接管了曾经忠于她死去的父亲的骑士团的指挥权——现在她不仅为宾纳里亚而战，还为多明纳里亚而战。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dav.oracleText: Davriel Cane is a simple man who enjoys simple pleasures: wealth, luxury, and fine tea. He also happens to be a talented diabolist, skilled at binding demons to his service. He detests playing the hero, yet often finds himself in the role despite his best efforts to avoid it.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dav.translation: 达夫黎凯恩是一个简单的人，他享受着简单的快乐：财富、奢侈品和上等茶。他还碰巧是一个有天赋的恶魔学家，擅长将恶魔束缚在他的身边。他不喜欢扮演英雄，但却经常发现自己在扮演英雄，尽管他竭力避免这种情况。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Din.oracleText: Dina is a weird, darkly humorous, and tea-obsessed student of Witherbloom. She is learning how to concoct all manner of herbal brews from bizarre swamp creatures. If she offers you a cup of tea, you should probably decline.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Din.translation: 是靡华学院的一个古怪、黑暗幽默、痴迷于茶的学生。她正在学习如何从怪异的沼泽生物中炼制各种草药酒。如果她给你一杯茶，你可能应该拒绝。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dom.oracleText: Domri's affinity for wild creatures grew out of his natural distrust of rules, hierarchies, and authority figures. He can weave magic that summons, commands, and enhances these beasts.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dom.translation: 多密和野蛮生物的密切关系来自于他天生对规则、阶级和权威人物的不信任。他能使用魔法来召唤、控制并加强这些野兽。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dov.oracleText: Dovin can clearly see the flaws in any system or machine and predict with startling accuracy exactly how and when it will fail.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Dov.translation: 多温可以清晰洞见系统或机械当中的任何缺陷，同时还能精确预测故障发生的方式和时间。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ele.oracleText: After dominating the other Phyrexian praetors in a struggle for power, Elesh Norn led the transformation of the plane of Mirrodin into a world of twisted perfection called New Phyrexia. Under her rule, she now envisions an entire Multiverse "blessed" by the same mechanical corruption . . .
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ele.translation: 在权力斗争中统治了其他非瑞克西亚魔判官后，艾蕾侬带领秘罗地位面转变为一个完美且扭曲的世界，称为新非瑞克西亚。 在她的统治下，她现在设想让整个多重宇宙都受到同样的机械腐蚀的“祝福”……

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ell.oracleText: A lucky draw from the Deck of Many Things made Ellywick Tumblestrum the greatest bard in the multiverse. Her enchanting music so moved the Summer Queen and the Queen of Air and Darkness that they gifted the bard with her instrument, Morningmist.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ell.translation: 从万象无常牌中的幸运一抽，使艾利薇鼓琴成为多重宇宙中最伟大的吟游诗人。她迷人的音乐让夏日女王和空气与黑暗女王非常感动，她们把她的乐器--晨雾送给了吟游诗人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Els.oracleText: Elspeth Tirel has been to hell and back (for starters) but one thing is always true—you can never keep her down for long. Reborn as a planeswalking angel in the final hours of the Phyrexian invasion, Elspeth led the charge to save the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Els.translation: 艾紫培提瑞曾从冥界复还，有一件事永远是对的——你绝对无法让她屈服太久。 在非瑞克西亚入侵的最后时刻，艾紫培重生为天使鹏洛客，带头拯救多元宇宙。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Els.oracleText: The valiant planeswalker Elspeth Tirel has lived—and died—in her pursuit of justice. Now free from the underworld, she has arrived in New Capenna to find evidence of Phyrexian threats and demonic control. Time to get to work.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Els.translation: 英勇的鹏洛客艾紫培提瑞在追求正义的过程中出生入死。现在，她从地下世界中解脱出来，来到了新卡佩纳，找到了非瑞克西亚威胁和恶魔控制的证据。是时候开始工作了。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Els.oracleText: Elspeth fights for a single core principle: freedom for all. Struck down into the Underworld by a jealous god, she must find a way back to the land of the living—or stay dead trying.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Els.translation: 艾紫培为一个核心原则而战：所有人的自由。她被嫉妒的神明击落到冥界，她必须找到返回活人之地的方法——否则就死定了。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Eow.oracleText: Éowyn protects her homeland of Rohan as a skilled rider and a shieldmaiden. At the Battle of the Pelennor Fields, Éowyn demonstrates her prowess by slaying the Witch-king of Angmar, the Lord of the Nazgûl.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Eow.translation: 伊奥温以熟练的骑手和盾牌侍女的身份保护她的家乡洛汗 (Rohan)。 在佩兰诺平野之战中，伊奥温杀死了戒灵之王安格玛的巫王，展示了她的实力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ete.oracleText: After death, the warriors of Amonkhet that passed the trials of Gods become part of Bolas's lethal undead fighting force, the Dreadhorde. Embalmed in layers of lazotep to preserve their lifeforce, they lack emotions, hesitation, and disloyalty.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ete.translation: 阿芒凯的勇士生前历经万苦力争通过五神祀炼，然最终成得豪英者死后却变作波拉斯不死亡灵大军震惧军中一员杀戮四方。永生者经数层拉佐特石遗存，虽然能保留生命活力，但毫无情感，从不犹豫，绝对忠诚。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Fal.oracleText: Falco Spara is the head of the Brokers and one of the few in New Capenna old enough to remember the city's founding. With his ironclad contracts, Falco and his Brokers provide the highest order of protection to clients in need—provided they can shell out the cash.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Fal.translation: 冯柯斯帕拉是扶济社的头儿，也是新卡佩纳为数不多的、足以记住这座城市成立的老人之一。冯柯斯帕拉和他的扶济社通过他的铁定合同，为有需要的客户提供最高级别的保护--只要他们能拿出钱来。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Fre.oracleText: A half-elven Planeswalker from a bygone era, Freyalise was a leader of elven clans who used her incredible power to protect their forest home. She heroically sacrificed her life to save her people and prevented a catastrophe that threatened to destroy Dominaria.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Fre.translation: 妃雅丽兹是一位来自过去时代的半精灵鹏洛客，她是精灵部族的领袖，用她难以置信的力量来保护他们的森林家园。她英勇地牺牲了自己的生命来拯救她的人民，并阻止了一场有可能摧毁多明纳里亚的灾难。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Fro.oracleText: Frodo and Sam are two Hobbits from the Shire who selflessly volunteer to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom. They brave near-impossible odds throughout their quest, relying on the strength of their friendship to survive.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Fro.translation: 佛罗多和山姆是来自夏尔的两名霍比特人，他们无私地自愿在末日火山的烈火中摧毁至尊魔戒。 他们在整个探险过程中冒着几乎不可能的困难，依靠他们的友谊幸免遇难。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gal.oracleText: Galadriel carries one of the Three Rings of the Elves and is nearly as old as Middle-earth itself. She rules the forest of Lothlórien with her husband Celeborn and provides aid to the Fellowship of the Ring after their escape from Moria.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gal.translation: 凯兰崔尔携带着精灵三戒之一，几乎与中土本身一样古老。 她和她的丈夫凯勒博恩一起统治着洛丝罗瑞恩的森林，并在魔戒远征队逃离墨瑞亚后向他们提供援助。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gal.oracleText: In his youth, Gale was a prodigy practitioner of the Art. He likened his skill as a wizard to that of an actual artist, who manipulated the Weave in the same manner a virtuoso did music. After he was spurned by the goddess Mystra, Gale sought to win back her affection by reuniting her with a lost piece of her old magics.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gal.translation: 在年轻时，盖尔是一个天才般的艺术实践者。他把自己作为一个巫师的技能比作一个真正的艺术家，他以演奏家演奏音乐的方式操纵着魔网。在他被魔法女神蜜斯拉抛弃后，盖尔试图通过让她重新获得她的旧魔法中的一个失落部分来赢回她的感情。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gan.oracleText: Gandalf is an ancient Wizard sent to Middle-earth in the Third Age to prevent Sauron's return to power. Centuries of wandering endeared him to the peoples of the land as a trusted sage. As the leader of the Fellowship of the Ring, he sets out to guide Frodo to destroy the One Ring.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gan.translation: 甘道夫是一位古老的巫师，在第三纪元被派往中土世界阻止索伦重新掌权。 几个世纪的漂泊使他成为当地人民值得信赖的圣人。 作为魔戒远征队的领袖，他开始引导佛罗多摧毁至尊魔戒。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gar.oracleText: Garruk is the ultimate hunter and force of nature. Able to call wild creatures to his side and magically enhance their strength, he is a formidable foe to face anywhere. Currently under the spell of Oko, Garruk serves as a bodyguard; but for how long?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gar.translation: 贾路是终极猎手和自然力量。他能够召唤野生动物到他身边，并通过魔法增强它们的力量，在任何地方，他都是一个可怕的敌人。目前，在瓯柯的咒语下，贾路充当他的保镖；但能维持多久？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gid.oracleText: A powerful warrior-mage with the ability to make himself invulnerable, Gideon is fiercely loyal, unyielding, just, charismatic and never hesitates to enter combat to defend the innocent.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gid.translation: 基定是擅使法术的强大战士，身怀战而无伤之力。他尽节竭诚、坚定不屈、刚正坚贞而又富有魅力，总会毫不犹豫地冲入战团以保卫无辜者。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gis.oracleText: Gishath may look like a giant, terrifying dinosaur, because he is—but Gishath is also an avatar of the Threefold Sun, combining the deity's three aspects into one of the most formidable creatures on Ixalan. Best advice? Run, and never look back.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gis.translation: 基撒斯可能看起来像一只巨大而可怕的恐龙，因为他确实如此——但基撒斯也是三重太阳的化身，将神的三个方面结合在一起，成为依夏兰最强大的生物之一。 最好的建议是什么？ 跑吧，绝对不要回头看。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gol.oracleText: Sméagol, also called Gollum, was once a Hobbit who discovered the One Ring and fell under its thrall. He accompanies Frodo and Sam as their guide into Mordor, all the while fighting an internal battle to help the Hobbits or seize the Ring for himself once more.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Gol.translation: 史麦戈，又名咕噜，曾经是一名发现了至尊魔戒并被其奴役的霍比特人。 他作为佛罗多和山姆的向导一同进入魔多，同时他内心一直在作斗争：是帮助霍比特人，或是再次将魔戒据为己有。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Hua.oracleText: Under instruction from her Emperor, Huatli adventures in search of the Golden City, the Immortal Sun, and to secure her title as Warrior-Poet of the Sun Empire.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Hua.translation: 受帝国皇帝之令，华特莉率部进发寻找黄金城与永生圣阳，守护自己「烈阳帝国战士诗人」头衔。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Hua.oracleText: Warrior-Poet of the Sun Empire. Savior of Ixalan during the Phyrexian invasion. Former planeswalker. Huatli faces an uphill battle to unite her divided home in the aftermath of the war, but her answers wait deep underground—along with all-new conflicts yet to surface.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Hua.translation: 太阳帝国的战士诗人。 非瑞克西亚入侵期间依夏兰的救世主。 前鹏洛客。 华特莉面临着一场艰苦的战斗，要在战后团结她分裂的家园，但她的答案在地下深处等待着——同时还有尚未浮出水面的全新冲突。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jac.oracleText: Jace Beleren is a master of mental magic: spells of illusion, deception, and mind reading. His powers allow him to manipulate enemies by countering their magic or turning their spells against them.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jac.translation: 杰斯擅长心灵魔法：幻影、欺瞒，以及读取心灵的咒语。他的力量让他能反击敌对法师的魔法，或以其道反治其身。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jac.oracleText: Jace Beleren's power to manipulate minds finally met its match when he found his own consciousness dominated by the shadowy thrall of New Phyrexia. With Jace compleated, is any mind safe? All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jac.translation: 杰斯贝连操纵心灵的能力终于遇到了对手，其自身意识已被新非瑞克西亚的暗黑之力掌控。杰斯都被完化了，还有谁的心灵能确保安全？万界归一。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jac.oracleText: Few can compete with Jace Beleren as a strategist. Fewer still can overcome the influence of his mind-altering magic. While clever illusions help tip the balance of power in Jace's favor, his true strength lies in knowing his opponent's mind better than they know themselves.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jac.translation: 作为战略家，很少有人能与杰斯贝连抗衡，更少有人能够克服他的心灵魔法的影响。虽然聪明的幻象有助于使力量平衡向有利于杰斯的方向倾斜，但他真正的力量在于比对手更了解自己的思想。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jay.oracleText: Jaya is a native of Dominaria and a prominent part of both its past and its present. In her reckless youth, she sold her considerable pyromantic talents to the highest bidder.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jay.translation: 雅亚巴拉德是土生土长的多明纳里亚人，在它的过去与现今都扮演着重要角色。在当她还年轻气盛时，这位特务法术师强大的烈焰术天赋只为出价最高者效力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jay.oracleText: Born on Dominaria more than 1,500 years ago, Jaya Ballard is a hot-headed Planeswalker who played an important part in the plane's early history before disappearing for centuries. In recent years, she resurfaced as an older, wiser, but no less sarcastic hero, helping unite Dominaria to fight back against the threat of New Phyrexia.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jay.translation: 雅亚巴拉德于1，500 多年前出生于多明纳里亚，是一位急性子的鹏洛客。她在销声匿迹几个世纪之前，在该位面的早期历史中扮演了重要角色。近年来，她以年长、睿智但毒舌的英雄身份重新出现，帮助联合多明纳里亚对抗新非瑞克西亚的威胁。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jet.oracleText: Living large and in charge of the Cabaretti is Jetmir, the affable emcee of New Capenna. Once a druid leonin and now a social butterfly, Jetmir provides the music, the dancing, and the halo to the people, and the people are happy to oblige.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jet.translation: 新卡佩纳和蔼可亲的司仪杰米尔是乐舞会的负责人。杰米尔曾经是狮族德鲁伊，现在则是一只社交“蝴蝶”，他为人们提供音乐、舞蹈和金圆，人们也乐意为之效劳。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jin.oracleText: Cold, calculating, and brutal, Jin-Gitaxias thinks himself the smartest of all the Phyrexian praetors. He chooses his words carefully, but will gladly deliver long speeches on complex topics. His terrifying research is unburdened by ethics, and he cannot resist an intellectual challenge.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Jin.translation: 金吉塔厦冷酷、精于算计、残酷无情，他认为自己是所有非瑞克西亚魔判官中最聪明的。 他措辞谨慎，但很乐意就复杂的话题发表长篇演讲。 他令人恐惧的研究不受伦理道德的约束，而且他无法抗拒智力上的挑战。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kai.oracleText: Kaito Shizuki is a master ninja whose telekinetic powers augment his skills as an infiltrator. A risk-taker at heart with few qualms about breaking the rules, Kaito pursues technological progress to make his home plane of Kamigawa a better place for himself and his sister.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kai.translation: 漆月魁渡是一位忍者大师，他的心灵感应能力增强了他作为潜入者的技能。漆月魁渡是一个敢于冒险的人，对打破规则没有什么顾虑。他追求技术进步，致力于使他的家乡神河成为一个对他自己和他妹妹来说更好的地方。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kar.oracleText: Originally created as a war weapon, Karn is able to control all five colors of mana. This silver golem is a time-travelling Planeswalker, powerful artifact, world builder, and unstoppable ally.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kar.translation: 原本生为战争机器的卡恩，这尊银魔像能够控制全部五种颜色的法术力，它是一个能够进行时间旅行的鹏洛客，一件强大的神器，一位世界建造者和坚不可摧的盟友。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kay.oracleText: Kaya is a firm believer that life is for the living. If you die with unfinished business, well, that's probably your fault.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kay.translation: 卡娅坚信，只有生者才有资格生活。如果在逝去时仍有未竟的心愿，那么这大概是你自己的错。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kay.oracleText: A confident, roguish duelist with a mysterious past, Kaya has the ability to become partially incorporeal—allowing her to slip through solid items and physically interact with ghosts and the spirit world.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kay.translation: 卡娅是一名自信不羁的斗客，而她的过去是一个谜。她有能力使身体的部分成为虚体形态使她能穿越实物并与鬼魂和灵魂世界进行实体接触。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kel.oracleText: Hardly a day after leaving his home plane of Eldraine, Kellan is immediately thrown into a new adventure. The half-fae son of Oko traveled through an Omenpath in search of his father, arriving on Ixalan with a head full of questions.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kel.translation: 离开家乡艾卓时空不到一天，凯澜就立即投入了新的冒险。 瓯柯的半仙子儿子穿过预兆之路寻找他的父亲，带着满脑子的疑问来到依夏兰。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kel.oracleText: Kellan, the brave and kind son of Planeswalker Oko and a human woman of Eldraine, struggles to find his place. His life changes forever when he's swept off on a grand adventure, discovering in the process his power to summon weapons of arcane energy.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kel.translation: 凯澜是鹏洛客瓯柯和艾卓人类女性的儿子，他勇敢又善良，努力寻找着自己的位置。 当他踏上一场伟大的冒险之旅时，他的生活发生了永远的改变，并在这个过程中发现了他召唤秘法能量武器的能力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kil.oracleText: Killian Lu is a competitive and driven student of Silverquill who puts a lot of pressure on himself. His father being one of the deans doesn't make it any easier. While Killian's talents may seem effortless, he secretly trains for long hours every day.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kil.translation: 齐力安是一个好胜心强的银毫学生，他给自己施加了很大的压力。他的父亲是院长之一，这并没有让他轻松。或许齐力安看似毫不费力就拥有那些天赋，不过他每天都会进行长时间的秘密训练。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kio.oracleText: When Kiora isn't protecting Zendikar, she's turning her watchful gaze to pool safety. Armed with the Floaty of Thassa, a relic of great buoyancy, Kiora can save any troubled swimmer—unless they dare to run on the pool deck or dive in the shallow end.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kio.translation: 当奇奥拉不在保护赞迪卡的时候，她会把她警惕的目光转向泳池安全。在浮力强劲的遗物——塔撒的浮板的加持下，奇奥拉可以拯救任何陷入麻烦的游泳者，除非他们胆敢在泳池边缘奔跑、或是在浅水区潜水。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kio.oracleText: Cocky, brash, and occasionally selfish, Kiora is a merfolk Planeswalker who wields a magical bident she once stole from a god. She shares a close bond with creatures of the ocean, especially the titanic leviathans that lurk deep beneath the waves.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kio.translation: 傲慢、粗鲁，偶尔还很自私，奇奥拉是一个人鱼族的鹏洛客，她挥舞着曾经从一个神那里偷来的双叉戟。她与海洋生物有着密切的联系，尤其是潜伏在海面下的泰坦巨兽。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kot.oracleText: Koth, a vulshok Planeswalker from Mirrodin, uses geomancy to split stone and shape metal in his fight for Mirran peace. With his home plane twisted into New Phyrexia, Koth prepares one final strike to defend it—along with the entire Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Kot.translation: 作为一名来自秘罗地的瓦许克鹏洛克，寇斯使用碎石与熔铁的大地魔法战斗，以守护秘罗地的和平。当家乡被腐化为新非瑞克西亚时，寇斯已经做好了最后一战的准备，和整个多元宇宙一起。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Lae.oracleText: Lae'zel is a consummate warrior, ferocious even by the standards of the githyanki. Faced with transforming into the very monster she has sworn to destroy, Lae'zel must prove herself worthy of rejoining her people - if they do not execute her first.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Lae.translation: 莱埃泽尔是技艺高超的斗士，即使以一个吉斯洋基养育所的标准来看也非寻常。面临即将转变为自己发誓要消灭的怪物，她必须向自己的同胞证明自己还有作用——如果他们饶她一命的话。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Laz.oracleText: Little is known about the mysterious shapeshifter Lazav. House Dimir's Guildmaster is able to warp reality and seems to attract all of the magic in his surroundings toward him.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Laz.translation: 底密尔会堂公会长拉札夫是位神秘的变形法师。他行踪成谜，无人知晓他的底细。人们只知道他能够扭曲现实，同时吸引身旁周遭的一切魔法。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Leg.oracleText: Legolas, son of King Thranduil, is a member of the Fellowship of the Ring and an expert Elven archer. His keen senses can spot danger from a distance, which proves invaluable as the Fellowship crosses Middle-earth. He forms strong bonds with the party, especially the Dwarf warrior Gimli.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Leg.translation: 莱戈拉斯是瑟兰迪尔国王的儿子，是魔戒远征队的成员，也是一位精灵弓箭手。 他敏锐的感官可以从远处发现危险，这在远征队穿越中土世界时发挥了无价的作用。 他与队伍，尤其是矮人战士吉姆利建立了牢固的联系。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Lil.oracleText: A brave li'l warrior from a distant li'l plane, Li'l Giri is a protector of those who can't protect themselves. He has a strong sense of justice, deft sword skills, and an unknown filling.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Lil.translation: Li'l Giri是一位来自遥远星球的勇敢战士，他保护着那些无法保护自己的人。他拥有强烈的正义感、灵巧的剑术和未知的填充物。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Lil.oracleText: Liliana Vess is a necromantic master, controlling armies of the dead to serve her ends. After rebelling against Nicol Bolas, she took up a teaching position at Strixhaven under the pseudonym "Professor Onyx", ultimately defending the campus from New Phyrexia's assault.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Lil.translation: 莉莲娜维斯是一位死灵大师，她控制亡者大军来达成她的目的。 在反抗尼可波拉斯之后，她化名黑玉教授在斯翠海文担任教职，最终保卫了校园免受新非瑞克西亚的攻击。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Luk.oracleText: Lukka was once a loyal soldier who dedicated his life to protecting the humans of Ikoria from monsters. Then he magically bonded with one of the creatures he'd been trained to hate and fear, leaving him caught between two warring worlds.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Luk.translation: 卢卡曾经是一名忠诚的士兵，他毕生致力于保护依克黎的人类免受怪物的侵害。然后他神奇地与一只被他训练的让人憎恨和恐惧的生物结合在一起，让他被夹在两个交战的世界之间。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Min.oracleText: Minsc is a bald, purple-tattooed ranger and a source of comic relief. His loyal companion is a miniature giant space hamster (a.k.a., a regular hamster) known as Boo, who doesn't talk. Minsc hails from Rashemen, Boo from Wildspace. Minsc is kind-hearted, has good intentions, and absolutely loves to be the hero even if it means throwing himself into danger to do what he believes is right.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Min.translation: 明斯克是一位秃头、紫色纹身的游侠，不去演相声真是一大损失。他的忠实伙伴是一只名叫布布的微型巨型太空仓鼠（又名普通仓鼠），它不会说话。明斯克来自莱瑟曼，布布来自野性空间。明斯克心地善良，心怀善意，绝对喜欢成为英雄，即使这意味着将自己置于危险之中去做他认为正确的事情。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Mis.oracleText: Mishra's story began after discovering a powerful stone with his brother Urza. When the stone split, so did the brothers' bond, leaving Mishra an outcast. He waged a war against Urza with the help of formidable dragon engines and—unbeknownst to him—the corrupting influence of Phyrexia.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Mis.translation: 米斯拉的故事始于与他的兄弟克撒发现一块强大的石头之后。 当石头裂开时，兄弟俩的关系也随之破裂，米斯拉成了被抛弃的人。 他在强大的龙引擎以及——他不知道的——非瑞克西亚的腐化影响的帮助下，对克撒发动了一场战争。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_MuY.oracleText: Mu Yanling has adept command over wind and water, shaping them to meet her needs, whether it be gales to carry her through the air or weaving wind and water together to aid in her martial prowess.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_MuY.translation: 沐燕灵善控清风流水，可将其随意塑形为己所用：既可驾风疾行，又能乘浪助力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nah.oracleText: Nahiri is a kor Planeswalker from Zendikar with the power of lithomancy—the control of stone. Setting aside old rivalries to fight New Phyrexia, she moved mountains protecting her allies...before crumbling under Elesh Norn's subjugation. All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nah.translation: 身为赞迪卡的寇族鹏洛客，娜希丽擅长砾岩术——即操控岩石之力。为对抗新非瑞克西亚，她抛开旧日恩怨，为保护盟友移动群山……最终还是败给了艾蕾侬的强大。万界归一。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nah.oracleText: Nahiri is a lithomancer: a mage who wields great power over stone. She can create arcane, complex formations that redirect the leylines of an entire world, or simply drag red-hot blades from the earth and leap into battle. Some call her a hero, some a villain, but nobody not even her most vicious enemies can deny her courage.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nah.translation: 娜希丽是一位砾岩术士：一位对石头拥有强大力量的法师。她可以创造出神秘而复杂的阵型来改变整个世界的地脉，或者干脆从大地中拖出炽热的刀刃并跃入战斗。有人称她为英雄，有人称她为恶棍，但即使是她最恶毒的敌人，也没有人能否认她的勇气。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nas.oracleText: Nashi witnessed in horror as his adoptive mother, Tamiyo, fell to Phyrexian compleation. Tamiyo was killed during the invasion, but an echo of her former self—preserved through her scroll magic—arose to comfort her grieving son. Nashi resolved to continue his mother's legacy as a story-seeker, with the aid of Tamiyo's guiding wisdom.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nas.translation: Nashi witnessed in horror as his adoptive mother, Tamiyo, fell to Phyrexian compleation. Tamiyo was killed during the invasion, but an echo of her former self—preserved through her scroll magic—arose to comfort her grieving son. Nashi resolved to continue his mother's legacy as a story-seeker, with the aid of Tamiyo's guiding wisdom.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nia.oracleText: Niambi is daughter to the Planeswalker Teferi and a legend in her own right, having served as an advisor and healer throughout Jamuraa. It is her sincere hope that, through diplomacy and compassion, she can mend the wounds that divide her fellow Dominarians in time to unite them.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nia.translation: 安碧是鹏洛客泰菲力的女儿，她本身也是一个传奇人物，曾在整个贾穆拉担任顾问和治疗师。她真诚地希望，通过外交和同情心，能及时修补分裂的多明纳里亚人的伤口，使他们团结起来。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nic.oracleText: Elder dragon and tyrant of worlds, Nicol Bolas is one of the oldest known beings in the Multiverse. He's a force of villainous destruction, crushing all magic—and minds—that stand in his way.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nic.translation: 龙族的长老，世界的暴君；尼可波拉斯是多重宇宙中已知的最古老人物之一。他掌握着邪恶的毁灭力量，能够粉碎一切敢阻止他的魔法和生灵。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nik.oracleText: Niko Aris, a star athlete from Theros, fights with cleverness and dexterity rather than brute force. They prefer to avoid outright violence when they can, but those who cross them learn a hard lesson: Once they set their sights on a target, they never miss.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nik.translation: 来自塞洛斯的明星运动员尼科阿理斯，以聪明和灵巧而非蛮力进行战斗。TA宁愿在可能的情况下避免彻底的暴力，但那些越过TA的人学到了一个惨痛的教训：一旦TA瞄准目标，TA就不会错过。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nis.oracleText: Driven, devoted, and deeply connected to the land, Nissa Revane wields elemental magic. She's able to channel the mana leylines of a plane and to bring the land to life.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nis.translation: 妮莎努力奋进，做事倾尽全力，与大地有密切的联系，还擅使元素魔法。她能够引导时空的魔法生机地脉，为土地赋予生命。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nis.oracleText: Nissa is an elven Planeswalker from Zendikar and a steward of nature. However, her devotion to organic life withers under the corruption of Phyrexian compleation. All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Nis.translation: 妮莎是一位赞迪卡的妖精鹏洛客，以监管自然为己任。可惜在非瑞克西亚完化之力的腐化下，其对有机生命体的虔诚信仰已枯萎。万界归一。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_ObN.oracleText: The demon lord Ob Nixilis has carved his path to power through the multiverse. But after growing bored of regular conquest, he appeared in New Capenna with a more subtle strategy—gradually build his influence over the Five Families before claiming the plane for himself.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_ObN.translation: 恶魔领主尼希兹在多重宇宙中开创了自己的权力之路。但在厌倦了常规的征服之后，他出现在新卡佩纳，采取了一个更微妙的策略--在将这个星球据为己有之前，逐步建立他对五大家族的影响力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Oki.oracleText: Sovereign Okinec leads a large cadre of jaguarfolk and rules over the Hanging City of Chuuy Kaaj, located in the caverns under Ixalan. He is a storied warrior and tactical thinker who envisions the surface as a new territory to conquer for his people.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Oki.translation: 君主欧奇尼领导着一支庞大的美洲虎队伍，统治着位于依夏兰地下洞穴中的悬空城丘伊卡伊。 他是一位传奇的战士和战术思想家，他将地面视为等待他的人民征服的新领土。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Oko.oracleText: A trickster and master of deception, the shapeshifting Planeswalker Oko embraces any excuse to sow chaos and undermine authority. He has kept a low profile since wreaking havoc on Eldraine, but the odds are good that his next mischievous scheme is already in motion.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Oko.translation: 妮莎与三个鹏洛客相约见面，妮莎迟到了，她愧疚地说：“不好意思，我刚刚遇到一位小蓝牌手，他一边闪现生物，一边用生物的异能抓牌。”第一位鹏洛客问道：“什么叫闪现？”第二位鹏洛客问道：“什么叫抓牌？”第三位鹏洛客则问道：“什么叫生物的异能？”

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Oli.oracleText: Olivia, head of the Voldaren bloodline, plans to seize power and exact revenge on her adversary, Sorin Markov, in a single stroke. By marrying Sorin's grandfather Edgar in an opulent vampiric wedding, she hopes to unite the bloodlines under her rule once and for all.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Oli.translation: 沃达连血脉的首领，奥莉薇亚计划夺取权力，并一举向她的对手索霖马可夫复仇。通过与索林的祖父艾德嘉在一场奢华的吸血鬼婚礼上结婚，她希望在她的统治下一劳永逸地统一各血脉。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Pha.oracleText: Before becoming a Planeswalker, Jeska once took the form of Phage, a powerful Avatar who could kill anything with a single touch. It's . . . complicated.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Pha.translation: 在成为一名鹏洛克之前，洁丝卡曾经以菲姬的形式存在，一个能仅以一触便能杀死任何事物的强大化身。这件事......很复杂。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Qui.oracleText: Quintorius, "Quint" for short, is a Loxodon planeswalker attending the mage school of Strixhaven. He studies at Lorehold College—at least he did, until his spark ignited during the Phyrexian invasion. Now he's taking his studies abroad, eager to chart the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Qui.translation: 昆托力，简称“昆特”，是一位就读于斯翠海文法师学校的象族鹏洛客。 他在衡鉴学院上学——至少直到他的火花在非瑞克西亚入侵期间点燃前是这样的。 现在他正在异国学习，渴望绘制多重宇宙的地图。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Qui.oracleText: Quintorius Kand is a gentle, earnest-hearted archaeomancer. Expelled from a military academy, he discovered his true passion as a student of Lorehold. Quintorius is an extensive reader with a head full of facts and a big heart, even for a loxodon.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Qui.translation: 昆托力康德是一位温和、真诚的古语术士。被一所军事学院开除，他发现自己对于衡鉴修习法师的身分怀有真正的热诚。昆托力博览群书，学富五车。在经历于不同道路上摸索的漫长青春期之后，他一心只想「寻找自我」，而且他相信自己能够藉由探索世界上奇妙的历史名胜而达成该目标。他当然能够利用一点指引来协助他找到方向。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Raf.oracleText: The Obscura's figurehead is a mysterious sphinx named Raffine, one of the last of her kind in New Capenna. Both feared and respected for her prophetic visions, Raffine now foresees a disquieting fate for the city. But will it be too late to make a difference?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Raf.translation: 秘闻帮的头领是一个神秘的史芬斯，名叫拉斐茵，她是新卡佩纳最后的史芬斯。拉斐茵其预言能力而受到敬畏和尊重，她现在预见到了这座城市令人不安的命运。但是，要改变现状会不会太晚了？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Rak.oracleText: Rakdos is a consummate entertainer. A monstrous figure standing thirty feet tall, Rakdos demands the spotlight. His every entrance is a showstopper.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Rak.translation: 拉铎司演艺精湛。作为身长三十英尺的庞然巨物，他必然占据主角之位，堪称镇场明星。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ral.oracleText: Brilliant, unpredictable, and daring, Ral Zarek was always testing boundaries (and nerves) as a young mage. His bright, fearless skill made him a natural at harnessing the chaotic power of lightning and storms.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ral.translation: 年轻法师拉尔查雷克才华横溢、难以预测又大胆勇敢，他总是在挑战极限（和勇气）。他聪明无畏的技艺让其能够自如驾驭闪电和风暴的混乱能量。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Roo.oracleText: Rootha Squallheart is a student of Prismari. She is intense, passionate, and obsessed with perfecting her art. She often becomes enamored of a visionary idea, spends weeks working to make it incredible, then suddenly hates her creation and destroys it.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Roo.translation: 如莎斯奎哈特是一位粹丽修习法师。她积极、热情，醉心于使她的艺术趋于完美。她经常沉浸于预想的点子中，花了好几个礼拜让它看起来十分惊人，然后突然厌恶她的作品并在隔天摧毁它。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Row.oracleText: After the death of her parents and Eldraine's devastation during the Phyrexian invasion, Rowan returned home drowning in grief but spurred into action. She knew her journey to save the Realm would take her into the Wilds—and separate her from her brother Will.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Row.translation: 在她的父母去世以及艾卓在非瑞克西亚入侵期间遭受毁灭性打击之后，萝婉回到家乡，一面沉浸在悲伤之中，但又开始了行动。 她知道拯救王国的旅程会将带她进入荒野，并使她与她的弟弟威尔分开。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_STX.oracleText: An alumna of Witherbloom, Professor Onyx has returned to her alma mater as a teacher. She is researching a way to return the dead to life. The good professor is definitely not the planeswalker Liliana Vess. Look, no headdress. Totally a different person.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_STX.translation: 作为靡华的校友，黑玉教授已经回到母校当黑魔法防御课老师了。她正在研究一种让死者复生的方法。这位好教授绝对不是鹏洛客莉莲娜维斯。看，没有头饰。完全是一个不同的人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_STX.oracleText: An alumna of Witherbloom, Professor Onyx has returned to her alma mater as a teacher. She is researching a way to return the dead to life. The good professor is definitely not the planeswalker Liliana Vess. Look, no headdress. Totally a different person.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_STX.translation: An alumna of Witherbloom, Professor Onyx has returned to her alma mater as a teacher. She is researching a way to return the dead to life. The good professor is definitely not the planeswalker Liliana Vess. Look, no headdress. Totally a different person.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sah.oracleText: Saheeli is a master inventor. Her brilliant mind is a never-ending font of innovative ideas, and her magical command over metal allows her to bring them into reality. She's a fierce competitor who loves a good challenge, but nothing can dampen her bright, optimistic spirit.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sah.translation: 莎希莉是一位伟大的发明家。她聪明的头脑是一个永无止境的创新想法的源泉，而她对金属的神奇控制使她能够将它们变成现实。她是一个激烈的竞争者，喜欢挑战，但没有什么能阻挡她明亮、乐观的精神。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sar.oracleText: The dragon-worshipping Sarkhan Vol is a native of Tarkir. Obsessed with their fury and predatory majesty, he joined a group of infamous shamans who venerated the apex predators.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sar.translation: 崇拜巨龙的萨坎沃出身鞑契，他迷恋巨龙的盛怒，醉心其身居掠食者高位的威严，于是加入了恶名昭彰的崇龙祭师会，共同顶礼心目中的世间霸主。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sar.oracleText: Sarkhan Vol is a wandering shaman whose obsessive reverence for dragons drove him into the service of an ancient evil. After years of madness, he recovered his senses and turned his draconic powers toward vengeance against his former master.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sar.translation: 萨坎沃是一个流浪的萨满，他对龙的痴迷驱使他为一个古老的邪恶服务。经过多年的疯狂，他恢复了理智，将他的龙之力量转向了对他以前的主人的复仇。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ser.oracleText: A human Planeswalker from the distant past, Serra was a powerful and benevolent healer. She created an artificial plane known as Serra's Realm, where she and her followers lived in peace defended by flights of angels. Though Serra and her realm are long gone, her legacy and teachings have lived on as a beacon of hope throughout the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ser.translation: 来自遥远过去的人类鹏洛客，撒拉是一位强大而仁慈的治疗师。她创造了一个被称为撒拉国度的人造位面，在那里她和她的追随者在飞行天使的保护下过着和平的生活。尽管撒拉和她的国度早已不复存在，但她的遗产和教义作为整个多重宇宙的希望灯塔一直存在。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sha.oracleText: Shadowheart is a devout follower of the dark goddess Shar with a keen sense of duty that holds Shar's will above her personal interests. The dark cleric is tenacious when focused on goal and holds tremendous power through her faith in the Mistress of the Night.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sha.translation: 影心是黑暗女神夏尔的虔诚追随者，有着敏锐的责任感，将夏尔的意志置于她的个人利益之上。这位黑暗牧师在专注于目标时非常顽强，并通过她对夜之女莎尔的信仰拥有巨大的力量。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_She.oracleText: Sheoldred is a graceful, cruel, and clever praetor and the mightiest of the Seven Steel Thanes. She is known for underhanded manipulation and effective use of sleeper agents to infiltrate her opposition. Returned now to New Phyrexia, Sheoldred prepares to betray Norn before her moment of triumph.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_She.translation: 希欧蕊是一位优雅、残忍、聪明的魔判官，也是七位钢铁领主中最强大的一位。 她以暗中操纵和有效利用潜伏特工渗透反对派而闻名。 现在回到新非瑞克西亚的希欧蕊准备在她胜利的时刻来临之前背叛艾蕾侬。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sli.oracleText: Once a humble spore in the Weatherlight's hull, the thallid Slimefoot has now taken up his role on the crew as caretaker of the fabled ship. It's unclear exactly how much Slimefoot understands about their current dangerous mission behind enemy lines, but he's stopped cleaning off the Phyrexian detritus they're using as camouflage, which is certainly progress.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sli.translation: Once a humble spore in the Weatherlight's hull, the thallid Slimefoot has now taken up his role on the crew as caretaker of the fabled ship. It's unclear exactly how much Slimefoot understands about their current dangerous mission behind enemy lines, but he's stopped cleaning off the Phyrexian detritus they're using as camouflage, which is certainly progress.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sor.oracleText: A powerful vampire Planeswalker, Sorin Markov was born over 7,000 years ago on Innistrad. For millennia, he lorded over his home plane, preserving the balance between humans and the monsters that hunt them. Now, his power has been challenged by his longtime rival, Olivia Voldaren.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sor.translation: 一个强大的吸血鬼鹏洛客，索霖马可夫在7000 多年前出生在依尼翠。几千年来，他一直统治着他的家乡时空，保持着人类与猎杀他们的怪物之间的平衡。现在，他的权力受到了他长期以来的对手奥莉薇亚沃达连的挑战。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sor.oracleText: A powerful vampire Planeswalker, Sorin Markov was born over 7,000 years ago on Innistrad. For millennia, he lorded over his home plane, preserving the balance between humans and the monsters that hunt them. Now, his power has been challenged by his longtime rival, Olivia Voldaren.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Sor.translation: 一个强大的吸血鬼鹏洛客，索霖马可夫在7000 多年前出生在依尼翠。几千年来，他一直统治着他的家乡时空，保持着人类与猎杀他们的怪物之间的平衡。现在，他的权力受到了他长期以来的对手奥莉薇亚沃达连的挑战。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Squ.oracleText: Once a cabin-boy on the Weatherlight, a mishap related to an evil god granted Squee immortality. Unable to die by blade, age, or any other method his assorted enemies have tried, Squee has had his fill of adventuring and now lives in "retirement" as the chieftain of a goblin tribe high in the Otarian mountains. Lately, he can't shake the feeling that something is off, and is putting his centuries of wisdom to the purpose of figuring out just what that something is....
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Squ.translation: 曾经是晴空号上的一个客舱男孩，一次与邪恶之神有关的意外使斯奎获得了不朽的生命。由于无法死于刀剑、年龄或其他任何他的敌人尝试过的方法，斯奎已经完成了他的冒险，现在作为欧塔利亚山脉中一个鬼怪部落的首领过着“退休”生活。最近，他总觉得有什么东西不对劲，于是把他几个世纪的智慧用在了弄清楚什么东西上....

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tal.oracleText: As the lord of the faeries and the self-appointed ruler of Eldraine, Talion partnered with three powerful witch sisters to save the plane from the Phyrexian invasion. But curious effects of their spell still linger, prompting Talion to suspect the witches of foul play.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tal.translation: 作为精灵之主和艾卓自封的统治者，塔莱恩与三位强大的女巫姐妹合作，从非瑞克西亚的入侵中拯救了这个时空。 但他们的咒语的奇怪效果仍然挥之不去，这让塔莱恩怀疑女巫们在背后做了手脚。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tam.oracleText: For years, Tamiyo traveled the Multiverse, an impartial historian documenting stories from across dozens of different planes. Now, she has been compleated by the Phyrexians, her purpose twisted to serve their one "true" story: the inexorable rise of Phyrexia.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tam.translation: 多年来，多美代游历了多重宇宙，一位公正的历史学家记录了来自数十个不同位面的故事。现在，她已经被非瑞克西亚完化，她的目的被扭曲为服务于他们的一个“真实”故事：非瑞克西亚崛起不可阻挡。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tam.oracleText: Tamiyo is a brilliant moonfolk scholar who travels the Multiverse seeking stories and secrets from every plane. She usually tries to stay an impartial observer, but will intervene when she deems it necessary. Who else would have thought to imprison Emrakul in Innistrad's moon?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tam.translation: 多美代是一位才华横溢的月人学者，她周游多重宇宙，从各个位面寻找故事和秘密。她通常试图保持一个公正的观察者，但会在她认为有必要时进行干预。还有谁会想到将伊莫库囚禁在依尼翠的月球上？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tas.oracleText: Tasha hails from Oerth (the World of Greyhawk) and is the adopted daughter of Baba Yaga, an archfey known as the Mother of Witches. An archmage with unsurpassed knowledge of the planes, she is also an archfey with control over her own Domain of Delight.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tas.translation: 塔莎来自Oerth（灰鹰世界），是被称为女巫之母的大法师Baba Yaga的养女。她是一位大法师，拥有无与伦比的平面知识，同时也是一位大法师，控制着她自己的快乐领域。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tef.oracleText: Teferi was recognized as a magical prodigy at a young age. With a talent for temporal magic and a fondness for practical jokes, he was one of the academy's most renowned, and confounding, students.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tef.translation: 泰菲力在很年轻时就被认为是个魔法奇才。他拥有时间魔法的天赋和恶作剧的爱好，也成为了学院里最有名，也是最会捣乱的学生。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tey.oracleText: Teyo Verada is a young, inexperienced shield mage who was unexpectedly thrust into the chaos of war, surviving deadly trials against all odds. He's still learning what it means to be a Planeswalker and has only scratched the surface of his true potential.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tey.translation: 泰佑维拉达是一个年轻的、没有经验的盾法师，他意外地被推入了混乱的战争中，在致命的考验中逆境生存。他仍在学习成为一名鹏洛客的意义，对他真正的潜力也只是触及表面。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tez.oracleText: Tezzeret specializes in blue artifice magic: spells that forge and manipulate artifacts, sometimes even bringing them to life. His body is enhanced with the magical alloy etherium.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tez.translation: 泰兹瑞擅长于蓝色神器法术：铸造神器，操弄神器，甚至替神器赋与生命的咒语。他的身体都有一部分以法术合金乙金增强过。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_The.oracleText: A mysterious swordswoman of unmatched prowess, the Wanderer appears without warning to defend the innocent before disappearing just as suddenly as she arrived. Few know the truth: she is the lost empress of Kamigawa, wandering the Multiverse in search of a way home.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_The.translation: 飘萍是一位具有无与伦比的能力的神秘女剑客，她毫无征兆地出现在人们面前，保护无辜者，然后就像她到来时一样突然消失。很少有人知道真相：她是神河的失落皇后，在多重宇宙游荡，寻找回家的路。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tia.oracleText: Appointed guardian of the sacred powerstone at the core of the Weatherlight, Tiana discovered a gift for maintaining the legendary skyship. At home amidst the grease and noise of the engine room, Tiana uses her natural abilities to keep the Weatherlight flying in hostile territory.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tia.translation: 被任命为晴空号核心的神圣能量石的守护者，蒂娅娜发现了维持传奇飞船的天赋。在发动机室的油脂和噪音中，蒂娅娜利用她的自然能力让晴空号能在敌对领土上飞行。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tib.oracleText: A sadistic, interplanar menace who revels in the suffering of others, Tibalt brings misery and conflict wherever he goes. Though born human on Innistrad, his fascination with pain drove him to explore fiendish magic that ultimately transformed him into a half-devil.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tib.translation: 提勃是一个虐待狂，以他人的痛苦为乐的星际威胁，无论他走到哪里都会带来痛苦和冲突。虽然他是出生在依尼翠的人类，但他对痛苦的迷恋促使他探索恶魔般的魔法，最终将自己转变为一个半恶魔。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tit.oracleText: Queen Titania, avatar of the goddess Gaea, ruled over the forested island of Argoth. When Urza's and Mishra's forces came to Argoth's shores to plunder the land for resources, Titania unleashed the full fury of nature upon them. But when Urza activated the Sylex to end the war, Argoth was destroyed—and Titania with it.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tit.translation: Queen Titania, avatar of the goddess Gaea, ruled over the forested island of Argoth. When Urza's and Mishra's forces came to Argoth's shores to plunder the land for resources, Titania unleashed the full fury of nature upon them. But when Urza activated the Sylex to end the war, Argoth was destroyed—and Titania with it.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tro.oracleText: Guildmaster of the Selesnya Conclave on Ravnica, and speaker for the World Tree, Mat'Selesnya. Trostani is a fusion of three Dryads who each represent a different key Selesnyan value: Life, Order, and Harmony.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Tro.translation: 卓塔妮，拉尼卡瑟雷尼亚盟会公会长，世界之树太瑟雷尼亚之声。她是三位树灵融合一体，分别代表瑟雷尼亚三大核心价值观之一：生命、秩序、和谐。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UB_.oracleText: Giggly and playful, it's not unusual to find Pinkie Pie prancing, bouncing and skipping through the streets of Ponyville. The silliest pony around, Pinkie Pie has a desire to entertain and put a smile on everypony's face. She moved to Ponyville and lives above the Sugarcube Corner bakery with Gummy, her pet alligator.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UB_.translation: 经常能发现萍琪派傻笑着、顽皮地在小马谷的街道上蹦蹦跳跳。作为世界上最淘气的小马，萍琪派渴望娱乐并想让她所有的朋友发自内心的笑。 她搬到了小马谷，和她的宠物鳄鱼嘎米一起住在方糖甜点屋楼上。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNJ.oracleText: Johnny is the cerebral player who likes to set it up before knocking it all down. They deckbuild and play with unconventional options to show off their style and creativity. Win or lose, they're satisfied if their experiment gets results. Just wait till they get their Krark-Clan Ironworks, Genesis Chamber, Grinding Station...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNJ.translation: 强尼是头脑型玩家，他喜欢在打倒它之前先把它布置好。他们用非传统的选择来构建和玩耍，以展示他们的风格和创造力。无论输赢，只要他们的实验有结果，他们就很满意。等到他们拿到喀勒克族制铁厂、创生秘室、辗碎工段......

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNS.oracleText: Spike is here to win, and win a lot. They're a tournament player with ruthless strategies and the best decks to claim victory, no matter how slight. If they can prove themself worthy in a competition, that's a day well spent. Think you've got them beat? Just wait for their response...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNS.translation: 斯派克是来赢的，而且是赢很多。他们是一个拥有无情策略和最佳牌组的比赛选手，无论多么微不足道，都能获得胜利。如果他们能在比赛中证明自己的价值，那就是一天的美好时光。你认为你已经打败了他们？那就等着看他们的反应吧...

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNT.oracleText: Timmy likes big plays, big creatures, and big wins. Their gaming style favors powerful smackdowns over sneaky mechanics, and it's the sheer thrill of victory that keeps them coming back for more. When they drop a monstrous beast into play, head for the hills. Just wait till they get their Gigantosaurus...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNT.translation: 蒂米喜欢大场面、大生物和大胜利。他们的游戏风格偏向于强大的打击，而不是鬼鬼祟祟的机械，正是胜利的纯粹快感让他们不断地回来。当他们放出巨兽时，就赶紧去山头吧。等到他们得到巨龙的时候......

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNV.oracleText: Vorthos is here for the flavor. That doesn't mean they're not trying to win, they just get their greatest joy from playing cards tied to the lore they adore. Watch out for their clever theming with a killer edge—just wait till you see their Bolas deck complete with an Umezawa subtheme!
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_UNV.translation: 沃尔托斯是为了味道而来。这并不意味着他们不想赢，他们只是从与他们所崇拜的传说相关的牌中获得最大的乐趣。请注意他们巧妙的主题设计与杀手锏--等着看他们的波拉斯套牌与梅泽悟主题的完整版吧!

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ugi.oracleText: Over his unfathomably long life, Ugin has shaped entire planes, vanquished cataclysmic forces, and been reborn at least twice. He's as cunning and powerful as his twin, Nicol Bolas, but luckily much less interested in world domination.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ugi.translation: 在他深不可测的漫长生命中，乌金塑造了整个星球，战胜了灾难性的力量，并至少重生了两次。他和他的孪生兄弟尼可波拉斯一样狡猾和强大，但幸运的是，他对统治世界的兴趣要小得多。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ugl.oracleText: Uglúk, a fearsome captain of the Uruk-hai, leads the war party that slew Boromir at Amon Hen and attempts to take the Hobbits Pippin and Merry to Isengard. Near Fangorn Forest, the Rohirrim attack the Uruk-hai, killing Uglúk and freeing the Hobbits.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ugl.translation: 乌格鲁克是乌鲁克族的可怕队长，他领导的战争党在阿蒙汉山脉杀死了博罗米尔，并试图将霍比特人皮平和梅里带到艾森加德。 在范贡森林附近，洛希尔人袭击了乌鲁克族，杀死了乌格鲁克并释放了霍比特人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ura.oracleText: Blazing with a temper as hot as his furnace, Urabrask is a reclusive praetor solely focused on the perfection of Mirrodin. His devotion was so extreme that he refused to fight the Mirran Resistance, an act which would eventually draw punishment from Elesh Norn. Now he plots a rebellion of his own.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Ura.translation: 洼巴司的脾气和他的熔炉一样暴躁，他是一位隐居的魔判官，一心只想让秘罗地变得更加完美。他的献身精神极端到了拒绝与秘罗反抗军作战的地步，这一行为最终招致了艾蕾侬的惩罚。现在，他正在策划一场属于自己的叛乱。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Urz.oracleText: Urza is one of the most influential Planeswalkers to ever live. From his early days exploring Thran ruins, Urza was a brilliant artificer, eventually crafting a mechanized army to fight his brother Mishra. Urza would stop at nothing to win the war, even if it meant shattering Dominaria in the process.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Urz.translation: 克撒是有史以来最具影响力的鹏洛客之一。克撒早年在索蓝废墟探险后，成为了一名出色的工匠，最终，他打造了一支机械化军团来对抗他的兄弟米斯拉。为了赢得战争，克撒将不惜一切代价，甚至包括在战争中毁灭多明纳里亚。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Urz.oracleText: Powered by genius artifice and ancient magical energy, the mechanical soldiers of Urza's army were marvels to behold and terrifying to oppose. Each machine fulfilled a crucial purpose on the battlefield, but their greatest power? They can always build more.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Urz.translation: 克撒的机械士兵军团由天才的手艺打造，又有古老的魔法能量提供动力，是令人叹为观止的奇迹，也是可怕的对手。每台机械都能在战场上发挥重要作用，但它们最大的威能是——它们可以随时制造更多。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Van.oracleText: Guildmaster of the Simic Combine, Vannifar is an elf who has mutated her body into a proto-plasmic ooze. She considers herself a superior life-form.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Van.translation: 析米克联合的公会长凡妮法原本生来是个妖精，但她现在已将自己演化成原质流浆。她以自己是更优越的生命形态为傲。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vit.oracleText: Vito Quijano de Pasamonte, vampire cleric of the Church of Dusk, has seen his hardline faith redoubled. To usher Torrezon into a new era of pure devotion, Vito sees a path through Aclazotz, the progenitor god of vampires. And that means seeking Ixalan's hollow core.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vit.translation: 暮影教会的吸血鬼牧师维托·基哈诺·德帕萨蒙特发现他强硬的信仰更加坚定了。 为了将托雷宗带入一个纯粹奉献的新时代，维托通过吸血鬼的始祖神阿洛佐兹找到了一条道路。 这意味着寻找依夏兰的空洞核心。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Viv.oracleText: Vivien's homeworld was deeply divided between the forest dwellers and an advanced civilization that encircled the dwindling woodlands; she belonged to the Smaragdi, sworn to protect the forest.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Viv.translation: 薇薇安的家园时空有着鲜明的族群对立～栖居深林的原始住民与侵蚀自然土地之先进文明一直冲突不断；碧玉族誓死保卫林地家园，而薇薇安正是其中一员。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Viv.oracleText: Vivien Reid is a magical archer and the last survivor of Skalla, a plane where advocates of progress and guardians of nature failed to find balance. Her weapon, the Arkbow, can preserve the life force of dying beasts and summon their powerful spirits into battle.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Viv.translation: Vivien Reid is a magical archer and the last survivor of Skalla, a plane where advocates of progress and guardians of nature failed to find balance. Her weapon, the Arkbow, can preserve the life force of dying beasts and summon their powerful spirits into battle.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Viv.oracleText: Vivien Reid is an expert archer and the wielder of the Arkbow, a magic weapon that summons spirits into battle. As the last survivor of her home plane, she fights for the natural conservation of each new plane she visits, including Ikoria and New Capenna.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Viv.translation: 薇薇安瑞德是一位经验丰富的弓箭手，也是方舟神弓的持有者，方舟神弓是一把能召唤灵魂参加战斗的魔法武器。 作为家乡时空的最后幸存者，她为她到访的每一个新时空的自然保护而奋斗，包括依克黎和新卡佩纳。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vor.oracleText: Vorinclex is the praetor of the Hunter Maze and an apex predator of great appetite and power. While intelligent, he rarely prefers speech, delegating matters of rule to the compleated elf Glissa. He was the first to work with Norn and her plan for Multiverse domination, believing it the next step in his theory of Grand Evolution.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vor.translation: 弗霖凯是猎者迷林的魔判官，也是一位食欲旺盛、力量强大的顶级掠食者。 虽然他很聪明，但他不常讲话，他将管辖的事务委派给完化妖精格莉莎。 他是第一个与艾蕾侬和她的多重宇宙统治计划合作的人，并且相信这是他大进化理论的下一步。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vra.oracleText: This mysterious Planeswalker wields a suite of deadly spells that suit her gorgon nature. Vraska specializes in magic that involves assassination, stealth, and petrification. And she likes to take souvenirs...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vra.translation: 这名神秘的鹏洛客具有蛇发妖本色，而她所使用的致命咒语也恰如其分。瓦丝卡擅长的都是与暗杀、隐形和石化相关的法术。而且她很喜欢带走纪念品...

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vra.oracleText: The deadly and quick-witted Vraska, a gorgon from Ravnica, has held many titles and allegiances throughout her life. Through compleation, her latest allegiance is to New Phyrexia and the vision of a perfected multiverse. All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Vra.translation: 致命而机智的瓦丝卡是来自拉尼卡的蛇发妖，一生中拥有许多头衔和效忠对象。 经过完化，她最新的效忠对象是新非瑞克西亚和完化多重宇宙的愿景。 万界归一。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Wil.oracleText: To reunite the broken Realm of Eldraine after the Phyrexian assault that killed both his parents, Will claimed his father's title of High King of the five courts. Now he tirelessly seeks to calm the chaotic land, quelling rebellions through diplomacy or bloodshed.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Wil.translation: 在非瑞克西亚人的侵袭中不幸失去双亲后，为统一破碎的艾卓王国，威尔继承了父亲五廷至高王的头衔。如今他通过外交或血刃镇压反叛军，不倦地寻求安定这片混乱的土地的计策。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Wre.oracleText: Long ago, Wrenn absorbed a raging wildfire to protect an ancient forest. Those flames still burn within her and she must physically merge with especially strong trees to survive. Now, Wrenn and her latest symbiont, Seven, seek a way to quench her inner fire for good.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Wre.translation: 很久以前，芮恩为了保护一个古老的森林，吸收了熊熊的野火。那些火焰仍然在她体内燃烧，她必须与特别强壮的树木身体融合才能生存。现在，芮恩和她最新的共生体，七树妖，寻求一种方法来永久地熄灭她内心的火焰。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Wyl.oracleText: Noble by birth, Wyll made his name as the heroic 'Blade of Frontiers'. He keeps his pact with a devil well-hidden and is desperate to escape the hellish bargain - even if that means rescuing the seductive creature that made the deal.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Wyl.translation: 威迩出身贵族，以英雄的“边境之刃”扬名。他将与恶魔的契约隐藏得很深，并迫切希望逃脱地狱般的交易——即使这意味着要拯救做出交易的诱人生物。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Xan.oracleText: At the top of the food chain for the Maestros is Lord Xander, an eternal vampire with a powerful demonic blessing. He positions himself as a curator and collector of Old Capenna's historical relics. The crown jewel in his collection? Himself, of course.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Xan.translation: 处于绝艺盟食物链顶端的是尚夺尔勋爵，一个拥有强大恶魔祝福的永恒吸血鬼。他把自己定位为老卡佩纳的历史遗物的策展人和收藏家。他的收藏品中的皇冠上的宝石？当然是他自己。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Yar.oracleText: When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Yar.translation: 贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Zia.oracleText: Ziatora not only established the Riveteers, but also much of New Capenna itself from the foundations up. By accepting power from a demonic contract, she left dragonkind in the dust and grew her organization into one of the mightiest the city's ever seen.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Zia.translation: 齐朵拉不仅建立了勤工联，而且还从基础上建立了新卡佩纳的大部分地区。通过接受恶魔契约的力量，她将龙族甩在了身后，并将她的组织发展成这个城市有史以来最强大的组织之一。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Zim.oracleText: Zimone Wola is a young prodigy who was accepted to Strixhaven early. She is a whiz at many forms of mystical arts, but eventually gravitated to the mathematical magic of Quandrix. Dark forces have noticed her considerable talents...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Avatar_Basic_Zim.translation: 齐莫内·沃拉是一个年轻的神童，很早就被斯翠海文接纳。她在许多形式的神秘艺术方面都很有天赋，但最终倾向于量析的数学魔法。黑暗势力已经注意到她的巨大才能......

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Basri_M21_Bio.oracleText: For most of his life, Basri Ket was utterly devoted to Oketra, god of loyalty and solidarity. When she was slain in the Hour of Devastation, his world was shattered. But rather than let it break him, he took up one of her massive arrows as a spear and vowed to champion her ideals across the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Basri_M21_Bio.translation: 巴席利柯特一生中的大部分时间都完全献给了团结之神。当她在毁灭时刻被杀时，他的世界被打碎了。但他并没有因此而崩溃，而是拿起她的一支巨箭作为长矛，发誓要在整个多重宇宙捍卫她的理想。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/ChandraNalaar_Bi.oracleText: There is no virtue in subtlety, at least not as far as Chandra Nalaar is concerned. She's a confident, ardent, defiant Planeswalker whose specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/ChandraNalaar_Bi.translation: 缜密没什么好处～至少茜卓纳拉从不挂心这点。她是一名自信满盈，热情似火，桀骜不驯的鹏洛客，她的专长就是烈焰：火焰咒语，火焰，以及更猛的火焰。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/CourtKnight_Bio.oracleText: The court of Ardenvale values loyalty above all else, and only those with truly virtuous hearts survive the trial of the Circle of Loyalty. Ardenvale's knights fight in perfect unison with a single, unbreakable will, each one selflessly defending the next.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/CourtKnight_Bio.translation: 雅登瓦的宫廷重视忠诚高于一切，只有那些正直善良的人才能在忠诚焰圈的考验中幸存下来。雅登瓦的骑士们以一种牢不可破的意志完美地统一作战，每个人都无私地捍卫着下一个人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Danitha_DMU_Bio.oracleText: Danitha, heir of House Capashen, is a brave and brash knight who can always be found at the front of a melee. Trained from a young age in both diplomacy and sword-play, Danitha has taken over command of the knights once loyal to her fallen father—now she fights not just for Benalia, but Dominaria.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Danitha_DMU_Bio.translation: 卡帕轩家族的继承人达妮莎是一位勇敢而无畏的骑士，总是可以在混战的前线找到她。达妮莎从小就接受外交和剑术训练。她接管了曾经忠于她死去的父亲的骑士团的指挥权——现在她不仅为宾纳里亚而战，还为多明纳里亚而战。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Davriel_J21_Bio.oracleText: Davriel Cane is a simple man who enjoys simple pleasures: wealth, luxury, and fine tea. He also happens to be a talented diabolist, skilled at binding demons to his service. He detests playing the hero, yet often finds himself in the role despite his best efforts to avoid it.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Davriel_J21_Bio.translation: 达夫黎凯恩是一个简单的人，他享受着简单的快乐：财富、奢侈品和上等茶。他还碰巧是一个有天赋的恶魔学家，擅长将恶魔束缚在他的身边。他不喜欢扮演英雄，但却经常发现自己在扮演英雄，尽管他竭力避免这种情况。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Dina_STX_Bio.oracleText: Dina is a weird, darkly humorous, and tea-obsessed student of Witherbloom. She is learning how to concoct all manner of herbal brews from bizarre swamp creatures. If she offers you a cup of tea, you should probably decline.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Dina_STX_Bio.translation: 是靡华学院的一个古怪、黑暗幽默、痴迷于茶的学生。她正在学习如何从怪异的沼泽生物中炼制各种草药酒。如果她给你一杯茶，你可能应该拒绝。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Domri_Bio.oracleText: Domri's affinity for wild creatures grew out of his natural distrust of rules, hierarchies, and authority figures. He can weave magic that summons, commands, and enhances these beasts.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Domri_Bio.translation: 多密和野蛮生物的密切关系来自于他天生对规则、阶级和权威人物的不信任。他能使用魔法来召唤、控制并加强这些野兽。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/DovinBaan_Bio.oracleText: Dovin can clearly see the flaws in any system or machine and predict with startling accuracy exactly how and when it will fail.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/DovinBaan_Bio.translation: 多温可以清晰洞见系统或机械当中的任何缺陷，同时还能精确预测故障发生的方式和时间。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/ELD_Garruk_Bio.oracleText: Garruk is the ultimate hunter and force of nature. Able to call wild creatures to his side and magically enhance their strength, he is a formidable foe to face anywhere. Currently under the spell of Oko, Garruk serves as a bodyguard; but for how long?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/ELD_Garruk_Bio.translation: 贾路是终极猎手和自然力量。他能够召唤野生动物到他身边，并通过魔法增强它们的力量，在任何地方，他都是一个可怕的敌人。目前，在瓯柯的咒语下，贾路充当他的保镖；但能维持多久？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/EleshNorn_ONE_Bi.oracleText: After dominating the other Phyrexian praetors in a struggle for power, Elesh Norn led the transformation of the plane of Mirrodin into a world of twisted perfection called New Phyrexia. Under her rule, she now envisions an entire Multiverse "blessed" by the same mechanical corruption . . .
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/EleshNorn_ONE_Bi.translation: After dominating the other Phyrexian praetors in a struggle for power, Elesh Norn led the transformation of the plane of Mirrodin into a world of twisted perfection called New Phyrexia. Under her rule, she now envisions an entire Multiverse "blessed" by the same mechanical corruption . . .

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Ellywick_AFR_Bio.oracleText: A lucky draw from the Deck of Many Things made Ellywick Tumblestrum the greatest bard in the multiverse. Her enchanting music so moved the Summer Queen and the Queen of Air and Darkness that they gifted the bard with her instrument, Morningmist.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Ellywick_AFR_Bio.translation: 从万象无常牌中的幸运一抽，使艾利薇鼓琴成为多重宇宙中最伟大的吟游诗人。她迷人的音乐让夏日女王和空气与黑暗女王非常感动，她们把她的乐器--晨雾送给了吟游诗人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Elspeth_MOM_Bio.oracleText: If anyone else had been dealt the full force of a sylex blast in the Blind Eternities, they'd be gone for good—but not Elspeth Tirel. Split from her physical body, Elspeth's true form awakened, transforming her into a planeswalking angel. Her only goal is to find Elesh Norn and deliver a bit of divine butt kicking. Compleat this!
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Elspeth_MOM_Bio.translation: If anyone else had been dealt the full force of a sylex blast in the Blind Eternities, they'd be gone for good—but not Elspeth Tirel. Split from her physical body, Elspeth's true form awakened, transforming her into a planeswalking angel. Her only goal is to find Elesh Norn and deliver a bit of divine butt kicking. Compleat this!

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Elspeth_SNC_Bio.oracleText: The valiant planeswalker Elspeth Tirel has lived—and died—in her pursuit of justice. Now free from the underworld, she has arrived in New Capenna to find evidence of Phyrexian threats and demonic control. Time to get to work.
