MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Elspeth_SNC_Bio.translation: 英勇的鹏洛客艾紫培提瑞在追求正义的过程中出生入死。现在，她从地下世界中解脱出来，来到了新卡佩纳，找到了非瑞克西亚威胁和恶魔控制的证据。是时候开始工作了。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Eternal_Army_Bio.oracleText: After death, the warriors of Amonkhet that passed the trials of Gods become part of Bolas's lethal undead fighting force, the Dreadhorde. Embalmed in layers of lazotep to preserve their lifeforce, they lack emotions, hesitation, and disloyalty.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Eternal_Army_Bio.translation: 阿芒凯的勇士生前历经万苦力争通过五神祀炼，然最终成得豪英者死后却变作波拉斯不死亡灵大军震惧军中一员杀戮四方。永生者经数层拉佐特石遗存，虽然能保留生命活力，但毫无情感，从不犹豫，绝对忠诚。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Fblthp_Bio_Alt2.oracleText: Fblthp is a humble homunculus from Ravnica with a penchant for stumbling (or being shoved) into dangerous, important events he'd rather have nothing to do with. With his habit of getting lost, there's no telling where he'll turn up next!
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Fblthp_Bio_Alt2.translation: 夫毕佐是一个来自拉尼卡的不起眼的造妖，喜欢在危险的、重要的事件中跌跌撞撞（或被推搡），他宁愿与之无关。以他迷路的习惯，不知道他接下来会出现在哪里！

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Freyalise_J21_Bi.oracleText: A half-elven Planeswalker from a bygone era, Freyalise was a leader of elven clans who used her incredible power to protect their forest home. She heroically sacrificed her life to save her people and prevented a catastrophe that threatened to destroy Dominaria.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Freyalise_J21_Bi.translation: 妃雅丽兹是一位来自过去时代的半精灵鹏洛客，她是精灵部族的领袖，用她难以置信的力量来保护他们的森林家园。她英勇地牺牲了自己的生命来拯救她的人民，并阻止了一场有可能摧毁多明纳里亚的灾难。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Gale_HBG_Bio.oracleText: In his youth, Gale was a prodigy practitioner of the Art. He likened his skill as a wizard to that of an actual artist, who manipulated the Weave in the same manner a virtuoso did music. After he was spurned by the goddess Mystra, Gale sought to win back her affection by reuniting her with a lost piece of her old magics.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Gale_HBG_Bio.translation: 在年轻时，盖尔是一个天才般的艺术实践者。他把自己作为一个巫师的技能比作一个真正的艺术家，他以演奏家演奏音乐的方式操纵着魔网。在他被魔法女神蜜斯拉抛弃后，盖尔试图通过让她重新获得她的旧魔法中的一个失落部分来赢回她的感情。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/GideonJura_Bio.oracleText: A powerful warrior-mage with the ability to make himself invulnerable, Gideon is fiercely loyal, unyielding, just, charismatic and never hesitates to enter combat to defend the innocent.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/GideonJura_Bio.translation: 基定是擅使法术的强大战士，身怀战而无伤之力。他尽节竭诚、坚定不屈、刚正坚贞而又富有魅力，总会毫不犹豫地冲入战团以保卫无辜者。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Huatli_Bio.oracleText: Under instruction from her Emperor, Huatli adventures in search of the Golden City, the Immortal Sun, and to secure her title as Warrior-Poet of the Sun Empire.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Huatli_Bio.translation: 受帝国皇帝之令，华特莉率部进发寻找黄金城与永生圣阳，守护自己「烈阳帝国战士诗人」头衔。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/IKO_Lukka_Bio.oracleText: Lukka was once a loyal soldier who dedicated his life to protecting the humans of Ikoria from monsters. Then he magically bonded with one of the creatures he'd been trained to hate and fear, leaving him caught between two warring worlds.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/IKO_Lukka_Bio.translation: 卢卡曾经是一名忠诚的士兵，他毕生致力于保护依克黎的人类免受怪物的侵害。然后他神奇地与一只被他训练的让人憎恨和恐惧的生物结合在一起，让他被夹在两个交战的世界之间。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JaceBeleren_Bio.oracleText: Jace Beleren is a master of mental magic: spells of illusion, deception, and mind reading. His powers allow him to manipulate enemies by countering their magic or turning their spells against them.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JaceBeleren_Bio.translation: 杰斯擅长心灵魔法：幻影、欺瞒，以及读取心灵的咒语。他的力量让他能反击敌对法师的魔法，或以其道反治其身。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JaceTMS_Bio.oracleText: Few can compete with Jace Beleren as a strategist. Fewer still can overcome the influence of his mind-altering magic. While clever illusions help tip the balance of power in Jace's favor, his true strength lies in knowing his opponent's mind better than they know themselves.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JaceTMS_Bio.translation: 作为战略家，很少有人能与杰斯贝连抗衡，更少有人能够克服他的心灵魔法的影响。虽然聪明的幻象有助于使力量平衡向有利于杰斯的方向倾斜，但他真正的力量在于比对手更了解自己的思想。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Jace_ONE_Bio.oracleText: Jace Beleren's power to manipulate minds finally met its match when he found his own consciousness dominated by the shadowy thrall of New Phyrexia. With Jace compleated, is any mind safe? All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Jace_ONE_Bio.translation: Jace Beleren's power to manipulate minds finally met its match when he found his own consciousness dominated by the shadowy thrall of New Phyrexia. With Jace compleated, is any mind safe? All will be one.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JayaBallard_Bio.oracleText: Jaya is a native of Dominaria and a prominent part of both its past and its present. In her reckless youth, she sold her considerable pyromantic talents to the highest bidder.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JayaBallard_Bio.translation: 雅亚巴拉德是土生土长的多明纳里亚人，在它的过去与现今都扮演着重要角色。在当她还年轻气盛时，这位特务法术师强大的烈焰术天赋只为出价最高者效力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Jaya_DMU_Bio.oracleText: Born on Dominaria more than 1,500 years ago, Jaya Ballard is a hot-headed Planeswalker who played an important part in the plane's early history before disappearing for centuries. In recent years, she resurfaced as an older, wiser, but no less sarcastic hero, helping unite Dominaria to fight back against the threat of New Phyrexia.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Jaya_DMU_Bio.translation: 雅亚巴拉德于1，500 多年前出生于多明纳里亚，是一位急性子的鹏洛客。她在销声匿迹几个世纪之前，在该位面的早期历史中扮演了重要角色。近年来，她以年长、睿智但毒舌的英雄身份重新出现，帮助联合多明纳里亚对抗新非瑞克西亚的威胁。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JinGitaxias_ONE_.oracleText: Cold, calculating, and brutal, Jin-Gitaxias thinks himself the smartest of all the Phyrexian praetors. He chooses his words carefully, but will gladly deliver long speeches on complex topics. His terrifying research is unburdened by ethics, and he cannot resist an intellectual challenge.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/JinGitaxias_ONE_.translation: Cold, calculating, and brutal, Jin-Gitaxias thinks himself the smartest of all the Phyrexian praetors. He chooses his words carefully, but will gladly deliver long speeches on complex topics. His terrifying research is unburdened by ethics, and he cannot resist an intellectual challenge.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kaito_NEO_Bio.oracleText: Kaito Shizuki is a master ninja whose telekinetic powers augment his skills as an infiltrator. A risk-taker at heart with few qualms about breaking the rules, Kaito pursues technological progress to make his home plane of Kamigawa a better place for himself and his sister.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kaito_NEO_Bio.translation: 漆月魁渡是一位忍者大师，他的心灵感应能力增强了他作为潜入者的技能。漆月魁渡是一个敢于冒险的人，对打破规则没有什么顾虑。他追求技术进步，致力于使他的家乡神河成为一个对他自己和他妹妹来说更好的地方。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Karn_Bio.oracleText: Originally created as a war weapon, Karn is able to control all five colors of mana. This silver golem is a time-travelling Planeswalker, powerful artifact, world builder, and unstoppable ally.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Karn_Bio.translation: 原本生为战争机器的卡恩，这尊银魔像能够控制全部五种颜色的法术力，它是一个能够进行时间旅行的鹏洛客，一件强大的神器，一位世界建造者和坚不可摧的盟友。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kaya_Bio.oracleText: Kaya is a firm believer that life is for the living. If you die with unfinished business, well, that's probably your fault.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kaya_Bio.translation: 卡娅坚信，只有生者才有资格生活。如果在逝去时仍有未竟的心愿，那么这大概是你自己的错。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kaya_Bio_Alt.oracleText: A confident, roguish duelist with a mysterious past, Kaya has the ability to become partially incorporeal—allowing her to slip through solid items and physically interact with ghosts and the spirit world.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kaya_Bio_Alt.translation: 卡娅是一名自信不羁的斗客，而她的过去是一个谜。她有能力使身体的部分成为虚体形态使她能穿越实物并与鬼魂和灵魂世界进行实体接触。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Killian_STX_Bio.oracleText: Killian Lu is a competitive and driven student of Silverquill who puts a lot of pressure on himself. His father being one of the deans doesn't make it any easier. While Killian's talents may seem effortless, he secretly trains for long hours every day.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Killian_STX_Bio.translation: 齐力安是一个好胜心强的银毫学生，他给自己施加了很大的压力。他的父亲是院长之一，这并没有让他轻松。或许齐力安看似毫不费力就拥有那些天赋，不过他每天都会进行长时间的秘密训练。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kiora_J21_Bio.oracleText: Cocky, brash, and occasionally selfish, Kiora is a merfolk Planeswalker who wields a magical bident she once stole from a god. She shares a close bond with creatures of the ocean, especially the titanic leviathans that lurk deep beneath the waves.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Kiora_J21_Bio.translation: 傲慢、粗鲁，偶尔还很自私，奇奥拉是一个人鱼族的鹏洛客，她挥舞着曾经从一个神那里偷来的双叉戟。她与海洋生物有着密切的联系，尤其是潜伏在海面下的泰坦巨兽。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Koth_ONE_Bio.oracleText: Koth, a vulshok Planeswalker from Mirrodin, uses geomancy to split stone and shape metal in his fight for Mirran peace. With his home plane twisted into New Phyrexia, Koth prepares one final strike to defend it—along with the entire Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Koth_ONE_Bio.translation: Koth, a vulshok Planeswalker from Mirrodin, uses geomancy to split stone and shape metal in his fight for Mirran peace. With his home plane twisted into New Phyrexia, Koth prepares one final strike to defend it—along with the entire Multiverse.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Laezel_HBG_Bio.oracleText: Lae'zel is a consummate warrior, ferocious even by the standards of the githyanki. Faced with transforming into the very monster she has sworn to destroy, Lae'zel must prove herself worthy of rejoining her people - if they do not execute her first.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Laezel_HBG_Bio.translation: 莱埃泽尔是技艺高超的斗士，即使以一个吉斯洋基养育所的标准来看也非寻常。面临即将转变为自己发誓要消灭的怪物，她必须向自己的同胞证明自己还有作用——如果他们饶她一命的话。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Lazav_Bio.oracleText: Little is known about the mysterious shapeshifter Lazav. House Dimir's Guildmaster is able to warp reality and seems to attract all of the magic in his surroundings toward him.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Lazav_Bio.translation: 底密尔会堂公会长拉札夫是位神秘的变形法师。他行踪成谜，无人知晓他的底细。人们只知道他能够扭曲现实，同时吸引身旁周遭的一切魔法。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/LilianaVess_Bio.oracleText: Beautiful, cunning, and ambitious to a fault, Liliana has mastered the dark art of necromancy. Her spells reanimate the dead and corrupt the living.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/LilianaVess_Bio.translation: 美丽，狡猾，而充满野心的莉莲娜，擅长运用暗黑魔法死灵术。她的咒语能够操弄亡者，腐化生灵。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/M20_Chandra_Bio.oracleText: An impulsive and immensely powerful pyromancer, Chandra Nalaar is still growing into the hero she is destined to become.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/M20_Chandra_Bio.translation: 茜卓纳拉是位性格冲动、技艺高强的烈焰术士。将来她必定能够成为伟大英雄，只是她现在仍在不断进步。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/M20_MuYanling_Bi.oracleText: Mu Yanling has adept command over wind and water, shaping them to meet her needs, whether it be gales to carry her through the air or weaving wind and water together to aid in her martial prowess.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/M20_MuYanling_Bi.translation: 沐燕灵善控清风流水，可将其随意塑形为己所用：既可驾风疾行，又能乘浪助力。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/M21_Ugin_Bio.oracleText: Over his unfathomably long life, Ugin has shaped entire planes, vanquished cataclysmic forces, and been reborn at least twice. He's as cunning and powerful as his twin, Nicol Bolas, but luckily much less interested in world domination.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/M21_Ugin_Bio.translation: 在他深不可测的漫长生命中，乌金塑造了整个星球，战胜了灾难性的力量，并至少重生了两次。他和他的孪生兄弟尼可波拉斯一样狡猾和强大，但幸运的是，他对统治世界的兴趣要小得多。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/MH1_Serra_Bio.oracleText: A human Planeswalker from the distant past, Serra was a powerful and benevolent healer. She created an artificial plane known as Serra's Realm, where she and her followers lived in peace defended by flights of angels. Though Serra and her realm are long gone, her legacy and teachings have lived on as a beacon of hope throughout the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/MH1_Serra_Bio.translation: 来自遥远过去的人类鹏洛客，撒拉是一位强大而仁慈的治疗师。她创造了一个被称为撒拉国度的人造位面，在那里她和她的追随者在飞行天使的保护下过着和平的生活。尽管撒拉和她的国度早已不复存在，但她的遗产和教义作为整个多重宇宙的希望灯塔一直存在。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Minsc_HBG_Bio.oracleText: Minsc is a bald, purple-tattooed ranger and a source of comic relief. His loyal companion is a miniature giant space hamster (a.k.a., a regular hamster) known as Boo, who doesn't talk. Minsc hails from Rashemen, Boo from Wildspace. Minsc is kind-hearted, has good intentions, and absolutely loves to be the hero even if it means throwing himself into danger to do what he believes is right.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Minsc_HBG_Bio.translation: 明斯克是一位秃头、紫色纹身的游侠，不去演相声真是一大损失。他的忠实伙伴是一只名叫布布的微型巨型太空仓鼠（又名普通仓鼠），它不会说话。明斯克来自莱瑟曼，布布来自野性空间。明斯克心地善良，心怀善意，绝对喜欢成为英雄，即使这意味着将自己置于危险之中去做他认为正确的事情。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Mishra_BRO_Bio.oracleText: Mishra's story began after discovering a powerful stone with his brother Urza. When the stone split, so did the brothers' bond, leaving Mishra an outcast. He waged a war against Urza with the help of formidable dragon engines and—unbeknownst to him—the corrupting influence of Phyrexia.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Mishra_BRO_Bio.translation: Mishra's story began after discovering a powerful stone with his brother Urza. When the stone split, so did the brothers' bond, leaving Mishra an outcast. He waged a war against Urza with the help of formidable dragon engines and—unbeknownst to him—the corrupting influence of Phyrexia.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Nahiri_ONE_Bio.oracleText: Nahiri is a kor Planeswalker from Zendikar with the power of lithomancy—the control of stone. Setting aside old rivalries to fight New Phyrexia, she moved mountains protecting her allies...before crumbling under Elesh Norn's subjugation. All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Nahiri_ONE_Bio.translation: Nahiri is a kor Planeswalker from Zendikar with the power of lithomancy—the control of stone. Setting aside old rivalries to fight New Phyrexia, she moved mountains protecting her allies...before crumbling under Elesh Norn's subjugation. All will be one.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Niambi_DMU_Bio.oracleText: Niambi is daughter to the Planeswalker Teferi and a legend in her own right, having served as an advisor and healer throughout Jamuraa. It is her sincere hope that, through diplomacy and compassion, she can mend the wounds that divide her fellow Dominarians in time to unite them.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Niambi_DMU_Bio.translation: Niambi is daughter to the Planeswalker Teferi and a legend in her own right, having served as an advisor and healer throughout Jamuraa. It is her sincere hope that, through diplomacy and compassion, she can mend the wounds that divide her fellow Dominarians in time to unite them.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NicolBolas_Bio.oracleText: Elder dragon and tyrant of worlds, Nicol Bolas is one of the oldest known beings in the Multiverse. He's a force of villainous destruction, crushing all magic—and minds—that stand in his way.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NicolBolas_Bio.translation: 龙族的长老，世界的暴君；尼可波拉斯是多重宇宙中已知的最古老人物之一。他掌握着邪恶的毁灭力量，能够粉碎一切敢阻止他的魔法和生灵。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NicolBolas_Drago.oracleText: A force of villainous destruction, crushing all that stand in his way.  Elder dragon and tyrant of worlds, Nicol Bolas is one of the oldest known beings in the Multiverse.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NicolBolas_Drago.translation: 尼可波拉斯掌握着邪恶的毁灭力量，能够粉碎一切敢阻止他的事物。他是龙族的长老，世界的暴君，多重宇宙中已知的最古老人物之一。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NikoAris_Bio.oracleText: Niko Aris, a star athlete from Theros, fights with cleverness and dexterity rather than brute force. They prefer to avoid outright violence when they can, but those who cross them learn a hard lesson: Once they set their sights on a target, they never miss.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NikoAris_Bio.translation: 来自塞洛斯的明星运动员尼科阿理斯，以聪明和灵巧而非蛮力进行战斗。TA宁愿在可能的情况下避免彻底的暴力，但那些越过TA的人学到了一个惨痛的教训：一旦TA瞄准目标，TA就不会错过。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NissaRevane_Bio.oracleText: Driven, devoted, and deeply connected to the land, Nissa Revane wields elemental magic. She's able to channel the mana leylines of a plane and to bring the land to life.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/NissaRevane_Bio.translation: 妮莎努力奋进，做事倾尽全力，与大地有密切的联系，还擅使元素魔法。她能够引导时空的魔法生机地脉，为土地赋予生命。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Nissa_ONE_Bio.oracleText: Nissa is an elven Planeswalker from Zendikar and a steward of nature. However, her devotion to organic life withers under the corruption of Phyrexian compleation. All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Nissa_ONE_Bio.translation: Nissa is an elven Planeswalker from Zendikar and a steward of nature. However, her devotion to organic life withers under the corruption of Phyrexian compleation. All will be one.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Oko_ELD_Bio.oracleText: A trickster and master of deception, the shapeshifting Planeswalker Oko embraces any excuse to sow chaos and undermine authority. He has kept a low profile since wreaking havoc on Eldraine, but the odds are good that his next mischievous scheme is already in motion.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Oko_ELD_Bio.translation: 妮莎与三个鹏洛客相约见面，妮莎迟到了，她愧疚地说：“不好意思，我刚刚遇到一位小蓝牌手，他一边闪现生物，一边用生物的异能抓牌。”第一位鹏洛客问道：“什么叫闪现？”第二位鹏洛客问道：“什么叫抓牌？”第三位鹏洛客则问道：“什么叫生物的异能？”

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Olivia_VOW_Bio.oracleText: Olivia, head of the Voldaren bloodline, plans to seize power and exact revenge on her adversary, Sorin Markov, in a single stroke. By marrying Sorin's grandfather Edgar in an opulent vampiric wedding, she hopes to unite the bloodlines under her rule once and for all.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Olivia_VOW_Bio.translation: 沃达连血脉的首领，奥莉薇亚计划夺取权力，并一举向她的对手索霖马可夫复仇。通过与索林的祖父艾德嘉在一场奢华的吸血鬼婚礼上结婚，她希望在她的统治下一劳永逸地统一各血脉。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Quintorius_STX_B.oracleText: Quintorius Kand is a gentle, earnest-hearted archaeomancer. Expelled from a military academy, he discovered his true passion as a student of Lorehold. Quintorius is an extensive reader with a head full of facts and a big heart, even for a loxodon.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Quintorius_STX_B.translation: 昆托力康德是一位温和、真诚的古语术士。被一所军事学院开除，他发现自己对于衡鉴修习法师的身分怀有真正的热诚。昆托力博览群书，学富五车。在经历于不同道路上摸索的漫长青春期之后，他一心只想「寻找自我」，而且他相信自己能够藉由探索世界上奇妙的历史名胜而达成该目标。他当然能够利用一点指引来协助他找到方向。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Rakdos_Bio.oracleText: Rakdos is a consummate entertainer. A monstrous figure standing thirty feet tall, Rakdos demands the spotlight. His every entrance is a showstopper.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Rakdos_Bio.translation: 拉铎司演艺精湛。作为身长三十英尺的庞然巨物，他必然占据主角之位，堪称镇场明星。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/RalZarek_Bio.oracleText: Brilliant, unpredictable, and daring, Ral Zarek was always testing boundaries (and nerves) as a young mage. His bright, fearless skill made him a natural at harnessing the chaotic power of lightning and storms.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/RalZarek_Bio.translation: 年轻法师拉尔查雷克才华横溢、难以预测又大胆勇敢，他总是在挑战极限（和勇气）。他聪明无畏的技艺让其能够自如驾驭闪电和风暴的混乱能量。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Rootha_STX_Bio.oracleText: Rootha Squallheart is a student of Prismari. She is intense, passionate, and obsessed with perfecting her art. She often becomes enamored of a visionary idea, spends weeks working to make it incredible, then suddenly hates her creation and destroys it.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Rootha_STX_Bio.translation: 如莎斯奎哈特是一位粹丽修习法师。她积极、热情，醉心于使她的艺术趋于完美。她经常沉浸于预想的点子中，花了好几个礼拜让它看起来十分惊人，然后突然厌恶她的作品并在隔天摧毁它。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/STX_ ProfessorOn.oracleText: An alumna of Witherbloom, Professor Onyx has returned to her alma mater as a teacher. She is researching a way to return the dead to life. The good professor is definitely not the planeswalker Liliana Vess. Look, no headdress. Totally a different person.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/STX_ ProfessorOn.translation: 作为靡华的校友，黑玉教授已经回到母校当黑魔法防御课老师了。她正在研究一种让死者复生的方法。这位好教授绝对不是鹏洛客莉莲娜维斯。看，没有头饰。完全是一个不同的人。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/SaheeliRai_Bio.oracleText: Saheeli is a master inventor. Her brilliant mind is a never-ending font of innovative ideas, and her magical command over metal allows her to bring them into reality. She's a fierce competitor who loves a good challenge, but nothing can dampen her bright, optimistic spirit.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/SaheeliRai_Bio.translation: 莎希莉是一位伟大的发明家。她聪明的头脑是一个永无止境的创新想法的源泉，而她对金属的神奇控制使她能够将它们变成现实。她是一个激烈的竞争者，喜欢挑战，但没有什么能阻挡她明亮、乐观的精神。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/SarkhanVol_Bio.oracleText: The dragon-worshipping Sarkhan Vol is a native of Tarkir. Obsessed with their fury and predatory majesty, he joined a group of infamous shamans who venerated the apex predators.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/SarkhanVol_Bio.translation: 崇拜巨龙的萨坎沃出身鞑契，他迷恋巨龙的盛怒，醉心其身居掠食者高位的威严，于是加入了恶名昭彰的崇龙祭师会，共同顶礼心目中的世间霸主。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Sarkhan_J21_Bio.oracleText: Sarkhan Vol is a wandering shaman whose obsessive reverence for dragons drove him into the service of an ancient evil. After years of madness, he recovered his senses and turned his draconic powers toward vengeance against his former master.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Sarkhan_J21_Bio.translation: 萨坎沃是一个流浪的萨满，他对龙的痴迷驱使他为一个古老的邪恶服务。经过多年的疯狂，他恢复了理智，将他的龙之力量转向了对他以前的主人的复仇。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Shadowheart_HBG_.oracleText: Shadowheart is a devout follower of the dark goddess Shar with a keen sense of duty that holds Shar's will above her personal interests. The dark cleric is tenacious when focused on goal and holds tremendous power through her faith in the Mistress of the Night.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Shadowheart_HBG_.translation: 影心是黑暗女神夏尔的虔诚追随者，有着敏锐的责任感，将夏尔的意志置于她的个人利益之上。这位黑暗牧师在专注于目标时非常顽强，并通过她对夜之女莎尔的信仰拥有巨大的力量。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Sheoldred_ONE_Bi.oracleText: Sheoldred is a graceful, cruel, and clever praetor and the mightiest of the Seven Steel Thanes. She is known for underhanded manipulation and effective use of sleeper agents to infiltrate her opposition. Returned now to New Phyrexia, Sheoldred prepares to betray Norn before her moment of triumph.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Sheoldred_ONE_Bi.translation: Sheoldred is a graceful, cruel, and clever praetor and the mightiest of the Seven Steel Thanes. She is known for underhanded manipulation and effective use of sleeper agents to infiltrate her opposition. Returned now to New Phyrexia, Sheoldred prepares to betray Norn before her moment of triumph.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Sorin_VOW_Bio.oracleText: A powerful vampire Planeswalker, Sorin Markov was born over 7,000 years ago on Innistrad. For millennia, he lorded over his home plane, preserving the balance between humans and the monsters that hunt them. Now, his power has been challenged by his longtime rival, Olivia Voldaren.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Sorin_VOW_Bio.translation: 一个强大的吸血鬼鹏洛客，索霖马可夫在7000 多年前出生在依尼翠。几千年来，他一直统治着他的家乡时空，保持着人类与猎杀他们的怪物之间的平衡。现在，他的权力受到了他长期以来的对手奥莉薇亚沃达连的挑战。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/THB_Ashiok_Bio.oracleText: Cloaked in darkness and mystery, Ashiok has the power to turn nightmares into reality. Ashiok claims to act in the name of equality—and believes there is no greater equalizer than fear.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/THB_Ashiok_Bio.translation: 隐藏在黑暗和神秘之中，安梭苛拥有将噩梦变为现实的力量。 安梭苛声称以平等的名义行事——并相信没有比恐惧更能平衡的东西了。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/THB_Elspeth_Bio.oracleText: Elspeth fights for a single core principle: freedom for all. Struck down into the Underworld by a jealous god, she must find a way back to the land of the living—or stay dead trying.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/THB_Elspeth_Bio.translation: 艾紫培为一个核心原则而战：所有人的自由。她被嫉妒的神明击落到冥界，她必须找到返回活人之地的方法——否则就死定了。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tamiyo_NEO_Bio.oracleText: For years, Tamiyo traveled the Multiverse, an impartial historian documenting stories from across dozens of different planes. Now, she has been compleated by the Phyrexians, her purpose twisted to serve their one "true" story: the inexorable rise of Phyrexia.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tamiyo_NEO_Bio.translation: 多年来，多美代游历了多重宇宙，一位公正的历史学家记录了来自数十个不同位面的故事。现在，她已经被非瑞克西亚完化，她的目的被扭曲为服务于他们的一个“真实”故事：非瑞克西亚崛起不可阻挡。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tasha_HBG_Bio.oracleText: Tasha hails from Oerth (the World of Greyhawk) and is the adopted daughter of Baba Yaga, an archfey known as the Mother of Witches. An archmage with unsurpassed knowledge of the planes, she is also an archfey with control over her own Domain of Delight.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tasha_HBG_Bio.translation: 塔莎来自Oerth（灰鹰世界），是被称为女巫之母的大法师Baba Yaga的养女。她是一位大法师，拥有无与伦比的平面知识，同时也是一位大法师，控制着她自己的快乐领域。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Teferi_Bio.oracleText: Teferi was recognized as a magical prodigy at a young age. With a talent for temporal magic and a fondness for practical jokes, he was one of the academy's most renowned, and confounding, students.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Teferi_Bio.translation: 泰菲力在很年轻时就被认为是个魔法奇才。他拥有时间魔法的天赋和恶作剧的爱好，也成为了学院里最有名，也是最会捣乱的学生。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Teyo_J21_Bio.oracleText: Teyo Verada is a young, inexperienced shield mage who was unexpectedly thrust into the chaos of war, surviving deadly trials against all odds. He's still learning what it means to be a Planeswalker and has only scratched the surface of his true potential.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Teyo_J21_Bio.translation: 泰佑维拉达是一个年轻的、没有经验的盾法师，他意外地被推入了混乱的战争中，在致命的考验中逆境生存。他仍在学习成为一名鹏洛客的意义，对他真正的潜力也只是触及表面。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tezzeret_Bio.oracleText: Tezzeret specializes in blue artifice magic: spells that forge and manipulate artifacts, sometimes even bringing them to life. His body is enhanced with the magical alloy etherium.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tezzeret_Bio.translation: 泰兹瑞擅长于蓝色神器法术：铸造神器，操弄神器，甚至替神器赋与生命的咒语。他的身体都有一部分以法术合金乙金增强过。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/TheRavenMan_DMU.oracleText: Centuries ago, Braids was a powerful mage for the Cabal until a near-death experience left her trapped in dementia space. There she was trapped, torn apart again and again by her own nightmares, until a desperate conclave of summoners performed a ritual to drag her back to Dominaria (and unfortunately blew up all their heads in the process).
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/TheRavenMan_DMU.translation: 几个世纪前，布蕾德是柯帮的一名强大法师，直到一次濒临死亡的经历让她被困在惧像空间。她被困在那里，一次又一次地被自己的噩梦撕裂，直到一个穷途末路的惧像召唤师协会举行仪式将她拖回多明纳里亚（不幸的是，在这个过程中他们的头都被炸掉了）。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/TheWanderer_NEO_.oracleText: A mysterious swordswoman of unmatched prowess, the Wanderer appears without warning to defend the innocent before disappearing just as suddenly as she arrived. Few know the truth: she is the lost empress of Kamigawa, wandering the Multiverse in search of a way home.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/TheWanderer_NEO_.translation: 飘萍是一位具有无与伦比的能力的神秘女剑客，她毫无征兆地出现在人们面前，保护无辜者，然后就像她到来时一样突然消失。很少有人知道真相：她是神河的失落皇后，在多重宇宙游荡，寻找回家的路。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tibalt_KHM_Bio.oracleText: A sadistic, interplanar menace who revels in the suffering of others, Tibalt brings misery and conflict wherever he goes. Though born human on Innistrad, his fascination with pain drove him to explore fiendish magic that ultimately transformed him into a half-devil.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Tibalt_KHM_Bio.translation: 提勃是一个虐待狂，以他人的痛苦为乐的星际威胁，无论他走到哪里都会带来痛苦和冲突。虽然他是出生在依尼翠的人类，但他对痛苦的迷恋促使他探索恶魔般的魔法，最终将自己转变为一个半恶魔。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Titania_BRO_Bio.oracleText: Queen Titania, avatar of the goddess Gaea, ruled over the forested island of Argoth. When Urza's and Mishra's forces came to Argoth's shores to plunder the land for resources, Titania unleashed the full fury of nature upon them. But when Urza activated the Sylex to end the war, Argoth was destroyed—and Titania with it.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Titania_BRO_Bio.translation: 作为女神盖亚的化身，泰坦尼亚女王统治整个亚格斯的林覆海岛。当克撒和米斯拉的势力抵达亚格斯的海岸来掠夺资源时，泰坦尼亚对他们释放了自然的全部怒火。但当克撒启动同兆来结束战争时，泰坦尼亚与亚格斯被其一同摧毁殆尽。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Trostani_Bio.oracleText: Guildmaster of the Selesnya Conclave on Ravnica, and speaker for the World Tree, Mat'Selesnya. Trostani is a fusion of three Dryads who each represent a different key Selesnyan value: Life, Order, and Harmony.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Trostani_Bio.translation: 卓塔妮，拉尼卡瑟雷尼亚盟会公会长，世界之树太瑟雷尼亚之声。她是三位树灵融合一体，分别代表瑟雷尼亚三大核心价值观之一：生命、秩序、和谐。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Urabrask_ONE_Bio.oracleText: Blazing with a temper as hot as his furnace, Urabrask is a reclusive praetor solely focused on the perfection of Mirrodin. His devotion was so extreme that he refused to fight the Mirran Resistance, an act which would eventually draw punishment from Elesh Norn. Now he plots a rebellion of his own.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Urabrask_ONE_Bio.translation: Blazing with a temper as hot as his furnace, Urabrask is a reclusive praetor solely focused on the perfection of Mirrodin. His devotion was so extreme that he refused to fight the Mirran Resistance, an act which would eventually draw punishment from Elesh Norn. Now he plots a rebellion of his own.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Urza_BRO_Bio.oracleText: Urza is one of the most influential Planeswalkers to ever live. From his early days exploring Thran ruins, Urza was a brilliant artificer, eventually crafting a mechanized army to fight his brother Mishra. Urza would stop at nothing to win the war, even if it meant shattering Dominaria in the process.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Urza_BRO_Bio.translation: Urza is one of the most influential Planeswalkers to ever live. From his early days exploring Thran ruins, Urza was a brilliant artificer, eventually crafting a mechanized army to fight his brother Mishra. Urza would stop at nothing to win the war, even if it meant shattering Dominaria in the process.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Urzabot_BRO_Bio.oracleText: Powered by genius artifice and ancient magical energy, the mechanical soldiers of Urza's army were marvels to behold and terrifying to oppose. Each machine fulfilled a crucial purpose on the battlefield, but their greatest power? They can always build more.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Urzabot_BRO_Bio.translation: Powered by genius artifice and ancient magical energy, the mechanical soldiers of Urza's army were marvels to behold and terrifying to oppose. Each machine fulfilled a crucial purpose on the battlefield, but their greatest power? They can always build more.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vannifar_Bio.oracleText: Guildmaster of the Simic Combine, Vannifar is an elf who has mutated her body into a proto-plasmic ooze. She considers herself a superior life-form.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vannifar_Bio.translation: 析米克联合的公会长凡妮法原本生来是个妖精，但她现在已将自己演化成原质流浆。她以自己是更优越的生命形态为傲。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/VivienReid_Bio.oracleText: Vivien's homeworld was deeply divided between the forest dwellers and an advanced civilization that encircled the dwindling woodlands; she belonged to the Smaragdi, sworn to protect the forest.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/VivienReid_Bio.translation: 薇薇安的家园时空有着鲜明的族群对立～栖居深林的原始住民与侵蚀自然土地之先进文明一直冲突不断；碧玉族誓死保卫林地家园，而薇薇安正是其中一员。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vivien_ANB_Bio.oracleText: Vivien Reid is a magical archer and the last survivor of Skalla, a plane where advocates of progress and guardians of nature failed to find balance. Her weapon, the Arkbow, can preserve the life force of dying beasts and summon their powerful spirits into battle.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vivien_ANB_Bio.translation: Vivien Reid is a magical archer and the last survivor of Skalla, a plane where advocates of progress and guardians of nature failed to find balance. Her weapon, the Arkbow, can preserve the life force of dying beasts and summon their powerful spirits into battle.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vorinclex_ONE_Bi.oracleText: Vorinclex is the praetor of the Hunter Maze and an apex predator of great appetite and power. While intelligent, he rarely prefers speech, delegating matters of rule to the compleated elf Glissa. He was the first to work with Norn and her plan for Multiverse domination, believing it the next step in his theory of Grand Evolution.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vorinclex_ONE_Bi.translation: Vorinclex is the praetor of the Hunter Maze and an apex predator of great appetite and power. While intelligent, he rarely prefers speech, delegating matters of rule to the compleated elf Glissa. He was the first to work with Norn and her plan for Multiverse domination, believing it the next step in his theory of Grand Evolution.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vraska_Bio.oracleText: This mysterious Planeswalker wields a suite of deadly spells that suit her gorgon nature. Vraska specializes in magic that involves assassination, stealth, and petrification. And she likes to take souvenirs...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vraska_Bio.translation: 这名神秘的鹏洛客具有蛇发妖本色，而她所使用的致命咒语也恰如其分。瓦丝卡擅长的都是与暗杀、隐形和石化相关的法术。而且她很喜欢带走纪念品...

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vraska_ONE_Bio.oracleText: The deadly and quick-witted Vraska, a gorgon from Ravnica, has held many titles and allegiances throughout her life. Through compleation, her latest allegiance is to New Phyrexia and the vision of a perfected multiverse. All will be one.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Vraska_ONE_Bio.translation: The deadly and quick-witted Vraska, a gorgon from Ravnica, has held many titles and allegiances throughout her life. Through compleation, her latest allegiance is to New Phyrexia and the vision of a perfected multiverse. All will be one.

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/WAR_Ashiok_Bio.oracleText: Ashiok is an elegant being of nightmare who draws on fear, creating twisted physical manifestations of each victim's darkest dreams. Ashiok's motives and origin are unknown, but most who encounter this sinister entity quickly conclude that some mysteries are better left unraveled.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/WAR_Ashiok_Bio.translation: 安梭苛是一个优雅的噩梦生物，利用恐惧，为每个受害者最黑暗的梦想创造扭曲的物理表现。安梭苛的动机和来源不明，但大多数遇到这个邪恶的实体的人很快就会得出结论，有些谜团最好不要被揭开。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/WAR_Tamiyo_Bio.oracleText: Tamiyo is a brilliant moonfolk scholar who travels the Multiverse seeking stories and secrets from every plane. She usually tries to stay an impartial observer, but will intervene when she deems it necessary. Who else would have thought to imprison Emrakul in Innistrad's moon?
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/WAR_Tamiyo_Bio.translation: 多美代是一位才华横溢的月人学者，她周游多重宇宙，从各个位面寻找故事和秘密。她通常试图保持一个公正的观察者，但会在她认为有必要时进行干预。还有谁会想到将伊莫库囚禁在依尼翠的月球上？

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Wrenn_MID_Bio.oracleText: Long ago, Wrenn absorbed a raging wildfire to protect an ancient forest. Those flames still burn within her and she must physically merge with especially strong trees to survive. Now, Wrenn and her latest symbiont, Seven, seek a way to quench her inner fire for good.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Wrenn_MID_Bio.translation: 很久以前，芮恩为了保护一个古老的森林，吸收了熊熊的野火。那些火焰仍然在她体内燃烧，她必须与特别强壮的树木身体融合才能生存。现在，芮恩和她最新的共生体，七树妖，寻求一种方法来永久地熄灭她内心的火焰。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Wyll_HBG_Bio.oracleText: Noble by birth, Wyll made his name as the heroic 'Blade of Frontiers'. He keeps his pact with a devil well-hidden and is desperate to escape the hellish bargain - even if that means rescuing the seductive creature that made the deal.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Wyll_HBG_Bio.translation: 威迩出身贵族，以英雄的“边境之刃”扬名。他将与恶魔的契约隐藏得很深，并迫切希望逃脱地狱般的交易——即使这意味着要拯救做出交易的诱人生物。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Yargle_DAR_Bio.oracleText: When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Yargle_DAR_Bio.translation: 贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/ZNR_Nahiri_Bio.oracleText: Nahiri is a lithomancer: a mage who wields great power over stone. She can create arcane, complex formations that redirect the leylines of an entire world, or simply drag red-hot blades from the earth and leap into battle. Some call her a hero, some a villain, but nobody not even her most vicious enemies can deny her courage.
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/ZNR_Nahiri_Bio.translation: 娜希丽是一位砾岩术士：一位对石头拥有强大力量的法师。她可以创造出神秘而复杂的阵型来改变整个世界的地脉，或者干脆从大地中拖出炽热的刀刃并跃入战斗。有人称她为英雄，有人称她为恶棍，但即使是她最恶毒的敌人，也没有人能否认她的勇气。

MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Zimone_STX_Bio.oracleText: Zimone Wola is a young prodigy who was accepted to Strixhaven early. She is a whiz at many forms of mystical arts, but eventually gravitated to the mathematical magic of Quandrix. Dark forces have noticed her considerable talents...
MainNav/Profile/Avatars/Zimone_STX_Bio.translation: 齐莫内·沃拉是一个年轻的神童，很早就被斯翠海文接纳。她在许多形式的神秘艺术方面都很有天赋，但最终倾向于量析的数学魔法。黑暗势力已经注意到她的巨大才能......

MainNav/Profile/Emotes/ExceededMaxEquipp.oracleText: Cannot equip more than {maxEquippedCount} emotes of type {emoteType}.

MainNav/Profile/Emotes/Instructions.oracleText: Click to equip or unequip an emote. All equipped emotes will be available during matches.
MainNav/Profile/Emotes/Instructions.translation: 单击以装备或取消装备表情，所有装备的表情都将在比赛期间可用。

MainNav/Profile/Emotes/MaxEquippedEmoteC.oracleText: One of your emote types has gone over the equip cap. Would you like to discard changes?
MainNav/Profile/Emotes/MaxEquippedEmoteC.translation: 你装备的一种表情已经超过上限，是否要放弃更改？

MainNav/Profile/Emotes/UnlockNewEmotes.oracleText: Unlock new Emotes through the Mastery Pass, Store, or Rewards.
MainNav/Profile/Emotes/UnlockNewEmotes.translation: 通过精研通行证、商店、奖励解锁新的表情。

MainNav/Profile/Emotes/UnsavedChanges_Bo.oracleText: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to discard changes or save and exit?
MainNav/Profile/Emotes/UnsavedChanges_Bo.translation: 你有未保存的更改。你要放弃更改还是保存并退出？

MainNav/Profile/ToolTip_SetCollection.oracleText: Track your progress on collecting card sets
MainNav/Profile/ToolTip_SetCollection.translation: 追踪你收集系列卡片的进展

MainNav/Profile/ToolTip_SetMastery.oracleText: Earn XP from quests and wins to get mastery rewards
MainNav/Profile/ToolTip_SetMastery.translation: 从任务和胜利中获得经验，来解锁通行证奖励

MainNav/Profile/rankConstructed.oracleText: Your Constructed rank is determined by matches and events where you choose your deck ahead of time, like Standard Ranked and Historic Ranked.
MainNav/Profile/rankConstructed.translation: 你的构筑天梯段位取决于你选择的套牌和赛事，例如标准段位和史迹段位。

MainNav/Profile/rankLimited.oracleText: Your Limited rank is determined by events where you open the cards you play with, like Draft and Sealed.
MainNav/Profile/rankLimited.translation: 你的限制赛天梯段位取决于你所玩的限制赛事的成绩，例如轮抽和现开。

MainNav/Quest/Confirm_Swap_Text.oracleText: Swap this quest for a new one? All progress on this quest will be lost. This action can't be undone.
MainNav/Quest/Confirm_Swap_Text.translation: 用新任务替换此任务？此任务现有进度将会丢失。此操作不能倒回。

MainNav/Quest/Quest_NoActiveQuests_Image.oracleText: Come back tomorrow for a new quest!
MainNav/Quest/Quest_NoActiveQuests_Image.translation: 请明天再回来看看新任务！

MainNav/QuestRewards/NPE_MonoDeck_Desc.oracleText: Each deck is one of the five colors
MainNav/QuestRewards/NPE_MonoDeck_Desc.translation: 每副套牌都属于五种颜色之一

MainNav/Quests/WR_Damage_Desc.translation: 用白色或红色卡牌造成{quantity}点伤害。

MainNav/Quests/WU_Damage_Desc.translation: 用白色或蓝色卡牌造成{quantity}点伤害。

MainNav/Rewards/1xELD.oracleText: Congratulations! You've earned one copy of every card in Throne of Eldraine!
MainNav/Rewards/1xELD.translation: 恭喜! 你获得了艾卓王权系列每张卡牌各一张!

MainNav/Rewards/1xStandard.oracleText: Congratulations! You've earned one copy of every card in these sets!
MainNav/Rewards/1xStandard.translation: 恭喜! 你获得了这些系列里的每张卡牌各一张!

MainNav/Rewards/DecathlonTokenDescriptio.oracleText: Earn 3+ unique Decathlon tokens to reach the Finals.
MainNav/Rewards/DecathlonTokenDescriptio.translation: 赚取3个以上单独的十项全能门票以进入总决赛。

MainNav/Rewards/EquipEmoteCapReached_Sub.oracleText: Equip cap reached. Manage emotes in the Profile tab.
MainNav/Rewards/EquipEmoteCapReached_Sub.translation: 达到装备上限。 在资料页中管理表情。

MainNav/Rewards/EquipEmotesError_Descrip.oracleText: An error occured attempting to equip emote. Please try equipping later from the Profile page.
MainNav/Rewards/EquipEmotesError_Descrip.translation: 装备表情时发生错误。 请稍后在资料页中尝试。

MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardBoosterMy.oracleText: Congratulations! You have collected all mythic rare cards in this set.
MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardBoosterMy.translation: 恭喜！你已经集齐本系列所有秘稀牌。

MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardBoosterRa.oracleText: Congratulations! You have collected all rare cards in this set.
MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardBoosterRa.translation: 恭喜！你已经集齐本系列所有稀有牌。

MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardMythicRar.oracleText: The Mythic Rare card you collected exceeds the collection limit.
MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardMythicRar.translation: 所收集到的秘稀牌之数量已超过收藏上限。

MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardRare.oracleText: The Rare card you collected exceeds the collection limit.
MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemCardRare.translation: 所收集到的稀有牌之数量已超过收藏上限。

MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemRewardDescrip.oracleText: Rare and mythic rare cards you collected that exceed the 4x collection limit were converted to gems.
MainNav/Rewards/GemCard/GemRewardDescrip.translation: 每种牌张的收藏上限为4张。你收藏中超过此上限的稀有及秘稀牌已转化成宝石。

MainNav/Rewards/ICRBonusAdditional.oracleText: You have been granted a bonus Alchemy card.
MainNav/Rewards/ICRBonusAdditional.translation: 你已经获得一张额外的炼金卡牌。

MainNav/Rewards/ICRBonusAdditionalPlural.oracleText: You have been granted bonus Alchemy cards.
MainNav/Rewards/ICRBonusAdditionalPlural.translation: 你已获得额外的炼金卡牌。

MainNav/Rewards/MythicQualifier_Button_M.translation: 具体赛事详敬请移步网站查询

MainNav/Rewards/MythicQualifier_Subtitle.oracleText: You've earned your spot in the upcoming Mythic Qualifier Weekend Day 1 Event
MainNav/Rewards/MythicQualifier_Subtitle.translation: 你已赢得即将举办之「传奇资格赛周末」第一天赛事的参赛资格

MainNav/Rewards/QualifierTokenDescriptio.translation: 在太平洋时间的早上六点到八点加入

MainNav/Rewards/QualifierTokenDescriptio.oracleText: Join between 6am and 8am Pacific (1300 UTC - 1500 UTC)
MainNav/Rewards/QualifierTokenDescriptio.translation: 在太平洋时间的早上六点到八点加入(1300 UTC - 1500 UTC)

MainNav/Rewards/QualifierTokenDescriptio.oracleText: Join between 6am and 8am Pacific (1300 UTC - 1500 UTC)
MainNav/Rewards/QualifierTokenDescriptio.translation: 在太平洋时间的早上六点到八点加入(1300 UTC - 1500 UTC)
在太平洋时间的早上六点到八点加入

MainNav/Sealed/Description.oracleText: Open six packs to craft your sealed deck.
MainNav/Sealed/Description.translation: 打开六包补充包来构筑你的现开套牌。

MainNav/Sealed/PostOpenDescription.oracleText: These are the rares opened in your sealed packs.
MainNav/Sealed/PostOpenDescription.translation: 这些是你现开补充包中开出来的稀有牌。

MainNav/Sealed/PostOpenDescription_Plura.oracleText: These rares, <color=#FF9C01>plus {extraRares} more</color>, were opened in your sealed packs.
MainNav/Sealed/PostOpenDescription_Plura.translation: 这些稀有物品，<color=#FF9C01>加上 {extraRares} 更多</color>，可以在你的现开包中发现。

MainNav/Sealed/PostOpenDescription_Singu.oracleText: These rares, <color=#FF9C01>plus {extraRares} more</color>, were opened in your sealed packs.
MainNav/Sealed/PostOpenDescription_Singu.translation: 这些稀有物品，<color=#FF9C01>加上 {extraRares} 更多</color>，可以在你的现开包中发现。

MainNav/Season/SeasonEnds_LessThanMinute.oracleText: (Season ends in less than a minute)

MainNav/SetAnnouncements/GRN/GRNAnnounce.oracleText: The Guilds of Ravnica card set is now available. Which of the guilds will you align with? Experience what Ravnica has to offer and discover for yourself.
MainNav/SetAnnouncements/GRN/GRNAnnounce.translation: 烽会拉尼卡系列现已推出。你会加入哪个公会？敬请体验拉尼卡这一宏伟世界，发现自己心中归属。
访问网站了解更多关于各公会的信息

MainNav/SetAnnouncements/RNA/RNAAnnounce.oracleText: Orzhov, Gruul, Simic, Azorius, and Rakdos join the fray. Which of the guilds will you align with?
MainNav/SetAnnouncements/RNA/RNAAnnounce.translation: 欧佐夫、古鲁、析米克、俄佐立和拉铎司登场亮相。你会加入哪个公会？
效忠拉尼卡系列现已推出！

MainNav/SetAnnouncements/WAR/WARAnnounce.oracleText: Join the other Planeswalkers in the fight for the fate of the Multiverse.
MainNav/SetAnnouncements/WAR/WARAnnounce.translation: 加入鹏洛客的行列，共同为多重宇宙的命运而战。
访问网站，了解更多关于鹏洛客的信息

MainNav/Settings/Account/VerboseLogs_Lab.translation: 详细日志（用于支持插件）

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoApplyCardS.oracleText: Automatically update your decks to include new card styles you collect.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoApplyCardS.translation: 自动更新套牌，使用新收集到的卡牌样式。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoAssignComb.oracleText: Your creatures automatically assign their combat damage.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoAssignComb.translation: 自动分配你的生物所造成的战斗伤害。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoChooseRepl.oracleText: Automatically choose the order for replacement effects rather than manually selecting them.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoChooseRepl.translation: 自动选择替代式效应的生效顺序，而无需手动选择。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoOrderTrigg.oracleText: Automatically order triggered abilities rather than manually ordering them.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoOrderTrigg.translation: 自动排列触发式异能的顺序，而无需手动排列。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoPay_ToolTi.oracleText: Automatically taps mana sources and spends mana when paying costs.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoPay_ToolTi.translation: 在你支付费用的时候自动横置法术力源并支付法术力。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoPay_ToolTi.oracleText: Automatically taps mana sources and spends mana when paying costs.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/AutoPay_ToolTi.translation: Automatically taps mana sources and spends mana when paying costs.

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/DisableEmotes_.oracleText: Hide player's Emotes from each other.

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/EnableGameplay.oracleText: Require confirmation for some actions, for example playing a duplicate legendary.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/EnableGameplay.translation: 执行某些行为前需要确认操作，比如打出相同的传奇牌时。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/EvergreenKeywo.oracleText: Show reminders for common keywords like flying, first strike, etc.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/EvergreenKeywo.translation: 显示常见关键字（例如飞行、先攻等）的提示。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/FixedRulesText.oracleText: Rule text boxes use the maximum font size for legibility. More cards will require scrolling.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/FixedRulesText.translation: 规则文本框将会使用最大的字体尺寸以提高可读性。这会导致更多的牌张文本需要滚动才能阅读全文。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/HideAltArt_Too.oracleText: Hide card styles with alternate art during gameplay.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/HideAltArt_Too.translation: 对局中隐藏异画卡牌样式

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/HideRealWorldC.oracleText: Hide opponent's cosmetics that depict strong real-world imagery.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/HideRealWorldC.translation: 隐藏对手描绘现实世界图像的装饰。

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/SkipOnboarding.oracleText: Would you like to skip the guided tour on this device?
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/SkipOnboarding.translation: 要在本设备上跳过操作导览吗？

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/SkipPlayModesC.oracleText: Would you like to unlock all Play modes and skip all guidance?
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/SkipPlayModesC.translation: 你想要跳过所有教程直接解锁所有游玩模式吗？

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/SkipTutorial_C.oracleText: Would you like to skip all tutorial games?
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/SkipTutorial_C.translation: 要跳过所有教程对局吗？

MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/UnlockGameMode.oracleText:
There are many ways to play Magic. This option unlocks all of them and skips all tutorials.
If you get overwhelmed or want to learn more, visit the Codex of the Multiverse in the top right corner.
MainNav/Settings/Gameplay/UnlockGameMode.translation:
万智牌有多种玩法。这个选项将解锁所有模式并跳过所有教程。
如果你不知道怎么进行游戏，或想要了解更多，请访问右上角的多重宇宙法典。

MainNav/Settings/ReportABug/CaptureLog_L.oracleText:
Please report any issues using the link below.
Attaching your log file will provide additional helpful information.
MainNav/Settings/ReportABug/CaptureLog_L.translation:
请使用下方链接联系客服。
附上日志文件可提供更多帮助。

MainNav/Settings/RestorePurchasesFail.translation: 找不到未完成的购买记录。

MainNav/Settings/StoreChangeWarning.oracleText: Changing your currency may result in additional bank or credit card transaction fees.
MainNav/Settings/StoreChangeWarning.translation: 更改支付货币可能会导致你需要支付额外的银行或信用卡交易手续费。

MainNav/SleeveSelectorPopup/UpdateDecks_.oracleText: This action will update all of your decks with the previous default sleeve to this new sleeve.
MainNav/SleeveSelectorPopup/UpdateDecks_.translation: 此动作会将你的所有套牌从旧的牌套换成这个新牌套。

MainNav/Store/AgreeToTermsAndConditions.oracleText: By clicking I agree I read, understood, and accept the <link="TC"><color=#CBAE85><u>Terms and Conditions</u></color></link> that govern this purchase.
MainNav/Store/AgreeToTermsAndConditions.translation: 点击「我同意」，即表明我已阅读、理解并接受约束此次购买之各项<link="TC"><color=#CBAE85><u>条款与细则</u></color></link>。

MainNav/Store/BattlePass_M20_Desc.oracleText:
Unlocks the ability to earn up to:
50 M20 Card Styles
20 Booster Packs
10 Mythic Card Rewards
Unique Sleeves
3 visuals of the Elemental Cat
and more!
MainNav/Store/BattlePass_M20_Desc.translation:
解锁之后，在游戏过程中可至多获得：
50种M20卡牌样式
20包补充包
10张秘稀牌奖励
独有牌套
3种不同外观元素灵猫
以及更多！

MainNav/Store/BetaPurchaseDisclaimer.oracleText: IMPORTANT:  Periodic account resets occur during Beta.  Gems you purchase prior to a reset will be reimbursed in Gems.  No cash refunds will be provided.
MainNav/Store/BetaPurchaseDisclaimer.translation: 重要事项：测试期间会定期清空重置帐号。在清空重置前购买过宝石的牌手会得到宝石补偿。恕不提供现金退款。

MainNav/UpdateStandardDecks_Message.oracleText: Updated starter decks have been added to your collection!
MainNav/UpdateStandardDecks_Message.translation: 更新的起始套牌已添加到你的收藏！

MainNav/Vault/DraftProgressDescription.oracleText: After drafting your final card, common and uncommon cards that exceeded the 4x collection limit increase your vault progress.
MainNav/Vault/DraftProgressDescription.translation: 在抽选完全部牌张后，所有超过4张收藏上限的普通与非凡牌都会增加你的宝库进度。

MainNav/Widgets/TOHO_Body.oracleText: Until May 21, 2020 get bonus Godzilla Series Monster card styles with IKO pack bundles!
MainNav/Widgets/TOHO_Body.translation: 直到 2020年5月21日，通过IKO套装包获得额外的哥斯拉系列怪物卡牌样式！

MainNav/homepage/billboards/LockedDescri.oracleText: Complete more Color Challenges to unlock additional play modes.
MainNav/homepage/billboards/LockedDescri.translation: 完成当前所有任务，即可启用更多游戏模式。

Match/LeaveQueue.oracleText: This will attempt to leave the matchmaking queue without joining a match.
Match/LeaveQueue.translation: 这会尝试离开配对队列，不加入对局。

Match/Match_Join_Cancel.oracleText: This will cancel joining the match. This may count as a loss if your opponent has already joined the match.
Match/Match_Join_Cancel.translation: 这会取消加入对局。如果对手已加入对局，则会算作你认输。

Match/QueueTip001.oracleText: If you click End Turn but change your mind before the turn ends, you can cancel that by quickly pressing Enter or clicking End Turn again.
Match/QueueTip001.translation: 如果你已点击「结束回合」按钮，但在回合实际结束前改变心意，可以通过快速按下Enter键或再次点击「结束回合」按钮来取消。

Match/QueueTip002.oracleText: To tap specific lands to cast a spell, tap them before starting to cast your spell.
Match/QueueTip002.translation: 若要横置特定的地来施放咒语，请在开始施放咒语前先行横置之。

Match/QueueTip003.oracleText: Drag cards from your hand to the battlefield to play them.
Match/QueueTip003.translation: 将你手上的牌拖至战场以使用之。

Match/QueueTip004.oracleText: As you drag a spell over the battlefield, the lands that will be tapped to cast it become highlighted.
Match/QueueTip004.translation: 当你将咒语拖到战场上方时，游戏会高亮显示将横置用于施放该咒语的地。

Match/QueueTip005.oracleText: You can click a graveyard or exile zone to browse its contents.
Match/QueueTip005.translation: 你可以点击坟墓场或放逐区来查看位于该区域的牌张。

Match/QueueTip006.oracleText: If you don't want to cast a spell or activate an ability, you can pass priority with the spacebar.
Match/QueueTip006.translation: 如果你不希望施放咒语或起动异能，你可以按下空格键来让过优先权。

Match/QueueTip007.oracleText: If you play through three of your turns without seeing the timer fuse, you'll get a 30-second extension for a future turn.
Match/QueueTip007.translation: 如果你在没有激活计时引信的情况下完成自己的三个回合，便会获得一次30秒延长时间供后续回合使用。

Match/QueueTip008.oracleText: If your timer fuse runs down, you'll automatically use one of your 30-second extensions, if available.
Match/QueueTip008.translation: 如果你计时引信已烧尽，则你会自动用掉一次30秒延长时间（如有）。

Match/QueueTip009.oracleText: If your timer fuse runs down and you don't have any time extensions, you'll automatically pass through the current turn.
Match/QueueTip009.translation: 如果你计时引信已烧尽，也没有可用的延长时间，则你会自动让过本回合剩余所有阶段。

Match/QueueTip010.oracleText: Known cards in your opponent's hand are shown face-up, fully visible - no need to take notes!
Match/QueueTip010.translation: 如果对手手牌中有你已经知晓的牌张，则它们便会以牌面朝上的状态显示，让你看得清清楚楚，无需另外记录！

Match/QueueTip011.oracleText: When cards in a library are known to a player, they'll see them face-up when browsing that library.
Match/QueueTip011.translation: 如果牌手因故已知晓某张牌在牌库中的位置，则他在浏览该牌库时，该牌会以牌面朝上的状态显示。

Match/QueueTip012.oracleText: If you can cast a card that isn't actually in your hand, you'll see a version of it there that you can drag out to cast, just the same as if it were really there!
Match/QueueTip012.translation: 如果你能够施放一张不在你手上的牌，则该牌也会显示在你的手牌区域中，让你能够如同其他手牌一般将它拖出来施放！

Match/QueueTip013.oracleText: Express yourself to your opponent with emotes by clicking your avatar.
Match/QueueTip013.translation: 点击自己的头像可向对手发送表情。

Match/QueueTip014.oracleText: You can mute your opponent's emotes by clicking their avatar and choosing Mute.
Match/QueueTip014.translation: 你可以点击对手头像并选择「静音」以忽略对手的表情。

Match/QueueTip015.oracleText: Wildcards can be redeemed in your collection for cards of the same rarity.
Match/QueueTip015.translation: 你牌张收藏中的万用牌可用来兑换同等稀有度的牌张。

Match/QueueTip016.oracleText: Right-click or hover over a card during a game to zoom in, giving you more information.
Match/QueueTip016.translation: 在游戏过程中，你可以右击某牌，或将指针悬停在该牌上以放大显示，好了解更多信息。

Match/QueueTip017.oracleText: Click a phase in either player's phase bar to set a "stop" there, letting you take an action the next time the game reaches that phase.
Match/QueueTip017.translation: 点击双方牌手阶段栏上任一阶段便可在该处设置「暂停点」，方便你在下次游戏推进到该阶段时采取行动。

Match/QueueTip018.oracleText: Press Ctrl to use Full Control for the next action, and Shift+Ctrl to use Full Control until you turn it off.
Match/QueueTip018.translation: 按下Ctrl键便可为下次行动时启用「完全掌控」，而按下Shift+Ctrl便会一直启用「完全掌控」，直到你关闭为止。

Match/QueueTip019.oracleText: You can bluff having a spell to cast by entering Full Control (Ctrl), or clicking a phase on a Phase Bar to set a stop.
Match/QueueTip019.translation: 你可以利用「完全掌控」（按下Ctrl键）或暂停点（通过点击阶段栏上的阶段来设置）来假装自己有能够施放的咒语。

Match/QueueTip020.oracleText: You can bluff not having a spell to cast by passing quickly with the space bar, or automatically by clicking End Turn.
Match/QueueTip020.translation: 你可以快速让过（按下空格键）或自动让过回合（点击「结束回合」）来假装自己没有能够施放的咒语。

Match/QueueTip021.oracleText: You can change the art used to represent your deck by dragging a card onto the deck image during deckbuilding.
Match/QueueTip021.translation: 在构筑套牌时，你可以将牌张拖到套牌图像上，以更改用来代表你套牌的图案。

Match/QueueTip023.oracleText: Players with "Mythic Orange" names are MTG Arena team members.
Match/QueueTip023.translation: 名称以秘稀橙颜色显示的牌手是MTGA团队成员。

Match/QueueTip024.oracleText: Acquiring copies of a card beyond your fourth brings you closer to opening the Vault, which contains a Mythic Wildcard, two Rare Wildcards, and three Uncommon Wildcards
Match/QueueTip024.translation: 在某牌已有四张后，再度获得该牌便能增加打开宝库的进度。宝库内容丰富：内有一张秘稀万用牌，两张稀有万用牌，以及三种非凡万用牌。

Match/QueueTip025.oracleText: If you don't like your opening hand, you can "mulligan": drawing a new opening hand with one fewer card.
Match/QueueTip025.translation: 如果你不喜欢你的起手牌，你可以选择「再调度」：重抓一副新的起手牌，但张数会比之前少一张。

Match/QueueTip026.oracleText: If you're able to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, and there's an X in that cost, X must be zero.
Match/QueueTip026.translation: 如果你能以不需支付法术力费用的方式来施放某咒语，且该咒语费用中有X，则X只能是0。

Match/QueueTip027.oracleText: Your creatures can attack your opponent or their planeswalkers. When you click a creature to attack with it, click the planeswalker or the opponent to decide what they're attacking.
Match/QueueTip027.translation: 你的生物可以攻击对手或对手的鹏洛客。在利用生物攻击时，先点击生物，然后再点击要让其攻击的鹏洛客或对手。

Match/QueueTip028.oracleText: Spells that deal damage to "any target" can target planeswalkers and reduce their loyalty just as easily as they damage a creature or player.
Match/QueueTip028.translation: 能对「任意一个目标」造成伤害的咒语可以指定鹏洛客为目标。这样会降低鹏洛客的忠诚，跟对生物和牌手造成伤害类似。

Match/QueueTip029.oracleText: Aggressive ("aggro") decks look to win quickly with cheap creatures before the opponent can set up effective defenses.
Match/QueueTip029.translation: 强攻（「快攻」）套牌偏好使用费用较低的生物，力争在对手建立起有效防御之前赢得胜利。

Match/QueueTip030.oracleText: Midrange decks use efficient creatures and value-generating spells to outclass aggro decks and pressure control and combo decks.
Match/QueueTip030.translation: 中速套牌则会放入各类优质生物和高效咒语，以此拖垮快攻套牌，并与控制及组合技等套牌周旋、抗衡。

Match/QueueTip031.oracleText: Control decks look to answer early threats and survive until the late game, when they take over with powerful spells and card advantage.
Match/QueueTip031.translation: 控制套期偏重化解前期威胁，以存活到游戏后期，而后再以强力咒语和卡牌优势掌控游戏。

Match/QueueTip032.oracleText: Combo decks focus on finding and casting spells that work together to produce powerful effects, often winning the game outright!
Match/QueueTip032.translation: 组合技套牌注重于搜寻并施放配合良好的咒语来产生强大的效应，通常能够一举赢下游戏！

Match/QueueTip033.oracleText: Ideal draws allow you to "curve out" by both playing a land and spending all available mana every turn for the first few turns.
Match/QueueTip033.translation: 理想的起手能让你在游戏最初的数回合中都连续使用地牌并用尽法术力。这便叫做「曲线平滑」。

Match/QueueTip034.oracleText: When you can't decide which spell to cast, the play that lets you spend as much of your available mana as possible is generally better.
Match/QueueTip034.translation: 当你举棋不定，不知道要施放哪个咒语时，不妨先考虑能够用尽你所有法术力的方案，通常收效较佳。

Match/QueueTip035.oracleText: Your life total is a resource, so don't be afraid to spend it! Winning at one life counts the same as winning at 20 life.
Match/QueueTip035.translation: 你的总生命也是一种资源，能派上用场时请不要吝惜！获胜时还剩1点生命和还剩20点生命并没有区别。

Match/QueueTip036.oracleText: When you spend less mana to answer a threat than it cost, you have gained an important mana advantage.
Match/QueueTip036.translation: 当你利用较少的法术力来化解费用较高的威胁时，你已获得显著的法术力优势。

Match/QueueTip037.oracleText: If your opening hand doesn't contain any early plays, consider taking a mulligan.
Match/QueueTip037.translation: 如果你的起手牌中没有可在游戏早期打出的牌，则应考虑再调度。

Match/QueueTip038.oracleText: An ideal opening hand typically has three or four lands in it. If you have more than five or fewer than two, consider taking a mulligan.
Match/QueueTip038.translation: 起手牌通常以其中有三到四张地牌为佳。如果你起手抓到的地牌数量过多（多于五张）或过少（少于两张），则应考虑再调度。

Match/QueueTip039.oracleText: 60-card decks typically have 23-27 lands, depending on average spell cost and deck plan. The auto-land tool adds 24.
Match/QueueTip039.translation: 一副60张的套牌通常会有23-27张地牌，具体数量取决于套牌的平均咒语费用和游戏计划。「自动配地」工具会将地牌数量加至24。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_1.oracleText: If you click End Turn but change your mind before the turn ends, you can cancel that by quickly pressing 'ENTER' ('RETURN' on Mac) or clicking End Turn again.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_1.translation: 如果你已点击「结束回合」按钮，但在回合实际结束前改变心意，可以通过快速按下Enter键（MAC为RETURN键）或再次点击「结束回合」按钮来取消。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_10.oracleText: Known cards in your opponent's hand are shown face-up, fully visible—no need to take notes!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_10.translation: 如果对手手牌中有你已经知晓的牌张，则它们便会以牌面朝上的状态显示，让你看得清清楚楚，无需另外记录！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_100.oracleText: Your opponent can be any kind of person from any kind of background. Magic is for everyone!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_100.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_101.oracleText: Digital-only cards have a small Arena logo in the space where the holofoil stamp normally is on a printed card.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_101.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_102.oracleText: You can mute your opponent's emotes by tapping their avatar and choosing Mute.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_102.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_103.oracleText: Your creatures can attack your opponent or their planeswalkers. When you tap a creature to attack with it, tap the planeswalker or the opponent to decide what they're attacking.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_103.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_104.oracleText: When cards are stacked together on the battlefield, you can tap on the quantity number to select all of them while attacking and blocking.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_104.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_105.oracleText: You can replay the Color Challenges or the Tutorial by tapping on the ‘Learn More' button. It's located in the top right and looks like a question mark.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_105.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_106.oracleText: You can assign specific companions, sleeves, emotes, and avatars on a per-deck basis!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_106.translation: 你可以为每副套牌指定特定的宠物、牌套、表情和头像！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_107.oracleText: You can mute your opponent's emotes and companion by selecting their avatar and choosing Mute.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_107.translation: You can mute your opponent's emotes and companion by selecting their avatar and choosing Mute.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_108.oracleText: Want to know even more about Magic: The Gathering and MTG Arena? Then it's time to explore the Codex of the Multiverse! You can find it in the top right of your screen next to your Mail.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_108.translation: 想了解更多关于万智牌和万智牌竞技场的事吗？是时候去多重宇宙法典看看了！你可以在你屏幕顶端右侧的邮箱旁边找到它。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_109.oracleText: To show only cards from Streets of New Capenna in the deckbuilder, type "set:SNC" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_109.translation: 想让组牌器只显示新卡佩纳：喧嚣黑街的卡，在搜索栏输入“set:SNC” 或者“e:SNC”。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_11.oracleText: When cards in a library are known to a player, they'll see them face-up when browsing that library.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_11.translation: 如果牌手因故已知晓某张牌在牌库中的位置，则他在浏览该牌库时，该牌会以牌面朝上的状态显示。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_110.oracleText: Falco Spara studied law long ago, but was ousted from his university due to always correcting his teachers. His studies have culminated in the magically binding pact his Brokers use to protect New Capenna.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_110.translation: 冯柯斯帕拉很久以前就开始学习法律，但由于总是忍不住纠正老师的错误而被赶出了大学。他的研究最终促成了他的扶济社用来保护新卡佩纳的神奇契约。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_111.oracleText: Raffine poses as a simple fortune teller, but in truth leads the Obscura from her perch in the Cloud Spire, a glass enclosure that marks the highest point in the city.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_111.translation: 拉斐茵假扮成一个普通的的占卜师，但实际上她栖身在尖云顶的栖息地引导着秘闻帮行动。尖云顶，一座位于高地园且看似无法进入的摩天楼。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_112.oracleText: Lord Xander used to be an assassin and artist in Old Capenna, but nowadays the retired vampiric demon curates the archives and museums of New Capenna.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_112.translation: 尚夺尔勋爵曾经是旧卡佩纳的刺客和艺术家，但如今这位退休的恶魔吸血鬼管理着新卡佩纳的档案和博物馆。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_113.oracleText: Ziatora is a thrill-seeker whose need for adventure has now turned into a lust for violence and crime. She now has one goal: increase her hoard beneath the Caldaia district as the last dragon in New Capenna.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_113.translation: 齐朵拉是一个寻求刺激的人，她对冒险的渴望现在已经变成了对暴力和犯罪的渴望。她现在只有一个目标：增加她在柯达亚区下方的巨龙宝库，成为新卡佩纳的最后一条巨龙。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_114.oracleText: Jetmir was born to a sect of leonin paladins, but now he charismatically and hedonistically leads the Cabaretti throwing a never-ending party in the Vantoleone, his prized dance hall.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_114.translation: 杰米尔出生于一个狮族德鲁伊宗派，但现在他以超凡魅力和享乐主义的方式带领他珍视的乐舞会在万通汇举办一场永无止境的派对。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_115.oracleText: Halo is the most valuable resource in New Capenna, and while nobody truly knows what it is, everybody knows they want it. Halo can be used as a currency, to power up spells, or can be transformed into a tasty beverage.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_115.translation: 金圆是新卡佩纳最有价值的资源，虽然没有人真正知道它是什么，但所有人都知道他们想要它。金圆可以作为一种货币，为咒语提供能量，也可以转化为美味的饮品。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_116.oracleText: The opulent Park Heights is the uppermost tier of New Capenna where the streets are paved with literal gold. While crime is rampant even here, it is the only place where you can see something truly rare: the open sky.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_116.translation: 富丽堂皇的高地园是新卡佩纳的最上层，这里的街道是由字面上的黄金铺成的。虽然即使在这里犯罪也很猖獗，但这是唯一可以看到真正罕见的东西的地方：开放的天空。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_117.oracleText: The bustling Mezzio is the city center of New Capenna, full of glitzy cabarets, busy shops both magical and mundane, and secret backrooms you shouldn't know about.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_117.translation: 繁华的梅齐奥区是新卡佩纳的市中心，到处都是炫目的歌舞表演、神奇而平凡的繁忙商店，以及你不应该知道的秘密密室。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_118.oracleText: The industrial Caldaia is the lowest level of New Capenna and resembles a dragon's lair combined with industrial elements. Many residents live in The Verts, an infamous district of row houses with a sudden vertical drop.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_118.translation: 工业区柯达亚是新卡佩纳最底层的行政区，就像是结合了工业元素的龙的巢穴。许多居民住在维兹区，这是一个臭名昭著的排屋区。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_119.oracleText: New Capenna was built by angels, but most have now disappeared. The average denizen believes the now-absent angels are still enforcing order, but the city's demonic masters and their five Families are its current rulers.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_119.translation: 新卡佩纳是天使建造的，但现在大部分都消失了。普通居民认为，现在缺席的天使仍在执行秩序，但这座城市的恶魔主人和他们的五个家族却是目前的统治者。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_12.oracleText: If you can cast a card that isn't actually in your hand, you'll see a version of it there that you can drag out to cast, just the same as if it were really there!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_12.translation: 如果你能够施放一张不在你手上的牌，则该牌也会显示在你的手牌区域中，让你能够如同其它手牌一般将它拖出来施放！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_120.oracleText: To show only cards from Alchemy Horizons: Baldur's Gate in the deckbuilder, type "set:HBG" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_120.translation: 想让组牌器只显示炼金新篇：博德之门的卡，在搜索栏输入“set:HBG”或者“e:HBG”。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_121.oracleText: The world of the Forgotten Realms takes place on a planet called Toril and its moon Selûne, which is always trailed by an asteroid cluster known as The Tears of Selûne.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_121.translation: 被遗忘国度的故事发生在一个名为托瑞尔的行星及其卫星阿贝尔内，它总是被一个名为塞伦涅之泪的小行星团尾随。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_122.oracleText: Baldur's Gate is a welcoming and inclusive port city on the Sword Coast. It's a haven for opportunity, commerce...and corruption.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_122.translation: 博德之门是位于剑湾的一座热情、包容的港口城市。它是机会、商业……和腐败的天堂。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_123.oracleText: The Yawning Portal is a tavern in Waterdeep named after the great hole in the taproom that leads to the dungeons of Undermountain.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_123.translation: 呵欠大门是深水城的一家酒馆，以酒窖里的大洞命名，这个大洞通向地脉迷城的地下城。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_124.oracleText: Chromatic dragons are driven by greed and united by their sense of superiority. Meanwhile, metallic dragons are curious, protective, and can shapeshift into humanoids and beasts.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_124.translation: 彩色龙被贪婪驱使，因他们的优越感而团结。同时，金属龙好奇，善良，并且可以变形为类人生物和野兽。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_125.oracleText: Baldur's Gate is protected by the Watch, who guard the citizens of the Upper City; and the Flaming Fists, a mercenary company who control Wyrm's Rock, an imposing island-fortress.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_125.translation: 博德之门受到守卫上城区市民的守望者的保护；还有焰拳兵团，一个控制着巨龙之石的雇佣兵公司，一个雄伟的岛屿堡垒。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_126.oracleText: Lulu is a gentle and caring hollyphant who served for centuries as the war mount for a certain fallen angel, and believes in the power of friendship above all else.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_126.translation: 露露是一只温柔体贴的圣飞象，几个世纪以来一直作为某个堕落天使的战争坐骑，她相信友谊的力量高于一切。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_127.oracleText: Miirym was one of the guardians of Candlekeep, Faerûn's famous library-fortress of enlightenment and knowledge. The ghostly and lonely dragon only desires to protect Candlekeep, and to fly again in the blue sky.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_127.translation: 米瑞穆是烛堡的守护者之一，烛堡是费伦著名图书馆——启蒙与知识的堡垒。幽冥孤龙，只愿守护烛堡，再次翱翔于蓝天。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_128.oracleText: Iggwilv is famous for creating her namesake Demonomicon, which contained many spells such as Tasha's hideous laughter, Tasha's mind whip, Tasha's otherworldly guise, and torment.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_128.translation: 伊格维尔伏以创造她的同名恶魔之书而闻名，其中包含许多法术，如塔莎狂笑术、塔莎心灵之鞭、塔莎的超凡脱俗的伪装和折磨。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_129.oracleText: Minsc is a beloved berserker and a virtuous member of the Heroes of Baldur's Gate. He can always be found accompanied by his most trusted companion Boo, a hamster that is definitely a miniature giant space hamster.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_129.translation: 明斯克是一位受人喜爱的狂战士游侠，也是博德之门英雄中的一名正直成员。总能找到他最信任的伙伴布布陪伴，这只仓鼠绝对是一只微型的巨型太空仓鼠。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_13.oracleText: Express yourself to your opponent with emotes by clicking your avatar.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_13.translation: 点击自己的头像可向对手发送表情。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_130.oracleText: Catti-brie is a kind and insightful member of the Companions of the Hall, a group of adventurers that also count Drizzt Do'Urden and King Bruenor Battlehammer among its members.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_130.translation: 凯蒂布莉儿是秘银厅同伴中一位善良而富有洞察力的成员。秘银厅同伴是一群冒险家，其中也包括崔斯特杜垩登和布鲁诺·战锤国王。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_131.oracleText: To show only cards from Dominaria United in the deckbuilder, type "set:DMU" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_131.translation: 想让组牌器只显示多明纳里亚：众志成城的卡，在搜索栏输入 "set:DMU" 或者 "e:DMU" 。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_132.oracleText: The Seven Great Houses rule New Benalia and attempt to live up to a thousand years of heroic ancestors. The current Highest House is House Capashen, the first house to accept the Serran faith.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_132.translation: 七大家族统治新宾纳里亚，并试图不辜负祖先的千年英名。目前的最高家族是卡帕轩家族，第一个接受塞伦信仰的家族。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_133.oracleText: The great island of New Argive is part of the archipelago of Terisiare, which was shattered at the end of the Brothers' War. It's currently ruled by King Darien XLVIII, but the dragon Prossh reigns over its Kher ridges.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_133.translation: 新阿基夫是特里西安群岛的一部分，该群岛在兄弟战争结束时由特里夏瑞板块部分沉入海平面形成。新阿基夫目前由国王达利安四十八世统治，但喀尔天君普罗许统治着它的喀尔山脊。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_134.oracleText: While the original Tolaria was utterly destroyed by the Phyrexian Invasion, the idea of unfettered magical learning lives on among the various campuses of the Tolarian Academies. Each wizard school is protected by a magical barrier called the Perimeter.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_134.translation: 虽然最初的陶拉里亚被非瑞克西亚入侵彻底摧毁，但无拘无束的魔法学习理念在陶拉里亚学院的各个校区中流传。每所魔法学校都受到称为“周界”的魔法屏障的保护。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_135.oracleText: Most of Dominaria is covered in water, and therein lies the global empire of Vodalia. The center of this society dwells in the Voda Sea and modern Vodalia still keeps a wary eye on the activities of the homarids.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_135.translation: 多明纳里亚的大部分地区都被水覆盖，其中坐落着全球帝国伏特里亚。这个社会的中心坐落于伏特海，现代伏特里亚仍然对荷马利人的活动保持警惕。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_136.oracleText: With Belzenlok and the rest of the Cabal's leadership slain, a conclave of dementia sorcerers have brought Braids, the Cabal's former second-in-command, back from dementia space— a place of created nightmares and horrors.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_136.translation: 随着贝赞洛以及柯帮的其他领导悉数被杀，一个惧像召唤师秘密组织举行仪式将柯帮的前副手布蕾德从惧像空间带了回来——这是一个制造噩梦和恐怖的地方。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_137.oracleText: Urborg is now dominated by the Cabal's enormous Stronghold, but used to be home to Crosis, the Primeval Dragon of death, the infamous necromancer Nevinyrral, and the noble panther planeswalker Lord Windgrace.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_137.translation: 乌尔博格现在被柯帮的天罗城塞所统治，但它曾经是死亡的太古龙克罗希司、臭名昭著的死灵法师妮维亚洛和高贵的黑豹鹏洛客风华领主的家园。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_138.oracleText: Hailing from the barren land of Keld on the far northern continent of Icehaven live the courageous and resilient Keldons. The task of restoring Keld has fallen to Radha, granddaughter of the great warlord Astor and an elf of Skyshroud.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_138.translation: 来自遥远的冰河大陆北部的荒芜之地凯尔德，生活着勇敢而坚韧的凯尔德人。复兴凯尔德的任务落在了大军阀阿斯托的孙女、天帷妖精拉妲身上。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_139.oracleText: The isolated continent of Shiv is home to dragons, Ghitu pyromancers, goblins, and viashino, and is nominally lead by the Shivan Nation. Teferi once phased out most of Shiv to save it from the Phyrexians and it is home to the imperative Mana Rig.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_139.translation: 与世隔绝的西瓦大陆是龙族、基图烈焰术士、鬼怪和凡尔西诺的家园，名义上由西瓦国掌控。泰菲力曾经为了从非瑞克西亚的入侵中拯救西瓦，将西瓦的大部分跃离出此时空。西瓦是势在必得的魔力钻探机的所在地。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_14.oracleText: You can mute your opponent's emotes by clicking their avatar and choosing Mute.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_14.translation: 你可以点击对手头像并选择「静音」以忽略对手的表情。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_140.oracleText: Some of the reclusive Llanowar Elves are still wholly devoted to Gaea, the Dominaria nature goddess, while many others are more pragmatic. But despite differences in their beliefs they all still punish transgressions of their unwritten laws, often by breaking bones.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_140.translation: 一些隐居的罗堰妖精仍然完全献身于多明纳里亚自然女神盖亚，而其他许多人则更加务实。但是，尽管他们的信仰不同，他们都会惩罚违反他们不成文法律的行为，通常是打断骨头。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_141.oracleText: The tremendous coastal forest of Yavimaya has a collective consciousness and remembers the harm it has suffered at the hands of artificers. In the heart of Yavimaya, the largest and oldest magnigoth trees grow nearly a mile high.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_141.translation: 亚维马雅巨大的沿海森林有一个集体意识，它还记得工匠们对它的伤害。在亚维马雅的中心地带，最大和最古老的马尼古斯树有近一英里高。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_142.oracleText: Holding 'SHIFT' and pressing 'ENTER' ('RETURN' on Mac) allows you to pass priority for the rest of the turn, unless you're prompted to block.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_142.translation: 按住'SHIFT'键时再按住'ENTER' 键(Mac为'RETURN' 键) ，你可以快速让过此回合剩余步骤，除非你被要求阻挡。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_143.oracleText: To show only cards from The Brothers' War in the deckbuilder, type "set:BRO" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_143.translation: 想让组牌器只显示兄弟之战的卡，在搜索栏输入 "set:BRO" 或者 "e:BRO" 。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_144.oracleText: Urza was obsessed with perfection, emphasizing efficiency, elegance, and power. In his machines, he finds the perfection he cannot see in people - or himself.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_144.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_145.oracleText: Mishra was obsessed with ancient Thran artifacts, which made him an easy target for Phyrexia's influence following his fall into hardship after parting ways with his brother.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_145.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_146.oracleText: The Brothers' War is a 40 year conflict set on the continent of Terisiare, on the world of Dominaria, roughly 4,500 years prior to present day. The birth of Urza marks 0 "AR," or "Argivian Reckoning" time.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_146.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_147.oracleText: In the beginning, Urza was interested primarily in machines, and Mishra was more interested in people. But Urza eventually marries the princess of Kroog: Kayla bin-Kroog, while Mishra discovers an ancient Phyrexian artifact: a dragon engine.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_147.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_148.oracleText: Each brother has an assistant: Urza has Tawnos, who works on automatons, while Mishra has Ashnod, who develops machine-human zombies called "Transmogrants." They share in their mutual difficulties with their employers.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_148.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_149.oracleText: The beginning of the War is marked by Urza and Mishra discovering the Caves of Koilos, which hold the Mightstone and the Weakstone. The former empowers machines, while the latter does the opposite.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_149.translation: 本Mod并不收费，找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_15.oracleText: Wildcards can be redeemed in your collection for cards of the same rarity.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_15.translation: 你牌张收藏中的万用牌可用来兑换同等稀有度的牌张。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_150.oracleText: The end of the War is marked by Urza using his latent magical abilities to activate The Golgothian Sylex, which shatters the world, causes cracks in the Multiverse, and ignites Urza's planeswalker spark.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_150.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_151.oracleText: The Thran Empire fell to Phyrexia 5,000 years before Urza, but was known for their highly advanced artifacts. Powerstones have nearly inexhaustible sources of power, and Urza reverse engineers the mighty ornithopter.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_151.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_152.oracleText: The Union of scholars in Terisia City comprise of the archimandrite, Feldon, Loran, Drafna, and Hurkyl. They agree to form a coalition to protect and foster knowledge, in an attempt to find a path to a future that doesn't involve Mishra or Urza.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_152.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_154.oracleText: To show only cards from Phyrexia: All Will Be One in the deckbuilder, type "set:ONE" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_154.translation: 想让组牌器只显示非瑞克西亚：万界归一的卡，在搜索栏输入 "set:ONE" 或者 "e:ONE" 。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_155.oracleText: Elesh Norn leads the Machine Orthodoxy as The Mother of Machines. She aims to unify all living creatures and end needless conflict through phyresis.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_155.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_156.oracleText: Jin-Gitaxias runs the Progress Engine and believes he is smartest of the praetors. His goal is to achieve total compleation by the most efficient means possible.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_156.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_157.oracleText: Sheoldred is the tenuous leader of the Seven Steel Thanes. The Thanes rose from the swamp of Mirrodin's black sun and see themselves as direct heirs of Yawgmoth's Old Phyrexia.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_157.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_158.oracleText: Urabrask oversees the Quiet Furnace with a blazing hot temper. He has closed off the Furnace Layer to the other factions, and even leaves the Mirran Resistance alone.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_158.translation: 洼巴司以炽热的脾气监管着安静的熔炉。他对其他派系关闭了熔炉层，甚至对秘罗抵抗组织也不闻不问。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_159.oracleText: Vorinclex rules the Vicious Swarm as its apex predator, but delegates most of his responsibilities to the compleated elf Glissa.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_159.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_16.oracleText: Right-click or hover over a card during a game to zoom in, giving you more information.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_16.translation: 在游戏过程中，你可以右击某牌，或将指针悬停在该牌上以放大显示，好了解更多信息。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_160.oracleText: The Nine Spheres of New Phyrexia are: The Monumental Facade, Mirrex, the Autonomous Furnace, the Hunter Maze, the Surgical Bay, the Dross Pits, the Fair Basilica, the Mycosynth Gardens, and the Seedcore.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_160.translation: The Nine Spheres of New Phyrexia are: The Monumental Facade, Mirrex, the Autonomous Furnace, the Hunter Maze, the Surgical Bay, the Dross Pits, the Fair Basilica, the Mycosynth Gardens, and the Seedcore.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_161.oracleText: The Domini are mysterious, cosmic beings that became sentient as the Phyrexians compleated the terrain of Mirrodin itself.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_161.translation: The Domini are mysterious, cosmic beings that became sentient as the Phyrexians compleated the terrain of Mirrodin itself.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_162.oracleText: The Mirrans inhabited Mirrodin prior to the Phyrexians' arrival. Most have been wiped out, but the rest fight for their future under the strong leadership of the Vulshok Planeswalker Koth.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_162.translation: 秘罗人在非瑞克西亚人到来之前居住在秘罗地。大多数秘罗人已经被消灭了，但剩下的人在瓦许克族鹏洛客寇斯的强大领导下为他们的未来而战。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_165.oracleText: To show only cards from March of the Machine in the deckbuilder, type "set:MOM" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_165.translation: To show only cards from March of the Machine in the deckbuilder, type "set:MOM" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_166.oracleText: The Invasion Tree, or Realmbreaker, was grown from the stolen essence of Kaldheim's World Tree and is the linchpin to Phyrexia's conquest of the Multiverse.
