Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_166.translation: The Invasion Tree, or Realmbreaker, was grown from the stolen essence of Kaldheim's World Tree and is the linchpin to Phyrexia's conquest of the Multiverse.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_167.oracleText: Despite being warned ahead of time, Strixhaven University's faculty were no match for the Phyrexian invaders. Meanwhile, students have been searching the Biblioplex for a fabled ancient spell...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_167.translation: Despite being warned ahead of time, Strixhaven University's faculty were no match for the Phyrexian invaders. Meanwhile, students have been searching the Biblioplex for a fabled ancient spell...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_168.oracleText: Once upon a time, a host of terrible monsters came to Eldraine. While the knights of the Realm fell, the fae are cunning and wily, and the newly Phyrexianized knights need reminding...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_168.translation: Once upon a time, a host of terrible monsters came to Eldraine. While the knights of the Realm fell, the fae are cunning and wily, and the newly Phyrexianized knights need reminding...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_169.oracleText: Glistening oil has corrupted Ikoria's crystals, and now even more monstrously mutated monsters clash with bonders and their crystal clad companions...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_169.translation: Glistening oil has corrupted Ikoria's crystals, and now even more monstrously mutated monsters clash with bonders and their crystal clad companions...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_17.oracleText: Click a phase in either player's phase bar to set a "stop" there, letting you take an action the next time the game reaches that phase.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_17.translation: 点击双方牌手阶段栏上任一阶段便可在该处设置「暂停点」，方便你在下次游戏推进到该阶段时采取行动。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_170.oracleText: Thanks to Saheeli Rai's warnings, the people of Kaladesh have time to prepare. Now both sides race to the Aetherflux Reservoir hoping to control the flow of aether in the world...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_170.translation: Thanks to Saheeli Rai's warnings, the people of Kaladesh have time to prepare. Now both sides race to the Aetherflux Reservoir hoping to control the flow of aether in the world...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_171.oracleText: The Invasion Tree has broken into Kaldheim and snarled around the World Tree, causing devastating doomskars. So the denizens of Kaldheim do what they do best and ride out gloriously into battle...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_171.translation: The Invasion Tree has broken into Kaldheim and snarled around the World Tree, causing devastating doomskars. So the denizens of Kaldheim do what they do best and ride out gloriously into battle...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_172.oracleText: The samurai of Kamigawa rushed to defend Towashi against Phyrexia, but were tragically converted. It's now Kamigawa's ninjas and their use of high-tech weaponry versus the Phyrexianized samurai...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_172.translation: The samurai of Kamigawa rushed to defend Towashi against Phyrexia, but were tragically converted. It's now Kamigawa's ninjas and their use of high-tech weaponry versus the Phyrexianized samurai...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_173.oracleText: Elesh Norn has dispatched Atraxa to New Capenna to cut off Halo at its source. While the Maestro vampires were quickly converted, the rest of the families have set aside their differences to fight this dark angel...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_173.translation: Elesh Norn has dispatched Atraxa to New Capenna to cut off Halo at its source. While the Maestro vampires were quickly converted, the rest of the families have set aside their differences to fight this dark angel...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_174.oracleText: Due to the nature of faith on Theros, compleation of the gods' devotees means compleation of the gods as well. Now Ephara leads the citizens of a besieged Meletis against a fully Phyrexianized plane...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_174.translation: Due to the nature of faith on Theros, compleation of the gods' devotees means compleation of the gods as well. Now Ephara leads the citizens of a besieged Meletis against a fully Phyrexianized plane...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_175.oracleText: A Phyrexianized Nahiri has returned to Zendikar to use the Skyclaves to convert the entire plane. It's now up to Zendikar's residents, and Zendikar's Roil to stop her...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_175.translation: A Phyrexianized Nahiri has returned to Zendikar to use the Skyclaves to convert the entire plane. It's now up to Zendikar's residents, and Zendikar's Roil to stop her...

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_178.oracleText: To show only cards from The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth in the deckbuilder, type "set:LTR" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_178.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_179.oracleText: "All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." —Gandalf
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_179.translation: “我们需要决定的是，如何利用好上天赋予我们的时间。” —甘道夫

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_18.oracleText: Press 'CTRL' key ('CMD'key on Mac) to use Full Control for the next action, and 'SHIFT+CTRL' keys ('SHIFT+CMD' keys on Mac) to use Full Control until you turn it off.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_18.translation: 按下Ctrl键(Mac为'CMD'键)便可为下次行动时启用「完全掌控」，而按下Shift+Ctrl键(Mac为'SHIFT'+'CMD'键)便会一直启用「完全掌控」，直到你关闭为止。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_180.oracleText: "I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. You cannot pass. The dark fire will not avail you, flame of Udûn. Go back to the Shadow! You cannot pass." -Gandalf
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_180.translation: “我是圣火的仆人，高举着亚尔诺炽焰，你绝不能通过。黑暗之火不会帮你的，乌顿之火。滚回黑暗中吧！你绝不能通过！” ——甘道夫

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_181.oracleText: "'He stands not alone,' said Legolas, bending his bow and fitting an arrow with hands that moved quicker than sight. 'You would die before your stroke fell.'" —Legolas, to Éomer
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_181.translation: “他并不孤单，”莱戈拉斯一边说，一边用比视线更快的手弯弓搭箭。“在你中箭倒下之前，你就会死去。” ——莱格拉斯对伊欧墨说

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_182.oracleText: ‘Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens,' -Gimli
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_182.translation: “信念不足的人在路变黑时道别。” ——吉姆利

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_183.oracleText: "It is useless to meet revenge with revenge: it will heal nothing." —Frodo
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_183.translation: "以牙还牙没有用，无济于事。" ——弗罗多

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_184.oracleText: "For the Quest is achieved, and now all is over. I am glad you are here with me. Here at the end of all things, Sam." —Frodo, to Sam
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_184.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_185.oracleText: "Arise now, arise, Riders of Théoden! Dire deeds awake, dark is it eastward. Let horse be bridled, horn be sounded! Forth Eorlingas!" —Théoden
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_185.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_186.oracleText: "I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend..." —Faramir
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_186.translation: “我不喜欢亮剑的锋利，不喜欢箭的迅捷，也不喜欢勇士的荣耀，我只喜欢他们捍卫的东西……” ——法拉米尔

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_187.oracleText: "In sorrow we must go, but not in despair. Behold! we are not bound for ever to the circles of the world, and beyond them is more than memory." —Aragorn
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_187.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_188.oracleText: "For thus is it spoken: Oft hope is born, when all is forlorn." —Legolas, to Aragorn
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_188.translation: “正如俗话所说：当一切都绝望时，希望往往诞生。” ——莱戈拉斯对阿拉贡说

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_189.oracleText: Right click a card during a game to zoom in, giving you more information!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_189.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_19.oracleText: You can bluff having a spell to cast by entering Full Control ('CTRL' key, or 'CMD' key on Mac), or clicking a phase on a Phase Bar to set a stop.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_19.translation: 你可以利用「完全掌控」（按下Ctrl键，Mac为'CMD'键）或暂停点（通过点击阶段栏上的阶段来设置）来假装自己有能够施放的咒语。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_190.oracleText: Is the text on some cards too small to read? You can enable  "Fixed Rules Text Size" in the Gameplay Menu under Options to keep all card text the maximum size.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_190.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_191.oracleText: Can't place a card's alternate art? You can enable "Hide Alternate Art Styles" in the Gameplay Menu under Options to show all cards with their base art from the set.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_191.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_192.oracleText: Pressing 'QQ' will tap all your noncreatures that add mana and "float" it until you use it, or proceed to the next step or phase.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_192.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_193.oracleText: You can play one land each turn, and it's generally best to do so!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_193.translation: 你每回合可以下一块地，通常最好也这样做！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_194.oracleText: You can usually only play cards on your own turn, but instants can be played during another player's turn!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_194.translation: 您通常只能在自己的回合使用牌，但瞬间可以在其他玩家的回合中使用！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_195.oracleText: It's a good idea to spend as much mana as you can each turn. Bigger spells are usually better!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_195.translation: 每回合消耗尽可能多的法术力是个好主意。 越大的咒语越好！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_196.oracleText: About half of the spells in the game are creatures, and most decks center around attacking with them!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_196.translation: 游戏中大约一半的咒语是生物，大多数套牌都以用它们攻击为核心！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_197.oracleText: Tapping means "using up" that card for the turn. You cast spells by tapping lands, and creatures tap to attack. Don't worry, you'll get to untap everything at the start of your turn!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_197.translation: 横置意味着“用完”该回合的那张牌。 你可以通过横置地来施放咒语，生物也可以横置来进行攻击。 别担心，你将在你的回合开始时重置这一切！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_198.oracleText: Creatures can't attack the turn you cast them, but they can still block your opponent's creatures!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_198.translation: 生物在你施放它们的回合无法攻击，但它们仍然可以阻挡你对手的生物！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_199.oracleText: There are five basic lands that each tap to add one mana of the five colors of Magic: White, Blue, Black, Red, and Green.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_199.translation: 一共有五种基本地，横置它们可以分别添加对应万智牌五种颜色中的一种法术力：白色、蓝色、黑色、红色和绿色。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_2.oracleText: To tap specific lands to cast a spell, tap them before starting to cast your spell.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_2.translation: 若要横置特定的地来施放咒语，请在开始施放咒语前先行横置之。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_20.oracleText: You can bluff not having a spell to cast by quickly passing or clicking End Turn.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_20.translation: 你可以快速让过（按下空格键）或自动让过回合（点击「结束回合」）来假装自己没有能够施放的咒语。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_200.oracleText: MTG Arena let's you play Magic: The Gathering wherever you are, but you can also play at your local game store with paper cards!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_200.translation: 万智牌竞技场让你无论身在何处都可以玩万智牌，但你也可以在当地的牌店使用实体卡牌玩！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_201.oracleText: Lands are cards you simply play. Spells are cards you cast using mana from tapping those lands, and can be responded to!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_201.translation: 地是你只需打出的牌。 咒语是你使用横置这些地产生的法术力施放的牌，并且可以得到回应！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_202.oracleText: To show only cards from Wilds of Eldraine in the deckbuilder, type "set:WOE" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_202.translation: 想让组牌器只显示艾卓仙踪的卡，在搜索栏输入 "set:WOE" 。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_203.oracleText: Hylda is an exacting and dispassionate woman who could bury Eldraine in snow and ice with her crown of weather manipulation. But she mostly just wants to be left alone in her self-imposed isolation.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_203.translation: 希尔妲是一位严谨而冷静的女人，她可以用她能操纵天气的王冠将艾卓埋葬在冰雪之中。 但她大多时候只想一个人与世隔绝。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_204.oracleText: The Kindly Lord Talion, ruler and progenitor of the race of fae, unleashed a terrible sleeping curse upon Eldraine to defeat the Phyrexians. Even their daughter Obyra is fast asleep, but just as deadly, and just as kind.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_204.translation: 仁慈的塔莱恩领主，仙灵种族的统治者和祖先，向艾卓释放了可怕的沉睡诅咒以击败非瑞克西亚人。 就连他们的女儿欧拜拉也在熟睡，同样致命，也同样善良。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_205.oracleText: Totentanz never made much coin playing songs on his carved pipe. But after making a dark deal with the demonic rat Lord Skitter, he's been granted eerie and wonderous powers for his second verse.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_205.translation: 托腾坦用他的雕花乐笛演奏歌曲从来没有赚到多少钱。 但在与恶魔老鼠捷敏王达成黑暗交易后，他的第二段歌被授予了怪异而奇妙的力量。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_206.oracleText: Ruby is a tough, street-smart girl who lives on the outskirts of the dangerous Wilds. But when her brother is kidnapped and ensorcelled, she has no choice but to take on the red mantle of his rescuer.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_206.translation: 小红玉是一个坚强、聪明的女孩，住在危险的荒野郊区。 但当她的哥哥被绑架并被迷惑时，她别无选择，只能披上拯救他的红色斗篷。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_207.oracleText: Syr Armont is known throughout the Realm for her beauty and devotion to Ardenvale. When she stumbles upon Redtooth Keep and the cursed elves within, she vows to outfox the terrible enchantment that transforms them into beasts.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_207.translation: 希尔·娅蒙因其美丽和对雅登瓦的奉献而闻名于整个王国。 当她偶然发现红牙要塞和里面被诅咒的精灵时，她发誓要智胜将他们变成野兽的可怕结界。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_208.oracleText: Once just a nervous village boy with a knack for elementary cantrips, Johann was chosen to be an apprentice to the sorcerer of Caervelin. But now with his master asleep, he is desperate to find a way to undo the elemental chaos he has inadvertently caused.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_208.translation: 约翰曾经只是一个胆怯的乡村男孩，擅长初级法术，后来被选为卡尔维林魔法师的学徒。 但现在他的老师睡着了，他迫切希望找到一种方法来消除他无意中造成的元素混乱。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_209.oracleText: Eriette was gifted an apple that caused anybody who tasted it to fall in love with her, but she always dreamed a bit bigger. Now sleepwalkers and dreamers do her bidding, all while the mind of Neva, a girl interred in a glass coffin, wanders the realm of dreams.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_209.translation: 艾纶缇收到了一个苹果，任何尝过它的人都会爱上她，但她的梦想总是更大。 现在，梦游者和做梦者都听从她的命令，而埋葬在玻璃棺里的女孩涅娃的心灵却在梦境中徘徊。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_21.oracleText: You can change the art used to represent your deck by dragging a card onto the deck image during deckbuilding.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_21.translation: 在构筑套牌时，你可以将牌张拖到套牌图像上，以更改用来代表你套牌的图案。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_210.oracleText: Years ago, siblings Hanlon and Greta wandered into Sweettooth Village and were attacked by sinister living candy. Unlike Hanlon, Greta was able to escape with her life. Now she returns as a witch hunter to exact sweet justice upon those who robbed her of her brother.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_210.translation: 几年前，汉隆和格蕾特兄妹误入甘饴村，遭到邪恶的活体糖果的袭击。 与汉隆不同的是，格蕾特活着逃了出去。 现在，她以猎巫人的身份回归，对那些夺走她哥哥的人施以正义。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_211.oracleText: Ash always wanted to attend the Grand Ball in the dwarven halls of Delverhaugh, but her parents forbade it. Unbeknownst to them, she dons a disguise and sneaks into the ball. Unbeknownst to her, she falls in love with a mysterious stranger and is forced to flee leaving her helmet behind...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_211.translation: 灰钴娘一直想参加在德尔弗豪矮人大厅举行的盛大舞会，但她的父母不允许。 他们不知道的是，她乔装打扮，溜进了舞会。 她不知道的是，她爱上了一个神秘的陌生人，并被迫留下头盔逃离……

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_212.oracleText: Troyan is a vedalken from Ravnica who once paid allegiance to the Izzet League. After discovering an Omenpath leading to Eldraine, he's managed to climb the Everstalks to hijack as much treasure from Stormkeld as he can before the cloud giants find him.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_212.translation: 特洛扬是来自拉尼卡的维多肯人，曾效忠伊捷联盟。 在发现一条通往艾卓的预兆之路后，他成功地攀登了永恒之茎，在云巨人找到他之前从风暴凯尔德那里劫持了尽可能多的宝藏。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_213.oracleText: To show only cards from The Lost Caverns of Ixalan in the deckbuilder, type "set:LCI" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_213.translation: 想让组牌器只显示依夏兰迷窟中的卡，请在搜索栏中输入"set:LCI"。 每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_214.oracleText: The Sun Empire is a proud and ancient imperial power that dominates the coastal territories of Ixalan. Orazca, the Golden City, was claimed but later became a city of death, due to Phyrexian sleeper agents awakening behind sealed doors. During the slaughter, a team of soldiers fighting to clear out a nest of Phyrexians discover a grand, ancient door beneath the earth...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_214.translation: 烈阳帝国是一个骄傲而古老的帝国势力，统治着依夏兰沿海地区。 黄金之城欧拉兹卡曾被占领，但后来由于非瑞克西亚潜探在密封的门后苏醒而成为一座死亡之城。 在屠杀过程中，一队士兵在奋力清除非瑞克西亚人的巢穴时，发现了地底下有一扇宏伟而古老的大门……

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_215.oracleText: The Legion of Dusk is the military arm of Alta Torrezon, the ecclesiastic kingdom of vampires on the continent of Torrezon. The Queen's Bay Company was created to liberate Ixalan of its resources, but these vampires also feel the tugging of their progenitor god, calling to them beneath the earth...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_215.translation: 暮影军团是托雷宗大陆上的吸血鬼教会王国阿尔塔托雷宗的军队。女王湾连队的成立是为了解放依夏兰的资源，但这些吸血鬼也感受到了他们的始祖神的牵引，神在地下召唤着他们……

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_216.oracleText: The Brazen Coalition is a confederacy of ships, with each captain a sovereign of the state contained within their vessel's decks. From the floating city of High and Dry, Governor Beckett Brass may have declared the age of piracy to be "over" but new riches are being discovered beneath the earth...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_216.translation: 莽霸联盟是一个由船组成的联盟，每位船长都是其船只甲板上的领导人。 贝克蒂霸司总督可能已经在漂浮的高地之城宣布海盗的时代“结束”了，但新的财富正在地下被发现……

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_217.oracleText: The River Heralds are nomadic bands of merfolk that live in harmony with the natural world. They once unified to defend Orazca, but ultimately failed, and were hit hard by the Phyrexian Invasion. They have now migrated underground only to discover a freshwater ocean, untouched and unspoiled beneath the earth...
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_217.translation: 川流使是与自然世界和谐相处的游牧人鱼群体。 他们曾经联合起来保卫欧拉兹卡，但最终失败，并遭到非瑞克西亚入侵的重创。他们现在迁徙到地下，只是为了发现地底下一片未被接触、未受污染的内陆海洋……

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_218.oracleText: Quintorius Kand, or Quint, is a Planeswalker from the world of Arcavios and has been ranging throughout the Multiverse for Lorehold. He teams up with Huatli on the Sun Empire's expedition to the Core and harnesses his ability to bring history to life by summoning the spirits of legends to aid them.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_218.translation: 昆托力康德，或者昆特，是一位来自阿凯维沃世界的鹏洛客，一直在为衡鉴而游历多元宇宙。 他与华特莉联手进行烈阳帝国对核心的远征，并利用自己的能力召唤传说中的灵魂来帮助他们，让历史栩栩如生。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_219.oracleText: Huatli is the Warrior-Poet of the Sun Empire. While she was victorious in leading the defense against the Phyrexian Invasion thanks to Saheeli's warnings, it came at great cost. With her companion dinosaurs corrupted and her spark quieted, she now looks for the future of the Empire buried somewhere in its ancient past.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_219.translation: 华特莉是烈阳帝国的战士诗人。 虽然由于莎希莉的警告，她在领导防御非瑞克西亚入侵方面取得了胜利，但她也付出了巨大的代价。 随着她的恐龙同伴被腐化，她的火花也熄灭了，她现在寻找埋藏在其古老过去某个地方的帝国的未来。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_22.oracleText: In best-of-one matches, your starting hand is selected from two random hands, leaning towards the one with the more average land-spell mix.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_22.translation: 在一盘定胜负的对局中，游戏会从两份随机手牌中挑选地牌与咒语牌分布更为平均的一份作为你的起手牌。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_220.oracleText: The Deep Gods are Chimil's children who walk among the Oltec, and once helped shatter the shell that once contained their mother. The chief deity of the Oltec is Ojer Taq, and all the Deep Gods have temples dedicated to them in the Core, though Aclazotz's places of worship are rather hidden.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_220.translation: 深邃尊神是奇密理的孩子，他们行走在欧尔特人之中，曾经帮助粉碎了过去容纳他们母亲的外壳。 欧尔特人的主神是塔克尊神，所有深邃尊神在核心都有供奉他们的神庙，尽管阿洛佐兹的礼拜场所相当隐蔽。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_221.oracleText: Chimil is the star at the center of Ixalan's Core, revered by the Oltec. From her comes Cosmium, which is highly sought after for its practical and fantastic applications. Cosmium magic resembles solar flares and magnetic field patterns.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_221.translation: 奇密理是依夏兰核心中心的恒星，受到欧尔特人的崇敬。 她带来了宇金，因其实用和奇妙的应用而备受追捧。 宇金魔法类似于太阳耀斑和模仿磁场。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_222.oracleText: Echoes are ancestor spirits strongly associated with a focus, an item that was important to them in life. Abuelo is an Oltec Echo of a warrior from centuries past. His memory is patchy due to his lonely death long ago, far from home.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_222.translation: 念世灵是与中心密切相关的祖先灵魂，中心对他们的生活很重要。 阿布罗是几个世纪前的欧尔特念世战士。 由于他很久以前在远离家乡的地方孤独死去，他的记忆变得支离破碎。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_223.oracleText: The Mycotyrant is the gestalt leader of the mycoids, a race of virulent fungus. The primary way this single entity learns is via consumption, digestion, and replication. It only has two overriding motivations: to consume and expand.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_223.translation: 智蕈暴君是一种剧毒真菌的完形领袖。 该单一实体学习的主要方式是通过进食、消化和复制。 它只有两个最重要的动机：吞噬和扩张。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_224.oracleText: Be sure to check out the Daily Deals over in the Store. It changes daily, and sometimes features discounted packs, gold, gems, and more!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_224.translation: 请务必查看商店中的每日优惠。 它每天都会变化，有时会提供折扣补充包、金币、宝石等等！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_225.oracleText: Each pack you purchase in the Store fills the Golden Packs meter by a step. Fill it up to receive a Golden Pack that's chock-full of Rares and Mythic Rares!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_225.translation: 你在商店购买的每个补充包都会一步步填满黄金包。 填满它即可获得装满稀有和秘稀卡的黄金包！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_226.oracleText: Don't forget to check your Mail in the upper right corner of the Main Menu. In your inbox you'll find important updates, and even sometimes some sweet gifts to claim!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_226.translation: 不要忘记检查主菜单右上角的邮件。 在你的收件箱中，你会发现重要的更新，有时甚至还可以领取一些甜蜜的礼物！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_227.oracleText: The spies and secretkeepers of the Dimir once ran the information trade in Ravnica. Since the Phyrexian invasion, they have retreated into the shadows--some even claim they don't exist any more.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_227.translation: The spies and secretkeepers of the Dimir once ran the information trade in Ravnica. Since the Phyrexian invasion, they have retreated into the shadows--some even claim they don't exist any more.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_228.oracleText: The Izzet League is in charge of providing solutions for public works projects, such as sewers and boilers. They're also obsessive innovators whose experiments are often...explosive.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_228.translation: The Izzet League is in charge of providing solutions for public works projects, such as sewers and boilers. They're also obsessive innovators whose experiments are often...explosive.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_229.oracleText: The Cult of Rakdos are entertainers, satirists, and circus acrobats who revel in unrestrained hedonism; often to the point of risking their lives. They regularly mock and undermine the other guilds, whom they believe take themselves too seriously.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_229.translation: The Cult of Rakdos are entertainers, satirists, and circus acrobats who revel in unrestrained hedonism; often to the point of risking their lives. They regularly mock and undermine the other guilds, whom they believe take themselves too seriously.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_23.oracleText: Players with "Mythic Orange" names are MTG Arena team members.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_23.translation: 名称以秘稀橙颜色显示的牌手是MTGA团队成员。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_230.oracleText: Originally functioning as the agricultural and waste reclamation sector, the Golgari are a pragmatic guild who are unafraid of the concept that death is a reality of life. They served as the Phyrexia Invasions' first converts, and have been treated poorly by the other guilds ever since rebuilding has begun.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_230.translation: Originally functioning as the agricultural and waste reclamation sector, the Golgari are a pragmatic guild who are unafraid of the concept that death is a reality of life. They served as the Phyrexia Invasions' first converts, and have been treated poorly by the other guilds ever since rebuilding has begun.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_231.oracleText: The Gruul Clans are a loose affiliation of clans that make their homes in Ravnica's alleyways and ruins. They hold the most anti-civilization views of all of Ravnica's guild, viewing civilization as something for the weak.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_231.translation: The Gruul Clans are a loose affiliation of clans that make their homes in Ravnica's alleyways and ruins. They hold the most anti-civilization views of all of Ravnica's guild, viewing civilization as something for the weak.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_232.oracleText: The Boros Legion is a military that combines the force of law with strength of arms to forge Ravnica into a just society, a safe and healthy community for all.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_232.translation: The Boros Legion is a military that combines the force of law with strength of arms to forge Ravnica into a just society, a safe and healthy community for all.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_233.oracleText:
The Selesnya Conclave is part commune, part naturalistic church, and are united by the will of the Wordsoul. They dream of embracing all of Ravnica in a
harmonious union of nature and civilization.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_233.translation:
The Selesnya Conclave is part commune, part naturalistic church, and are united by the will of the Wordsoul. They dream of embracing all of Ravnica in a
harmonious union of nature and civilization.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_234.oracleText: The Simic Combine is Ravnica's steward of nature and the wild; the guild uses magic to coax new morphologies from existing creatures, as well as to combine traits from multiple organisms in one.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_234.translation: The Simic Combine is Ravnica's steward of nature and the wild; the guild uses magic to coax new morphologies from existing creatures, as well as to combine traits from multiple organisms in one.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_25.oracleText: If you don't like your opening hand, you can "mulligan": drawing a new opening hand with one fewer card.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_25.translation: 如果你不喜欢你的起手牌，你可以选择「再调度」：重抓一副新的起手牌，但张数会比之前少一张。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_26.oracleText: If you're able to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, and there's an X in that cost, X must be zero.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_26.translation: 如果你能以不需支付法术力费用的方式来施放某咒语，且该咒语费用中有X，则X只能是0。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_27.oracleText: Your creatures can attack your opponent or their planeswalkers. When you click a creature to attack with it, click the planeswalker or the opponent to decide what they're attacking.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_27.translation: 你的生物可以攻击对手或对手的鹏洛客。在利用生物攻击时，先点击生物，然后再点击要让其攻击的鹏洛客或对手。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_28.oracleText: Spells that deal damage to "any target" can target planeswalkers and reduce their loyalty just as easily as they damage a creature or player.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_28.translation: 能对「任意一个目标」造成伤害的咒语可以指定鹏洛客为目标。这样会降低鹏洛客的忠诚度，跟对生物和牌手造成伤害类似。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_29.oracleText: Aggressive ("aggro") decks look to win quickly with cheap creatures before the opponent can set up effective defenses.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_29.translation: 强攻（「快攻」）套牌偏好使用费用较低的生物，力争在对手建立起有效防御之前赢得胜利。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_3.oracleText: Drag cards from your hand to the battlefield to play them.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_3.translation: 将你手上的牌拖至战场以使用之。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_30.oracleText: Midrange decks use efficient creatures and value-generating spells to outclass aggro decks and pressure control and combo decks.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_30.translation: 中速套牌则会放入各类优质生物和高效咒语，以此拖垮快攻套牌，并与控制及组合技等套牌周旋、抗衡。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_31.oracleText: Control decks look to answer early threats and survive until the late game, when they take over with powerful spells and card advantage.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_31.translation: 控制套期偏重化解前期威胁，以存活到游戏后期，而后再以强力咒语和卡牌优势掌控游戏。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_32.oracleText: Combo decks focus on finding and casting spells that work together to produce powerful effects, often winning the game outright!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_32.translation: 组合技套牌注重于搜寻并施放配合良好的咒语来产生强大的效应，通常能够一举赢下游戏！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_33.oracleText: Ideal draws allow you to "curve out" by both playing a land and spending all available mana every turn for the first few turns.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_33.translation: 理想的起手能让你在游戏最初的数回合中都连续使用地牌并用尽法术力。这便叫做「曲线平滑」。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_34.oracleText: When you can't decide which spell to cast, the play that lets you spend as much of your available mana as possible is generally better.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_34.translation: 当你举棋不定，不知道要施放哪个咒语时，不妨先考虑能够用尽你所有法术力的方案，通常收效较佳。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_35.oracleText: Your life total is a resource, so don't be afraid to spend it! Winning at one life counts the same as winning at 20 life.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_35.translation: 你的总生命也是一种资源，能派上用场时请不要吝惜！获胜时还剩1点生命和还剩20点生命并没有区别。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_36.oracleText: When you spend less mana to answer a threat than it cost, you have gained an important mana advantage.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_36.translation: 当你利用较少的法术力来化解费用较高的威胁时，你已获得显著的法术力优势。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_37.oracleText: If your opening hand doesn't contain any early plays, consider taking a mulligan.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_37.translation: 如果你的起手牌中没有可在游戏早期打出的牌，则应考虑「再调度」。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_38.oracleText: An ideal opening hand typically has three or four lands in it. If you have more than five or fewer than two, consider taking a mulligan.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_38.translation: 起手牌通常以其中有三到四张地牌为佳。如果你起手抓到的地牌数量过多（多于五张）或过少（少于两张），则应考虑「再调度」。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_4.oracleText: As you drag a spell over the battlefield, the lands that will be tapped to cast it become highlighted.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_4.translation: 当你将咒语拖到战场上方时，游戏会高亮显示将横置用于施放该咒语的地。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_40.oracleText: 60-card decks typically have 23-27 lands, depending on average spell cost and deck plan. The auto-land tool adds 24.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_40.translation: 一副60张的套牌通常会有23-27张地牌，具体数量取决于套牌的平均咒语费用和游戏计划。「自动配地」工具会将地牌数量加至24。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_41.oracleText: Completing quests is the best way to earn gold and mastery pass XP.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_41.translation: 完成任务是获得金币和经验的最佳方式。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_42.oracleText: You'll get a new daily quest every 24 hours. You can have up to 3 of them at a time.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_42.translation: 你每24小时获得一个任务。你同时最多只能有3个。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_43.oracleText: You automatically earn rewards from the top row of the Mastery Pass as you play matches and complete quests.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_43.translation: 你对战和完成任务时会自动获得精研通行证上面一行的奖励。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_44.oracleText: The start of a new Mastery Pass begins with a new set. Each Mastery Pass lasts about 3 months.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_44.translation: 新精研通行证在新系列时开始。每个精研通行证持续大概3个月。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_45.oracleText: Purchasing the Mastery Pass from the store will give you all of the rewards from the levels you've already completed.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_45.translation: 从商店购买精研通行证会给予对应你完成等级的所有奖励。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_46.oracleText: Can't find your deck? Decks that missing cards or other errors appear at the bottom of the list.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_46.translation: 找不到套牌? 套牌缺少卡牌或者有其它错误出现时会出现在列表最底部。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_47.oracleText: The deck ‘Import' button will pull from what's currently copied to the clipboard.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_47.translation: 套牌的「导入」键会使用已复制到剪贴板的套牌列表。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_48.oracleText: To show only cards from Zendikar Rising in the deckbuilder, type "set:ZNR" or "e:ZNR" into the searchbar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_48.translation: 想让组牌器只显示赞迪卡再起的卡，在搜索栏输入“set:ZNR”或者“e:ZNR”。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_49.oracleText: To show only Mythic Rare cards in the deckbuilder, type "rarity:M" or "r:M" into the searchbar.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_49.translation: 想让组牌器只显示秘稀卡牌，在搜索栏输入“rarity:M”或者“r:M”。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_5.oracleText: You can click a graveyard or exile zone to browse its contents.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_5.translation: 你可以点击坟墓场或放逐区来查看位于该区域的牌张。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_50.oracleText: To show only Instant cards in the deckbuilder, type "t:Instant" or "type:Instant" into the searchbar.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_50.translation: 想让组牌器只显示瞬间卡牌，在搜索栏输入“t:Instant”或者“type:Instant”。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_51.oracleText: When cards are stacked together on the battlefield, you can click on the quantity number to select all of them while attacking and blocking.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_51.translation: 当一些卡牌在战场上堆在一起时，在攻击或阻挡时你可以点击显示的数字来选择所有卡牌。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_52.oracleText: You can automatically apply card sleeves to your new decks by choosing one of your sleeves to be your default.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_52.translation: 你可以通过将你的牌套选为默认来使你在创建新套牌时自动应用该牌套。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_53.oracleText: You can replay the Color Challenges or the Tutorial and learn even more about Magic by visiting the Codex of the Multiverse located in the top right of the Main Menu.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_53.translation:
本MOD并不收费，也没有提供给任何加速器进行分发。
找某宝或其他平台店家进行代氪存在"黑卡氪金/氪后数天请求退款"导致封号的风险。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_54.oracleText: MTG Arena allows you to see which of your friends are playing right now. You can challenge them if they're online.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_54.translation: 万智牌竞技场允许你看到你哪些好友正在对战。你可以在他们在线时挑战他们。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_55.oracleText: Once you achieve a rank badge, you can't lose it until the season ends.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_55.translation: 一旦你获得段位徽章，在赛季结束前你不会失去它。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_56.oracleText: While drafting, you can hold they 'ALT' key ('OPTION' key on Mac) to show how many copies of a card you already own.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_56.translation: 在轮抽时，你可以按住Alt键(Mac为'Option'键)来显示每种卡牌已抓取张数。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_57.oracleText: If you tap on End Turn but change your mind before the turn ends, you can cancel that by tapping on End Turn again.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_57.translation: 你点击回合结束按钮后，在回合结束前如果你还想再操作一下，再点一下回合结束按钮就行了。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_58.oracleText: Tap + Hold a card during a game to zoom in, giving you more information.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_58.translation: 在游戏过程中，在一张牌上点击+按住就可以放大它，这下总看得清了吧？

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_59.oracleText: Tap a phase icon in either player's bar to set a "stop" there, letting you take an action the next time the game reaches that phase.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_59.translation: 点击任意玩家条上的阶段图标，可以让你在游戏下次进入该阶段时采取行动。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_6.oracleText: If you don't want to cast a spell or activate an ability, you can pass priority with the spacebar.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_6.translation: 如果你不希望施放咒语或起动异能，你可以按下空格键来让过优先权。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_60.oracleText: You can bluff having a spell to cast by tapping on a phase icon on a Phase Bar to set a stop.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_60.translation: 你可以点击阶段条上的阶段图标来假装你有咒语可以施放。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_61.oracleText: You can bluff not having a spell to cast by passing and quickly tapping on End Turn.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_61.translation: 你可以快速让过（按下空格键）或自动让过回合（点击「结束回合」）来假装自己没有能够施放的咒语。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_62.oracleText: Express yourself to your opponent with emotes by tapping on your avatar.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_62.translation: 点击自己的头像可向对手发送表情。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_63.oracleText: Tap + Hold on your avatar to enter Full Control
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_63.translation: 点击并按住自己的头像进入全控状态。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_64.oracleText: Completing quests is the best way to earn gold, Mastery Pass XP, and Mastery Orbs.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_64.translation: 完成任务是获得金币，精研通行证经验和精研法珠的最佳方式。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_65.oracleText: Express yourself to your opponent with emotes or stickers by clicking your avatar.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_65.translation: 点击自己的头像可向对手发送表情或贴纸。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_66.oracleText: You'll get a new daily quest every 24 hours. You can have up to 3 of them at a time and can reroll them once per day.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_66.translation: 你每24小时获得一个任务。你同时最多只能有3个。每天可选择替换任务内容1次。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_67.oracleText: While drafting, you can hold down the 'Alt' key ('Option' key on Mac) to show how many copies of a card you already own.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_67.translation: 在轮抽时，你可以按住Alt键(Mac为'Option'键)来显示每种卡牌已抓取张数。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_68.oracleText: MTG Arena allows you to see which of your friends are playing right now. You can challenge and chat with them whenever they are online.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_68.translation: 万智牌竞技场允许你看到你哪些好友正在对战，你可以在好友在线时挑战他们。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_69.oracleText: To show only cards from Strixhaven in the deckbuilder, type "set:STX" into the searchbar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_69.translation: 想让组牌器只显示斯翠海文的卡，在搜索栏输入“set:STX”或者“e:STX”。每个系列有一个独有的3字缩写。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_7.oracleText: If you play through three of your turns without seeing the timer fuse, you'll get a 30-second extension for a future turn.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_7.translation: 如果你在没有激活计时引信的情况下完成自己的三个回合，便会获得一次30秒延长时间供后续回合使用。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_70.oracleText: Can't find your deck? Decks with missing cards or other errors appear at the bottom of the list.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_70.translation: 找不到套牌? 套牌缺少卡牌或者有其它错误出现时会出现在列表最底部。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_71.oracleText: Players with "Mythic Orange" names are Wizards of the Coast employees. Make sure to say Hello!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_71.translation: 名称以秘稀橙颜色显示的牌手是威世智公司员工。记得跟他们打个招呼！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_74.oracleText: There are no mistakes, only happy accidents that may lead you to trying a new strategy!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_74.translation: 万智牌没有对错，只有精妙的巧合引导你尝试全新的构筑！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_75.oracleText: Everybody loves to hear a great comeback story. Never give up!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_75.translation: 所有人都喜欢听到绝境翻盘的故事。永不言弃！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_76.oracleText: You can't control the cards you draw, but you can control how you react to them. Stay cool and have fun!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_76.translation: 你没法掌控你抓的牌，但你可以控制你对它们的反应。保持冷静，享受乐趣！（毕竟电脑是你自己的）

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_77.oracleText: During a draft with other players, you can click on your name, and it will show you everybody in your pod. And where the packs are!
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_77.translation: 在与其他玩家的轮抽中，你可以单击你的名字，它会显示所有人，以及包在哪里！

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_78.oracleText: When the ten deans of Strixhaven cannot agree on a university issue, the Founder Dragons send in one man: Director Taiva.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_78.translation: 当斯翠海文的十位院长无法就大学问题达成一致时，创始巨龙派出了​​一个人：泰瓦馆长。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_8.oracleText: If your timer fuse runs down, you'll automatically use one of your 30-second extensions, if available.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_8.translation: 如果你计时引信已烧尽，则你会自动用掉一次30秒延长时间（如有）。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_80.oracleText: The Biblioplex lies at the center of Strixhaven University. At the center of that is the Hall of Oracles. And at the center of that resides the Strixhaven Snarl.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_80.translation: 茂典阁位于斯翠海文大学的中心，而在其中心是圣法谕大厅，而在大厅中心则是斯翠海文魔旋。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_81.oracleText: After classes at Strixhaven University, why not stop at the Firejolt Café or Bow's End Tavern for a refreshment or two?
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_81.translation: 在斯翠海文大学课余时间，何不在火震咖啡厅或弓之涯酒馆坐下来享用一两杯茶点？

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_82.oracleText: Mage Tower is the main spectator sport at Strixhaven, where teams must steal another college's mascot and almost all magic is legal.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_82.translation: 斗法塔是斯翠海文的学生们进行的一种竞技团队运动，以窃取敌对队伍高塔上的苑像为目标，近乎所有魔法都属合法。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_83.oracleText: The Founder Dragons of Strixhaven University protect the Vastlands with an elite force of mages known as the Dragonsguard.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_83.translation: 斯翠海文大学的创院巨龙们用一支名为龙卫的精锐法师部队来保护旷土。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_84.oracleText: Silverquill mage-students often practice their art at the Rose Stage or the Dramarium.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_84.translation: 银毫学生经常在蔷薇舞台或戏剧馆练习他们的文字魔法艺术。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_85.oracleText: The Furygale, an area that contains abandoned artistic creations, is where Prismari mage-students often visit for inspiration — or a safe space to duel.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_85.translation: 怒风区是一个充满废弃魔法艺术作品的区域，是粹丽学生经常造访以寻求灵感的地方，或者是一个安全的不受打扰的决斗地点。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_86.oracleText: Sedgemoor on the Witherbloom campus contains both the cozy Widdershins Hall, as well as the much less cozy Detention Bog.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_86.translation: 靡华校区的蓑草原既有舒适的韦德胫学堂，也有不那么舒适的拘禁腐沼。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_87.oracleText: Pillardrop is a series of historical buildings excavated directly out of perpendicular cliffs by the mages of Lorehold.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_87.translation: 避柱是由衡鉴的法师直接从完全垂直的峭壁上挖掘而出的一连串历史建筑。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_88.oracleText: You can bluff not having a spell to cast by quickly tapping on End Turn.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_88.translation: 你可以快速自动让过回合（点击「结束回合」）来假装自己没有能够施放的咒语。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_89.oracleText: To show only cards from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty in the deckbuilder, type "set:NEO" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_89.translation: To show only cards from Kamigawa: Neon Dynasty in the deckbuilder, type "set:NEO" into the search bar. Each set has a unique 3-letter-code.

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_9.oracleText: If your timer fuse runs down and you don't have any time extensions, you'll automatically pass through the current turn.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_9.translation: 如果你计时引信已烧尽，也没有可用的延长时间，则你会自动让过本回合剩余所有阶段。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_90.oracleText: Towashi, the largest city in Kamigawa, is built in the middle of a cleared out section of the Jukai Forest around the world's oldest tree, Boseiju.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_90.translation: 都和市是神河最大的城市，建在树海的空地中间，环绕着世界上最古老的树，母圣树。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_91.oracleText: 1200 years ago, Daimyo Konda took for himself part of O-Kagachi, the mightiest kami, which began the Kami War. That part became Kyodai, who is now the guardian of Kamigawa.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_91.translation: 1200 年前，永岩城主今田将最强神明大口绳的一部分俘获并占为己有，从而引发了逆神之战。那部分重获自由并成为现在的神川守护者香醍。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_92.oracleText: At the end of the Kami War 1200 years ago, Michiko and Kyodai changed the nature of the relationship between the mortal and spirit worlds collapsing the barrier that kept the two fully separate.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_92.translation: 在 1200 年前的逆神之战结束时，魅知子和香醍改变了实界和灵界之间的联系，使两界之间的屏障瓦解。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_93.oracleText: The Imperial Court was founded to help Kyodai manage the merging of the mortal and spirit realms and is now the ruling authority on Kamigawa.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_93.translation: 皇室的成立是为了协助香醍管理逐渐融合的实界与灵界所创，现在是神河的统治机构。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_94.oracleText: The highly secretive Saiba Futurists push the boundary of what technology can do and even experiment on the very fabric of reality itself.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_94.translation: 积极又高度保密的赛博派将科技发展的边界推展至人们无法猜测的程度，甚至在现实本身的结构上进行实验。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_95.oracleText: The loosely connected criminal organization known as the Reckoners are inked with magical loyalty inducing tattoos and often meet at The Dragon's Well in Towashi's undercity.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_95.translation: 这些广泛且连结松散的犯罪集团被称为帮派，每一位帮派成员都拥有确保忠诚度并且预防叛变的魔法刺青，来自不同帮派的头目经常在都和市地下的“龙井区”会面。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_96.oracleText: The Asari Uprisers are primarily based out of Sokenzan-shi and aim to overthrow the Imperial regime and to them, their oppressive and authoritarian rule.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_96.translation: 浅利军起事者主要以霜剑山市为基地，旨在推翻被他们视为压迫且专制的皇室规范。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_97.oracleText: The Order of Jukai believes that technology is harming the fabric of the spirit realm and have vowed to stop its use by channeling their bonds with kami.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_97.translation: 树海团认为科技正在破坏自然的结构，并发誓通过引导他们与神明的联系来停止使用科技。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_98.oracleText: The Living Historians were founded by Reki and Azusa and tattoo Kamigawa's history on their skin. They can then bring this calligraphic history to life through their performance magic.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_98.translation: 现世史家由神河通史历和梓纱于逆神之战后所创，他们把历史故事刺在身上并透过舞蹈、戏剧与歌曲将之栩栩如生地呈现。

Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_99.oracleText: Demon Cultists devour power and feed it to their patron demons. The most known demon is Hidetsugu who was once just an ogre, but is now an entity of destruction and hunger incarnate.
Match/QueueTips/Queue_Tip_99.translation: 教众吞噬力量并将其供给其恶魔守护者。最有名的教众为碑出告，他曾经是一个食人魔，后来与吞世浑魔融合成为毁灭与飢饿的实体化身。

Match/Rejoin_Match.translation: 正在连接至尚未完成的对局...

Match/Start_Match_Failure.oracleText: Your match failed to start. Please wait a few moments and try again. If the problem persists, please contact Customer Service.
Match/Start_Match_Failure.translation: 你的对局无法开始。请于稍后重试。如果此问题依然存在，请联系客户服务。

NPE/ColorChallenge/CarouselBody.oracleText: Discover new decks or test yourself in the Color Challenge. Can you complete all five?
NPE/ColorChallenge/CarouselBody.translation: 在颜色挑战中探索新套牌或者自我测试一下。你能通过这五个颜色挑战吗？

NPE/Deckbuilder/addcard_135.oracleText: You can drag cards in and out of a deck.
NPE/Deckbuilder/addcard_135.translation: 用拖入拖出将牌加入移出套牌。

NPE/Deckbuilder/autocomplete_01.oracleText: Add a card you'd like to use.
NPE/Deckbuilder/autocomplete_01.translation: 添加一张你想使用的卡牌。

NPE/Deckbuilder/autocomplete_03.oracleText: Use this button to complete your deck.
NPE/Deckbuilder/autocomplete_03.translation: 按这个按钮来完成你的套牌。

NPE/Deckbuilder/autocomplete_04.oracleText: Your deck is ready to go!
NPE/Deckbuilder/autocomplete_04.translation: 你的套牌现在已经可以用来对战了！

NPE/Deckbuilder/explanation_01.oracleText: A card doesn't have to be in your collection to add it to your deck.
NPE/Deckbuilder/explanation_01.translation: 你尚未拥有的卡牌也可以加入你的套牌中。

NPE/Deckbuilder/explanation_02.oracleText: But you can't play with a deck unless all of those cards are in your collection.
NPE/Deckbuilder/explanation_02.translation: 但是在获得那些卡牌前你并不能使用那个套牌对战。

NPE/Deckbuilder/filters_134.oracleText: Use the filters to narrow down what cards are shown.
NPE/Deckbuilder/filters_134.translation: 你可以利用筛选器来控制要显示哪些牌张。

NPE/Deckbuilder/graph_137.oracleText: Want more details about your deck? Check out the "Deck Details" section
NPE/Deckbuilder/graph_137.translation: 想要进一步了解你的套牌构成吗？去「套牌详细信息」部分看看吧

NPE/Deckbuilder/inspectCards_01.oracleText: You can inspect cards here too.
NPE/Deckbuilder/inspectCards_01.translation: 你也可以在这里检视卡牌。

NPE/Deckbuilder/inspectCards_03.translation: ...通过鼠标左键一直按住卡牌

NPE/Deckbuilder/inspectCards_04.translation: ...又或者把光标悬浮在卡牌之上

NPE/Deckbuilder/intro_132.oracleText: Let me introduce you to the deckbuilder.
NPE/Deckbuilder/intro_132.translation: 让我介绍一下套牌构筑界面吧。

NPE/Deckbuilder/intro_133.oracleText: This is where ideas become reality!
NPE/Deckbuilder/intro_133.translation: 这就是将构思化作现实之处！

NPE/Deckbuilder/lands_02.oracleText: Use the 'Suggest Lands' button to add some.
NPE/Deckbuilder/lands_02.translation: 用“建议地牌”按钮来添加地。

NPE/Deckbuilder/learnmore_140.oracleText: If you want tips on building a great deck, come by the learn page.
NPE/Deckbuilder/learnmore_140.translation: 如果想了解构筑套牌的诀窍，请移步「精研技艺」页面。

NPE/Deckbuilder/search_01.oracleText: Type in some of a card's name or rules to search for it.
NPE/Deckbuilder/search_01.translation: 输入卡牌名称或者是检索规则来找到你想要的牌。

NPE/Deckbuilder/sideboard_136.oracleText: Sideboards are only used in traditional best-of-three  matches
NPE/Deckbuilder/sideboard_136.translation: 备牌只会在传统的三盘式对局才会用到

NPE/Deckbuilder/testDeck_01.oracleText: Let's see your new deck in action.
NPE/Deckbuilder/testDeck_01.translation: 实战是检验构筑的唯一标准。还不试试？

NPE/Deckbuilder/testDeck_02.oracleText: Test a deck you're working on right in the deckbuilder!
NPE/Deckbuilder/testDeck_02.translation: 在组牌器里测试你正在构建的套牌！

NPE/Deckbuilder/testDeck_03.oracleText: You can even try out cards that aren't in your collection yet.
NPE/Deckbuilder/testDeck_03.translation: 你甚至可以试试你还没收集到的牌。

NPE/Deckbuilder/view_01.oracleText: Cards are sorted by their mana cost.
NPE/Deckbuilder/view_01.translation: 卡牌由法术力费用的不同而分类。

NPE/Deckbuilder/view_02.oracleText: Use the button in the top right to change your deck view.
NPE/Deckbuilder/view_02.translation: 用顶部右侧的按钮来改变你套牌的显示方式。

NPE/Deckbuilder/wildcard_138.oracleText: Add a card you're missing to your deck to redeem a wildcard for it.
NPE/Deckbuilder/wildcard_138.translation: 如果把收藏里没有的牌张加入套牌，就会消耗万用牌来兑换。

NPE/Deckbuilder/wildcard_139_alt.oracleText: Looks like you'll need to use a wildcard if you want to play with that one.
NPE/Deckbuilder/wildcard_139_alt.translation: 如果要在套牌里用这张牌的话，就得用掉一张万用牌。

NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_02.oracleText: That dragon better think twice before he tries messing with you again.
NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_02.translation: 那条龙在来惹你之前最好再三考虑。

NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_04.oracleText: I believe these belong to you.

NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_05.oracleText: I like to think the treasure was the lessons learned...
NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_05.translation: 我喜欢把宝藏想成是你学到的教训...

NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_07.oracleText: Wait let me see those rares!
NPE/Epilogue/Sparky_07.translation: 等等，让我看看这些稀有牌！

NPE/Extra/Extra01.oracleText: During your opponent's turn, their bar glows orange.
NPE/Extra/Extra01.translation: 在对手的回合中，对方的阶段条会以橙色显示。

NPE/Extra/Extra02.oracleText: Your tapped cards untap at the beginning of your turn.
NPE/Extra/Extra02.translation: 你已横置的牌将在你的回合开始时重置。

NPE/Extra/Extra03.oracleText: Attacking creatures become tapped until your next turn.
NPE/Extra/Extra03.translation: 进行攻击的生物会被横置，要等到你的下个回合才能重置。

NPE/Extra/Extra04.oracleText: Click on each creature you want to attack. Creatures can't attack their first turn.
NPE/Extra/Extra04.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。生物在其刚进战场的那回合不能攻击。

NPE/Extra/Extra05.oracleText: Don't attack if an opponent can block with a bigger creature, otherwise your creature will die.
NPE/Extra/Extra05.translation: 如果对手能够用较大的生物来阻挡，就千万不要攻击，否则就是让你的生物去送死。

NPE/Extra/Extra06.oracleText: Your creatures are no match for this beast. Don't attack this turn.
NPE/Extra/Extra06.translation: 你的生物敌不过这个野兽。本回合中不要攻击。

NPE/Extra/Extra07.oracleText: Click on each creature you want to attack with.
NPE/Extra/Extra07.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。

NPE/Extra/Extra08.translation: 已横置的生物不能进行阻挡。

NPE/Extra/Extra09.oracleText: Click on your creature to enchant it with an aura.
NPE/Extra/Extra09.translation: 点击你的生物，来将灵气结附于其上。

NPE/Extra/Extra09_Handheld.oracleText: Touch your creature to enchant it with an aura.
NPE/Extra/Extra09_Handheld.translation: 点击你的生物，来将灵气结附于其上。

NPE/Extra/Extra10.oracleText: Cast an aura spell to make your creature bigger.
NPE/Extra/Extra10.translation: 施放灵气咒语来增强你的生物。

NPE/Extra/Extra11.oracleText: Click on each creature you want to attack with. Tapped creatures can't block.
NPE/Extra/Extra11.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。已横置的生物不能进行阻挡。

NPE/Extra/Extra12.oracleText: Drag your creatures into attackers to block.
NPE/Extra/Extra12.translation: 将你的生物拖曳到攻击者上来进行阻挡。

NPE/Extra/Extra13.oracleText: Click on your creature to target it
NPE/Extra/Extra13.translation: 点击你的生物来指定它为目标

NPE/Extra/Extra14.oracleText: Choose your blockers, use multiple creatures to take down that dragon.
NPE/Extra/Extra14.translation: 选择你的阻挡者，利用多个生物来阻挡巨龙，好将其消灭。

NPE/Extra/Extra15.oracleText: Confirm your blocks by clicking the button below
NPE/Extra/Extra15.translation: 点击下方的按钮来确认阻挡。

NPE/Extra/Extra15_Handheld.oracleText: Confirm your blocks by touching the button below
NPE/Extra/Extra15_Handheld.translation: 点击下方的按钮来确认阻挡。

NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_01.oracleText: Don't you know the penalty for trespassing in Llanowar?
NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_01.translation: 你们难道不知道擅闯罗堰有什么后果吗？

NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02.translation: 每踩断一根树枝...就得死！

NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02a.oracleText: A bone shall be broken for each twig snapped underfoot.
NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02a.translation: 每踩断脚下一根树枝就打断一根骨头。

NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02b.oracleText: For each branch you snapped, a bone shall be broken.
NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02b.translation: 你脚下每踩断一根树枝，就打断你一根骨头。

NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02c.oracleText: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
NPE/Game01/Intro/Kylea_02c.translation: 脚下每踩断一根树枝就打断一根骨头。

NPE/Game01/Intro/Sparky_02.oracleText: Travelling between planes can be hard, but you'll get the hang of it.
NPE/Game01/Intro/Sparky_02.translation: 穿梭时空很辛苦，但你很快就会习惯了。

NPE/Game01/Intro/Sparky_03.oracleText: The elves of Llanowar are impressive warriors, perhaps one of them will help us practice.
NPE/Game01/Intro/Sparky_03.translation: 罗堰妖精是强悍的战士，或许他们会有人愿意陪我们练习练习。

NPE/Game01/Intro/Sparky_04.oracleText: She seems like an enthusiastic teacher!
NPE/Game01/Intro/Sparky_04.translation: 嗯，她看起来是个热心的老师！

NPE/Game01/Stitcher/Sparky_01b.oracleText: But if you're going to battle another Planeswalker, you've got to be prepared for anything.
NPE/Game01/Stitcher/Sparky_01b.translation: 但是如果你打算跟其他鹏洛客对战，就得作好万全的准备。

NPE/Game01/Stitcher/Sparky_02.oracleText: I know a guy on Ravnica that can teach you everything you need to know about tactics.
NPE/Game01/Stitcher/Sparky_02.translation: 我在拉尼卡认识人，他能教会你如何运用战术。

NPE/Game01/Stitcher/Sparky_02b.translation: 尤其是那些不该做的事。

NPE/Game01/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_2.oracleText: You need more untapped lands for that.
NPE/Game01/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_2.translation: 你需要更多未横置的地才行。

NPE/Game01/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_3.oracleText: You don't have enough mana to cast that spell.
NPE/Game01/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_3.translation: 你没有足够的法术力来施放该咒语。

NPE/Game01/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_5.oracleText: This spell may not do exactly what you think. Read it again.
NPE/Game01/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_5.translation: 这个咒语的作用可能跟你想的不一样。再读一次。

NPE/Game01/Turn01/Interceptor_1.oracleText: Play a land each turn, so you can cast spells that cost more mana.
NPE/Game01/Turn01/Interceptor_1.translation: 每个回合都使用地，这样便能施放需要更多法术力的咒语。

NPE/Game01/Turn01/Kylea_03.oracleText: The forest belongs to the elves!

NPE/Game01/Turn01/Kylea_03a.translation: 外来者，你在这里不受欢迎。

NPE/Game01/Turn01/Sparky_05.oracleText: You'll need to draw mana from lands to cast your spells.
NPE/Game01/Turn01/Sparky_05.translation: 你需要从地中汲取法术力才能施放咒语。

NPE/Game01/Turn01/Sparky_07.oracleText: You don't have enough lands to cast anything yet.
NPE/Game01/Turn01/Sparky_07.translation: 你的地数量不够，什么都施放不了。

NPE/Game01/Turn01/Sparky_08.oracleText: So that's all you can do right now.

NPE/Game01/Turn02/Interceptor_8.oracleText: You need creatures to deal damage. Cast a creature spell.
NPE/Game01/Turn02/Interceptor_8.translation: 你要有生物才能造成伤害。施放一个生物咒语。

NPE/Game01/Turn02/Sparky_09.oracleText: Play another land so you can summon a creature.
NPE/Game01/Turn02/Sparky_09.translation: 使用另一个地，这样你就可以召唤生物了。

NPE/Game01/Turn02/Sparky_10.oracleText: You can summon creatures to fight for you.
NPE/Game01/Turn02/Sparky_10.translation: 你能召唤生物为你而战。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/ActionReminder_0.oracleText: You can play one land each turn.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/ActionReminder_0.translation: 你每回合可使用一张地牌。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_12.oracleText: Click on each creature you want to attack with.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_12.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_12_H.oracleText: Touch each creature you want to attack with.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_12_H.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_15.oracleText: Click on each creature you want to attack with. Creatures can't attack their first turn.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_15.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。生物在其刚进战场的那回合不能攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_15_H.oracleText: Touch each creature you want to attack with. Creatures can't attack their first turn.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingReminder_15_H.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。生物在其刚进战场的那回合不能攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingSubmitReminde.oracleText: Click the button in the bottom right to confirm your attackers.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingSubmitReminde.translation: 点击右下方的按钮确认攻击者。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingSubmitReminde.oracleText: Touch the button in the bottom right to confirm your attackers
NPE/Game01/Turn03/AttackingSubmitReminde.translation: 点击右下方的按钮确认攻击者。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/CenterPrompt_10.oracleText: Your tapped lands untap at the beginning of your turn.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/CenterPrompt_10.translation: 你已横置的地会在你的回合开始时重置。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/Interceptor_11.oracleText: Make use of your untapped lands. Cast a creature spell.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/Interceptor_11.translation: 用好这些未横置的地。施放一个生物咒语。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/Interceptor_14.oracleText: You need to deal damage to your opponent to win the game. Attack with a creature.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/Interceptor_14.translation: 你需要向对手造成伤害才能赢得游戏。利用生物攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/Kylea_04.oracleText: You're going to pay for that.

NPE/Game01/Turn03/Sparky_11.oracleText: These elves aren't kidding around. You have to fight.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/Sparky_11.translation: 这些妖精可不是闹着玩的。只得硬上。

NPE/Game01/Turn03/Sparky_12.oracleText: Only one of your creatures is ready to attack.
NPE/Game01/Turn03/Sparky_12.translation: 你的生物中只有一个准备好攻击了。

NPE/Game01/Turn04/AttackingReminder_17.oracleText: Attack with your creatures to defeat your opponent.
NPE/Game01/Turn04/AttackingReminder_17.translation: 利用生物攻击来击败对手。

NPE/Game01/Turn04/AttackingSubmitReminde.oracleText: Click the button in the bottom right to confirm attacks.
NPE/Game01/Turn04/AttackingSubmitReminde.translation: 点击右下方的按钮确认进行攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn04/CenterPrompt_16.oracleText: Your creatures untap at the beginning of your turn.
NPE/Game01/Turn04/CenterPrompt_16.translation: 你的生物会在你回合开始时重置。

NPE/Game01/Turn04/Kylea_05.oracleText: Admirable. Pity I have to crush you.
NPE/Game01/Turn04/Kylea_05.translation: 身手不错。只可惜还是过不了我这关。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/BlockingReminder_23.oracleText: To block, click or drag one of your creatures into an attacker.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/BlockingReminder_23.translation: 若要阻挡，请点击并将你的生物拖曳到攻击者上。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/BlockingSubmitReminder.oracleText: Confirm your blocks by clicking the button below.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/BlockingSubmitReminder.translation: 点击下方的按钮来确认阻挡。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/BlockingSubmitReminder.oracleText: Confirm your blocks by touching the button below.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/BlockingSubmitReminder.translation: 点击下方的按钮来确认阻挡。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/CenterPrompt_22.oracleText: A spell has made this creature stronger temporarily.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/CenterPrompt_22.translation: 有咒语暂时增强了此生物。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/CenterPrompt_27.oracleText: Even a small creature will block all damage.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/CenterPrompt_27.translation: 就算只有一个小生物，也能阻挡所有伤害。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/Interceptor_21.oracleText: Your opponent can block and kill your attacking creatures. Don't attack this turn.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/Interceptor_21.translation: 对手能够挡死你的攻击生物。本回合中不要攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/Interceptor_25.oracleText: Use a creature to block otherwise you'll lose.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/Interceptor_25.translation: 用生物来阻挡，否则你会输掉这盘游戏。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/Interceptor_26.oracleText: Block with only one creature, otherwise both will die.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/Interceptor_26.translation: 只派一个生物去阻挡，否则两个生物都会死去。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/Kylea_06.oracleText: You've shown spirit, but I will show you strength!
NPE/Game01/Turn05/Kylea_06.translation: 你勇气可嘉，但我会让你懂得力量至上！

NPE/Game01/Turn05/Sparky_15.oracleText: That beast will destroy your creatures if you attack now.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/Sparky_15.translation: 如果现在攻击，那头野兽会消灭你的生物。

NPE/Game01/Turn05/Sparky_16.oracleText: Stand your ground. One of your creatures can block it.
NPE/Game01/Turn05/Sparky_16.translation: 稳住。你有生物可以阻挡它。

NPE/Game01/Turn06/Interceptor_29.oracleText: Cast a spell on your opponent's creature, otherwise it could attack again.
NPE/Game01/Turn06/Interceptor_29.translation: 向对手的生物施放咒语，否则它可以再度攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn06/Interceptor_31.oracleText: You need to deal damage to your opponent to win the game. Attack with all your creatures.
NPE/Game01/Turn06/Interceptor_31.translation: 你需要向对手造成伤害才能赢得游戏。利用所有的生物来攻击。

NPE/Game01/Turn06/Sparky_17.oracleText: Take down that beast while it's still recovering.
NPE/Game01/Turn06/Sparky_17.translation: 趁那头野兽在恢复的时候，打倒它。

NPE/Game01/Turn06/TargetReminder_30.translation: 点击一个已横置的生物。

NPE/Game01/Turn06/TargetReminder_30_Hand.translation: 点击一个已横置的生物。

NPE/Game01/Turn07/DontAttackReminder_20.oracleText: Don't attack if an opponent can block with a bigger creature, otherwise your creature could die.
NPE/Game01/Turn07/DontAttackReminder_20.translation: 如果对手能够用较大的生物来阻挡，就千万不要攻击，否则就是让你的生物去送死。

NPE/Game01/Turn07/Interceptor_32.oracleText: Cast your spell to clear the way!
NPE/Game01/Turn07/Interceptor_32.translation: 施放咒语，扫清对方防线！

NPE/Game01/Turn07/Sparky_18.oracleText: Cast the spell. Clear a path to finish her!
NPE/Game01/Turn07/Sparky_18.translation: 施放咒语。扫清阻挡之敌，击败她！

NPE/Game01/g1_142.oracleText: Mouse-over cards to inspect their details.
NPE/Game01/g1_142.translation: 将指针悬停在牌张上可查看牌张叙述。

NPE/Game01/g1_142_Handheld.oracleText: Touch and hold cards to inspect their details
NPE/Game01/g1_142_Handheld.translation: 点击并长按在牌张上可查看牌张叙述。

NPE/Game01/g1_Handheld_01.oracleText: Drag cards to the battlefield to use them.
NPE/Game01/g1_Handheld_01.translation: 将你手上的牌拖放到战场上来使用它。

NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_01.oracleText: There are two types of cards: lands and spells.
NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_01.translation: 卡牌的种类有两种：地和咒语

NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_02.oracleText: You'll need lands to cast your spells.
NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_02.translation: 你需要地中才能施放咒语。

NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_03.oracleText: And bigger spells require more lands.
NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_03.translation: 越强力的咒语需要越多的地。

NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_04.oracleText: Anything that's not a land is a spell.
NPE/Game01/g1_LandsAndSpells_04.translation: 记住！一张牌要不是咒语要不就是地。

NPE/Game02/End/GoblinDefeat/Miirbo_14.oracleText: It's the pokey bits that hurt the most.
NPE/Game02/End/GoblinDefeat/Miirbo_14.translation: 果然还是尖的那端比较痛。

NPE/Game02/End/GoblinDefeat/Miirbo_14a.oracleText: I think that went pretty well.

NPE/Game02/Stitcher/Sparky_01.oracleText: You're a quick learner, so let's try a more challenging lesson.
NPE/Game02/Stitcher/Sparky_01.translation: 你学得很快，现在我们来提高挑战难度。

NPE/Game02/Stitcher/Sparky_02.oracleText: Follow me to Ixalan. There's a mystic there who has spent his life studying the nuances of combat.
NPE/Game02/Stitcher/Sparky_02.translation: 跟我去依夏兰吧。那里有位秘教徒，他花了毕生时间研究战斗中最微妙的差异。

NPE/Game02/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_35.oracleText: You'll need this spell for something else or at another time.
NPE/Game02/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_35.translation: 你可能会在其他时机用到这个咒语。

NPE/Game02/Turn01/ActionReminder_33.oracleText: Summon a creature by dragging it onto the battlefield.
NPE/Game02/Turn01/ActionReminder_33.translation: 将生物拖曳到战场上来召唤它。

NPE/Game02/Turn01/Sparky_01.oracleText: Lesson number one: Don't yell "Surprise Attack" right before you ambush someone...
NPE/Game02/Turn01/Sparky_01.translation: 第一课：在伏击之前记得请不要大喊「突然袭击」……

NPE/Game02/Turn01/Sparky_02.oracleText: Don't worry. These things are basically harmless.
NPE/Game02/Turn01/Sparky_02.translation: 不用担心。这些小东西无关痛痒。

NPE/Game02/Turn02/Sparky_03.oracleText: Okay, maybe worry just a little bit.
NPE/Game02/Turn02/Sparky_03.translation: 好吧，可能要稍微上点心。

NPE/Game02/Turn02/Sparky_04.oracleText: You need to mount a defense.

NPE/Game02/Turn03/CenterPrompt_36.oracleText: Creatures heal all damage at the end of each turn.
NPE/Game02/Turn03/CenterPrompt_36.translation: 在每个回合结束时，生物受到的伤害都会治愈。

NPE/Game02/Turn03/Interceptor_34.oracleText: Make use of your unused mana. Cast a creature spell.
NPE/Game02/Turn03/Interceptor_34.translation: 用好这些还未利用的法术力。施放一个生物咒语。

NPE/Game02/Turn03/Interceptor_37.oracleText: Block an attacker whenever you control a bigger creature.
NPE/Game02/Turn03/Interceptor_37.translation: 你操控较大的生物时，就可以用其去阻挡攻击者。

NPE/Game02/Turn03/Interceptor_38.oracleText: Cast both of your creature spells.
NPE/Game02/Turn03/Interceptor_38.translation: 施放剩下的两个生物咒语。

NPE/Game02/Turn03/Miirbo_04.oracleText: I've got more where that came from!

NPE/Game02/Turn03/Sparky_05.oracleText: Your creatures aren't tough enough to survive being blocked.
NPE/Game02/Turn03/Sparky_05.translation: 你的生物不够大，对手如果阻挡的话都活不下来。

NPE/Game02/Turn04/Interceptor_39.oracleText: Block more attackers, otherwise you'll take more damage than you have to.
NPE/Game02/Turn04/Interceptor_39.translation: 你需要阻挡更多攻击者，否则你会受到较预计为多的伤害。

NPE/Game02/Turn04/Miirbo_05.translation: 全体听令，除我之外～冲锋！

NPE/Game02/Turn04/Miirbo_06.oracleText: Nobody kills my troops but me!
NPE/Game02/Turn04/Miirbo_06.translation: 只有我能消灭我的部队！

NPE/Game02/Turn04/Miirbo_06a.oracleText: So you want to kill my troops? Well two can play at that game!
NPE/Game02/Turn04/Miirbo_06a.translation: 你想对我的手下动手？我来陪你！

NPE/Game02/Turn05/CenterPrompt_40.oracleText: This creature has an effect when it enters the battlefield.
NPE/Game02/Turn05/CenterPrompt_40.translation: 此生物在进战场时具有效应。

NPE/Game02/Turn05/CenterPrompt_41.oracleText: This creature also has an "enters the battlefield" ability.
NPE/Game02/Turn05/CenterPrompt_41.translation: 此生物也具有「进战场」的异能。

NPE/Game02/Turn05/Miirbo_08.oracleText: Where's an army of expendable minions when you need one?
NPE/Game02/Turn05/Miirbo_08.translation: 我那么多招手即来的手下都去哪了？每次要用的时候都找不到！

NPE/Game02/Turn05/Sparky_07.oracleText: Nice defense. He'd be a fool to attack you now.
NPE/Game02/Turn05/Sparky_07.translation: 守得不错。他现在攻击你可不是明智之举。

NPE/Game02/Turn06/Miirbo_10.oracleText: Never hold back! Never back down! Never walk barefoot in a goblin warren.
NPE/Game02/Turn06/Miirbo_10.translation: 别犹豫！别放弃！别光着脚在鬼怪繁殖地里走路！

NPE/Game02/Turn06/Miirbo_11.oracleText: It's time to bring the pain.

NPE/Game02/Turn07/Miirbo_12.oracleText: A good general knows when they're beat... so you should probably give up now.
NPE/Game02/Turn07/Miirbo_12.translation: 聪明的将军知道打不过的时候该怎么作……所以你该要放弃了吧。

NPE/Game02/Turn07/Miirbo_12a.oracleText: I don't know where you came from. I didn't invite you. And you've been nothing but trouble since you got here!
NPE/Game02/Turn07/Miirbo_12a.translation: 我不知道你从哪来。但我肯定没有请你来。你来了之后就不停惹麻烦！

NPE/Game02/Turn09/Miirbo_17.oracleText: I don't know the meaning of tactical retreat!
NPE/Game02/Turn09/Miirbo_17.translation: 我不知道什么叫做战术撤退！

NPE/Game03/End/MerfolkDefeat/Calubi_16.oracleText: It was fun while it lasted.
NPE/Game03/End/MerfolkDefeat/Calubi_16.translation: 有来有回的时候还挺有趣的。

NPE/Game03/End/MerfolkDefeat/Calubi_16a.oracleText: Pay me a visit when your journey is done.
NPE/Game03/End/MerfolkDefeat/Calubi_16a.translation: 旅程告一段落后，再来见我。

NPE/Game03/End/MerfolkVictory/Calubi_17.oracleText: It seems you still have much to learn, my pupils.
NPE/Game03/End/MerfolkVictory/Calubi_17.translation: 学海无涯，仍需坚苦作舟。

NPE/Game03/Intro/Calubi_01.oracleText: If it is wisdom you seek, I will teach you.
NPE/Game03/Intro/Calubi_01.translation: 如果你想要的是智慧，我很乐意教你。

NPE/Game03/Intro/Sparky_01.oracleText: He might look like any other merfolk, but his knowledge is boundless.
NPE/Game03/Intro/Sparky_01.translation: 他看起来跟其他的人鱼一样，但却拥有无限丰富的知识。

NPE/Game03/Intro/Sparky_02.oracleText: Stay patient and keep an open mind.

NPE/Game03/Stitcher/Sparky_01.oracleText: You're almost ready to take on anyone, including whoever roughed you up in the first place.
NPE/Game03/Stitcher/Sparky_01.translation: 你差不多可以找人练手了，包括那些先前打惨你的对手。

NPE/Game03/Stitcher/Sparky_01a.oracleText: I'd say you're just about ready to take on anyone, including whoever roughed you up in the first place.
NPE/Game03/Stitcher/Sparky_01a.translation: 在我看来，你差不多可以找人练手了，包括那些先前打惨你的对手。

NPE/Game03/Stitcher/Sparky_02.oracleText: For your last lesson, let's head to Tarkir to learn the art of surprise...
NPE/Game03/Stitcher/Sparky_02.translation: 至于你的最后一课，让我们前往鞑契学学突袭战技吧...

NPE/Game03/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_42.oracleText: Put this aura on your most powerful creature.
NPE/Game03/Turn00/AlwaysReminder_42.translation: 将此灵气结附在你最强大的生物上。

NPE/Game03/Turn01/Calubi_03.oracleText: Birds fly freely, unfettered by earthly bonds.
NPE/Game03/Turn01/Calubi_03.translation: 鸟类自由地飞翔，不受到地面的束缚。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/ActionReminder_46.oracleText: Cast an aura spell to make your creatures bigger.
NPE/Game03/Turn02/ActionReminder_46.translation: 施放灵气咒语来增强你的生物。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/Calubi_04.oracleText: Everything is connected.  You must understand the air, land, and sea.
NPE/Game03/Turn02/Calubi_04.translation: 万物都相互关联。你必须分清天空、陆地和海洋。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/Calubi_05.oracleText: I do this only so that you may learn from it.
NPE/Game03/Turn02/Calubi_05.translation: 我这么做只是为了让你学习。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/Interceptor_47.oracleText: Enchant your creature before attacking for more damage.
NPE/Game03/Turn02/Interceptor_47.translation: 在攻击前将灵气结附在其上，可以造成更多伤害。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/Sparky_01.oracleText: That bird can fly over any blockers on the ground.
NPE/Game03/Turn02/Sparky_01.translation: 那只鸟能飞越地面上的阻挡者。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/Sparky_02.oracleText: Alright, you give it a shot.

NPE/Game03/Turn02/TargetReminder_45.oracleText: Enchant your creature with the aura.
NPE/Game03/Turn02/TargetReminder_45.translation: 将此灵气结附在你的生物上。

NPE/Game03/Turn02/g3_t2_144.oracleText: Is that crab wearing... a pirate hat?
NPE/Game03/Turn02/g3_t2_144.translation: 那只螃蟹是...戴着一顶航海士帽吗？

NPE/Game03/Turn03/Calubi_07.oracleText: Obstacles may block your path, but do not lose sight of your true goal.
NPE/Game03/Turn03/Calubi_07.translation: 障碍会挡住你的去路，但不要忽略了你真正的目的。

NPE/Game03/Turn03/Calubi_08.oracleText: Sometimes the best way around is through.
NPE/Game03/Turn03/Calubi_08.translation: 通途有时远在天边，有时只需你勇往直前。

NPE/Game03/Turn03/Interceptor_48.oracleText: Make use of your untapped mana. Cast a creature spell.
NPE/Game03/Turn03/Interceptor_48.translation: 用好未横置的法术力。施放一个生物咒语。

NPE/Game03/Turn03/Sparky_03.oracleText: Oh look at its little hat! So cute!
NPE/Game03/Turn03/Sparky_03.translation: 噢，看看那顶帽子！真可爱！

NPE/Game03/Turn04/TargetReminder_49.oracleText: Enchant another creature with an aura.
NPE/Game03/Turn04/TargetReminder_49.translation: 让另一个生物上也结附有灵气。

NPE/Game03/Turn04/g3_t4_145.oracleText: Keep going. He's running out of cards.
NPE/Game03/Turn04/g3_t4_145.translation: 坚持下去。他的牌快用完了。

NPE/Game03/Turn05/Calubi_11.oracleText: If you keep to the shallows, you'll never learn the secrets of the depths.
NPE/Game03/Turn05/Calubi_11.translation: 如果只驻足浅滩，就永远无法知晓深渊的奥秘。

NPE/Game03/Turn05/Sparky_05.translation: 哇哦，这听起来……可真深奥。

NPE/Game03/Turn06/AttackingReminder_52.oracleText: Click on each creature you want to attack with. Tapped creatures can't block.
NPE/Game03/Turn06/AttackingReminder_52.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。已横置的生物不能进行阻挡。

NPE/Game03/Turn06/AttackingReminder_52_H.oracleText: Touch each creature you want to attack with.
NPE/Game03/Turn06/AttackingReminder_52_H.translation: 点击所有你要用于攻击的生物。已横置的生物不能进行阻挡。

NPE/Game03/Turn06/Calubi_12.oracleText: If you make big waves, do not blame the ocean when you get carried away.
NPE/Game03/Turn06/Calubi_12.translation: 如果是你掀起波涛，那么大浪来袭时切勿怪罪大海。

NPE/Game03/Turn06/Interceptor_51.oracleText: Attack with your flying creature, your opponent can't block it.
NPE/Game03/Turn06/Interceptor_51.translation: 利用飞行生物攻击，你的对手无法阻挡。

NPE/Game03/Turn06/Sparky_06.oracleText: His lessons are just... so... majestic.

NPE/Game03/Turn06/TargetReminder_50.oracleText: Choose a creature to enchant with an aura.
NPE/Game03/Turn06/TargetReminder_50.translation: 选择一个要结附灵气的生物。

NPE/Game03/Turn07/Calubi_13.oracleText: The student is a river. The teacher is an ocean. The master is... also an ocean.
NPE/Game03/Turn07/Calubi_13.translation: 如果学生像是潺潺溪流。老师便是汪洋大海。而无上宗师……也是汪洋大海。

NPE/Game03/Turn07/Calubi_15.oracleText: It was just nice to have some company.
NPE/Game03/Turn07/Calubi_15.translation: 只不过有人陪伴还真是不错。

NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_07.oracleText: Wait, what? That last one sounds a bit fishy.
NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_07.translation: 等等，什么？最后一点听起来有点靠不住。

NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_08.oracleText: You know what? The mystic I was thinking of isn't even a Merfolk!
NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_08.translation: 你知道吗？我先前在想的秘教徒甚至不是人鱼！

NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_08a.oracleText: You know, now I think about it, the mystic I was thinking of isn't even a merfolk!
NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_08a.translation: 知道吗，现在想想，我先前在想的秘教徒甚至不是人鱼！

NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_08b.oracleText: So... I actually don't know who this guy is.
NPE/Game03/Turn07/Sparky_08b.translation: 所以...我也不知道这人是谁。

NPE/Game04/Beginning/Sparky_01.oracleText: Watch her every move... and be ready for anything.
NPE/Game04/Beginning/Sparky_01.translation: 留意她的一举一动...做好万全准备。

NPE/Game04/Beginning/ViperNang_01.oracleText: Oh, what pretty little thing has wandered into my web?
NPE/Game04/Beginning/ViperNang_01.translation: 噢，看看哪个小东西进了我的罗网？

NPE/Game04/Beginning/ViperNang_01a.oracleText: Pain is the lesson. I am your teacher.
NPE/Game04/Beginning/ViperNang_01a.translation: 今天便要教你受苦。我就是你的老师。

NPE/Game04/Beginning/ViperNang_01b.oracleText: Are you here for my entertainment?

NPE/Game04/End/AssassinVictory/ViperNang.oracleText: There is little honor in my tactics, but there is no honor in losing.
NPE/Game04/End/AssassinVictory/ViperNang.translation: 可能我的战术不太光彩，但战场上输了更不光彩。

NPE/Game04/Stitcher/NicolBolas_02.oracleText: After I annihilated you, I really didn't expect to see you again.
NPE/Game04/Stitcher/NicolBolas_02.translation: 先前灭了你，我还真没想到会再见到你。

NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_01.oracleText: Nice job! That was some quick thinking.
NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_01.translation: 干得漂亮！这才叫思绪敏捷。

NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_02.oracleText: When we first met, you looked within an inch of your life, but now you are unstoppable!
NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_02.translation: 我们刚见面的时候，你看起来半死不活的，但现在已经没人能挡得住你了！

NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_02b.oracleText: Who were you fighting in the first place, anyway?
NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_02b.translation: 你一开始是跟谁作战的来着？

NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_03.oracleText: WHAT?! This is a terrible idea!

NPE/Game04/Stitcher/Sparky_03b.oracleText: There's no way you're prepared for this guy!

NPE/Game04/Turn01/CenterPrompt_53.oracleText: This opponent has spells that can be cast on your turn.
NPE/Game04/Turn01/CenterPrompt_53.translation: 对手有能在你回合施放的咒语。

NPE/Game04/Turn01/ViperNang_02.oracleText: Don't be shy. I just want to play.
NPE/Game04/Turn01/ViperNang_02.translation: 别害羞。我只想切磋一下。

NPE/Game04/Turn02/CenterPrompt_54.oracleText: Instant spells can be cast at any time.
NPE/Game04/Turn02/CenterPrompt_54.translation: 瞬间咒语随时都可以施放。

NPE/Game04/Turn02/Sparky_02.oracleText: Don't let her get under your skin.

NPE/Game04/Turn03/CenterPrompt_55.oracleText: Creatures with flash can also be cast at any time.
NPE/Game04/Turn03/CenterPrompt_55.translation: 具闪现异能的生物也随时都可以施放。

NPE/Game04/Turn03/ViperNang_07a.oracleText: I bet you didn't see that coming!

NPE/Game04/Turn04/Sparky_03.oracleText: Aw, we don't even get a hit in.
NPE/Game04/Turn04/Sparky_03.translation: 啊，我们连还手的机会都没有。

NPE/Game04/Turn04/ViperNang_08.translation: 你们手忙脚乱的样子还真逗啊。

NPE/Game04/Turn05/DontAttackReminder_57.oracleText: Click 'No Attackers' to keep back a blocker.
NPE/Game04/Turn05/DontAttackReminder_57.translation: 点击「不进攻」，好留下一个阻挡者。

NPE/Game04/Turn05/DontAttackReminder_57_.oracleText: Touch 'No Attackers' to keep back a blocker.
NPE/Game04/Turn05/DontAttackReminder_57_.translation: 点击「不进攻」，好留下一个阻挡者。

NPE/Game04/Turn05/Interceptor_58.oracleText: Your life total is low. Hold back your creature to block.
NPE/Game04/Turn05/Interceptor_58.translation: 你的总生命很低。别让生物攻击，留它们下来阻挡。

NPE/Game04/Turn05/Sparky_04.oracleText: Careful. You can't afford to take another hit like that.
NPE/Game04/Turn05/Sparky_04.translation: 小心。你下次承受不住这样的攻势了。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/ActionReminder_62.oracleText: Cast an instant spell to save your creature.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/ActionReminder_62.translation: 施放瞬间咒语来挽救生物。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/BlockingReminder_59.oracleText: To block, click or drag one of your creatures into an attacking creature.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/BlockingReminder_59.translation: 若要阻挡，请点击并将你的生物拖曳到攻击者上。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/BlockingReminder_59_Ha.oracleText: To block, touch one of your creatures, then touch an attacking creature
NPE/Game04/Turn06/BlockingReminder_59_Ha.translation: 若要阻挡，请点击并将你的生物拖曳到攻击者上。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/BlockingSubmitReminder.oracleText: Confirm your blockers by clicking the button in the bottom right.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/BlockingSubmitReminder.translation: 点击右下方的按钮来确认阻挡者。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/Interceptor_61.oracleText: Use a creature to block otherwise you'll take too much damage and lose.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/Interceptor_61.translation: 用一个生物来阻挡，否则你便会因为受到过多伤害而输掉游戏。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/Interceptor_64.oracleText: Make your creature bigger to help it win combat.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/Interceptor_64.translation: 增强你的生物以让它在战斗中获胜。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/Interceptor_65.oracleText: Cast a spell to help your creature win combat.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/Interceptor_65.translation: 施放咒语帮助你的生物在战斗中获胜。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/Sparky_05.oracleText: Block first – then it's time for some trickery of your own.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/Sparky_05.translation: 先阻挡～然后就到你展现谋略的时候了。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/TargetReminder_63.oracleText: Click on your creature to target it.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/TargetReminder_63.translation: 点击你的生物来指定它为目标。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/TargetReminder_63_Hand.oracleText: Touch your creature to target it.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/TargetReminder_63_Hand.translation: 点击你的生物来指定它为目标。

NPE/Game04/Turn06/ViperNang_10a.oracleText: Very clever, but you're just delaying the inevitable.
NPE/Game04/Turn06/ViperNang_10a.translation: 真狡猾，但你只不过在苟延残喘罢了。

NPE/Game04/Turn07/Sparky_08.oracleText: That's not dirty. It's totally allowed.
NPE/Game04/Turn07/Sparky_08.translation: 那才不叫不择手段。那是正当手段。

NPE/Game04/Turn07/ViperNang_11.oracleText: What's the matter? Losing your nerve?

NPE/Game04/Turn07/ViperNang_12.oracleText: Ha! You've fallen right into my trap.

NPE/Game04/Turn08/Interceptor_66.oracleText: Cast an instant spell to deal with the creatures attacking you.
NPE/Game04/Turn08/Interceptor_66.translation: 施放瞬间咒语来应对攻击你的生物。

NPE/Game04/Turn08/ViperNang_14.oracleText: I've got nothing. Really. I'm at your mercy.
NPE/Game04/Turn08/ViperNang_14.translation: 我甘拜下风。真的。现在只能任你宰割。

NPE/Game04/Turn08/ViperNang_15.oracleText: I've caught you with your guard down!

NPE/Game04/Turn08/ViperNang_15a.oracleText: Looks like you've let your guard down.

NPE/Game04/Turn09/ViperNang_16a.oracleText: Well, it's been fun, but your time is up.
NPE/Game04/Turn09/ViperNang_16a.translation: 我玩得很尽兴，但你的死期已到。

NPE/Game04/Turn10/ViperNang_21.oracleText: Didn't your folks teach you not to play with your food?
NPE/Game04/Turn10/ViperNang_21.translation: 没人教过你不要戏耍盘中餐吗？

NPE/Game04/Turn11/Sparky_11.oracleText: If you ever want to leave this place, now's the time.
NPE/Game04/Turn11/Sparky_11.translation: 如果你想离开这里，就趁现在。

NPE/Game04/Turn11/ViperNang_22.translation: 又一个沼泽！？真是太看不起人了！

NPE/Game04/Turn12/ViperNang_23.oracleText: Finally! You should have taken me down when you had a chance.
NPE/Game04/Turn12/ViperNang_23.translation: 终于！当你有机会时应该将我打倒。

NPE/Game05/End/BolasDefeat/NicolBolas_25.oracleText: As a gesture, I'll give you back what I stole. It means nothing to me...
NPE/Game05/End/BolasDefeat/NicolBolas_25.translation: 为表赞赏，我把我偷走的东西还给你。它对我毫无价值。

NPE/Game05/End/BolasDefeat/NicolBolas_26.oracleText: And do not dare cross my path again.
NPE/Game05/End/BolasDefeat/NicolBolas_26.translation: 再遇到我定要你付出代价。
