NPE/Game05/End/BolasVictory/NicolBolas_2.oracleText: But I'm sure I will find a use for you.
NPE/Game05/End/BolasVictory/NicolBolas_2.translation: 但我确定你以后会有用处。

NPE/Game05/Intro/NicolBolas_01.oracleText: I'll make a deal with you, planeswalker.
NPE/Game05/Intro/NicolBolas_01.translation: 我跟你做一笔交易吧，鹏洛客。

NPE/Game05/Intro/NicolBolas_02.oracleText: Defeat me and I'll let you go.
NPE/Game05/Intro/NicolBolas_02.translation: 如果我输了，我就放你自由。

NPE/Game05/Intro/NicolBolas_03.oracleText: Lose, and you will serve me for eternity.
NPE/Game05/Intro/NicolBolas_03.translation: 如果你输了，你就永生为仆。

NPE/Game05/Intro/Sparky_01.oracleText: I don't like this deal at all!
NPE/Game05/Intro/Sparky_01.translation: 我一点也不喜欢这交易！

NPE/Game05/Intro/Sparky_01b.oracleText: Do we even have a choice?

NPE/Game05/Turn01/Sparky_02.oracleText: Fight as if your life depended on it.

NPE/Game05/Turn010/BlockingReminder_73.oracleText: Choose your blockers, but keep your angel alive.
NPE/Game05/Turn010/BlockingReminder_73.translation: 选择你的阻挡者，但把天使保护好。

NPE/Game05/Turn010/Interceptor_74.oracleText: Block the dragon to clear the way for your angel.
NPE/Game05/Turn010/Interceptor_74.translation: 阻挡巨龙，为天使清除障碍。

NPE/Game05/Turn02/NicolBolas_05.oracleText: You look surprised... I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine.
NPE/Game05/Turn02/NicolBolas_05.translation: 你看起来很惊讶……我的事物随我处置。而今一切尽归我有。

NPE/Game05/Turn02/NicolBolas_05a.oracleText: The ends justify the means. And in the end, all are expendable.
NPE/Game05/Turn02/NicolBolas_05a.translation: 为达目的，不择手段。到头来，一切都能牺牲。

NPE/Game05/Turn02/PickReminder_67.oracleText: Discard a Plains card by clicking on one in your hand.
NPE/Game05/Turn02/PickReminder_67.translation: 点击手上的一张平原牌来弃掉它。

NPE/Game05/Turn02/PickReminder_67_Handhe.oracleText: Discard a plains card by touching one in your hand.
NPE/Game05/Turn02/PickReminder_67_Handhe.translation: 点击手上的一张平原牌来弃掉它。

NPE/Game05/Turn02/Sparky_03.oracleText: Sometimes you need to make a tough decision.
NPE/Game05/Turn02/Sparky_03.translation: 有时你必须做出艰难的选择。

NPE/Game05/Turn02/Sparky_04.oracleText: Did he just throw away a Dragon?!
NPE/Game05/Turn02/Sparky_04.translation: 他刚刚是弃掉了一条龙吗？！

NPE/Game05/Turn03/NicolBolas_06.oracleText: Everything here exists or perishes at my whim.
NPE/Game05/Turn03/NicolBolas_06.translation: 此间万物的存亡都由我定。

NPE/Game05/Turn03/NicolBolas_06a.oracleText: You pitiful efforts will not save you. It is folly to stand against me.
NPE/Game05/Turn03/NicolBolas_06a.translation: 你垂死挣扎也没用。反抗我是最蠢的事。

NPE/Game05/Turn04/NicolBolas_07.oracleText: Power is the only thing that matters. There is nothing else.
NPE/Game05/Turn04/NicolBolas_07.translation: 世间唯力量独尊。其他均不值一提。

NPE/Game05/Turn04/NicolBolas_07a.oracleText: Victory requires sacrifice.  I prefer the sacrifice of others
NPE/Game05/Turn04/NicolBolas_07a.translation: 有人牺牲才能胜利。而我偏好牺牲他人。

NPE/Game05/Turn05/NicolBolas_08.oracleText: I will let nothing stand in the way of what I seek – not even death!
NPE/Game05/Turn05/NicolBolas_08.translation: 我不会让任何事物阻挡我追寻目标～死亡也不行！

NPE/Game05/Turn05/NicolBolas_08a.oracleText: Mortality itself is mine to command.

NPE/Game05/Turn07/Interceptor_69.oracleText: You need to deal with your opponent's creature. Use a spell to destroy it.
NPE/Game05/Turn07/Interceptor_69.translation: 你需要处理对手的生物。利用咒语来消灭它。

NPE/Game05/Turn07/NicolBolas_11.oracleText: You have nothing, while I have everything!
NPE/Game05/Turn07/NicolBolas_11.translation: 你一无所有，而我无所不有！

NPE/Game05/Turn07/NicolBolas_13.oracleText: No matter. Soon there will be nothing left of you, either.
NPE/Game05/Turn07/NicolBolas_13.translation: 无所谓。反正你很快会一无所有。

NPE/Game05/Turn07/Sparky_06.oracleText: We just might be able to pull this off.
NPE/Game05/Turn07/Sparky_06.translation: 我们说不定可以打出这配合。

NPE/Game05/Turn08/NicolBolas_14.translation: 世间万物皆屈从于波拉斯。

NPE/Game05/Turn08/Sparky_07a.oracleText: He's not making this easy, is he?
NPE/Game05/Turn08/Sparky_07a.translation: 他是真不打算让你好过了，不是吗？

NPE/Game05/Turn08/Sparky_08.oracleText: Hold back so you can prepare for his attack.
NPE/Game05/Turn08/Sparky_08.translation: 别攻击，准备阻挡对方的攻势。

NPE/Game05/Turn09/BlockingReminder_70.oracleText: Choose your blockers. You may need multiple creatures and cards to take down that dragon.
NPE/Game05/Turn09/BlockingReminder_70.translation: 选择你的阻挡者。你可能需要多个生物和数张手牌才能击倒攻击的巨龙。

NPE/Game05/Turn09/Interceptor_71.oracleText: Cast a spell to deal with the creatures attacking you.
NPE/Game05/Turn09/Interceptor_71.translation: 施放咒语来应对攻击你的生物。

NPE/Game05/Turn09/Interceptor_72.oracleText: Use a multiple creatures to block the dragon so you can destroy it.
NPE/Game05/Turn09/Interceptor_72.translation: 利用多个生物来阻挡巨龙，好将其消灭。

NPE/Game05/Turn09/NicolBolas_17.oracleText: Congratulations. You're actually beginning to irritate me

NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_20.oracleText: Do you really think a mere angel will stop me?
NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_20.translation: 你真的以为区区一个天使就可以阻挡我？

NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_21.oracleText: My power is beyond that of a god.

NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_23.oracleText: My patience is wearing thin. Let's finish it.
NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_23.translation: 我已经没有耐心了。让我们做个了断吧。

NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_23a.oracleText: Such hubris to fight me, it cannot go unpunished.
NPE/Game05/Turn10/NicolBolas_23a.translation: 胆敢与我反抗，定将被我制裁。

NPE/Game05/Turn10/Sparky_10.oracleText: We've come this far, don't give up now!
NPE/Game05/Turn10/Sparky_10.translation: 好不容易来到这里，现在绝不能放弃！

NPE/Game05/Turn10/Sparky_10a.oracleText: He is posturing, you must really have him on the ropes.
NPE/Game05/Turn10/Sparky_10a.translation: 他只不过在虚张声势，你一定已将他逼到绝路了。

NPE/Intro/Sparky_02.oracleText: I was worried there for a minute.
NPE/Intro/Sparky_02.translation: 我还稍微担心了一会儿。

NPE/Intro/Sparky_03.oracleText: Looks like you barely survived your last battle, but with some training, you'll become a force to be reckoned with.
NPE/Intro/Sparky_03.translation: 虽然上次战斗你差点送命，但假以时日，我相信你的实力一定不容小觑。

NPE/Learn/idlechat_66.oracleText: You've got to learn to planeswalk before you can planes-run.
NPE/Learn/idlechat_66.translation: 说到穿越时空，你得先学走，再开始跑。

NPE/Learn/idlechat_67.oracleText: Ever think about the multiverse. Like... hey, that's wild.
NPE/Learn/idlechat_67.translation: 你了解过多重宇宙吗？那就像...嘿，可劲爆了。

NPE/Learn/idlechat_68.oracleText: Whoa! ... Oh, sorry. Thought I saw something...
NPE/Learn/idlechat_68.translation: 哇哦！...噢，抱歉。我以为看到了不得了的东西...

NPE/Learn/idlechat_69.oracleText: Oh no... I think I'm gonna' sneeze... False alarm.
NPE/Learn/idlechat_69.translation: 噢不...我还以为我要打喷嚏了...虚惊一场。

NPE/Learn/idlechat_71.oracleText: I think I'm allergic to waiting around.

NPE/Learn/idlechat_72_alt.oracleText: I think I'm allergic to waiting.(little laugh)
NPE/Learn/idlechat_72_alt.translation: 我可能是对等待过敏吧。（笑）

NPE/Learn/intro_56.oracleText: You'll find more helpful information over here.
NPE/Learn/intro_56.translation: 你能在这里找到许多有用的信息。

NPE/Learn/intro_57.oracleText: These links will help you dive in.
NPE/Learn/intro_57.translation: 这些链接能帮你了解万智牌。

NPE/Learn/intro_58.oracleText: It's jammed packed with expert information and strategy.
NPE/Learn/intro_58.translation: 这里面有丰富的专业信息与游戏策略。

NPE/Learn/intro_59.oracleText: Here's just a few of the many resources out there.
NPE/Learn/intro_59.translation: 而这不过是网上浩瀚信息的一小部分。

NPE/Learn/intro_60.oracleText: And you can always replay the tutorial.
NPE/Learn/intro_60.translation: 你还可以随时重温教程。

NPE/Mulligans/13.oracleText: At the beginning of the game, you can either keep your opening hand or "mulligan" it.
NPE/Mulligans/13.translation: 在游戏开始时，你可以选择保留起手牌或将其「再调度」。

NPE/Mulligans/14.oracleText: A mulligan lets you trade your hand for a new one, but you get one less card.
NPE/Mulligans/14.translation: 「再调度」能让你重新抓一副起手牌，但会比之前少一张。

NPE/Mulligans/16.oracleText: I'd recommend a mulligan if your hand has too many or too few lands.
NPE/Mulligans/16.translation: 我的建议是，如果你起手牌中的地牌数量过多或过少，就应该再调度。

NPE/Mulligans/17.oracleText: Keep hands with multiple lands and cards you can cast.
NPE/Mulligans/17.translation: 如果起手牌中地牌和可施放牌的数量均衡，便可保留。

NPE/Mulligans/20.oracleText: I also wouldn't suggest a mulligan if it would put you below four cards, no matter what.
NPE/Mulligans/20.translation: 我还有个忠告：无论如何都不要将起手牌再调度到低于四张。

NPE/Mulligans/24.oracleText: But you can mulligan for any reason you want.
NPE/Mulligans/24.translation: 不过你可以因为任何原因再调度。

NPE/Mulligans/25_Alt.oracleText: You can mulligan for any reason you want.
NPE/Mulligans/25_Alt.translation: 你可以因为任何原因再调度。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_04.oracleText: You got a quest! If you complete it, you'll get a reward.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_04.translation: 你获得一个任务！只要完成它，就能获得奖励。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_05.oracleText: Go here when you're ready to play a game.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_05.translation: 当你准备好游戏时就来这里。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_06.oracleText: But first you'll need to choose a deck.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_06.translation: 但首先你需要选一副套牌。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_06a.oracleText: First you'll need to choose a deck.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_06a.translation: 首先，你需要选一副套牌。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_07.oracleText: You can change your deck before each game.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Landing/Sparky_07.translation: 你可以在游戏开始前更换套牌。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Profile/Sparky_02.oracleText: It won't affect your games, and you can change it whenever you want.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Profile/Sparky_02.translation: 它不会影响你的游戏，而且你随时可以更换它。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Profile/customize_01.oracleText: And this is where you'll find options on how to customize your look.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Profile/customize_01.translation: 这里是可以自定义你角色外观的地方。

NPE/PLP/MS1/Profile/customize_02.oracleText: You can also choose your avatar and more.
NPE/PLP/MS1/Profile/customize_02.translation: 也可以选择你的头像和其他东西。

NPE/PLP/MS2/DuelScene/Sparky_02.oracleText: After each victory, your rank will improve.
NPE/PLP/MS2/DuelScene/Sparky_02.translation: 每次胜利后，你的排名都会提升。

NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_03.oracleText: Oooh, more quests! You'll get another one every day.
NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_03.translation: 噢噢，更多任务！你每天都会获得一个任务。

NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_04.oracleText: There's extra rewards for daily and weekly wins too.
NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_04.translation: 每天和每周获胜还有额外的奖励。

NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_05.oracleText: Golly, there's so much to look forward to.
NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_05.translation: 天哪，有好多值得期待的东西。

NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_05a.oracleText: Crikey! There is so much to look forward to.
NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_05a.translation: 哇塞，有好多值得期待的东西。

NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_05b.oracleText: Cor, there is so much to look forward to.
NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_05b.translation: 哎哟，有好多值得期待的东西。

NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_06.oracleText: Let's try to finish another quest.
NPE/PLP/MS2/Landing/Sparky_06.translation: 我们再来试着完成另一个任务。

NPE/PLP/MS3/Landing/Sparky_01.oracleText: You have enough gold for a booster!
NPE/PLP/MS3/Landing/Sparky_01.translation: 你的金币够换一包补充包了！

NPE/PLP/MS3/Landing/Sparky_01a.oracleText: Hey!  You have enough gold for a booster!
NPE/PLP/MS3/Landing/Sparky_01a.translation: 嘿！你的金币够换一包补充包了！

NPE/PLP/MS3/Landing/Sparky_02.oracleText: Let's go get one from the store.

NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_06.oracleText: I can't wait to find out what's inside. Open it!
NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_06.translation: 我已经等不及想要看看里面有什么了。快打开！

NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_06a.oracleText: Who knows what's inside? Only one way to find out.
NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_06a.translation: 谁会知道里面有什么？只有一种办法能揭晓。

NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_06b.oracleText: I can't wait to find out what's inside. Go on! Open it!
NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_06b.translation: 我已经等不及想要看看里面有什么了。快去！快打开！

NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_08.oracleText: Finish quests to earn more boosters and gold.
NPE/PLP/MS3/Packs/Sparky_08.translation: 完成任务以获得更多补充包和金币。

NPE/PLP/MS3/PurchasePack/Sparky_04.oracleText: There they are. One booster pack, please!
NPE/PLP/MS3/PurchasePack/Sparky_04.translation: 我们到了。请给我一包补充包！

NPE/PLP/MS3/PurchasePack/Sparky_05.oracleText: Let's go open your new booster pack.
NPE/PLP/MS3/PurchasePack/Sparky_05.translation: 我们打开你的新补充包吧。

NPE/PLP/MS3/PurchasePack/Sparky_05a.oracleText: Now let's go open that new booster pack.
NPE/PLP/MS3/PurchasePack/Sparky_05a.translation: 现在打开你的新补充包吧。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/Sparky_02.oracleText: You'll need to earn more gold to play in events.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/Sparky_02.translation: 你需要获得更多金币才能参加赛事。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_01.oracleText: This one is perfect for new planeswalkers.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_01.translation: 这个最适合新进鹏洛客了。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_02.oracleText: And you've got what you need to try it out now.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_02.translation: 现在你已经可以开始玩这个了。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_03.oracleText: If you want to try something new
NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_03.translation: 如果你想尝试一下新鲜玩意

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_04.oracleText: I'd suggest this one for you.

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_05.oracleText: You can even try it now, if you'd like.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_05.translation: 如果你想的话，现在就可以试试这个。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_08.oracleText: There's even events for fledgling planeswalkers.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Events/jumpIn_08.translation: 这里也有适合新进鹏洛客的赛事。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_01.oracleText: Look, special events! Each one is different.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_01.translation: 看，特殊赛事！每场赛事都不相同。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_03.oracleText: You can find events here too. Keep an eye out for new ones.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_03.translation: 你也可以在这里找到赛事。记得留意新赛事。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_04.oracleText: Well, it's been fun. I hope you stick around.
NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_04.translation: 真的很开心。希望你会留下来。

NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_05.translation: 鹏洛客，我们就此别过，祝你好运！

NPE/PLP/MS4/Landing/Sparky_05b.translation: 鹏洛客，希望我们后会有期！

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_03.oracleText: This is a great place for it.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_04.translation: 炼金赛制融合了很多东西。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_05.oracleText: Like Standard, it features the latest sets.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_05.translation: 像标准，只能使用最近几期的系列卡牌。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_06.translation: 你就像个爱冒险的——探险家，不是吗？

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_07.oracleText: Ah, the curious type, I like that.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_08.oracleText: Alchemy is a fresh take on the Standard format where some cards get rebalanced.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_08.translation: 炼金赛制是对标准赛制的全新改进尝试，其中一些卡得到了重新平衡。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_09.oracleText: This is the place for it.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_13.oracleText: If you were battling in Spark Ranked, that's the format you were playing! If you want to keep competing with those decks, play here.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroAlchemy_13.translation: If you were battling in Spark Ranked, that's the format you were playing! If you want to keep competing with those decks, play here.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroBrawl_02.oracleText: But first, you'll need to build a deck with a commander.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroBrawl_02.translation: 但首先你需要选一副有一位指挥官的套牌

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroBrawl_03.oracleText: Which can be your favorite legendary creature or planeswalker.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroBrawl_03.translation: 这可以是你最喜欢的传奇生物或鹏洛客。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_02.oracleText: Explorer is a non-rotating format that only uses cards from paper Magic.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_02.translation: Explorer is a non-rotating format that only uses cards from paper Magic.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_04.oracleText: Perfect! Explorer is made for you.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_04.translation: Perfect! Explorer is made for you.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_05.oracleText: It began with the dinosaurs of Ixalan...
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_05.translation: It began with the dinosaurs of Ixalan...

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_06.oracleText: And includes every Standard set since!
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_06.translation: And includes every Standard set since!

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_07.oracleText: Cards never rotate out of the Explorer format.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_07.translation: Cards never rotate out of the Explorer format.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_08.oracleText: And they've all been printed in paper!
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_08.translation: And they've all been printed in paper!

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_09.oracleText: Cards both old and new will be added to Explorer.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_09.translation: Cards both old and new will be added to Explorer.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_10.oracleText: Expanding it to both the past and the future!
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_10.translation: Expanding it to both the past and the future!

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_11.oracleText: Explorer is the perfect place to pioneer new strategies.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroExplorer_11.translation: Explorer is the perfect place to pioneer new strategies.

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_01.oracleText: While other formats focus on new cards, Historic is all about... well, History!
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_01.translation: 其他赛制专注于新牌，而史迹则是关于……嗯，历史！

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_02.oracleText: You can always play your old cards here.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_02.translation: 你总是可以在这里玩你的旧牌。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_03.oracleText: With so many options, the possibilities are endless.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_03.translation: 有这么多的选择，可能性是无穷无尽的。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_04.oracleText: Historic includes just about every card you can collect on Arena.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_04.translation: 史迹包含你可以在竞技场上收集的几乎全部卡片。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_05.oracleText: Old cards never go out of style here.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_05.translation: 旧牌在这里永远不会过时。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_06.oracleText: There's so many cards and combos and every kind of strategy too!
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_06.translation: 有这么多的卡牌和组合，也有各种策略！

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_07.oracleText: Cards never rotate out of the Historic format.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_07.translation: 卡牌永远不会脱离史迹赛制。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_08.oracleText: Which means there's so much more to do!
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_08.translation: 这意味着有这么多事情可做！

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_09.oracleText: There are so many cards to choose from...

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_11.oracleText: If you want to make history, this is the right format for you.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroHistoric_11.translation: 如果你想创造历史，这是适合你的赛制。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_01.translation: 这个模式称为标准模式。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_02.oracleText: Because its the most common way to play.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_02.translation: 因为这是最常见的游戏方式。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_03.oracleText: It only uses cards from the last couple of years, to keep things fresh.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_03.translation: 它只使用过去几年的卡牌，以保持新鲜感。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_05.oracleText: It's a great way to check out what's new.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_05.translation: 这是一个检查新事物的好办法。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_06.oracleText: New cards, new decks, new strategies.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_06.translation: 船新卡牌，船新构筑，船新策略。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroStandard_07.translation: 展现在你眼前的是多重宇宙！

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsExistin.oracleText: Whatever you played last time will show up here.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsExistin.translation: 你上一次游玩的模式会显示在这里。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsExistin.oracleText: Use the "Find Match" tab to try out a new format.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsExistin.translation: 使用“寻找对局”选项卡尝试新赛制。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsExistin.oracleText: Or the "Events" tab to see both Limited and Constructed events.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsExistin.translation: 或“赛事”选项卡查看限制和构筑赛事。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew01.oracleText: You can use the "Find Match" tab to find an opponent.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew01.translation: 你可以使用“寻找对局”选项卡来匹配对手。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew02.oracleText: Or try facing new opponents with the "Find Match" tab.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew02.translation: 或者尝试使用“寻找对局”选项卡寻找新对手。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew03.oracleText: Or use the "Events" tab to continue playing the Color Challenges.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew03.translation: 或使用“赛事”选项卡继续尝试颜色挑战。

NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew04.oracleText: You'll find the Color Challenges under the "Events" tab.
NPE/PLP/Playblade/sparkyIntroTabsNew04.translation: 你将在“赛事”选项卡下找到颜色挑战。

NPE/PLP/directplay_05.oracleText: If you know someone you want to play with, you can challenge them here.
NPE/PLP/directplay_05.translation: 如果你想跟好友切磋，可以在这里挑战对方。

NPE/PLP/directplay_06.oracleText: Challenge your friends with this button.
NPE/PLP/directplay_06.translation: 点此按钮向好友请求对战。

NPE/PLP/directplay_07.oracleText: You'll need to enter their full username below.
NPE/PLP/directplay_07.translation: 你需要在下方输入对方的完整用户名。

NPE/PLP/directplay_08.oracleText: Make sure to they enter your info too.
NPE/PLP/directplay_08.translation: 确保他们也如此输入你的信息。

NPE/PLP/learnpage_09.oracleText: Want to learn more? Come visit me at the learn page!
NPE/PLP/learnpage_09.translation: 想要深入钻研？来「精研技艺」页面找我吧！

NPE/PLP/learnpage_10.oracleText: Well, if you need anything else, I'll be over here.
NPE/PLP/learnpage_10.translation: 其实只要你想了解任何事情，都能在那里找到我。

NPE/PLP/learnpage_11.oracleText: Bye! You know where to find me.
NPE/PLP/learnpage_11.translation: 回见！你知道在哪儿可以找到我。

NPE/PLP/playmodetoggle_03.oracleText: This will let you toggle on all events.
NPE/PLP/playmodetoggle_03.translation: 这个开关能切换显示所有赛事。

NPE/PLP/playmodetoggle_04.oracleText: Click on this to reveal expert-level events.
NPE/PLP/playmodetoggle_04.translation: 点按此处来显示专家级赛事。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_173.oracleText: The big number on a planeswalker is its "loyalty".
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_173.translation: 鹏洛客上那个大大的数字便是他的「忠诚」。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_174.oracleText: Planeswalkers can use one of their abilities each turn.
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_174.translation: 鹏洛客每回合都能从自己的异能中选一个来使用。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_175.oracleText: Some abilities add loyalty, while others take it away.
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_175.translation: 有些异能会增加忠诚，有些则会消耗忠诚。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_176.oracleText: Planeswalkers can also be attacked, like a player, and when they take damage, their loyalty goes down.
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_176.translation: 鹏洛客跟牌手一样，也能被生物攻击；当鹏洛客受到伤害时，会移去等量的忠诚。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_177.oracleText: If a planeswalker runs out of loyalty, it'll disappear.
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_177.translation: 如果鹏洛客的忠诚降至零，它就会消失。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_178.oracleText: Planeswalkers are very powerful cards, so make it a priority to attack planeswalkers your opponents' control.
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_178.translation: 鹏洛客都异常强大，所以我们需要先专注于击败对手的鹏洛客。

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_179.oracleText: Don't let them use their ultimate ability!
NPE/PW/planeswalkers_179.translation: 千万不要让他们用出终极异能！

NPE/PW/planeswalkers_180.translation: 试着用生物攻击对手的鹏洛客。

NPE/QuestChain/colorNames_01.oracleText: It's two colors, Red and Green.

NPE/QuestChain/colorNames_02.oracleText: It's two colors, White and Blue.

NPE/QuestChain/colorNames_03.oracleText: It's two colors, Blue and Black.

NPE/QuestChain/colorNames_04.oracleText: It's two colors, Green and White.

NPE/QuestChain/colorNames_05.oracleText: It's two colors, Black and Red.

NPE/QuestChain/deckAll_01.translation: 你集齐了所有的十组套牌！

NPE/QuestChain/deckOne_01.oracleText: You just got a new deck!

NPE/QuestChain/deckOne_03.oracleText: You can complete your next quest by trying it out.
NPE/QuestChain/deckOne_03.translation: 你可以用他来完成你的下个挑战。

NPE/QuestChain/deckOne_04.oracleText: You just got a dualcolor deck!
NPE/QuestChain/deckOne_04.translation: 你刚刚获得了一副双色套牌！

NPE/QuestChain/deckOne_05.translation: 双色套牌由两种颜色的卡牌组成。

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_01.translation: 你得到了另一幅双色套牌！

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_02.oracleText: Keep completing quests and you'll get ten decks in total.
NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_02.translation: 继续完成任务你将获得总计十副套牌。

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_03.oracleText: You might have to wait until tomorrow for your next quest though, so come back then.
NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_03.translation: 你要等到明天（24小时后）才能完成下一个任务，稍后再回来吧。

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_04.translation: 明天见，来自神秘东方的鹏洛客！

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_05.translation: 你刚刚获得了另一副双色套牌！

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_06.oracleText: There are ten of these two-color decks you can get through quests.
NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_06.translation: 完成任务你总共可以获得十副双色套牌。

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_07.oracleText: I can't wait to see you again tomorrow.
NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_07.translation: 我等不及明天见到你啦~

NPE/QuestChain/deckTwo_08.oracleText: The cards just keep coming, don't they?

NPE/Rank/rankprofile_50.oracleText: You have two ranks - one for "Constructed" and one for "Limited".
NPE/Rank/rankprofile_50.translation: 你会有两个段位～「构筑」段位和「限制」段位。

NPE/Rank/rankprofile_51.oracleText: Your "Constructed" rank is affected by ranked games.
NPE/Rank/rankprofile_51.translation: 进行积分对战会影响你的「构筑」段位。

NPE/Rank/rankprofile_52.oracleText: While your "Limited" rank is tied to draft and sealed events.
NPE/Rank/rankprofile_52.translation: 而「限制」段位则由你轮抽和现开赛事的战绩决定。

NPE/Rank/rankprogress_42.translation: 胜利之后，会有少许提升。

NPE/Rank/rankprogress_43.oracleText: You can check on your rank in the profile too.
NPE/Rank/rankprogress_43.translation: 你也可以在个人档案中看到自己的段位。

NPE/Rank/rankup_47.oracleText: Hey Good Job! You've ranked up

NPE/Rank/seasonrewards_48.oracleText: You'll earn rewards based on your highest rank each season.
NPE/Rank/seasonrewards_48.translation: 赛季最后，你会获得你本赛季最高段位的奖励。

NPE/Rank/seasonrewards_49.oracleText: The higher the rank, the better the rewards.

NPE/Rank/sparkyIntroRank_01.oracleText: The competition can be fierce, but rewarding.
NPE/Rank/sparkyIntroRank_01.translation: 竞争可能很激烈，但也很有意义。

NPE/Rewards/NPE_Key_Tooltip.oracleText: Complete the tutorial to unlock 5 decks.
NPE/Rewards/NPE_Key_Tooltip.translation: 完成教程以解锁5个套牌。

NPE/Rewards/NPE_Locked_Card_Tooltip.oracleText: Continue playing to unlock more cards.
NPE/Rewards/NPE_Locked_Card_Tooltip.translation: 继续对局以解锁更多卡牌。

NPE/Social/featureSocial_01.oracleText: You can add new friends if you know their username or e-mail address.
NPE/Social/featureSocial_01.translation: 你可以在知道用户名或邮箱的情况下添加新好友。

NPE/Social/featureSocial_02.oracleText: Use this button to add a new friend.
NPE/Social/featureSocial_02.translation: 使用此按键添加新好友。

NPE/Social/featureSocial_03.oracleText: You'll need to know their exact username.
NPE/Social/featureSocial_03.translation: 你需要知道它们的准确用户名。

NPE/Social/featureSocial_04.oracleText: You can also chat with your friends.
NPE/Social/featureSocial_04.translation: 你也能和你的好友们聊天。

NPE/Social/featureSocial_05.oracleText: Is there anyone you want to add now?

NPE/Social/introSocial_01.oracleText: Down here is your Friends list.

NPE/Social/introSocial_02.oracleText: This is where you'll find your friends.

NPE/Sparky/badeffect_130.oracleText: I should have seen that coming.

NPE/Sparky/goodeffect_127.oracleText: You're going to have to teach me that one.
NPE/Sparky/goodeffect_127.translation: 你得教教我是怎么做到的。

NPE/Sparky/idlechat_122.oracleText: I'm feeling like this is going to be a win.

NPE/Sparky/idlechat_123.oracleText: Stick with me and we can't lose!
NPE/Sparky/idlechat_123.translation: 我们团结一致，就绝不会输！

NPE/Timers/27.oracleText: In practice matches you can take as much time as you'd like.
NPE/Timers/27.translation: 在练习对局中，你耗费多少时间都没关系。

NPE/Timers/28.oracleText: When you play with other people, you'll only have about a minute to take your turn.
NPE/Timers/28.translation: 但你与其他牌手对战时，每回合大概只有一分钟的时间。

NPE/Timers/29.oracleText: So now might be a good time to practice playing quickly.
NPE/Timers/29.translation: 所以请利用现在，来熟悉快速游戏的节奏。

NPE/Timers/30.oracleText: If the timer runs out, your turn will be over.
NPE/Timers/30.translation: 如果计时器走完，你的回合就结束了。

NPE/Timers/32.oracleText: (oh) That means you're running out of time.

NPE/Wildcards/34.translation: 嘿，你获得了一张万用牌！

NPE/Wildcards/36.oracleText: You can redeem wildcards for any card of the same rarity.
NPE/Wildcards/36.translation: 你可以将万用牌兑换成相同稀有度的任何牌张。

NPE/Wildcards/37.oracleText: Go to the deckbuilder to use your wildcards.
NPE/Wildcards/37.translation: 现在就去套牌构筑界面使用万用牌吧。

NPE/Wildcards/39.oracleText: Looking for a specific card? That's what wildcards are for.
NPE/Wildcards/39.translation: 你是正缺某张牌吗？万用牌能满足你的需要。

NPE/Wildcards/craftAll_01.oracleText: The 'Craft All' button makes it easy to use them.
NPE/Wildcards/craftAll_01.translation: “合成全部”按钮使它们易于使用。

New items have been added to your collec.oracleText: New items have been added to your collection!
New items have been added to your collec.translation: 新物品已加入你的牌张收藏！

Notification/Channel/Main_Default_Body.oracleText: General notifications from Magic the Gathering: Arena.

Notification/Channel/Main_High_Body.oracleText: Alerts from Magic the Gathering: Arena.

Notification/Channel/News_Body.oracleText: News and updates about Magic the Gathering: Arena.
Notification/Channel/News_Body.translation: 关于万智牌竞技场的新闻和更新。

Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.oracleText: Unlock a new Black and Red deck by completing your latest quest.
Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.translation: 完成新任务来解锁一个新红黑套牌。

Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.oracleText: Unlock the final five decks by completing one more quest.
Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.translation: 完成一个或多个任务来解锁最后5个套牌。

Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.oracleText: Unlock a new Green and White deck by completing your latest quest.
Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.translation: 完成新任务来解锁一个新白绿套牌。

Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.oracleText: Unlock a new Red and Green deck by completing your latest quest.
Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.translation: 完成新任务来解释一个新红绿套牌。

Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.oracleText: Unlock a new Blue and Black deck by completing your latest quest.
Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.translation: 完成新任务来解释一个新蓝黑套牌。

Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.oracleText: Unlock a new White and Blue deck by completing your latest quest.
Notification/Notification_ColorChallenge.translation: 完成新任务来解释一个新白蓝套牌。

NumberOfInstantAndSorceryCardsInGraveyar.oracleText: Instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard: {quantity}
NumberOfInstantAndSorceryCardsInGraveyar.translation: 你坟墓场中的法术和瞬间牌总数为：{quantity}

PlayBlade/Filters/Default/ColorChallenge.oracleText: Walk the path of a famed planeswalker to grow your knowledge in each of the five colors of Magic.
PlayBlade/Filters/Default/ColorChallenge.translation: 踏上一名著名鹏洛客的旅程来增长你对万智牌5种颜色中各种颜色的了解。

PlayBlade/Filters/Default/Constructed_De.oracleText: Bring a deck constructed from the cards of your choice and see how it stacks up against other players'.
PlayBlade/Filters/Default/Constructed_De.translation: 带上由你选择的卡牌构筑成的套牌，用它们与其它玩家对战。

PlayBlade/Filters/Default/Limited_Desc.oracleText: Draft or build a deck from a limited pool of cards that you'll get at the start of one of these events.
PlayBlade/Filters/Default/Limited_Desc.translation: 轮抽或者仅使用赛事开始时从限制牌池中获得的卡牌来构筑套牌。

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/ArenaOpenDescr.oracleText: Play in either Best-of-1 or Best-of-3 Events to Qualify for Day 2!
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/ArenaOpenDescr.translation: Play in either Best-of-1 or Best-of-3 Events to Qualify for Day 2!

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/ChromaticCubeD.oracleText: In the Chromatic Cube, not only are the decks splashy, but the colors are too!
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/ChromaticCubeD.translation: 在 Chromatic Cube 中，不仅牌组很引人注目，而且颜色也很引人注目！

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/KhansofTarkirE.oracleText: Khans of Tarkir Limited Format Events

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/LCILimitedTitl.oracleText: The Lost Caverns of Ixalan Limited

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/LTRLimitedTitl.oracleText: The Lord of The Rings Limited

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/NewPlayerDescr.oracleText: These Events are great for both New and Long Time Players!  Click into an Event to learn more about it!
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/NewPlayerDescr.translation: 这些赛事适合新玩家游玩！点击其中一个赛事了解详情！

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/ONELimitedTitl.oracleText: Phyrexia: All will be One Limited
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/ONELimitedTitl.translation: 非瑞克西亚：万界归一限制赛

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/PremierPlayDes.oracleText: Top Prize in these regular events include Play-In Points.  Earn 20 Play-In Points for Free Entry into Monthly Play-In Events!
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/PremierPlayDes.translation: 这些常规赛事包含入围赛积分。使用20个入围赛积分可以免费进入每月的RPTQ！

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/RankedDescript.oracleText: Looking to Climb your way up the Ladder?  These Events can earn you rewards along with your Rank!
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/RankedDescript.translation: 想要获得提升吗？这些赛事的奖励会随着你的技能提升而提升！

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/SETLimitedDesc.oracleText: Put your Limited skill to the test!
This Week's Shadows of the Past: Creature Type Terror!
PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/SETLimitedDesc.translation: This Week's Shadows of the Past: Creature Type Terror!

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/SETLimitedDesc.oracleText: This Week's Shadows of the Past: Fatal Flashback!

PlayBlade/Filters/Dynamic/SETLimitedDesc.oracleText: This Week's Shadows of the Past: Morbid and Macabre!

Rank/MustPlayGameWarning.oracleText: You must play a game this season to receive your season rewards.

Rank/Spark_Ranked.oracleText: Win more games in Spark Ranked to rank up and earn rewards.
Rank/Spark_Ranked.translation: 在火花段位赛中赢得更多比赛，提升你的排名并获得更多的奖励。

ReminderText_Class.oracleText: (Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
ReminderText_Class.translation: (获得下一等级便能新增相应异能，只能于法术时机如此作)

ReminderText_Saga.oracleText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step add a lore counter. Sacrifice after {lastSagaChapter}.)
ReminderText_Saga.translation: 于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到{lastSagaChapter}后牺牲之。

ReminderText_TransformSaga.oracleText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
ReminderText_TransformSaga.translation: (于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。)

Renewal/ArrivedRenewal_Timing.translation: 多明纳里亚：众志成城在这里。

Renewal/UpcomingRenewal_MainSubTitle.oracleText: You will receive a gift this Renewal Season.
Renewal/UpcomingRenewal_MainSubTitle.translation: 你将在此焕新赛季中获得一份礼物。

Renewal/UpcomingRenewal_Timing.oracleText: Opens when Wilds of Eldraine releases in September.
Renewal/UpcomingRenewal_Timing.translation: 到九月份艾卓幻野发售时可以打开。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle1.translation: 多明纳里亚：众志成城即将到来。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle2.oracleText: Every fall, Alchemy playable cards rotate.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle2.translation: 每年秋季，炼金赛制的可用卡牌会轮替。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle3.oracleText: Every fall, cards in the Alchemy format rotate.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle3.translation: 每年秋季，炼金赛制的可用卡牌会轮替。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4.oracleText: These sets will only be playable in non-rotating modes, like Historic and Explorer.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4.translation: 这些系列将只能在非轮转模式下游玩，如史迹和探险。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt1.oracleText: These sets will be playable only in Open Play or Historic play modes.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt1.translation: 这些系列将会只在公开匹配和史迹模式中可用。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt2.oracleText: These sets will be playable only in Rotated Play or Historic play modes.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt2.translation: 这些系列将会只在轮转模式或史迹模式中可用。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt4.oracleText: These sets will not be playable in Alchemy.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt4.translation: 这些系列将无法继续在炼金赛制使用。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt5.oracleText: These sets will not be playable in Alchemy play modes.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt5.translation: 这些系列将无法继续在炼金对战模式使用。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt6.oracleText: These sets will continue to be available in Standard.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Alt6.translation: 这些系列在标准赛制中仍能继续使用。

Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Old.oracleText: These sets will be playable only in Historic play modes.
Renewal/UpcomingRotation_SubTitle4_Old.translation: 这些系列只能在史迹模式中使用。

RestrictedAnnouncement/Restricted_Craft_.oracleText: This card is on the Restricted List. Are you sure you want to craft beyond the number of copies allowed in this format?
RestrictedAnnouncement/Restricted_Craft_.translation: This card is on the Restricted List. Are you sure you want to craft beyond the number of copies allowed in this format?

Social/Challenge/Request_Message.oracleText: {playerName} is challenging you to a match!

Social/Chat/SpamHint.oracleText: You are sending messages too quickly

Social/Errors/Wizards/AlreadFriends/Body.oracleText: You are already friends with this person. Hooray!
Social/Errors/Wizards/AlreadFriends/Body.translation: 你已经是这个人的朋友了。万岁！

Social/Errors/Wizards/CannotFriendSelf/B.oracleText: You're pretty neat, but you can't be friends with yourself in our system.
Social/Errors/Wizards/CannotFriendSelf/B.translation: 你很整洁，但在我们的系统里你不能和自己做朋友。

Social/Errors/Wizards/FriendLimit/Body.oracleText: Either you or the friend you are trying to add have reached the current limit.
Social/Errors/Wizards/FriendLimit/Body.translation: 你或你想添加的朋友的好友列表已达上限。

Social/Friends/ConnectionState/Offline_T.oracleText: Offline — Go online to see your friends.
Social/Friends/ConnectionState/Offline_T.translation: 离线 — 上线去找你的好友吧。

Social/Friends/Prompt/ConfirmBlock/Body.oracleText: Do you really want to block {displayName}?

Social/Friends/Prompt/RemoveFriend/Body.oracleText: Do you really want to remove {displayName} from your friends list?
Social/Friends/Prompt/RemoveFriend/Body.translation: 你真的要从你的好友列表中删除{displayName}吗？

Social/Friends/Prompt/RemoveFriend_Faile.oracleText: Unable to remove friend. Please try again later.
Social/Friends/Prompt/RemoveFriend_Faile.translation: 无法移除好友。请稍后再试。

Social/Friends/UI/Errors/InvitePrompt/In.oracleText: Invalid Display Name or email address. Please check your spelling and try again.
Social/Friends/UI/Errors/InvitePrompt/In.translation: 显示名称或电子邮件无效。请检查拼写，然后重试。

Social/Friends/UI/Subheader/InvitePrompt.oracleText: Input your friend's display name or email address below.
Social/Friends/UI/Subheader/InvitePrompt.translation: 在下方输入好友的显示名称或电子邮件。

Social/Settings/Toggle_DisabledDiscordTo.oracleText: Discord Rich Presence integration has been temporarily disabled for all players. Click here to open the MTG Arena status page for more information.
Social/Settings/Toggle_DisabledDiscordTo.translation: Discord Rich Presence集成已暂时对所有牌手停用。欲了解详情，请点击此处访问MTG竞技场状态页面。

Social/Settings/Toggle_DiscordTooltip.oracleText: When enabled, this allows Discord users you are friends with or share a server with to see details about your game activity, and will allow your Discord friends to ask to join you for a Direct Challenge match.
Social/Settings/Toggle_DiscordTooltip.translation: 启用后，你在Discord上面的好友或同服务器的其他用户便能看到你的详细游戏活动状态，同时允许你在Discord上面的好友向你发出直接对战请求。

SystemMessage/ChangeCurrencyInSettings.oracleText: Set your currency selection in View Account.
SystemMessage/ChangeCurrencyInSettings.translation: 可在「查看帐户」中设置货币选项。

SystemMessage/Deeplink_PageNotAccessible.oracleText: The page you are trying to reach is not accessible
SystemMessage/Deeplink_PageNotAccessible.translation: 您尝试访问的页面无法访问

SystemMessage/Event_Payout.oracleText: {publicEventName} has ended. Any earned prizes have been awarded.

SystemMessage/InvalidDeckChangeFormat_Bo.oracleText:
This deck is currently set to <color="red">{0}</color>.

Would you like to change the format of this deck to <color="red">{1}</color>?
SystemMessage/InvalidDeckChangeFormat_Bo.translation:
该套牌当前设置为<color="red">{0}</color>

您想将此套牌的赛制更改为<color="red">{1}</color>吗？

SystemMessage/MatchDown.oracleText: The match system has been taken down for scheduled downtime. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. Players will no longer be able to start matches until after the downtime is complete.
SystemMessage/MatchDown.translation: 对局系统已关闭以进行例行停机维护。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手将无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/MatchDownTime15.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled match downtime in 15 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. Players will no longer be able to start matches until after the downtime is complete.
SystemMessage/MatchDownTime15.translation: 我们将在15分钟后关闭系统以进行例行对局维护。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手将无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/MatchDownTime30.translation: 我们将在30分钟后关闭系统以进行例行对局维护。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手将无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/MatchDownTime5.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled match downtime in 5 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. Players will no longer be able to start matches until after the downtime is complete.
SystemMessage/MatchDownTime5.translation: 我们将在5分钟后关闭系统以进行例行对局维护。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手将无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/MatchDownTime60.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled match downtime in 60 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. Players will no longer be able to start matches until after the downtime is complete.
SystemMessage/MatchDownTime60.translation: 我们将在60分钟后关闭系统以进行例行对局维护。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手将无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/MatchUp.oracleText: We have restored the ability to play in matches. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service.
SystemMessage/MatchUp.translation: 现已能重新参加对局。如果你在游戏过程仍遇到问题，请联系客户服务。

SystemMessage/Message_User_Fulfillment_E.oracleText: Error fulfilling order {orderNumber}. Please contact Customer Service.
SystemMessage/Message_User_Fulfillment_E.translation: 完成订单{orderNumber}时出现错误。请联系客户服务。

SystemMessage/Message_User_Redemption_Er.oracleText: Error redeeming code. Please contact Customer Service.
SystemMessage/Message_User_Redemption_Er.translation: 兑换代码时出现错误。请联系客户服务。

SystemMessage/ParameterizedMessageTest.oracleText: This is my system message to player {playerId} who is over {powerLevel} and likes to eat {eats}. Thanks for playing {playerId}!";
SystemMessage/ParameterizedMessageTest.translation: 这是我给牌手{playerId}的系统信息，对方已超过{powerLevel}级，喜欢品尝{eats}。感谢畅玩，{playerId}！";

SystemMessage/PurchaseSkinFailureText.oracleText: Unable to purchase card style. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/PurchaseSkinFailureText.translation: 无法购买卡牌样式。请再试一次。

SystemMessage/SystemDownTime30_0.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled downtime in 30 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. Players will no longer be able to start matches until after the downtime is complete.
SystemMessage/SystemDownTime30_0.translation: 我们将在30分钟后关闭系统以进行例行维护。欲了解详情，请访问 https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手都无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/SystemDownTime60_0.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled downtime in 60 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. Players will no longer be able to start matches until after the downtime is complete.
SystemMessage/SystemDownTime60_0.translation: 我们将在60分钟后关闭系统以进行例行维护。欲了解详情，请访问 https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。在维护完成之前，牌手都无法开始对局。

SystemMessage/SystemDownTime65_60.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled downtime in 65 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. 60 minutes prior to downtime, players will not be able to start new matches or log in.
SystemMessage/SystemDownTime65_60.translation: 我们将在65分钟后关闭系统以进行例行维护。欲了解详情，请访问 https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。维护开始前60分钟，牌手便无法开始新对局或登录游戏。

SystemMessage/SystemDownTime90_60.oracleText: We will be bringing the system down for scheduled downtime in 90 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information. 60 minutes prior to downtime, players will not be able to start new matches or log in.
SystemMessage/SystemDownTime90_60.translation: 我们将在90分钟后关闭系统以进行例行维护。欲了解详情，请访问 https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。维护开始前60分钟，牌手便无法开始新对局或登录游戏。

SystemMessage/System_Access_Denied_Permi.oracleText: Please wait or check online for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Access_Denied_Permi.translation: 请稍后再试或咨询客服以了解更多信息。

SystemMessage/System_Asset_Error_Body.oracleText: Arena will relaunch to verify asset contents.
SystemMessage/System_Asset_Error_Body.translation: 将重新启动《竞技场》来验证资源内容。

SystemMessage/System_ClientMessageParseE.oracleText: There was a problem when communicating with the server.
SystemMessage/System_ClientMessageParseE.translation: 与服务器进行通信时出现问题。

SystemMessage/System_Client_Restart.oracleText: An update is available. Please restart MTG Arena.
SystemMessage/System_Client_Restart.translation: 有可用更新。请重新启动MTG竞技场。

SystemMessage/System_Collection_Get_Erro.oracleText: Unable to get collection. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Collection_Get_Erro.translation: 无法取得收藏。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Confirm_ExitGame_Te.oracleText: Would you like to exit and close the game?
SystemMessage/System_Confirm_ExitGame_Te.translation: 你想要退出并关闭游戏吗？

SystemMessage/System_Confirm_LogOut_Text.oracleText: Would you like to log out of your account?
SystemMessage/System_Confirm_LogOut_Text.translation: 你想要登出你的帐号吗？

SystemMessage/System_Connection_Lost_Tex.oracleText: You have lost your connection to the server.
SystemMessage/System_Connection_Lost_Tex.translation: 你与服务器的连接已中断。

SystemMessage/System_Constructed_Disable.oracleText: All Constructed events have been taken offline while we investigate an issue. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Constructed_Disable.translation: 在调查问题期间，所有构筑赛事均已下线。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Constructed_Restore.oracleText: Constructed events are back online. If you experience any issues with a Constructed event, contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Constructed_Restore.translation: 构筑赛事已重新上线。如果你在进行构筑赛事时遇到问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Add_Error_Text.oracleText: Add to inventory failed. Maximum number of decks reached.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Add_Error_Text.translation: 添加到库存失败。已达到最大套牌数。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Creation_Failu.oracleText: Deck creation failed. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Creation_Failu.translation: 创建套牌失败。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Deletion_Failu.oracleText: Unable to delete deck. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Deletion_Failu.translation: 无法删除套牌。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Import_Error_T.oracleText: Deck import failed with the following message:
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Import_Error_T.translation: 导入套牌失败，错误信息如下：

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Insufficient_O.oracleText: You cannot add {quantity} copies of this version of the card "{cardName}" because you only have {ownedQuantity} in your collection."
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Insufficient_O.translation: 你无法将{quantity}张此版本的「{cardName}」加入套牌当中，因为你收藏中仅有{ownedQuantity}张。"

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Comman.oracleText: The following card is not a valid commander: {cardName}
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Comman.translation: 以下卡牌不是可用的指挥官: {cardName}

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Compan.oracleText: The following card is not a valid companion: {cardName}
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Compan.translation: 以下卡牌不是可用的行侣: {cardName}

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Input_.oracleText: The input string contains an invalid line: {line}
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Input_.translation: 输入的字符串中含有无效行：{line}

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Mainde.oracleText: The following card is not valid in the deck: {cardName}
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Mainde.translation: 以下卡牌在套牌中无效：{cardName}

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Sectio.oracleText: The input string contains more than two sections (main, sideboard).
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Invalid_Sectio.translation: 输入的字符串中含有多于两个部分：（主牌，备牌）。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Limit_Reached.oracleText: Maximum number of decks reached.  Please delete decks until you have fewer than {deckLimit}.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Limit_Reached.translation: 套牌数量已达到最大值。请删除套牌，直到其数量少于{deckLimit}为止。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_No_Owned_Cards.oracleText: You cannot add {quantity} copies of this version of the card "{cardName}" because you don't have any in your collection.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_No_Owned_Cards.translation: 因为你收藏中没有「{cardName}」这张牌，因此无法将{quantity}张该牌加入你的套牌。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Submit_Error_T.oracleText: Unable to submit deck. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Submit_Error_T.translation: 无法提交套牌。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Unknown_Card_E.oracleText: The input string contains an unknown card title: {cardName}
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Unknown_Card_E.translation: 输入的字符串中含有未知牌名：{cardName}

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Unknown_Non-Pr.oracleText: The input string contains an unfound non-premium card title: {cardName}
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Unknown_Non-Pr.translation: 输入的字符串中含有未找到的非闪卡名称：{cardName}

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Unknown_Non-Pr.oracleText: The input string contains an unfound non-premium card title with expansion code: {cardName} ({setCode})
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Unknown_Non-Pr.translation: 输入的字符串中含有未找到的具此系列代码的非闪卡名称：{cardName}（{setCode}）

SystemMessage/System_Deck_Update_Failure.oracleText: Unable to update deck. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Deck_Update_Failure.translation: 无法更新套牌。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Decks_Get_Error_Tex.oracleText: Unable to get decks. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Decks_Get_Error_Tex.translation: 无法获取套牌。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Decks_Get_Failure_T.oracleText: Unable to get decks. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Decks_Get_Failure_T.translation: 无法获取套牌。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Disable_Autosuggest.oracleText: This will turn off automatic land suggestion. Continue?
SystemMessage/System_Disable_Autosuggest.translation: 这会关闭自动配地建议。要继续吗？

SystemMessage/System_DownForMaintenance.translation: 游戏服务器因维护而关闭。

SystemMessage/System_Draft_Disabled.oracleText: Drafts have been taken offline while we investigate an issue. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Draft_Disabled.translation: 在调查问题期间，所有轮抽赛事均已下线。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Draft_Pick_Error_Te.oracleText: Unable to make draft pick. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Draft_Pick_Error_Te.translation: 无法抽选牌张。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Draft_Restored.oracleText: Drafts are back online. If you experience any issues with drafting, contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Draft_Restored.translation: 轮抽赛事已重新上线。如果你在进行轮抽赛事时遇到问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Draft_Status_Get_Er.oracleText: Unable to get draft progress. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Draft_Status_Get_Er.translation: 无法取得轮抽进度。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.oracleText: The system will be taken offline for emergency maintenance in 15 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.translation: 系统需要进行紧急维护，游戏服务器将在15分钟后关闭。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.oracleText: The system will be taken offline for emergency maintenance in 30 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.translation: 系统需要进行紧急维护，游戏服务器将在30分钟后关闭。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.oracleText: The system will be taken offline for emergency maintenance in 5 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.translation: 系统需要进行紧急维护，游戏服务器将在5分钟后关闭。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.oracleText: The system will be taken offline for emergency maintenance in 60 minutes. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_EmergencyMaintenanc.translation: 系统需要进行紧急维护，游戏服务器将在60分钟后关闭。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Enter_Payment_Info_.oracleText: Please continue after entering payment information
SystemMessage/System_Enter_Payment_Info_.translation: 请在输入支付信息后继续

SystemMessage/System_Event_Deck_Submit_E.oracleText: Unable to submit deck. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Deck_Submit_E.translation: 无法提交套牌。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Draft_Commenc.oracleText: Unable to start draft. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Draft_Commenc.translation: 无法开始轮抽。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Draft_Complet.oracleText: Unable to finish draft. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Draft_Complet.translation: 无法完成轮抽。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Drop_Error_Te.oracleText: Unable to resign from event. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Drop_Error_Te.translation: 无法退出赛事。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Join_Error_Te.oracleText: Unable to join event. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Join_Error_Te.translation: 无法参加赛事。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Match_Active_.oracleText: Unable to get event active match. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Match_Active_.translation: 无法获取赛事当前对局。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Matches_Activ.oracleText: Unable to get event active matches. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Matches_Activ.translation: 无法获取赛事当前对局。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Pay_Error_Tex.oracleText: Unable to pay event entry. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Pay_Error_Tex.translation: 无法支付赛事报名费。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Prize_Claim_E.oracleText: Unable to claim prize. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Prize_Claim_E.translation: 无法领取奖品。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Progress_Get_.oracleText: Unable to get event progress. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Progress_Get_.translation: 无法获取赛事进度。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Queue_Join_Er.oracleText: Unable to join queue. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Queue_Join_Er.translation: 无法加入队列。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Queue_Leave_E.oracleText: Unable to leave queue. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Queue_Leave_E.translation: 无法离开队列。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Queue_Status_.oracleText: Unable to get queue status. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Queue_Status_.translation: 无法取得队列状态。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Rank_Get_Erro.oracleText: Unable to get rank. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Rank_Get_Erro.translation: 无法取得排名。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Event_Refund.oracleText: Players affected by the recent event problem will have their event entry returned to them. Please allow up to 7 days for this to be processed.
SystemMessage/System_Event_Refund.translation: 受近期赛事问题影响的牌手将获得报名费退款。整个退款流程至多可能需要7天才能完成，敬请耐心等待。

SystemMessage/System_Events_All_Disabled.oracleText: All events have been taken offline while we investigate an issue. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Events_All_Disabled.translation: 在调查问题期间，所有赛事均已下线。欲了解详情，请访问 https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Events_All_Restored.oracleText: Events are back online. If you experience any issues with an event, contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Events_All_Restored.translation: 赛事已重新上线。如果你在进行赛事时遇到问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_FrontDoor_InternalE.translation: 鉴权期间发生服务器错误。

SystemMessage/System_FrontDoor_UserLimit.oracleText: Server is full.  Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_FrontDoor_UserLimit.translation: 服务器已满。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Generic_CriticalErr.oracleText: An error occurred. Please restart or exit the application.
SystemMessage/System_Generic_CriticalErr.translation: 发生错误。请重新启动或退出应用程序。

SystemMessage/System_Generic_Noncritical.oracleText: An error occurred. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Generic_Noncritical.translation: 发生错误。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Handle_Error_With_R.oracleText: Error during {requestType} with error {errorMessage} and response code {responseCode}
SystemMessage/System_Handle_Error_With_R.translation: {requestType}期间发生错误，错误信息是{errorMessage}，回应码为{responseCode}

SystemMessage/System_Insufficient_Gems_S.oracleText: You do not have enough gems for this purchase.  The store is currently disabled, but you can buy gems when it is reenabled.
SystemMessage/System_Insufficient_Gems_S.translation: 宝石数量不足，无法完成此次购买。商店当前不可用，请等到商店恢复之后再回来购买宝石。

SystemMessage/System_Insufficient_Gems_T.oracleText: You do not have enough gems for this purchase.  Would you like to purchase gems?
SystemMessage/System_Insufficient_Gems_T.translation: 宝石数量不足，无法完成此次购买。需要购买宝石吗？

SystemMessage/System_Insufficient_Roles.oracleText: Your client version isn't currently available.
SystemMessage/System_Insufficient_Roles.translation: 你的客户端版本当前不可用。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.oracleText: An update is required for compatibility. Please run MTGALauncher.exe to update to the latest version of MTG Arena and log in again.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.translation: 由于兼容性问题需要更新。请使用MTGALauncher.exe更新到最新版本的MTGA并重新登录。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.oracleText: An update is required for compatibility. Please use the Epic Games Launcher to update to the latest version of MTG Arena and log in again.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.translation: 由于兼容性问题需要更新。请使用 Epic Games Launcher 更新到最新版本的MTGA并重新登录。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.oracleText: An update is required for compatibility. Please visit your app store to update to the latest MTG Arena app and log in again.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.translation: 由于兼容性问题需要更新。请访问应用商店以更新到最新版本的MTGA并重新登录。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.oracleText: An update is required for compatibility. Please use the {service} to update to the latest version of MTG Arena and log in again.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.translation: 由于兼容性问题需要更新。请使用{service}更新到最新版本的MTGA并重新登录。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.oracleText: An update is required for compatibility. Please use the Steam client to update to the latest version of MTG Arena and log in again.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Client_Vers.translation: 由于兼容性问题需要更新。请使用Steam客户端更新到最新版本的MTGA并重新登录。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Redemption_.oracleText: Banned cards cannot be crafted using wildcards.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Redemption_.translation: 禁用牌无法由万用牌合成而成。

SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Redemption_.oracleText: This card cannot be crafted using wildcards.
SystemMessage/System_Invalid_Redemption_.translation: 此牌无法由万用牌合成而成。

SystemMessage/System_Inventory_Get_Error.oracleText: Unable to get inventory. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Inventory_Get_Error.translation: 无法获取库存。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Investigating.oracleText: We are aware of the current issues and are working on a solution. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for updates.
SystemMessage/System_Investigating.translation: 我们已经知悉此问题，并正在努力解决。欲获取最新信息，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Ladder_Join_Error_T.oracleText: Unable to join ladder. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Ladder_Join_Error_T.translation: 无法加入天梯。请稍后再试。

SystemMessage/System_Limited_Disabled.oracleText: All Limited events have been taken offline while we investigate an issue. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Limited_Disabled.translation: 在调查问题期间，所有限制赛事均已下线。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Limited_Restored.oracleText: Limited events are back online. If you experience any issues with a Limited event, contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Limited_Restored.translation: 限制赛事已重新上线。如果你在进行限制赛事时遇到问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_15.oracleText: Scheduled downtime will begin in 15 minutes. Players can no longer create games or log in. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_15.translation: 将在15分钟后进行例行停机维护。届时牌手将无法创建游戏或登录。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_30.oracleText: Scheduled downtime will begin in 30 minutes. Players can no longer create games or log in. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_30.translation: 将在30分钟后进行例行停机维护。届时牌手将无法创建游戏或登录。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_5.oracleText: Scheduled downtime will begin in 5 minutes. Players can no longer create games or log in. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_5.translation: 将在5分钟后进行例行停机维护。届时牌手将无法创建游戏或登录。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_60.oracleText: Scheduled downtime will begin in 60 minutes. In 30 minutes, players will no longer be able to create games or log in. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_60.translation: 将在60分钟后进行例行停机维护。届时牌手将无法创建游戏或登录。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_AB_1_Up.oracleText: A required update is available. We will be disabling new matches in 10 minutes for those who have not updated.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_AB_1_Up.translation: 强制更新现已可以下载。10分钟后，尚未更新游戏之牌手的新建对战功能将被停用。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_AB_2_Di.oracleText: A required update is available. We are now disabling new matches for those who have not updated.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_AB_2_Di.translation: 强制更新现已可以下载。尚未更新游戏之牌手的新建对战功能现已停用。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_AB_3_Fi.oracleText: A required update is available. Your client will be disconnected in 10 minutes and you will need to update to the latest version of MTG Arena.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_AB_3_Fi.translation: 强制更新现已可以下载。现有版本的客户端将在10分钟后断开连接，你需要运行MTGALauncher.exe来更新到最新版本的MTG竞技场。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_Start.oracleText: MTG Arena is now offline for scheduled downtime. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_Start.translation: 《MTG竞技场》已下线进行例行停机维护。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_Warning.oracleText: We will be entering maintenance soon. Please see the Status Page (https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io/) for more details.
SystemMessage/System_Maintenance_Warning.translation: 游戏即将开始维护。欲了解详情，请访问状态页面（https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io/）。

SystemMessage/System_Matches_Disabled.oracleText: Matchmaking for new games has been taken offline while we investigate an issue. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Matches_Disabled.translation: 在调查问题期间，我们已将新游戏配对功能下线。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Matches_Disruption.oracleText: An issue is currently disrupting some matches. While we work to fix it, please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Matches_Disruption.translation: 目前游戏中存在会影响对局正常进行的问题。我们目前正在努力修复，在此期间欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Matches_Drain.oracleText: Matches have been temporarily disabled for those who have not updated their client. Please update and visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Matches_Drain.translation: 还未更新客户端的牌手暂时无法进行对局。请更新你的客户端。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Matches_Restored.oracleText: Matchmaking is back online and players can once again start new matches. If you experience any matchmaking issues, contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Matches_Restored.translation: 配对功能已重新上线，牌手现能创建新的对局。如果你遇到任何配对问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Matchmaking_Failure.oracleText: You have been dropped from the matchmaking queue. Please wait a few moments and try again.If the problem persists, please contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Matchmaking_Failure.translation: 你已退出配对队列。请于稍后重试。如果此问题依然存在，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Network_IdleDisconn.oracleText: You have been disconnected.  Please reconnect to continue playing.
SystemMessage/System_Network_IdleDisconn.translation: 你已被断开。请重新连接，以便继续比赛。

SystemMessage/System_Network_IdleTimeout.oracleText: Your session will expire in the next {seconds} seconds and you will be disconnected unless you confirm you're still here and active.
SystemMessage/System_Network_IdleTimeout.translation: 你的会话将在{seconds}秒后过期，届时系统会自动将你断开，请确认你仍在游戏中并处于活跃状态。

SystemMessage/System_Network_LoginQueue_.oracleText: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.
SystemMessage/System_Network_LoginQueue_.translation: 「当了解到他们无法通过这团迷雾，这些妖精只好做他们唯一能做的事：等待。」

SystemMessage/System_Network_LoginQueue_.oracleText: We are experiencing heavy load at the moment, and your login has been queued.  You will be logged in automatically as soon as possible.
SystemMessage/System_Network_LoginQueue_.translation: 当前服务器负载过高，我们已将你的登录请求加入队列。请稍候片刻，登录会自动完成。

SystemMessage/System_Patch.oracleText: We have successfully patched the issues we were experiencing. Thank you for your patience!
SystemMessage/System_Patch.translation: 我们已成功修复先前发生的问题。感谢各位的耐心等待！

SystemMessage/System_Payment_Info_Must_S.oracleText: Payment information must be provided before purchases can be made. Click ‘OK' to open our secure website in a browser.
SystemMessage/System_Payment_Info_Must_S.translation: "需先提供支付信息后才能进行购买。点击「确定」在浏览器中打开我们的安全网站。"

SystemMessage/System_Payment_Removal_Err.oracleText: An unknown error occurred. If this problem persists and you're unable to find a workaround, please contact customer support.
SystemMessage/System_Payment_Removal_Err.translation: 发生未知错误。如果此问题依然存在，且没有解决方法，请联系客户支持。

SystemMessage/System_Payment_Removal_Fai.oracleText: We tried to remove your payment information, but couldn't find any stored for your account. If you believe this is incorrect, please contact customer support.
SystemMessage/System_Payment_Removal_Fai.translation: 我们尝试移除你的支付信息，但并未发现你帐号中储存了相关资料。如果你认为此信息不正确，请联系客户支持。

SystemMessage/System_Payment_Removal_Suc.oracleText: Your payment information has been cleared.

SystemMessage/System_PlayFab_InternalDat.translation: 帐户服务内部数据错误

SystemMessage/System_Purchase_Info_Error.oracleText: Error requesting purchase-confirmation-info on sku {productId} with response code {responseCode}
SystemMessage/System_Purchase_Info_Error.translation: 请求SKU {productId}的购买确认信息时发生错误，回应码为{responseCode}

SystemMessage/System_Read_Terms_Text.oracleText: You must accept the Terms and Conditions to continue.
SystemMessage/System_Read_Terms_Text.translation: 你必须接受条款与细则才能继续。

SystemMessage/System_Remove_Payment_Info.oracleText: Clicking OK will delete your saved payment information. Are you sure?
SystemMessage/System_Remove_Payment_Info.translation: 点击「确定」将删除你保存的支付信息。你确定吗？

SystemMessage/System_Sealed_Disabled.oracleText: Sealed deck events have been taken offline while we investigate an issue. Please visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Sealed_Disabled.translation: 在调查问题期间，所有现开赛事均已下线。欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Sealed_Restored.oracleText: Sealed deck events are back online. If you experience any issues with a sealed deck event, contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Sealed_Restored.translation: 现开赛事已重新上线。如果你在进行现开赛事时遇到问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Server_Full_Text.oracleText: The servers are currently full. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Server_Full_Text.translation: 服务器目前已满。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Skins_Get_Error.oracleText: Unable to get card styles. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Skins_Get_Error.translation: 无法获得卡牌样式。请再试一次。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Down.oracleText: The store is currently offline. While we work to bring it back, you can visit https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io for more information.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Down.translation: 商店现已下线。我们目前正在努力修复，在此期间欲了解详情，请访问https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Products_Get_.oracleText: Unable to get products. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Products_Get_.translation: 无法获取产品。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Restored.oracleText: The store is back online. If you have issues with the store, please contact Customer Service at http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Restored.translation: 商店已重新上线。如果你在使用商店时遇到问题，请访问此网站联系客户服务：http://mtgarena-support.wizards.com。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Scheduled_Com.oracleText: Maintenance is complete and the store is now available.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Scheduled_Com.translation: 维护完成，商店现已可正常使用。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Scheduled_Sta.oracleText: The store has been disabled for maintenance. Please see the Status Page  (https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io/) for more details.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Scheduled_Sta.translation: 因正进行维护，商店当前不可用。欲了解详情，请访问状态页面（https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io/）。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Scheduled_War.oracleText: We will be disabling the store for maintenance in 10 minutes. Please see the Status Page (https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io/) for more details.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Scheduled_War.translation: 因需进行维护，商店将于10分钟后停用。欲了解详情，请访问状态页面（https://magicthegatheringarena.statuspage.io/）。

SystemMessage/System_Store_Status_Error_.oracleText: Unable to reach store. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Store_Status_Error_.translation: 无法访问商店。请于稍后重试。

SystemMessage/System_Update_Payment_Info.oracleText: Click 'OK' to open our secure website in a browser to update payment information.
SystemMessage/System_Update_Payment_Info.translation: 点击「确定」在浏览器中打开我们的安全网站，以更新支付信息。

SystemMessage/System_Wildcard_Redeem_Fai.oracleText: Unable to redeem wildcard. Please try again later.
SystemMessage/System_Wildcard_Redeem_Fai.translation: 无法兑换万用牌。请于稍后重试。

vo_sparky_Renewal_01a.oracleText: Planeswalker, renewal is upon us! Here is when entire sets will rotate of out of the Standard and Alchemy formats.
vo_sparky_Renewal_01a.translation: 鹏洛客，轮替即将到来！以下是整个系列将从标准和炼金赛制中轮替出来的时刻。

vo_sparky_Renewal_01b.oracleText: Planeswalker, renewal is upon us! Here is when entire sets will rotate of out of the Alchemy format.
vo_sparky_Renewal_01b.translation: 鹏洛客，轮替即将到来！以下是整个系列将从炼金赛制中轮替出来的时刻。

vo_sparky_Renewal_02.oracleText: Normally rotation also affects Standard, but not this year!
vo_sparky_Renewal_02.translation: 一般情况下，轮替也会影响标准赛制，但今年除外！

vo_sparky_Renewal_03.oracleText: Be sure to check out the Constructed page under "Ways to Play" in the Codex of the Multiverse to get the full details!
vo_sparky_Renewal_03.translation: 请查看多重宇宙法典中的「怎样玩万智牌」→「构筑」页面，了解更多详情！

vo_sparky_Renewal_03b.oracleText: Be sure to check out the Renewal and Rotation page in the Codex of the Multiverse to get the full details!
vo_sparky_Renewal_03b.translation: 请查看多重宇宙法典中的「更新与轮替」页面，了解更多详情！
